Description: A young woman who dreams of becoming a children's book author makes an unlikely friendship with a cantankerous, rich old widower.

Title: The Recruit
Description: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

Title: Joe
Description: An ex-con, who is the unlikeliest of role models, meets a 15-year-old boy and is faced with the choice of redemption or ruin.

Title: Brain Freeze
Description: A fertilizer used in a rich gated community becomes the source of a genetic mutation that transforms its residents into zombies. Can a teenager and his baby sister break free from the quarantined island before turning into grass?

Title: Hitchcock
Description: The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.

Title: Cobain: Montage of Heck
Description: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.

Title: Vox Lux
Description: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star.

Title: Rogue
Description: An American journalist on assignment in the Australian outback encounters a man-eating crocodile while trapped on a rapidly flooding mud island.

Title: Den of Thieves 2: Pantera
Description: Plot unknown. A sequel to the 2018 film 'Den of Thieves'.

Title: Battle of the Bulge
Description: A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.

Title: Hardbodies
Description: Three middle aged guys rent a beach house to hopefully score with young, single women. Not having what it takes, the men hire a sexy young surfer, Scotty, to teach them some game and help them meet girls.

Title: Oslo, August 31st
Description: One day in the life of Anders, a young recovering drug addict, who takes a brief leave from his treatment center to interview for a job and catch up with old friends in Oslo.

Title: Hvidsten gruppen
Description: The true story of the Fiil family - a family of innkeepers who during Nazi-Germany's occupation of Denmark took up arms against the German occupiers, but in the fight for freedom, some must die so that others may live.

Title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
Description: An eight-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

Title: The Scapegoat
Description: Set in 1952, as England prepares for the coronation, this movie tells the story of two very different men who have one thing in common - a face.

Title: The Song of Names
Description: Several years after his childhood friend, a violin prodigy, disappears on the eve of his first solo concert, an Englishman travels throughout Europe to find him.

Title: The Infernal Machine
Description: A reclusive and controversial author is drawn out of hiding when he begins to receive endless letters from an obsessive fan. What ensues is a dangerous labyrinth as he searches for the person behind the cryptic messages.

Title: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
Description: Upon arriving in a small town where she has inherited a rundown mansion, a famous horror hostess battles an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.

Title: The Critic
Description: The Critic is a story of ambition, blackmail and desire with a dazzling anti-hero at its dark heart. A whodunnit wrapped in a Faustian pact which winds tighter and tighter. Patrick Marber adapted the script from Anthony Quinn's novel.

Title: War and Peace
Description: The Russian aristocracy prepares for the French invasion on the eve of 1812.

Title: El Topo
Description: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.

Title: Malibu Express
Description: A womanizing private detective is assigned the task of investigating who is behind the hi-tech computer technology leaks to the Russians.

Title: God's Not Dead
Description: College philosophy professor Mr. Radisson's curriculum is challenged by his new student, Josh, who believes God exists.

Title: Gloria Bell
Description: A free-spirited woman in her 50s seeks out love at L.A. dance clubs.

Title: Tess
Description: A strong-willed young peasant girl attracts the affection of two men.

Title: Orion and the Dark
Description: Follows Orion, a young boy who is afraid of heights, pets, and rendered nearly catatonic by the worst of all perils: the dark. The Dark takes Orion on a nighttime trip to prove to the youngster that the only thing to fear is fear itself.

Title: Bandits
Description: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.

Title: Santa Sangre
Description: A former circus artist escapes from a mental hospital to rejoin his armless mother - the leader of a strange religious cult - and is forced to enact brutal murders in her name as he becomes "her arms".

Title: The Love Bug
Description: Down-on-his-luck race car driver Jim Douglas teams up with a little VW Bug that has a mind of it's own, not realizing Herbie's worth until a sneaky rival plots to steal him.

Title: 84 Charing Cross Road
Description: True story of a transatlantic business correspondence about used books that developed into a close friendship.

Title: Birdemic: Shock and Terror
Description: A horde of mutated birds descends upon the quiet town of Half Moon Bay, California. As the death toll rises, two citizens manage to fight back, but will they survive Birdemic?

Title: Suffragette
Description: In 1912 London, a young working mother is galvanized into radical political activism supporting the right for women to vote, and is willing to meet violence with violence to achieve this end.

Title: It Snows in Benidorm
Description: Peter has worked all his life at a Manchester bank. When he is awarded an early retirement, he decides to visit his brother in Benidorm, only to discover that he's disappeared.

Title: Cemetery Man
Description: A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.

Title: Novitiate
Description: Set in the early 1960s and during the era of Vatican II, a young woman in training to become a nun struggles with issues of faith, the changing church and sexuality.

Title: Blood for Dust
Description: Cliff, a traveling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family and the myth of the American dream, finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with Ricky, a colleague from a dark past.

Title: Agent Game
Description: A CIA officer finds himself the target of a rendition operation after being scapegoated for the death of an interrogation subject.

Title: Love Wedding Repeat
Description: While trying to make his sister's wedding day go smoothly, Jack finds himself juggling an angry ex-girlfriend, an uninvited guest with a secret, a misplaced sleep sedative, and the girl who got away in alternate versions of the same day.

Title: Merry Ex-Mas
Description: Two unwitting ex-high school sweethearts who, while stranded at a random hotel bar during a snowstorm, discover their first love memories may be more than that after revisiting their past and present lives.

Title: The Stepford Wives
Description: Joanna Eberhart has come to the quaint little town of Stepford, Connecticut with her family, but soon discovers there lies a sinister truth in the all too perfect behavior of the female residents.

Title: In the Electric Mist
Description: A detective in post-Katrina New Orleans has a series of surreal encounters with a troop of ghostly Confederate soldiers while investigating serial killings of local prostitutes, a 1965 lynching, and corrupt local businessmen.

Title: Diabolique
Description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

Title: Mr. Holmes
Description: An aged, retired Sherlock Holmes deals with dementia, as he tries to remember his final case, and a mysterious woman, whose memory haunts him. He also befriends a fan, the young son of his housekeeper, who wants him to work again.

Title: A Fall from Grace
Description: Disheartened since her ex-husband's affair, Grace Waters feels restored by a new romance. But when secrets erode her short-lived joy, Grace's vulnerable side turns violent.

Title: Savage Grace
Description: A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...

Title: Momentum
Description: Four criminals steal diamonds from a safety deposit box in Cape Town, including a drive containing a US senator's evil plans. He'll do anything to get it back from Alexis Olga Kurylenko.

Title: The Road Dance
Description: A young girl lives in the Outer Hebrides in a small village in the years just before WWI. Isolated and hard by the shore, her life takes a dramatic change when a terrible tragedy befalls her.

Title: Broken City
Description: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.

Title: Reds
Description: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia, and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.

Title: The Cotton Club
Description: Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner, and guests (like gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-1930s Harlem.

Title: Bringing Down the House
Description: When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.

Title: Young Adult
Description: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.

Title: A Savage Christmas
Description: After years of estrangement, trans woman Davina Savage returns home for Christmas expecting her transition to be the focus, but it's overshadowed by family secrets and lies which threaten not only their lives--but another Christmas lunch.

Title: New York, I Love You
Description: Eleven love stories set in one of the most loved and hated cities of the world, New York City.

Title: A Man for All Seasons
Description: The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

Title: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
Description: Two newly acquainted music-lovers spend the night scouting the streets of New York City in search of their favourite band's surprise secret show. All the while, they're both being chased after by their tempting but devious exes.

Title: The Man Without a Past
Description: M arrives in Helsinki only to be viciously attacked by thugs and pronounced dead by medics. He revives but with no memory of his past or his identity. He rebuilds his life from scratch, but the past inevitably catches up with him.

Title: Marry My Dead Body
Description: One day a police officer finds a red wedding envelope, only to find out that the owner is in fact a ghost asking for the officer's hand in marriage before reincarnation. What will happen when a human and a ghost form a special bond?

Title: Riddick: Furya
Description: It follows Riddick as he returns to his home world, a place he barely remembers and one he fears might be left in ruins. He finds other Furyans fighting for their existence against a new enemy.

Title: The Amateur
Description: Follows a CIA cryptographer, who manages to blackmail his agency into training him to let him go after a group of terrorist who killed his wife in London.

Title: De Tatta's 2
Description: In De Tatta's 2, the van Kampen family is once again in for a big surprise. They have just settled in among their new friends when they receive the message that the Hollandwijk is threatened with demolition. And then Erik's father asks if he can come and stay.

Title: The Manny
Description: Young industrialist Clemens Klina doesn't have time for his children and accidentally hires a man who actually came to him, seeking revenge, as a nanny for them.

Title: Die in a Gunfight
Description: In New York City, a young guy falls for the daughter of his father's nemesis.

Title: Flyboys
Description: The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.

Title: Problem Child 2
Description: The worst child in the world makes an unthinkable discovery: there is another child even worse than he is--and it's a girl.

Title: Pillow Talk
Description: An interior decorator and a playboy songwriter share a telephone party line and size each other up.

Title: Curse of Chucky
Description: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.

Title: Electric Dreams
Description: An artificially intelligent PC and his human owner find themselves in a romantic rivalry over a woman.

Title: Grotesque
Description: A doctor kidnaps a young couple and forces them into a game of torment that slowly extinguishes their hopes for survival.

Title: Pather Panchali
Description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

Title: Little Flames
Description: Little boy Tommaso has several imaginary friends who like to play cruel pranks on the staff in his house. When new maid Mara arrives, Tommaso bonds with her, but his jealous imaginary friends devise the cruelest prank yet for her.

Title: 777 Charlie
Description: Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

Title: Night of the Missing
Description: A secretive small town sheriff gets a visit from a mysterious woman who recounts bizarre stories involving MISSING persons.

Title: The Mandela Effect
Description: A man becomes obsessed with facts and events that have been collectively misremembered by thousands of people. Believing the phenomena to be the symptom of something larger, his obsession eventually leads him to question reality itself.

Title: Fifty Shades of Black
Description: An inexperienced college student meets a wealthy businessman whose sexual practices put a strain on their relationship.

Title: Screwballs
Description: Frolicking youth comedy about zany high school students set in the 1960s.

Title: Not Without My Daughter
Description: An American woman trapped in Islamic Iran by her brutal husband must find a way to escape with her daughter as well.

Title: The Chorus
Description: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

Title: Joe
Description: Two men--wealthy conservative Bill and far-right factory worker Joe--form a dangerous bond after Bill confesses to Joe about murdering his daughter's drug-dealer boyfriend.

Title: Betrayed
Description: The Braude family's experiences when Norway was occupied by Nazi Germany and Jews were arrested and deported.

Title: Cliffhanger 2
Description: Gabe Walker and his daughter have a mountaineering company in the Italian Alps. A tragedy strikes so Gabe and his daughter must deal with and overcome the tragedy. And some bad guys appear, and all hell breaks loose.

Title: Ryan's Daughter
Description: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.

Title: In a Better World
Description: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

Title: Inside Story
Description: Meet Kalu, a gifted football star whose journey to soccer stardom is complicated when he learns that he is HIV-positive. What follows is an entertaining and educational ride that follows Kalu and the virus within his young body.

Title: Do Not Reply
Description: Chelsea, a teenager, is abducted through a social media app by Brad and is held captive with other girls who are to become victims in his virtual reality filmed murders.

Title: Moving On
Description: Two old friends reconnect at a funeral and decide to get revenge on the widower who messed with them decades before.

Title: The Fan
Description: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

Title: Deathstalker
Description: A lone warrior nicknamed Deathstalker is sent by a witch on a quest to find a sword, a chalice, and an amulet, two of which are held by the wicked king and sorcerer, Munkar.

Title: Nell
Description: In a remote woodland cabin, a small-town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit-woman with many secrets.

Title: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
Description: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Title: Eagle vs Shark
Description: The tale of two socially-awkward misfits and the strange ways they try to find love: through revenge on high-school bullies, burgers, and video games.

Title: The Channel
Description: After their bank heist goes wrong, a desperate criminal, his out-of-control brother, and their motley crew of ex-marines must escape New Orleans and the determined FBI agent who pursues them.

Title: The Libertine
Description: The story of John Wilmot, a.k.a. the Earl of Rochester, a 17th century poet who famously drank and debauched his way to an early grave, only to earn posthumous critical acclaim for his life's work.

Title: Chhichhore
Description: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

Title: When a Stranger Calls
Description: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

Title: Mother/Android
Description: In a post-apocalyptic world rocked by a violent android uprising, a young pregnant woman and her boyfriend desperately search for safety.

Title: Music
Description: Zu is newly sober when she receives news that she is to become the sole guardian of her half-sister named Music, a young girl on the autism spectrum. The film explores two of Sia's favorite themes: finding your voice and creating family.

Title: GomBurZa
Description: Mariano Gomes, José Burgos, and Jacinto Zamora are three brave Filipino Catholic priests whose narrative is told in this stirring and inspirational historical drama.

Title: Sailor Moon Cosmos
Description: The Sailor Senshi team up with the Sailor Starlights to stop Sailor Galaxia from conquering the galaxy.

Title: Superstar
Description: A nerdy Catholic schoolgirl, Mary Katherine Gallagher, dreams of superstardom.

Title: Stan & Ollie
Description: Laurel and Hardy, the world's most famous comedy duo, attempt to reignite their film careers as they embark on what becomes their swan song: a grueling theatre tour of post-war Britain.

Title: Dreamscape
Description: A man who can enter and manipulate people's dreams is recruited by a government agency to help cure the President of the United States of his nightmares about nuclear war but stumbles upon an assassination plot.

Title: The Big Bust-Out
Description: Seven beautiful women in a high security prison set the stage for a big bust out.

Title: Devil in a Blue Dress
Description: A Black war hero is hired to find a mysterious woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal in 1948 Los Angeles.

Title: All About the Benjamins
Description: Bounty hunter Bucum chases bail-jumper Reggie, who runs right into the scene of a diamond heist and murder and gets shot at as well. Later they become partners in their pursuit of the $20M in diamonds and lottery ticket. Their women join.

Title: A Matter of Life and Death
Description: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court, hoping to prolong his fledgling romance with an American girl.

Title: Pom Poko
Description: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.

Title: Control
Description: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

Title: Prizzi's Honor
Description: Two professional assassins fall in love.

Title: Thunderbirds
Description: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

Title: The Bible: In the Beginning...
Description: Extravagant production of the first part of the book of Genesis. Its main highlights are the Garden of Eden, the first brothers, Noah and his family obeying God to build an ark for the Flood and Abraham's attempted sacrifice of Isaac.

Title: Vicky and Her Mystery
Description: Victoria, 8 year old girl whose mother just passed away, relocates with her father in a small mountain village. She finds solace in the adoption of a puppy of unknown origin found in an isolated farm.

Title: Tadpole
Description: Coming-of-age story about a suave 15-year-old prep school student who falls in love with his stepmother. When her best friend responds to his advances, he suddenly finds himself in way over his head.

Title: Jason Goes to Hell
Description: Serial killer Jason Voorhees' supernatural origins are revealed.

Title: Poetic Justice
Description: Grieving hairdresser Justice goes on a road trip from South Central L.A. to Oakland on a mail truck alongside her friend and an obnoxious postal worker.

Title: Game of Love
Description: Vivien accompanies her partner Roy to his childhood home to prepare for the sale of the family estate. Their relationship is put into jeopardy when secrets from Roy's past are revealed.

Title: The Line
Description: A university student lives life without fear of consequences.

Title: Sergeant York
Description: A Tennessee farmer and marksman is drafted in World War I, and struggles with his pacifist inclinations before becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.

Title: The Real Story of January 6
Description: The "Real Story of January 6", a feature documentary by the Epoch Times reveals the truth that has been hidden from the American people.

Title: The Last Song
Description: A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

Title: Orange County
Description: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

Title: White Squall
Description: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

Title: The Good Neighbor
Description: The budding friendship between two very different neighbours takes a tragic turn when David runs over a young woman and causes her death.

Title: My Days of Mercy
Description: The daughter of a man on death row falls in love with a woman on the opposing side of her family's political cause.

Title: Mindhunters
Description: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.

Title: Johnny & Clyde
Description: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are madly in love and on an endless crime spree. They have their sights set on robbing a prosperous casino - owned by crime boss Alana and guarded by a demonic slayer that she commands.

Title: I Am Wrath
Description: Stanley Hill opens a can of brutal vengeance on the thugs who murdered his wife and the corrupt cops who are protecting them.

Title: The Beast
Description: In order to inherit a fortune a young woman agrees to marry a young man. She soon discovers that his family harbours a dark past involving a monstrous beast.

Title: Alien Code
Description: After deciphering a message found in a satellite, brilliant cryptographer Alex Jacobs finds himself being stalked by government agents and otherworldly beings.

Title: Wonder Wheel
Description: On Coney Island in the 1950s, a lifeguard tells the story of a middle-aged carousel operator, his beleaguered wife and the visitor who turns their lives upside-down.

Title: Friday the 13th: Part 3
Description: Jason Voorhees stalks a group of friends who have just arrived to spend the weekend at a cabin near Crystal Lake.

Title: Thoroughly Modern Millie
Description: In New York City during the Roaring Twenties, would-be flapper Millie Dillmount's self-appointed mission to marry her boss is complicated by white slavers and true love.

Title: Yuletide the Knot
Description: Small town wedding planner Rachel is planning her biggest Christmas wedding for an influencer couple, is thrown a surprise when the bride's manager turns out to be Logan, her first love and high school sweetheart - her one that got away.
A family man struggling to hold it all together discovers a hidden parlor that offers a solution...sexbots.

Title: Creation of the Gods I: Kingdom of Storms
Description: A magnificent eastern high fantasy epic that recreates the prolonged mythical wars between humans, immortals and monsters, which happened more than three thousand years ago.

Title: Bubba Ho-Tep
Description: When residents of their nursing home start dying of dubious causes, an aged Elvis and an African-American senior who claims to be President John F. Kennedy discover that the perpetrator is an Egyptian mummy with murderous intentions.

Title: Tamasha
Description: A boy meets a girl, in Corsica. They decide not to reveal their real name or personality.

Title: Assassination Nation
Description: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

Title: At Close Range
Description: Reunited with his career criminal father, tough teen Brad thinks he's found his ticket to an exciting life of crime, only to find out he's wrong.

Title: Aladdin 2
Description: Sequel to Disney's live-action version of Aladdin.

Title: Below
Description: Strange happenings occur on a WW II submarine.

Title: My Friend Dahmer
Description: A young Jeffrey Dahmer struggles to belong in high school.

Title: Gallipoli
Description: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

Title: High School High
Description: Richard Clark has just left the well-known Wellington Academy to teach at Marion Barry High School. Now, he will try to inspire the D-average students into making good grades and try to woo a fellow teacher.

Title: The Big Hit
Description: Socially anxious hitman Melvin Smiley, an expert in his lucrative field, goes on a job and falls in love with his kidnapping victim, turning his world upside down.

Title: Madame Claude
Description: Paris, in the late 1960s. Madame Claude is at the head of a flourishing business dedicated to prostitution that gives her power over both the French political and criminal worlds. But the end of her empire is closer than she thinks.

Title: I Don't Expect Anyone to Believe Me
Description: A young man who wants to be a writer travels to Barcelona to study literature. In the Spanish city he is involved in a criminal business.

Title: Bushwhacked
Description: Framed for murder and on the run from authorities, a sleazy courier poses as a scout leader. But he has no idea what he's in for when he must actually take charge of a group of kids on a hiking trip.

Title: Don't Bother to Knock
Description: After being dumped by his girlfriend, an airline pilot pursues a babysitter in his hotel and gradually realizes she's dangerous.

Title: Frank
Description: Jon, a young wanna-be musician, discovers he's bitten off more than he can chew when he joins an eccentric pop band led by the mysterious and enigmatic Frank.

Title: Angela
Description: After a turbulent separation and having to give up custody of her three children, the famous socialite Ângela Diniz meets Raul, and believes she has found someone who loves her free spirit as much as she does.

Title: Chaver
Description: Political thugs commit an abhorrent crime, taking an innocent bystander on the run. The police chase them, and moral dilemmas arise among them. The bystander's fate remains ambiguous. Escaping justice, they face life-altering consequences.

Title: A Chorus Line
Description: Hopefuls try out before a demanding director for a part in a new musical.

Title: Veronica Mars
Description: Years after walking away from her past as a young private eye, Veronica Mars gets pulled back to her hometown, just in time for her high school reunion, in order to help her old flame Logan Echolls, who's embroiled in a murder mystery.

Title: The Big Sleep
Description: Grizzled American private detective in England investigates a complicated case of blackmail turned murder involving a rich but honest elderly general, his two loose socialite daughters, a pornographer and a gangster.

Title: Phoenix the Warrior
Description: In a post-apocalyptic world, women warriors battle each other from junkyards to gravel pits as they determine the fate of the entire world.

Title: In My Mother's Skin
Description: Stranded in the Philippines during World War II, a young girl finds that her duty to protect her dying mother is complicated by her misplaced trust in a beguiling, flesh-eating fairy.

Title: One from the Heart
Description: A couple has a fight after living together 5 years in Las Vegas. They go out and celebrate 4th of July, each with a new partner. Breakup?

Title: All Eyez on Me
Description: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

Title: Flawless
Description: In 1960s London, an elderly janitor convinces a glass-ceiling constrained executive to help him steal a handful of diamonds from their employer, the London Diamond Corporation.

Title: The Sugarland Express
Description: A woman attempts to reunite her family by helping her husband escape prison and together kidnapping their son. But things don't go as planned when they are forced to take a police hostage on the road.

Title: He Got Game
Description: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

Title: Freddy's Fridays
Description: An evil man lures female victims to his lair to be sacrificed by monsters.

Title: Skanda: The Attacker
Description: When his sister is put into a coma, a man vows to get revenge on the corrupt men who injured her.

Title: Philomena
Description: A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.

Title: Pinocchio
Description: Old woodcarver Geppetto's puppet creation, Pinocchio, magically comes to life with dreams of becoming a real boy. Easily led astray, Pinocchio tumbles from one misadventure to another as he is tricked, kidnapped and chased by bandits.

Title: Some of My Best Friends Are...
Description: A dramatic expose of the lives of a group of gays who meet in a New York City bar on Christmas Eve.

Title: Survivor
Description: A Foreign Service Officer in London tries to prevent a terrorist attack set to hit New York City, but is forced to go on the run when she is framed for crimes she did not commit.

Title: Jennifer 8
Description: John Berlin, a former Los Angeles homicide detective, investigates a multiple murder case in San Diego. The only witness is a blind girl to whom he is immediately attracted.

Title: Three Identical Strangers
Description: In 1980 New York, three young men who were all adopted meet each other and find out they're triplets who were separated at birth. But their quest to find out why turns into a bizarre and sinister mystery.

Title: Sleeping Dogs
Description: After undergoing a cutting-edge Alzheimer's treatment protocol, a former homicide detective reexamines a decade old case involving the brutal murder of a college professor - and it's as if he's investigating the case for the first time.

Title: Jexi
Description: Phil makes top 10 pop lists at work. His only "friend" is cellphone Siri. His new phone includes AI helper Jexi, who improves/controls his social life.

Title: 7th Secret
Description: A young wife harboring a secret finds herself wrapped up in a double life.

Title: Bleed for This
Description: The inspirational story of World Champion Boxer Vinny Pazienza who, after a near fatal car crash which left him not knowing if he'd ever walk again, made one of sports' most incredible comebacks.

Title: Palm Swings
Description: After moving to Palm Springs, a young married couple puts their love to the test when they discover their neighbors are swingers.

Title: We Have Never Been Modern
Description: Helena is about to give birth and face a rosy future in a modern city as the wife of a successful young factory manager.

Title: The Transformers: The Movie
Description: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

Title: Judgment Night
Description: Four young friends, while taking a shortcut en route to a local boxing match, witness a brutal murder which leaves them running for their lives.

Title: The Operative
Description: A woman is recruited by the Mossad to work undercover in Tehran.

Title: Red Tails
Description: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.

Title: Mame
Description: Following the death of his father, an orphan is sent to live with his free-spirited aunt.

Title: Truth or Die
Description: Young British boys and girls travel to an isolated cabin after being promised a night of heavy partying. Instead of the fun they hoped for, they meet a killer out to reap vengeance on them for the death of his brother.

Title: Down by Love
Description: Based on a true story, the impossible love between a prison director and one of its female inmates.

Title: The Kindness of Strangers
Description: The story of people whose lives intertwine during a dramatic winter in New York City.

Title: Walk Don't Run
Description: During the housing shortage of the Summer Olympic Games in 1964, two men and a woman share a small apartment in Tokyo, and the older man soon starts playing Cupid to the younger pair.

Title: 24 Hour Party People
Description: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

Title: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Description: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.

Title: Black Cat, White Cat
Description: Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.

Title: Eden
Description: A young Korean-American girl, abducted and forced into prostitution by domestic human traffickers, cooperates with her captors in a desperate ploy to survive.

Title: The Jazz Singer
Description: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of being a popular singer.

Title: Godzilla vs. Destoroyah
Description: The aftermath of the Oxygen Destroyer brings forth Destoroyah, a beast intent on killing Godzilla, who is on the verge of a nuclear meltdown.

Title: Parental Guidance
Description: Artie and Diane Decker agree to look after their three grandchildren when their type-A helicopter parents need to go out of town for work. Problems arise when their 21st-century behavior collides with Artie and Diane's old-school methods.

Title: Stormbreaker
Description: After the death of his uncle, the 14-year-old schoolboy Alex Rider is forced by the Special Operations Division of the UK's secret intelligence service, MI6, into a mission which will save millions of lives.

Title: Soul Man
Description: To achieve his dream of attending Harvard, a pampered teen poses as a young black man to receive a full scholarship.

Title: Monolith
Description: A mother and her son plan a surprise visit to Los Angeles to see her husband/his father. Halfway there they get into a terrible accident in the middle of nowhere and now must fight to survive.

Title: Three Men and a Little Lady
Description: Three ex-dads quickly discover how empty life is without their little lady, and go to outrageous lengths in their efforts to win their daughter back in this critically acclaimed and equally charming sequel.

Title: Darby O'Gill and the Little People
Description: A wily old codger matches wits with the King of the Leprechauns and helps play matchmaker for his daughter and the strapping lad who has replaced him as caretaker.

Title: Finding 'Ohana
Description: A summer in rural O‘ahu takes an exciting turn for two Brooklyn-raised siblings when a journal pointing to long-lost treasure sets them on an epic adventure with new friends, and leads them to reconnect with their Hawaiian heritage.

Title: Supercell
Description: A teenage boy runs away to follow in the footsteps of his father, legendary storm chaser Bill Brody.

Title: Fellini Satyricon
Description: A series of disjointed mythical tales set in first-century Rome.

Title: 16 Blocks
Description: An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.

Title: We Are the Flesh
Description: After wandering a ruined city for years in search of food and shelter, two siblings find their way into one of the last remaining buildings. Inside, they find a man who will make them a dangerous offer to survive the outside world.

Title: Hot Pursuit
Description: An uptight and by-the-book cop (Reese Witherspoon) tries to protect the outgoing widow (Sofia Vergara) of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

Title: Hellhole
Description: In 1987 Poland, a police officer investigating mysterious disappearances infiltrates a remote monastery and discovers a dark truth about its clergy.

Title: I, Frankenstein
Description: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries-old war between two immortal clans.

Title: Belly
Description: Two young friends involved in organized crime and drug dealing find that their priorities differ.

Title: The Tin Star
Description: A cynical former sheriff turned bounty hunter helps a young, recently appointed acting sheriff with his advice, his experience and his gun.

Title: Prom Night
Description: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

Title: Lie with Me
Description: An author returns to his hometown of Cognac for the first time in 35 years to help promote a distillery. He is also there to face the memories of his first love. The people & places he returns to evoke many feelings from the past.

Title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
Description: Guinevere Pettigrew, a middle-aged London governess, finds herself unfairly dismissed from her job. An attempt to gain new employment catapults her into the glamorous world and dizzying social whirl of an American actress and singer, Delysia Lafosse.

Title: Lost in the Night
Description: Emiliano lives in a small mining town in Mexico. Motivated by a deep sense of justice, he searches for those responsible for the disappearance of his activist mother who was standing up for local jobs against an international mining company. Receiving no help from the police or judicial system, he finds a clue that leads him to the wealthy Aldama Family, where he meets a famous artist, his celebrity wife and their beautiful daughter. It's not long before he has a job at their home and becomes determined to uncover the secrets beneath the surface.

Title: Son of Saul
Description: A Jewish-Hungarian concentration camp prisoner sets out to give a child he mistook for his son a proper burial.

Title: Tender Mercies
Description: A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.

Title: Ironmaster
Description: A violent man is ejected from his tribe after killing two of its elders, but he discovers a way to make weapons out of iron, and begins waging war against all the tribes in the region. His arch rival manages to escape and vows to stop him.

Title: Rings
Description: A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in 7 days.

Title: Umma
Description: Amanda and her daughter live a quiet life on an American farm, but when the remains of her estranged mother arrive from Korea, Amanda becomes haunted by the fear of turning into her own mother.

Title: SuperFly
Description: With retirement on his mind, a successful Atlanta-based drug dealer sets up one last big job while dealing with trigger-happy colleagues and the police.

Title: Rifftrax: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
Description: Mike Nelson and Neil Patrick Harris riff on the movie with the chicken-slaughtering candy-maker himself, Willy Wonka.

Title: The Quake
Description: In 1904 an earthquake of magnitude 5.4 on the Richter scale shook Oslo, with an epicenter in the "Oslo Graben" which runs under the Norwegian capital. There are now signs that indicate that we can expect a major future earthquake in Oslo.

Title: Big Time Adolescence
Description: A suburban teenager comes of age under the destructive guidance of his best friend, an aimless college dropout.

Title: Backcountry
Description: An urban couple goes camping in the woods and find themselves lost in the territory of a predatory black bear.

Title: Max
Description: A military dog that helped American Marines in Afghanistan returns to the United States and is adopted by his handler's family after suffering a traumatic experience.

Title: The Sessions
Description: A man in an iron lung who wishes to lose his virginity contacts a professional sex surrogate with the help of his therapist and priest.

Title: A Woman Under the Influence
Description: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

Title: Heart of Champions
Description: During their last year at an Ivy League college in 1999, a group of friends and crew teammates' lives are changed forever when an army vet takes over as coach of their dysfunctional rowing team.

Title: Twins of Evil
Description: A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Frieda, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.

Title: Captain Ron
Description: A Chicagoan inherits an old yacht. He, his wife, daughter and son fly to a Caribbean island and hire a dubious Captain Ron to sail them on an adventure to Miami.

Title: The Experiment
Description: 26 men are chosen to participate in the roles of guards and prisoners in a psychological study that ultimately spirals out of control.

Title: The Imposter
Description: A documentary centered on a young man in Spain who claims to a grieving Texas family that he is their 16-year-old son who has been missing for 3 years.

Title: The Legend of Molly Johnson
Description: A lonely bushwoman struggles to raise her children and run the family farm while her husband is away.

Title: Stolen Vacation
Description: Carlos Camargo and his family live a life that they just can't afford, full of debt he comes across a wad of money and takes his family on a dream vacation.

Title: Last Shift
Description: A rookie cop is tasked with taking the last shift at a police station before it is permanently closed, but it turns into a living nightmare.

Title: Rock-A-Doodle
Description: In order to defeat the wicked Grand Duke of Owls, a young boy, transformed into a cat, teams up with a group of barnyard animals to find the rooster who can raise the sun.

Title: The Crimson Rivers
Description: A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.

Title: Lone Star
Description: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

Title: Christmas in the Caribbean
Description: Follows an abandoned British bride, who spends December in the Caribbean with her bridesmaids as love blossoms.

Title: Injustice
Description: On an alternate Earth, the Joker tricks Superman into killing Lois Lane, which causes a rampage in the hero. Superman decides to take control of Earth; Batman and his allies will have to attempt to stop him.

Title: Rogue City
Description: Caught in the cross hairs of police corruption and Marseille's warring gangs, a loyal cop must protect his squad by taking matters into his own hands.

Title: The Scarlet Letter
Description: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

Title: Santa Paws 2: The Santa Pups
Description: When the Christmas spirit mysteriously begins to disappear, the playful and mischievous Santa Pups - Hope, Jingle, Charity and Noble - must race to save Christmas.

Title: Acrimony
Description: A faithful wife, tired of standing by her devious husband, is enraged when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.

Title: Wintertide
Description: Beth, a volunteer watchperson of an isolated northern city battles a plague of depression that transforms the few remaining residents into empty, zombie-like automatons.

Title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
Description: A Heffley family road trip to attend Meemaw's 90th birthday party goes hilariously off course thanks to Greg's newest scheme to get to a video gaming convention.

Title: My Little Pony: The Movie
Description: After a dark force conquers Canterlot, the Mane 6 embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship to save their homeland.

Title: Lemon
Description: A man watches his life unravel after he is left by his girlfriend of 10 years.

Title: Girl in the Picture
Description: A young mother's mysterious death and her son's subsequent kidnapping blow open a decades-long mystery about the woman's true identity and the murderous federal fugitive at the center of it all.

Title: Paul, Apostle of Christ
Description: Luke risks his life to visit Paul, who is captive in a Roman prison under Nero's rule. Together, they struggle against a determined emperor and the frailties of the human spirit to live out the Gospel and spread the message to the world.

Title: Kill Chain
Description: Three strangers' lives are inevitably entangled in a conflict none of them are prepared for.

Title: Catchfire
Description: A witness to a mob assassination flees for her life, running from town to town and switching identities along the way, but she cannot seem to elude Milo, the chief hit man sent after her.

Title: The Professionals
Description: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

Title: Talvar
Description: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

Title: Worth
Description: An attorney in Washington D.C. battles against cynicism, bureaucracy and politics to help the victims of 9/11.

Title: Rangasthalam 1985
Description: Chitti Babu begins to suspect his elder brother's life is in danger after they team up to lock horns with their village president and overthrow his unlawful 30 year old regime.

Title: The Christmas Star
Description: A counterfeiter finds the true meaning of the holidays.

Title: In Secret
Description: Thérèse grows up with her aunt and cousin. Around 1860 the aunt decides they move to Paris and that her son and Thérèse get married. The joy- and loveless life changes when her husband brings a friend home. The affair turns ugly for all.

Title: Maria
Description: Follows the life story of the world's greatest opera singer, Maria Callas, during her final days in 1970s Paris.

Title: Mass
Description: The parents of both the shooter and one of the victims of a school shooting tragedy agree to meet and talk in an attempt to move forward.

Title: Pump Up the Volume
Description: Mark runs a pirate radio station and causes an uproar when he speaks his mind and enthralls fellow teens.

Title: Bill
Description: What really happened during Shakespeare's 'Lost Years'? Hopeless lute-player Bill Shakespeare leaves his home to follow his dream.

Title: Help!
Description: Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

Title: Rogue
Description: O'Hara is a mercenary leading a squad of soldiers on their mission to rescue hostages in a remote part of Africa. Unfortunately, the mission goes awry and the team is stranded and forced to survive against the local rebels.

Title: Max Keeble's Big Move
Description: Max Keeble, the victim of his 7th grade class, plots revenge when he learns that he's moving, but it backfires when he isn't after all.

Title: 55 Days at Peking
Description: During the 1900 Boxer Rebellion, U.S. marine, Maj. Matt Lewis, along with British consul, Sir Arthur Robertson, develop a plan to keep the rebels at bay until an international military relief force can arrive.

Title: The Decameron
Description: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".

Title: Big Bug
Description: A group of bickering suburbanites find themselves stuck together when an android uprising causes their well intentioned household robots to lock them in for their own safety.

Title: Bandidas
Description: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

Title: The Rover
Description: 10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.

Title: Extra Ordinary Man
Description: A former movie extra tells the story of how he became a smuggler and vigilante hero.

Title: Duck, You Sucker!
Description: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

Title: All About Me
Description: Dramatised origin story of one of Germany's most beloved contemporary comedians.

Title: Endless Journey
Description: After an accidental death during an interrogation, a police team is disbanded and imprisoned. Once released, the former leader reunites the group to persistently pursue the remaining suspect in an unsolved murder case over the next decade.

Title: Red River
Description: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

Title: The Survivalist
Description: In a time of starvation, a survivalist lives off a small plot of land hidden deep in forest. When two women seeking food and shelter discover his farm, he finds his existence threatened.

Title: First Love
Description: The story is described as a poignant look at a young man's difficult entry into adulthood.

Title: Summertime
Description: A young woman moves from the French countryside to Paris and begins a passionate love affair with a feminist leader in this drama set in 1970s France.

Title: Mixed by Erry
Description: The rise and fall of the pirate mixtape empire of three brothers from Naples and their "Mixed by Erry"-trademarked cassettes that brought pop music to 1980s Italian youth.

Title: Night of the Creeps
Description: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

Title: God's Creatures
Description: In a windswept fishing village, a mother is torn between protecting her beloved son and her own sense of right and wrong. A lie she tells for him rips apart their family and close-knit community in this tense, sweepingly emotional epic.

Title: The Asphalt Jungle
Description: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

Title: Malevolent
Description: A team of scam artists get more than they bargained for when a job at a haunted country estate gets out of hand.

Title: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone
Description: A veteran Vegas magician tries to revive his career after his longtime partner quits, he gets fired from his casino act, and an edgy new "street magician" steals his thunder.

Title: Bait
Description: A freak tsunami traps shoppers at a coastal Australian supermarket inside the building - along with 12-foot Great White Sharks.

Title: The Canterbury Tales
Description: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.

Title: Total Eclipse
Description: Young, wild poet Arthur Rimbaud and his mentor Paul Verlaine engage in a fierce, forbidden romance while feeling the effects of a hellish artistic lifestyle.

Title: Little
Description: A woman is transformed into her younger self at a point in her life when the pressures of adulthood become too much to bear.

Title: C.H.U.D.
Description: A bizarre series of sudden disappearances on the streets of New York City seems to point toward something unsavory living in the sewers.

Title: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
Description: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in an inhumanely grueling dance marathon.

Title: Quarantine
Description: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.

Title: Pussy Island
Description: Frida is a young waitress in Los Angeles who has her eye on tech entrepreneur Slater King. When she gets to go to an intimate meeting on his private island. Frida senses there's more to it than meets the eye.

Title: Scarface
Description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

Title: Raising Helen
Description: After her sister and brother-in-law die in a car accident, a young woman becomes the guardian of their three children.

Title: Marmalade
Description: Follows a man in jail who narrates the colorful tale of a romantic bank heist to his cunning cellmate to escape and reunite with the alluring love of his life.

Title: The Sacrifice
Description: At the dawn of World War III, a man searches for a way to restore peace to the world and finds he must give something in return.

Title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
Description: A clumsy daydreamer gets caught up in a sinister conspiracy.

Title: London
Description: At a drug laden party in a New York loft, a young man tries to win back his ex-girlfriend.

Title: Hatchet
Description: When a group of tourists in a New Orleans haunted swamp tour find themselves stranded in the wilderness, their evening of fun and spooks turns into a horrific nightmare.

Title: MacGruber
Description: Former special operative MacGruber is called back into action to take down his arch-enemy, Dieter Von Cunth, who's in possession of a nuclear warhead and bent on destroying Washington, D.C.

Title: Sissi - Die junge Kaiserin
Description: The second in a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the film chronicles the married life of the young empress as she tries to adjust to formal and strict life in the palace and an overbearing mother-in-law.

Title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
Description: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

Title: Blood Work
Description: Still recovering from a heart transplant, retired F.B.I. profiler Terry McCaleb (Clint Eastwood) returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

Title: Lost Horizon
Description: When a revered diplomat's plane is diverted and crashes in the peaks of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to an isolated monastery at Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.

Title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King
Description: A lone sellsword named Guts gets recruited into a mercenary band and attempts to help the Band's leader, Griffith, on his rise to power.

Title: The Big Easy
Description: A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.

Title: Coal Miner's Daughter
Description: The fictionalized life of singer Loretta Lynn, a girl who rose from humble beginnings to become a country music star in the 1960s/70s.

Title: The Piano Lesson
Description: Follows the lives of the Charles family as they deal with themes of family legacy and more, in deciding what to do with an heirloom, the family piano.

Title: Gumraah
Description: The murder investigation of a young man takes an unexpected turn when the cops discover that the prime suspect has a lookalike.

Title: Felon
Description: Locked up for killing an intruder in self-defense, a family man must cope with life in the violent penal system.

Title: The Omega Man
Description: Dr Robert Neville has developed an experimental vaccine which makes him the only immune survivor of a biological catastrophe. A gang of homicidal mutants blame science for their condition and attempt to kill him.

Title: El Cid
Description: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz de Vivar (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

Title: Cosmic Sin
Description: Seven rogue soldiers launch a preemptive strike against a newly discovered alien civilization in the hopes of ending an interstellar war before it starts.

Title: Cape Fear
Description: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.

Title: Cellular
Description: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped, and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

Title: Man Behind the Sun
Description: Japanese troops round up Chinese and Russian prisoners of war and take them to unit 731, where they're horribly tortured and experimented on to test new biological weapons.

Title: Human Traffic
Description: Five youngsters embrace the 90s clubbing scene on a drug-fuelled weekend of partying in Cardiff.

Title: Escape Room
Description: Six friends test their intelligence when an escape room they participate in takes a dark and twisted turn.

Title: Pollyanna
Description: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

Title: Only Yesterday
Description: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

Title: The Last Days of American Crime
Description: In the not-too-distant future, as a final response to terrorism and crime, the U.S. government plans to broadcast a signal making it impossible for anyone to knowingly commit unlawful acts.

Title: Old Dogs
Description: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside-down when strange circumstances lead them to be the temporary guardians of 7-year-old twins.

Title: The Painter
Description: An ex-CIA operative is thrown back into a dangerous world when a mysterious woman from his past resurfaces. Now exposed and targeted by a relentless killer and a rogue black ops program, he must rely on skills he thought he left behind.

Title: Darlings
Description: It follows the lives of two women as they find courage and love in exceptional circumstances.

Title: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
Description: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

Title: One for the Money
Description: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Title: Misconduct
Description: When an ambitious young lawyer takes on a big case against a powerful and ruthless executive of a large pharmaceutical company, he soon finds himself involved in a case of blackmail and corruption.

Title: Death of a Unicorn
Description: Father-Daughter duo, Riley and Elliot, hit a unicorn with their car and bring it to the wilderness retreat of a mega-wealthy pharmaceutical CEO.

Title: Horror of Dracula
Description: When Jonathan Harker rouses the ire of Count Dracula after accepting a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses, his friend Dr. Van Helsing hunts for the predatory villain.

Title: Krampus Unleashed
Description: In pursuit of buried treasure, a group of fortune hunters unearth an ancient demonic summoning stone that holds a terrible curse and awakens a timeless evil, the Krampus. After centuries of slumber, Krampus has awoken with a thirst for blood.

Title: Miss Violence
Description: A chilling account of a horrendous family tragedy perpetuated behind closed doors. As chronic violence chips away at the household's elaborate façade, the shocking secret reveals that almost nothing is as it seems.

Title: Manon of the Spring
Description: A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.

Title: Maximum Truth
Description: A documentary crew follows political grifter Rick Klingman as he teams up with his sketchy buddy Simon to take down a rival congressional candidate.

Title: Powder Blue
Description: Four Los Angelenos, a mortician, an ex-con, a suicidal ex-priest, and a stripper, are brought together on Christmas Eve by a mixture of circumstances.

Title: Lucky Day
Description: Red, a safe cracker who has just been released from prison, is trying to hold his family together as his past catches up with him in the form of Luc, a psychopathic contract killer who's seeking revenge for the death of his brother.

Title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones
Description: When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

Title: She
Description: An Edwardian archaeologist and two companions stumble upon a lost city in East Africa, run by a beautiful queen whose love holds the promise of immortality.

Title: Darkness Falls
Description: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

Title: Amar
Description: Laura and Carlos love each other as if every day was the last, and perhaps that first love intensity is what will tear them apart a year later.

Title: The Flood
Description: A daring jail break during a dangerous Louisiana hurricane is interrupted by a horde of large hungry alligators.

Title: Transfusion
Description: A former Special Forces operative thrust into the criminal underworld to keep his only son from being taken from him.

Title: The Ice Pirates
Description: In a distant future scarce of water, space pirates get caught after stealing ice from a spaceship. They are sold to a princess looking for her dad. He might have found a planet abundant with water.

Title: Camelot
Description: The story of the marriage of England's King Arthur to Guinevere. The plot of illegitimate Mordred to gain the throne and Guinevere's growing attachment to Sir Lancelot, threaten to topple Arthur and destroy his "round table" of knights.

Title: Don't Listen
Description: Daniel and Sara have a 9-year-old son, Eric, and they've just moved to a new home not knowing the neighbours call it "the house of the voices". Eric is the first one to notice the odd noises behind each door.

Title: Gilda
Description: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

Title: Bajirao Mastani
Description: An account of the romance between the Maratha general, Baji Rao I and Mastani, princess of Bundelkhand.

Title: Ra.One
Description: When the titular antagonist of an action game takes on physical form, it's only the game's less powerful protagonist who can save his creator's family.

Title: A Perfect Christmas Pairing
Description: Top chef Grace Cooke rips in reviews due to her gastro-scientific approach to cuisine. She takes time off to see her family over Christmas and connects with traveler Asher St. James, where Asher helps her reconnect with her roots.

Title: I Spit on Your Grave: Deja Vu
Description: Cinema's top lethal lady vengeance returns in the most anticipated sequel of all time.

Title: One Cut of the Dead
Description: Things go badly for a hack director and film crew shooting a low budget zombie movie in an abandoned WWII Japanese facility, when they are attacked by real zombies.

Title: Them!
Description: The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.

Title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
Description: During World War II, an American navy ship is sunk by a Japanese submarine leaving 890 crewmen stranded in shark infested waters.

Title: Night Train
Description: A single mom struggling to make ends meet as a Hollywood teamster evades capture by a ruthless FBI Agent while running black market medical supplies in her legendary souped-up pickup truck.

Title: The Brood
Description: A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.

Title: The Violent Men
Description: A bitter land dispute causes a Civil War veteran to take extreme action.

Title: Diabolique
Description: The wife and mistress of the sadistic dean of an exclusive prep school conspire to murder him.

Title: Romeo Is Bleeding
Description: A womanizing, crooked cop on the payroll of the mafia is confronted with the reality of his double life after he is asked to kill a beautiful and ruthless Russian gangster.

Title: Detective Knight: Rogue
Description: As Los Angeles prepares for Halloween, mask-wearing armed robbers critically wound detective James Knight's partner in a shootout following a heist.

Title: Madea Goes to Jail
Description: Mischievous grandma Madea lands in jail, where she meets a variety of mixed-up characters.

Title: The Sons of Katie Elder
Description: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.

Title: Loser
Description: A college student, branded a loser by his roommates and booted from the dorm, falls in love with a coed who has eyes for their condescending professor.

Title: Solomon Kane
Description: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.

Title: It's a Wonderful Life: The Rest of the Story
Description: George Bailey's troubled grandson is forever changed when his Aunt Zuzu comes back as an angel and reveals how much better the world would have been had he never been born. Production is moving forward steadily as of May 2015 according to producer Bob Farnsworth, CEO and founder of Hummingbird Productions in Nashville, TN.

Title: Ironclad
Description: In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.

Title: Turistas
Description: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

Title: Megan Leavey
Description: Based on the true life story of a young Marine corporal whose unique discipline and bond with her military combat dog saved many lives during their deployment in Iraq.

Title: Personal Best
Description: The intertwined lives and loves of three highly ranked athletes striving for the national team; Chris bounces between the beds of male coach Terry and her female friend, competitor, and role model Tory.

Title: A Dark Song
Description: A determined young woman and a damaged occultist risk their lives and souls to perform a dangerous ritual that will grant them what they want.

Title: Ronnie O'Sullivan: The Edge of Everything
Description: The film focuses on understanding the player's genius, illuminating his past through archive family footage and charts his rise to fame from his early teens and the mental challenges he has overcome in the pursuit of perfection.

Title: Step Up Revolution
Description: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

Title: Orlando
Description: After Queen Elizabeth I commands him not to grow old, a young nobleman struggles with love and his place in the world.

Title: Remember
Description: With the aid of a fellow Auschwitz survivor and a hand-written letter, an elderly man with dementia goes in search of the person he believes to be responsible for the death of his family in the death camp to kill him himself.

Title: Notorious
Description: The life and death story of The Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

Title: Seems Like Old Times
Description: Wrongfully accused of a bank robbery, a writer seeks the help of his ex-wife, who is now married to the soon-to-be Attorney General of California.

Title: Dil Chahta Hai
Description: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

Title: Stay Tuned
Description: A husband and wife are sucked into a hellish television set and must survive the gauntlet of twisted versions of shows in which they find themselves.

Title: Chernobyl: Abyss
Description: A story about a heroic fireman who worked as one of Chernobyl liquidators.

Title: American Ninja
Description: American soldier, obviously very skilled in martial arts, single-handedly takes on mercenaries in the Philippines.

Title: Peeping Tom
Description: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

Title: Livid
Description: The suggestion of a big treasure hidden somewhere inside Mrs Jessel's once renowned classical dance academy will become an irresistible lure to a fiendish trap for Lucie and her friends.

Title: House of the Dead
Description: A group of college students travels to a mysterious island to attend a rave, which is soon taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.

Title: Showdown in Little Tokyo
Description: Two L.A. cops with opposing views on what is the best way to uphold the law have to work together to bring down the Yakuza, while trying to protect a beautiful woman.

Title: A Haunted House
Description: Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home, then learn that a demon also resides there. When Kisha becomes possessed, Malcolm--determined to keep his sex life on track--turns to a priest, a psychic, and a ghostbusting team for help.

Title: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
Description: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

Title: The East
Description: A young Dutch soldier deployed to suppress post-WWII independence efforts in the Netherlands' colony of Indonesia finds himself torn between duty and conscience when he joins an increasingly ruthless commander's elite squad.

Title: The Anniversary Party
Description: Love is complex and relationships deteriorate.

Title: The Burning Sea
Description: An oil platform dramatically goes down on the Norwegian coast, and researchers try to find out what happened when they realize this is just the start of something even more serious.

Title: Incredibles 3
Description: Plot unknown. Upcoming Walt Disney Animation Studios film, in co-production with Walt Disney Pictures.

Title: A Vigilante
Description: After escaping her violent husband, Sadie makes it her life's mission to help free others in danger. After months of rigorous training in survival skills, boxing, and lethal martial arts, she is back with a vengeance.

Title: Careful What You Wish For
Description: A guy gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker. Soon, a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal.

Title: Lions for Lambs
Description: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

Title: Club Zero
Description: A teacher takes a job at an elite school and forms a strong bond with five students - a relationship that eventually takes a dangerous turn.

Title: Bleach
Description: A Japanese teenager with the ability to see ghosts gains a soul reaper's powers and begins his duties as a substitute soul reaper.

Title: Blithe Spirit
Description: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writer's block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife, which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

Title: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
Description: High school senior Katey moves to Havana in November 1958, when her dad gets a promotion at Ford. She meets a local waiter, who introduces her to sensual Cuban music/dance. They enter a big dance contest for the prize when he gets fired.

Title: Adam's Apples
Description: A neo-Nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devoted minister.

Title: Wolves
Description: A boy is trying to find out about his family history and stumbles upon a town of lycans.

Title: Welcome Home
Description: A couple spend a weekend at a vacation rental home in the Italian countryside in an attempt to repair their relationship, but soon become victims of the homeowner's sinister plans.

Title: My Dad's Christmas Date
Description: A 16-year-old tries to play matchmaker for her widowed father during Christmastime.

Title: Hands of Stone
Description: The legendary Roberto Duran and his equally legendary trainer Ray Arcel change each other's lives.

Title: Vice Versa
Description: Divorced executive Marshall and his 11-year-old son Charlie casually touch a magical Tibetan skull, releasing a mysterious power that transfers Marshall's mind to Charlie's body and vice versa. Their problems have just begun.

Title: Starlet
Description: An unlikely friendship forms between twenty-one-year-old Jane and the elderly Sadie after Jane discovers a hidden stash of money inside an object at Sadie's yard sale.

Title: The Man from Laramie
Description: Newcomer Will Lockhart defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.

Title: The Eye
Description: Violinist Sydney Wells was accidentally blinded by her sister Helen when she was five years old. She submits to a cornea transplantation, and while recovering from the operation, she realizes that she is seeing dead people.

Title: Vampires Suck
Description: A spoof of vampire-themed movies. Teenager Becca finds herself torn between 2 boys. As she and her friends wrestle with a number of different dramas, everything comes to a head at their prom.

Title: Bride & Prejudice
Description: A modern adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, Pride and Prejudice, that features the lives of four unmarried daughters in an Indian family.

Title: Space Mutiny
Description: A pilot is the only hope to stop the mutiny of a spacecraft by its security crew, who plot to sell the crew of the ship into slavery.

Title: Rabid
Description: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into blood-thirsty zombies, leading into a city-wide epidemic.

Title: Johnny Puff: Secret Mission
Description: Follows Johnny Puff and his friends as they embark on a secret mission to save Taigasville from the evil plans of Otto von Walrus.

Title: Bad Guy
Description: An unfeeling gangster seeks to ruin the life of a young girl who rejected him. He forces her into prostitution and spies on her regularly, then he soon begins to fall for her.

Title: Blue Thunder
Description: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

Title: Romeo Must Die
Description: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

Title: Grimcutty
Description: A suburban teen girl and her little brother must stop a terrifying internet meme brought to life by the hysteria of their parents.

Title: The Merchant of Venice
Description: In 16th century Venice, when a merchant must default on a large loan from an abused Jewish moneylender for a friend with romantic ambitions, the bitterly vengeful creditor demands a gruesome payment instead.

Title: Christmas Survival
Description: Two sisters and their families spend--or rather, endure--Christmas at their late parents' dilapidated country house.

Title: Everything, Everything
Description: A teenager who's spent her whole life confined to her home falls for the boy next door.

Title: The Paramedic
Description: Angel works in an ambulance service. After a tragic accident, his personal life begins to deteriorate as he becomes more and more suspicious of his partner Vane.

Title: My Blue Heaven
Description: An all too uptight FBI agent must protect a larger than life mobster with a heart of gold, currently under witness protection in the suburbs.

Title: Get a Job
