Description: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

Title: Waking Ned Devine
Description: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

Title: The End of Sex
Description: A couple feeling the pressures of parenting and adulthood, send their kids to winter camp for the first time and embark on a series of sexual adventures to reinvigorate their relationship.

Title: Passengers
Description: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Title: Backfire
Description: While recuperating from wartime back injuries at a hospital, veteran Bob Corey is visited on Christmas Eve by a beautiful stranger with an even stranger message.

Title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
Description: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddie.

Title: Brain on Fire
Description: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

Title: The Grifters
Description: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend, both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

Title: Words on Bathroom Walls
Description: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to not be defined by his condition.

Title: Fearless
Description: A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.

Title: Bloody Daddy
Description: A messed up, tenacious man faces off against cops and crime lords to save the one relationship that matters to him.

Title: Bereavement
Description: The horrific account of 6 year old Martin Bristol, abducted from his backyard swing and forced to witness the brutal crimes of a deranged madman.

Title: Summer Lovers
Description: A young American couple and a French woman engage in a threesome in the Greek Islands.

Title: Apollo 18
Description: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where three American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.

Title: Charley Varrick
Description: A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery without realizing they are stealing from the Mob.

Title: Splendor in the Grass
Description: The love of high school sweethearts Deanie and Bud is weighed down by the oppressive expectations of their parents and society in smalltown Kansas in 1928, threatening the future of their relationship.

Title: Upside Down
Description: Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Ten years after a forced separation, Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.

Title: Escape Plan: The Extractors
Description: After security expert Ray Breslin is hired to rescue the kidnapped daughter of a Hong Kong tech mogul from a formidable Latvian prison, Breslin's girlfriend is also captured.

Title: Two Queens and One Consort
Description: At the deathbed of his used-to-be militant mother an older man looks back at his childhood, when he was in love with his sensual aunt Coleta.

Title: Innocence
Description: A young woman discovers that her elite Manhattan preparatory school harbors a dark secret.

Title: The Ballad of Jack and Rose
Description: A father and daughter isolated on an island off the East Coast and living on a once-thriving commune grapple with the limits of family and sexuality.

Title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
Description: Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.

Title: V/H/S/2
Description: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.

Title: L'immensità
Description: The story of love between Clara and her children, set in Rome in the '70s.

Title: Project Iceman
Description: Follow Anders Hofman, the first ever human to attempt a long distance triathlon in Antarctica.

Title: Adi
Description: Nandu, has been earning a living in Saudi and is engaged to Geethika. They get married but while returning from the church they get in a fight with two men on a bike.

Title: Clementine
Description: Reeling from a one-sided breakup, heartbroken Karen breaks into her ex's lake house. There, she strikes up a complicated relationship with provocative younger woman Lana.

Title: Castaway
Description: Middle-aged Gerald Kingsland advertises in a London paper for a female companion to spend a year with him on a desert island.

Title: The Magician
Description: A mockumentary that follows Ray Shoesmith, a Melbourne hitman who is simultaneously ruthless and caring, likeable and volatile. 'Filmed' by his media student neighbour for a university assignment, Ray is under contract to kill a low life of the Melbourne underworld when a more tempting offer is made...

Title: Cloak & Dagger
Description: A young boy and his imaginary friend end up on the run while in possession of a top-secret spy gadget.

Title: Jersey Boys
Description: The story of four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic 1960s rock group The Four Seasons.

Title: Shaft
Description: A crime lord hires black private eye, John Shaft, to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

Title: Black Box
Description: After losing his wife and his memory in a car accident, a single father undergoes an agonizing experimental treatment that causes him to question who he really is.

Title: Sisters
Description: A small-time reporter tries to convince the police she saw a murder in the apartment across from hers.

Title: Bound
Description: The daughter of a wealthy real estate broker falls in love with a younger man, who introduces her to B&D and S&M. Using her newly awakened sexual prowess, she finally takes charge of her own life.

Title: Son's Girlfriend, Daddy's Girlfriend
Description: Dong-gook, who is thinking of remarrying, introduces his stepmother Kyeong-sook to his son Jin-yeong. At the family gathering, Jin-yeong is surprised to see his stepmother's younger brother Hyeon-sook who was his one-night stand recently.

Title: Big Trouble
Description: The lives of several Miami denizens, from ad agents to gunrunners to street thugs to law enforcement to school-children, intersect with humorous and dangerous results.

Title: Abandoned
Description: After a young couple moves into a remote farmhouse with their infant son, the woman's struggles with postpartum psychosis begin to intensify...as the house reveals secrets of its own.

Title: Marshall
Description: The story of Thurgood Marshall, the crusading lawyer who would become the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases.

Title: Leatherface
Description: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

Title: The Color of Pomegranates
Description: A surreal biopic of Armenian poet Sayat Nova, told via non-narrative amalgamations of images, hailed as revolutionary by Mikhail Vartanov.

Title: Coonskin
Description: Rabbit, a country-born trickster, takes over the organized crime racket in Harlem, facing opposition from the institutionalized racism of the Mafia and corrupt police.

Title: Dagon
Description: A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.

Title: Best Sellers
Description: A cranky, retired author reluctantly embarks on a final book tour to help out a young publisher.

Title: Bobby
Description: The story of the assassination of U.S. Senator Robert F. Kennedy, who was shot in the early morning hours of June 5, 1968 in the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles, California, and twenty-two people in the hotel, whose lives were never the same.

Title: Downfalls High
Description: When reserved, lonely teenager Fenix (Chase Hudson) meets popular high-school girl Scarlett (Sydney Sweeney), the two form a bond that shapes the rest of his life. A musical drama featuring the music of Machine Gun Kelly.

Title: Romper Stomper
Description: A group of skinheads become alarmed at the way their neighbourhood is changing.

Title: Cat Ballou
Description: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

Title: Serena
Description: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.

Title: The Sun Is Also a Star
Description: A hopeless romantic ambivalent about his future in medical school falls for a hard-luck young woman who doesn't believe in love.

Title: Miracle on Main Street
Description: The discovery of an abandoned baby on Christmas Eve brings new meaning to a lonely and depressed Los Angeles dancer.

Title: Dangerous
Description: Rashmi, an aspiring model, rents an apartment and meets married neighbor Nalini. They fall in love and plot to steal from Nalini's gangster husband. Will the risky con work?

Title: Employee of the Month
Description: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.

Title: Bounce
Description: A man switches plane tickets with another man who dies in that plane in a crash. The man falls in love with the deceased one's wife.

Title: Game of Death
Description: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

Title: The Yards
Description: Leo is released from prison after serving time for car theft. His plan to go straight falls apart when he meets his corrupt uncle for a job and later an old friend working there. It culminates at the (railroad) yards.

Title: Great Expectations
Description: A series of events change the orphaned Pip's life forever as he eagerly abandons his humble origins to begin a new life as a gentleman.

Title: On Fire
Description: Follows a family who lives in a trailer home in the woods and are suddenly confronted by a wildfire. Survival becomes their main objective.

Title: Think Like a Man Too
Description: All the couples are back for a wedding in Las Vegas, but plans for a romantic weekend go awry when their various misadventures get them into some compromising situations that threaten to derail the big event.

Title: War Sailor
Description: The sailor Alfred is in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean when World War II breaks out. Suddenly the sailors are in the front of the war, without any weapons.

Title: Airport '77
Description: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.

Title: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!
Description: A small-town girl wins a date with a male celebrity through a contest. When the date goes better than expected, a love triangle forms between the girl, the male celebrity, and the girl's best friend.

Title: Speak No Evil
Description: Remake of Speak No Evil (2022). A family invited to spend a weekend in an idyllic country house, go from a dream vacation to a psychological nightmare.

Title: Green Night
Description: Trapped in a life of oppression under her Korean husband, a Chinese woman sets out on a thrilling adventure with a mysterious green-haired girl, finding her chance to finally break free and claim her independence.

Title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
Description: In the 1913 U.S. Open, twenty-year-old Francis Ouimet played golf against his idol, 1900 U.S. Open champion, Englishman Harry Vardon.

Title: Mother Krampus
Description: Based on the myth of Frau Perchta, a witch that comes on the 12 days of Christmas taking children each night.

Title: Undine
Description: Undine works as a historian lecturing on Berlin's urban development. But when the man she loves leaves her, the ancient myth catches up with her. Undine has to kill the man who betrays her and return to the water.

Title: Queer
Description: Lee, who recounts his life in Mexico City among American expatriate college students and bar owners surviving on part-time jobs and GI Bill benefits. He driven to pursue a young man named Allerton, who is based on Adelbert Lewis Marker.

Title: Lord of Illusions
Description: A private detective gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan, a performer whose amazing illusions captivate the world, but they are not really what everyone thinks.

Title: SpaceCamp
Description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

Title: Guns of the Magnificent Seven
Description: Gunslinger Chris Adams is hired by a Mexican revolutionary to organize the rescue of his cause's leader from a brutal Army prison.

Title: The Super
Description: Karma comes into play when a wealthy wisecracking landlord is ordered by a court to live in the filthy building that he runs.

Title: The Cave
Description: Blood-thirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

Title: Tidal Wave
Description: A woman named Yeon-hee (Ha Ji-won) lives in Busan with her boyfriend Man-sik (Sol Kyung-gu) near Haeundae Beach. But, when they find out a tsunami will hit the city, They realize they only have 10 minutes to escape!

Title: The Blob
Description: An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

Title: Sugar & Spice
Description: A popular high-school cheerleader becomes pregnant by the star quarterback and turns to crime to support her desired lifestyle.

Title: Limelight
Description: A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.

Title: Corvette Summer
Description: A high school grad and a hooker-in-training try to track down his stolen Corvette.

Title: When a Man Loves a Woman
Description: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

Title: New World
Description: An undercover cop finds it difficult to play both a cop and a goon.

Title: Bugsy
Description: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

Title: Ms .45
Description: A timid and mute seamstress goes insane after being attacked and raped twice in one day, in which she takes to the streets of New York City after dark and randomly shoots men with a .45 caliber pistol.

Title: Death Note
Description: A battle between the world's two greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.

Title: Tetsuo: The Iron Man
Description: A businessman accidentally kills The Metal Fetishist, who gets his revenge by slowly turning the man into a grotesque hybrid of flesh and rusty metal.

Title: Johnny Got His Gun
Description: During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

Title: Dangerous
Description: A reformed sociopath journeys to a remote island to investigate the mystery behind his brother's demise, but soon ends up facing off with more than he bargained for.

Title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
Description: This story explores love - the shapes it takes, the ways it changes us and the exhilarating and often terrifying ride it takes us on. It is the journey of two characters, Alizeh and Ayan, as they navigate life, love and heartbreak.

Title: Barefoot
Description: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life; he takes this naive young woman home for his brother's wedding.

Title: Magic
Description: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy while he tries to renew a romance with his high school sweetheart.

Title: The Affair
Description: Liesel Landauer and her friend Hana are linked by a lifelong relationship and an exceptional house built by the architect Von Abt for Liesel and her husband Viktor in Czechoslovakia in the early 1930s.

Title: The Farmer and the Belle: Saving Santaland
Description: Sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter when she visits her childhood home. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

Title: Condor's Nest
Description: A decade after the fall of Nazi Germany, an American aviator travels across South America in search of war criminals and encounters more than he bargained for.

Title: 45 Years
Description: A married couple preparing to celebrate their wedding anniversary receives shattering news that promises to forever change the course of their lives.

Title: Barefoot in the Park
Description: Paul, a conservative young lawyer, marries the vivacious Corie. Their highly passionate relationship descends into comical discord in a five-flight New York City walk-up apartment.

Title: Trenque Lauquen: Part 1
Description: With the strange disappearance of Laura, two colleagues, her older boyfriend, Rafael, and Ezequiel, learn of their recent discoveries, which may help them locate her. However, the story is bigger and stranger than they could imagine.

Title: Maudie
Description: An arthritic Nova Scotia woman works as a housekeeper while she hones her skills as an artist and eventually becomes a beloved figure in the community.

Title: Shrunk
Description: An amateur scientist and father accidentally shrinks his family with his latest invention. A sequel to the 1989 film 'Honey, I Shrunk the Kids".

Title: Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger
Description: Sinbad The Sailor sails to deliver a cursed prince to a dangerous island in the face of deadly opposition from a powerful witch.

Title: The Lost Empire
Description: Seeking revenge, officer Angel Wolfe, her Native American friend Whitestar, and outlaw Heather infiltrate a fortified island where an undead wizard and his evil cult force captured women to take part in gladiatorial tournaments.

Title: Strictly Ballroom
Description: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

Title: Samson and Delilah
Description: When strongman Samson rejects the love of the beautiful Philistine woman Delilah, she seeks vengeance that brings horrible consequences they both regret.

Title: Catlow
Description: An outlaw tries to avoid interference as he journeys to Mexico to pull off a $2,000,000 gold robbery.

Title: Jumpin' Jack Flash
Description: An American computer wiz who works at a New York bank is suddenly thrust into the world of international espionage after she inadvertently receives a coded message from a British spy.

Title: Bad Samaritan
Description: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

Title: Pamasahe
Description: A penniless mother, with her infant child, takes on a journey by land and sea to find her husband in Manila. But this trip won't be free for she has to use her body to get to her destination.

Title: Seberg
Description: Inspired by real events in the life of French New Wave icon Jean Seberg. In the late 1960s, Hoover's FBI targeted her because of her political and romantic involvement with civil rights activist Hakim Jamal.

Title: The Secret of Roan Inish
Description: Young Fiona lives with her grandparents in a small fishing village where she takes an active role to unravel the mysterious secrets.

Title: Talaash: The Answer Lies Within
Description: Inspector Surjan Shekhawat, who is dealing with a depressing past, has to investigate a high profile murder case, deal with his crumbling marriage and use the help and solace of a prostitute by the name of Rosie.

Title: Monolith
Description: A headstrong journalist whose investigative podcast uncovers a strange artifact, an alien conspiracy, and the lies at the heart of her own story.

Title: Screamers
Description: A military commander stationed off planet during an interplanetary war travels through the devastated landscape to negotiate a peace treaty, but discovers that the primitive robots they built to kill enemy combatants have gained sentience.

Title: The Main Event
Description: A bankrupt entrepreneur attempts to recoup some of her losses by getting a washed-out boxer she picked up as a tax loss back into the ring - an idea her protégé isn't fond of.

Title: The Price of Family
Description: When Alessandra and Emilio move to the city leaving their parents Carlo and Anna alone, life changes for everyone. In a few months the kids forget about their parents: a few phone calls, missed birthdays, missed funerals. But the last straw for these parents is knowing their kids won't be around for Christmas.

Title: The Man from Earth: Holocene
Description: A 14,000-year-old college professor notices that he has finally started showing signs of aging. Meanwhile, four of his students get suspicious of him and start investigating his past.

Title: Sound of My Voice
Description: Two documentary filmmakers attempt to penetrate a cult who worships a woman who claims to be from the future.

Title: Deconstructing Harry
Description: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

Title: Ski Patrol
Description: A developer attempts to sabotage the safety record of a ski resort.

Title: Senna
Description: A documentary on Brazilian Formula One racing driver Ayrton Senna, who won the F1 world championship three times before his death at age 34.

Title: Pet Sematary II
Description: A teenage boy and his father move to his recently-deceased mother's hometown, where they encounter the ancient Native American cemetery with the power to raise the dead.

Title: Work It
Description: When Quinn Ackerman's admission to the college of her dreams depends on her performance at a dance competition, she forms a ragtag group of dancers to take on the best squad in school. Now she just needs to learn how to dance.

Title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
Description: Kids all over America want Silver Shamrock masks for Halloween. Doctor Daniel Challis seeks to uncover a plot by Silver Shamrock owner Conal Cochran.

Title: Thumbelina
Description: This retelling of the Hans Christian Andersen classic fairy tale has the digit-sized heroine evading the clutches of various toads, moles, and beetles before she can proceed with her courtship with her dream lover, Prince Cornelius.

Title: At Midnight
Description: At Midnight is a romantic comedy about two people who have made the "safe" choice not to fall in love.

Title: Black Water
Description: A boat tour of a mangrove swamp turns into a fight for survival when a group of people are attacked by a ferocious saltwater crocodile.

Title: It's a Wonderful World
Description: When a tycoon (Ernest Truex) is accused of murder, the private eye (James Stewart) tracking him finds himself roped in as an accessory and attempts to evade police, kidnapping a poetess (Claudette Colbert) along the way.

Title: Coma
Description: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

Title: Breakthrough
Description: When her 14-year-old son drowns in a lake, a faithful mother prays for him to come back from the brink of death and be healed.

Title: Three Floors
Description: The story of three families living in three apartments in the same bourgeois condominium.

Title: Looker
Description: Three of four models, who had plastic surgery done by Larry after a computed list, are dead. Neither the cops nor Larry believe they're suicides. Larry investigates and stays with the fourth model. Who's behind the lists and murders?

Title: Manhunt
Description: Accused of heinous crimes he didn't commit, a prosecutor sets out on a mission to clear his name.

Title: Play Motel
Description: A reporter and his girlfriend investigate deaths surrounding a hotel where several prominent people go to have sex.

Title: Vampire Killers
Description: Their women having been enslaved by the local pack of lesbian vampires thanks to an ancient curse, the remaining menfolk of a rural town send two hapless young lads out onto the moors as a sacrifice.

Title: The Night Eats the World
Description: The morning after a party, a young man wakes up to find Paris invaded by zombies.

Title: The Family That Preys
Description: Two families from different walks of life learn to work together.

Title: Key Largo
Description: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

Title: The Best Man
Description: Mercenaries seize control of a remote resort hotel during a wedding and it's up to the best man, the groom and their drunken best friend to stop the terrorists and save the hostages.

Title: Bring Him to Me
Description: Under orders from a ruthless crime boss, a getaway driver must battle his conscience and drive an unsuspecting crew member to an ambush execution. There is a long drive ahead.

Title: Gold Run
Description: He's not the bravest of men, but he's given a great responsibility and an enormous task - to get the whole Norwegian gold reserve away from the Germans during the invasion of Norway during the outbreak of WW2.

Title: Chemical Hearts
Description: A teenage boy falls in love with a troubled girl who transfers to his high school.

Title: Delivery Man
Description: An affable underachiever finds out he's fathered 533 children through anonymous donations to a fertility clinic 20 years ago. Now he must decide whether or not to come forward when 142 of them file a lawsuit to reveal his identity.

Title: Best of the Best
Description: A team from the United States is going to compete against Korea in a Tae Kwon Do tournament. The team consists of fighters from all over the country - can they overcome their rivalry and work together to win?

Title: Juliet, Naked
Description: Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) has an unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

Title: Just the Two of Us
Description: Follows Blanche Renard who meets Greg Lamoureux and believes he is the one, but soon she finds herself caught up in a toxic relationship with a possessive and dangerous man.

Title: Placido
Description: In a small Spanish town, a group of old ladies decides to celebrate Christmas Eve with a "seat a poor man at your table" dinner: each wealthy household of the town will have a homeless person dining with them that night. The celebrations also include a parade, and in its midst is Plácido, the humble owner of a three-wheeler, whose family is forced to live in a public lavatory because they lack the money to pay rent, and who must pay the second bill on his vehicle before midnight or else he will lose it.

Title: Mother, May I?
Description: When Anya starts behaving like her fiancée's recently-deceased mother, Emmett must confront his deepest traumas to free his fiancee from this bewildering possession.

Title: Wedding Season
Description: Pressured by their parents to find spouses, Asha and Ravi pretend to date during a summer of weddings, only to find themselves falling for each other.

Title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
Description: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

Title: Sweet Smell of Success
Description: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

Title: Untitled Fred Astaire Biopic
Description: Plot under wraps.

Title: The Magdalene Sisters
Description: Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

Title: The Locksmith
Description: A thief fresh out of prison, tries to work his way back into the life of his daughter and ex-fiancé. Determined, he is forced to use the skills he has as a gifted locksmith. Things take a tumultuous turn after an unexpected disappearance.

Title: L.E.T.H.A.L. Ladies: Return to Savage Beach
Description: A stolen computer floppy disc filled with information about the location of a mythical treasure in Savage Island will lure both villains and L.E.T.H.A.L. Agents into a dangerous treasure hunt.

Title: The Rite
Description: American seminary student Michael Kovak travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

Title: My Stepmother Is an Alien
Description: A creature from another planet tries to seduce a shy Earth physicist to gain control over his researches. The result of this important mission much exceeded her expectations.

Title: Loverboy
Description: Randy is still unfocused after 2 years in college. When his dad refuses to keep paying his tuition, he gets a job delivering pizzas. Several alluring cougars pay him $200 for pizza delivery and "services rendered." As for their husbands.

Title: Barfly
Description: Based on the life of successful poet Charles Bukowski and his exploits in Hollywood during the 60s, 70s, and 80s.

Title: Irrational Man
Description: A tormented philosophy professor finds a will to live when he commits an existential act.

Title: The Wild Geese
Description: A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.

Title: Night at the Museum: Kahmunrah Rises Again
Description: Nick Daley hesitates becoming a museum nightwatchman and Kahmunrah returns to conquer the world.

Title: Nefes: Yer Eksi Iki
Description: Brings together many true stories from different periods and tells the intersecting stories of three different characters.

Title: Rooster Cogburn
Description: Marshal Rooster Cogburn unwillingly teams up with Eula Goodnight to track down her father's murderers.

Title: Alone in the Dark
Description: A detective of the paranormal slowly unravels mysterious events with deadly results.

Title: Unlawful Entry
Description: A burglar holds a knife to Karen's throat while her husband does nothing. The couple ends up befriending the cop that comes. The friendship ends when the cop beats up the culprit. Karen isn't ready to end it. Things get ugly with the cop.

Title: The Four Musketeers: Milady's Revenge
Description: The Four Musketeers defend the queen and her dressmaker from Cardinal Richelieu and Milady de Winter.

Title: Seven Veils
Description: An earnest theater director has the task of remounting her former mentor's most famous work, the opera Salome. Some disturbing memories from her past will allow her repressed trauma to color the present.

Title: Immigrants
Description: Set in a dystopian Malaysia in which different races are forbidden to mix. A Chinese family moves into their new house to find a scared Malay girl still hiding in it. Should they get rid of her or try to smuggle her back to safety?

Title: Man of the House
Description: A young boy refuses to accept his mother's new boyfriend, a lawyer, despite the man's attempts to win his respect. Meanwhile, disgruntled relative of a criminal he prosecuted seek revenge.

Title: Marauders
Description: When a bank is hit by a brutal heist, all evidence points to the owner and his high-powered clients. But as a group of FBI agents dig deeper into the case - and the deadly heists continue - it becomes clear that a larger conspiracy is at play.

Title: Bedazzled
Description: A hapless loser sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but has trouble winning over the girl of his dreams.

Title: The Killer
Description: A retired hitman agrees to take care of a teen aged girl, but when she becomes involved with unsavory people, he has to rescue her.
While on a routine patrol, an aging cop, his partner and their ride-along, get caught in a standoff with a band of former mercenaries robbing a bank.

Title: On the Count of Three
Description: Jerrod Carmichael makes his directorial debut and stars in On the Count of Three, a darkly comic feature about two best friends, Val (Carmichael) and Kevin (Christopher Abbott), on the last day of their lives.

Title: Maid Droid
Description: To get over his ex, Harrison hires Mako, a beautiful android maid whose past memories resurface, leading her to act out in violent ways.

Title: Shithouse
Description: A lonely college freshman forges a strong connection with his resident assistant during a fraternity party.

Title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
Description: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

Title: Rupture
Description: A single mom tries to break free from a mysterious organization that has abducted her.

Title: What a Way to Go!
Description: A four-time widow discusses her four marriages, in which all of her husbands became incredibly rich and died prematurely because of their drive to be rich.

Title: God's Country
Description: When a college professor confronts two hunters she catches trespassing on her property, she's drawn into an escalating battle of wills with catastrophic consequences.

Title: Malibu's Most Wanted
Description: A senator arranges for his son, a rich white kid who fancies himself black, to be kidnapped by a couple of black actors pretending to be murderers to try and shock him out of his plans to become a rapper.

Title: Brazen
Description: When her sister is killed and her double life as a webcam performer is revealed, Grace ignores the warnings of a cool-headed detective and gets involved in the case.

Title: Jackass: The Movie
Description: Johnny Knoxville and his band of maniacs perform a variety of stunts and gross-out gags on the big screen for the first time.

Title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
Description: A vulgar private detective is hired to find a missing groupie and is drawn into a mystery involving a series of murders tied to the music industry.

Title: The Last Thing He Wanted
Description: A veteran D.C. journalist loses the thread of her own narrative when a guilt-propelled errand for her father thrusts her from byline to unwitting subject in the very story she's trying to break. Adapted from Joan Didion's namesake novel.

Title: Live Flesh
Description: After leaving jail, Víctor is still in love with Elena, but she's married to the former cop -now basketball player- who became paralysed by a shot from Víctor's gun...

Title: The Killing Tree
Description: On Christmas Eve, a widow casts a spell to resurrect her executed husband. However, when the spell goes wrong, the husband is brought back as an Evil Christmas Tree and is hell-bent on getting revenge on the one who caused his execution.

Title: Sherlock Gnomes
Description: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet recruit renowned detective Sherlock Gnomes to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

Title: The Remaining
Description: Friends gather at a wedding, but the celebration's shattered by terrifying apocalyptic events, which force them to re-examine life, choices they've made...

Title: Blackbird
Description: A terminally ill mother arranges to bring her family together one last time before she dies. A remake of the 2014 Danish film 'Silent Heart'.

Title: The American Friend
Description: Tom Ripley, who deals in forged art, suggests a picture framer he knows would make a good hit man.

Title: WeWork: Or the Making and Breaking of a $47 Billion Unicorn
Description: An account of the six-week death spiral that brought down the company's IPO, a behind-the-scenes look at WeWork's frat-boy culture.

Title: Krampus: The Reckoning
Description: Zoe, a strange child, has a not so imaginary friend Krampus, who is the dark companion of St. Nicholas.

Title: Kundun
Description: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

Title: Mr. Destiny
Description: Unhappy Larry Burrows sees what his life could have been like if he had made that winning home run as a teenager.

Title: Breach
Description: FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.

Title: Terror Train
Description: Three years after a prank went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train.

Title: Surprised by Oxford
Description: Brilliant but emotionally-guarded Caro Drake arrives in Oxford with the singular goal of attaining her PhD, but through a turbulent friendship with a charming young man she starts to open herself up to mystery, vulnerability, and love.

Title: Godzilla: Planet of the Monsters
Description: A desperate group of refugees attempts to recolonize Earth 20,000 years after Godzilla took over, but one young man wants revenge above all else.

Title: If Only
Description: It takes a tragedy to teach the young businessman Ian to put love ahead of work and open up to his musician girlfriend Samantha.

Title: My Blueberry Nights
Description: A young lonely woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of off-beat characters along the way.

Title: Man of the House
Description: A Texas Ranger must protect a group of cheerleaders who have witnessed a murder.

Title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
Description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

Title: Starred Up
Description: Eric Love, 19, is locked up in prison. On his first day, he assaults another inmate and several guards. He's offered group therapy and his dad, an inmate as well, tries to talk sense into him. Can he be rehabilitated?

Title: May-December-January
Description: Claire and Migoy's relationship is tested when Claire falls in love with Migoy, her son's best friend. This further complicates when it is revealed that Migoy is also secretly in a relationship with the boy who has been calling her Migoy.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba - To the Hashira Training
Description: Tanjiro undergoes rigorous training with the Stone Hashira, Himejima, in his quest to become a Hashira. Meanwhile, Muzan continues to search for Nezuko and Ubuyashiki.

Title: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
Description: The MacManus brothers are living a quiet life in Ireland with their father, but when they learn that their beloved priest has been killed by mob forces, they go back to Boston to bring justice to those responsible and avenge the priest.

Title: Valmont
Description: France before 1789: When a widow hears that her lover is to marry her cousin's daughter, she asks the playboy Valmont to take the girl's virginity. But first she bets him, with her body as prize, to seduce a virtuous, young, married woman.

Title: The Notorious Bettie Page
Description: The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation because of her risqué bondage photos.

Title: Dealing with Christmas
Description: On Christmas Eve, Greg must infiltrate a drug ring instead of spending time with family. Santa sends him into a Christmas film to help the hero's family, but a spell glitch sends the hero into Greg's dangerous mission.

Title: Cries & Whispers
Description: When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

Title: Threesome
Description: A girl named Alex is by mistake housed with 2 guys, Stuart and Eddy, in a college dorm suite. After initial problems they become friends. Stuart has the hots for Alex, Alex for Eddy and Eddy for Stuart. Can it work?

Title: The Party
Description: This is the story about a teenage girl's first love experiences.

Title: The Indian Fighter
Description: A scout leading a wagon train through hostile Indian country unwittingly gets involved with a Sioux chief's daughter.

Title: Iron Lung
Description: Plot kept under wraps.

Title: Antiviral
Description: In a blackly satirical near future, a thriving industry sells celebrity illnesses to their obsessed fans. Employee Syd March's attempts to exploit the system backfire when they involve him in a potentially deadly mystery.

Title: A Mouthful of Air
Description: Julie Davis writes bestselling children's books about unlocking your fears, but has yet to unlock her own. When her daughter is born, that trauma is brought to the fore, and with it, a crushing battle to survive.

Title: The Beyond
Description: A young woman inherits an old hotel in Louisiana where, following a series of supernatural "accidents", she learns that the building was built over one of the entrances to Hell.

Title: Soccer Soul
Description: It narrates the epic title obtained by the Argentine National Team in the World Cup Qatar 2022 with testimonies of the protagonists, told from the intimacy and in first person.

Title: Christmas for a Dollar
Description: A family struggling to get by during the Depression expects another presentless Christmas until the father brings home a dollar for them to spend on presents.

Title: Rahasya
Description: A Doctor stands accused of killing his own eighteen-year old daughter. While this aggrieved father protests his innocence, all evidence points towards him irrefutably.

Title: Ice Station Zebra
Description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

Title: The Mercy
Description: The incredible story of amateur sailor Donald Crowhurst and his solo attempt to circumnavigate the globe. The struggles he confronted on the journey while his family awaited his return is one of the most enduring mysteries of recent times.

Title: White as Snow
Description: Claire, a beautiful young woman works at her late father's hotel that is now managed by her evil stepmother Maud. Claire unwittingly sparks uncontrollable jealousy in Maud, whose young lover has fallen in love with Claire. Maud decides to get rid of Claire who finds shelter in a farm where she's allowed to break free from her strict upbringing through encounters with seven "princes."

Title: Howl
Description: When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.

Title: The Fury
Description: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from a shadowy secret government agency.

Title: Dil To Pagal Hai
Description: A grand musical about three passionate and dreamy characters: Rahul, Pooja and Nisha. Will their dreams come true? Will they find their true love?

Title: Tom and Jerry: The Movie
Description: Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.

Title: Tom and Huck
Description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Title: The Unhealer
Description: Spiritual healing gone wrong turns a relentlessly bullied teenager into a super-powered killing machine just as his tormentors do the unthinkable.

Title: Eve's Bayou
Description: What did little Eve see--and how will it haunt her? Husband, father and womanizer Louis Batiste is the head of an affluent family, but it's the women who rule this gothic world of secrets, lies and mystic forces.

Title: The Goodbye Girl
Description: After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, an unemployed dancer and her 10-year-old daughter are reluctantly forced to live with a struggling off-Broadway actor.

Title: You Sing Loud, I Sing Louder
Description: A father takes his estranged daughter on a road trip in an effort to get her out of trouble. Along the way they meet all types of strangers, as their strained relationship is put to the test.

Title: Mysterious Island
Description: During the Civil War a group of Union soldiers and two Confederates escape the stockade using a hot-air balloon and end up on a strange Pacific island.

Title: Anastasia
Description: With Lenin about to destroy the Romanovs, Rasputin sends Anastasia through a magical portal.

Title: Creepshow 2
Description: Three macabre tales from the latest issue of a boy's favorite comic book, dealing with a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and an undying hitchhiker.

Title: Book of Blood
Description: A paranormal expert discovers a house that is at the intersection of so-called "highways" transporting souls in the afterlife.

Title: As We Know It
Description: In the late '90s, James Bishop is dealing with a complicated breakup with the help of his best friend, while trying to finish his book before the impending zombie apocalypse.

Title: Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III
Description: A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.

Title: The Weapon
Description: Dallas is a one-man killing machine who is working for a Vegas mob boss and won't stop until justice is served.

Title: Meet the Feebles
Description: Multiple animals and insects experience the sleazier side of show business while working on a variety show.

Title: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Description: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Title: F/X
Description: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

Title: No Escape
Description: A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.

Title: An Awkward Sexual Adventure
Description: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a conservative accountant enlists the help of an exotic dancer to guide him on a quest for sexual experience, leading him into a world of strip clubs, sensual massage parlors, cross-dressing and S & M.

Title: Radio Flyer
Description: A father recounts a dark period of his childhood when he and his little brother lived in the suburbs.

Title: High Society
Description: A deputy curator of a chaebol-funded art gallery and her husband, a politically ambitious economics professor, will do anything to join the über-elite.

Title: Revenge of the Pink Panther
Description: To prove that he still is strong and powerful, Philippe Douvier decides to kill Clouseau. Once news of his "death" has been announced, Clouseau tries to take advantage of it and goes undercover with Cato to find out who tried to kill him.

Title: Murmur of the Heart
Description: As France is nearing the end of the first Indochina War, an open-minded teenage boy finds himself torn between a rebellious urge to discover love, and the ever-present, almost dominating affection of his beloved mother.

Title: Disconnect
Description: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.

Title: Feel the Beat
Description: After failing to find success on Broadway, April returns to her hometown and reluctantly is recruited to train a misfit group of young dancers for a big competition.

Title: Angels of Sex
Description: The established relationship between university student Bruno and aspiring photographer Carla is thrown into turmoil when Bruno feels drawn to sexy karate instructor/break dancer Rai. Complications ensue.

Title: Nostalghia
Description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer, and instead meet a ruminative madman who tells the poet how the world may be saved.

Title: Calendar Girls
Description: A Women's Institute chapter's fundraising effort for a local hospital by posing nude for a calendar becomes a media sensation.

Title: Disturbing the Peace
Description: A small-town marshal who hasn't carried a gun since he left the Texas Rangers after a tragic shooting, must pick up his gun again to battle with a gang of outlaw bikers that has invaded the town to pull off a brazen and violent heist.

Title: Two for the Money
Description: After suffering a career-ending knee injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

Title: Blindness
Description: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant white blindness.

Title: Spring
Description: A young man in a personal tailspin flees from US to Italy, where he sparks up a romance with a woman harboring a dark, primordial secret.

Title: After Everything
Description: A young couple's relationship develops quickly when one of them is diagnosed with a life-changing illness.

Title: Dark Command
Description: In Kansas during the Civil War, opposing pro-Union and pro-Confederate camps clash and visiting Texan Bob Seton runs afoul of William Cantrell's Raiders.

Title: The Gold Rush
Description: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

Title: You're Killing Me
Description: Follows Eden, who goes to a coveted 'Heaven and Hell' party, hoping to get a letter of recommendation to an elite university from the wealthy parents of her classmate, but the party quickly turns into a fight for her life.

Title: The Invisible Guardian
Description: A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.

Title: Needful Things
Description: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.

Title: Biosphere
Description: In the not-too-distant future, the last two men on earth must adapt and evolve to save humanity.

Title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
Description: Kermit and his friends go to New York City to get their musical on Broadway only to find it's a more difficult task than they anticipated.

Title: Searching for Bobby Fischer
Description: A prepubescent chess prodigy is encouraged to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

Title: Come to the Stable
Description: Two nuns arrive unannounced in the small New England town of Bethlehem, where they recruit various townspeople to help them build a children's hospital.

Title: 3 Women
Description: Two roommates/physical therapists, one a vain woman and the other an awkward teenager, share an increasingly bizarre relationship.

Title: The Last Waltz
Description: A film account and presentation of the final concert of The Band.

Title: Throne of Blood
Description: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

Title: When Time Ran Out...
Description: An active volcano threatens a south Pacific island resort and its guests as a power struggle ensues between the property's developer and a drilling foreman.

Title: Superfast!
Description: A spoof on The Fast and the Furious (2001) and the following F&F movies. An undercover cop joins a gang of criminal street racers to get close to the LA crime kingpin.

Title: Auto Focus
Description: The life of TV star Bob Crane and his strange friendship with electronics expert John Henry Carpenter.

Title: Torn Curtain
Description: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

Title: Valentino
Description: In 1926 the tragic and untimely death of a silent screen actor caused female moviegoers to riot in the streets and in some cases to commit suicide.

Title: Swallows and Amazons
Description: Set in 1929, and based upon Arthur Ransome's immortal children's novel, "Swallows and Amazons" is the story of a group of children who man two sailing dinghies,'Swallow' and 'Amazon', and plan mock 'sea-battles'.

Title: The Heart Is Deceitful Above All Things
Description: Seven-year-old Jeremiah is pulled from his foster home and thrown into a troubled life on the road with his teenage mother, Sarah.

Title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Once & Always
Description: The Rangers come face-to-face with a familiar threat from the past. In the midst of a global crisis, they are called on once again to be the heroes the world needs.

Title: Damien: Omen II
Description: Damien the Antichrist, now about to turn thirteen years old, finally learns of his destiny under the guidance of an unholy disciple of Satan. Meanwhile dark forces begin to eliminate all those who suspect the child's true identity.

Title: Someone to Watch Over Me
Description: A married New York cop falls for the socialite murder witness he's been assigned to protect.

Title: Persian Lessons
Description: A young Jewish man in a concentration camp has his life saved when executioners realize he owns a Persian book. Brought before a camp officer who wants to learn Farsi, Gilles agrees to teach him despite not knowing a word of the language.

Title: Red Planet
Description: Astronauts, and their robotic dog AMEE (Autonomous Mapping Evaluation and Evasion), search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.

Title: Black Knight
Description: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

Title: Married to the Mob
Description: A mobster's wife hates her lifestyle, but gets a chance to change it when her husband is killed - if the Long Island mob and the FBI let her.

Title: Trust
Description: In this sexy and twisty ride, New York gallery owner Brooke and her husband Owen each face exceptional temptations, with most unexpected results.

Title: Girl
Description: A promising teenage dancer enrolls at a prestigious ballet school while grappling with her gender dysphoria.

Title: Muppets from Space
Description: Gonzo is contacted by his alien family through his breakfast cereal. But when the men in black kidnap him, it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue Gonzo and help him reunite with his long-lost family.

Title: Town Tamer
Description: A gunfighter is hired to clean up a wild frontier town, but there are forces afoot who want to keep the town as wide-open as it is.

Title: T-34
Description: An SS Panzer Division uses a T-34 manned by Soviet POWs as a training target, but the prisoners plot a daring maneuver.

Title: The Air Up There
Description: A basketball coach travels to Africa to recruit a new star.

Title: Mars Needs Moms
Description: A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.

Title: Just Cause
Description: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

Title: When the Wind Blows
Description: A naive elderly British rural couple survive the initial onslaught of a nuclear war.

Title: Coriolanus
Description: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.

Title: Wonderstruck
Description: Tells the tale of two children separated by fifty years. In 1927, Rose searches for the actress whose life she chronicles in her scrapbook; in 1977, Ben runs away from home to find his father.

Title: The Birthday Cake
Description: On the 10th anniversary of his father's death, Giovanni reluctantly accepts the task of bringing a cake to the home of his uncle, a mob boss, for a celebration. Just two hours into the night, Gio's life is forever changed.

Title: The Players Club
Description: A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.

Title: The 39 Steps
Description: In London, a diplomat accidentally becomes involved in the death of a British agent who's after a spy ring that covets British military secrets.

Title: Wicked City
Description: While protecting a signatory to a peace treaty between their peoples, a male human and a female demon discover that their mutual attraction may be the key to unifying their worlds.

Title: Murder at Yellowstone City
Description: A former slave arrives in Yellowstone City, Montana, a desolate former boomtown now on the decline, looking for a place to call home. On that same day, a local prospector discovers gold - and is murdered.

Title: The Grand Seduction
Description: To survive, a dying Newfoundland fishing village must convince a young doctor to take up residence by any means necessary.

Title: The Model
Description: Emma, an emerging model, struggles to enter the Parisian fashion scene and develops a dangerous obsession for fashion photographer Shane White.

Title: The Invisible
Description: A teenager is left invisible to the living after an attack.

Title: Blackout
Description: A man wakes in a hospital with no memory, and quickly finds himself on the run in a locked down hospital with the Cartel on his tail. He scrambles to find his true identity in the most vicious way.

Title: Buffaloed
Description: In the underworld of debt-collecting, homegrown hustler Peg Dahl will do anything to escape Buffalo, NY.

Title: Multiverse
Description: Four brilliant university students are forced to confront themselves in terrifying ways when their quantum physics experiment leads to an entangled parallel existence that leaves them questioning who they are and what is real.

Title: Aftermath
Description: Two strangers' lives become inextricably bound together after a devastating plane crash.

Title: Traffik
Description: A couple off for a romantic weekend in the mountains are accosted by a biker gang. Alone in the mountains, Brea and John must defend themselves against the gang, who will stop at nothing to protect their secrets.

Title: Journey to the West
Description: Tang Sanzang, an aspiring Buddhist hero tries to protect a village from three demons. He develops complex feelings for Miss Duan, the demon hunter who repeatedly helps him, and finally quests to meet the legendary Monkey King.

Title: The Journey of Natty Gann
Description: In the 1930s, a tomboy runs away from her guardian to join her single father who is 2,000 miles away, where he has found work.

Title: By the Sea
Description: A couple tries to repair their marriage while staying at a hotel in France.

Title: Memoria
Description: A woman from Scotland, while traveling in Colombia, begins to notice strange sounds. Soon she begins to think about their appearance.

Title: Among Wolves
Description: A tale of redemption and self-discovery between two violent criminals during the waning era of prohibition.

Title: Daddy's Little Girls
Description: A mechanic and his family are struggling to make ends meet with his ex-girlfriend and her drug dealing boyfriend He struggles to get custody of his children during the way he falls inlove with his attorney.

Title: Repeat Performance
Description: On New Year's Eve 1946, Sheila Page kills her husband Barney. She wishes that she could relive 1946 and avoid the mistakes that she made throughout the year. Her wish comes true but cheating fate proves more difficult than she anticipated.

Title: The Redneg
Description: The Redneg takes place in the near future, in a fallen world after a devastating world war between woman and man. Only one percent of the world's population has survived the war and most of them are women. The few surviving men are being killed or captured by female groups, driven by the vision and the determination to build a new world, ruled only by women. Due to the decay of civilization, the survivors from around the world seek new beginnings in the woods up north in Scandinavia. In this extraordinary movie we meet Noland. A former teacher who lost his wife and son in the war. Noland lives in the woods, and one day he meets a group of women, led by their ruthless leader "Tamara". This is the beginning of a brutal chase and fight for survival. Before Noland's wife Lisa passed away, he promised her to fulfill their dream of building a house by the sea. The question is: will Noland ever reach his goal?

Title: The Black Phone 2
Description: Plot under wraps.

Title: Twin Peaks: The Missing Pieces
Description: Twin Peaks before Twin Peaks (1990) and at the same time not always and entirely in the same place as Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992). A feature film which presents deleted scenes from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992) assembled together for the first time in an untold portion of the story's prequel.

Title: Hippie Hippie Shake
Description: An account of counterculturalist Richard Neville's misadventures in London at the end of the 1960s.

Title: Boxcar Bertha
Description: During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on the management of a railroad.

Title: Drinking Buddies
Description: Luke and Kate are coworkers at a brewery who spend their nights drinking and flirting heavily. One weekend away together with their significant others proves who really belongs together and who doesn't.

Title: Chasing Mavericks
Description: When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.

Title: Shelby Oaks
Description: A woman's desperate search for her long-lost sister falls into obsession upon realizing that the imaginary demon from their childhood may have been real.

Title: Shag
Description: Summer of 1963. Carson is getting married to her boyfriend so her friends Melaina, Pudge and Luanne take her to Myrtle Beach for one last irresponsible weekend.

Title: Ghajini
Description: A short-term memory loss patient goes on a killing spree in order to avenge the death of his ladylove.

Title: The Boxtrolls
Description: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

Title: Hellraiser: Bloodline
Description: In the 22nd century, a scientist attempts to right the wrong his ancestor created: the puzzle box that opens the gates of Hell and unleashes Pinhead and his Cenobite legions.

Title: Anuvahood
Description: Meet Kenneth. He thinks he's got the moves. He thinks he's got the swagger. He thinks he can spit bars. But in reality, he's a WASTEMAN!

Title: The Donor Party
Description: Jaclyn wants a baby. But after a messy divorce and fruitless years of online dating, she realizes she doesn't need a husband to become a mother. She and her best friends hatch a plan to get her pregnant at a very special party.

Title: Avanti!
Description: A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his tycoon father's body--and discovers that Dad died with his long-time mistress.

Title: Smokey and the Bandit II
Description: The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.

Title: The Exorcism of God
Description: An American priest working in Mexico is possessed during an exorcism and ends up committing a terrible act. Eighteen years later, the consequences of his sin come back to haunt him, unleashing the greatest battle within.

Title: Evangelion: 3.0+1.01 Thrice Upon a Time
Description: Misato and her anti-NERV group WILLE arrive in Paris, a city now red from core-ization. Crew from the flagship Wunder land on a containment tower.

Title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
Description: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

Title: V/H/S/94
Description: A police S.W.A.T. team investigate a mysterious VHS tape and discover a sinister cult that has pre-recorded material which uncovers a nightmarish conspiracy.

Title: Julia
Description: Pauli is a sexually frustrated young man who's surrounded by sexually liberated women who will not give him the time of day. He meets a beautiful virgin woman, Andrea, who strongly resists his charms, which compounds his frustrations.

Title: Equals
Description: In an emotionless utopia, two people fall in love when they regain their feelings from a mysterious disease, causing tensions between them and their society.

Title: Falling for Figaro
Description: A brilliant young fund manager leaves her unfulfilling job and long-term boyfriend to chase her lifelong dream of becoming an opera singer in the Scottish Highlands.

Title: A Boy Named Charlie Brown
Description: Charlie Brown makes his way to the national spelling bee finals.

Title: The Rising Hawk
Description: The Mongol Empire had grown to the largest the world had ever known. Its armies now laid siege to much of Eastern Europe. A small village fights for freedom in the frontier landscape of the Carpathian Mountains.

Title: Santa's Summer House
Description: 90s Action Stars stumble onto Santa's Summer Beach house!

Title: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
Description: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

Title: To the Wonder
Description: After falling in love in Paris, Marina and Neil come to Oklahoma, where problems arise. Their church's Spanish-born pastor struggles with his faith, while Neil encounters a woman from his childhood.

Title: Kedi
Description: A profile of an ancient city and its unique people, seen through the eyes of the most mysterious and beloved animal humans have ever known, the Cat.

Title: The Angel
Description: As his country prepares for war, top Egyptian official Ashraf Marwan makes contact with Israel and wades into a shadowy game of high-stakes espionage.

Title: The Robe
Description: In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.

Title: Venus in Fur
Description: An actress attempts to convince a director how she's perfect for a role in his upcoming production.

Title: Tiger, Blood in the Mouth
Description: Ramón Alvia is a professional boxer who, although he has won several international championships, is old and is at the end of his career. He resists. In the gym, Ramon discovers among the young boxers Deborah, a beautiful girl.

Title: Swept Away
Description: A snooty socialite is stranded on a Mediterranean island with a communist sailor.

Title: Three Colors: White
Description: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

Title: The French Lieutenant's Woman
Description: Anna and Mike portray two characters in a film set in 19th century England who fall in love despite the fact that Mike's character is engaged.

Title: Gas Pump Girls
Description: New high school graduates June and her friends take over a dilapidated service station owned by her bed-ridden uncle. They have to perform every trick in the book to compete against the modern station across the street.

Title: Grind
Description: Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

Title: The General
Description: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

Title: School for Scoundrels
Description: A young guy short on luck enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when it turns out his teacher has the same agenda.

Title: Untraceable
Description: FBI agent Jennifer Marsh is tasked with hunting down a seemingly untraceable serial killer who posts live videos of his victims on the Internet. As time runs out, the cat and mouse chase becomes more personal.

Title: The Dilemma
Description: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

Title: Irish Wish
Description: When the love of Maddie's life gets engaged to her best-friend, she puts her feelings aside to be a bridesmaid at their wedding in Ireland.

Title: Murina
Description: A teenage girl decides to replace her controlling father with his wealthy foreign friend during a weekend trip to the Adriatic Sea.

Title: Borderline
Description: While in London, SoMe strategist Mads embarks on a whirlwind romance with Joan. But the affair ends when he returns home to his girlfriend in Copenhagen, and things take a sinister turn when Joan decides she doesn't want it to be over.

Title: Ip Man 2
Description: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

Title: Romance & Cigarettes
Description: This down-and-dirty musical set in the world of working-class New York tells the story of a husband's journey into infidelity and redemption when he must choose between his seductive mistress and his beleaguered wife.

Title: Gringo
Description: GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted criminal.

Title: Handyman
Description: A boring woman worries that her man would leave her, so she hires a plumber with ''extra service''. As she falls for him, she's torn between her boyfriend and her new found love.

Title: The Mountain II
Description: In a desolate war zone where screams of the innocent echo, seven Maroon Berets will dance with death on the very line between disaster and valor.

Title: Mary Shelley
Description: Life and facts of Mary Wollstonecraft Godwin, who at 16 met 21 year old poet Percy Shelley, resulting in the writing of Frankenstein.

Title: American Beach House
Description: What happens when six lucky strangers, three handsome young guys and three beautiful sexy young women, from all over the world, win a random contest-- an all expenses paid trip to an amazing beach house in glamorous Malibu, California, thanks to a big Internet company--only to discover they have to share it with each other.

Title: We Summon the Darkness
Description: Three best friends embark on a road trip to a heavy-metal show, where they bond with three aspiring musicians and head off to one of the girls' country home for an after-party.

Title: Bubblegum
Description: Aadi and Jhanvi, from different backgrounds, struggle with doubts and challenges in their relationship, questioning if love can overcome their differences.

Title: The Great Raid
Description: Taking place towards the end of WWII, 500 American Soldiers have been entrapped in a camp for 3 years. Beginning to give up hope they will ever be rescued, a group of Rangers goes on a dangerous mission to try and save them.

Title: Yannick
Description: In the middle of a performance of the play "Le Cocu", a very bad boulevard, Yannick gets up and interrupts the show to take the evening back in hand.

Title: Barely Lethal
Description: A teenage special ops agent coveting a "normal" adolescence fakes her own death and enrolls in a suburban high school. She quickly learns that surviving the treacherous waters of high school is more challenging than international espionage.

Title: School Dance
Description: A high school freshman wants to be part of the most popular dance clique in his school but he tends to freeze in the spotlight and has no clue how he's going to pass the initiation.

Title: Well Done!
Description: A widowed British businessman takes the job as a butler of a manor house in France to keep memories of his late French wife. His life takes a turn as he navigates the eccentric behavior of the lady of the manor and the household staff.

Title: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
Description: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his brand of justice as he sees fit.

Title: Drunken Master
Description: Wong Fei-Hung is a mischievous yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents his frustrated father has him disciplined by a master of drunken martial arts.

Title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
Description: Instead of coming in from the Cold War, British agent Alec Leamas chooses to face another mission.

Title: Instructions Not Included
Description: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.

Title: Blade of the 47 Ronin
Description: Ancient Japanese Ronin warriors set 300 years after 47 Ronin, in a modern-day world where Samurai clans exist in complete secrecy.

Title: Eureka
Description: Murphy searches for his daughter after she is kidnapped by the outlaw Randall.

Title: Venus
Description: Horror invades the concrete corridors of a cursed apartment complex on the outskirts of Madrid.

Title: The Green Man
Description: An assassin is annoyed by a vacuum cleaner salesman determined to stop him.

Title: Elliot the Littlest Reindeer
Description: When Blitzen announces his retirement on December 21st, a miniature horse has 3 days to fulfill his lifelong dream of earning a spot on Santa's team at the North Pole try-outs.

Title: House of Wax
Description: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

Title: Horrible Histories: The Movie - Rotten Romans
Description: Atti, a smart and quick-witted Roman teenager, manages to upset Emperor Nero with one of his schemes. For punishment, Atti is sent to work in a cold and wet Britain where he also meets the Celts.

Title: The Trial
Description: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.

Title: Airport 1975
Description: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and is rendered pilotless. Somehow the control tower must get a pilot aboard so the jet can land.

Title: Red State
Description: Set in Middle America, a group of teens receive an online invitation for sex, though they soon encounter fundamentalists with a much more sinister agenda.

Title: Penguin Bloom
Description: A family takes in an injured Magpie that makes a profound difference in their lives.

Title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
Description: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

Title: Cleaner
Description: A former cop who now earns a wage as a crime scene cleaner unknowingly participates in a cover-up at his latest job.

Title: Censor
Description: After viewing a strangely familiar video nasty, Enid, a film censor, sets out to solve the past mystery of her sister's disappearance, embarking on a quest that dissolves the line between fiction and reality.

Title: The Lure
Description: In Warsaw, a pair of mermaid sisters are adopted into a cabaret. While one seeks love with humans the other hungers to dine on the human population of the city.

Title: Stamped from the Beginning
Description: A hybrid documentary/scripted feature based on Dr. Kendi's National Book Award-winning "Stamped from the Beginning: The Definitive History of Racist Ideas".

Title: Love Me If You Dare
Description: As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, their game might be a way to avoid the fact that they are truly meant for one another.

Title: Miss Bala
Description: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness, and strength. Based on the Spanish-language film.

Title: A Difficult Year
Description: Two swindlers, deep in debt, infiltrate a group of climate activists when they are attracted to the free food and drinks they are offered.

Title: The Book of Henry
Description: With instructions from her genius son's carefully crafted notebook, a single mother sets out to rescue a young girl from the hands of her abusive stepfather.

Title: 10 Rillington Place
Description: What happened to the women at 10 Rillington Place? The story of British serial killer John Christie, who committed most or all of his crimes in the titular terraced house, and the miscarriage of justice involving Timothy Evans.

Title: Class of 1984
Description: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with a delinquent punk posse who run the institute with an iron fist.

Title: Neem me mee
Description: Six people over seventy are at a turning point in their lives. Without knowing each other, they go on a journey together.

Title: Anonymous
Description: The theory that it was in fact Edward De Vere, Earl of Oxford, who penned Shakespeare's plays. Set against the backdrop of the succession of Queen Elizabeth I and the Essex rebellion against her.

Title: The Hard Way
Description: After learning his brother died on a mission in Romania, a former soldier teams up with two allies to hunt down a mysterious enemy and exact revenge.

Title: Halloween: Resurrection
Description: Three years after he last terrorized his sister, Michael Myers confronts her again, before traveling to Haddonfield to deal with the cast and crew of a reality show which is being broadcast from his old home.

Title: Driving Madeleine
Description: Madeleine, leaves small suburban to join a nursing home, on the other side of Paris. Charles, a taxi driver, comes to pick her and in no hurry to reach, she asks him to go through places of the capital, which have counted in her life.

Title: Beast
Description: A troubled woman living in an isolated community finds herself pulled between the control of her oppressive family and the allure of a secretive outsider suspected of a series of brutal murders.

Title: Money Plane
Description: A professional thief with $40 million in debt and his family's life on the line must commit one final heist - rob a futuristic airborne casino filled with the world's most dangerous criminals.
