Description: An examination of the health risks involved in the fast food industry as well as its environmental and social consequences.

Title: Jab We Met
Description: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

Title: The Fifth Estate
Description: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

Title: Breathe In
Description: When a foreign exchange student arrives in a small upstate New York town, she challenges the dynamics of her host family's relationships and alters their lives forever.

Title: Steptoe & Son
Description: Albert Steptoe and his son Harold are junk dealers. Harold meets a stripper, marries her and takes her home. Albert, of course, is furious and tries every trick he knows to drive the new bride from his household.

Title: Out for Justice
Description: With his partner executed in broad daylight by a psychotic mafia enforcer, a veteran Brooklyn officer vows revenge. But is the unstoppable detective prepared to face the truth and pay the price of blood?

Title: Bird on a Wire
Description: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

Title: One Perfect Match
Description: Matchmaker Lucy Marks meets businessman Finn Grayson, and she immediately feels a spark. However, she then learns that he's her new client.

Title: Flame & Citron
Description: A drama centered on two fighters in the Holger Danske World War II resistance group.

Title: Prizefighter: The Life of Jem Belcher
Description: At the turn of the 19th century, Pugilism was the sport of kings and a gifted young boxer fought his way to becoming champion of England.

Title: Something in the Dirt
Description: Maverick filmmaking duo Justin Benson and Aaron Moorhead offer up a twisted reflection of our paranoid times in this inventive mix of buddy comedy and sci-fi thriller.

Title: Picnic
Description: Emotions are ignited among the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labor Day picnic.

Title: Fear of Rain
Description: A girl living with schizophrenia struggles with terrifying hallucinations as she begins to suspect her neighbor has kidnapped a child. The only person who believes her is Caleb - a boy she isn't even sure exists.

Title: Hyena Road
Description: Three different men, three different worlds, three different wars - all stand at the intersection of modern warfare - a murky world of fluid morality where all is not as it seems.

Title: Journal 64
Description: A series of mysterious disappearances in 2006 are eerily connected to the same institution.

Title: Naked Weapon
Description: 40 13 y.o. girls are kidnapped and the next 6 years forcefully trained to be sexy assassins. The survivors go on to be top int'l assassins known as China dolls. A CIA agent's on track of them.

Title: Paper Man
Description: A washed-up writer forms an unlikely friendship with a teenager from Long Island.

Title: Studio 54
Description: The story of the notorious 1970s New York City nightclub.

Title: Pig Killer
Description: Inspired by the terrifying story of Robert "Willy" Pickton, the pig farmer and prolific killer of women whose horrific crimes shocked the world.

Title: Arc
Description: Lines are crossed and friendships tested when friends Ben and Naomi grow closer together amid a failed relationship and a broken marriage.

Title: Downtown Owl
Description: Based on the novel by Chuck Klosterman, Downtown Owl is a sparkle dark Reagan Era comedy set in the fictional town of Owl, North Dakota in the leading days up to the region's blizzard in Minnesota's century.

Title: Owd Bob
Description: A teen orphan spends the summer on Isle of Man with estranged grandpa. Despite loving dogs, they want summer to end. Boy befriends neighbor girl, but her father has history with grandpa. Locals suspect neighbor's dog kills sheep at night.

Title: Lay the Favorite
Description: Ex-private dancer Beth aspires to be a Las Vegas cocktail waitress, when she falls in with Dink, a sports gambler. Sparks fly as she proves to be something of a gambling prodigy--much to the ire of Dink's wife, Tulip.

Title: Crazy on the Outside
Description: A recently paroled ex-con who has trouble adjusting to the wacky normalcy of life outside of prison. He has spent the last three years behind bars after getting caught committing a crime and taking the rap for his much more dangerous pal.

Title: Running with the Devil
Description: The CEO of an international conglomerate sends two of his most regarded executives to investigate why shipments of cocaine are being hijacked and over cut somewhere on the supply chain.

Title: The Cheerleaders
Description: A group of cheerleaders from the local high school decide to show their school spirit for their football team by sleeping with the opponents the night before the game so that they can be so worn out the opposition won't be able to play.

Title: Very Good Girls
Description: Two New York City girls make a pact to lose their virginity during their first summer out of high school. When they both fall for the same street artist, the friends find their connection tested for the first time.

Title: The Sensuous Nurse
Description: As an aging widower begins suffering from cardiac trouble, his greedy heirs hire a super-seductive nurse in the hopes of inducing a heart attack, but the plan backfires when she falls in love with him.

Title: The Tinder Swindler
Description: Posing as a wealthy, jet-setting diamond mogul, he wooed women online, then conned them out of millions of dollars. Now some victims plan for payback.

Title: The Car
Description: A small desert town is terrorized by a powerful, seemingly possessed car, and the local sheriff may be the only one who can stop it.

Title: Look Who's Talking Too
Description: This time, a new baby is on the way, and it's a girl. Wrapped together with the standard conflict between mother and father, Mikey engages in a bit of sibling rivalry with his new sister.

Title: FPS: First Person Shooter
Description: A documentary about first-person shooter video games.

Title: Sweet Movie
Description: After winning the "most virgin" contest, Miss Canada is married to a rich milk tycoon. But she quickly flees the marriage to experience the world around her, full of sweetness and anarchy.

Title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
Description: Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending massive Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.

Title: The Other Side of the Wind
Description: At a media-swamped party to celebrate his 70th birthday and screen his avant-garde film-in-progress, a legendary but jaded Hollywood director is faced both with voracious fans and unsettling questions about what became of his lead actor.

Title: The Experiment
Description: For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

Title: The Unspoken
Description: In 1997 the Anderson family vanished from their home without a trace. No bodies were ever found. For 17 years the house has remained undisturbed... until now.

Title: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
Description: A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant.

Title: Circle of Friends
Description: Three women, who've been friends since childhood, meet at university in Dublin in 1957. Student and boyfriend life begins.

Title: Everything Must Go
Description: When an alcoholic relapses, causing him to lose his wife and his job, he holds a yard sale on his front lawn in an attempt to start over. A new neighbor might be the key to his return to form.

Title: Benji
Description: Two school kids strike up a friendship with an orphaned puppy named Benji. When danger befalls them and they end up kidnapped by robbers who are in over their heads, Benji and his scruffy sidekick come to the rescue.

Title: Apollo 10½: A Space Age Childhood
Description: A coming-of-age story set in the suburbs of Houston, Texas in the summer of 1969, centered around the historic Apollo 11 moon landing.

Title: The Field
Description: When a field (which has been farmed by the McCabe family for generations) goes up for auction, the patriarch of the McCabe family will stop at nothing to prevent a rich American from buying it.

Title: Son of Rambow
Description: During a long English summer in the early 1980s, two schoolboys from differing backgrounds set out to make a film inspired by First Blood (1982).

Title: Diana
Description: The bedroom of Sofía, a luxury escort. Her new client, who has introduced himself as Hugo and appears to be an educated businessman, discovers that she has a name tattooed on her leg: Diana. Hugo cannot help asking her who Diana is.

Title: Law of Tehran
Description: The police are after a drug lord named Naser Khakzad, but when they finally manage to catch him, he tries whatever he can think of to escape and save his family.

Title: The Ash Lad: In the Hall of the Mountain King
Description: Espen "Ash Lad", a poor farmer's son, embarks on a dangerous quest with his brothers to save the princess from a vile troll known as the Mountain King - in order to collect a reward and save his family's farm from ruin.

Title: Paradise Lost: The Child Murders at Robin Hood Hills
Description: A horrific triple child murder leads to an indictment and trial of three nonconformist boys based on questionable evidence.

Title: A Whisker Away
Description: Miyo Sasaki is in love with her classmate Kento Hinode and tries repeatedly to get Kento's attention by transforming into a cat, but at some point, the boundary between herself and the cat becomes ambiguous.

Title: Canceled
Description: Gone Ghosting is a popular ghost hunting team that earned millions from live broadcasts and selling merch. Lise, Catta, Sandro, and Polly join the group to live-stream a ghost hunt to prove that everything is real. They break into a place where legend says everyone has died and do the craziest broadcast ever live.

Title: Madrid, 1987
Description: Two characters: old and young; teacher and pupil; man and woman. Four walls within which they conjure intellectualism, relive the profession (journalism), explore politics and discover each other.

Title: The Sweeney
Description: A hardened detective in the Flying Squad of London's Metropolitan police. Based on the '70s UK TV show.

Title: Waxwork
Description: A wax museum owner uses his horror exhibits to unleash evil on the world.

Title: Hesher
Description: A young boy has lost his mother and is losing touch with his father and the world around him. Then he meets Hesher who manages to make his life even more chaotic.

Title: The Slammin' Salmon
Description: The owner of a Miami restaurant indebted to the mob institutes a contest to see what waiter can earn the most money in one night.

Title: The Conspirator
Description: Mary Surratt is the lone female charged as a co-conspirator in the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln. As the whole nation turns against her, she is forced to rely on her reluctant lawyer to uncover the truth and save her life.

Title: The Great Silence
Description: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

Title: Sanki Her Sey Biraz Felaket
Description: Coincidence brings four twenty somethings in contemporary Istanbul together in humorous and playful ways. Almost Entirely a Slight Disaster explores the anxieties faced by the new generation with its humorous and intertwined ways.

Title: Monsieur Hulot's Holiday
Description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation and accidentally, but good-naturedly, causes havoc.

Title: Summer Heat
Description: Roxy, a Depression-era farmer, feels alone and neglected by her husband, who works too much, and is drawn into an ill-advised affair with Jack, her day laborer.

Title: Legend of the White Dragon
Description: In the Aftermath, the city was left decimated. A past reminder of the great battle and fall of heroes. The heroes were blamed, stripped of their titles and hunted.

Title: Vjeran Tomic: The Spider-Man of Paris
Description: In his own words, the burglar behind the 2010 robbery of the Paris Museum of Modern Art tells how he pulled off the biggest art heist in French history.

Title: The Ark and the Aardvark
Description: An aardvark named Gilbert lands the job of shepherding all the animals onto Noah's Ark.

Title: Tickled
Description: Journalist David Farrier stumbles upon a mysterious tickling competition online. As he delves deeper he comes up against fierce resistance, but that doesn't stop him getting to the bottom of a story stranger than fiction.

Title: Code Name Banshee
Description: Caleb, a former government assassin in hiding, who resurfaces when his protégé, the equally deadly killer known as Banshee, discovers a bounty has been placed on Caleb's head.

Title: Dono
Description: Modern relationships set against the backdrop of a lavish destination wedding.

Title: The Company of Wolves
Description: A teenage girl in a country manor falls asleep while reading a magazine, and has a disturbing dream involving wolves prowling the woods below her bedroom window.

Title: Language Lessons
Description: A Spanish teacher and her student develop an unexpected friendship.

Title: Noise
Description: After moving his family into his childhood home, a man's investigation into a local factory accident connected to his father unveils dark family secrets.

Title: Giant Little Ones
Description: Two popular teen boys, best friends since childhood, discover their lives, families, and girlfriends dramatically upended after an unexpected incident occurs on the night of a 17th birthday party.

Title: The Last Summer
Description: Standing on the precipice of adulthood, a group of friends navigate new relationships, while reexamining others, during their final summer before college.

Title: Six Pack
Description: A race car driver is driving to a race in a motor home with his race car on a trailer. His car gets stripped of parts. He ends up with 6 orphan kids on his way to the race.

Title: Curtains
Description: Six young actresses auditioning for a movie role at a remote mansion are targeted by a mysterious masked murderer.

Title: Missing Link
Description: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

Title: Greedy
Description: Rich, old uncle Joe is surrounded by relatives waiting/hoping for him to die while trying to look good and backstabbing the competition. What should he do?

Title: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
Description: A successful fashion designer abandons a sado-masochistic relationship with her female assistant in favor of a love affair with a beautiful young woman.

Title: Far Haven
Description: Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven. When his father-in-law is brutally attacked by an unidentified raiding party, Braddock must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

Title: Much Ado About Nothing
Description: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

Title: The Case for Christ
Description: An investigative journalist and self-proclaimed atheist sets out to disprove the existence of God after his wife becomes a Christian.

Title: Bonus Track
Description: Charming teen, an aspiring musician teams up with the son of a rock star to try and win the school talent show.

Title: The Cove
Description: Using state-of-the-art equipment, a group of activists, led by renowned dolphin trainer Ric O'Barry, infiltrate a cove near Taijii, Japan to expose both a shocking instance of animal abuse and a serious threat to human health.

Title: A Score to Settle
Description: An ex-enforcer for a local crime syndicate has vowed to enact retribution on his mob bosses after 19 years of wrongful imprisonment. The only thing diverting his violent plans is a new found relationship to his beloved son.

Title: Umami
Description: France's leading chef throws himself into a quest seeking the flavor that has confounded his life since he was defeated by a Japanese chef's bowl of noodles as a young man.

Title: Rules of Engagement
Description: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a Middle Eastern country.

Title: Return of the Seven
Description: Two survivors of the original Magnificent Seven, Chris and Vin, recruit four new members to re-form the outfit and defend several Mexican villages from vicious bandits.

Title: The New York Ripper
Description: A burned-out New York police detective teams up with a college psychoanalyst to track down a vicious serial killer randomly stalking and killing various young women around the city.

Title: Christmas Time
Description: A physics teacher's obsessive dislike for Christmas is put to the test when a reservation mishap sends him and his family on a trip to Lapland, a tourist destination dedicated to Christmas and surprisingly near the North Pole.

Title: Black Sea
Description: In order to make good with his former employers, a submarine captain takes a job with a shadowy backer to search the depths of the Black Sea for a submarine rumored to be loaded with gold.

Title: Made
Description: Two aspiring boxers, life-long friends, get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organized crime group.

Title: Sheena
Description: Sheena grew up in the African wild, raised by a mystical witch woman. When her foster mother is framed for a murder Sheena is forced to flee, helped by her ability to talk to animals and her knowledge of the jungle.

Title: Wrong Place
Description: A methamphetamines cook hunts down the former Police chief of a small town in order to silence him before he can deliver eyewitness testimony against his family, but ultimately finds himself up against more than he had bargained for.

Title: Mirchi
Description: A man returns to his country in order, ostensibly, to reform his girlfriend's violent family, but he seems to have a strange connection and a rather dark past.

Title: Away We Go
Description: A couple expecting their first child travels the U.S. seeking the perfect "family home." They have misadventures and find fresh connections with relatives and old friends who help them discover "home" on their own terms for the first time.

Title: Into the Deep
Description: A young woman desperate for an escape, meets a mysterious and attractive stranger who promises a romantic trip. What follows is deceit, mistrust, and violence.

Title: Christmas at the Holly Hotel
Description: It follows Kathy, a food critic in New York City. Her parents ask her to come home for Christmas, and there she meets a handsome police officer, which now complicates her situation.

Title: Madeline
Description: Horrified at the prospect of her beloved school being sold, a young French girl uses her wit and craftiness to attempt to save it, making an unlikely new friend in the process.

Title: The Water Horse
Description: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

Title: O Sequestro do Voo 375
Description: During the Brazilian economical crisis in 1988, a gunman hijacks a flight targeting the president, and intending to have it crashed onto the presidential headquarters.

Title: Going the Distance
Description: A romantic comedy centered on a guy and a gal who try to keep their love alive as they shuttle back and forth between New York and San Francisco to see one another.

Title: Happy New Year
Description: A gang of amateur dancers takes part in a dancing competition to avenge their personal vendetta.

Title: Forbidden World
Description: In the distant future, a federation marshal arrives at a research lab on a remote planet where a genetic experiment has gotten loose and begins feeding on the dwindling scientific group.

Title: Losin' It
Description: Set in 1965, four rowdy teenage guys travel to Tijuana, Mexico for a night of partying when they are joined by a heartbroken housewife who is in town seeking a quick divorce.

Title: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
Description: A small-town band hits it big, but it must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

Title: Warlock
Description: A warlock flees from the 17th to the 20th century, with a witch-hunter in hot pursuit.

Title: Dorm Daze
Description: Set during a crazy afternoon in the lives of a dozen college students at a co-ed dorm that starts with the arrival of two very different women with the same name of Dominique.

Title: The Death & Life of John F. Donovan
Description: A decade after the death of an American television star, a young actor reminisces about the written correspondence he shared with him, as well as the impact those letters had on both their lives.

Title: Visions
Description: Follows a brilliant airline captain, Estelle, who has a perfect life with her husband Guillaume, a renowned doctor. Something is about to change as Estelle falls in love with Ana and starts and intense affair.

Title: Diana
Description: During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan.

Title: The Woodmen
Description: Three individuals who find themselves in a fight for their lives as they attempt to escape from a clan of feral humans that call the Great Smoky Mountains home.

Title: The Tall Stranger
Description: Back from the Civil War, an ex-Yankee officer aids a wagon train of former Confederates settle in a prosperous valley marred by cattle-rustling and land-grabbing feuds.

Title: Nomads
Description: A French anthropologist specializing in nomadic groups moves to Los Angeles with his wife, and starts following a group of sinister street punks who seem to live and move around in a black van. But they aren't what they seem.

Title: The Swimmer
Description: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.

Title: Eaten Alive
Description: A psychotic redneck, who owns a dilapidated hotel in rural East Texas, kills various people who upset him or his business, and he feeds their bodies to a large crocodile that he keeps as a pet in the swamp beside his hotel.

Title: Cat's Eye
Description: A stray cat is the linking element of three tales of suspense and horror.

Title: Written on the Wind
Description: Alcoholic playboy Kyle Hadley marries the woman secretly loved by his poor but hard-working best friend, who in turn is pursued by Kyle's nymphomaniac sister.

Title: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
Description: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during World War II, his fiancée falls in love with the local Italian commander.

Title: Baskin
Description: A squad of unsuspecting cops go through a trapdoor to Hell when they stumble upon a Black Mass in an abandoned building.

Title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
Description: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens on Halloween Eve and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

Title: To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You
Description: Lara Jean and Peter have just taken their relationship from pretend to officially official when another recipient of one of her old love letters enters the picture.

Title: Blow Dry
Description: In 2000, a small town hosts The British Hairdressing Championship, where a former 2-time winner, his son, his run-away wife and his runaway wife's lady lover reside (not all on speaking terms).

Title: The Code
Description: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

Title: Kokomo City
Description: A raw depiction of the lives of four black trans sex workers as they confront the dichotomy between the black community and themselves.

Title: The Rhythm Section
Description: A woman seeks revenge against those who orchestrated a plane crash that killed her family.

Title: Sex and Zen
Description: A man marries a beautiful wife, but decides to go out and experience as many sexual conquests as possible, with unusual and often hilarious results. Meanwhile, his wife is forced to enter a brothel and work as a prostitute.

Title: Now, Voyager
Description: A frumpy spinster blossoms under therapy and becomes an elegant, independent woman.

Title: Ida
Description: A novice nun about to take her vows uncovers a family secret dating back to the German occupation.

Title: Ready to Wear
Description: A chronicle of the interconnected lives of a group of people in the lead up to Paris Fashion Week.

Title: Empire State
Description: Two childhood friends plan to rob an armored-car depository, but an NYPD officer stands in their way.

Title: Glisten and the Merry Mission
Description: Follows Marzipan, a young elfling, and her mother Cinnameg, as Marzipan must believe in the magic of the season and goes on an adventure to rediscover the enchanted snow deer named Glisten and save Christmas.

Title: Garuda Gamana Vrishabha Vahana
Description: Set in the backdrop of the coastal and cultural city of modern-day Mangaluru, Hari and his soulmate Shiva rise together to great heights only to face off as bitter enemies resulting to their own downfall and destruction.

Title: Scum
Description: An uncompromising story of life in a British juvenile offender institution in the '70s.

Title: Manhattan Night
Description: A reporter becomes involved with a mysterious woman while investigating her late husband's death.

Title: Atharva
Description: A policeman from the clues department tries to unravel murder mystery. When the investigation becomes more complex, it leads to a twisted path. Will he be able to unravel the chain of mystery?

Title: Stars and Bars
Description: A British art expert travels across America in order to purchase a rare Renoir painting in the South but comes across some crazy characters in the process.

Title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
Description: When Dusty learns that his engine is damaged and he may never race again, he joins a forest fire and rescue unit to be trained as a firefighter, or else his air strip will be shut down.

Title: The Kashmir Files
Description: A heart-wrenching tale that captures the pain, suffering, and struggle of the Kashmiri Pandit community in 1990 and leads Krishna, a young college student, to set out on a quest to uncover the truth.

Title: Vide Noir
Description: The story follows Buck, a young man embarking on a surreal journey through a sprawling, neon-lit city in search of his missing fiancée, ending up at the heart of a drug ring for a dangerous new psychedelic called Vide Noir.

Title: Untitled Fourth Film Directed by Jordan Peele
Description: Plot kept under wraps.

Title: That Time of Year
Description: Deep-rooted grievances can rip families apart--and the ties that bind them together.

Title: Welcome to Redville
Description: A young couple on the run from the law after a botched robbery takes refuge in a small desert town where strange townsfolk and the lure of one final heist threatens their relationship and their lives.

Title: Experiment in Terror
Description: A man with an asthmatic voice telephones and assaults clerk Kelly Sherwood at home and coerces her into helping him steal a large sum from her bank.

Title: Toma
Description: Biopic about Toma Zdravkovic, the man who is remembered not only for his songs and the unique way he sang them, but also as a bohemian, both in his behavior and his soul.

Title: Finding Steve McQueen
Description: In 1972, a gang of close-knit thieves from Youngstown, Ohio attempt to steal $30 million in illegal contributions and blackmail money from President Richard Nixon's secret fund.

Title: Deep in the Valley
Description: A mysterious video booth transports two friends to an alternate reality straight out of a pornographic film.

Title: Valley Girl
Description: A pair of young lovers from different backgrounds defy their parents and friends to stay together, set to a New Wave '80s soundtrack. A musical adaptation of the 1983 film.

Title: Fair Game
Description: CIA operative Valerie Plame discovers her identity is allegedly leaked by the government as payback for an op-ed article her husband wrote criticizing the Bush administration.

Title: That Obscure Object of Desire
Description: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

Title: Man Down
Description: In a post-apocalyptic America, former U.S. Marine Gabriel Drummer searches desperately for the whereabouts of his son, accompanied by his best friend and a survivor.

Title: Stan Helsing
Description: A spoof on many horror movie series. Ending his shift at the video rental, Stan's picked up by his BFF and 2 cute girls, all going to a Halloween party. Will they even get there?

Title: Thunderheart
Description: A young mixed-blood FBI agent is assigned to work with a cynical veteran investigator on a murder on a poverty-stricken Sioux reservation.

Title: Tender Teenager
Description: A teenage girl has a series of sexual adventures in France, then moves to Montreal and New York, where she finds pleasure, love and danger. Her promiscuity may be inspired by her father's incestuous advances toward her.

Title: Momma Said Come Home for Christmas
Description: The matriarch of a family calls all her children home for Christmas, but this will be a vacation full of surprises as lovers bond and family members collide.

Title: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
Description: Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.

Title: Swinging Safari
Description: A teenager comes of age in a small Australian town during the 1970s when a 200-ton blue whale gets washed up on a local beach.

Title: Son of God
Description: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.

Title: The Great Ziegfeld
Description: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues, are portrayed.

Title: Main Hoon Na
Description: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

Title: Cold Storage
Description: A fungus stored in a government facility gets out and wreaks havoc on the world.

Title: Longlegs
Description: FBI Agent Lee Harker is assigned to an unsolved serial killer case that takes unexpected turns, revealing evidence of the occult. Harker discovers a personal connection to the killer and must stop him before he strikes again.

Title: The Hyperions
Description: In 1960, Professor Ruckus invented the Titan badge - a device that enables humans to have a particular superpower. Cut to 1979 when two of the original superheroes are all grown up and want their Titan badges back.

Title: The Messengers
Description: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

Title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
Description: In New York City, an estranged couple who witness a murder are relocated to small town Wyoming as part of the Witness Protection Program.

Title: Loving Pablo
Description: A journalist strikes up a romantic relationship with notorious drug lord Pablo Escobar.

Title: Cactus Flower
Description: A dentist pretends to be married to avoid commitment, but when he falls for his girlfriend and proposes, he must recruit his lovelorn nurse to pose as his wife.

Title: Hoodlum
Description: Black gangsters in 1930 Harlem fights Dutch Schultz who is trying to horn in on their numbers racket.

Title: The Train
Description: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.

Title: Acts of Vengeance
Description: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

Title: So Young, So Lovely, So Vicious...
Description: Angela is not happy about her daddy's choice for a new wife and does everything she can to destroy her stepmother-to-be.

Title: Support the Girls
Description: The general manager at a highway-side ''sports bar with curves" has her incurable optimism and faith, in her girls, her customers, and herself, tested over the course of a long, strange day.

Title: Red Stone
Description: A dangerous hitman (Neal McDonough) is tasked with hunting down a teenager who witnessed the murder of his older brother at the hands of a ruthless Southern crime lord (Michael Cudlitz). The hired gun must track down the boy before either the rival henchmen or the F.B.I. find him first. As the hours tick down, the hitman begins to question his deadly ways and must choose which side he belongs to.

Title: Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li
Description: When a child, Chun-Li sees her father being captured by wealthy gangster Bison. When she grows up, she goes into a quest for justice and bring down the criminal organization Shadaloo which is led by Bison.

Title: Someday We'll Tell Each Other Everything
Description: Set in a warm summer in 1990 in former East Germany, it follows a young woman who begins a relationship with a charismatic farmer who is twice her age.

Title: Snow Falls
Description: After a winter storm strands five friends in a remote cabin with no power and little food, disorientation slowly claims their sanity as each of them succumbs to a fear that the snow itself may be contaminated or somehow evil.

Title: Don
Description: Vijay is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as his lookalike Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. Things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.

Title: In Your Dreams
Description: The falling in love of two people who ran away from marriage and the interesting events that followed. Istanbul, urban renewal, love and dreams come together in this movie.

Title: Violet Evergarden: The Movie
Description: After the aftermath of a war, a young girl who was used as a 'tool' for war learned to live. With the scars of burns, she goes back to her past to feel the true feelings of the Major's, "I love you."

Title: The Cost
Description: Intent on dispensing their own brutal form of justice, two ordinary men abduct a felon who committed a horrific crime many years before.

Title: The Occupant
Description: Javier Muñoz, once a successful executive, makes the fateful decision to leave his home, which he and his family can no longer afford.

Title: Loving
Description: The story of Richard and Mildred Loving, a couple whose arrest for interracial marriage in 1960s Virginia began a legal battle that would end with the Supreme Court's historic 1967 decision.

Title: I Saw the Light
Description: The story of the country-western singer Hank Williams, who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his rise to fame and its tragic effect on his health and personal life.

Title: Trancers
Description: A gruff bounty hunter travels back in time to 1980s Los Angeles to stop a twisted criminal who can transform people into zombie-like creatures.

Title: Aspen Extreme
Description: An autoworker and his buddy exit Detroit, move to Colorado, and become popular ski instructors.

Title: Super Troopers 2
Description: When a border dispute arises between the U.S. and Canada, the Super Troopers are tasked with establishing a Highway Patrol station in the disputed area.

Title: Both Sides of the Blade
Description: A love triangle story about a woman caught between two men, her long-time partner and his best friend, her former lover.

Title: The Manny
Description: A former TV idol and Hollywood bad-boy, takes a job as a nanny to the little girl next door and must apply lessons learned in order to save his relationship with his own daughter.

Title: Gidget
Description: A young girl discovers surfing and love (in that order) during one transitive summer.

Title: 42nd Street
Description: When the leading lady of a Broadway musical breaks her ankle, she is replaced by a young unknown actress, who becomes the star of the show.

Title: Arkansas
Description: Kyle and Swin live by the orders of an Arkansas-based drug kingpin named Frog, whom they've never met. But when a deal goes horribly wrong, the consequences are deadly.

Title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
Description: When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

Title: Champions
Description: A British steeple chase jockey who, in the late 1970s, was diagnosed with cancer. Rather than succumb to the disease, however, Bob stages a miraculous recovery and goes on to win the 1981 Grand National steeplechase on the horse Aldaniti.

Title: A Monster in Paris
Description: A 3D-animated movie set in Paris in the year 1910 and centered on a monster who lives in a garden and his love for a beautiful, young singer.

Title: Escobar: Paradise Lost
Description: In Colombia, a young surfer meets the woman of his dreams - and then meets her uncle, Pablo Escobar.

Title: On a Clear Day You Can See Forever
Description: A troubled young woman who visits a psychotherapist to help her quit smoking undergoes hypnosis and finds herself reliving a tragic Victorian romance from a past life.

Title: Iratta
Description: After a cop is found dead, a policeman's investigation starts a chilling search for the truth connected to his estranged twin and their fraught past.

Title: Down by Law
Description: Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.

Title: Rocket Gibraltar
Description: An old patriarch unites all members of his family for his birthday, but the group of people are full of personal and social problems.

Title: Nights of Cabiria
Description: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

Title: Eat Drink Man Woman
Description: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

Title: Midnight at the Magnolia
Description: Longtime friends and local radio hosts Maggie and Jack fake it as a couple for their families and listeners in hopes of getting their show syndicated.

Title: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
Description: A fictionalized account in four chapters of the life of celebrated Japanese writer Yukio Mishima.

Title: Dangerous Lies
Description: When a wealthy elderly man dies and unexpectedly leaves his estate to his new caregiver, she's drawn into a web of deception and murder. If she's going to survive, she'll have to question everyone's motives - even the people she loves.

Title: Pierrot le Fou
Description: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

Title: De-Lovely
Description: Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda.

Title: Quick Change
Description: Three thieves successfully rob a New York City bank, but making the escape from the city proves to be almost impossible.

Title: The Golem
Description: During an outbreak of a deadly plague in Lithuania, a mystical woman must save her tight-knit Jewish community from a gang of ruffians led by a local landowner, but the entity she conjures to protect them is a far greater evil.

Title: Armour of God
Description: Asian Hawk (Jackie Chan) and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks.

Title: The Children's Hour
Description: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.

Title: Irugapatru
Description: Follows three couples, navigating inevitable challenges, and seeking self-discovery to salvage their relationships

Title: My Night at Maud's
Description: A devout Catholic man's rigid principles are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.

Title: Home Guards
Description: Two boys from bad financial situation join to a law enforcement organization because of a charismatic leader, but soon they realize how hard is to decide who is guilty, and who is a victim.

Title: Table 19
Description: Eloise, having been relieved of maid of honor duties after being unceremoniously dumped by the best man via text, decides to attend the wedding anyway, only to find herself seated with five fellow unwanted guests at the dreaded Table 19.

Title: Bad CGI Gator
Description: Six college grads get a cabin in the swampland's of Georgia. They decide to throw their school laptops in a backyard lake in an act of youthful defiance, which unknowingly turns an alligator into a dreaded and insatiable CGI creature.

Title: The Meteor Man
Description: A high school teacher from a troubled inner city Washington D.C. neighborhood becomes a super-powered hero and takes on the gang that has been terrorizing his streets.

Title: Dolphin Tale 2
Description: The team of people who saved Winter's life reassemble in the wake of her surrogate mother's passing in order to find her a companion so she can remain at the Clearwater Marine Hospital.

Title: Heaven Knows What
Description: A young woman struggles to reconcile her love for her boyfriend and for heroin, as she finds out that suicide is the only way for her boyfriend to forgive her for her misdeed.

Title: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
Description: Cheech and Chong live in a decrepit old house and drive their neighbour crazy with their loud music, weed smoking and general anarchy and slacker view on life. Then Chong meets Cheech's Texan cousin Red and things kick up a notch.

Title: Armed and Dangerous
Description: A fired cop and useless lawyer sign up as security guards and find they've joined a corrupt union.

Title: Brother
Description: An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.

Title: Line of Duty
Description: A disgraced cop finds himself in a race against time to find a kidnap victim whose abductor he accidentally killed.

Title: Antim: The Final Truth
Description: The cop played by Salman fights the land mafia in the film.

Title: Laurel Canyon
Description: When an uptight young man and his fiancée move into his libertine mother's house, the resulting clash of life attitudes shakes everyone up.

Title: Along With the Gods: The Last 49 Days
Description: In the afterlife, one guardian helps a man through his trials, while his two colleagues help a former guardian on earth.

Title: Love Lesson
Description: Hee-Soo is a lonely composer who is not doing very well with her work. New ideas flow when she meets a high school boy who wants to learn how to play the piano.

Title: Two Women
Description: In the Italy of WWII, a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.

Title: Chestnut
Description: A recent graduate becomes entangled in a relationship with a man and a woman during her summer after college.

Title: OSS 117: Cairo, Nest of Spies
Description: Secret agent OSS 117 foils Nazis, beds local beauties, and brings peace to the Middle East.

Title: The Catholic School
Description: In late September 1975, a renowned Catholic school in Rome for sheltered, upper-middle-class boys is attacked in what became known as the Circeo Massacre. The film examines what triggered the violence.

Title: Like Water for Chocolate
Description: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

Title: New York Minute
Description: Jane and Roxy Ryan are teenage Long Island twins who find themselves on numerous misadventures when they trek into Manhattan on a school day.

Title: Perinbaba
Description: The Feather Fairy lives in the sky and gives snow to the people. She lives with a boy called Jakob, who one day ventures into the human world and falls for a peasant girl.

Title: Riding in Cars with Boys
Description: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.

Title: Doom: Annihilation
Description: A group of UAC Marines respond to a distress call from a top secret scientific base on Phobos, a moon around Mars, only to discover it's been overrun by demons who seek to create Hell on Earth.

Title: The Laws of the Border
Description: Introverted Gerona student Nacho meets two delinquents from the city's Chinatown and gets caught up in a summer onslaught of burglaries and hold ups that will change his life.

Title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
Description: A gay man and a political prisoner are together in a prison. The gay man narrates the stories of two fake movies and his own life.

Title: Prozac Nation
Description: A young woman struggles with depression during her first year at Harvard.

Title: Freedom's Path
Description: After a Union soldier flees from battle, rescue comes from a free black man operating a section of the Underground Railroad. But when a ruthless slave catcher discovers the secret network, he conspires to bring it burning to the ground.

Title: Who's That Girl
Description: The life of an uptight tax lawyer turns chaotic when he is asked to escort a young woman newly released from prison, who persuades him to help prove her innocence.

Title: The House
Description: Emma sets out to write a book about the world of sex workers and is hired as a sex worker at La Maison. Emma discovers the dangers and feelings of alienation and isolation, as well as the difficulties in forging romantic bonds.

Title: Karla
Description: Based on real events, Paul Bernardo and his wife, Karla Homolka, kidnap, sexually abuse, and murder three young girls.

Title: Mute Witness
Description: A mute make-up artist working on a slasher movie being shot in Moscow, is locked in the studio after hours. While there, she witnesses a brutal murder, and must escape capture.

Title: Killing Ground
Description: A couple's camping trip turns into a frightening ordeal when they stumble across the scene of a horrific crime.

Title: Noroi
Description: A documentary filmmaker explores seemingly unrelated paranormal incidents connected by the legend of an ancient demon called the "kagutaba."

Title: The Horse Soldiers
Description: In 1863, a Union outfit is sent behind Confederate lines in Mississippi to destroy enemy railroads but a captive southern belle and the unit's doctor cause frictions within ranks.

Title: Oh My Darling
Description: At the Loony Lake Resort, there's a killer on the loose. If you find yourself at Hookup Point, be sure to lock your car doors and close your windows.

Title: The Parallax View
Description: An ambitious reporter gets in way-over-his-head trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation behind every event in the world's headlines.

Title: Red Sun
Description: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.

Title: Grumpy Old Santa
Description: Bowling, Fishing, working, hating and loving almost every day.

Title: California Suite
Description: Misadventures of four groups of guests at the Beverly Hills Hotel.

Title: Mother's Day
Description: Two brothers kidnap and brutalize three women for the pleasure of their demented mother.

Title: Flirting with Disaster
Description: A young man, his wife, and his incompetent case worker travel across country to find his birth parents.

Title: Sing 3
Description: Sequel to "Sing" (2016) & "Sing 2" (2021). Plot under wraps.

Title: Frightmare
Description: After escaping a death sentence for her hideous crimes, a seemingly rehabilitated woman settles in an isolated farmhouse with her husband, only to ache, once more, for blood, and a crash-course in surgery. Is, indeed, her old self back?

Title: Another Country
Description: Based on the life of the young Guy Burgess, who would become better known as one of the Cambridge Spies.

Title: The Buckingham Murders
Description: A grieving cop who loses her child to murder and moves to another town where she's tasked with investigating the disappearance of a missing child. Exploring themes of trauma, grief, the immigrant experience, and our need for closure.

Title: Raazi
Description: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

Title: Beau Travail
Description: An ex-Foreign Legion officer recalls his once-glorious life of leading troops in Djibouti.

Title: The Cellar
Description: Keira Woods' daughter mysteriously vanishes in the cellar of their new house. She soon discovers there is an ancient and powerful entity controlling their home that she will have to face or risk losing her family's souls forever.

Title: Slumber Party Massacre II
Description: Courtney Bates, the younger sister of Valerie, and her friends go to a condo for a weekend getaway, but Courtney can't get rid of the haunting feeling that a supernatural rockabilly driller killer is coming to murder them all.

Title: Behind the Mask: The Rise of Leslie Vernon
Description: The next great psycho horror slasher has given a documentary crew exclusive access to his life as he plans his reign of terror over the sleepy town of Glen Echo.

Title: The Big Heat
Description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

Title: Patient Zero
Description: After an unprecedented global pandemic turns the majority of humankind into violent "Infected," a man gifted with the ability to speak the Infected's new language leads the last survivors on a hunt for Patient Zero and a cure.

Title: Sip
Description: Noah has been longing for his ex-girlfriend Ysa, who now works in a milk tea shop. As he pursues Ysa again, he learns that the real product they serve are the ladies.

Title: Virupaksha
Description: Mysterious deaths occur in a village due to an unknown person's occult practices. The whole town is afraid, and the problems continue as they search for the one responsible.

Title: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
Description: A fictionalized account of the life of the martial arts superstar.

Title: Underground
Description: A 15-year-old drug dealer's world turns upside down when he ends up on the run from dangerous criminals during one chaotic night in London's underworld.

Title: Saint
Description: A horror film that depicts St. Nicholas as a murderous bishop who kidnaps and murders children when there is a full moon on December 5.

Title: Paris Paramount
Description: A filmmaking duo, who after falling in and out of love, reunite on set to work together again.

Title: Mrs. Brown's Boys D'Movie
Description: A company tries to shut down Mrs Brown's fruit and veg stall. They can feck off.

Title: Nancy Drew
Description: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.

Title: A Hologram for the King
Description: A failed American sales rep looks to recoup his losses by traveling to Saudi Arabia and selling his company's product to a wealthy monarch.

Title: Blonde and Blonder
Description: Comic mayhem ensues when two lovely blondes, Dee and Dawn, are mistaken as international mob killers.

Title: One Shot
Description: An elite squad of Navy SEAL's, on a covert mission to transport a prisoner off a CIA black site island prison, are trapped when insurgents attack while trying to rescue the same prisoner.

Title: Black Sheep
Description: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.

Title: Death Game
Description: Two crazy women seduce and then torment a businessman in his plush San Francisco home.

Title: The Virgin Spring
Description: In 14th-century Sweden, an innocent yet pampered teenage girl and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out from their farm to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.

Title: Malone
Description: An ex-C.I.A. hit man running from his past finds just how difficult it is to retire when he runs across a small town controlled by mercenaries and a family that's resisting their control.

Title: Cold Fish
Description: The lives of a bored suburban couple are changed forever when a seemingly nice old man gives their daughter a job at his fish store, and soon his gruesome hobbies are brought to light.

Title: 3 Ninjas Kick Back
Description: Young martial artists face their grandfather's foes when they accompany him to Japan to deliver a priceless dagger.

Title: Red Sonja
Description: Plot kept under wraps. An adaptation of the comic book, Red Sonja, a vengeful warrior known as a "She-Devil with a sword".

Title: High Holiday
Description: To lighten up her uptight family, the free-spirited daughter of a conservative politician brings weed-infused salad dressing to their Christmas Eve dinner. Chaos ensues when everyone gets high and reveals their innermost secrets.

Title: Black Mold
Description: While exploring a decrepit and abandoned facility, an auspicious photographer faces off against her traumatic past.

Title: The Invisible Woman
Description: At the height of his career, Charles Dickens meets a younger woman who becomes his secret lover until his death.

Title: The Forgotten
Description: After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.

Title: The Road to Wellville
Description: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early twentieth century, run by the eccentric Dr. John Harvey Kellogg.

Title: Alone Together
Description: Two strangers embroiled in bad relationships wind up in the same upstate New York Airbnb.

Title: Citizen Ruth
Description: An irresponsible, drug-addicted, recently impregnated woman finds herself in the middle of an abortion debate when both parties attempt to sway her to their respective sides.

Title: The Triplets of Belleville
Description: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

Title: Something You Said Last Night
Description: A writer in her twenties accompanies her parents and younger sister on vacation.

Title: The Rapture
Description: A telephone operator living an empty, amoral life finds God and loses him again.

Title: Kalank
Description: The lives of six enigmatic characters become entangled whilst in search of love, but separated by the dichotomy between the two worlds of Husnabad, a town in North India.

Title: Titus
Description: Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family.

Title: Elisa & Marcela
Description: In 1901, Elisa Sanchez Loriga took on the identity of Mario Sánchez to marry her lover of fifteen years, Marcela Gracia Ibeas.

Title: Lavender
Description: After discovering old fractures in her skull, a photographer recovering from amnesia becomes increasingly haunted by a sinister childhood secret.

Title: The Bang Bang Club
Description: A drama based on the true-life experiences of four combat photographers capturing the final days of apartheid in South Africa.

Title: Fascination
Description: A young man becomes suspicious when his recently widowed mother decides to re-marry soon after his stepfather's death.

Title: Gone in 60 Seconds
Description: When a South American drug lord pays Pace to steal 48 cars for him, all but one is in the bag - thereby, the police precipitate in a desperate car chase against Pace and his Eleanor across Southern California.

Title: Once Upon a Crime...
Description: Phoebe and a fellow American in Rome find a dog with a $5000 reward. They take a train to the owner in Monte Carlo. She turns up murdered. They run and become suspects just as 3 other Americans on the train.

Title: Most Dangerous Game
Description: Plot details are under wraps.

Title: Godspell
Description: An adaption of the musical, in a modern-day song-and-dance recreation of the Gospel of St. Matthew.

Title: Blindspotting
Description: While on probation, a man begins to re-evaluate his relationship with his volatile best friend.

Title: The Good the Bad the Weird
Description: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

Title: The Newton Boys
Description: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

Title: When Dinosaurs Ruled the Earth
Description: Sanna escapes being sacrificed and meets Tara. Together, they live in a seaside tribe that worships the Sun God and survive the dangers of the creatures from the Mesozoic Era.

Title: Moebius
Description: A father driven into desire, a son coveting that of his father's and the sorrowful maternity that hovers them into tragedy.

Title: The Christmas Tree
Description: Since the death of his mother, Pascal, ten years old, spends his holidays with his father, the rich Laurent Segur. One day, when diving near the shores of Corse, an aircraft falls into the sea. The holiday goes on happily with Catherine, the young and pretty girlfriend of Laurent. But soon blue marks appear on the face of Pascal. He has been contaminated by a nuclear weapon carried by the destroyed plane, and he won't survive more than six months. There is nothing Laurent can do, except give his son the best six months he has ever lived.

Title: Dead Mine
Description: The legend of Yamashita's Gold lures a treasure hunter and his group deep into the Indonesian jungle. Once they are trapped in an abandoned World War II Japanese bunker, they face the terrifying reality that the only way out is to go further in.

Title: Don't Let Go
Description: After a man's family dies in what appears to be a murder, he gets a phone call from one of the dead, his niece. He's not sure if she's a ghost or if he's going mad, but as it turns out, he's not.

Title: Angel Eyes
Description: A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and an unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.

Title: The Absence of Eden
Description: An ICE Agent struggling with the moral dilemmas of border security and an undocumented woman fighting to escape a ruthless cartel cross paths and work together to save the life of an innocent girl.

Title: Radhe
Description: After taking the dreaded gangster Gani Bhai, ACP Rajveer Shikawat aka Radhe goes on a manhunt to find the wealthiest man of the town secretly running a crime syndicate.

Title: Stutz
Description: Follow Hill and his therapist as he has candid discussions of mental health and the progressively worsening anxiety attacks related to movie promotion that have turned his dream job into a nightmare.

Title: Kingsglaive: Final Fantasy XV
Description: King Regis, who oversees the land of Lucis, commands his army of soldiers to protect the kingdom from the Niflheim empire's plans to steal the sacred crystal which gives Lucis its magic and power.

Title: Refuge
Description: Sergeant Rick Pedroni, who comes home to his wife Kate changed and dangerous after suffering an attack by a mysterious force during combat in Afghanistan.

Title: All the King's Men
Description: The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his friends richer and retains power by dint of a populist appeal.

Title: Hell
Description: After being deported back to Mexico, a man has no choice but to join the vicious drug cartel that has corrupted his hometown in order to survive.

Title: On Body and Soul
Description: When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams, where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love, they decide to make their dreams come true, but it's difficult in real life.

Title: Joyful Noise
Description: G.G. Sparrow faces off with her choir's newly appointed director, Vi Rose Hill, over the group's direction as they head into a national competition.

Title: The Gunman
Description: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

Title: Bullets Over Broadway
Description: In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

Title: Circus Maximus
Description: The film is a surreal and psychedelic journey, uniting a collective of visionary filmmakers from around the world in a kaleidoscopic exploration of human experience and the power of soundscapes.

Title: Cinderella
Description: Cinderella traces the misadventures of our heroine, who, via the help of her "fairy" godmother, is granted heightened sexual prowess to win over Prince Charming.

Title: The Watcher
Description: David Allen Griffin is a cool killer- time and time again, he chooses a female victim, studies her for weeks till he knows her routine to the smallest detail, makes meticulous preparations using his forensic knowledge to gain entry when she's quite alone, subdues her and administers a long, torturous death. Joel Campbell got so frustrated by his failure to capture Griffin in Los Angeles, that he quit the FBI, moved to Chicago, and remains in psychiatric therapy, unable to function normally. Then he realizes, when opening his mail very late, that a new murder victim is Griffin's, and the killer sent him pictures of her. Campbell reports this to the police, but is unwilling to join them in the search, suggesting Griffin is too slick and clever; yet he won't get out of it that easily.

Title: The Hammer
Description: Kim Wheeler, an attorney who is appointed as a judge for Nevada's 5th district after the former judge's death. As the investigation into the death intensifies, Kim's sister, who runs the local brothel, becomes the prime suspect.

Title: The Sister of Ursula
Description: Still mourning the passing of their father, two Austrian sisters, Dagmar and Ursula, arrive at a luxurious Italian seaside hotel. At the same time, a mysterious killer starts murdering promiscuous women in the area.

Title: Dom Hemingway
Description: After spending 12 years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he's owed.

Title: Phantom
Description: Young and handsome Sergio works the night shift as a trash collector in Lisbon, Portugal. He can't force himself to connect with his pretty female co-worker Fatima, who displays an avid interest in him, so instead Sergio roams the city with the trash company's pet dog. Eventually Sergio becomes fascinated with a sleek motorcycle, and then also its owner, João - a young man totally indifferent to Sergio. The frustrated trash collector's surfacing sexual desires unleash his darkest impulses, sending him down a dangerous path of violence, depravity and degradation.

Title: Lady Snowblood
Description: A strikingly beautiful young woman is trained from birth to be a deadly instrument of revenge against the swindlers who destroyed her family.

Title: Christmas Holiday
Description: A young femme fatale-type woman realizes that the man she married is an incorrigible wastrel.

Title: Next Exit
Description: Two unhappy strangers find themselves on a road trip across the U.S. to partake in a scientist's radical experiment with the afterlife in Mali Elfman's poignant sci-fi debut.

Title: Beverly Hills Chihuahua
Description: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.

Title: Come True
Description: A teenage runaway takes part in a sleep study that becomes a nightmarish descent into the depths of her mind and a frightening examination of the power of dreams.

Title: Separation
Description: A young girl finds solace in her artist father and the ghost of her dead mother.

Title: My Beautiful Laundrette
Description: An ambitious Pakistani Briton and his white boyfriend strive for success and hope when they open a glamorous laundromat.

Title: Invaders from Mars
Description: A boy tries to stop aliens who have taken over his town and are attempting to brainwash its inhabitants.

Title: The Defiant Ones
Description: Two chained-together escaped convicts, White and Black, must learn to get along in order to elude capture.

Title: Back Roads
Description: In 1993, Harley's dad is shot dead and his mom goes to prison. He has to earn money and look after his 3 kid sisters. No college. Over 2 years, family secrets are slowly revealed. Will a good therapist be enough?

Title: Cadillac Man
Description: Joey gets 2 days to sell 12 cars to keep his job and keep his girlfriends happy. It gets worse. He's juggling 3 buyers when a guy with a machine gun crashes into the car dealership and takes everybody hostage.

Title: Breaking the Girls
Description: Sara, a college student who was slandered by a classmate, finds herself framed for murder by Alex, who initially proposed the perfect, untraceable crime.

Title: The Venture Bros.: Radiant Is the Blood of the Baboon Heart
Description: Doc's latest invention will either bankrupt the Ventures or launch them to new heights.

Title: Autumn Sonata
Description: A devoted wife is visited by her mother, a successful concert pianist who had little time for her when she was young.

Title: ATL
Description: As four friends prepare for life after high school, different challenges bring about turning points in each of their lives. The dramas unfold and resolve at their local rollerskating rink, Cascade.

Title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
Description: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

Title: Hardware
Description: The head of a cyborg reactivates, rebuilds itself, and goes on a violent rampage in a space marine's girlfriend's apartment.

Title: Extract
Description: Joel, the owner of an extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.

Title: Daughter of the Wolf
Description: A military veteran hunts the men who kidnapped her son.

Title: Holy Motors
Description: A man boards a limousine to be driven to his day's work: nine mysterious "appointments."

Title: Motel Hell
Description: A seemingly friendly farmer and his sister kidnap unsuspecting travelers and bury them alive, using them to create the "special meat" they are famous for.

Title: Grand Canyon
Description: The fates of several people are randomly intertwining. Their sympathy of each other faces multiple differences in their lifestyles.

Title: Kung Fu Yoga
Description: Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai, and to a mountain temple in India.

Title: Night in Paradise
Description: Hiding out in Jeju Island following a brutal tragedy, a wronged mobster with a target on his back connects with a woman who has her own demons.

Title: Unrest
Description: In late 19th century Switzerland, a factory worker becomes involved with a local group of anarchist watchmakers.

Title: Hounddog
Description: A drama set in the American South, where a precocious, troubled girl finds a safe haven in the music and movement of Elvis Presley.

Title: Hart's War
Description: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

Title: So Undercover
Description: A tough, street-smart private eye is hired by the FBI to go undercover in a college sorority.

Title: The Health Journey
Description: Stig-Helmer has returned to Sweden after the divorce from Fiona, and lives a sad and stagnant life in front of the television. As usual his enthusiastic and energetic friend Ole knows how to get his pal out of the boring existence he finds himself in. The eccentric Rebekka is a whole new acquaintance, who radically is going to change Stig-Helmer's life.

Title: About Elly
Description: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

Title: Pursuit
Description: Detective Breslin crosses paths with Calloway, a ruthless hacker who's trying to save his kidnapped wife from a drug cartel. When Calloway escapes from police custody, Breslin joins forces with a no-nonsense cop to reclaim his prisoner.

Title: Sheroes
Description: When four thick-as-thieves friends arrive in Thailand they quickly find themselves in over their heads. Fighting to stay alive, they employ their unique set of skills and unleash their fierce loyalty in a heart-pumping battle for survival.

Title: Happy End
Description: When a wife becomes the breadwinner of her family after her husband loses his job, adultery becomes part of her life.

Title: Strictly Sexual
Description: Two successful women, sick and tired of dating and relationships, decide to keep two young men in their pool house for strictly sexual purposes.

Title: Land of the Pharaohs
Description: A captured architect designs an ingenious plan to ensure the impregnability of the tomb of a self-absorbed Pharaoh, obsessed with the security of his next life.

Title: State of Emergency
Description: Chaos consumes a small town when a chemical facility explodes releasing a deadly toxin. Moments after the leak, the town's residents show signs of mutation, causing the military to quarantine the area leaving any survivors helpless and trapped inside. The story follows Jim, a young man isolated within the red zone, as he eludes flesh eating zombies in an attempt to win back his freedom.

Title: A Real Pain
Description: Two cousins travel to Poland after their grandmother's death to see where they came from and end up joining a Holocaust tour.

Title: The Madness of King George
Description: When King George III goes mad, his Lieutenants try to adjust the rules to run the country without his participation.

Title: Little Buddha
Description: After the death of Lama Dorje, Tibetan Buddhist monks find three children - one American and two Nepalese - who may be the rebirth of their great teacher.

Title: The Missouri Breaks
Description: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

Title: Hounds of Love
Description: Vicki Maloney is randomly abducted from a suburban street by a disturbed couple. As she observes the dynamic between her captors she quickly realises she must drive a wedge between them if she is to survive.

Title: Section 8
Description: After avenging the murder of his family a former soldier is sprung from prison and recruited by a shadowy government agency.

Title: Come from Away
Description: 7,000 passengers are stranded after the 9/11 terrorist attacks in a small town in Newfoundland, where they were housed and welcomed. Filmed live on stage at the Gerald Schoenfeld Theater in New York City.

Title: The Ages of Lulu
Description: The story of a young woman's descent into the kinky and dangerous sexual underground in Madrid.

Title: Choke
Description: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.

Title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
Description: Teenager Darren Shan meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a vampire. After a series of events, Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque du Freak, becoming a creature of the night.

Title: Kill the Messenger
Description: Journalist Gary Webb, California 1996, started investigating CIA's role in the 1980s in getting crack cocaine to the black part of LA to get money and weapons to the Contra insurgents in Nicaragua.

Title: Arthur
Description: A drunken playboy stands to lose a wealthy inheritance when he falls for a woman his family doesn't like.

Title: Choose Love
Description: Cami has it all, the perfect job and boyfriend but she feels that something is missing, and that feeling begins to grow when she meets Rex and an old love returns to her life.

Title: Kinetta
Description: At a Greek hotel in the off-season, a chamber maid, a man obsessed with BMWs, and a photo-store clerk attempt to film and photograph various badly reenacted struggles between a man and a woman.

Title: Miss Stevens
Description: A heart-broken teacher chaperones a group of high schoolers to a state drama competition.

Title: Rose Island
Description: An idealistic engineer builds his own island off the Italian coast and declares it a nation, drawing the world's attention. Values are tested when the Italian Government declares him an enemy, but to change the world risks must be taken.

Title: The Heavenly Kid
Description: In order to earn his wings and get into heaven, a hip guardian angel is handed the task of watching over a lonely high school boy who needs guidance on how to fit in.

Title: Premium Rush
Description: In Manhattan, a bike messenger picks up an envelope that attracts the interest of a dirty cop, who pursues the cyclist throughout the city.

Title: Ready to Rumble
Description: Two slacker wrestling fans are devastated by the ousting of their favorite character by an unscrupulous promoter.

Title: The House on Sorority Row
Description: After a seemingly innocent prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one in their sorority house while throwing a party to celebrate their graduation.

Title: The Guardians
Description: During the Cold War, an organization called "Patriot" created a super-hero squad, which includes members of multiple Soviet republics. For years, the heroes had to hide their identities, but in hard times they must show themselves again.

Title: Ittefaq
Description: A detective seeks out the truth between two different stories of a crime scene.

Title: Iron Sky: The Coming Race
Description: A follow-up to the film Iron Sky (2012) in which Nazis plan to take over the world after lying dormant in a secret military base on the moon.

Title: Hit the Road
Description: Follows a chaotic, tender family that is on a road trip across a rugged landscape and fussing over the sick dog and getting on each others' nerves. Only the mysterious older brother is quiet.

Title: Life with Luca
Description: Life With Luca is a spinoff movie based on the television series Life with Derek. The film picks up 15 years after the finale as Derek and his daughter Skyler prepare to move in with aunt Casey and her extended family.

Title: My Dog Skip
Description: A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.

Title: Occupation
Description: A small group of town residents have to band together after a devastating ground invasion. As they struggle to survive, they realize they must stay one step ahead of their attackers, and work together for a chance to strike back.

Title: Satanic Panic
Description: A pizza delivery girl at the end of her financial rope has to fight for her life - and her tips - when her last order of the night turns out to be high society Satanists in need of a virgin sacrifice.

Title: The BFG
Description: A young orphan girl, Sophie, gets taken away to a faraway land populated by Giants and Dreams.

Title: Miracle Beach
Description: A down-on-his luck beach bum asks a cute female genie to help him seduce the woman of his dreams only to realize that he might be looking in the wrong place.

Title: A Wesley Christmas
Description: Sibling adults Chris, Todd, and Cydney Wesley all go to their childhood home in Washington, DC, to celebrate the Christmas vacation with their parents Bryan and Sylvia and the entire Wesley family.

Title: The Fly
Description: A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.

Title: The Takeover
Description: Framed for murder after uncovering a privacy scandal, an ethical hacker must evade the police while trying to track down the criminals blackmailing her.

Title: The Neighbor
Description: Set in Cutter Mississippi, the film follows a man who discovers the dark truth about his neighbor and the secrets he may be keeping in the cellar.

Title: A Lonely Place to Die
Description: A group of mountaineers in the Scottish Highlands discover a kidnapped girl and are pursued by her captors.

Title: My Father and My Son
Description: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

Title: Les Misérables in Concert: The 25th Anniversary
Description: A celebratory 25th anniversary concert performance of the hit musical at The O2 in London.

Title: Mo' Better Blues
Description: Jazz trumpeter Bleek Gilliam makes questionable decisions in his professional and romantic lives.

Title: Crawlers
Description: In the year 2030, a Zombie Pandemic of Biblical proportions decimates the United States' population. American survivors rush to Mexico to 'El Santuario del Sur', the southern sanctuary, a rocky plateau believed to be zombie free.

Title: The Angry Black Girl and Her Monster
Description: Vicaria is a brilliant teenager who believes death is a disease that can be cured. After the brutal murder of her brother, she embarks on a dangerous journey to bring him back to life.

Title: Tuhog
Description: Abie's fiance, Michael is reported dead during dangerous military task. She finds solace from her supposedly soon-to-be father-in-law, Roldan, and starts falling for him. But when Michael returns, their world turns upside down.

Title: Deuces Wild
Description: Bobby, a member of The Deuces, and the sister of the rival Vipers member fall in love, promoting a street war between the two factions.

Title: Marmaduke
