Description: A suburban family moves to a new neighborhood with their large, yet lovable Great Dane, who has a tendency to wreak havoc in his own oblivious way.

Title: Let It Snow
Description: Separated from her fiance after sneaking onto a restricted slope, Mia, a free-riding snowboarder, must survive not only against nature, but also the masked snowmobile rider in black who is out for her blood.

Title: Aliens the Awakening
Description: A group of scientists return to LV-426 where a new base has been built, but when they get there something is wrong and they discover eggs in the underground of the base.

Title: Macbeth
Description: A ruthlessly ambitious Scottish lord seizes the throne with the help of his scheming wife and a trio of witches.

Title: You Are Not My Mother
Description: In a North Dublin housing estate Char's mother goes missing. When she returns Char is determined to uncover the truth of her disappearance and unearth the dark secrets of her family.

Title: Treasure Island
Description: The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate captain Long John Silver.

Title: Are You Here
Description: Two childhood best friends, one a superficial womanizer and the other a barely functioning bipolar, embark on a road trip back to their hometown after one of them learns his estranged father has died.

Title: The Disappearance of Shere Hite
Description: Shere Hite's bestselling book The Hite Report liberated female orgasm by revealing the most private experiences of thousands of anonymous surveys. Her findings rocked the American establishment and conversations about gender and sexuality.

Title: S. Darko
Description: Donnie Darko's little sister Samantha and her best friend Corey are on a cross-country road trip, but soon find themselves entangled in a dangerous glitch in the time-space continuum.

Title: Bright Young Things
Description: An adaptation of Evelyn Waugh's novel "Vile Bodies", is a look into the lives of a young novelist, his would-be lover, and a host of young people who beautified London in the 1930s.

Title: Eyes Without a Face
Description: A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured and goes to extreme lengths to give her a new face.

Title: Murder Made Easy
Description: Pals Joan and Michael host an elaborate dinner party for their best friends on the anniversary of the death of Joan's husband. But as each guest arrives they find their very lives are on the menu to protect a secret that links them all.

Title: Ivan's Childhood
Description: During WWII, Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.

Title: Danny Collins
Description: An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.

Title: The Tunnel
Description: An investigation into a government cover-up leads to a network of abandoned train tunnels deep beneath the heart of Sydney. As a journalist and her crew hunt for the story it quickly becomes clear the story is hunting them.

Title: The Dirt Bike Kid
Description: When his mother sends Jack off with money to buy groceries, he comes home with a magic supercharged dirt bike instead. His mother is furious, but when Jack uses the magic bike to save the local hot dog stand from the clutches of corrupt big business, he becomes the town hero.

Title: Inshallah a Boy
Description: Jordan's inheritance culture under which women are pressured to relinquish their rights to property to male relatives.

Title: Basket Case
Description: A young man carrying a big basket that contains his extremely deformed, formerly conjoined twin brother seeks vengeance on the doctors who separated them against their will.

Title: What Remains of Us
Description: Set in 1965, follows a ten-year-old girl as she starts to question her atypical life in her family's fortified compound in rural England

Title: Girl Lost: A Hollywood Story
Description: Girl Lost: A Hollywood Story offers a glimpse into the lives of women involved in the sex industry through the interconnected stories of a teen runaway, single mother and two career escorts.

Title: False Positive
Description: As if getting pregnant weren't complicated enough, Lucy sets out to uncover the unsettling truth about her fertility doctor.

Title: Stakeout
Description: Two detectives observe an escaped convict's ex-girlfriend, but complications set in when one of them falls for her.

Title: Carnival of Souls
Description: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

Title: All the Pretty Horses
Description: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

Title: Lady Jane
Description: The story of Lady Jane Grey, who was Queen of England for only nine days.

Title: Duck Soup
Description: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side they're on.

Title: Children of a Lesser God
Description: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

Title: Thursday
Description: A former L.A. drug dealer has moved to Houston to make a new life for himself as a married architect. Everything falls apart when he is suddenly visited by one of his former cohorts who comes carrying heroin.

Title: Brother
Description: Sons of Caribbean immigrants, Francis and Michael face questions of masculinity, identity and family amid the pulsing beat of Toronto's early hip-hop scene.

Title: China Moon
Description: Detective Kyle Bodine falls for Rachel Munro who is trapped in a violent marriage. After shooting her husband, Kyle reluctantly agrees to help hide the body, but Kyle's partner is showing an unusual flair for finding clues.

Title: Urban Tale
Description: A boy and a girl wake up in bed one morning, naked. The children's mother died a few weeks earlier. Before she died she asked her children to find their birth father who left them when they were still babies. Their quest in search of their father leads them to hospitals, nursing homes and holding cells. In the course of the quest the brother and sister meet people who provide them - like in parallel quantum universes - a glance into what their future lives may hold for them. Is this a world suitable for these two young souls? Will they change their nature in order to survive? Based on a true story, this independent film is unique in its cinematic storytelling, provocative and sometimes non politically correct, yet on the other hand thought provoking and soul penetrating.

Title: The Cowboy Way
Description: Two childhood friends who are rodeo cowboys travel from New Mexico to New York City searching for a friend who disappeared while looking for his daughter, who's just been smuggled into the US from Cuba.

Title: Hercules
Description: The story of the Greek mythological figure, updated in this 80's version.

Title: Twisted
Description: Jessica, whose father killed her mother and committed suicide, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the center of her own investigation, when her former lovers start being murdered.

Title: Zero Fucks Given
Description: Cassandre (Adèle Exarchopoulos) is disconnected from life after the death of her mother, spending her days working on a budget airline, and having meaningless relationships.

Title: Mrs. Brown
Description: When Queen Victoria's husband Prince Albert dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. John Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.

Title: Messiah of Evil
Description: A young woman goes searching for her missing artist father. Her journey takes her to a strange Californian seaside town governed by a mysterious undead cult.

Title: Queen of the Ring
Description: The biopic of Mildred Burke, the first ever million dollar female athlete and champion pro-wrestler who pioneered the sport in a time when all girl wrestling was banned in most of America.

Title: Holland, Michigan
Description: A thriller centered on a woman who suspects her husband is cheating, and enters into an affair of her own, before learning her husband's true, dark secret life.

Title: The Giant Spider Invasion
Description: Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.

Title: Far til fire i byen
Description: The last day of the summer holiday is spent in the amusement park.

Title: Una
Description: When a young woman unexpectedly arrives at her much-older former lover's workplace, looking for answers, the secrets of their dark past threaten to unravel his new life. What follows is an emotional and unflinching excavation of inappropriate love, with shattering consequences.

Title: Wil
Description: Wilfried Wils must survive as an auxiliary policeman during the Nazi occupation of Antwerp.

Title: Martyrs
Description: A woman and her childhood friend seek out revenge on those who victimized and abused them.

Title: Burning Flowers
Description: The film is about the teenager Hermann (Hølmebakk) who develops a relationship with the middle-aged Rosa (Fjeldstad).

Title: Relay
Description: A broker of lucrative payoffs between corrupt corporations and the individuals who threaten them breaks his own rules when a new client seeks his protection to stay alive.

Title: Departures
Description: A newly unemployed cellist takes a job preparing the dead for funerals.

Title: The Tunnel
Description: When a truck crashes inside a tunnel, people on their way home for Christmas are brutally trapped in a deadly fire. With a blizzard raging outside, and the first responders struggling to get to the accident, it's every man for himself.

Title: Everybody's Talking About Jamie
Description: Feature film adaptation of the musical about a teenager from Sheffield, England who wants to be a drag queen.

Title: The Unseen
Description: A law student finds himself in a twisted web of murder and deceit brought on by a dark force from his past.

Title: A Simple Wish
Description: A bumbling fairy godfather tries to grant a girl's wish that her cabby father lands a Broadway role.

Title: Red Rock West
Description: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter is mistaken for a hitman, but when the real hitman arrives, complications ensue.

Title: Nowhere to Run
Description: Sam, an escaped convict, lands up on a farmland owned by a widow. When he learns that a ruthless contractor is trying to take over her land, he helps her to fight against the injustice.

Title: Gore
Description: A young man spends a summer in Italy where he meets his idol, Gore Vidal, who teaches him about life, love, and politics.

Title: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold
Description: Allan Quatermain once again teams up with Jesse Huston where the discovery of a mysterious old gold piece sends Quatermain looking for his long-lost brother, missing in the wilds of Africa after seeking a lost white race.

Title: Chapter 27
Description: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.

Title: In the Land of Women
Description: A sleazy writer has a chance to redeem himself when he goes to stay with his grandmother and befriends the neighbors.

Title: Our Idiot Brother
Description: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

Title: Dude
Description: A group of teenage girlfriends deal with their impending graduation from high school.

Title: The Go-Between
Description: A tale of torrid and forbidden love between a couple in the English countryside.

Title: Sleepaway Camp III: Teenage Wasteland
Description: After murdering a young girl, Angela Baker assumes her identity and travels to Camp New Horizons, built on the grounds of the camp she terrorized the year before, and starts killing again.

Title: The Hunter
Description: Martin, a mercenary, is sent from Europe by a mysterious biotech company to the Tasmanian wilderness on a hunt for the last Tasmanian tiger.

Title: Wimbledon
Description: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

Title: Make Me Believe
Description: Two meddling grannies trick their adult grandkids into a meet-cute that reignites a childhood crush and old grudges.

Title: Short Circuit 2
Description: Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.

Title: Hidden Blade
Description: Follows the story of underground workers who risked their lives to send intelligence and defend the motherland, set after Japan's attack on Pearl Harbor when the Wang Jingwei regime declared war on Britain and the U.S.

Title: Frosty
Description: A fairy-tale about a conceited young man and a young woman with a tyrannical step-mother, who must overcome magical trials in order to be together.

Title: This Must Be the Place
Description: Cheyenne, a retired rock star living off his royalties in Dublin, returns to New York City to find the man responsible for a humiliation suffered by his recently deceased father during W.W.II.

Title: Calvaire
Description: Marc, a traveling entertainer, is on his way home for Christmas when his van breaks down in the middle of a jerkwater town with some strange inhabitants.

Title: Indiscreet
Description: An actress who has given up on love meets a suave banker and begins a flirtation with him--although he's already married.

Title: 3 Idiots
Description: A group of friends embark on a fun adventure determined to find a college roommate who disappeared without a trace on graduation day.

Title: No Bears
Description: Two parallel love stories in which the partners are thwarted by hidden, inevitable obstacles, the force of superstition, and the mechanics of power.

Title: The Photographer of Mauthausen
Description: Based on real events, Francesc Boix is a Spaniard inmate in the Nazi concentration camp of Mauthausen in Austria who tries to save the evidences of the horrors committed inside its walls.

Title: At the Earth's Core
Description: A Victorian era scientist and his assistant take a test run in their Iron Mole drilling machine and end up in a strange underground labyrinth ruled by a species of giant telepathic bird and full of prehistoric monsters and cavemen.

Title: National Lampoon's Senior Trip
Description: To embarrass his rival, a scheming senator uses nitwit Ohio teens who are invited to a Washington gathering on educational failure.

Title: Gold Brick
Description: Determined to even the scales and profit from his thankless job, a factory worker schemes to traffic luxury perfumes from under his employer's nose.

Title: Postcards from the Edge
Description: A substance-addicted actress tries to look on the bright side even as she is forced to move back in with her mother to avoid unemployment.
The events leading up to an 11:14 p.m. car crash, from five very different perspectives.

Title: Wasabi
Description: In Japan for the funeral of his long-lost love, a tough French detective learns that he also has a teenage daughter and that her life is in danger from the Yakuza.

Title: Nightmare Sisters
Description: Three geeky college girls who can't get a date, organize a seance and become sex starved vamps.

Title: The Legend of Maula Jatt
Description: From times untold where legends are written in soil with blood, a hero is born. Maula Jatt, a fierce prizefighter with a tortured past seeks vengeance against his arch nemesis Noori Natt, the most feared warrior in the land of Punjab.

Title: Two Hands
Description: A 19 year old finds himself in debt to a local gangster when some gang loot disappears and sets him on the run from thugs. Meanwhile two street kids start a shopping spree when they find the missing money.

Title: Margaret
Description: A young woman witnesses a bus accident, and is caught up in the aftermath, where the question of whether or not it was intentional affects many people's lives.

Title: I Am David
Description: A twelve-year-old boy escapes from a Bulgarian Communist concentration camp and sets out on a journey to reach Denmark.

Title: No Holds Barred
Description: A TV-network boss pits a wrestler called Zeus against a wrestler called Rip in a wrestling match.

Title: Xtreme
Description: Two years after the murder of his son and father, a retired hitman sets in motion a carefully crafted revenge plan against the killer: his own brother.

Title: Affliction
Description: A deeply troubled small-town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while other events jeopardize his sanity.

Title: Uncle Nick
Description: Nothing ruins Christmas like family.

Title: Metalocalypse: Army of the Doomstar
Description: Can Dethklok choose between their egos and the greater good of the world to embark on a gauntlet of dangers that will try their very souls and finally write the song that will be their salvation?

Title: The ABCs of Death
Description: A 26-chapter anthology that showcases death in all its vicious wonder and brutal beauty.

Title: Wolf Creek 2
Description: The outback once more becomes a place of horror as another unwitting tourist becomes the prey for crazed, serial-killing pig-hunter Mick Taylor.

Title: Gung Ho
Description: When a Japanese car company buys an American plant, the American liaison must mediate the clash of work attitudes between the foreign management and native labor.

Title: The Kitchen
Description: The wives of New York gangsters in Hell's Kitchen in the 1970s continue to operate their husbands' rackets after they're locked up in prison.

Title: Don't Fuck in the Woods
Description: A group of friends are going on a camping trip to celebrate graduating college. But once they enter the woods, the group are attacked by a creature.

Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Description: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

Title: Wee Willie Winkie
Description: Priscilla Williams, a young girl living with her widowed mother and paternal grandfather at the post he commands in northern India, becomes enamored of military life and embroiled in brewing rebellion against the crown in the early 1900's.

Title: No Mercy
Description: A Chicago detective, seeking to avenge his partner's death, travels to New Orleans, where he unexpectedly becomes involved in a cat and mouse game of survival.

Title: Occupation: Rainfall
Description: Two years after aliens land on Earth, survivors from Sydney, Australia, fight in a desperate war as the number of casualties continue to grow.

Title: Department Q: The Keeper of Lost Causes
Description: Police inspector Carl Mørck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant Assad. They dig into a case about a missing woman.

Title: Champions
Description: A basketball coach is sentenced to community service, forced to work with a team of mentally disabled players.

Title: Breaking the Surface
Description: A photography student struggles to balance school, work, and helping her mom. She meets a mysterious younger man at a club. They start a passionate affair, but their new relationship faces tough challenges that test their commitment.

Title: Someone Like You
Description: After being jilted by her boyfriend, a talk show talent scout writes a column on the relationship habits of men which gains her national fame.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

Title: Then Came You
Description: A hypochondriac working as an airport baggage handler is forced to confront his fears when a British teenager with a terminal illness enlists him to help her carry out her eccentric bucket list.

Title: Excess Baggage
Description: A bratty teenager fakes her own kidnapping, but gets mistakenly kidnapped for real instead.

Title: Austin Powers 4
Description: The fourth installment in the Austin Powers series.

Title: Code of Silence
Description: A Chicago cop is caught in the middle of a gang war while his own comrades shun him because he wants to take down an irresponsible cop.

Title: Futureworld
Description: Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.

Title: Summer '03
Description: A 16-year-old girl and her extended family are left reeling after her calculating grandmother unveils an array of secrets on her deathbed.

Title: Pietje Bell
Description: There is never a dull moment in 10-year-old Peter's life; his adventures appearing in newspaper headlines based unfortunately on outright lies. Together with his own little army, The Black Hand Club, Peter decides to right these wrongs.

Title: Gor II
Description: An Earthman returns to the planet Gor, and fights against tyranny.

Title: Radical Wolfe
Description: With a distinctive style all his own, author and journalist Tom Wolfe reshapes how American stories are told.

Title: The Long Game
Description: In 1955, five young Mexican-American caddies, out of the love for the game, were determined to learn how to play, so they created their own golf course in the middle of the South Texas desert.

Title: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes!
Description: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated killer tomatoes.

Title: Stardust
Description: Chronicles the young David Bowie's first visit to the US in 1971 - a trip that inspired the invention of his iconic alter ego Ziggy Stardust.

Title: Alphaville
Description: A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.

Title: Hell of a Summer
Description: The counselors of a summer camp are terrorized by a masked killer.

Title: Wild Hearts Can't Be Broken
Description: Thrilled by a performance she sees at a fair, Sonora Webster tries to land a spot as a daredevil who rides horses off of high dives.

Title: Ronal the Barbarian
Description: The 100 Barbarian Sons of Krull get attacked by a superior force and captured. It's up to the young, weak but smart Ronal to free them. 3 join his dangerous quest.

Title: Company Business
Description: A retired CIA agent is recruited to participate in a prisoner exchange with the Russians.

Title: Gorky Park
Description: A Moscow police officer investigates a vicious triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.

Title: American Pastoral
Description: An All-American college star and his beauty queen wife watch their seemingly perfect life fall apart as their daughter joins the turmoil of '60s America.

Title: Doctor Dolittle
Description: After the animal communicating veterinarian goes too far for his clientele, he and his friends escape their hometown to the sea in search of the Great Pink Sea Snail.

Title: Animal Friends
Description: Two animals become unlikely friends.

Title: Happy-Go-Lucky
Description: A look at a few chapters in the life of Poppy, a cheery, colorful, North London schoolteacher whose optimism tends to exasperate those around her.

Title: Free Birds
Description: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history, and get Turkeys off the Thanksgiving menu for good.

Title: The Damned
Description: The dramatic collapse of a wealthy, industrialist/Junker family during the reign of the Third Reich.

Title: Final Cut
Description: Things go badly for a small film crew shooting a low budget zombie movie when they are attacked by real zombies.

Title: Little Thirteen
Description: The everyday lives of teenagers, coming from various social backgrounds. For them, sexuality has become a substitute for love, resulting from emotional neglect.

Title: Life with Father
Description: A straitlaced turn-of-the-century father presides over a family of boys and the mother who really rules the roost.

Title: Hibang
Description: A girl tries to regain her memory, and her former friend tries to help her, but not everything is as it seems.

Title: Dust Bunny
Description: An eight-year-old girl asks her scheming neighbor for help in killing the monster under her bed that she thinks ate her family.

Title: The United States vs. Billie Holiday
Description: Follows Holiday during her career as she is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics with an undercover sting operation led by black Federal Agent Jimmy Fletcher, with whom she has a tumultuous affair.

Title: Dracula
Description: In 1913, the charming, seductive and sinister vampire Count Dracula travels to England in search of an immortal bride.

Title: God Bless America
Description: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.

Title: Unicorns
Description: It follows a queer South Asian nightclub performer living a double life, and a young, single father who works as a mechanic. When they meet, a search for identity is sparked.

Title: The Big 4
Description: Tells the story of an elite assassin that is targeted by murderous gangsters after sparing a girl's life during a massacre.

Title: Anita
Description: Anita is a girl of only teenage years, and while she has developed early physically, to a mature woman, she is emotionally struggling. Her relationship with her parents and her friends is very poor and she is regarded with contempt by the people around her, even by the men who so ruthlessly use her. During her troubles she meets Erik, a young psychology student. Gently and carefully he begins to dispel her psychological blocks. In the course of this treatment she reveals to him some of the shocking episodes of her previous experiences. Erik believes he has the solution to Anita's problems: to let her move into an artist's communal experiment, of which he is already a member. The common interest of this collective is largely the performing of classical music. Anita's presence in the collective, however, is regarded by some of the other girls as highly provocative. Anita's nymphomania is her means of protest against her parents, school, society and her own environment (her whole life situation). He therefore tries to get her to see clearly, and with some insight, the breadth of her psychological situation. Against the background of the intensive battle that Anita carries on with the self-destructive drives within her, grows the depth of feeling that bind her and Erik together. She is no longer simply a "case" for him. Anita discovers that Erik is the one man whom she both wants to, and can, remain with.

Title: Lorenzo's Oil
Description: Lorenzo Odone, a Virginia 5-year-old, develops a degenerative nerve disease so rare that nobody is working on a cure, so his parents decide to immerse themselves in research and tackle the problem themselves.

Title: Dertigers: De Kerstfilm
Description: The most beautiful time of the year has arrived: Christmas. In various ways, the group in the Netherlands is confronted with the chaos of their diverse lives. Will the trip to the enchanting Lapland bring them back together?

Title: Battlestar Galactica
Description: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet on a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

Title: Lost Bullet
Description: A small time delinquent, turned police mechanic for a go fast task force, is forced to defend his innocence when his mentor is killed by dirty cops.

Title: The Souvenir: Part II
Description: In the aftermath of her tumultuous relationship, Julie begins to untangle her fraught love for him in making her graduation film, sorting fact from his elaborately constructed fiction.

Title: American Outlaws
Description: 5 Southern friends return home when the war ends 1865. But Yankee soldiers and Pinkerton are busy helping a railroad baron grab land from farmers along the planned railroad west. The 5 friends fight back.

Title: The Daughter: I, a Woman Part III
Description: Siv loves sex, while her 17-year-old daughter Birthe is frigid. Soon, however, Birthe's sexuality is awakened. The film focuses on the gap between the generations - heavily influenced by 1960s youth rebellion.

Title: Bent
Description: On his release from a prison sentence for crimes of which he was innocent, a shamed former cop connects a murder case to a government conspiracy involving rogue agents from a top spy agency.

Title: The Last Movie Star
Description: An aging former movie star is forced to face the reality that his glory days are behind him. On its surface, the film is a tale about faded fame. At its core, it's a universal story about growing old.

Title: Haddi
Description: In this ZEE5 Original film, a transgender, Haddi moves to Delhi and joins a gang of transgenders and cross-dressers headed by an influential man. But is this move aspirational or driven by revenge?

Title: The Villain
Description: Facing hanging, a bank robber makes a deal with the corrupt banker to avoid execution in exchange for a dirty assignment.

Title: Croupier
Description: An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.

Title: Doctor Death
Description: After a skiing accident, Sarah's life is saved thanks to a brilliant surgeon, Dr. Vincent. But when Dr. Vincent mistakes Sara's gratitude for love, he becomes obsessed with her, determined to have her at any cost.

Title: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
Description: An American barroom pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a trip through the Mexican underworld to collect the bounty on the head of a dead gigolo.

Title: Stay as You Are
Description: Stuck in a dysfunctional marriage, a middle-aged architect has a chance encounter with an alluring student and they start an affair. He wants to be loved; she needs a meaningful relationship. However--could he be her missing father?

Title: Guardami
Description: Nina is a porn star with an independent setup,she is a mother and has a relationship with one of her colleagues Christiana. She doesn't need anything more but after a checkup she discovers that she has cancer and now nothing is same.

Title: Changing Lanes
Description: A young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident, and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.

Title: The Perfect Date
Description: To save up for college, Brooks Rattigan creates an app where anyone can pay him to play the perfect stand-in boyfriend for any occasion.

Title: Apex
Description: Six elite hunters pay to hunt down a man on a deserted island, only to find themselves becoming the prey.

Title: Cat People
Description: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

Title: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
Description: One year after the events of Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.

Title: Het Geheugenspel
Description: The body of Nathalie, who disappeared 25 years ago, is found on the Deridder family estate. The event reveals a long-hidden crime, and when secrets are brought forth, the present is overshadowed by the past.

Title: Solarbabies
Description: In a post-apocalyptic future ruled by the military, a group of renegade teenage orphans find a legendary orb, Bohdai, that can supposedly bring the rain back to dried up Earth.

Title: The Flying Deuces
Description: Ollie has fallen in love with the innkeeper's daughter in Paris. The only problem - she's very much in love with her husband. To forget her he joins the Foreign Legion with Stan. Bad idea.

Title: Monstrous
Description: Story centers on a traumatized woman fleeing from her abusive ex-husband with her 7-year-old son. In their new, remote sanctuary they find they have a bigger, more terrifying monster to deal with.

Title: Róise & Frank
Description: A widow who has given up on life becomes convinced that a stray dog is the reincarnation of her Hurling-loving husband.

Title: Ishtar
Description: Two terrible lounge singers get booked to play a gig in a Moroccan hotel but somehow become pawns in an international power play between the C.I.A., the Emir of Ishtar, and the rebels trying to overthrow his regime.

Title: Tall Girl 2
Description: After Jodi Kreyman gains popularity, her miscommunications start causing rifts with those around her and now she really needs to 'stand tall'.

Title: Radius
Description: A man wakes up with no memory of who he is, and finds that everyone who comes within a certain distance of him suddenly dies.

Title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
Description: Two young friends find a magic book that brings a ventriloquist's dummy to life.

Title: ARQ
Description: Trapped in a lab and stuck in a time loop, a disoriented couple fends off masked raiders while harboring a new energy source that could save humanity.

Title: The Wizard of Oz
Description: A take on the classic story written by L. Frank Baum.

Title: Delirium
Description: A former hooker runs a successful men's magazine. An obsessed admirer systematically slaughters her models (occasionally increasing the magazine's output) and supplies the mistress with pictures of their disfigured corpses taken in front of her semi-nude posters visible in the background. Will she be the psycho's next victim?

Title: Summer
Description: During his summer vacation, Martin meets two women that would let him explore his manhood - Adele, the politician's kept woman, and Nadine, the sexually-active Manila girl.

Title: Ask Filmi
Description: Tells the love story of a model and a director.

Title: The Big Boss
Description: A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.

Title: Theater of Blood
Description: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.

Title: City of the Living Dead
Description: A reporter and a psychic race to close the Gates of Hell after the suicide of a clergyman caused them to open, allowing the dead to rise from their graves.

Title: Main Atal Hoon
Description: This is a compelling biopic chronicling the extraordinary life and political journey of Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee, India's 10th Prime Minister. The film captures his multifaceted persona as a poet, a gentleman, and a statesman.

Title: Burnt Offerings
Description: A family moves into a large old mansion in the countryside which seems to have a mysterious and sinister power over its new residents.

Title: Savage Streets
Description: A teenage vigilante seeks revenge on a group of violent thugs who raped her handicapped sister and killed her best friend.

Title: Meek's Cutoff
Description: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

Title: The Lost Weekend
Description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

Title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
Description: A young boy named Harold embarks on a magical mission with the help of his purple crayon

Title: Arcadian
Description: A father and his twin teenage sons fight to survive in a remote farmhouse at the end of the end of the world.

Title: All I See Is You
Description: A blind woman's relationship with her husband changes when she regains her sight and discovers disturbing details about themselves.

Title: Santocielo
Description: A modern and comical take about the birth of a baby Jesus sibling. But this time set in Sicily

Title: The Sound of Christmas
Description: A woman facing eviction just before Christmas who must navigate budding romantic feelings for a handsome billionaire when she takes a job nannying for his two children right before Christmas.

Title: Keith
Description: Natalie, head of her curriculum activities in high school and riding on a tennis scholarship for college, gets Keith as her Chemistry lab partner. As Natalie can be uptight, Keith proves to be the opposite, even while hiding a secret.

Title: Invitation to a Gunfighter
Description: In New Mexico, a Confederate veteran returns home to find his fiancée married to a Union soldier, his Yankee neighbors rallied against him and his property sold by the local banker who then hires a gunman to kill him.

Title: Big Bad Mama
Description: Circumstances force a tough single mother and her two daughters into a life of crime and they quickly become outlaws on the run, picking up partners along the way, and traveling to different states, pursued by the law.

Title: Forever
Description: Mila and Kia, a pair of teenage best friends and aspiring football professionals. When the girls get a new demanding football coach Lollo, they slowly start to drift apart.

Title: Ten Little Indians
Description: Ten people are invited to go on an African safari, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?

Title: Below Zero
Description: On a lonely road, a prison transport is brutally assaulted. Martin, the policeman who was driving, survives and fortifies his position while the con men search for a way to finish him.

Title: Timeless Heroes: Indiana Jones and Harrison Ford
Description: Documentary exploring actor Harrison Ford's enduring appeal and his upbringing, including his foray into the entertainment business, his casting in the "Indiana Jones" franchise and the impact and inspiration generated by the films.

Title: Analyze That
Description: Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.

Title: I Saw the TV Glow
Description: Follows two teenage who bond over their shared love of a scary television show, but the show gets mysteriously cancelled.

Title: The Last Page
Description: After being raised--and abused--in the foster-care system, twin brothers find refuge with a group of misfits who turn out to be a violent band of criminals. Now on the the run for their lives, they find themselves in a small town in Utah where they meet a family who will change their lives forever by providing the spiritual guidance and love for which they have so desperately longed.

Title: Music of the Heart
Description: Story of a schoolteacher's struggle to teach violin to inner-city Harlem kids.

Title: The Case of the Bloody Iris
Description: Having recently escaped the clutches of a hippie sex cult, a beautiful model is pursued by a serial killer whose previous victims include former occupants of her new apartment.

Title: The Resident
Description: When a young doctor suspects she may not be alone in her new Brooklyn loft, she learns that her landlord has formed a frightening obsession with her.

Title: Bad Influence
Description: A soft and hesitant young man is in danger when he tries to break toxic relationships with a mysterious stranger claiming to be his friend.

Title: Soul Kitchen
Description: In Hamburg, German-Greek chef Zinos unknowingly disturbs the peace in his locals-only restaurant by hiring a more talented chef.

Title: The Killing of a Chinese Bookie
Description: A proud strip club owner is forced to come to terms with himself as a man when his gambling addiction gets him in hot water with the mob, who offer him only one alternative.

Title: Virus
Description: After outrunning a typhoon at sea, a strong-willed tugboat navigator and her crew discover a high-tech alien life form that's taken control of a Russian research vessel and aims to destroy on a massive scale.

Title: Maria Full of Grace
Description: A pregnant Colombian teenager becomes a drug mule to make some desperately-needed money for her family.

Title: The Nutcracker and the Magic Flute
Description: Follows Marie, as she makes a wish and becomes the same size as her toy nutcracker, who is really a prince under a spell, and they must travel to the magical Land of Flowers to save the world from the rat people.

Title: Teenagers
Description: The story of Lucas and how he helps others as an angel. This is an innovative, educational drama that resembles a documentary.

Title: Marfa Girl
Description: A story centered on a directionless 16-year-old living in Marfa, Texas and his relationships with his girlfriend, his neighbor, his teacher, a newly arrived local artist, and a local Border Patrol officer.

Title: Spartan
Description: The investigation into a kidnapping of the daughter of a high-ranking US government official.

Title: The Visitor
Description: A college professor travels to New York City to attend a conference and finds a young couple living in his apartment.

Title: Torso
Description: A string of appalling lust murders shocks the University of Perugia as a sadistic serial killer strangles to death beautiful college girls with a red and black scarf.

Title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
Description: Pele's meteoric rise from the slums of Sao Paulo to leading Brazil to its first World Cup victory at the age of 17 is chronicled in this biographical drama.

Title: Saboteur
Description: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the run to prove his innocence.

Title: Wuthering Heights
Description: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.

Title: Reasonable Doubt
Description: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime and charged with murder.

Title: The Inspection
Description: A young, gay Black man, rejected by his mother and with few options for his future, decides to join the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside.

Title: The Annunciation
Description: When Adam and Eve, having succumbed to Lucifer's temptation, are expelled from the Garden of Eden, Adam makes Lucifer keep his promise. Lucifer then grants Adam a dream of the world to come.

Title: Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan
Description: The eldest brother refuses to marry since he believes it may create disharmony in his big family. His brothers, who've already found partners, come together to find a match for him.

Title: Fire Island
Description: The perfect summer vacation quickly spirals out of control for a group of friends on the infamous, picturesque party getaway of Fire Island as they find themselves caught in a web of sex, lies and cold blooded murder.

Title: Nowhere Special
Description: When John, a thirty-five-year-old window cleaner, is given only a few months to live, he attempts to find a new, perfect family for his three-year-old son, determined to shield him from the terrible reality of the situation.

Title: In the Valley of Elah
Description: A retired military investigator works with a police detective to uncover the truth behind his son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.

Title: Dirty Mary Crazy Larry
Description: Down-on-their-luck racers Larry and Deke steal from a supermarket manager to buy a car that will help them advance their racing chances. Their escape does not go as planned when Larry's one-night stand, Mary, tags along for the ride.

Title: Pixote
Description: The life of a boy on the streets of Sao Paulo, involved with crimes, prostitution, and drugs.

Title: Sweet Sue
Description: A woman back on the dating scene embarks on a relationship with a mysterious biker at her brother's funeral, whose son turns out to be a social media influencer.

Title: The Long, Long Trailer
Description: Nicky and Tacy are going to be married. Nicky wants to save up money for a house, but Tacy dreams of starting off with their own home on wheels--a trailer.

Title: The In-Laws
Description: Right before his daughter's wedding, a mild-mannered foot doctor discovers that his future son-in-law's father is a free-wheeling international spy.

Title: The Man with Two Brains
Description: A brain surgeon marries a femme fatale, causing his life to turn upside down. Things go more awry when he falls in love with a talking brain.

Title: Animal Farm
Description: A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong when the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.

Title: Horizon Line
Description: A couple flying on a small plane to attend a tropical island wedding must fight for their lives after their pilot suffers a heart attack.

Title: Pretty Maids All in a Row
Description: California State Police Captain Sam Surcher investigates a string of teenage-girl murders at Oceanfront High School.

Title: The Fly II
Description: The almost-human son of "Brundlefly" searches for a cure to his mutated genes while being monitored by a nefarious corporation that wishes to continue his father's experiments.

Title: The Day of the Locust
Description: An art director in the 1930s falls in love and attempts to make a young woman an actress despite Hollywood who wants nothing to do with her because of her problems with an estranged man and her alcoholic father.

Title: Hatari!
Description: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.

Title: Watch Out, We're Mad
Description: After a tied first place in a local stunt race, two drivers start a contest to decide which of them will own the prize, a dune buggy. But when a mobster destroys the car, they are determined to get it back.

Title: Enter the Warriors Gate
Description: A teenager is magically transported to China and learns to convert his video game skills into those of a Kung Fu warrior.

Title: Formula 51
Description: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.

Title: Other People's Children
Description: A childless woman forms a deep bond with her boyfriend's young daughter.

Title: Aquaslash
Description: Thrills, chills and screwball comedy meet tiny bikinis and gory dismemberment in this chlorine and blood drenched murder mystery.

Title: Home Service
Description: A nursing student by day, massage therapist by night named Happy meets a client named Precious that leads her to the shady world of pornography.

Title: Nothing Underneath
Description: A park ranger from Wyoming, whose twin sister is a fashion model in Milan, Italy, strongly senses that his sister is in mortal danger. Once he arrives in Milan, he discovers that his sister has disappeared.

Title: The Love Punch
Description: A divorced couple scheme to recover the retirement money that was stolen from them.

Title: Teen Lust
Description: An awkward high school student strives to lose his virginity before his parents and their Satanic cult can sacrifice him to the devil.

Title: Air Doll
Description: A life-size blow-up doll develops a soul and falls in love with a video store clerk.

Title: Jean de Florette
Description: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.

Title: Emmanuelle
Description: Follows a woman and the series of erotic fantasies that she entertains.

Title: Asoka
Description: The epic tale of King Asoka's life is recounted.

Title: Santa Swap: Merry Christmas Mr. Andersen
Description: Alf Prøysen's classic tale tells the story of the Christmas-loving carpenter struggling to make his three children believe in Santa Claus. He swaps places with him on Christmas Eve to create a Christmas like no other.

Title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
Description: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

Title: Action Jackson
Description: Vengeance drives a tough Detroit cop to stay on the trail of a power-hungry auto magnate who is systematically eliminating his competition.

Title: Zoe
Description: A story about how synthetic humans can feel and even love and how the people they are involved with react to this concept.

Title: Alice
Description: A slave in the antebellum South escapes her secluded plantation only to discover a shocking reality that lies beyond the tree line.

Title: Angela's Christmas Wish
Description: A sequel to the much loved Angela's Christmas, Angela's Christmas Wish is a heart-warming tale of a determined little girl who sets out to reunite her family in time for Christmas.

Title: Boys of Summer
Description: In the summer of 1997, a local boy and his friends team up with a retired detective to confront a witch that has secretly moved to Martha's Vineyard. Together, they must work to overcome their fears and save the island.

Title: Zorba the Greek
Description: An uptight English writer travelling to Crete, on a matter of business, finds his life changed forever when he meets the gregarious Alexis Zorba.

Title: Wanted Man
Description: Follows a police officer who must retrieve an eyewitness and escort her after a cartel shooting leaves several DEA agents dead, but then he must decide who to trust when they discover that the attack was executed by American forces.

Title: Miss Meadows
Description: A proper elementary-school teacher moonlights as a vigilante.

Title: Fistful of Vengeance
Description: Kai Jin, a young Chinatown chef in present day San Francisco, becomes entangled with the Chinese Triad's pursuit of deadly ancient powers known as the "Wu Xing.

Title: Adam the First
Description: Adam, a 14-year-old boy travels across the country to meet a series of men who could be his father after finding a letter with a list of names and addresses.

Title: Teen Spirit
Description: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. She enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. A spin on the Cinderella story.

Title: Mercy Christmas
Description: When Michael Briskett meets the perfect woman, his ideal Christmas dream comes true when she invites him to her family's holiday celebration. Dreams shattered, Michael struggles to survive once he realizes HE will be Christmas dinner.

Title: The Hole
Description: A pair of brothers stumble upon a mysterious hole in their basement that leads to the darkest corridors of their fears and nightmares.

Title: Beautiful Thing
Description: Jamie is a shy teenager, often bullied at school. His neighbour Ste has a rough time at home, being beaten by his father and brother. This issues bring them together and they find that what they feel for each other is more than friendship.

Title: MR-9: Do or Die
Description: An elite Bangladeshi spy teams up with a CIA operative to bring down an international criminal organization headed by a ruthless businessman.

Title: Pressure
Description: A group of men are trapped in a small pod on the sea bed, after diving down to fix an oil pipeline and becoming separated from their ship.

Title: The Spirit of the Beehive
Description: In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie Frankenstein (1931), a sensitive seven year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.

Title: Student of the Year
Description: Several alumni reminisce about their final year at St. Theresa's College and the events that shaped their lives.

Title: Blithe Spirit
Description: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

Title: Under Suspicion
Description: Disgraced detective Tony fakes evidence in divorce cases, implicates wife in Stasio affair. Stasio and wife shot dead in hotel. Tony's ex-partner Frank investigates, suspects inheritance-seeking mistress Angeline and inconsistent Tony.

Title: Croc!
Description: Deep in the English countryside, Lisa and Charlie prepare for their wedding at a Tudor mansion. But an angry crocodile lies in wait, determined to ruin their big day.

Title: City of Ghosts
Description: A con man (Matt Dillon) travels to Cambodia (also on the run from law enforcement in the U.S.) to collect his share in an insurance scam, but discovers more than he bargained for.

Title: 49th Parallel
Description: A World War II U-boat crew are stranded in northern Canada. To avoid internment, they must make their way to the border and get into the still-neutral U.S.

Title: The Decoy Bride
Description: When the world's media descend on the remote Scottish island where a Hollywood actress is attempting to get married, a local girl is hired as a decoy bride to put the paparazzi off the scent.

Title: The Taste of Christmas
Description: Three separate groups navigate that most emotionally fraught of seasons Christmas.

Title: The Edge of the Blade
Description: Paris, 1887. Duels have been officially outlawed but are still regular practice. For many, they are the only way to defend their honor. Fencing master Clément Lacaze tries in vain to prevent his nephew from engaging in an uneven duel with the more experienced Colonel Berchère. Marie-Rose Astié de Valsayre, a feminist fighting for women's equality, tries to show that honor is not just a male affair. Actor and director Vincent Perez's historical film makes excellent use of various forms of duels - with épées, pistols, and sabres on horseback.

Title: She's Out of Control
Description: When an average-looking teenage girl gets a makeover, it's enough to make her father become overprotective of her.

Title: Moh
Description: A teenage boy Rabbi falls in love with an orchestra girl Gore who's living a tragic life while their relationship leads to various destruction for lifetime.

Title: Stagecoach
Description: On the stagecoach to Cheyenne, a mixed group of passengers must work together to survive the arduous journey and the Indian attacks.

Title: Torque
Description: A biker returns from Thailand to set things straight with his girlfriend. One gang leader wants him for delivery of 2 motorbikes filled with crystal meth and another gang leader wants him for murdering his brother.

Title: The Secret Scripture
Description: A woman keeps a diary of her extended stay at a mental hospital.

Title: The Quiet Earth
Description: A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world. In a desperate attempt to search for others, he finds only two who have their own agenda.

Title: Hopscotch
Description: Grounded with a desk job by incompetent superiors, a clever CIA agent retires and writes a tell all memoir that will embarrass his bosses, prompting him to go on the run and elude them.

Title: Breeder
Description: A ruthless businesswoman is abducting young women as part of a gruesome bio-hacking experiment to reverse the aging process. When Mia goes to investigate, she finds herself trapped, branded and tortured in an underground medical facility.

Title: Maleficent 3
Description: Plot under wraps. Sequel to "Maleficent" and "Maleficent: Mistress of Evil".

Title: A Man of Reason
Description: A gang of criminals rob and murder and want Su-hyuk on board after 10 years in jail, but Su-hyuk just wants to have a normal life with his old girlfriend and daughter.

Title: Twelve
Description: A young drug dealer watches as his high-rolling life is dismantled in the wake of his cousin's murder, which sees his best friend arrested for the crime.

Title: Legion of Super-Heroes
Description: Kara, devastated by the loss of Krypton, struggles to adjust to her new life on Earth. Superman mentors her. Meanwhile, she must contend with a mysterious group called the Dark Circle who searches for a powerful weapon held in the Academy's vault.

Title: Tamara Drewe
Description: A young newspaper writer returns to her hometown in the English countryside, where her childhood home is being prepped for sale.

Title: Double Team
Description: An international spy teams up with an arms dealer to escape from a penal colony and rescue his family from a terrorist.

Title: Tucker: The Man and His Dream
Description: The story of Preston Tucker, the maverick car designer and his ill-fated challenge to the auto industry with his revolutionary car concept.

Title: Horseplay
Description: A group of young men at a gathering in a luxury villa test each other's boundaries.

Title: America: The Motion Picture
Description: A chainsaw-wielding George Washington teams with beer-loving bro Sam Adams to take down the Brits in a tongue-in-cheek riff on the American Revolution.

Title: Mia and the White Lion
Description: Mia moves to South Africa with her family to manage a lion farm and develops a special bond with Charlie, a white lion cub; however, things change when she uncovers her father's secret.

Title: The War
Description: A Vietnam veteran helps his kids battle over a tree house while recovering from his traumatic war experience.

Title: Curly Top
Description: Wealthy Edward Morgan becomes charmed with a curly-haired orphan and her pretty older sister Mary and arranges to adopt both under the alias of "Mr. Jones." As he spends more time with them, he soon finds himself falling in love with Mary.

Title: One, Two, Three
Description: In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.

Title: In Love and Deep Water
Description: On a massive luxury cruise ship while at sea, the loyal butler Suguru, and a mysterious woman named Chizuru cross paths as they try to uncover a murder-mystery that occurs on the ship.

Title: The Medallion
Description: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

Title: Mohabbatein
Description: A film about the battle between love and fear, between two stubborn men and their opposing beliefs and the outcome of the love stories of 3 couples.

Title: Zulu
Description: Policemen Ali Sokhela and Brian Epkeen investigate the brutal murder of a young white woman, apparently provoked by the availability of a new illegal drug and somehow connected to the disappearance of black street children.

Title: Godfather
Description: After the death of a political leader, a mysterious man steps in to ascend the throne.

Title: The Dog Who Stopped the War
Description: During Christmas holidays, the children of a small village split themselves into two groups and begin preparing a week-long snowball war. The rivalry opens up tension among group members, especially leaders Luc and Sophie.

Title: Untitle Denzel Washington Project
Description: Based on the real warrior Hannibal, considered one of the greatest military commanders in history. The film covers the crucial battles he led against the Roman Republic during the Second Punic War.

Title: From Black
Description: A recovering drug addict, desperate for closure and saddled by crushing guilt after the disappearance of her young son, is presented with a bizarre offer to learn the truth about what happened and set things right - if she is willing to pay a terrifying price. How dark is she willing to go for a chance at redemption?

Title: Secret Society
Description: Celess and Tina play the game too well to be considered your average gold diggers.

Title: The Outlaw
Description: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are played against each other over the law and the attentions of vivacious country vixen Rio McDonald.

Title: Cyberbunker: The Criminal Underworld
Description: A group of hackers powered the darkest corners of the internet from a Cold War-era bunker in a quiet German tourist town.

Title: Blueback
Description: Follows Abby, a child who befriends a magnificent wild blue groper while diving. When Abby realizes that the fish is under threat, she takes inspiration from her activist Mum, Dora, and takes on poachers to save her friend.

Title: The Bridge at Remagen
Description: As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?

Title: French Exit
Description: An aging Manhattan socialite existing on the last of her inheritance moves to a small Paris apartment with her son and cat.

Title: The Duel
Description: A Texas Ranger investigates a series of unexplained deaths in a town called Helena.

Title: Us x Her
Description: A young couple's shaky marriage becomes more chaotic when an other woman comes into the picture. But what happens when the two women fall in love with each other?

Title: Gabriel's Inferno: Part One
Description: An intriguing exploration of seduction, forbidden love, and redemption, a captivating and passionate tale of one man's escape from his own personal hell as he tries to earn the impossible: forgiveness and love.

Title: Seconds
Description: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

Title: Sex and Breakfast
Description: Two young couples take a swing at handling their relationship problems through psychologist-prescribed partner-swapping.

Title: A Sunburnt Christmas
Description: On an outback farm ravaged by drought, the lives of a struggling family are upended when a runaway criminal dressed as Santa Claus crashes onto their property.

Title: Ganti-Ganti
Description: Four lives become intertwined because of one goal - to exact revenge. Things turn bloodier and more chaotic when they all realize who the real mastermind is.

Title: F.I.S.T.
Description: A rebellious Cleveland warehouse worker rises through the ranks of a trucking industry union to become union president but his organized crime links cause his eventual downfall.

Title: Breakheart Pass
Description: John Deakin is being transported, as a prisoner, on a train with supplies and medicine to Fort Humboldt, Nevada.

Title: Josee, the Tiger and the Fish
Description: Tsuneo is a university student and Josee is a young girl who has rarely gone out of the house by herself due to her being unable to walk. The two meet when Tsuneo finds Josee's grandmother taking her out for a evening walk.

Title: Salaam Venky
Description: Sujata, an ideal mother, who battled the most challenging situations one can ever face with a smile.

Title: Mayday
Description: Ana is transported to a dreamlike and dangerous land where she joins an army of girls engaged in a never-ending war. Though she finds strength in this exhilarating world, she realizes that she's not the killer they want her to be.

Title: Eros
Description: Three short films, one each from Directors Michelangelo Antonioni, Steven Soderbergh, and Wong Kar Wai, address the themes of love and sex.

Title: Deranged
Description: A deranged rural farmer becomes a grave robber and murderer after the death of his possessive mother, whose corpse he keeps, among others, as his companion in a decaying farmhouse.

Title: Lust Stories
Description: Four short films by four of India's biggest directors exploring love, sex and relationships in modern India.

Title: Christmas Mail
Description: In this holiday romantic comedy, a mysterious woman who works at the post office answering Santa's mail captures the heart of a disillusioned postal carrier

Title: The Brave and the Bold
Description: It centers on the father and son dynamics of Batman and Robin.

Title: Lost Illusions
Description: Lucien de Rubempré, a young, lower-class poet, leaves his family's printing house for Paris. Soon, he learns the dark side of the arts business as he tries to stay true to his dreams.

Title: A Home of Our Own
Description: An overwhelmed but persevering mother relocates her many children to a safe but extremely humble home that will hopefully eventually provide them with a better life

Title: Stranger Than Paradise
Description: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise-visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

Title: The Big Bus
Description: A nuclear powered bus driving cross-country, from New York City to Colorado, is destined for disaster due to the machinations of a mysterious group allied with the oil lobby.

Title: The Silence
Description: 13-year-old Sinikka vanishes on a hot summer night. Her bicycle is found in the exact place where a girl was killed 23 years ago. The dramatic present forces those involved in the original case to face their past.

Title: 7:20 Once a Week
Description: Two strangers have an intense casual encounter but later, both will realize that what has emerged is superior to pure physics, understanding that human relationships are more complex than a simple exchange of caresses.

Title: War on Everyone
Description: Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are.

Title: The Binge
Description: Set in a time where all drugs and alcohol are illegal, the only day anyone can participate in the "fun" is on Binge day.

Title: Ace in the Hole
Description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

Title: An Affair to Die For
Description: A secret rendezvous. A man cheats on his wife. A woman cheats on her husband. And then everything goes bad, quickly.

Title: The January Man
Description: Two years after being forced out of NYPD, quirky Nick is rehired by the mayor to catch a serial killer after the 11th murder of a woman.

Title: You're a Mean One, Mr. Grinch!
Description: The trauma of the grinch cost him to kill Christmas literally would you forgive him.

Title: Wake in Fright
Description: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

Title: Still Walking
Description: A family gathers together for a commemorative ritual whose nature only gradually becomes clear.

Title: The Wolf Man
Description: Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.

Title: The Indian Runner
Description: A Vietnam vet comes home to his small town and finds himself in conflict with rules that his brother has vowed to uphold.

Title: Slaughter High
Description: Eight people are invited to their alma mater for their 10-year reunion, where a fellow former student, disfigured from a prank gone wrong, is out to seek revenge.

Title: Black Sunday
Description: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant.

Title: The Other Me
Description: An architect is diagnosed with a rare eye disease, entering him into a surreal reality in which he sees people's true motives. As the visions become intolerable, he falls for a strange woman and confronts the truth about his own identity.

Title: The Greatest Lie Ever Sold: George Floyd and the Rise of BLM
Description: On the 2-year anniversary of George Floyd's death, Candace revisits Minneapolis and the violent, racially-divided aftermath that fueled BLM's global rise--and filled its coffers.

Title: The Replacement Killers
Description: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

Title: The Portrait of a Lady
Description: An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.

Title: The Opposite of Sex
Description: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

Title: Dersu Uzala
Description: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

Title: Tiger House
Description: Kelly sneaks into her boyfriend's house but tonight, she's not the only unwelcome visitor. As the situation spirals out of control, the suburban house becomes a terrifying arena for violence.

Title: Kingdom 3
Description: It follows Li Xin and Wang Qi as they stand on the battlefield for the first time to fight off an invasion by Zhao, and it also follows Ying Zheng's unknown past.

Title: Royalteen
Description: Follows prince Karl Johan and newcomer Lena, who have feelings for each other but are aware that their relationship might put them in an impossible situation, while he has to carry a nation on his shoulders, she carries lies on hers.

Title: Kolya
Description: A confirmed bachelor is in for the surprise of his life when a get-rich-quick scheme backfires and leaves him with a pint-sized new roommate.

Title: The Heiress
Description: A naive young woman falls for a handsome young man her emotionally abusive father suspects is only a fortune hunter.

Title: The Bye Bye Man
Description: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

Title: Outpost
Description: After a violent attack, a woman searches for strength in the solitude of a lookout job, but is overwhelmed by something darker.

Title: Playing by Heart
Description: Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in Los Angeles.

Title: The Baby-Sitters Club
Description: Seven junior-high-school girls organize a daycare camp for children while at the same time experiencing classic adolescent growing pains.

Title: Don't Knock Twice
Description: A mother desperate to reconnect with her troubled daughter becomes embroiled in the urban legend of a demonic witch.

Title: The Killer
Description: Ah Jong trying to make amends and pay for a cornea transplant to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer Jennie. He has to face several challenges in this endeavor but he is a man of principle and morals.

Title: The Protector
Description: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.

Title: The Ghost of Rashmon Hall
Description: A doctor is summoned to an old dark house to rid it of evil spirits.

Title: Eye See You
Description: A lead detective being stalked by a serial killer is asked to check into a clinic treating law enforcement officials who can't face their jobs.

Title: Kill Her Goats
Description: Audra's graduation gift is her dream house, but it soon becomes a living nightmare when some uninvited guests come to her homecoming party who aren't very subtle about the fact they don't approve of the home's new owner.

Title: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two
Description: The killer known as Holiday continues to stalk the Falcone crime family while a new class of costumed criminal rises in Gotham City. Batman suspects that a former ally might be the serial killer.

Title: The Feeling That the Time for Doing Something Has Passed
Description: A mosaic-style comedy following the life of a woman as time passes in her long-term casual BDSM relationship, low-level corporate job, and quarrelsome Jewish family.

Title: Cube²: Hypercube
Description: Eight strangers awaken with no memory, in a puzzling cube-shaped room where the laws of physics do not always apply.

Title: Goin' South
Description: Due to the lack of men after the Civil War, a small western town allows a bachelorette with ulterior motives to save a horse thief from the gallows by marrying him. They must deal with his old gang, the Sheriff, the bank, and each other.

Title: Siren
Description: A bachelor party becomes a savage fight for survival when the groomsmen unwittingly unleash a fabled predator upon the festivities.

Title: Miami Bici
Description: Miami Bici is the story of Ion and Ilie, two young people from a small dark city in Romania who go to Miami in the middle of winter, to live both the "American Dream" and the Romanian dream of "getting rich quick".

Title: Bronco Billy
Description: An idealistic, modern-day cowboy struggles to keep his Wild West show afloat in the face of hard luck and waning interest.

Title: Punch
Description: Jim is preparing for his first professional fight but begins to rethink his life's trajectory and his sexuality after tangling with Whetu, a gay Maori boy who spends his days in an old shack down by the beach.

Title: Alice
Description: A surrealistic revision of Alice in Wonderland.

Title: Strul
Description: A chemistry teacher is framed for making drugs. In prison he discovers a passage out. A gang forces him to reveal it and join them in their crimes outside, returning each time. He meets a cutie that turns out to be a cop.

Title: The Tigger Movie
Description: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.

Title: Tart
Description: A portrait of the increasingly desperate attempts of a teenage Manhattan girl to find love and kinship, in a world that never reciprocates.

Title: The Grass Is Greener
Description: Victor and Hilary have guided tours in their English mansion. A US oil tycoon "bumps" into Hilary during a tour and charms his way into her heart. Meanwhile, Hattie pursues Victor.

Title: Proof of Life
Description: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

Title: The Birth of a Nation
Description: Nat Turner, a literate slave and preacher in the antebellum South, orchestrates an uprising.

Title: Camp Pleasant Lake
Description: An enterprising couple, the Rutherfords, decide to open a horror camp on an abandoned camp property (Camp Pleasant Lake) where a young girl named Echo Meadows was kidnapped and her parents were brutally murdered 20 years prior.

Title: The Family Fang
Description: A brother and sister return to their family home in search of their world famous parents who have disappeared.

Title: The Burial of Kojo
Description: A man is trapped in a mine shaft by his vengeful brother while his daughter embarks on a magical journey to rescue him.

Title: We're No Angels
Description: Two escaped cons only prayer to escape is to pass themselves off as priests and pass by the police blockade at the border into the safety of Canada.

Title: Dominion
Description: Dominion uses drones, hidden and handheld cameras to expose the dark underbelly of modern animal agriculture, questioning the morality and validity of humankind's dominion over the animal kingdom.

Title: It Remains
Description: A group of people on an island experience strange events as the darkness sets in.

Title: Wasp Network
Description: The story of five Cuban political prisoners who had been imprisoned by the United States since the late 1990s on charges of espionage and murder.

Title: Inferno
Description: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.

Title: The Last Exorcism
Description: A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.

Title: Miracle on Christmas
Description: The holiday spirit seems distant for the Boyce family until an unexpected visitor and miracle change everything on Christmas Day.

Title: Falling
Description: John Peterson lives with his partner Eric and their adopted daughter in Southern California. When he is visited by his aging father who is searching for a place to retire, their two very different worlds collide.

Title: The Coldest Game
Description: During 1962's Cuban missile crisis, a troubled math genius finds himself drafted to play in a U.S.-Soviet chess match -- and a deadly game of espionage.

Title: Fort Apache
Description: At Fort Apache, an honorable and veteran war captain finds conflict when his regime is placed under the command of a young, glory hungry lieutenant colonel with no respect for the local Indian tribe.

Title: The Throwaways
Description: Given a choice between assisting the CIA or life in prison, a notorious hacker agrees to help the government and recruits a team of misfits to assist.

Title: Once Upon a Forest
Description: A young mouse, mole and hedgehog risk their lives to find a cure for their badger friend, who's been poisoned by men.

Title: Duck Duck Goose
Description: A bachelor goose must form a bond with two lost ducklings as they journey south.

Title: The Windigo
Description: A Native American teen resurrects an ancient demon to protect his family from meth dealers, but finds the creature's bloodlust uncontrollable, forcing the family to break the curse before becoming its next victims.

Title: It Ain't Over
Description: The illustrious life and career of the baseball great, Yogi Berra.

Title: Children's Island
Description: Reine is supposed to go to a summer camp called Children's Island but decides to remain in Stockholm over the summer while his mother is working at a hospital. She thinks he is at the camp, and he tells her he is. We then follow him around Stockholm that summer and see what he encounters on the path of life.

Title: Alice, Sweet Alice
Description: In 1961, a divorced Catholic couple's life is turned upside-down when one of their two adolescent daughters is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her First Holy Communion and a series of subsequent stabbings.

Title: Love Affair
Description: Two people meet on a flight to Sydney. Although both are engaged to others, they fall in love during their evacuation after a forced landing, and agree to meet in New York City three months later if the attraction lasts.

Title: Loveless
Description: A couple going through a divorce must team up to find their son who has disappeared during one of their bitter arguments.

Title: Hoffa
Description: The story of the notorious American labor union figure Jimmy Hoffa, who organizes a bitter strike, makes deals with members of the organized crime syndicate and mysteriously disappears in 1975.

Title: Julia
Description: At the behest of an old and dear friend, playwright Lillian Hellman undertakes a dangerous mission to smuggle funds into Nazi Germany.

Title: Small Apartments
Description: A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.

Title: The Velvet Queen
Description: Two men explore the high-altitude wilderness of Tibet with many cameras, filming wildlife from a respectful distance and searching for the rare snow leopard.

Title: The Exterminating Angel
Description: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

Title: The Last Vermeer
Description: An artist is suspected of selling a valuable painting to the Nazis, but there is more to the story than meets the eye.

Title: A Star Is Born
