Description: An awkward college student who seizes the opportunity to bolster her popularity and her under-the-radar true-crime podcast by solving the disappearance of a classmate.

Title: Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah
Description: Time travelers use Godzilla in their scheme to destroy Japan to prevent the country's future economic reign.

Title: Long Story Short
Description: Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he's jumping forward to the next year of his life.

Title: Planet 51
Description: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

Title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie
Description: When Roo sets off on his own into the Hundred Acre Wood, he discovers a friendly and playful Heffalump named Lumpy.

Title: The Serpent and the Rainbow
Description: An anthropologist goes to Haiti after hearing rumors about a drug used by black magic practitioners to turn people into zombies.

Title: Five Times Two
Description: Five stages in the romance between a woman and a man.

Title: Three Monkeys
Description: A family suffers from a major communication breakdown during their struggle to get through their hardships.

Title: Little Manhattan
Description: A 10-year-old boy and an 11-year-old girl find love in New York City.

Title: BMX Bandits
Description: A trio of teen BMX enthusiasts become entangled with a group of bank robbers after discovering their cache of walkie-talkies.

Title: Attack on Titan: Part 2
Description: A young boy name Eren Jaeger has to use his gift to know about the mystery of the Titans.

Title: The Heist of the Century
Description: In 2006, a group of thieves performed what is considered one of the most famous and smart bank heists in the history of Argentina when they rob the Banco Río branch in Acassuso.

Title: Max Manus: Man of War
Description: The true story about one of the most brilliant saboteurs during World War II and his battle to overcome his inner demons.

Title: Ben
Description: A lonely boy befriends Ben, the leader of a violent pack of killer rats.

Title: Rampart
Description: Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

Title: My Son Hunter
Description: Fictional retelling of the lifestyle and scandals of Hunter Biden, son of US President Joe Biden.

Title: Shining Through
Description: An American woman of Irish and Jewish-German parentage goes undercover in Nazi Germany.

Title: Pamela: A Love Story
Description: Follows the life of pop culture icon Pamela Anderson, including never-before-seen archival footage and personal journals.

Title: The People's Joker
Description: An aspiring clown grappling with her gender identity combats a fascistic caped crusader.

Title: Parasyte: Part 1
Description: The humanity is suffering from murders all over the globe, called "Mincemeat murders". High school student, Izumi Shinichi has a parasite living off him, having replaced his right hand, and he might be the discoverer of truth.

Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Description: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a horribly disfigured composer, who has plans for those who oppose him or the young singer.

Title: Downhill Racer
Description: Quietly cocky Robert Redford joins U.S. ski team as downhill racer and clashes with the team's coach, played by Gene Hackman. Lots of good skiing action leading to an exciting climax.

Title: Blood Meridian
Description: Texas-Mexico border in the mid-19th century: Kid, a sixteen-year-old Tennessean who stumbles into the nightmarish world where aboriginal Americans are being murdered and the market for their scalps is thriving.

Title: Fancy Dance
Description: Following her sister's disappearance, a Native American hustler kidnaps her niece from the child's white grandparents and sets out for the state powwow in hopes of keeping what is left of their family intact.

Title: Chappaquiddick
Description: Depicting Ted Kennedy's involvement in the fatal 1969 car accident that claims the life of a young campaign strategist, Mary Jo Kopechne.

Title: Monsters of California
Description: Teenager Dallas Edwards, and his derelict friends on a quest for the meaning behind a series of mysterious, paranormal events in Southern California.

Title: Jane Got a Gun
Description: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

Title: The Touchstone
Description: THE TOUCHSTONE is a teen comedy about a student on a high school field trip who uncovers a relic that makes whoever has it irresistible to virgins, and the disastrous consequences that occur when he and his friends try to use it to get the girls of their dreams.

Title: New York Stories
Description: A middle-aged artist obsessed with his pretty young assistant, a precocious 12-year-old living in a hotel, and a neurotic lawyer with a possessive mother make up three Gotham tales.

Title: Orca
Description: A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.

Title: The Exterminating Angels
Description: A filmmaker holds a series of boundary-pushing auditions for his project about female pleasure.

Title: A Prairie Home Companion
Description: A look at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.

Title: More American Graffiti
Description: Told in four different New Year's Eves in the mid 1960s, John, Terry, Debbie, Steve and Laurie deal with adulthood, the Vietnam war, peace rallies, and relationships.

Title: For Love or Money
Description: Doug's a concierge at a luxury hotel on Manhattan. He saves all his tips towards his plan for a hotel. A potential investor seduces the girl, Doug loves, with false promises of leaving his wife. Doug's dilemma: hotel project or girl?

Title: Supercop
Description: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

Title: Gridlock'd
Description: Two friends try to kick their drug addiction after a friend dies from an overdose, when they try to enroll in a detox program, things quickly go wrong.

Title: Jigen Daisuke
Description: The legendary gunman Daisuke Jigen comes to Japan to have his pistol examined.

Title: Double Threat
Description: Pretty girl with great assets skims money from the mob. The crime boss' son takes it personally and seeks to settle the score. Meanwhile a man on a quest to scatter his brother's ashes becomes entangled in this tawdry affair.

Title: Death Wish 4: The Crackdown
Description: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.

Title: Hope and Glory
Description: Bill, a young boy living on the outskirts of London experiences the exhilaration of World War II. During this period, Bill learns about sex, death, love, hypocrisy, and the faults of adults as he prowls the ruins of bombed houses.

Title: The Seven Kittens
Description: Noronha is a low middle-class civil servant who lives with his frustrated wife Gorda and their four elder daughters. The fifth and youngest one, virginal Silene, is unexpectedly sent back home. Noronha discovers she has been expelled from boarding school for having killed a female cat and her seven newborns in a hysterical fit. Many dark family secrets will emerge from that episode leading to tragic events.

Title: The Loveless
Description: Trouble ensues when a motorcycle gang stops in a small southern town while heading to the races at Daytona.

Title: Fire Down Below
Description: A federal agent uncovers lucrative toxic waste dumps in Appalachia and must deal with the locals who want to keep their 'gold mine' secret.

Title: The Rose
Description: The tragic life of a self-destructive female rock star who struggles to deal with the constant pressures of her career and the demands of her ruthless business manager.

Title: The Trench
Description: June 1916. The British Army is planning a big offensive in the Somme region in France. We follow a platoon of British soldiers as they sit in a forward trench, anxiously awaiting the order to go over the top.

Title: Nothing But the Truth
Description: In Washington, D.C., a reporter faces a possible jail sentence for outing a CIA agent and refusing to reveal her source.

Title: You're Not You
Description: A drama centered on a classical pianist who has been diagnosed with ALS and the brash college student who becomes her caregiver.

Title: Russian Ark
Description: A 19th century French aristocrat, notorious for his scathing memoirs about life in Russia, travels through the Russian State Hermitage Museum and encounters historical figures from the last 200+ years.

Title: Sultan
Description: Sultan is a classic underdog tale about a wrestler's journey, looking for a comeback by defeating all odds.

Title: Whore
Description: A night in the life of a cynical prostitute forms the basis of Ken Russell's portrait of the world's oldest profession.

Title: Encounter
Description: Two brothers embark on a journey with their father, who is trying to protect them from an alien threat.

Title: Blackway
Description: An ex-logger comes to the aid of a woman who returns to her hometown in the Pacific Northwest and finds herself harassed and stalked by a former cop turned crime lord.

Title: Kwaidan
Description: A collection of four Japanese folk tales with supernatural themes.

Title: Gotcha!
Description: Jonathan plays Gotcha with fellow college students, testing ability as assassin or mark, using paintball guns on campus. He flies to Paris on vacation and, with a woman taking his virginity, on to Berlin, where the game/ammo gets real.

Title: Erotic
Description: Angèle and Adam form a young ideal couple. A few years pass. One evening, they meet again. Strangers to each other, can their love come back to life ?

Title: Lucky Bastard
Description: A fan is invited to take part in a porn video with his favourite porn star. He is romantically rejected, and goes on a killing spree on location.

Title: Govinda Naam Mera
Description: The very charming Govinda Waghmare juggles his time and love between his wife Mrs. Waghmare and his girlfriend in this dose of chaos, confusion, and laughter.

Title: The Ledge
Description: A police officer looks to talk down a young man lured by his lover's husband to the ledge of a high rise, where he has one hour to contemplate a fateful decision.

Title: Julieta
Description: After a casual encounter, a brokenhearted woman decides to confront her life and the most important events involving her estranged daughter.

Title: Sobreviviendo Mis XV
Description: Turning 15 is magical except when your family wants to put you in a ridiculous dress and make you dance the waltz in front of everyone. Danae will have to organize a traditional yet cool quinceañera that also pleases her grandmother.

Title: We're All Going to the World's Fair
Description: Alone in her attic bedroom, teenager Casey becomes immersed in an online role-playing horror game, wherein she begins to document the changes that may or may not be happening to her.

Title: Vengeance: A Love Story
Description: One vigilante policeman comes to the aid of a single mother seeking to bring her rapists to justice.

Title: Secrets
Description: A dark tale of sexual experimentation and perversion when a young couple escape to a beach house in order to sort out their relationship, but find themselves entangled in a trap set by a seductive stranger.

Title: Pure Country
Description: Dusty gets tired of all the smoke and light effects, wonders what happened to doing it the way that made him famous and happy. Takes a walk to find what seems to be missing and finds himself and his music again!

Title: Santa Claws
Description: A B-horror movie actress is stalked by a deranged fan bent on claiming her for himself.

Title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday
Description: The Accident Man, is back and this time he must beat the top assassins in the world, to protect the ungrateful son of a mafia boss, save the life of his only friend and rekindle his relationship with his maniacal father figure.

Title: Future '38
Description: A 1938 screwball comedy set in the far future year of 2018.

Title: Once Upon a Crime
Description: While at the royal ball with Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood finds herself in the middle of a mystery. Can she solve the case before midnight strikes?

Title: Little Richard: I Am Everything
Description: The life and career of Little Richard, the one-of-a-kind rock 'n' roll icon who shaped the world of music.

Title: The Big Bounce
Description: A small-time con artist and a Hawaiian real estate developer's mischevious, enterprising mistress team up for a potential $200,000 score.

Title: God's Pocket
Description: A blue collar worker tries to cover things up when his stepson is killed in a suspicious accident, but a local reporter senses that something's amiss.

Title: Fierce Creatures
Description: Zookeepers struggle to deal with the policies of changing directors.

Title: Love Scenes
Description: Acclaimed actress surprisingly accepts the lead role in a controversial erotic film directed by her self-centered husband. They fight and she, taken in by the role and crew's constant flirting, cheats on him. Will their marriage survive?

Title: For a Handful of Kisses
Description: A girl. A boy. A love story. But also about dreams, fears, life, true love, friendship and how we deal with it. And a secret between them...

Title: Brassed Off
Description: The coal mine in a northern English village may be closing, which would also mean the end of the miners' brass band.

Title: ...All the Marbles
Description: Small timer female wrestling team "The California Dolls" and their manager must face the hardship of their sport and life to suceed.

Title: Tea With the Dames
Description: Dames Judi Dench, Eileen Atkins, Joan Plowright, and Maggie Smith get together for tea to reminisce and discuss their acting careers.

Title: Sanctum
Description: An underwater cave diving team experiences a life-threatening crisis during an expedition to the unexplored and least accessible cave system in the world.

Title: Hector and the Search for Happiness
Description: A psychiatrist searches the globe to find the secret of happiness.

Title: Foxes
Description: A group of four teenage girls come of age in the asphalt desert of Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley arranged with a blazing soundtrack and endless drinking, drugs and sex.

Title: A Long Way Down
Description: Four people meet on New Year's Eve, and form a surrogate family to help one another with the difficulties of their lives.

Title: The Spanish Prisoner
Description: An employee who develops a lucrative secret process for his corporation is tempted to betray the company when higher ups attempt to take the process from him. Dastardly intrigue ensues.

Title: Mothra vs. Godzilla
Description: Mothra's egg washes ashore and is claimed by greedy entrepreneurs who refuse to return it to her fairies. As Godzilla arises near Nagoya, the people of Infant Island must decide if they are willing to answer Japan's own pleas for help.

Title: Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna
Description: Dev, a former football player is married to Rhea, a successful fashion editor. Maya is a kindergarten teacher who is married to Rishi, an outgoing event planner. These couples' lives intersect and they each question their own marriage.

Title: Mirai
Description: A young boy encounters a magical garden which enables him to travel through time and meet his relatives from different eras, with guidance by his younger sister from the future.

Title: Red Dot
Description: When Nadja becomes pregnant, she and David make an attempt to rekindle their relationship by traveling to the north of Sweden for a hiking trip, but soon their romantic trip turns into a nightmare.

Title: 5 to 7
Description: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.

Title: Shimmer Lake
Description: An inventive crime thriller told backwards reversing day by day through a week following a local sheriff's quest to unlock the mystery of three small-town criminals and a bank heist gone wrong.

Title: Creature
Description: After a member of a geological research team who was sent to Saturn's largest moon: Titan crashes their spacecraft into a space station, another team is sent to Titan to investigate, not knowing the terror that awaits them.

Title: Wrath of Dracula
Description: Mina Harker embarks on a mission to rescue her husband Jonathan from Castle Dracula, assisted by the mysterious Professor Van Helsing.

Title: Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain
Description: A documentary about Anthony Bourdain and his career as a chef, writer and host, revered and renowned for his authentic approach to food, culture and travel.

Title: The Blue Bird
Description: Mytyl and her brother Tyltyl, a woodchopper's children, are led by the Fairy Berylune on a magical trip through the past, present, and future to locate the Blue Bird of Happiness.

Title: Tunnel
Description: A man is on his way home when the poorly constructed tunnel he is driving through collapses, leaving him trapped.

Title: I Am Not a Serial Killer
Description: In a small Midwestern town, a troubled teen with homicidal tendencies must hunt down and destroy a supernatural killer while keeping his own inner demons at bay.

Title: Alanis
Description: A young Buenos Aires mother finds employment as a sex worker and struggles to live under the same laws that are supposed to protect her.

Title: Only You
Description: Elena and Jake meet by chance on New Years Eve, arguing for the same taxi. However, instead of going their separate ways after sharing a taxi, they initiate a determined relationship.

Title: Still Time
Description: In this time-jumping dramedy, a workaholic who's always in a rush now wants life to slow down when he finds himself leaping ahead a year every few hours.

Title: The Summit of the Gods
Description: A photojournalist's obsessive quest for the truth about the first expedition to Mt. Everest leads him to search for an esteemed climber who went missing.

Title: Lust for a Vampire
Description: In 1830, forty years to the day since the last manifestation of their dreaded vampirism, the Karnstein heirs use the blood of an innocent to bring forth the evil that is the beautiful Mircalla - or as she was in 1710, Carmilla.

Title: La Navidad en sus manos
Description: Follows what would happen if Santa Claus could not go to his Christmas Eve appointment with all the kids around the world.

Title: Europa
Description: Just after W.W.II, an American takes a railway job in Germany, but finds his position politically sensitive with various people trying to use him.

Title: The World of Apu
Description: This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy follows Apu's life as an orphaned adult aspiring to be a writer.

Title: Palmetto
Description: A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.

Title: The Death and Return of Superman
Description: After the death of Superman, several new people present themselves as possible successors.

Title: The Nun's Story
Description: After leaving a wealthy Belgian family to become a nun, Sister Luke struggles with her devotion to her vows during crisis, disappointment, and World War II.

Title: Caravaggio
Description: A retelling of the life of the celebrated 17th-century painter through his brilliant, nearly blasphemous paintings and his flirtations with the underworld.

Title: When Hitler Stole Pink Rabbit
Description: A Jewish family in Berlin family must flee the Nazis. First, they go to Zürich. From there they go to Paris, and finally to London.

Title: The Most Dangerous Game
Description: A father and son are shipwrecked on a remote island where they are caught up in a trophy hunt held by its mysterious owner, a merciless man who uses the land as an elite hunting preserve for stalking the most dangerous game of all: human.

Title: Her: Chapter 1
Description: Archana ,a uniformed police officer returns to duty after a six month suspension to solve a high-stakes case.

Title: How I Live Now
Description: An American girl, sent to the English countryside to stay with relatives, finds love and purpose while fighting for her survival as war envelops the world around her.

Title: Sicko
Description: A documentary comparing the highly profitable American health care industry to other nations, and HMO horror stories including shotgun deaths.

Title: Fanaa
Description: A sweet blind girl Zooni meets a flirty Rehan. She ignores her friends' warnings. It's her time to discover life. Is she making the right love choice?

Title: One Way
Description: Freddy, a petty criminal, is on the run with a bag full of cash and coke. He's way over his head and hurt bad. With a bullet in his guts he's running out of time.

Title: Days of Wine and Roses
Description: An alcoholic marries a young woman and systematically addicts her to booze so that they can share his "passion" together.

Title: Captain Blood
Description: After treating a Monmouth rebel against King James II in 1680s England, a young Irish doctor is exiled as a slave to Jamaica where he captures a Spanish galleon and becomes the most feared pirate of the Caribbean.

Title: The Gathering
Description: Amnesiac Cassie Grant has a premonition that someone or something wants the family that's helping her recover dead. She investigates the secrets of the town they live in and uncovers darkness, both human and supernatural.

Title: Nude Nuns with Big Guns
Description: A left-for-dead nun forced into prostitution embarks on a deadly revenge mission to do the Lord's work, punishing sinners in a strictly personal vigilante Holy War.

Title: Gods and Monsters
Description: The last days of Frankenstein (1931) director James Whale are explored.

Title: Just Visiting
Description: A French count is in England to marry the princess. She's killed. A wizard helps him time travel back before the murder - but ends up in Chicago, April 2000. A descendant helps him. Can he return to the 1100s?

Title: Ip Man 3
Description: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over a local school, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

Title: Blue Chips
Description: A college basketball coach is forced to break the rules in order to get the players he needs to stay competitive.

Title: The Magnificent Ambersons
Description: The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

Title: Save Yourselves!
Description: A young Brooklyn couple head to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.

Title: The Man I Love
Description: A homesick, no-nonsense lounge singer decides to leave New York City to spend some time visiting her two sisters and brother on the West Coast. Eventually she falls in love with a down-and-out ex-jazz pianist.

Title: The Wolf Man
Description: About a man and his family who have been scared to death by a deadly predator

Title: Rememory
Description: Gordon invents the Rememory machine that allows him to see memories as they actually were. He dies in his office. Is it murder? Sam investigates by using the machine "borrowed" from Gordon's wife. He looks at memories of others involvement .

Title: Salvador
Description: A burnt-out photojournalist becomes involved in a Central American revolution.

Title: Free the Nipple
Description: A group of women launch a movement to remove the censor of women's breasts all over America.

Title: Pay the Ghost
Description: A professor frantically searches for his son who was abducted during a Halloween carnival.

Title: Deep Sea
Description: A girl strays into the dreamy deep sea world. In the deepest part of the sea, all secrets are hidden.

Title: The Harmonists
Description: The film chronicles the rise and fall of Germany's most famous a capella group, the Comedian Harmonists, in 1930s Germany.

Title: Sin Nombre
Description: A young Honduran girl and a Mexican gangster are united in a journey across the U.S. border.

Title: A Man Apart
Description: A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.

Title: They Live by Night
Description: An escaped convict injured during a robbery falls in love with the woman who nurses him back to health, but their relationship seems doomed from the beginning.

Title: Merry Mystery Christmas
Description: A rising star reporter must uncover the identity of a local late-night bandit who has been stealing beautiful home Christmas displays across the city.

Title: Carry on Screaming!
Description: The sinister Dr Watt has an evil scheme going. He's kidnapping beautiful young women and turning them into mannequins to sell to local stores.

Title: Wonder Man
Description: After being murdered by gangsters, an exuberant nightclub entertainer returns as a ghost to persuade his meek twin brother to help bring his killers to justice.

Title: Ultramarines: A Warhammer 40,000 Movie
Description: A squad of Ultramarines answer a distress call from an Imperial Shrine World. A full Company of Imperial Fists was stationed there, but there is no answer from them. The squad investigates to find out what has happened there.

Title: Modern Problems
Description: Jealous, harried air traffic controller Max Fiedler, recently dumped by his girlfriend, comes into contact with nuclear waste and is granted the power of telekinesis, which he uses not only to win her back, but to gain a little revenge.

Title: Deadly Virtues: Love.Honour.Obey.
Description: A stranger breaks into the house of a couple, ties up the husband and, having a whole weekend at his hand, plays a slow game with the woman, a game of threats, fear, obedience - and intimacy.

Title: M.F.A.
Description: An art student taps into a rich source of creative inspiration after the accidental slaughter of her rapist. An unlikely vigilante emerges, set out to avenge college girls whose attackers walked free.

Title: Moving Violations
Description: The goofy students of a remedial drivers education class find themselves butting heads with their abusive police instructors.
Alienated film-maker hopeful Pat Johnson's epic story of growing up in rural Illinois, falling in love and becoming the first fan of the movie that changed everything.

Title: Fearless
Description: A man's personality is dramatically changed after surviving a major airline crash.

Title: Super Size Me
Description: While examining the influence of the fast food industry, Morgan Spurlock personally explores the consequences on his health of a diet of solely McDonald's food for one month.

Title: Forget Paris
Description: Mickey, an NBA referee, meets Ellen, an American airline official, in Paris. It develops into a relationship of ups and downs.

Title: Our Little Sister
Description: A story that revolves around three sisters who live in their grandmother's home and the arrival of their thirteen-year-old half sister.

Title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
Description: In Missouri, during the 1840s, young Huck Finn fearful of his drunkard father and yearning for adventure, leaves his foster family and joins with runaway slave Jim in a voyage down the Mississippi River toward slavery free states.

Title: CBI 5: The Brain
Description: A series of murders is happening in the city. With the police failing to solve the case, a team of CBI Officers under CBI officer Sethurama Iyer take up the investigation to resolve the mystery.

Title: Wild Bill
Description: The early career of legendary lawman Wild Bill Hickock is telescoped and culminates in his relocation in Deadwood and a reunion with Calamity Jane.

Title: Article 15
Description: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

Title: Amazing Grace
Description: The idealist William Wilberforce maneuvers his way through Parliament, endeavoring to end the British transatlantic slave trade.

Title: Sri Asih
Description: Alana was separated from her parents and was adopted by a rich woman. As she reaches adulthood, she discovers the truth about her origin.

Title: Blood Creek
Description: A man and his brother on a mission of revenge become trapped in a harrowing occult experiment dating back to the Third Reich.

Title: Accidental Love
Description: A small town waitress gets a nail accidentally lodged in her head causing unpredictable behavior that leads her to Washington, D.C., where sparks fly when she meets a clueless young senator who takes up her cause - but what happens when love interferes with what you stand for?

Title: Their Finest
Description: A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.

Title: The Curse of Bridge Hollow
Description: A teenage girl, who accidentally releases an ancient and mischievous spirit on Halloween which causes decorations to come alive and wreak havoc, must team up with the last person she'd want to in order to save their town - her father!

Title: Colors of Love
Description: When librarian Taylor Harris suddenly loses her job, she visits her brother's small town in Montana, where she gets involved in helping save her brother's small-town hotel from tycoon, Joel Sheenan, who wants to renovate it.

Title: Night Watch
Description: A fantasy-thriller set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.

Title: Echo in the Canyon
Description: A look at the roots of the historic music scene in L.A.'s Laurel Canyon featuring the music of iconic groups such as The Byrds, The Beach Boys, Buffalo Springfield, and The Mamas and the Papas.

Title: Euphoria
Description: Sisters in conflict travelling through Europe toward a mystery destination.

Title: Parachute
Description: Follows Riley, who has recently been released from rehab after struggling with her addictions to food and body image. She will meet Ethan and finds herself navigating the line between love and a new addiction.

Title: Stalingrad
Description: A group of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.

Title: The Threesome
Description: A young man's perennial crush leads him into an unexpected threesome, he thinks it's his ultimate fantasy come true. When the fantasy ends, all three are left with sobering real-world consequences, to take responsibility for their actions.

Title: No Good Deed
Description: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.

Title: A Countess from Hong Kong
Description: In Hong Kong, an ambassador returning to America meets a Russian countess, a refugee without a passport, who decides to hide in his cabin.

Title: How to Succeed at Losing
Description: Upon being released from prison, the always-positive Miguel returns home to help his friends' soccer team find their winning spirit.

Title: Thanks for Sharing
Description: A romantic comedy that brings together three disparate characters who are learning to face a challenging and often confusing world as they struggle together against a common demon: sex addiction.

Title: And So It Goes
Description: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

Title: Malang
Description: Advait visits Goa where he meets Sara, a free-spirited girl who lives life unshackled. Opposites attract and all goes well until life turns upside down. Years later, Advait is on a killing spree with cops Aghase and Michael in his way.

Title: Christmas in the Wilds
Description: Buck and Jessica's merry little Christmas together takes a dangerous turn when their journey through the wild turns into a battle for survival.

Title: Dirty Love
Description: A jilted photographer goes on a mission to get back at her philandering model boyfriend and along the way discovers that not all love is created equal.

Title: Family Plot
Description: A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/actor boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

Title: Dada
Description: A couple in love, accidentally become teenage parents. Unpleasant situations make them fall apart. Manikandan, left alone with his son, struggles as a single teenage father. Fate owns him, bringing Sindhu back into his life.

Title: The Yellow Sea
Description: When the attempt to kill a professor goes wrong, a series of violent events are triggered which force a taxi driver to run for his life.

Title: Megan
Description: A hiker finds shelter in a mountain lodge inhabited by two strange women.

Title: Simple Minds: Everything Is Possible
Description: The inspirational story of how a group of working-class kids growing up in post-industrial Glasgow dared to dream. Those kids became Simple Minds, the most iconic and influential Scottish band in history.

Title: Mother Mary
Description: Follows the relationship between a fictional musician and a famous fashion designer.

Title: For Pete's Sake
Description: A housewife tries to finance her cab-driving husband's education.

Title: Lunana: A Yak in the Classroom
Description: An aspiring singer living with his grandmother in the capital of Bhutan dreams of getting a visa to move to Australia.

Title: Ladies in Black
Description: The lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

Title: Outside In
Description: An ex-con struggling to readjust to life in his small town forms an intense bond with his former high school teacher.

Title: Apartment 407
Description: Based on a true story. Isobel goes for a job interview, gets locked in and sex trafficked for 3 consecutive days.

Title: Proof
Description: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician, recently deceased, tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students, who wants to search through his papers, and her estranged sister, who shows up to help settle his affairs.

Title: The Dallas Connection
Description: Scientists in charge of a sophisticated, state-of-the-art, military satellite are being assassinated. It's up to a team of federal agents to protect the last surviving scientist able to activate the satellite.

Title: Love Life
Description: Taeko and her husband, Jiro, are living a peaceful existence with son, Keita. A tragic accident brings the boy's father, Park, back into her life. Taeko throws herself into helping this deaf and homeless man to cope with pain and guilt.

Title: Move Over, Darling
Description: After being lost at sea for several years, a missing wife thought long dead returns just after her husband has remarried.

Title: The Pornographer
Description: Jacques Laurent made pornographic films in the 1970s and '80s, but had put that aside for 20 years. His artistic ideas, born of the '60s counter-culture, had elevated the entire genre.

Title: Dil Dhadakne Do
Description: The Mehra family must contemplate over their way of living and their love lives while on a cruise celebrating their 30th wedding anniversary.

Title: The Family Vice
Description: Giosuè, a noble industrialist of the spaghetti of the Venetian province is about to die and his half-sister, Magda, his wife, Ines, and daughter, Suzie, the result of an old flirtation of twenty years before, all try to grab the huge inheritance triggering a war made exclusively of low blows. In this scenario, a married former prisoner, Giacomo, arrives at the villa as the new butler, who in reality has been hired by the count's half-sister to compromise and in fact remove her sister-in-law, her main rival. To succeed, the new servant must even pretend to be gay, but once his true attitudes are discovered, all the women of the house will try to take him to their side by trying him with their graces. After the death of the noble, a final twist will make the hierarchies within the house clear.

Title: Transamerica
Description: A transgender woman takes an unexpected journey when she learns that she had a son, now a teenage runaway hustling on the streets of New York.

Title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Movie
Description: When a mysterious stranger arrives from the future with a dire warning, Leo is forced to rise and lead his brothers, Raph, Donnie, and Mikey in a fight to save the world from a terrifying alien species.

Title: The Beehive
Description: The Beehive tells the story of an inquisitive young girl, her angsty teenage brother, and her self-righteous father who put their family conflicts aside in the face of a pandemic alien invasion.

Title: Batman: The Long Halloween
Description: Atrocious serial killings on holidays in Gotham City send The World's Greatest Detective into action - confronting both organized crime and a unified front of classic DC Super-Villains - while attempting to stop the mysterious murderer.

Title: Welcome al Norte
Description: Polito is a manager in a courier office in Izamal, Yucatan, and wants to fulfill his dream of a promotion and a job in Cancun to move with his wife Teo and son.

Title: Wolf
Description: A high-concept arthouse drama about a boy who believes he is a wolf.

Title: Outback
Description: Down Under for an adventure-filled vacation, a young American couple quickly find themselves stranded in the unforgiving Australian outback.

Title: No Mercy
Description: Despite being nearly proven the murderer, a serial killer threatens to kill the daughter of a forensic pathologist if he doesn't get him bailed out.

Title: Racing with the Moon
Description: In 1942 California, two young men await induction into the U.S. Marines and say goodbye to their girlfriends.

Title: Warlords of the Deep
Description: Two deep-sea explorers and their crew must survive a master race of beings and monstrous creatures when they discover the fabled city of Atlantis.

Title: Herd
Description: When a woman trying to outrun her past ends up trapped between a zombie outbreak and warring militia groups, she must fight to find her way back home.

Title: The Trouble with Jessica
Description: Sarah and Tom are in deep financial trouble. Their situation takes a terrifying nosedive with the shocking behavior of uninvited dinner guest, Jessica.

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Description: The arrival of wealthy bachelors in town causes an uproar when families with single daughters aggressively seek engagements, including the Bennet family, with five eligible daughters.

Title: Requiem
Description: An epileptic girl suffers a breakdown during her first year at university, then decides to seek help from a priest in battling the troubles associated with her strict upbringing.

Title: While She Was Out
Description: A woman out late for Christmas Eve shopping is soon terrorized by a small gang of troublemakers, and she must fight for her life.

Title: The Book of Solutions
Description: Follows a man, a director who tries to vanquish his demons, which are oppressing his creativity.

Title: Bedevilled
Description: A woman subject to mental, physical and sexual abuse on a remote island seeks a way out.

Title: The Comfort of Strangers
Description: A couple retreat to Venice to work on their relationship, but an encounter with a stranger leads them into a world of intrigue - where their darkest desires are in reach.

Title: Prophecy
Description: A government health inspector is dispatched to assess the damage a logging company is causing to a patch of forest claimed by Native Americans, and comes face to face with true terror wreaking havoc in the woods.

Title: Fellini's Casanova
Description: Giacomo Casanova uses his sexuality to find his place in life amid eccentric and strange characters.

Title: I Did It My Way
Description: Ho Sau, an undercover agent, has been working with Yau, a drug lord, for years, but his job and family are in trouble.

Title: Talk 2 Me
Description: Plot under wraps.

Title: Bloody New Year
Description: A group of friends take refuge in an island hotel that is decorated for New Years. The problem is, it's early summer, and soon enough, even the walls themselves are striking out against them.

Title: Flee
Description: FLEE tells the extraordinary true story of a man, Amin, on the verge of marriage which compels him to reveal his hidden past for the first time.

Title: Live Nude Girls
Description: Shane inherits a gentleman's club from his estranged uncle--run by a boozehound and staffed by a dozen out-of-control strippers. He must save the club from bankruptcy, and he might make history in the process.

Title: You're Cordially Invited
Description: Follows a woman who is planning her sister's wedding and the father of another bride-to-be. They discover that they are double-booked for their destination wedding, so both parties decide to share the venue, but chaos and disaster await.

Title: Impetigore
Description: A toll booth operator travels to her ancestral village in hopes of claiming an inheritance - until she discovers the unsettling truth about her past.

Title: Bucky F*cking Dent
Description: Follows Ted who moves in with his father Marty when he develops a fatal illness. To keep him happy and alive, Ted enlists Marty's grief counselor Mariana and friends to fake a Red Sox winning streak.

Title: Special 26
Description: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

Title: The Baader Meinhof Complex
Description: A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings, and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.

Title: The Young Offenders
Description: Two teenage boys cycle 160km on stolen bikes pursued by police to find a missing bale of cocaine worth 7 million euro. Set around the real event of Ireland's biggest cocaine seizure in 2007 of 440 million euro.

Title: The Last Kiss
Description: Michael, at 30, has a great job, still have his four best friends, and has a beautiful girlfriend, but his life seems predictable. Until he meets a college girl. It seems that everybody's having relationship problems.

Title: Jin-Roh: The Wolf Brigade
Description: A traumatized member of an elite para-military police force falls for the sister of a female terrorist courier who died in front of him on duty.

Title: Lucky Me
Description: Three struggling theatrical performers meet a famous songwriter who is trying to convince a wealthy oilman to finance a musical he is scripting, promising them stardom if it comes to fruition.

Title: Born a King
Description: The story focuses on growing up and finding one's place within your country, your family. It's about standing up for belief, learning about people's differences and allowing for that to be a positive thing.

Title: Mickey Blue Eyes
Description: An English auctioneer proposes to the daughter of a Mafia kingpin, only to realize that certain "favors" would be asked of him.

Title: Horror in the High Desert
Description: In July 2017, an outdoor enthusiast went missing in northern Nevada. He was never located. Friends and loved ones recall the events and, for the first time, talk about the horrific conclusion to his fate.

Title: White Wedding
Description: A teacher of philosophy encounters a complicated pupil; a seventeen year old girl who possesses quite a cynical view of the world. He attempts to help her focus on her studies, but soon becomes fascinated by her. They fall passionately in love. When the teacher is forced to choose between her and his Wife, complications ensue when the Girl refuses to accept his decision.

Title: Dead Man on Campus
Description: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.

Title: The Gnome-Mobile
Description: In the Redwood Forests of California, a multi-millionaire lumberman and his two young grandchildren encounter two gnomes who are supposedly the last of their kind.

Title: Lange flate ballær III
Description: To win back the love of his life, a charming car mechanic and a gang of soccer-mad friends embark on a madcap journey to the lawless East Bloc to correct a mistake of his past, risking life and prison in an ingenious booze smuggling scheme

Title: Jessica Frost
Description: A young woman searching for the truth about why a time-traveling psychopath is after her, is thrown into a turbulent journey through the desert, time, space and her family's past.

Title: Still Breathing
Description: When artist and street performer Fletcher (Brendan Fraser) thinks con-artist Roz (Joanna Going) is the woman he has seen in a vision, he has no idea she sees him as her next victim.

Title: Unstoppable: The Anthony Robles Story
Description: A three-time All-American wrestler born with one leg who won a national championship at Arizona State

Title: My Life to Live
Description: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

Title: Ava
Description: 13-year-old Ava learns that she will lose her sight sooner than expected, and she confronts the problem in her own way.

Title: The Church of Living Dangerously
Description: How one of America's biggest pastors became a drug runner for a Mexican cartel.

Title: Play Dirty
Description: Follows Parker, a craftsman and professional thief who approaches his job with a straightforward, no-nonsense work ethic, and he is also deadly.

Title: The Vanishing of Sidney Hall
Description: Sidney Hall finds accidental success and unexpected love at an early age, then disappears without a trace.

Title: Hostile Territory
Description: In post-civil war America, when a Union soldier is presumed dead, his children are mistakenly sent away on the orphan train. This is a wild-west story of people uniting for the greater good, and children forced to grow up quickly.

Title: Moonshot
Description: This romantic comedy with a twist follows two college students as they join forces in order to be reunited with their significant others, embarking on a lively journey that takes them wildly off course.

Title: L'Eclisse
Description: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

Title: Cracks
Description: A look at the lives and relationships among girls at an elite boarding school.

Title: Ilsa, the Wicked Warden
Description: After the mysterious disappearance of her sister, a desperate young woman infiltrates brutal warden Ilsa's mental health facility for sexually deviant women. Will she escape the hellhole and live to tell the tale?

Title: Owning Mahowny
Description: A bank manager with: (a) a gambling problem and (b) access to a multimillion dollar account gets into a messy situation. Based on the story of the largest one-man bank fraud in Canadian history.

Title: Pink
Description: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

Title: The Double
Description: A retired CIA operative is paired with a young FBI agent to unravel the mystery of a senator's murder, with all signs pointing to a Soviet assassin.

Title: Curse of Jack Frost
Description: A family is terrorized by a Christmas demon, Jack Frost, and must learn their family's dark secrets that link to why they are cursed. This Christmas, Jack will stop at nothing to exact his vengeance on those left in the bloodline.

Title: Landmine Goes Click
Description: Trapped standing on an armed landmine, an American tourist is forced to watch helplessly while his girlfriend is terrorized and brutally assaulted.

Title: After the Wedding
Description: A manager of an orphanage in Kolkata travels to New York to meet a benefactor.

Title: Girl Crazy
Description: A philandering young playboy is sent to college somewhere in the American West, and organizes a show, together with his sweetheart, to save the college from closure due to falling enrollments.

Title: Birds of America
Description: A regular guy struggles with a repressive home and professional life, as well as making amends for the trouble his free-spirited brother and sister cause about town.

Title: Here Today
Description: When veteran comedy writer Charlie Burnz meets New York street singer Emma Payge, they form an unlikely yet hilarious and touching friendship that kicks the generation gap aside and redefines the meaning of love and trust.

Title: The Christmas Project
Description: A writer looks back on his memorable 1986 Christmas, dealing with brothers, bullies, first love, pregnancy and family "elving."

Title: Four Little Adults
Description: A middle-aged couple who, in the middle of an infidelity crisis, decide to open their marriage and venture into polyamory.

Title: Megalomaniac
Description: Megalomaniac questions the invisible line between victim and executioner and how it is crossed. A film about the weight of patriarchy and the illusion of Manichaeism.

Title: The Story of My Wife
Description: Jacob Störr, a sea captain, makes a bet in a café with a friend, to marry the first woman who enters the place. And in walks Lizzy.

Title: Colossus: The Forbin Project
Description: Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.

Title: No More Bets
Description: A Chinese programmer and a model who, enticed by the promise of high-paying jobs, find themselves trapped in a foreign country as prisoners of a scam mill and were forced to be part of their online fraud scheme.

Title: Wichita
Description: In 1874, after noticing the total lawlessness in Wichita, Wyatt Earp reluctantly accepts the Marshal's job and runs into the worst local troublemakers.

Title: All the Real Girls
Description: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.

Title: Deathgasm
Description: Two teenage boys unwittingly summon an ancient evil entity known as The Blind One by delving into black magic while trying to escape their mundane lives.

Title: All That Breathes
Description: Amidst the darkening backdrop of Delhi's apocalyptic air and escalating violence, two brothers devote their lives to protect one casualty of the turbulent times: the bird known as the Black Kite.

Title: Hotel Sinestra
Description: When Ava wishes to get rid of her overprotective parents in Hotel Sinestra, next morning all grown-ups have miraculously disappeared. Ava and the other children have to go all out to find a solution to get their parents back.

Title: The Young Girls of Rochefort
Description: Two sisters leave their small seaside town of Rochefort in search of romance. Hired as carnival singers, one falls for an American musician, while the other must search for her ideal partner.

Title: Universal Soldier: The Return
Description: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

Title: AmeriGeddon
Description: A family of dedicated patriots living in the United States decide to defend their country against a terrorist organization that shuts down electricity in America and tries to take over the nation.

Title: Another Gay Movie
Description: Four gay high school friends make a pact to lose their virginity before they go to college.

Title: Vamps
Description: Two female vampires in modern-day New York City are faced with daunting romantic possibilities.

Title: Pelle the Conqueror
Description: When his wife dies, Lasse takes his 12-year-old son, Pelle, from their home in Sweden to Denmark in search of a better life.

Title: Sleeper
Description: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

Title: Stars Fell Again
Description: Bryce is ready to propose to Madison while they visit her family for Christmas. However, the spontaneous wedding of Madison's sister Harper throws Bryce's perfect proposal plans into a tailspin.

Title: Art of Love
Description: A mysterious, erotic and haunting love story between a writer/professor at Puerto Rico's leading University and an aspiring artist from the immigrant Chinese community.

Title: I Am Pilgrim
Description: A former spy is called up out of retirement to assist in an unusual investigation.

Title: A Killer Within
Description: Addison comes home one night to find his wife brutally murdered with the words "We're even now". The cops suspect that Addison killed her, and now he must race through the underside of Dallas to find the only other suspect.

Title: Zandalee
Description: Thierry's wife Zandalee married the poet he once was. Taking over his dad's company in New Orleans gives him stress and impotence. Thierry meets his high school buddy Johnny at a bachelor party. The painter Johnny can satisfy Zandalee.

Title: The Hotel New Hampshire
Description: A family weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of everything, in a film noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.

Title: Gasoline Rainbow
Description: Follows 5 teenagers from small-town Oregon who, with high school in the rearview, decide to embark on one last adventure: to make it to a place they've never been -the Pacific coast, 500 miles away. Their plan, in full: "F**k it."

Title: Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein
Description: The Wolf Man tries to warn a dimwitted porter that Dracula wants his brain for Frankenstein monster's body.

Title: Prime
Description: A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

Title: Robot Jox
Description: In the distant future, mankind has forsaken global wars for battles of single combat. The world has been divided into two opposing super powers, with each side represented by trained champions.

Title: The Wild One
Description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

Title: The Bachelor
Description: A commitment-phobic man goes in search of a bride, including his fed-up girlfriend, to inherit his grandfather's one hundred million dollar inheritance.

Title: Used People
Description: At her husband's funeral, Pearl (Shirley MacLaine), Jewish mother of two divorced and antagonistic daughters, meets an old Italian friend (Marcello Mastroianni) of her husband, whose advice years previously had stopped the husband leaving home. For 23 years he, now a widower, has secretly loved Pearl...

Title: The Row
Description: A college freshman discovers a dark secret about the sorority house she's pledging for after a series of murders terrorize the campus.

Title: Boat Trip
Description: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

Title: Cassandra's Dream
Description: The tale of two brothers with serious financial woes. When a third party proposes they turn to crime, things go badly and the two become enemies.

Title: Deathtrap
Description: A Broadway playwright puts murder in his plan to take credit for a student's play.

Title: Paris 05:59: Théo & Hugo
Description: Two men meet in a sex club, become entangled in a passionate embrace, and spend the night getting to know each other. As they wander through the empty streets of Paris, they must confront the feelings that are growing between them.

Title: Allan Quatermain and the Spear of Destiny
Description: Allan Quatermain leads a team to stop a clandestine organization from reviving ancient evil. Through forgotten tombs and deadly jungles, they face deadly traps and Nazi zombies in an epic battle for humanity's fate.

Title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
Description: A man studies kung fu at the Shaolin Temple to fight back against the oppressive Manchu government.

Title: Across 110th Street
Description: Two New York City cops go after amateur crooks who are trying to rip off the Mafia and start a gang war.

Title: Christmas Crossfire
Description: A man foils an attempted murder, then flees the crew of would-be killers along with their intended target as a woman he's just met tries to find him.

Title: Monsternado
Description: A tornado, infested with prehistoric monsters, has formed in the Bermuda Triangle, and is making its way towards land. Now the city must fight to survive against these deadly creatures.

Title: Small Engine Repair
Description: Events spin wildly out of control when three lifelong friends agree to do a favor on behalf of the brash young woman they all adore.

Title: Noises Off...
Description: A travelling theater group find so much action going on behind-the-scenes, they almost ruin the performances.

Title: Fireworks
Description: Nishi leaves the police in the face of harrowing personal and professional difficulties. Spiraling into depression, he makes questionable decisions.

Title: Airplane Mode
Description: En route to Australia, Logan is terrified; it's his first time flying. All of his worst nightmares come true when the "influencers" aboard refuse to switch their phones to airplane mode. The internet is about to crash.

Title: Afwaah
Description: An advertising professional and a political heiress whose lives are upended by a viral social media rumour.

Title: Miriam Maa
Description: Follows a fifty year old women who undergoes in vitro fertilisation treatment to get pregnant.

Title: Daisy Diamond
Description: Anna dreams of being an actress when she becomes pregnant. Though she struggles to give her daughter a good life, she fails to unite her dream of acting with creating a safe environment for her child.

Title: Hawaii
Description: An American missionary and his wife travel to the exotic island kingdom of Hawaii, intent on converting the natives. But the clash between the two cultures is too great and instead of understanding there comes tragedy.

Title: Skinwalkers
Description: A 12-year-old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

Title: Problemista
Description: Alejandro is an aspiring toy designer from El Salvador struggling to bring his unusual ideas to life in NY. As time runs out on his work visa, a job assisting an erratic art-world outcast becomes his only hope to stay in the country.

Title: Come to Daddy
Description: A man in his thirties travels to a remote cabin to reconnect with his estranged father.

Title: Hot Girls Wanted
Description: A documentary about young women who have been drawn into the sex trade - and how easy it is for a web-savvy generation to end up making porn.

Title: Kill
Description: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one another's loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.

Title: Mother
Description: A neurotic, twice-divorced sci-fi writer moves back in with his mother to solve his personal problems.

Title: In Darkness
Description: A blind musician hears a murder committed in the apartment upstairs from hers that sends her down a dark path into London's gritty criminal underworld.

Title: The Good Half
Description: Renn Wheeland returns home to Cleveland for his mother's funeral. Once there, he forges new relationships while healing old ones, before confronting his problems and trying to face his grief.

Title: Beach House
Description: Emma's quiet beach retreat takes an unsettling turn with the arrival of an enigmatic artist out of her mother's past. He challenges, enthralls, and frightens her, as she comes to suspect him of a terrible crime.

Title: Highway One
Description: Estranged friends Maria and Nina have spent years apart, but are brought back together at a New Year's party off the Highway One.

Title: Southbound
Description: Five interlocking tales of terror follow the fates of a group of weary travellers who confront their worst nightmares - and darkest secrets - over one long night on a desolate stretch of desert highway.

Title: Single and Ready to Jingle
Description: Emma Warner, as a SVP of a toy company, spends 12 months a year focusing on Christmas, leaving no time for dating. This year, she plans a trip to a tropical singles resort, but a booking mistake takes her to a Christmas obsessed town.

Title: Stalled
Description: A janitor gets trapped in a women's restroom and encounters an all-out attack by a horde of zombies.

Title: Upstream Color
Description: A man and woman are drawn together, entangled in the life cycle of an ageless organism. Identity becomes an illusion as they struggle to assemble the loose fragments of wrecked lives.

Title: Private Property
Description: Kathryn, a struggling actress and unfulfilled housewife, becomes involved with her new gardener, Ben. As he gives her the attention and sensitivity she craves, they start to fall for each other. But Ben is not what he seems.

Title: Smoke
Description: A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.

Title: Long Day's Journey Into Night
Description: A man went back to Guizhou, found the tracks of a mysterious woman. He recalls the summer he spent with her twenty years ago.

Title: The Savages
Description: A sister and brother face the realities of familial responsibility as they begin to care for their ailing father.

Title: My Mom's New Boyfriend
Description: Henry Durand is a young federal agent who is given a difficult assignment: spy on his mother and her boyfriend who is suspected of leading a gang of art thieves.

Title: Lady in White
Description: An author tells the story of how, as a young boy growing up in a 1960s small town, he was haunted after witnessing the murder of a little girl.

Title: Chatrapathi
Description: Displaced Sri Lankans in a Vizag port are ruled by a local rowdy. This is the story of Chatrapati Sivaji who overcomes this oppression and how he reunites with his long lost mother and brother.

Title: The Devils
Description: Orphaned 12-year-old twins Joseph and Chloé have been on the run together. Chloé is autistic, non-verbal and fears being touched. Joseph dearly loves her and dreams she will recover if they find their parents and fight the system.

Title: Camp Hideout
Description: After a troubled teen steals an important item from two big-city goons, he hides in a church summer camp and must protect his newfound friends at all cost when the goons track him down.

Title: Untitled Alien Prequel
Description: Plot unknown.

Title: This Is Paris
Description: The untold story of Paris Hilton.

Title: The Damned United
Description: The story of the controversial Brian Clough's 44-day reign as the coach of the English football club Leeds United.

Title: Fukrey
Description: The paths of four dream-chasing college friends cross with an array of colourful characters, from a tough-talking Punjabi female don to a Jugaad Baaz college watchman. Mayhem ensues.

Title: Diabolik: Who Are You?
Description: Captured by a ruthless criminal gang, Diabolik and Ginko get locked in the same cell, with no way out. Diabolik reveals his mysterious past to the inspector. Meanwhile, both Eva Kant and Altea are desperately looking for their men..

Title: First Lady of BMF: The Tonesa Welch Story
Description: Inspired by the true life of Detroit native Tonesa Welch. It charts Welch's rise from a teenager's mother to a drug dealer, she is referred to by federal prosecutors as "The First Lady of the BMF"

Title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
Description: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.

Title: Balthazar
Description: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

Title: Concussion
Description: After a blow to the head, Abby decides she can't do it anymore. Her life just can't be only about the house, the kids and the wife. She needs more: she needs to be Eleanor.

Title: Annapolis
Description: Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.

Title: Our Souls at Night
Description: Fonda and Redford star as Addie Moore and Louis Waters, a widow and widower who've lived next to each other for years. The pair have almost no relationship, but that all changes when Addie tries to make a connection with her neighbor.

Title: Daughters of Darkness
Description: While passing through a vacation resort, a newlywed couple encounters a mysterious, strikingly beautiful countess and her aide.

Title: Plank Face
Description: A man is taken captive by a feral family in the deep woods. They are determined to transform him, body and mind, into one of their own -- whether he likes it or not.

Title: Baazigar
Description: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces the man's younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.

Title: Teen Titans GO! To the Movies
Description: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

Title: Betrayal
Description: During the final months of World War II, a Nazi officer assigned to protect the war-torn frontline in the Netherlands decides to risk his life to protect a Jewish family in hiding.

Title: B.O.O.: Bureau of Otherworldly Operations
Description: B.O.O. (Bureau of Otherworldly Operations) is the super classified agency you've never heard of and certainly never seen. Dedicated to protecting humans from evil hauntings, the agents of B.O.O. have a secret weapon: they are ghosts themselves. When newbie agents Jackson Moss (Seth Rogen) and his odd-ball partner Watts (Melissa McCarthy) uncover a plot to destroy B.O.O. by the agency's Most Wanted Haunter, they must use every trick in their arsenal to defeat his powerful ghost army and save Earth from a ghostly fate.

Title: We Still Kill the Old Way
Description: When retired East End villain Charlie Archer is murdered by a feral street gang, his brother Ritchie returns to London from Spain to investigate.

Title: Up the Creek
Description: Bob McGraw is in his 12th year of college, goofing his way through life, until he has to win a river rafting race with three college buddies.

Title: Celeste & Jesse Forever
Description: A divorcing couple tries to maintain their friendship while they both pursue other people.

Title: The Man from Rome
Description: Vatican intelligence officer Father Quart (Richard Armitage) investigates a message sent to the pope about a crumbling Spanish church that "kills to defend itself." A deep conspiracy unfolds that challenges the Father's loyalty and faith.

Title: Will-o'-the-Wisp
Description: 2069, an erotic year if ever there was one, but a fateful year for a king without a crown.

Title: Run Fatboy Run
Description: Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back.

Title: Things We Lost in the Fire
Description: A recent widow invites her husband's troubled best friend to live with her and her two children. As he gradually turns his life around, he helps the family cope and confront their loss.

Title: Woman in the Maze
Description: A young woman rents a cursed house, forcing her to solve the mystery to find a way out.

Title: Grand Isle
Description: A young father is charged with murder and must prove his innocence by recalling a very twisted and dark night of events.

Title: The Running Man
Description: The futuristic United States of 2025 when the world has become a dystopia.

Title: 791 km
Description: 5 people of different personalities have to take the taxi from Munich to Hamburg, as the train service is canceled. The strangers discover that everybody has to carry his package, but overcome their trouble together as a group.

Title: The Thinning
Description: In a future, overcrowded, dystopian society, students with the lowest test scores are culled. Two students discover errors with the test.

Title: A Haunted House 2
Description: Having exorcised the demons of his ex, Malcolm is starting fresh with his new girlfriend and her two children. After moving into their dream home, however, Malcolm is once again plagued by bizarre paranormal events.

Title: Two-Lane Blacktop
Description: While drag-racing through the American Southwest in a Chevrolet 150, a driver and his mechanic cross paths with an enigmatic hitchhiker and the tall tale-spinning driver of a GTO.

Title: Monsoon Wedding
Description: A stressed father, a bride-to-be with a secret, a smitten event planner, and relatives from around the world create much ado about the preparations for an arranged marriage in India.

Title: Murder-Rock: Dancing Death
Description: The owner of a prestigious New York ballet school teams up with a male model to solve a series of bizarre murders of a few of the students.

Title: Smoke Signals
Description: Arnold rescued Thomas from a fire when he was a child. Thomas thinks of Arnold as a hero, while Arnold's son Victor resents his father's alcoholism, violence and abandonment of his family.

Title: Guarding Tess
Description: A former U.S. First Lady wants a particular Secret Service agent to head her bodyguard detail, even though he can't stand her.

Title: The Miracle
Description: N the 1960s, a new teacher arrives in a village in the interior of Turkey and discovers that there is no school. He mobilizes the residents to build a place for children and the disabled to learn.

Title: The Contender
Description: Senator Laine Hanson is a contender for U.S. Vice President, but information and disinformation about her past surfaces that threatens to derail her confirmation.

Title: Millions
Description: Ethics, being human and the soul come to the fore when a 7-year old finds a bag of Pounds just days before the currency is switched to Euros and learns what we are really made of.

Title: North Hollywood
Description: A kid must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skater.

Title: An American in Paris - The Musical
Description: Jerry Mulligan is an American striving to make it as a painter in Paris. Following an encounter with a dancer named Lise, the streets of Paris become the backdrop to a sensuous romance of art, friendship and love in the aftermath of war.

Title: The Devil
Description: During the Prussian army's invasion to Poland in 1793, a young Polish nobleman, Jakub is saved from the imprisonment by a stranger who wants in return to obtain a list of his fellow conspirators. Following his mysterious savior across the country, Jakub sees the overall chaos and moral corruption including his father's death and the betrayal of his friend who stole his fiancee. Being apparently demented by what he has seen, he commits a number of seemingly motiveless and gory killings.

Title: The Breed
Description: A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.

Title: Navy Seals
Description: A battle-hardened SEAL Team set off on a mission to destroy a shipment of US-built Stinger missiles that have fallen into terrorist hands.

Title: Blade of the Immortal
Description: Cursed with a life of immortality, a samurai is tasked by a young girl to help avenge the death of her father. Based on the manga series by Hiroaki Samura.

Title: Dry Martina
Description: Martina was a famous singer in Argentina during the late 90s, who's become completely frigid and disenchanted with love. The arrival of a so-called sister, alongside her attractive boyfriend, compel Martina to go to Chile with one objective in mind: getting back her libido.

Title: Portrait of a Beauty
Description: Born to a family of established court painters, a woman is forced to carry on her family name and take over her brother's life after he commits suicide.

Title: Bad Seeds of Loving Spring
Description: A cursed gunman and his nemesis, a sadistic sheriff, enlist a fearless bounty hunting woman to track a legendary serial killer who they believe was spawned by their childhood sins.

Title: Sapiosexual
Description: Three people gather for an "uncoupling celebration" arranged by the aging narcissist Liam. Both Hannah and Freddie, Liam's guests as well as victims, have dark ties to his past and plenty of their own secrets. When the power goes out during a thunderstorm, the deepest truth are revealed, changing each person's life forever.

Title: Maaveeran
Description: A cowardly cartoonist starts being 'controlled' by a cartoon action figure, and takes on a corrupt politician.

Title: Slackers
Description: When geeky Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the examination system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.

Title: Employee of the Month
Description: It just isn't David's day. First he gets fired at the bank, then his fiancee breaks up and throws him out of the house. The bank gets robbed and he gets shot. Twists follow.

Title: The Perfect Guy
Description: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a professional woman gets involved with a man who seems almost too good to be true.

Title: Little Big League
Description: A young boy is bequeathed the ownership of a professional baseball team.

Title: Trade
Description: Adriana, 13, is kidnapped in Mexico City by Russian sex traffickers. Her criminal 17 y.o. brother starts looking for her. Across the border in Texas, he gets help from a cop.

Title: All My Life
Description: A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer.

Title: Pagglait
Description: Widowed soon after marriage, a young woman grapples with an inability to grieve, quirky relatives, and a startling discovery about her late husband.

Title: The Best of Times
Description: A small-town loser determines to have one more shot at the big time by winning a football game.

Title: Dallas
Description: A former Confederate officer hunting for an outlaw who wronged him finds him in Dallas, but now as a wealthy, respectable citizen.

Title: Kadinlara Mahsus
Description: It tells the story of eight women who came together at the "For Women" camp to turn a new page in their lives.

Title: Facing the Giants
Description: A losing coach and his underdog football team face their giants of fear and failure on and off the field, with surprising results.

Title: Stranger in the House
Description: Eve has married the man of her dreams but when they return to live in the house willed to him by his first wife who died under horrific circumstances, it becomes a waking nightmare as Eve falls into a spiral of suspicion and madness.

Title: Samson
Description: After losing the love of his life to a cruel Philistine Prince, a young Hebrew with supernatural strength defends his people, sacrificing everything to avenge his love, his people, and God.

Title: Fort Dobbs
Description: Eluding a sheriff's posse, an escaped man saves a farming family from a Comanche attack and escorts it to the nearby Fort Dobbs.

Title: Breezy
Description: A young girl runs away from home and meets a grouchy older man who reluctantly takes her in. Eventually they develop a romantic and affectionate relationship.

Title: Soul Mates
Description: Follows Allison and Jason, two unsuspecting strangers who must find their way out of a nightmarish maze where they were forced to get into as part of a twisted new dating service created to help them find their Soul Mate.

Title: The Russia House
Description: A British publisher is sent a manuscript detailing Soviet Union nuclear missile capabilities. British Intelligence intercept it and recruit him to investigate the author's editor, a beautiful Russian woman he claims never to have met.

Title: The Grudge 2
Description: Three interwoven stories about a terrible curse. A young woman encounters a malevolent supernatural force while searching for her missing sister in Tokyo; a mean high school prank goes horribly wrong; a woman with a deadly secret moves into a Chicago apartment building.

Title: Valley of the Dead
Description: Months after bloody combats leave behind thousands of dead in the trenches. Jan Lozano, Captain of the Fifth Brigade has fallen prisoner by an opponent's platoon along with a young driver while carrying out a mission that has been entrusted to him. The possibility of dying executed will soon be overtaken when a new unknown enemy arises. Both rival sides must unite and set their mutual hate aside in order to survive.

Title: Cats
Description: A cat named Blanket lives in the city with his son, Cape. One day, Cape decides to leave home and embarks on an adventure to find the legendary cat's paradise. To find his son, Blanket must overcome his fear and reconcile with his past.

Title: Goodbye Lover
Description: Sandra is married to Jake, an alcoholic executive, but has a secret relationship with her brother-in-law Ben, who is attracted to Peggy, a woman who hides a dark side known to few. When Sandra finds out, Ben mysteriously disappears.

Title: Monkey Shines
Description: A quadriplegic man has a trained monkey help him with his paralysis, until the little monkey begins to develop feelings, and rage, against its new master.

Title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla II
Description: The United Nations assembles the ultimate weapon to defeat Godzilla, while scientists discover a fresh pteranodon egg on a remote Japanese island.

Title: Wyrmwood: Apocalypse
Description: In a zombie-infested Australian wasteland, soldier Rhys has dedicated his life to tracking and capturing survivors for the Surgeon General in hopes of finding a cure.

Title: The Russian Bride
Description: A Russian woman meets an older man on a dating site. She travels to America with her daughter to marry the man, who is a reclusive billionaire. He turns out to be a psycho, who sends their lives spiraling into a living hell. Will they manage to survive!

Title: ThanksKilling
Description: A homicidal turkey axes off college kids during Thanksgiving break.

Title: The Perfect Man
Description: A lonely mother begins receiving romantic e-mails from a secret admirer, unaware that this perfect man is really a creation of her daughter who is trying to cheer her up.

Title: Teen Wolf Too
Description: Todd Howard is a struggling college student. Nothing seems to be going very well for him, until he turns into a wolf.

Title: Paradox Effect
