Description: A mysterious discovery is made on the outskirts of the remote harbor town. The residents find themselves in a desperate fight for survival against something they have never encountered before.

Title: Snow White: A Tale of Terror
Description: In this dark take on the fairy tale, the growing hatred of a noblewoman, secretly a practitioner of the dark arts, for her stepdaughter, and the witch's horrifying attempts to kill her.

Title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
Description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

Title: Shakes the Clown
Description: Shakes is good at his job as party clown - when he's sober and shows up. Five druggy clowns frame him for the murder of his boss.

Title: Elf-Man
Description: An Elf is left behind by Santa to help rescue the Harper family from a lousy Christmas. The Elf and the family get more than they bargained for, as the kids help the Elf discover his special powers and true identity as a budding superhero.

Title: Uncommon Valor
Description: Ten years after his son went M.I.A. in Vietnam, U.S. Marine retired Colonel Jason Rhodes assembles a private rescue team to find Americans held in P.O.W. camps in Laos.

Title: Beyond the Law
Description: A mobster trying to go straight and a dogged police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.

Title: Maquia: When the Promised Flower Blooms
Description: Escaping war, an immortal girl blessed with Eternal Youth finds a lone surviving infant and decides to raise him as her son.

Title: Girl/Girl Scene
Description: Gay girls just want to have fun. Join bad girl Evan, blonde bombshell Bridget, party girl Ryan and their friends as they live and love as young lesbians living in a not so modern world.

Title: Theseus
Description: The epic mythical adventure of the ancient Greek hero Theseus.

Title: Clockers
Description: Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.

Title: Housebound
Description: A young woman is forced to return to her childhood home after being placed under house arrest, where she suspects that something evil may be lurking.

Title: My Favorite Martian
Description: A Martian lands on Earth and makes friends with a reporter.

Title: Blindsided
Description: A reclusive, blind photojournalist lives quietly in a New York penthouse, until a smooth but sadistic criminal looking for a hidden fortune enters her life.

Title: Dr. T & the Women
Description: A wealthy gynecologist's ideal life is thrown into turmoil when the women closest to him begin to affect his life in unexpecting ways.

Title: Sightless
Description: After an attack renders her blind, Ellen Ashland withdraws from the world to recover. But soon she plunges into paranoia, unable to convince anyone that her assailant has returned to terrorize her by hiding in plain sight.

Title: 1000 Miles from Christmas
Description: A Christmas tale, a romantic comedy and the story of a man in his 30s who learns reluctantly to get carried away by the Christmas spirit.

Title: Pure Nude Yoga: Zen Garden Goddess
Description: Explores the practice of yoga without the confinement of clothing. Beautiful 26 year old Yogini Wenona gracefully moves through a series of nude poses in a serene verdant Zen Garden.

Title: Dark Water
Description: A mother and her 6-year-old daughter move into a creepy apartment whose every surface is permeated by water.

Title: Debbie Does Demons
Description: Debbie is the host of a paranormal ghost hunter show. But can she come to the rescue when four friends use a Ouija board to summon a 300 year old witch? Good luck, Debbie. You're gonna NEED it.

Title: Band of the Hand
Description: Five juvenile lost causes are sent to the Everglades where a war veteran tries to reform them using survival tactics. Their new skills and resolve are tested when a Miami drug lord targets them for trying to clean up their neighborhood.

Title: Bring It On: Cheer or Die
Description: When a cheer squad practices their routines on Halloween weekend in an abandoned school, they are picked off one by one by an unknown killer.

Title: Brahms: The Boy II
Description: After a family moves into the Heelshire Mansion, their young son soon makes friends with a life-like doll called Brahms.

Title: An Ideal Husband
Description: London 1895: Cabinet minister, Sir Chiltern, and bachelor, Lord Goring, are victims of scheming women.

Title: Hell Night
Description: Four college pledges are forced to spend the night in a deserted old mansion, where they are stalked by the monstrous survivor of a family massacre years earlier.

Title: Miracle at St. Anna
Description: Set in 1944 Italy, the story of four black American soldiers who get trapped in a Tuscan village during WWII.

Title: Barely Legal
Description: Three high school guys attempt to make a porno movie.

Title: Monsters and Men
Description: The aftermath of a police killing of a black man, told through the eyes of the bystander who filmed the act, an African-American police officer and a high-school baseball phenom inspired to take a stand.

Title: Smilla's Sense of Snow
Description: A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.

Title: Like a Boss
Description: Two friends with very different ideals start a beauty company together. One is more practical while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

Title: Beauty and the Beast
Description: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

Title: Punchline
Description: A medical school dropout and a housewife/mom try to make it as stand-up comedians. They become friends and help each other out at an NYC comedy club.

Title: Mother's Day
Description: The sadistic members of a villainous family return to their childhood home to terrorize the new home owners and their guests.

Title: Starship Troopers: Traitor of Mars
Description: Federation trooper, Johnny Rico's ordered to work with a group of new recruits on a satellite station on Mars, where giant bugs have decided to target their next attack.

Title: Midnight Runners
Description: Two friends who are students at Korean National Police University, find themselves in an endless race against time after they witness a kidnapping and decide to use their knowledge.

Title: Aline
Description: With the support of her family and the man she loves, the 14th child of a modest family will become the most famous singer in the world.

Title: Tell Me Who I Am
Description: After losing his memory in an accident, Alex Lewis trusts his twin brother, Marcus, to tell him about his past only to discover that he's hiding a dark secret about their childhood.

Title: Time of the Gypsies
Description: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

Title: I Trapped the Devil
Description: A man descends into paranoia after trapping what he believes to be the devil in his basement, but things take a dark turn when his family unexpectedly arrive for Christmas.

Title: Hansel & Gretel
Description: A modern retelling of the classic tale. Teen siblings must escape from a psychotic recluse living in the woods.

Title: In the House
Description: A high school French teacher is drawn into a precocious student's increasingly transgressive story about his relationship with a friend's family.

Title: Vigilante
Description: When Luke is viciously attacked and his fiancée is raped and murdered, he pledges to train himself in deadly hand-to-hand combat and use it against any wrongdoers who dare cross his path.

Title: Natasha
Description: A forbidden romance between a 16-year-old Russian Jewish immigrant kid in Toronto and his cousin by marriage, a 14-year-old girl from Moscow with a scandalous past.

Title: In Like Flint
Description: Super-spy Flint takes on a cabal of women plotting to rule the world.

Title: Koi... Mil Gaya
Description: A developmentally disabled young man tries to continue the work his father did in communicating with extra-terrestrials from outer space, which leads to something miraculous and wonderful.

Title: Tokyo Revengers 2: Bloody Halloween - Destiny
Description: It follows Takemichi as he travels 10 years back in time to change a key case that can save Hinata, who was murdered again by the Tokyo Manjikai Gang in front of Takemichi.

Title: Distant
Description: After his wife leaves him, a photographer has an existential crisis and tries to cope with his cousin's visit.

Title: Curse of the Pink Panther
Description: Ensuing after the events of Clouseau's disappearance, his bosses at the Surete put a computer into service to elect a new shrewd detective, Sleigh, who turns up just as inept as Clouseau.

Title: The Prowler
Description: An unknown killer, clad in World War II U.S. Army fatigues, stalks a small California town, bent on reliving a 35 year-old double murder by focusing on a group of college kids holding an annual graduation dance.

Title: Return to Paradise
Description: Two friends must choose whether to help a third friend who was arrested in Malaysia for drug possession.

Title: Domino
Description: A Copenhagen police officer seeks justice for his partner's murder by a mysterious man.

Title: Cinderella's Curse
Description: Based on the same folktale that Disney updated and popularized for children, back in the 1950s.

Title: Blue Canaries
Description: On a sweltering Christmas night, a quick-tempered rookie cop and her seasoned senior officer get caught in a deadly standoff with a desperate teenager, but how they got there is the real story.

Title: Dhoom 3
Description: Jai and Ali return to catch the clown thief, Sahir, who has targeted various branches of the Western Bank of Chicago.

Title: Eternity and a Day
Description: Famous writer Alexander is very ill and has little time left to live. He meets a little boy on the street, who is an illegal immigrant from Albania, and goes on a journey with him to take the boy home.

Title: The Boys
Description: Brett Sprague is a violent and psychopathic man, who is released on parole after serving a sentence for assault. As he returns to his family house and we watch him and his brothers, Stevie and Glenn, for the next 24 hours, it becomes clear this day will not end well.

Title: Blue Miracle
Description: To save their cash-strapped orphanage, a guardian and his kids partner with a washed-up boat captain for a chance to win a lucrative fishing competition.

Title: Black Sabbath
Description: Boris Karloff hosts a trio of horror stories concerning a stalked call girl, a vampire-like monster who preys on his family, and a nurse who is haunted by her ring's rightful owner.

Title: The Conspiracy
Description: A documentary about conspiracy theories takes a horrific turn after the filmmakers uncover an ancient and dangerous secret society.

Title: After Porn Ends 2
Description: After Porn Ends 2 turns back the clock to meet the oldest living stars in adult film's history, but goes in depth with some of its most current retirees, and juxtaposes their experiences in a life after porn.

Title: Matinee
Description: The teenage son of a navy sailor newly stationed in Key West gets some excitement with his friends when a small-time film producer comes to town to premiere a kitschy horror film during the Cuban Missile Crisis.

Title: Hanu Man
Description: An imaginary place called Anjanadri where the protagonist gets the powers of Hanuman and fights for Anjanadri.

Title: Vanity Fair
Description: Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia Sedley.

Title: The Hunting Party
Description: A ruthless rancher and his gang use extremely long range rifles to kill the men who kidnapped his infidel wife.

Title: The Red Violin
Description: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

Title: Roll Bounce
Description: In the summer of 1978, a teenager and his group of friends face new challenges when their neighborhood roller-skating rink closes, forcing them to visit a different rink.

Title: House Arrest
Description: Desperate to keep their various parents from getting divorced, a group of teenagers kidnaps them and holds them prisoner in a basement to force them to reconcile.

Title: [Rec]²
Description: In order to ascertain the current situation inside, a supposed medical officer and a GEO team step into the quarantined and ill-fated apartment building.

Title: The Woods
Description: Set in 1965 New England, a troubled girl encounters mysterious happenings in the woods surrounding an isolated girls school that she was sent to by her disinterested parents.

Title: Wish I Was Here
Description: A struggling actor, father and husband finds himself at a major crossroads, which forces him to examine his life, his family and his career.

Title: Remi, Nobody's Boy
Description: The adventures of young Rémi, an orphan raised by the gentle Madam Barberin. At the age of 10 years, he is snatched from his adoptive mother and entrusted to Vitalis, a mysterious itinerant musician. At his side, Rémi will learn the harsh life of an acrobat and sing to win his bread. Accompanied by the faithful dog Capi and the small monkey Joli-Coeur, his long trip through France makes for meetings, friendships and mutual assistance, and leads him to the secret of his origins.

Title: The Girl on a Motorcycle
Description: A married woman leaves her husband and zooms off on her motorcycle to see her lover.

Title: Full River Red
Description: A pawn tries to get rid of a traitorous minister, Qin Hui, when he leads an army to the border for talks with a Jurchen mission.

Title: Jude
Description: In late 1800s England, Jude plans to go to the city and attend university but marries early and becomes a stonemason. When his wife leaves, he moves to the city, where he befriends his liberal cousin Sue.

Title: The Ambush
Description: When three Emirati soldiers are ambushed in a hostile territory, their commander leads a daring mission to rescue them.

Title: The Key Game
Description: Laura has been with Antonio all her life and, just when she begins to wonder if that is really the life she wants, Sergio and Siena cross paths in their lives. Sergio is a former high school classmate and Siena, his millennial girlfriend who arrives to revolutionize everyone's lives. Laura, Raquel and Cris, close friends for years, convince their respective husbands to play a game that Siena proposes to them: the game of keys. The game consists of everyone putting their keys in a bowl. At random, each one chooses some keys and he must go to spend the night with the owner of the keys. This game will revolutionize the group of friends and their lives. It will make them discover who they are and what they really want. A comedy about long-term monogamy, self-fulfillment, and pleasure. A story about four couples who are friends and decide to be swingers with each other.

Title: Laurence Anyways
Description: A drama that charts ten years in a transgender woman's relationship with her lover.

Title: Hard Kill
Description: The work of billionaire tech CEO Donovan Chalmers (Willis) is so valuable that he hires mercenaries to protect it, and a terrorist group kidnaps his daughter just to get it.

Title: Nights and Weekends
Description: A man and woman must face the tension that builds between them during a long-distance relationship.

Title: Blood and Money
Description: A retired veteran hunting in Northern Maine stumbles across a dead woman and a large sum of money.

Title: Ivanhoe
Description: A knight seeks to free the captive King Richard and put him back on the throne.

Title: Turkish Delight
Description: A young love faces with old problems.

Title: Pathology
Description: A group of medical students devise a deadly game: to see which one of them can commit the perfect murder.

Title: Holidays
Description: 'Holidays' is an anthology feature film that puts a uniquely dark and original spin on some of the most iconic and beloved holidays of all time by challenging our folklore, traditions and assumptions.

Title: Collide
Description: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Cologne high-speed Autobahn.

Title: Bang Bang
Description: A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

Title: Flipper
Description: A teenage boy sent to spend the summer with his eccentric uncle on the Florida coast befriends a remarkable dolphin and takes on local bad guys who are polluting the water.

Title: In the Blood
Description: When her husband goes missing during their Caribbean vacation, a woman sets off on her own to take down the men she thinks are responsible.

Title: The Pirates of Penzance
Description: After a young man leaves a band of pirates, hilarity ensues.

Title: Winter Kills
Description: The younger brother of an assassinated US President is led down a rabbit hole of conspiracies and dead ends after learning of a man claiming to be the real shooter.

Title: The Black Kaiser
Description: The Black Kaiser known as the world's most lethal hitman, uncovers a deadly conspiracy protecting a powerful syndicate of killers, and becomes their number one target.

Title: Then Came You
Description: A lonely widow plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever.

Title: Assassination
Description: The fateful murder of John F. Kennedy re-imagining his death as a hit ordered by Chicago kingpin Sam Giancana as payback for JFK's attempt to undermine the mob after they helped get him elected.

Title: Yara
Description: A determined prosecutor becomes consumed with the case of a missing 13-year-old and goes to extreme lengths to get to the truth. Based on a real case.

Title: Wrecked
Description: A man wakes in a car wreck at the bottom of a ravine and must overcome incredible odds to survive.

Title: Mrs. Miniver
Description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

Title: Two Weeks with Love
Description: The Robinson family are spending two weeks of summer vacation at a resort in the Catskills. Older daughter Patti vies with her friend, Valeria, for the affections of Demi Armendez but Patti is at a disadvantage because her parents think she is too young for boys. But with Patti singing at an amateur show and a dance, her adventures in quest of Armendez ends happily.

Title: Kaboom
Description: A sexually "undeclared" college freshman's clairvoyant/prophetic dreams are the first sign that something very strange is going on involving his classmates -- with him at the center.

Title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
Description: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

Title: Shogun Assassin
Description: When the wife of the Shogun's Decapitator is murdered and he is ordered to commit suicide by the paranoid Shogun, he and his four-year-old son escape and become assassins for hire, embarking on a journey of blood and violent death.

Title: My Best Friend's Birthday
Description: It's Mickey's Birthday and his girlfriend just left him, so that's when his friend Clarence shows him a birthday he'll never forget.

Title: Beautiful Kate
Description: A writer reawakens his childhood trauma from the past when he returns home, at the request of his estranged sister, to grieve their father's impending death.

Title: Motor City
Description: A recently released felon seeks revenge against those who framed him and put him in jail.

Title: Paranoia
Description: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

Title: Pools
Description: Stuck at summer school after a flunked year of college, Kennedy rallies a ragtag crew to go pool-hopping through the lavish estates of Lake Forest. But as secrets spill, a wild night of fun becomes a cathartic journey of self-discovery.

Title: Cash on Demand
Description: A charming but ruthless criminal holds the family of a bank manager hostage as part of a cold-blooded plan to steal 97,000 pounds.

Title: Alison
Description: Raped. Disemboweled. Nearly decapitated. Dumped on the outskirts of a nature reserve, dead - or so they thought. She needed a hero that night, so that's what she became. This is Alison's tale. A tale of monsters, miracles and hope.

Title: O
Description: An update of Shakespeare's 'Othello' with a young cast, set in an upper class prep school, & centered around basketball player Odin.

Title: The Velvet Underground
Description: The Velvet Underground explores the multiple threads that converged to bring together one of the most influential bands in rock and roll.

Title: Skipped Parts
Description: An ungrounded young mother and her thoughtful teenage son are banished to a remote provincial town by her domineering father.

Title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
Description: A married woman and a drifter fall in love and then plot to murder her husband.

Title: A Summer Place
Description: A self-made businessman rekindles a romance with a former flame while their two teenage children begin a romance of their own with drastic consequences for both couples.

Title: Willow Creek
Description: A man and his girlfriend camp in the woods to capture firsthand evidence of Bigfoot.

Title: Churchill
Description: Ninety-six hours before the World War II invasion of Normandy, British Prime Minister Winston Churchill struggles with his severe reservations with Operation Overlord and his increasingly marginalized role in the war effort.

Title: Sex Ed
Description: Eddie lands his first teaching gig at an inner city middle school and finds his highly pubescent pupils are receiving no form of sexual education. Eddie isn't really equipped to teach them...he's not exactly experienced romantically.

Title: Scarlet Innocence
Description: Small-town girl Deokee is abandoned by university professor Hak-kyu after a lusty affair and vengefully approaches him 8 years later when he starts suffering from blindness.

Title: Takva
Description: A promotion brings a Muslim's relationship with God into question.

Title: Maxine's Baby: The Tyler Perry Story
Description: An intimate portrait of Tyler Perry and his harrowing but faithful road to the top of an industry that didn't always include him.

Title: Baby Doll
Description: An immature child bride holds her anxious husband at bay while flirting with an amorous Sicilian farmer.

Title: Love in Taipei
Description: A young woman's cultural immersion program in Taiwan turns out to be a liberating free-for-all known as "Loveboat" where unexpected romance leads her to question her future.

Title: Grande école
Description: Paul and Agnes have been going out for quite a while and Agnes is shocked to learn that he'd rather live with two roommates on campus than move in with her. As soon as he meets one of his roommates, Louis-Anault, Paul's behavior changes - he is attracted to Louis without realizing so himself. Agnes, on the other hand, gets quite jealous and offers a bet: Whoever gets to have Louis-Anault first, wins... If she does, Paul will no longer explore his homosexual desires, if he does - she'll walk away. Meanwhile, Paul meets Mecir, a young Arab worker, who shows him there's more to life than elite colleges...

Title: Time to Hunt
Description: In the near future, a financial crisis will hit Korea and slums arise. From those areas, a group of young people commit crime to survive.

Title: Von Ryan's Express
Description: An American POW leads a group of mainly British prisoners to escape from the Germans in WWII.

Title: Highwaymen
Description: Rennie Cray (Caviezel) embarks on a bloodthirsty rampage to avenge the death of his wife who was struck down by a serial killer - a man who hunts and kills women using his '72 El Dorado.

Title: The Abominable Dr. Phibes
Description: Doctor, scientist, organist, and biblical scholar Anton Phibes seeks revenge on the nine doctors he considers responsible for the death of his wife.

Title: Melancholie der Engel
Description: Two friends meet again to share their last days in an old house where everything happened a long time ago. They gather a group of people, which results in a disastrous turn of events, during which reveals the deepest human depths.

Title: Seduction
Description: Giuseppe commits to love a woman he hasn't seen in 15 years, amid dangers of seduction from her daughter.

Title: Rushed
Description: Barbara O'Brien, an Irish Catholic mother, has her life turned upside-down when her son, a freshman in college, is involved in a tragic hazing incident.

Title: The Reef: Stalked
Description: After her sister's murder, Nic, her younger sister and two friends seek solace through a Pacific island kayaking adventure. Hours into the trip the women are stalked by a shark and must band together, face their fears and save each other.

Title: Inferno
Description: A man (JCVD) drives out in the desert where some men steal his motorcycle and leave him for dead. He survives and no longer thinks of suicide as he now has a purpose in life: revenge and getting his bike back.

Title: Scarlet Street
Description: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, though her fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.

Title: How to Be a Latin Lover
Description: Finding himself dumped after twenty-five years of marriage, a man who made a career of seducing rich older women must move in with his estranged sister, where he begins to learn the value of family.

Title: Walking with Dinosaurs 3D
Description: See and feel what it was like when dinosaurs ruled the Earth, in a story where an underdog dino triumphs to become a hero for the ages.

Title: A Week Away
Description: With nowhere left to go, Will Hawkins finds himself at camp for the first time. His instinct is to run, but he finds a friend, a father figure, and even a girl who awakens his heart. Most of all, he finally finds a home.

Title: The Adventures of the Wilderness Family
Description: A family flees the city for the wilderness. They learn to live with nature and more importantly, that when one has family, one has everything.

Title: American Virgin
Description: A night of debauchery threatens a sexually abstinent student's college standing.

Title: The Past
Description: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.

Title: The Psychopath Life Coach
Description: The journey and life story of criminal turned life coach Lewis Raymond Taylor.

Title: Dashcam
Description: Two friends embark on a horror-fueled road trip and livestream the most terrifying night of their lives.

Title: 5 Herë Jo
Description: On the biggest television in the country, Jora (Bora) is in competition with Klara, another television producer, and both are willing to do anything to win the project, even with a shot under the belt.

Title: Bliss
Description: In a world where their femininity is considered a commodity, two sex workers fall in love with each other. Together - and yet each on her own - they experience the one moment when happiness seems possible - but their love is threatened by different ideas of life and their own abysses.

Title: Meet the Browns
Description: A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father--a man she never met--and she and her clan meet the crass, fun-loving Brown family.

Title: License to Wed
Description: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

Title: Heart Like a Wheel
Description: Shirley Muldowney is determined to be a top-fuel drag racer, although no woman has ever raced them before. Despite the high risks of this kind of racing and the burden it places on her family life, she perseveres in her dream.

Title: Everything Is Illuminated
Description: A young Jewish American man, with the help of an eccentric local, endeavors to find the woman who saved his grandfather during World War II in a Ukrainian village that was ultimately razed by the Nazis.

Title: Transit
Description: A man attempting to escape occupied France falls in love with the wife of a dead author whose identity he has assumed.

Title: Fortress
Description: After being kidnapped for ransom by four criminals, a schoolteacher and her students flee into a cave and build fortifications in anticipation of a decisive battle with their captors.

Title: Fin
Description: Eli Roth and a professional group of scientists, researchers and activists sail around the globe to unveil the truth behind the death of millions of sharks.

Title: Battle in Heaven
Description: Marcos lusts after his boss's promiscuous daughter, but after botching an extortion scheme, he becomes wracked with guilt.

Title: Goya's Ghosts
Description: Painter Francisco Goya faces a scandal involving his muse, who is labeled a heretic by a monk.

Title: Sleuth
Description: On his sprawling country estate, an aging writer matches wits with the struggling actor who has stolen his wife's heart.

Title: Vanguard
Description: Covert security company Vanguard is the last hope of survival for an accountant after he is targeted by the world's deadliest mercenary organization.

Title: The Mole: Undercover in North Korea
Description: A real-life undercover thriller about two ordinary men who embark on an outrageously dangerous ten-year mission to penetrate the world's most secretive and brutal dictatorship: North Korea.

Title: Abominable
Description: A man, crippled in a climbing accident, returns to his cabin in the woods as part of his rehabilitation, but he wasn't prepared for the immanent onslaught.

Title: Cube
Description: In this remake without remembering how they got there, several strangers awaken in a prison of cubic cells, some of them booby-trapped. The prisoners must use their combined skills if they are to escape.

Title: Mortal Thoughts
Description: Two detectives interrogate a hairdresser on two homicides she may or may not have been involved in.

Title: Fraternity Vacation
Description: Two fraternity brothers take advantage of their nerdy pledge's generous parents to spend time with him in Palm Springs and encourage him to mingle with girls, but things don't go as planned when they run into rival fraternity members.

Title: The Shipping News
Description: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

Title: No Man of God
Description: The complicated relationship that formed between the FBI analyst Bill Hagmaier and serial killer Bundy during Bundy's final years on death row.

Title: Copenhagen
Description: When the girl of your dreams is half your age, it's time to grow up.

Title: Undateable John
Description: A slacker surf instructor, who's on and off the wagon, gets his life together when he falls for a beautiful but troubled young woman he meets in Alcoholics Anonymous. A Romantic Dramedy.

Title: The Naked Gun
Description: Follows the misadventures of Detective Frank Drebin's son, Frank Drebin jr. A sequel to "Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult".

Title: Wide Open
Description: A philandering cab driver decides to help his girlfriend's attractive sister, who is in trouble with drug dealers.

Title: The Phenomenon
Description: This documentary examines unidentified aerial phenomenon. With testimony from high-ranking government officials, and NASA Astronauts, Senator Harry Reid says it "makes the incredible credible."

Title: Amundsen
Description: The life and adventures of Norwegian explorer Roald Amundsen, the first man to arrive on the South Pole.

Title: As Tears Go By
Description: Mid-level gangster Wah falls in love with his beautiful cousin, but must also continue to protect his volatile partner-in-crime and friend, Fly.

Title: Delirious
Description: A soap opera writer gets hit on the head and wakes up as a character in his own show.

Title: Horrorscope
Description: A group of college friends begin dying in ways connected to their fortunes after getting their horoscopes read.

Title: Uncle Kent
Description: A pothead kid's show cartoonist in Los Angeles spends a weekend trying to sleep with his visiting house guest - a woman from New York who he met on Chatroulette.

Title: Down and Out in Beverly Hills
Description: A rich but troubled family find their lives altered by the arrival of a vagrant who tries to drown himself in their swimming pool.

Title: Tideland
Description: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

Title: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
Description: A tug-of-war between Elmo and his friend sends his blanket to faraway Grouchland, a place full of grouchy creatures and the villainous Huxley. Elmo embarks on a rescue mission, learning important lessons about sharing and responsibility.

Title: Twentynine Palms
Description: David, an American photographer, and his Russian girlfriend Katia are scouting locations for a photo shoot. During the day, they drive through some of the wildest, most bizarre desert landscapes, but their luck begins to run out.

Title: The Astronaut's Wife
Description: After an explosion in space and subsequent two-minute radio-out period, two astronauts return home to their wives. Slightly it's revealed that they're not the same as they were.

Title: Under Her Control
Description: When a fashion employee thinks she will have to end her promising career after getting pregnant, her boss offers to adopt the child.

Title: Come Back to the 5 & Dime Jimmy Dean, Jimmy Dean
Description: A fan club of die-hard James Dean fans meet on the 20th anniversary of his death and reconnect, opening old wounds and facing new ones.

Title: Corpus Christi
Description: Daniel experiences a spiritual transformation in a detention center. Although his criminal record prevents him from applying to the seminary, he has no intention of giving up his dream and decides to minister a small-town parish.

Title: The Absent Minded Professor
Description: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

Title: The Spy
Description: Sonja Wigert is a diva and star in Stockholm when WW2 breaks out, rapidly getting attention from the Nazi officer Josef Terboven. She's then recruited by Swedish intelligence as a spy, but Terboven makes her spy on the Swedes.

Title: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2
Description: A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.

Title: Our Secret Diary
Description: One day, Nozomi Kuroda finds a love letter in her desk from the most popular boy at school, Jun Setoyama. Though embarrassed and puzzled, a secret exchange diary between the two begins when she puts her reply in the shoebox.

Title: The Paper Chase
Description: A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and a woman, unaware that she has a connection that affects their relationship.

Title: Percy Jackson and the Titan's Curse
Description: This is a fan-made film based on the Percy Jackson series by Rick Riordan. This third adventure in the series finds Percy faced with his most dangerous challenge yet: The chilling prophecy of The Titan's Curse.

Title: Project 'Gemini'
Description: A sci-fi thriller about a space mission sent to terraform a distant planet. However, the mission encounters something unknown that has its own plan for the planet.

Title: Addicted to Love
Description: Maggie's and Sam's former partners are in love; she wants revenge and he wants his lost love back, so they work together to break up the happy couple.

Title: The Sacrament
Description: A news team trails a man as he travels into the world of Eden Parish to find his missing sister, where it becomes apparent that this paradise may not be as it seems.

Title: The Dark Side of the Moon
Description: In 2022, a repair crew is sent to fix an orbital weapon but their spaceship malfunctions and ends up heading towards the dark side of the moon. There, in a mysterious, seemingly abandoned space shuttle, a sinister force lies in wait.

Title: The Lazarus Project
Description: A paroled former criminal is drawn into an endeavor that puts life with his family at risk and subsequently finds himself living an inexplicable new life working at a psychiatric facility.

Title: Stake Land
Description: In a world of vampires, an expert vampire hunter and his young protégé travel toward sanctuary.

Title: Highlander: Endgame
Description: Immortals Connor and Duncan MacLeod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.

Title: Where the Boys Are
Description: Four very different college girls drive to Fort Lauderdale, Florida for spring break and seek out various adventures and romance for themselves.

Title: Blood for Dracula
Description: An ailing vampire count travels to Italy with his servant to find a bride.

Title: The Sheltering Sky
Description: An American couple travel abroad to revitalize their relationship. But as the trip drags on, their attempt at recovering what they once had seems futile.

Title: Innocent Blood
Description: Marie is a vampire with a thirst for bad guys. When she fails to properly dispose of one of her victims, a violent mob boss, she bites off more than she can chew and faces a new, immortal danger.

Title: Rules Don't Apply
Description: The unconventional love story of an aspiring actress, her ambitious driver, and their eccentric boss, the legendary billionaire Howard Hughes.

Title: The Earthling
Description: Diagnosed with a terminal form of cancer, Patrick Foley has returned to his native Australia to die in the peace and quiet of the wilderness. His simple plan is complicated, however, when he meets a young boy who has just lost his parents.

Title: The Maestro
Description: After the Second World War, budding film composer Jerry Herst moves to Hollywood to study with infamous master teacher Mario Castelnuovo-Tedesco.

Title: Tangerines
Description: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man, Ivo, has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

Title: Infamous
Description: While researching his novel "In Cold Blood", Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

Title: Oh, Ramona!
Description: A teenager named Andrei transitions from a teenager into an adult.

Title: Locked Down
Description: A couple attempts a high-risk, high-stakes jewelry heist at a department store.

Title: Montana Story
Description: Two estranged siblings return home to the sprawling ranch they once knew and loved, confronting a deep and bitter family legacy against a mythic American backdrop.

Title: Deep End
Description: 15-year-old dropout Mike takes a job at Newford Baths, where inappropriate sexual behaviour abounds, and becomes obsessed with his coworker Susan.

Title: What Just Happened
Description: Two weeks in the life of a fading Hollywood producer who's having a rough time trying to get his new picture made.

Title: Rise
Description: Based on the real life story about the family that produced the first trio of brothers to become NBA champions in the history of the league.

Title: Falling in Love Like in Movies
Description: Bagus, a screenwriter, reunites with his high school friend and crush, Hana, who is still grieving from the loss of her husband. He wants to convince her to fall in love once again, just like in the movies.

Title: Ludwig
Description: The reign of the tormented Ludwig, king of Bavaria, from 1864 to 1886.

Title: Lilies of the Field
Description: A travelling handyman becomes the answer to the prayers of nuns who wish to build a chapel in the desert.

Title: Topaz
Description: A French Intelligence Agent becomes embroiled in the Cold War politics first with uncovering the events leading up to the 1962 Cuban Missile Crisis, and then back to France to break up an international Russian spy ring.

Title: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
Description: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

Title: Conversations with Other Women
Description: When a man and woman flirt with each other at a wedding reception, the sexual tension seems spontaneous. As they break from the party to a hotel room, the flirtation turns into a night filled with passion and remorse.

Title: The Rage: Carrie 2
Description: A horrible massacre strikes up after an outcast teenage girl is taunted by a group of high school jocks, all of them unaware of her cutthroat telekinetic powers.

Title: Snow Day
Description: Your family is in for a flurry of fun with Snow Day, a musical reimagining of the beloved classic comedy film that follows a group of kids who discover that anything is possible when you break routines and take giant risks.

Title: I Can Do Bad All by Myself
Description: When Madea catches sixteen-year-old Jennifer and her two younger brothers looting her home, she decides to take matters into her own hands.

Title: Dudes & Dragons
Description: An evil wizard, Lord Tensley, seeks the hand and heart of the beautiful princess, Lady Ennogard. When she refuses, he locks her away and releases a deadly dragon, which he controls, to terrorize the land. He vows that, until she accepts his love, his dragon will destroy all who dare display any sign of love throughout the kingdom. Desperate to end the tyranny, she sends an enchanted dragonfly with a mission to find a true "Dragon Warrior" who is fit to release her from her captor and stop the destruction of the dragon. Meanwhile a young warrior, Camilan, braves the attacks of the Dragon and plans to marry his true love, the elf princess Larec. But his parents refuse to give their blessing, as marrying outside of their race would forfeit the family birthright. His only hope is to find a wife for his estranged older brother Ramicus, a rogue bounty hunter. But convincing the wild-hearted Ramicus to settle down and secure the family's inheritance seems a feat as impossible as any heroic quest. Camilan reunites with his brother with the hope that he will be able to soften his heart. His attempts are in vain until Lady Ennogard's dragonfly reaches their camp and relays her call of distress. Enamored by her beauty and lured by the promise of wealth, Ramicus agrees to take on the heroic task. So Ramicus and his Orc sidekick Shokdor, and Camilan and his loyal squire Samton, set off on a journey to rescue Lady Ennogard and put an end to the dragon and the evil reign of the powerful Lord Tensley.

Title: In Hell
Description: A man must survive a prison where hardened criminals battle to the death for the wardens' entertainment.

Title: Irma Vep
Description: A Hong Kong actress, Maggie Cheung playing a fictional version of herself, is cast in France to star in a remake of Les vampires (1915), but petty intrigues and clashing egos plague the production.

Title: Psycho Goreman
Description: After unearthing a gem that controls an evil monster looking to destroy the Universe, a young girl and her brother use it to make him do their bidding.

Title: Angry Neighbors
Description: A grumpy novelist vows revenge when his wealthy neighbor builds a hideous mega-mansion next door.

Title: The Perfect Match
Description: A playboy named Charlie, convinced that all his relationships are dead, meets the beautiful and mysterious Eva. Agreeing to a casual affair, Charlie then wants a bit more from their relationship.

Title: Breaker Morant
Description: Three Australian lieutenants are court martialed for executing prisoners as a way of deflecting attention from war crimes committed by their superior officers.

Title: Håndtering av udøde
Description: On a hot summer day in Oslo, the dead mysteriously awaken, and three families are thrown into chaos when their deceased loved ones come back to them. Who are they, and what do they want?

Title: Robot Holocaust
Description: A highly unlikely band of heroes traverses a post-apocalyptic wasteland to rescue a scientist from the tyrannical Dark One and his army of robots.

Title: Last Year at Marienbad
Description: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

Title: Biker Boyz
Description: A son of the leader of a legendary group of an urban biker gang tries to retain his championship title.

Title: Dreamer
Description: Cale Crane catalyzes the rescue and rehabilitation of Sonador, a race horse with a broken leg.

Title: Tales from Pandora's Box 3
Description: A collection of mind-twisting, out-of-this-world tales from the UK Film Production Studio that brought you Tainted Love, The Lorelei, and other unique feature films. You will be enthralled, bewitched, and stunned.

Title: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
Description: Stories about three very different women and the men they attract.

Title: Frantz
Description: In the aftermath of WWI, a young German who grieves the death of her fiancé in France meets a mysterious Frenchman who visits the fiancé's grave to lay flowers.

Title: Seven Minutes in Heaven
Description: When her father goes out of town, beautiful A-student Natalie lets best friends Jeff and Polly move in. Separately and together, the trio of young teens learn much about life, love, and growing up.

Title: RDX: Robert Dony Xavier
Description: The life of three mysterious individuals take a turn as their faces gets exposed.

Title: Kiss of Death
Description: Nick Bianco is caught during a botched jewelry heist. The district attorney offers him a more lenient sentence if he squeals on his accomplices but he refuses to make a deal. Three years into the sentence, an event changes his mind.

Title: Heads of State
Description: Keep Under Wraps

Title: Never Goin' Back
Description: Jessie and Angela, high school dropouts, are taking a week off to chill at the beach. Too bad their house got robbed, rent's due, they're about to get fired, and they're broke.

Title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
Description: The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972.

Title: Narc
Description: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

Title: Mary and the Witch's Flower
Description: Based on "The Little Broomstick" by Mary Stewart, a strange flower grants a girl magic powers.

Title: Yule Log
Description: Two friends take a buddy to a cabin and unknowingly burn wood from a tree on a mound once used to burn a powerful witch. The cursed timber re-awakens dark spirits, forcing them to fight for their lives during the Night of Mothers.

Title: Agent
Description: A spy with a mysterious past, who is on a mission to uncover the truth about a dangerous terrorist organization.

Title: Sanjuro
Description: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen trying to save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

Title: La Llorona
Description: An aging paranoid war criminal, protected by his faithful wife, faces death while being haunted by the ghosts of his past.

Title: Rugrats in Paris
Description: While on a family vacation in Paris, the Rugrats attempt to help Chuckie find a new mom while stopping his dad from marrying a conniving businesswoman who hates kids.

Title: Revolution
Description: A trapper and his young son get pulled into the American revolution early as unwilling participants and remain involved through to the end.

Title: Rock & Rule
Description: A malevolent rock star kidnaps a singer to force her to participate in the summoning of a demon, and her band must help her stop him.

Title: Bamboozled
Description: A frustrated African-American TV writer proposes a blackface minstrel show in protest, but to his chagrin, it becomes a hit.

Title: A Civil Action
Description: A tenacious lawyer takes on a case involving two companies responsible for causing several children to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's water supply being contaminated, at the risk of bankrupting his firm and career.

Title: Valiant
Description: At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon (Tim Curry) and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?

Title: Girl
Description: A young woman returns to her small hometown intent on killing her abusive father only to discover someone murdered him the day before. As the girl searches for answers, she uncovers a family legacy more dangerous than she'd imagined.

Title: Consenting Adults
Description: During a joint dinner at the restaurant, the neighbors offer to exchange wives for one night. It was a joke, but only at first.

Title: Marshland
Description: Two cops lost in the deep south of Spain. One serial killer to catch. A lot of secrets and lies to disclose.

Title: Burke and Hare
Description: A black comedy about two 19th-century grave robbers who find a lucrative business providing cadavers for an Edinburgh medical school.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Tsuzumi Mansion Arc
Description: Tanjiro ventures to the south-southeast where he encounters a cowardly young man named Zenitsu Agatsuma. He is a fellow survivor from Final Selection and his sparrow asks Tanjiro to help keep him in line.

Title: A Dogwalker's Christmas Tale
Description: Luce is a college student who gets a holiday job caring for a land developer's dog, but then she meets an attractive guy who is protesting her boss's plan to tear down their local dog park and turn it into a spa.

Title: Kamasutra 3D
Description: A young and beautiful Indian princess sets out on a voyage in search of her husband.

Title: White Heat
Description: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

Title: Where the Devil Roams
Description: Traces a family of murderous sideshow performers as it travels around the world on the dying carnival circuit.

Title: The One and Only
Description: When handyman Niller comes to install Sus' new kitchen one day, their immediate crush is a sweet escape from both of their problematic relationships.

Title: Gator
Description: Agents force a former con man to help them nab a corrupt politician.

Title: The Yin-Yang Master: Dream of Eternity
Description: Qing Ming, the Yin-Yang Master, took his master's last wish and went to the Captial Tiandu City to attend the heaven ceremony.

Title: Levon's Trade
Description: He wants to live a simple life and be a good father to his daughter. But when his boss's teenage daughter Jenny vanishes, he's called upon to re-employ the skills that made him a legendary figure in the shadowy world of black ops.

Title: Coven
Description: Basque Country, 1609. The men of the region are at sea and Amaia takes part for the first time in the nightly dances in the woods with the other villager girls. She is only 20. At dawn, they are all arrested.

Title: Scenes from a Marriage
Description: Scenes from a Marriage chronicles the many years of love and turmoil that bind Marianne (Liv Ullmann) and Johan (Erland Josephson) through matrimony, infidelity, divorce, and subsequent partners.

Title: Fun Mom Dinner
Description: Four moms whose only common ground is their kids' preschool class, decide to get together for a harmless "fun mom dinner."

Title: Initial D
Description: After winning his first competition, Takumi focuses his attention on drift racing, a sport he has unknowingly perfected while delivering tofu in his father's Toyota AE86.

Title: Destroy All Neighbors
Description: Struggling prog-rock musician William Brown finds himself in a living nightmare when he accidentally kills Vlad, the neighbor from hell.

Title: Silk Road
Description: Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down.

Title: Sherlock Jr.
Description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

Title: Ayla: The Daughter of War
Description: Sergeant Süleyman finds a little girl on a battlefield during the Korean War. He takes her and names her Ayla. Fifteen months later, Süleyman's brigade is told they will be returning to Turkey, and he is reluctant to leave her behind.

Title: Highlander: The Final Dimension
Description: Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.

Title: Wolfen
Description: A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.

Title: Fireheart
Description: Sixteen-year-old Georgia Nolan dreams of being the world's first-ever female firefighter. When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New York's firemen begin vanishing. The Mayor of New York calls Georgia's father Shawn out of retirement to lead the investigation into the disappearances. Desperate to help her father and save her city, Georgia disguises herself as a young man called "Joe" and joins a small group of misfit firefighters trying to stop the arsonist.

Title: Where Hands Touch
Description: A rites of passage story of a bi-racial teen struggling for survival in Nazi Germany.

Title: Gnome Alone
Description: When Chloe discovers that her new home's garden gnomes are not what they seem, she must decide between the pursuit of a desired high school life and taking up the fight against the Troggs.

Title: Dinner in America
Description: An on-the-lam punk rocker and a young woman obsessed with his band unexpectedly fall in love and go on an epic journey together through America's decaying Midwestern suburbs.

Title: The Tutor
Description: Mona picks up her first job tutoring two orphaned children living in a derelict house in the country. Her obsession with trying to educate these two nearly feral children blind her to the fact they have other plans for her.

Title: A Jenkins Family Christmas
Description: After burying their father earlier in the year, two sisters must make Christmas happen without getting into arguments, but an unexpected twist arrive at the festivities.

Title: The Prince
Description: All the world's a stage and Jen and Sam have learned the hard way, being trapped in a Shakespearean multiverse. On their quest to discover the doorway back to reality they notice something unusual about Henry 'Hotspur' Percy

Title: Morvern Callar
Description: After her beloved boyfriend's suicide, a mourning supermarket worker and her best friend hit the road in Scotland, but find that grief is something that you can't run away from forever.

Title: Flaming Star
Description: When fighting breaks out between two cultures in West Texas, the mixed-blood Pacer tries to act as a peacemaker, but the "flaming star of death" pulls him irrevocably into the deadly violence.

Title: Planet Dune
Description: A crew on a mission to rescue a marooned base on a desert planet turns deadly when the crew finds themselves hunted and attacked by the planet's apex predators: giant sand worms.

Title: Wings
Description: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

Title: Opera
Description: A young opera singer is stalked by a deranged fan bent on killing the people associated with her to claim her for himself.

Title: Eraser: Reborn
Description: It is based on U.S. Marshal Mason Pollard who is specialized in engineering the fake deaths of witnesses that leaves no trace of their existence.

Title: Schoolgirl Report Part 5: What All Parents Should Know
Description: Six more first-hand accounts of sexual awakening amongst school girls in the early Seventies - some with a happy end, some without.

Title: The Barefoot Contessa
Description: This is the life of a Hollywood movie star named Maria, as told by writer/director Harry Dawes, from being discovered in Madrid, Spain, until her funeral in Italy.

Title: Bowling for Columbine
Description: Filmmaker Michael Moore explores the roots of America's predilection for gun violence.

Title: Last Train from Gun Hill
Description: A marshal tries to bring the son of an old friend, an autocratic cattle baron, to justice for his role in the rape and murder of the marshal's Native American wife.

Title: Department Q: The Absent One
Description: The murder of young twins initially implicates a group of upper class students as the killers, though the case takes a turn or two from its starting point.

Title: Man of Tai Chi
Description: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.

Title: Trail of the Pink Panther
Description: Journalist Marie Jouvet attempts to uncover the mysterious disappearance of Chief Inspector Jacques Clouseau.

Title: French Connection II
Description: "Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.

Title: Jodhaa Akbar
Description: A sixteenth century love story about a marriage of alliance that gave birth to true love between a great Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Rajput princess, Jodha.

Title: Duplex
Description: A young couple has a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in the perfect New York neighborhood. All they have to do is bump off the current tenant, a cute little old lady.

Title: The Machine
Description: In efforts to construct perfect android killing machines in a war against China, UK scientists exceed their goal and create a sentient robot.

Title: My Best Friend's Girl
Description: Tank faces the ultimate test of friendship when his best friend hires him to take his ex-girlfriend out on a lousy date in order to make her realize how great her former boyfriend is.

Title: Bigger
Description: The inspirational tale of the grandfathers of fitness as we now know it, Joe and Ben Weider. Facing anti-Semitism and extreme poverty, the brothers beat all odds to build an empire and inspire future generations.

Title: Five Nights at Freddy's 4
Description: One day, a boy goes to Freddy Fazbear's pizzeria. The next day, strange things happen. A package arrives at your house, an invitation to an anonymous birthday party. Things lurk at night at Freddy Fazbear's.

Title: To the Devil a Daughter
Description: An American occult novelist battles to save the soul of a young girl from a group of Satanists, led by an excommunicated priest, who plan on using her as the representative of the Devil on Earth.

Title: The Fabulous Four
Description: It tells the story of two friends who travel to be bridesmaids in a surprise wedding of their college girlfriend.

Title: Cinnamon
Description: After a robbery gone wrong, two young lovers are caught in a deadly series of events that threaten to destroy their dreams of a better life.

Title: Unhuman
Description: A group of high school students whose school bus crashes on a field trip. Relationships are tested once they realize they are being stalked by an attacker who intends to drive them out and straight into a horrifying fight to survive.

Title: Mussum, O Filmis
Description: The story of Brazilian comedian Mussum, from his start performing samba to his breakthrough in film and TV comedy.

Title: Lilla Jönssonligan på styva linan
Description: It is summer holidays in the late 1950s and a fun fair comes to Wall-Entuna. All children obviously want to go there including Lilla Jönssonligan. Sickan then obviously has a plan for how to get hold of hundreds of "free tickets".

Title: Megaboa
Description: A group of college students head into the rainforest to look for cave drawings. But a once thought to be extinct fifty-foot boa constrictor is out hungry for blood.

Title: Brainscan
Description: A teenager is part of an interactive video game where he kills innocent victims. Later, the murders become real.

Title: Jolene
Description: A teenage orphan spends ten years traveling cross-country experiencing life, love and heartbreak.

Title: Flesh for Frankenstein
Description: Baron Frankenstein creates two "zombies" - one male, one female - planning to mate them in order to create a master race.

Title: Suicide Club
Description: A detective is trying to find the cause of a string of suicides.

Title: Silo
Description: Disaster strikes when teenage Cody becomes the victim of a grain entrapment accident.

Title: Killer Workout
Description: Two years ago, a young woman named Valerie was burned after entering a tanning salon. Now, her twin sister, Rhonda, runs a local gym where, all of a sudden, people are being murdered.

Title: Immanence
Description: Radio astronomers discover a mysterious signal in the deep sea that could be contact with extraterrestrials. After several terrifying manifestations threaten their beliefs, the team must fight to survive the ultimate evil.

Title: My Sole Desire
Description: Have you ever been to a strip club? But you've already wanted to - at least once - you didn't dare, that's all. This film tells the story of someone who dared

Title: Xtro
Description: An alien creature impregnates a woman who gives birth to a man who was abducted by aliens three years ago. The man reconnects with his wife and son for a sinister purpose.

Title: Primary Colors
Description: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the United States of America.

Title: A Madea Family Funeral
Description: A joyous family reunion becomes a hilarious nightmare as Madea and the crew travel to backwoods Georgia, where they find themselves unexpectedly planning a funeral that might unveil unsavory family secrets.

Title: Tomorrow, When the War Began
Description: When their country is invaded and their families are taken, eight unlikely teenagers band together to fight.

Title: I'm No Longer Here
Description: In Monterrey, Mexico, a young street gang spends their days dancing to slowed-down cumbia and attending parties. After a mix-up with a local cartel, their leader is forced to migrate to the U.S. but quickly longs to return home.

Title: Home for Christmas
Description: The film looks at those who are desperately trying to connect or reconnect with their families, friends, or anyone who will listen.

Title: Caddyshack II
Description: When a crass new-money tycoon's membership application is turned down at a snooty country club, he retaliates by buying the club and turning it into a tacky amusement park.

Title: Here After
Description: A dark fantasy-comedy about the meaning of love in the afterlife.

Title: Space Oddity
Description: A man seeks the help from an insurance company to plan a one-way trip to Mars.

Title: Message from the King
Description: Jacob King, a mysterious outsider from South Africa, arrives in Los Angeles to look for his missing younger sister.

Title: The Champion
Description: The story of the pre-war boxing champion Tadeusz "Teddy" Pietrzykowski, who in 1940 arrives with the first transport of prisoners to the newly created Auschwitz concentration camp.

Title: The Beach Girls
Description: Two young women convince their reluctant friend to open up her rich uncle's beach house for the summer to party, and invite all their friends.

Title: Iraivan
Description: A city lives in fear of a psychotic killer, and confidence in the police wanes. Arjun and Andrew finally arrest the killer, but he escapes and chaos reigns again.

Title: Cats Don't Dance
Description: Danny, an ambitious singing and dancing cat, goes to Hollywood and overcomes several obstacles to fulfill his dream of becoming a movie star.

Title: The Harbinger
Description: Monique ventures out of quarantine to visit an old friend who's plagued by nightmares. She finds herself drawn into a hellish dreamscape where she must face her greatest fears - or risk never having existed at all.

Title: Faust
Description: A man sells his soul to the devil to gain superpowers and avenge his girlfriend's brutal murder. When he realizes that the price is the soul of his new love interest, he turns on the devil.

Title: Emmanuelle IV
Description: In order to escape from her former lover Marc, Sylvia goes to Brazil where Dr. Santamo transforms her into the beautiful Emmanuelle. With this new identity comes a sexual awakening which is complicated by her memories of Marc. As with other entries in this series, the plot twists provide ample opportunities to expose the characters.

Title: The Reaping
Description: A former Christian missionary, who specializes in debunking religious phenomena, investigates a small town which seems to be suffering from the 10 biblical plagues.

Title: Apollo 11
Description: A look at the Apollo 11 mission to land on the moon led by commander Neil Armstrong and pilots Buzz Aldrin and Mike Collins.

Title: Stone
Description: A convicted arsonist looks to manipulate a parole officer into a plan to secure his parole by placing his beautiful wife in the lawman's path.

Title: Dirty Pretty Things
Description: Irregular migrants Okwe and Senay work at a posh London hotel and live in constant fear of deportation. One night Okwe stumbles across evidence of a bizarre murder, setting off a series of events that could lead to disaster or freedom.

Title: What Josiah Saw
Description: A family with buried secrets reunite at a farmhouse after two decades to pay for their past sins.

Title: Follow That Bird
Description: Big Bird is sent to live far from Sesame Street by a pesky social worker named Miss Finch. Unhappy, he runs away from there, prompting the rest of the Sesame Street gang to go on a cross-country journey to find him.

Title: Killshot
Description: Beautiful Carmen Colson and her ironworker husband Wayne are placed in the Federal Witness Protection program after witnessing an "incident". Thinking they are at last safe, they are targeted by an experienced hit man and a psychopathic young upstart killer. The ensuing struggle will test Carmen to the limit.

Title: Capturing the Friedmans
Description: Documentary on the Friedmans, a seemingly typical, upper-middle-class Jewish family whose world is instantly transformed when the father and his youngest son are arrested and charged with shocking and horrible crimes.

Title: The Candy Snatchers
Description: A mute and autistic little boy stumbles upon a teenage girl who has been kidnapped by three young psychopathic criminals who are intent on extorting diamonds from her rich stepfather.

Title: Tom Horn
Description: An ex-army scout is hired by ranchers to kill cattle rustlers but he gets into trouble with the corrupt local officials when he's suspected of killing a boy.

Title: Lipstick
Description: A top fashion model seeks justice after she is brutally raped by her teenage sister's music teacher.

Title: The Origin of Evil
Description: A woman on the verge of financial collapse attempts to reconnect with her wealthy, estranged father and his new family.

Title: Back to the Beach
Description: Frankie and Annette, having grown up and put aside their beach-partying lifestyle, visit their daughter in Southern California and discover there's still some wild times left in them.

Title: Van Wilder: The Rise of Taj
Description: Taj Mahal Badalandabad leaves Coolidge College behind for the halls of Camford University in England, where he looks to continue his education, and teach an uptight student how to make the most out of her academic career.

Title: Area 51
Description: Three young conspiracy theorists attempt to uncover the mysteries of Area 51, the government's secret location rumored to have hosted encounters with alien beings. What they find at this hidden facility exposes unimaginable secrets.

Title: City Hunter
Description: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.

Title: Trespass
Description: Two firemen in a burning building get a treasure map - stolen gold church items are hidden in a closed down factory in St. Louis. Once there, they're trapped in by a black gang considering it their territory.

Title: The Bear
Description: An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.

Title: The After Party
Description: When an aspiring rapper goes viral for all the wrong reasons, he thinks his career is over. But when his best friend gets them into a wild NYC after party, he gets one more chance to make the impossible happen.

Title: Confession
Description: A story about a man who has been pointed out as the culprit of a locked-room murder and his lawyer approaching the truth.

Title: Santa in Training
Description: A little known secret is that every 30 years a new Santa Claus is chosen to replace present Santa. So what could go wrong when two eccentric elves are sent to bring back and train a man who says he hates Christmas? Just about everything.

Title: The Arena
Description: When the Romans force a group of sex slaves to become gladiatrices, two such fighters - a Nubian dancer and a Gaulish priestess - form an alliance to lead the others in rebellion.

Title: Men & Chicken
Description: Through getting to know their unknown family, two outcast brothers discover a horrible truth about themselves and their relatives.

Title: Kevin Bridges: The Overdue Catch-Up
Description: In his overdue 18-year career comeback tour, Kevin Bridges gives a razor-sharp standup performance poking fun at modern life with his signature wit.

Title: Shoshana
Description: Follows two Brit police officers Thomas Wilkin and Geoffrey Morton in their hunt for charismatic poet and Zionist freedom fighter Avraham Stern, who was plotting to evict British authorities.

Title: Godzilla vs. SpaceGodzilla
Description: Godzilla is threatened by two new forces: Mogera - another UN built machine; and Space Godzilla - a beast spawned from Godzilla's particles in space.

Title: The Raven
Description: A magician, who has been turned into a raven, turns to a former sorcerer for help.

Title: Last Friday
Description: The fourth film in the "Friday" franchise.

Title: 9 Bullets
Description: A burlesque dancer must go on the run to save a neighbor boy whose life is threatened by her ex-lover.

Title: The Jungle Book 2
Description: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.

Title: The Paper
Description: New York City tabloid editor Henry's faced with tough decisions while he faces several serious life challenges, and a tempting job offer.

Title: The Savage
Description: A white boy raised by the Sioux must choose sides when the Sioux threaten to go to war against the Whites.

Title: Nathalie...
Description: A rich woman hires an elite prostitute in order to verify her husband's faithfulness. Before long the experiment gets out of control.

Title: L'Avventura
Description: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

Title: In Love and War
Description: A bitter love story between a talented writer and a gentle nurse.

Title: American Murder: The Family Next Door
Description: In 2018, 34-year-old Shanann Watts and her two young daughters disappear in Colorado. With the heartbreaking details emerging, the family's story made headlines around the world.

Title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Description: UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear from a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job six days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.

Title: The Public Enemy
Description: An Irish-American street punk tries to make it big in the world of organized crime.

Title: Bullhead
Description: Sint-Truiden, Belgium. Jacky, a young cattle farmer who is constantly pumped on steroids and hormones, is approached by a veterinarian to make a deal with a notorious beef trader.

Title: Never Alone for Christmas
Description: When Lauren gets cold feet and calls off her wedding to Miles, neither dreamed they would be forced to spend Christmas alone. By coincidence, each winds up at the same Cajun Christmas retreat, each with someone new on their arms.

Title: Mr. Soft Touch
Description: When he learns that a gangster has taken over his nightclub and murdered his partner, returning WW2 hero Joe Miracle steals the money from the club's safe and hides in a settlement home, while the mob is on his tail.

Title: Finding Michael
Description: Spencer Matthews heads to Everest to try and find his brother Michael who disappeared 23 years ago.

Title: Wherever You Go
Description: A comedy about an Egyptian family in the middle of World War ll inspired by El-Alamein Battle

Title: Losing Control
Description: Kim is suffering from writer's block. A chance encounter with a handsome stranger opens her to a world of risky sexual experimentation. However, she becomes worried when he refuses to say anything about himself.

Title: Savage Island
Description: Women who have been captured and sold as slave labor to a South American emerald mine hatch a plan for revolution and revenge.

Title: The Specials
Description: The story of two men, educators of children and adolescents with autism.

Title: Ru
Description: Based on the Governor General's Award-winning novel by Kim Thúy, Ru is the story of the arduous journey of a wealthy family fleeing from Vietnam, before landing in Quebec.

Title: And Soon the Darkness
Description: A couple of American girls on a bike trip in a remote part of Argentina split, and one goes missing, the other must find her before her worst fears are realized.

Title: The Broken Hearts Gallery
Description: After a break-up, a young woman decides to start a gallery where people can leave trinkets from past relationships.

Title: Triumph of the Will
Description: The infamous propaganda film of the 1934 Nazi Party rally in Nuremberg, Germany.

Title: Where the Tracks End
Description: Georgina is a teacher determined to make a difference in the lives of the children she educates in the classroom of a wagon school in rural Mexico.

Title: Raising Cain
Description: The oncologist wife of a prominent child psychologist suspects her husband has an unhealthy scientific obsession with their child, unaware of what - or who - is really going on inside his head.

Title: Little Death
Description: A middle-aged filmmaker on the verge of a breakthrough. Two kids in search of a lost backpack. A small dog a long way from home.

Title: Death Ship
Description: A mysterious ghostly freighter rams and sinks a modern day cruise ship whose survivors climb aboard the freighter and discover that it is a World War II Nazi torture vessel.

Title: Merrily We Roll Along
Description: "Merrily We Roll Along" follows Franklin Shepard, a talented Broadway composer who abandons his theater career in New York and all his friends in order to produce movies in Los Angeles.

Title: Yung
Description: YUNG is a trip following four young girls into the pulsating and hedonistic subculture of modern day Berlin. But above all, it's a pure, rough and authentic pic about friendship.

Title: Crooklyn
Description: Spike Lee's vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school teacher, her stubborn jazz musician husband and their five kids living in Brooklyn in 1973.

Title: Legend of the Lost
Description: American ne'er-do-well Joe January is hired to take Paul Bonnard on an expedition into the desert in search of treasure.

Title: Ponniyin Selvan: Part Two
Description: Arulmozhi Varman continues on his journey to become Rajaraja I, the greatest ruler of the historic Chola empire of south India.

Title: Climates
Description: Dowdy university instructor Isa is an inattentive husband to his younger, TV-business wife Bahar. Self-absorbed, Isa only communicates in the most rudimentary way, while she, similarly, detaches into crying jags and juvenile behavior.

Title: Esteros
Description: Two boyhood chums, separated soon after sexually awakening together, re-meet as young men with unspoken sexual tensions lying between them.

Title: Mortal Kombat Legends: Scorpion's Revenge
Description: Hanzo Hasashi loses his family during an attack by a rival clan the Lin Kuei. He is given the chance to compete in an inter-dimensional tournament to save his loved ones while other fighters try to save the Earth realm from annihilation.

Title: The Namesake
Description: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways.

Title: Shangri-La Suite
Description: Two young, damaged lovers head to Los Angeles to kill the King of Rock n Roll in the summer of 1974.

Title: The Prototype
Description: A government agent stumbles upon an alien conspiracy to conquer Earth. Using a blue liquid created by the aliens to make soldiers stronger, he becomes The Prototype-the only hope for mankind.

Title: Welcome to the Sticks
Description: A French public servant from Provence is banished to the far North. Strongly prejudiced against this cold and inhospitable place, he leaves his family behind to relocate temporarily there, with the firm intent to quickly come back.

Title: The Stand at Paxton County
Description: A military veteran comes home to find her father harassed by a sheriff intent to confiscate the livestock on their ranch under shady pretenses.

Title: Doogal
Description: A talking dog and his friends fight to stop an evil wizard.

Title: Sewu Dino
Description: Sri is tasked to do a cleansing ritual for Dela Atmojo, an unconscious girl who is suffering from 1000 days-hex. The terror begins when her friend neglects to finish the ritual. Failing until the 1000th day will result in their demise.

Title: How to Make an American Quilt
