Description: This is the story of Ozi, an orphan orangutan who uses her influencer skills to save her forest and home from deforestation.

Title: Summoning Sylvia
Description: A gay bachelor party turns spooky when sinister spirits are suddenly summoned.

Title: Piglet's Big Movie
Description: When Piglet comes up missing his Hundred Acre Wood friends use Piglet's own Book of Memories to find him, discovering along the way just how big a role he's played in their lives.

Title: Prestij Meselesi
Description: Founded by Hilmi Topaloglu, Prestij Music brought many important stars to Turkish music in the 90s. Real life of stars such as Özcan Deniz, Mahsun Kirmizigül and Haluk Levent at the Prestij Music.

Title: Happy End
Description: A well-to-do French family deals with a series of setbacks and crises.

Title: Mothra
Description: An expedition to Infant Island discovers a native population and tiny twin fairy priestesses of the island's mythical deity. Named Mothra, she sets out to rescue her fairies after they are kidnapped by an exploitative businessman.

Title: Fantastic Fungi
Description: Fantastic Fungi is a descriptive time-lapse journey about the magical, mysterious and medicinal world of fungi and their power to heal, sustain and contribute to the regeneration of life on Earth that began 3.5 billion years ago.

Title: Stonewalling
Description: When Lynn discovers that she is pregnant, finishing her studies as a flight attendant is called into question. Not wanting to have an abortion and hide her pregnancy from her absent boyfriend, Lynn hopes to give the child away at birth.

Title: P.O.Box Tinto Brass
Description: Tinto Brass receives letters containing real stories of women's erotic adventures which are subsequently transformed into short sex vignettes.

Title: Vanquish
Description: A mother, Victoria, is trying to put her dark past as a Russian drug courier behind her, but retired cop Damon forces Victoria to do his bidding by holding her daughter hostage.

Title: The Fortune Cookie
Description: A crooked lawyer persuades his brother-in-law to feign a serious injury.

Title: Major Grom: Plague Doctor
Description: Supercop Grom fights crime in St. Petersburg - an uphill battle. A vigilante starts killing the powerful, who escaped justice.

Title: Errementari
Description: A quiet village is thrown into turmoil upon disturbing a reclusive and feared blacksmith rumored to be in league with the devil.

Title: Cube Zero
Description: A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms.

Title: Sweetwater
Description: In the late 1800s, a fanatical religious leader, a renegade Sheriff, and a former prostitute collide in a blood triangle on the rugged plains of the New Mexico Territory.

Title: Slovenian Girl
Description: Aleksandra is a student from Krsko, a small town in Slovenia, who is studying the English language in Ljubljana, the capital of Slovenia. She has a plan to conquer the world. She is working as a prostitute and her life is heading to where she wants it to be, until an accidental death has her wrestling with new feelings of fear, loneliness, confusion, and responsibility.

Title: Two Evil Eyes
Description: A duo of Edgar Allan Poe adaptations about a greedy wife's attempt to embezzle her dying husband's fortune, and a sleazy reporter's adoption of a strange black cat.

Title: The Ash Lad: In Search of the Golden Castle
Description: In the sequel to The Ash Lad, Espen and Kristin embark on dangerous journey to save Espen's brothers, the kingdom - and perhaps the entire world.

Title: Madea's Witness Protection
Description: A Wall Street investment banker who has been set up as the linchpin of his company's mob-backed Ponzi scheme is relocated with his family to Aunt Madea's southern home.

Title: 3 jours max
Description: A Mexican cartel kidnapped Rayane's grandmother and now he has only three days to free her.

Title: The Great Alaskan Race
Description: In 1925's historic great race of mercy, a group of brave mushers travel 700 miles to save the small children of Nome, Alaska from a deadly epidemic.

Title: Bandolero!
Description: Mace Bishop (James Stewart) masquerades as a hangman in order to save his outlaw brother, Dee (Dean Martin), from the gallows, runs to Mexico chased by Sheriff July Johnson's (George Kennedy's) posse and fights against Mexican bandits.

Title: Vivacious Lady
Description: A professor marries a nightclub singer, much to the consternation of his family and friends back home.

Title: Parinda
Description: A man's friend, a police officer, is assassinated by gangsters in broad daylight. He discovers that his elder brother works in the same gang and decides to avenge his friend's death by infiltrating the gang.

Title: Abandon
Description: An investigation of a college student's missing boyfriend becomes quite strange when she begins to see him periodically.

Title: Werckmeister Harmonies
Description: A naive young man witnesses an escalation of violence in his small hometown following the arrival of a mysterious circus attraction.

Title: The Little Prince
Description: A pilot, stranded in the desert, meets a little boy who is a prince on a planet.

Title: The Nude Bomb
Description: Maxwell Smart is recalled to duty to help fight a villian who threatens to detonate a weapon that destroys clothing.

Title: D.O.A.
Description: Frank Bigelow, told he's been poisoned and has only a few days to live, tries to find out who killed him and why.

Title: Flash of Genius
Description: Robert Kearns takes on the Detroit automakers who he claims stole his idea for the intermittent windshield wiper.

Title: Rock Dog
Description: When a radio falls from the sky into the hands of a wide-eyed Tibetan Mastiff, he leaves home to fulfill his dream of becoming a musician, setting into motion a series of completely unexpected events.

Title: The Bad Guys: The Movie
Description: A bus transporting the inmates is flipped resulting in the felons escaping. In order to round up and once again incarcerate the criminals the cops form a special task force that needs to work in haste. The chief detective forms a crack team and is rearing to go because time is of the essence. The criminals are dangerous on the loose. The matter is complicated when a criminal gang is soon involved and interferes.

Title: Breaking News in Yuba County
Description: A woman takes advantage of her growing celebrity status when the police and the public think her dead husband is just missing.

Title: Peterloo
Description: The story of the 1819 Peterloo Massacre in which British forces attacked a peaceful pro-democracy rally in Manchester.

Title: Human Nature
Description: A woman is in love with a man in love with another woman, and all three have designs on a young man raised as an ape.

Title: Patrick the Pug
Description: Sarah is a young woman whose life is in a bit of a mess. The last thing she needs is someone else to look after. Yet, like it or not, her Grandmother has bequeathed her a very spoiled pug - Patrick. Surely she must have had her reasons?.

Title: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard
Description: Arthur answers a distress call from Princess Selenia, who is menaced by the nefarious Maltazard.

Title: Tea with Mussolini
Description: An orphaned Italian boy is raised amongst a circle of British and American women living in Mussolini's Italy before and during World War II.

Title: The King
Description: King Kamehameha fulfills his life-long prophecy of uniting the Hawaiian islands.

Title: Inside Deep Throat
Description: An examination of the infamous pornographic film Deep Throat (1972), covering aspects from the film's creation to its cultural impact.

Title: Mirrormask
Description: In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a fifteen-year-old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.

Title: Arctic Void
Description: When the power supply mysteriously fails and almost everyone disappears from a small tourist ship in the Arctic, fear invades the three remaining ones. They go ashore and deteriorate in body and mind. They must ally or perish.

Title: Sentinelle
Description: François Sentinelle has two lives. By day he is the most famous police officer on Reunion Island, known for his harsh methods and flowery shirts, who chases criminals in his 4x4. But the rest of the time, he is also a charismatic singer.

Title: The Story of Us
Description: Ben and Katie Jordan are a married couple who go through hard times in fifteen years of marriage.

Title: Stranger on the Third Floor
Description: An aspiring reporter is the key witness at the murder trial of a young man accused of cutting a café owner's throat and is soon accused of a similar crime himself.

Title: The Mole People
Description: A party of archaeologists discovers the remnants of a mutant five-millennia-old Sumerian civilization living beneath a glacier atop a mountain in Mesopotamia.

Title: Butch vs. Sundance
Description: After years of robbing and scheming, a feud between Butch and Sundance leads to mistrust and betrayal, jeopardizing the largest heist of the century.

Title: Ruby & Quentin
Description: A tough criminal is arrested after hiding the loot from a Paris armored truck robbery. A talkative dimwit befriends him in prison and escapes with him - chased by police and his evil crime boss.

Title: Good Dick
Description: A look at the relationship between a lonely introverted girl and a young video store clerk vying for her attention.

Title: Dolemite
Description: After he is released from jail, a pimp takes on the criminals and corrupt police officers who framed him in the first place.

Title: My Life as a Zucchini
Description: After losing his mother, a young boy is sent to an orphanage with other orphans his age where he begins to learn the meaning of trust and true love.

Title: Immoral Women
Description: Three women and three erotic tales. 1- Margherita: Did the great Renaissance painter Raphael Sanzio die because of the cold he took in the ruins of Rome? Or was it out of pleasure? Only one person knew the truth: Margherita Luti, the ardent and ambitious Roman daughter of a baker who, posing as a model and being the artist's lover, witnessed her last moments of life. 2 - Marcéline: At the age of 14, Marcéline has never loved anyone or anything except a big rabbit with pink ears, transparent in the sun. She called him "Souci." Who could imagine that this angelic face hid a heroine of evil? 3 - Marie: The Paris of today also has its "heroines of evil." Marie, the wife of a rich art collector, is kidnapped by a gangster. César the dog, on his own initiative and in secret, decides to find his lover and avenge her.

Title: Sparkle
Description: In the 1960s, three sisters form a girl group and soon become local sensations with major label interest, but fame becomes a challenge as the close-knit family begins to fall apart.

Title: Carry on Emmannuelle
Description: The beautiful and sex-starved Emmannuelle Prevert just cannot inflame her husband's ardour. In frustration she seduces a string of VIPs, including the Prime Minister and the American Ambassador. A jealous lover gives a list of all her conquests to the national press and a scandal ensues. But will she ever manage to get her own husband into bed?

Title: Spring
Description: A surreal juxtaposition French film about two people that never meet nor come close to. One, a young male outlaw, and the other a young woman going through puberty/sexual development for the first time.

Title: Johnny Handsome
Description: After being double crossed and thrown in jail, a deformed gangster gets a new face and rehabilitation, but his desire for revenge looms.

Title: Light Thereafter
Description: Pavel, an emotionally volatile and socially alienated young man, sets off across Europe in search of his idol, the enigmatic painter Arnaud. Desperately lonely, Pavel tries to adhere to the host of characters he meets along the way.

Title: The Maiden Heist
Description: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum.

Title: The Ex
Description: A slacker is forced to work for his father-in-law after his pregnant wife steps away from her high-paying job.

Title: Death's Roulette
Description: Seven people are kidnapped and suddenly find themselves part of a deadly game.

Title: Rust Creek
Description: An overachieving college student gets lost on her way to a job interview. A wrong turn leaves her stranded deep in the Kentucky forest.

Title: Steel
Description: A scientist for the military turns himself into a cartoon-like superhero when a version of one of his own weapons is being used against enemies.

Title: 15 Minutes
Description: A homicide detective and a fire marshal must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.

Title: Izzat
Description: Izzat (honor), the concept of honor in North India and Pakistan.

Title: Love & Murder: Atlanta Playboy
Description: Follows Lance, a prominent Atlanta businessman known for both revamping the city's 911 system and his proclivity for women. There are many theories and claims about who would have wished him dead when he is discovered dead in his own home.

Title: Earthlings
Description: Using hidden cameras and never-before-seen footage, Earthlings chronicles the day-to-day practices of the largest industries in the world, all of which rely entirely on animals for profit.

Title: Trapped
Description: Secret Service agents make a deal with a counterfeiting inmate to be released on early parole if he will help them recover some bogus moneymaking plates, but he plans to double cross them.

Title: Gunga Din
Description: In 19th century India, three British soldiers and a native waterbearer must stop a secret mass revival of the murderous Thuggee cult before it can rampage across the land.

Title: The Mean Season
Description: When a teenager is shot at the beach, a journalist from The Miami Journal is sent to cover the story. He's called by the murderer and told there'll be four more.

Title: Kit Kittredge: An American Girl
Description: Set in Cincinnati at the height of the Great Depression, Kit Kittredge, a resourceful young girl, helps her mother run a boardinghouse after her father loses his job.

Title: Racing Stripes
Description: An abandoned zebra grows up believing he is a racehorse, and, with the help of his barnyard friends and a teenage girl, sets out to achieve his dream of racing with thoroughbreds.

Title: Dead End
Description: The lives of a young man, a young woman, an infamous gangster, and a group of street kids converge one day in a volatile New York City slum.

Title: The Enemy Below
Description: During WWII an American destroyer discovers a German U-boat, and in the ensuing duel the American captain must draw upon all his experience to defeat the equally experienced German commander.

Title: Tread
Description: Pushed to his breaking point, a master welder in a small town at the foot of the Rocky Mountains quietly fortifies a bulldozer with 30 tons of concrete and steel and seeks to destroy those he believes have wronged him.

Title: Control
Description: A tale about a strange young man, Bulcsú, the fellow inspectors on his team, all without exception likable characters, a rival ticket inspection team and racing along the tracks - and a tale about love.

Title: Thomasine & Bushrod
Description: The exploits of 1910s bounty hunter Thomasine and bandit Bushrod who, after rekindling their old romance, take to robbing banks to survive, stealing from rich whites and sharing their loot with the poor on the harsh frontier.

Title: The Marco Effect
Description: One day Marco discovers a dead man. After learning that Marco may have invaluable information, Commissioner Mørck is determined to find and rescue him.

Title: Stage Beauty
Description: A female theatre dresser creates a stir and sparks a revolution in seventeenth century London theatre by playing Desdemona in Othello. But what will become of the male actor she once worked for and eventually replaced?

Title: My Science Project
Description: A high school student and his friend find a strange, orb-like piece of equipment to use as a science project, but must stop it when it begins to threaten mankind.

Title: Bride of Re-Animator
Description: Doctors Herbert West and Dan Cain discover the secret to creating human life and proceed to create a perfect woman from dead tissue.

Title: Amulet
Description: An ex-soldier, living homeless in London, is offered a place to stay at a decaying house inhabited by a young woman and her dying mother. As he starts to fall for her, he cannot ignore his suspicion that something sinister is going on.

Title: The Sentiment of the Flesh
Description: During a medical exam, Helena, a student in anatomical drawing, meets Benoit, a young radiologist. Their mutual fascination for the human body incites them to start a passionate romance. Helena's capability to memorize every detail of Benoit's body and Benoit's irresistible curiosity to uncover the 'interior' secrets of Helena's body lead them to a dangerous journey with no limits...

Title: Solo
Description: After falling by a cliff on a desert beach, a seriously injured surfer starts a lonely fight to survive against the merciless nature.

Title: Hedda
Description: Henrik Ibsen's renowned stage drama from 1891 is reimagined in an epic and emotional way in this production, Hedda Gabler.

Title: Castaway on the Moon
Description: A failed suicide attempt leads a heartbroken man to live a life in the wilderness.

Title: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
Description: A seductive woman falls in love with a mysterious ship's captain.

Title: Night Moves
Description: Three radical environmentalists look to execute the protest of their lives: the explosion of a hydroelectric dam.

Title: A Man and a Woman
Description: A widow and a widower find their relationship developing into love, but their past tragedies prove hard to overcome, causing them to proceed with utmost delicacy.

Title: The Odd Couple II
Description: Oscar and Felix take a road trip to their son and daughter's wedding.

Title: Stockholm
Description: A hot-blooded Spaniard engages in a long and interesting conversation with a young woman in an attempt to woo her.

Title: Carbon Copy
Description: When a rich white corporate executive finds out that he has an illegitimate black son, things start falling apart for him at home, work, and in his social circles.

Title: F/X2
Description: A special effects man helps his girlfriend's ex, a cop, with a sting operation, where the ex gets killed. Something's off and he investigates with help from an ex-cop PI friend.

Title: Reservation Road
Description: The lives of two families change forever after a fatal tragedy takes place on Reservation Road.

Title: The Water Man
Description: A boy sets out on a quest to save his ill mother by searching for a mythic figure said to have magical healing powers.

Title: Baby Blue
Description: A group of teens stumble across the story of now dead serial killer BABY BLUE and decide he'd be the perfect subject of a true crime vodcast. But when they start digging, they quickly discover that his murder spree never stopped. Now they are being targeted from beyond the grave.

Title: Johnny Z
Description: Johnny Z is a horror-action feature film about a half human, half zombie named Johnny who, under the guidance of a martial arts master seeks vengeance on the evil corporation that created him.

Title: Murder to the Tune of the Seven Black Notes
Description: A clairvoyant woman discovers a skeleton in a wall in her husband's house, and seeks to find the truth about what happened to the victim.

Title: G.I. Blues
Description: Tulsa, a soldier with dreams of running his own nightclub, places a bet with his friend Dynamite that he can win the heart of an untouchable dancer...but when Dynamite is transferred, Tulsa must replace him in the bet.

Title: Dagmar's Hot Pants, Inc.
Description: A prostitute disappoints her faithful clients when she announces her retirement in order to get married.

Title: Sonatine
Description: Several yakuza from Tokyo are sent to Okinawa to help end a gang war. The war then escalates and the Tokyo drifters decide to lay low at the beach.

Title: Norm of the North
Description: When a real estate development invades his Arctic home, Norm and his three lemming friends head to New York City, where Norm becomes the mascot of the corporation in an attempt to bring it down from the inside and protect his homeland.

Title: Immediate Family
Description: An upscale couple unable to conceive arrange a brokered adoption with a pregnant woman who doesn't hold up her end of the deal to give up the baby.

Title: Hindi Medium
Description: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.

Title: Caddo Lake
Description: When an 8-year-old girl disappears on Caddo Lake, a series of past deaths and disappearances begin to link together, altering a broken family's history.

Title: Come Play with Me
Description: A health-resort where both the clients and the employees easily take their clothes off and have a little fun is the setting of this sex-comedy.

Title: Breaking and Entering
Description: A landscape architect's dealings with a young thief cause him to re-evaluate his life.

Title: I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell
Description: A guy tries to patch things up with his soon-to-be-married pal after botching his bachelor party.

Title: 'Gator Bait
Description: Desiree lives deep in the swamp and supports herself and her siblings by poaching. Ben and deputy Billy hope to get a little sexual comfort from the "Cajun swamp rat" when they catch Desiree trapping 'gators, and give chase. Desiree outsmarts them but Billy accidentally shoots Ben and tells his sheriff dad that Desiree did it. Ben's dad and sons join them in the search party and quickly get out of control. Soon the hunters become the hunted as Desiree exacts her revenge for their violence against her family.

Title: The Tree of Blood
Description: Rebeca and Marc make a travel to discover their mutual family pasts in Rebeca's grandparents house.

Title: Running the Bases
Description: When a small-town baseball coach gets the offer of a lifetime from a larger 6A High School, he uproots his family and leaves the only home he's ever known. But soon faces opposition to his coaching methods from the school superintendent.

Title: The Pusher
Description: A detective investigating the murder of a heroin addict discovers that there is a connection between the junkie and his fiance, who is his boss' daughter.

Title: The Human Contract
Description: A successful corporate type harboring a deep, dark secret befriends a free-spirited stranger who encourages him to ditch his stuffy lifestyle and live life in reckless abandon.

Title: The Brothers Lionheart
Description: Brothers Jonatan and Skorpan lead a revolution against the tyrant Tengil in the magical afterlife land of Nangijala.

Title: Mikey
Description: A seemingly sweet and innocent little boy causes murder and mayhem in his new neighborhood and falls for the teenage girl next door.

Title: Dog Days
Description: A group of interconnected people in Los Angeles are brought together by their lovely canine counterparts.

Title: Freeheld
Description: New Jersey police lieutenant Laurel Hester and her registered domestic partner Stacie Andree battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.
Follows a popular musician who, one day, loses everything and is sent to prison, where the only thing that remains of his former life are his songs.

Title: Joika
Description: American ballet dancer Joy Womack is accepted into Moscow's infamously tough Bolshoi Ballet Academy, with the dream of becoming a great ballerina.

Title: The Last Wave
Description: A Sydney lawyer defends five Aboriginal Persons in a ritualized taboo murder and in the process learns disturbing things about himself and premonitions.

Title: Queen of Katwe
Description: A Ugandan girl sees her world rapidly change after being introduced to the game of chess.

Title: Sanctioning Evil
Description: After being discharged from the military, Sgt. Barnes finds his way back into society via a charismatic politician with a covert plan to eliminate an underground criminal element.

Title: Pygmalion
Description: A phonetics and diction expert makes a bet that he can teach a cockney flower girl to speak proper English and pass as a lady in high society.

Title: The Dish
Description: A remote Australian community, populated by quirky characters, plays a key role in the first Apollo moon landing.

Title: Gerry
Description: A friendship between two young men is tested when they go for a hike in a desert and forget to bring any water or food with them.

Title: Blacula
Description: An 18th century African prince, turned into a vampire by Dracula, finds himself in modern day Los Angeles.

A modern and stylish kaleidoscope of interconnected love and relationships linking characters from different cities and countries in a vivid, suspenseful and deeply moving tale of romantic life in the 21st century.

Title: I Walk the Line
Description: Henry Tawes, a middle-aged sheriff in a rural Tennessee town, is usually the first man to criticize others for their bad behavior. Miserable in his marriage, Henry falls in love with teenage Alma, who is the daughter of local criminal.

Title: Rape Zombie: Lust of the Dead
Description: After a nuclear attack in Tokyo, the female population is attacked by infected males who have become sex-crazed zombies, hungry for human flesh. Officeworker Momoko and nurse Nozomi seek shelter in a Shinto Shrine, where they meet housewife Kanae and school girl Tamae. With no choices left to them, the group of girls decides to take a stand and arm themselves with assault rifles and explosives to fight off hordes of horny zombies. What is the secret to killing the zombies for good?

Title: North to Alaska
Description: During the Alaska gold rush, prospector George sends partner Sam to Seattle to bring his fiancée but when it turns out that she married another man, Sam returns with a pretty substitute, the hostess of the Henhouse dance hall.

Title: For All Mankind
Description: An in-depth look at various NASA moon landing missions, starting with Apollo 8.

Title: Leave Us Alone
Description: A group from a ten to sixteen-year-old Danish educational center breaks the rules there and goes to an uninhabited island in a stolen boat. When the boat disappears, they are left to themselves, and their holiday turns into a nightmare: peer pressure, serious violence, accidents. But for some of them also an experience of love.

Title: Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ
Description: A Jewish prince seeks to find his family and revenge himself upon his childhood friend who had him wrongly imprisoned.

Title: The Wrath of God
Description: Luciana, a young woman immersed in a circle of mysterious deaths of relatives and the growing suspicion that the person responsible is an enigmatic writer, her former boss.

Title: Gloomy Sunday
Description: Follows three men who are in love with a beautiful waitress during World War II: an intellectual restaurant owner, a mysterious musician, and an erratic businessman.

Title: Max, Min and Meowzaki
Description: Max and Min are about to break up. They argue endlessly about dividing their possessions, including their cat, Meowzaki, whom they have named after their favourite filmmaker Hayao Miyazaki.

Title: Blackout
Description: A Fine Arts painter is convinced that he is a werewolf wreaking havoc on a small American town under the full moon.

Title: Claire's Knee
Description: On lakeside summer holiday, a conflicted older man is dared to have a flirt with two beautiful teenage half-sisters despite his betrothal to a diplomat's daughter and the fact that the girls have boyfriends.

Title: Schemers
Description: His football career over, Davie starts promoting gigs in Dundee with two friends, leading to a hugely ambitious Iron Maiden show. Out of his depth and in debt with gangster Fergie, Davie needs to pull off the biggest scheme of his life.

Title: The Bad Sleep Well
Description: A vengeful young man marries the daughter of a corrupt industrialist in order to seek justice for his father's suicide.

Title: Two Days, One Night
Description: Liège, Belgium. Sandra is a factory worker who discovers that her workmates have opted for a EUR1,000 bonus in exchange for her dismissal. She has only a weekend to convince her colleagues to give up their bonuses in order to keep her job.

Title: The Happiest Millionaire
Description: Clever yet hapless new butler John Lawless manages a Philadelphia household for quirky and joyful millionaire Anthony Drexel Biddle, his unflappable wife, Cordelia, and their spitfire daughter, Cordy.

Title: Three Months
Description: Coming-of-age film about Caleb, a South Florida teen. On the eve of his high school graduation, everything changes when he's exposed to HIV. While he waits three months for his results, he finds love in the most unlikely of places.

Title: The Evil Within
Description: Plot is currently under wraps.

Title: The New Centurions
Description: An idealistic rookie cop joins the L.A.P.D. to make ends meet while finishing law school, and is indoctrinated by a seasoned veteran. As time goes on, he loses his ambitions and family as police work becomes his entire life.

Title: Titanic 666
Description: Dark forces from the deep rise to the surface, terrorizing all aboard from Titanic III and threatens to repeat one of history's greatest disasters.

Title: Caught
Description: Joe and Betty run a fish market and have sunk into a comfortable/boring life. Enter the drifter Nick, who takes a job in the store. He awakes Joe's hope in the future and Betty's sexual passions. Until their son Danny returns home..

Title: Wildling
Description: A blossoming teenager uncovers the dark secret behind her traumatic childhood.

Title: The 10th Victim
Description: In a future where a human vs. human "Big Hunt" is used as an alternative to war, a veteran huntress' plan to kill a "victim" for a major TV sponsorship deal is compounded by romance.

Title: Woodstock
Description: Oscar-winning musical chronicle that brilliantly captures the three-day rock concert and celebration of peace and love that became a capstone for the Sixties.

Title: The Professional
Description: Victim of a plot which has resulted in his imprisonment in a Central African jail for two years, a French secret agent arrives in Paris to settle accounts.

Title: Aftershock
Description: In Chile, a group of travelers who are in an underground nightclub when a massive earthquake hits quickly learn that reaching the surface is just the beginning of their nightmare.

Title: BUtterfield 8
Description: A beautiful New York model and socialite enjoys a very active night-life, but all things change when she falls for a married man and the consequences are tragic.

Title: Woman Walks Ahead
Description: Catherine Weldon, a portrait painter from 1890s Brooklyn, travels to Dakota to paint a portrait of Sitting Bull and becomes embroiled in the Lakota peoples' struggle over the rights to their land.

Title: Spring Break
Description: Two sets of two college guys spend a spring break together in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. There they have lots of fun in and out of the sun.

Title: Watercolor Postcards
Description: A girl returns from a failed Hollywood career to her West Texas home, to say good-bye to her dying mother, only to find an eccentric, ex-pro football player, selling postcards and singing to his horse, while taking care of a sister she never knew and past she tried to leave behind.

Title: Everything at Once
Description: A film essay about a singular couple, Paco and Manolo, two Catalan photographers from the outskirts of Barcelona, who have been together for thirty years. Both have managed to work as a single photographer and have captured their imagery in Kink magazine, a very personal photography fanzine with an essentially Mediterranean homoerotic aesthetic.

Title: Alibi.com 2
Description: Greg's life had been pretty quiet after the agency closed, until he decides to propose to Flo and has to introduce her to his crooked father and ex-actress mother. With no choice but to reopen the agency and find fake parents.

Title: The Divine Fury
Description: An MMA fighter helps an exorcist fight evil.

Title: Head Office
Description: Lazy, womanizing Jack gets employed at the NYC HQ of the multinational conglomerate, INC. Crazy chaos, promotions, firings, suicides etc. seem to be the way of the day.

Title: Spinal Tap II
Description: On the 40th anniversary of the original, the sequel to the legendary rock mockumentary that put the film company on a run of success.

Title: Matewan
Description: A labor union organizer comes to an embattled mining community brutally and violently dominated and harassed by the mining company.

Title: He Knows You're Alone
Description: A young bride-to-be is being stalked upon by a serial killer in Staten Island. She gets help from a former lover, but will they manage to escape?

Title: Undertow
Description: Pig farmer and widower John Munn is raising his two sons in an isolated farmhouse, until his troubled brother arrives and changes their lives forever.

Title: Involuntary
Description: In several unrelated stories, the consequences of putting one's foot down - or failing to do so - are explored.

Title: Black Robe
Description: In the 17th century, a Jesuit missionary nicknamed Black Robe by the natives and his small party of companions try reaching the Huron tribe in Canada all while facing mistrust, Iroquois warring parties and harsh winter conditions.

Title: The Wind and the Lion
Description: A Berber chieftain triggers an international incident, drawing the involvement of Theodore Roosevelt, when he kidnaps an American widow and her children in 1900s Morocco.

Title: The Navigator: A Medieval Odyssey
Description: Men seeking relief from the Black Death, guided by a boy's vision, dig a tunnel from 14th century England to 20th century New Zealand.

Title: Rock My Heart
Description: 17-year-old Jana has a congenital heart defect. To defy fate, Jana seeks every challenge, plunges into every wild and dangerous adventure. Her parents do not like that and are even more fearful for their daughter.

Title: Buona Sera, Mrs. Campbell
Description: Carla Campbell receives maintenance payment from three former soldiers who all believe themselves to be the father of her daughter, Gia.

Title: Seoul Station
Description: Several groups of people try to survive a zombie pandemic that unleashes itself in downtown Seoul.

Title: Trinil: Kembalikan Tubuhku
Description: Couple Rara and Sutan who are ready to start a new life after their honeymoon. Rara inherited a large tea plantation in Central Java belonging to William Saunder, her father, a Dutch man who really loved Indonesia.

Title: StageFright
Description: A group of stage actors lock themselves in the theater for a rehearsal of their upcoming musical production, unaware that an escaped psychopath has sneaked into the theater with them.

Title: Stewie Griffin: The Untold Story
Description: The maniacal baby of the Griffin family, Stewie, meets his future self. In doing this he discovers that his future image is not what he has anticipated because of a near death experience.

Title: Outside Providence
Description: After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.

Title: Megalodon Rising
Description: When history's greatest aquatic predator returns, the armada of modern warships sent to destroy it has no chance at all.

Title: Out of Bounds
Description: Daryl's parents ship him off to the big city to live with his brother, hoping he will have a better life there. After a baggage mix-up at the airport, Daryl finds himself in possession of a drug cache, which a drug dealer wants back.

Title: Pandora's Box
Description: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

Title: Miami Connection
Description: A martial arts rock band goes up against a band of motorcycle ninjas who have tightened their grip on Florida's narcotics trade.

Title: Ladies in Lavender
Description: Two sisters befriend a mysterious foreigner who washes up on the beach of their 1930s Cornish seaside village.

Title: I Believe in Unicorns
Description: A road trip through the stunning and complex landscape of troubled young love.

Title: The Final
Description: An awkward student with a deadly vendetta leads a group of outcasts who plot to avenge the years of humiliation they faced by the popular students at Hohn High School.

Title: Big Wednesday
Description: The lives of some California surfers from the early 1960s to the 1970s.

Title: Show Boat
Description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairy tale romance is threatened after his luck turns sour.

Title: Demons 2
Description: A group of tenants and visitors are trapped in a 10-story high-rise apartment building infested with demons who proceed to hunt the dwindling humans down.

Title: Overdose
Description: Follows Sara, head of the Toulouse police narcotics squad, who is forced to collaborate with Richard, the head of the local criminal police, to stop a go-fast between Spain and France and find the murderer linked to the case.

Title: Teachers
Description: A well meaning but burned-out high school teacher tries to maintain order against the backdrop of a pending lawsuit against his school district when it comes to light they gave a diploma to an illiterate student.

Title: Shiloh
Description: A small-town Southern boy named Marty Preston must rescue a young beagle from his abusive owner, Judd Travers.

Title: The Initiation
Description: An amnesiac sorority member who has been plagued by a recurring nightmare is stalked alongside other coeds by a killer in a deserted department store where they are completing a hazing ritual.

Title: The Resort
Description: Four friends head to Hawaii to investigate reports of a haunting at an abandoned resort in hopes of finding the infamous Half-Faced Girl. When they arrive, they soon learn you should be careful what you wish for.

Title: The Cleaner
Description: A middle-aged house cleaner gets caught up in a violent crime after being hired to locate a client's estranged son.

Title: The Teasers
Description: Loredana is a schoolgirl who takes advantage of her fellow students and teachers by using her innocent schoolgirl beauty. After she loses her virginity to an older man she soon realizes there are more important things to life than teasing men.

Title: The Benefactor
Description: A philanthropist meddles in the lives of newly-married couples in an attempt to relive his past.

Title: Mystery Road
Description: An indigenous detective returns to the Outback to investigate the murder of a young girl.

Title: Birdman of Alcatraz
Description: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

Title: Summertime
Description: An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome--but married--Italian man while vacationing in Venice.

Title: Piglady
Description: Inspired by true events. Filmed at the murder scene. A group of friends, while on a Christmas vacation to a cabin in Southern Oregon, learn of a rumor of an antisocial woman who allegedly murders people and feeds her victims to pigs.

Title: Poisoned: The Dirty Truth About Your Food
Description: A call to action for the officials who have the power to mitigate the danger caused by foodborne pathogens that kill thousands of people in the U.S. every year.

Title: Popcorn
Description: A master of disguise deranged killer begins killing off the college students who are organizing a horror-movie marathon in an abandoned theater.

Title: Les démons
Description: A group of nuns become possessed by demons and are then tortured in a dungeon of horrors during the inquisition.

Title: Bottoms Up
Description: Two secret Agents are determined to retrieve a microfilm containing a revolutionary formula that transforms cow manure into fuel, but first, they must put into action a hot inspection procedure.

Title: 2000 Mules
Description: A documentary which purports to prove widespread, coordinated and deliberate voter fraud in the 2020 election, sufficient to change the overall outcome, and claims Trump won swing states like Michigan, Georgia, and Arizona.

Title: Graduation Day
Description: A masked killer begins murdering students on the school track team after a track runner dies upon completion of a 30 second 200-meter race.

Title: Thelma
Description: When 93-year-old Thelma Post gets duped by a phone scammer pretending to be her grandson, she sets out on a treacherous quest across the city to reclaim what was taken from her.

Title: Bunker
Description: Trapped in a bunker during World War I, a group of soldiers are faced with an ungodly presence that slowly turns them against each other.

Title: Vampyr
Description: A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.

Title: The Vampire Next Door
Description: Introverted Cameron, is desperately in love with his high school crush Diane. But his romantic pursuit is halted when Victoria, a female vampire moves in next door. Cameron soon discovers he's in the middle of a life-and-death adventure.

Title: Dragon's Lair: The Movie
Description: Dirk the Daring, a knight who sets out to rescue Princess Daphne from the evil dragon Singe and a wizard named Mordroc.

Title: 9 to 5: Days in Porn
Description: 9to5 - Days in Porn focuses on the people behind a controversial and multi-billion dollar industry "The Adult Entertainment industry". It depicts their stories, each one different, unadorned and authentic, without glorification or prejudice. It delivers deep insight into their personal lives - from glamorous to grotesque - strange, fascinating, offensive, absurd and sometimes funny moments all at once.

Title: A Perfect Enemy
Description: A successful architect is approached on his trip to the Paris Airport by a chatty girl. Although the meeting seems fortuitous, soon there be a turn that will transform the encounter into something much more sinister and criminal.

Title: I Know Where I'm Going!
Description: A young Englishwoman goes to the Hebrides to marry her older, wealthier fiancé. When the weather keeps them separated on different islands, she begins to have second thoughts.

Title: Sheer Passion
Description: A lingerie model has been strangled inside a wealthy fashion designer's house, and the designer is the obvious suspect. When the police appear to be dragging their feet on the investigation, private detective Cassandra decides to do her own investigation, posing as a model.

Title: Piaffe
Description: When her sibling Zara suffers a nervous breakdown, the introvert Eva is forced to take on Zara's job as a Foley artist. Then, a horsetail starts growing out of her body.

Title: The Beauty Inside
Description: A South Korean has a different person's body, changing every morning to a body "borrowed" for a day - man, woman, old, child and sometimes a foreigner. "He" works as furniture designer. He loves a girl. She loves him for the beauty inside.

Title: Cleopatra Jones
Description: During the 1970s, U.S. Special Agent Cleopatra Jones proves to be an invaluable asset to the local police forces in the war on drugs.

Title: Dark Tide
Description: A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever.

Title: She Rides Shotgun
Description: A girl marked for death, must fight and steal to stay alive, learning from the most frightening man she knows-her father. An adaptation of Jordan Harper's award winning novel.

Title: Wing Commander
Description: Blair, a fighter pilot, joins an interstellar war to fight the evil Kilrathi who are trying to destroy the universe.

Title: How to Date Billy Walsh
Description: Follows a pair of childhood friends: Amelia and Archie. Archie has always kept his love for her a secret, but just as he builds up the courage to declare his feelings, Amelia falls for Billy Walsh, the new transfer student.

Title: Crystal Fairy & the Magical Cactus
Description: As Jamie travels in Chile, he invites an eccentric woman to join his group's quest to score a fabled hallucinogen, a move that finds him at odds with his new companion, until they drink the magic brew on a beach at the edge of the desert.

Title: Jezabel
Description: Four upper-class high school students who live carefree between drugs, games and love until one of the girls, Eli, is brutally killed. Sixteen years later, the memory of the crime torments Alain, another member of the group.

Title: Things to Come
Description: The story of a century: a decades-long second World War leaves plague and anarchy, then a rational state rebuilds civilization and attempts space travel.

Title: Honeyland
Description: The last female bee-hunter in Europe must save the bees and return the natural balance in Honeyland, when a family of nomadic beekeepers invade her land and threaten her livelihood.

Title: Junebug
Description: A dealer in "outsider" art travels from Chicago to North Carolina to meet her new in-laws, challenging the equilibrium of this middle class Southern home.

Title: The Element of Crime
Description: A cop in a dystopian Europe investigates a serial killings suspect using controversial methods written by his now disgraced former mentor.

Title: Blaze
Description: After accidentally witnessing a violent crime, a young girl is left catatonic with shock, and struggles to make sense of what she saw, ultimately finding renewal in the inestimable world of her own imagination.

Title: Kaasua, komisario Palmu!
Description: A rich widow is found dead of gas poisoning in her flat in Helsinki. First the death is thought to be an accident, but lieutenant Palmu notices that the murderer has made a mistake, and Palmu and his assistants Kokki and Virta start an investigation into who has broken into the apartment through the balcony door and opened the gas tap when Mrs. Skrof was sleeping.

Title: Kingdom II: Harukanaru Daichi e
Description: It follows a young man who dreams of becoming a general and Ying Zheng, whose goal is unification.

Title: Sweethurt
Description: Two interwoven stories of young love, friendship, and the paralyzing fear of dying alone.

Title: Summer Wars
Description: A student tries to fix a problem he accidentally caused in OZ, a digital world, while pretending to be the fiancé of his friend at her grandmother's 90th birthday.

Title: Wetherby
Description: The mysterious death of an enigmatic young man newly arrived in the suburb of Wetherby releases the long-repressed, dark passions of some of its residents.

Title: Thundercrack! Q&A
Description: Audio of a 1977 Berkeley College discussion with Thundercrack!/Sparkle's Tavern director Curt McDowell and star Marion Eaton, supplemented with rare images and footage.

Title: Afterschool
Description: An Internet-addicted prep-school student captures on video camera the drug overdose of two girls.

Title: Return from Witch Mountain
Description: Tia and Tony visit Los Angeles, but he's quickly kidnapped by an evil scientist, leaving her to desperately search for him.

Title: Safety Last!
Description: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

Title: The Groove Tube
Description: A collection of skits that make fun of 1970s television, featuring early appearances by Chevy Chase and Richard Belzer.

Title: Adam
Description: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.

Title: Mesrine: Killer Instinct
Description: The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France.

Title: Vlad the Impaler
Description: The true story of 7 oddly dressed fearless men of Ottoman army fight against cruel Vlad.

Title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
Description: During WW2, Lt. Rip Crandall, who was a yachtsman before the war, takes command of the USS Echo, a sailing ship, for a secret mission in waters patrolled by Japanese warships.

Title: My Soul to Take
Description: A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.

Title: Feed
Description: A cybercrime investigator tracks a man suspected of force-feeding women to death.

Title: The Evil That Men Do
Description: A professional killer comes out of retirement to investigate and avenge the brutal murder of an old friend.

Title: Amelia
Description: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

Title: Atlas
Description: A bleak-sounding future, where an AI soldier has determined that the only way to end war is to end humanity.

Title: The Moon & Back
Description: A year after her father's death, Lydia Gilbert feels completely lost - until she discovers something unexpected: a space opera script in need of a blockbuster budget, written by her father.

Title: Boudica: Rise of the Warrior Queen
Description: Boudica is an innocent sixteen-year-old girl who is forced into an arranged marriage by her father, the leader of a Celtic Tribe. However, her mother is unsure, doing whatever it takes to protect her daughter.

Title: Lovewrecked
Description: On a Caribbean cruise, Jenny is marooned on a beach with her rock and roll idol. Deliriously in love with the idea of time alone with him, she manages to hide the fact that they're a stone's throw away from their resort.

Title: One Night at McCool's
Description: Every man has a different recollection of the beautiful young woman who wreaked havoc on their lives during one heated night.

Title: A Quiet Place in the Country
Description: After moving into a dilapidated rural villa to reinvigorate his creative energies, a neurotic artist becomes obsessed with a beautiful countess who died there many years prior.

Title: Camino
Description: Regitze no longer speaks to her father, Jan. But when they both discover that Regitze's mother's dying wish was for them to follow the Camino de Santiago, the two set out on the 260-kilometre journey together.

Title: Housefull 4
Description: Three couples who get separated from each other due to an evil ploy, reincarnate after 600 years and meet each other as history repeats itself again and their respective partners get mixed up this time.

Title: My Spy: The Eternal City
Description: It follows a teenage Sophie as she convinces JJ to chaperone her school trip where they both end up as pawns in an international terrorist plot targeting CIA Chief, David Kim and his son, Collin - who is Sophie's best friend.

Title: Boccaccio '70
Description: Inspired by Boccaccio's novellas, each episode focuses on sex, love and seduction in Italy in the 1960s, an era of economic growth and major cultural changes.

Title: Night Train to Munich
Description: After Germany invades Czechoslovakia, the German and the British intelligence services try to capture Czech scientist Dr. Axel Bomasch (James Harcourt), inventor of a new type of armor-plating.

Title: Night of the Lepus
Description: Giant mutant rabbits terrorize the south-west.

Title: Bride Hard
Description: When a mercenary group takes a lavish wedding hostage, they have no idea what they are in for as the Maid of Honor is actually a secret agent ready to rain hell-fire upon anyone who would ruin her best friend's wedding.

Title: The Red House
Description: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

Title: Gandahar
Description: An evil force begins to destroy the idyllic paradise of Gandahar, where the citizens are in perfect harmony with nature.

Title: The Shadow Line
Description: From Joseph Conrad's great novel comes the story of a young seaman trying to helm a damaged boat to Singapore and dealing with many unfortunate events. While on command of the situation, he also devotes himself to help his failing crew and some of the boat's many passengers, some of them who are in poor health conditions.

Title: Brute Force
Description: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

Title: Battle Beyond the Sun
Description: Two countries race to have the first successful landing on Mars.

Title: Almost Entirely a Slight Disaster
Description: Coincidence brings four twenty somethings in contemporary Istanbul together in humorous and playful ways. Almost Entirely a Slight Disaster explores the anxieties faced by the new generation with its humorous and intertwined ways.

Title: Strangeland
Description: A detective pursues a sadist specializing in body modification rituals who lures teenagers through the internet.

Title: Double Take
Description: A man on the run takes another man's passport, only to find himself stuck with the identity of a street hustler.

Title: In the Court of the Crimson King: King Crimson at 50
Description: What began as a straightforward documentary about the cult rock band King Crimson as it turned 50, mutated into an exploration of time, death, family, and the transcendent power of music to change lives. But with jokes.

Title: The Legacy of a Whitetail Deer Hunter
Description: The great hunter Buck Ferguson (Josh Brolin) and his trusted cameraman Don (Danny McBride) set out for an epic weekend adventure to reconnect with Buck's young son (Montana Jordan).

Title: The Mack
Description: Goldie returns from five years at the state pen and winds up King of the pimping game. Trouble comes in the form of two corrupt white cops and a crime lord who wants him to return to the small time.

Title: BloodRayne: The Third Reich
Description: Rayne joins a resistence group to fight against the Nazis during world war two.

Title: Little White Lies
Description: A near-fatal accident leaves one friend in the hospital while the rest go on their annual vacation. But their secrets and personal grief threaten to drive them apart.

Title: Attack of the Killer Donuts
Description: A chemical accident turns ordinary donuts into bloodthirsty killers.

Title: 14 Cameras
Description: When a family of five rent a beautiful house for their summer vacation, the price seems too good to be true.

Title: Blood Vessel
Description: Lifeboat survivors board a German boat that's crawling with vampires during World War II.

Title: Thunderpants
Description: An 11-year-old boy's amazing ability to break wind leads him first to fame and then to death row, before it helps him to fulfill his ambition of becoming an astronaut.

Title: Waking the Dead
Description: A congressional candidate questions his sanity after seeing the love of his life, presumed dead, suddenly emerge.

Title: Submission
Description: A cynical college professor takes a keen interest in a talented young writing student.

Title: How I Became a Gangster
Description: A polish gangster discovers the senselessness of his life.

Title: A Fortunate Man
Description: A gifted engineer flees his austere roots to pursue wealth and success among Copenhagen's elite, but the pride propelling him threatens to be his ruin.

Title: Cutting Class
Description: A murderer is loose in a high school in this 'whodunit' movie.

Title: A Dog's Will
Description: Follows the lives of 2 poor Brazilians and their schemes to get money and the consequences of their actions.

Title: Kidnapped
Description: Three hooded Eastern-European criminals burst into a home in a Madrid gated community, holding the family hostage in its own home, and forcing the father to empty his credit cards.

Title: Swearnet
Description: Fed up with being censored in their post-Trailer Park Boys lives, the out of work stars/world-renowned 'swearists', Mike Smith, Robb Wells and John Paul Tremblay decide to start their own uncensored network on the internet.

Title: Big Nothing
Description: A frustrated, unemployed professor joins forces with a scammer and a friend of his in a blackmailing scheme.

Title: Hansan: Rising Dragon
Description: Follow-up to 2014's The Admiral: Roaring Currents, which explores the historic Battle of Hansan Island.

Title: Condorman
Description: Cartoonist Woody becomes the superhero he draws. Using his gadgets he helps a Soviet spy defect to the West.

Title: Charming
Description: Three fairy tale princesses find themselves engaged to the same guy, Prince Charming.

Title: Tenant
Description: His name is Clint Westwood. Yes, sounds familiar. He changed his name when I came here to Hollywood. He is a filmmaker, actor and a writer. And he writes a lot. He is not famous yet, but he has an idea how to do it. Here is his story...and seven other stories too.

Title: Personality Crisis: One Night Only
Description: Follow musician David Johansen's luminous set at Café Carlyle from January 2020. A concert that is wonderfully intimate and a testament to both a lost New York and an artist who remains as fresh and exciting as ever.

Title: Beef
Description: A manager of a fast food restaurant in the Midwest is wanted by his bookies.

Title: Honk for Jesus. Save Your Soul.
Description: In the aftermath of a huge scandal, Trinitie Childs, the first lady of a prominent Southern Baptist Mega Church, attempts to help her pastor-husband, Lee-Curtis Childs, rebuild their congregation.

Title: City Hall
Description: The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.

Title: True Stories
Description: A small but growing Texas town, filled with strange and musical characters, celebrates its sesquicentennial and converge on a local parade and talent show.

Title: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying
Description: Armed with the titular manual, an ambitious window washer seeks to climb the corporate ladder.

Title: Unbelievable!!!!!
Description: Martians have conquered Earth. Four astronauts fight to save the last remnants of humanity.

Title: Love Affair
Description: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship.

Title: Witchfinder General
Description: A young soldier seeks to put an end to the evils caused by a vicious witch-hunter when the latter terrorizes his fiancée and kills her uncle.

Title: Taurus
Description: Follows the last days of a rising but problematic musician.

Title: Ulee's Gold
Description: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.

Title: Compulsion
Description: After a fight with her boyfriend, a successful female erotic novelist on a book tour of Europe joins her ex and his female friend, with whom she falls madly in love, for a party at a castle owned by a dangerous cult.

Title: Milka: Elokuva tabuista
Description: In a small Finnish Lapland community, Milka, an innocent 14-year-old girl lives with her mother, misses her dead father and prays God to show her what love is. For haymaking, they employ a simple but hard-working field hand, nicknamed Christ-Devil, who decides to stay and become the man of the house, courting both the mother and daughter. Eventually he leaves them both, and Milka has his child.

Title: Crypto
Description: Demoted back to his hometown, a young Wall Street banker is drawn into investigating a tangled web of corruption and fraud in Upstate New York, affecting both his personal life and business career.

Title: Gimme Shelter
Description: A pregnant teenager flees her abusive mother in search of her father, only to be rejected by her stepmother and forced to survive on the streets until a compassionate stranger offers a hopeful alternative.

Title: 100% Wolf
Description: 100% Wolf centers on Freddy Lupin, heir to a proud family line of werewolves. Positive he'll become the most fearsome werewolf ever, Freddy is in for a shock when his first "warfing" goes awry, turning him into a ferocious - poodle.

Title: Without a Trace
Description: Estranged New Yorker (Kate Nelligan) turns to the police after her son disappears.

Title: House II: The Second Story
Description: The new owner of a sinister house gets involved with reanimated corpses and demons searching for an ancient Aztec skull with magic powers.

Title: The Last Face
Description: In the midst of African social horror, a love between two volunteers fades out and is reborn.

Title: Diary of the Dead
Description: A group of young film students run into real-life zombies while filming a horror movie of their own.

Title: The Doorman
Description: A woman returns from combat and befriends a family in NYC. A gang of thieves plot to take the family's valuables, and she is all that stands between them and their lives.

Title: AIMEE: The Visitor
Description: Scott Keyes is a brilliant but misanthropic computer hacker who generally prefers the company of computers to humans.

Title: Stargirl
Description: An unassuming high schooler finds himself inexplicably drawn to the free-spirited new girl, whose unconventional ways change how they see themselves--and each other.

Title: Through a Glass Darkly
Description: Recently released from a mental hospital, Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family in their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.

Title: Rafadan Tayfa 4: Hayrimatör
Description: Although Hayri designed the Hayrimator as an engineering marvel, he could not obtain the power sources to operate it. Hayri manages to activate the Hayrimator with the support of Zobi; However, the villains pursue the invention.

Title: Spetters
Description: Several Dutch teenagers realize the cruel difference between dreams and reality.

Title: Flodder
Description: A rather a-social family, gets a chance to live in an upper-class neighborhood. As they are not accepted by the snobs living there, they get in all sorts of trouble.

Title: Mickey Mouse: Horror House
Description: After Mickey, Goofy, and Donald follow a trio of boys home, the three young men must fight them off to defend themselves.

Title: The Hill
Description: In a North African military prison during World War II, five new prisoners struggle to survive in the face of brutal punishment and sadistic guards.

Title: I'm a Cyborg, But That's OK
Description: A girl who thinks she is a combat cyborg checks into a mental hospital, where she encounters other psychotics. Eventually, she falls for a man who thinks he can steal people's souls.

Title: The Darkness
Description: A family unknowingly awakens an ancient supernatural entity on a Grand Canyon vacation, and must fight for survival when it follows them home.

Title: Outcast
Description: A mysterious warrior teams up with the daughter and son of a deposed Chinese Emperor to defeat their cruel brother, who seeks their deaths.

Title: She Done Him Wrong
Description: In the Gay Nineties, a seductive nightclub singer contends with several suitors, including a jealous escaped convict and a handsome temperance league member.

Title: Call Girl of Cthulhu
Description: When a virginal artist falls in love with a call girl, she turns out to be the chosen bride of the alien god Cthulhu. To save her, he must stop an ancient cult from summoning their god and destroying mankind.

Title: Demonlover
Description: A French corporation goes head-to-head with an American web media company for the rights to a 3-D manga pornography studio, resulting in a power struggle that culminates in violence and espionage.

Title: Zorro: The Gay Blade
Description: Zorro, the legendary swordsman, has passed on his weapon and his sense of duty to his noble son, Diego, a dashing swashbuckler like his father. But after an injury sidelines Diego, he is forced to hand the mask over to his twin, Ramon.

Title: Shakedown
Description: A legal attorney and renegade cop team up to stop a corrupt cop.

Title: A Secret Promise
Description: Hilarity ensues when a handsome businessman goes undercover in New York City as a "Homeless Billionaire."

Title: Hi, Mom!
Description: A Vietnam vet moves into an apartment and peers through other people's windows across the street, meets one of the women, and discovers Black theater.

Title: The Eighth Sense
Description: In Seoul, a senior and freshman confront their inner demons as they embark on a transformative journey of self-discovery, anchored by a bond of the transformative power of human connection.

Title: A Frozen Flower
Description: A historical drama set in the Koryo dynasty and focused on the relationship between a king and his bodyguard.

Title: The Mad Adventures of Rabbi Jacob
Description: A bigoted Frenchman finds himself forced to impersonate a popular rabbi while on the run from a group of assassins - and the police.

Title: 1987: When the Day Comes
Description: In 1987 Korea under an oppressive military regime, the unlawful interrogation and death of a college student ignite ordinary citizens to fight for the truth and bring about justice.

Title: Sex Guaranteed
Description: Kevin has sworn off sex to win back his former fiancé when he meets a beautiful escort named Zade. Over the course of a legendary party, Zade just might provide the spark that this heartbroken idealist needs to turn his life around.

Title: Red Beard
Description: In 19th-century Japan, a rough-tempered yet charitable town doctor trains a young intern.

Title: Lassie
Description: When a family of 4 moves from Baltimore to a farm in rural Virginia, they adopt an abandoned collie. The dog becomes the son's companion and protector, helping him adapt to rural life.

Title: Invisible Beauty
Description: Fashion revolutionary Bethann Hardison looks back on her journey as a pioneering Black model, modeling agent, and activist, shining a light on an untold chapter in the fight for racial diversity.

Title: Warlock: The Armageddon
Description: An order of Druids train their children to battle an evil Warlock determined to unleash Satan upon the world by bringing a collection of five mystic rune stones together.

Title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
Description: Alice (Fiona Fullerton) falls down a rabbit hole and into a magical dream world populated by surreal characters and bewildering adventures. It's a journey of self-discovery for Alice as she searches for a way out of Wonderland and encounters many bizarre creatures such as the White Rabbit (Michael Crawford), the March Hare (Peter Sellers), the Queen of Hearts (Dame Flora Robson), and the Dormouse (Dudley Moore). Musical highlights include the inspiring song "The Me I Never Knew".

Title: The Gallows
Description: 20 years after a horrific accident during a small town school play, students at the school resurrect the failed show in a misguided attempt to honor the anniversary of the tragedy - but soon discover that some things are better left alone.

Title: Chairman of the Board
Description: A surfer becomes the head of a major company.

Title: The Final Terror
Description: A group of rangers go camping on unfamiliar forest grounds. All's well until the group members start getting killed by a cunning killer in the woods.

Title: Nine Guests for a Crime
Description: While spending their annual vacation on a small Mediterranean Island, nine bourgeois family members are stalked and killed one by one by a mysterious killer.

Title: The Hindenburg
Description: A chronicle of the Hindenburg disaster in which a zeppelin burst into flames.

Title: Dracula: Prince of Darkness
Description: Ten years after his demise, Count Dracula is resurrected by his servant and preys on four unsuspecting English tourists who have taken shelter in his castle.

Title: First Kill
Description: A Wall Street broker is forced to evade a police chief investigating a bank robbery as he attempts to recover the stolen money in exchange for his son's life.

Title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Final Transmutation
Description: The Elric brothers' long and winding journey comes to a close in this epic finale, where they must face off against an unworldly, nationwide threat.

Title: Rome, Open City
Description: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

Title: Nude Tuesday
Description: A suburban couple goes to a new-age retreat as a last ditch attempt to save their marriage. Their path to reconnection is riddled with hilarity and humiliation as they seek to find themselves and each other.

Title: Flux Gourmet
Description: Set at an institute devoted to culinary and alimentary performance, a collective finds themselves embroiled in power struggles, artistic vendettas, and gastrointestinal disorders.

Title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer
Description: On his way to becoming an immortal demon, a gang leader orchestrates the murder of an ex-con and his girlfriend.

Title: Hidden Away
Description: Ibrahim, a 14-year-old Moroccan boy, walks down a road in the outskirts of a big city alone and disoriented. Recently informed that he will be deported in two days, he packed his belongings and ran away. He is now alone with no place to go.

Title: New Kids Turbo
Description: Five friends from 'Maaskantje' are getting fired because of the economic crisis. They decide that they won't pay for anything anymore.

Title: System Crasher
Description: 9-year-old Benni is a toss-up between institutions that cannot tackle her outbursts. She wants to move in with her mother, but she can not handle her wild daughter. After Micha is hired Benni slowly opens up and attaches herself to him.

Title: Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning
Description: John looks to take down Luc Deveraux after a home invasion claims his wife and daughter. The fight pits John against Andrew Scott and an army of genetically enhanced warriors; meanwhile, he must contend with a UniSol in relentless pursuit.

Title: Ninja
Description: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

Title: A Man
Description: Akira works as a lawyer. One day, he meets with his former client Rie, who asks Akira to perform a background check on her late husband Daisuke.

Title: Our Family Wedding
Description: The weeks leading up to a young couple's wedding are comic and stressful, especially as their respective fathers try to lay their long standing feud to rest.

Title: Deus
Description: A mysterious black sphere is discovered in the orbit of Mars. The Achilles is sent to investigate. After the bedraggled six-person crew wake from eight months hibernation, the Sphere is transmitting a single word in every Earth language ever known - Deus.

Title: A Raisin in the Sun
Description: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

Title: CB4
Description: A guy makes a documentary of the rap band CB4 by following them. CB4 got popular by stealing Gusto's name, background and image. He wants them dead.

Title: Mob Girl
Description: After years as a mob girlfriend, a woman began to get in on the action herself-eventually becoming a police informant and major witness in the government's case against a crime family.

Title: White Sands
Description: A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.

Title: Talk Radio
Description: A rude, contemptuous talk show host becomes overwhelmed by the hatred that surrounds his program just before it goes national.

Title: Enchanted April
Description: Four English women, after World War I, who are unhappy with their lives, and their time away on vacation in a beautiful Italian villa.

Title: Ginger Snaps 2: Unleashed
Description: Ginger's sister Brigitte, now a werewolf herself, must try to find a cure for her blood lust before the next full moon while hiding out in a rehab clinic from a relentless werewolf.

Title: Rawhead Rex
Description: An ancient creature called Rawhead is awakened from its slumber near an Irish village and goes on a rampage killing anyone in sight.

Title: The Actor
Description: When New York actor Paul Cole is beaten and left for dead in 1950s Ohio, he loses his memory and finds himself stranded in a mysterious small town where he struggles to get back home and reclaim what he's lost.

Title: The Plague Dogs
Description: Two dogs escape from a laboratory and are hunted as possible carriers of the bubonic plague.

Title: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
Description: Zombified chickens attempt to kill the fast-food workers that cook them in a restaurant built on an ancient burial ground.

Title: G.I. Joe: Ever Vigilant
Description: The GI Joe force is reinstated for a confrontation when the Cobra terrorists acquire a deadly new weapon.

Title: The Pass
Description: A romantic interaction between two young footballers profoundly affects one of them throughout the rest of his life and career.

Title: Robinson Crusoe
Description: 1703: Robinson Crusoe has to leave Scotland for a year, but after months sailing, a storm wrecks his ship. He ends up as only survivor on a desolate island.

Title: City Heat
Description: Slick Private Investigator Mike Murphy (Burt Reynolds) and tough Police Lieutenant Speer (Clint Eastwood), once partners, now bitter enemies, reluctantly team up to investigate a murder.

Title: Fantomas Unleashed
Description: When Professor Marchand, a famous scientist, mysteriously disappears, the commissioner, Juve, immediately suspects Fantomas.

Title: The Three-Body Problem: I
Description: A nanomaterials expert sees a mysterious countdown superimposed in his field of vision and finds himself under military investigation. To unravel the mystery, he enters the VR game "Three Body" developed by a secret organization ETO, and discovers the truth behind the deaths of dozens of scientists and a tragedy from the days of the Cultural Revolution.

Title: The Siege of Firebase Gloria
Description: A tough U.S. sergeant and his sidekick roll into a demoralized firebase, where they attempt to rebuild morale and fortifications amid a climactic battle with the Viet Cong.

Title: The Land That Time Forgot
Description: During World War I, a German U-boat sinks a British ship and takes the survivors on board. After it takes a wrong turn, the submarine takes them to the unknown land of Caprona, where they find dinosaurs and neanderthals.

Title: My Life Without Me
Description: A young woman conceals the fact of her terminal cancer to live her life with a passion she never had before.

Title: The Details
Description: When a family of raccoons discover worms living underneath the sod in Jeff and Nealy's backyard, this pest problem begins a darkly comic and wild chain reaction of domestic tension, infidelity and murder.

Title: Empire of the Summer Moon
Description: The story of Comanche warrior and chief Quanah.

Title: The Sunlit Night
Description: An aspiring painter meets eccentric locals and a fellow New Yorker while working on a barn in Norway.

Title: Girl Most Likely
Description: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News.

Title: Sweet Bird of Youth
Description: A drifter and a faded film star, both traumatized by Hollywood, arrive to the guy's hometown, where the old bitter memories revive again.

Title: Ayalaan
Description: A lost alien seeks help to go back to his home, but everything gets harder after the alien returns to its home.

Title: Most Disturbed Person on Planet Earth II
Description: A look at the world's most obscure, obscene and shocking electronic media documentation.

Title: Trouble in Paradise
Description: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.

Title: Permanent Midnight
Description: A comedy writer struggles to overcome his addiction to heroin while putting his professional and personal in danger.

Title: Alex Strangelove
Description: Alex, high school class president, nerd and a straight A student, has been dating Claire a long time. They decide to sleep together but then he meets a gay guy and he's confused.

Title: Broadway Danny Rose
Description: In his attempts to reconcile a lounge singer with his mistress, a hapless talent agent is mistaken as her lover by a jealous gangster.

Title: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
Description: An Irish boy named Keegan and a Spanish girl named Moya journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

Title: Blood Harvest
Description: Jill, visiting home from college, arrives to find her parents missing, and their home vandalized. Soon, matters take a turn for the worse, when she finds herself stalked, and her friends disappearing one by one.

Title: That's a Wrap
Description: Mason Maestro has just directed what he considers to be his masterpiece, a film titled 'That's a Wrap.' One by one, the cast disappears until the true nature of the evening is revealed.

Title: Howling II: ... Your Sister Is a Werewolf
Description: A man discovers that his sister was a werewolf, and helps an investigator track down a gang of the monsters through the United States and eastern Europe.

Title: The Guardian
Description: A young couple with a newborn baby don't realize that the nanny they hired is a magical nymph who sacrifices infants to an evil tree.

Title: Adam
Description: A hard-living salesman becomes a quadriplegic after an accident.

Title: Vampire in Venice
Description: Professor Paris Catalano visits Venice, to investigate the last known appearance of the famous vampire Nosferatu during the carnival of 1786.

Title: The Pez Outlaw
Description: Steve Glew spent the 1990s smuggling rare pez dispensers into the USA from Eastern Europe, making millions of dollars. It was all magical until his arch-nemesis, The Pezident decided to destroy him.

Title: Foxfire
Description: Legs Sadovsky gets four other high school girls to think for themselves and react to a teacher's sexual harassment, which gets them suspended. They bond, and rebel, at an abandoned house.

Title: The Pirates: The Last Royal Treasure
