When an ancient hunger is awakened in the far reaches of space, the Alterian High Council sends newly ordained Collector Maxy Prime to investigate with her nimble sidekick, Gabby Minx. There they discover a mad professor and her students in the grips of the Thanagarian Pleasure Pod, a mega-parasite who's giving everyone good vibrations while slowly sapping them of their very life essence. Will the Femaliens put an end to this tentacle terror, or will they succumb to the beast's cosmic crush?

Title: Ideal Home
Description: A bickering gay couple must suddenly deal with the unexpected task of raising a 10-year-old boy.

Title: I Killed My Mother
Description: A semi-autobiographical story about Hubert as a young homosexual at odds with his mother.

Title: The Naked City
Description: A step-by-step look at a murder investigation on the streets of New York.

Title: Songs from the Second Floor
Description: Where are we humans going? A film poem inspired by the Peruvian poet César Vallejo. We meet people in the city. People trying to communicate, searching compassion and get the connection of small and large things.

Title: Fear City
Description: Strippers in Manhattan are being stalked and maimed by a psycho-killer. A conflicted ex-boxer-turned-talent-manager and his business partner and friend, who represent some of the girls, set out to find him before he strikes again.

Title: Mr. Toad's Wild Ride
Description: Mole's underground home is bought by the Weasels from wealthy landowner Mr. Toad and Mole is thrown out. He and Rat start to fight to get his home back from evil Weasels.

Title: Warriors of the Wasteland
Description: Two mercenaries help wandering caravans fight off an evil and aimless band of white-clad bikers after the nuclear holocaust.

Title: The Tiger
Description: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger.

Title: Ne Zha
Description: Born with unique powers, a boy is recruited to fight demons and save the community that fears him.

Title: After Dark, My Sweet
Description: After he escapes from a mental hospital, a former boxer works for a widow. When she asks him to get involved in a kidnapping, he has second thoughts.

Title: The Fortress
Description: In 1636, King Injo hides in the mountains to avoid being part of the Qing dynasty.

Title: Taking Woodstock
Description: A man working at his parents' motel in the Catskills inadvertently sets in motion the generation-defining concert in the summer of 1969.

Title: Wyrmwood: Road of the Dead
Description: A talented mechanic prepares to battle his way through hordes of flesh-eating monsters after his sister is kidnapped on the eve of a zombie apocalypse.

Title: Roswell Delirium
Description: During the 1980s the US is hit by a wave of nuclear attacks, and after the fallout those who remain pretend like everything is normal even though they are all experiencing radiation poisoning. A young girl named Mayday tries to make contact on a series of ham radios with her father who is in space on a shuttle mission. Instead of making contact she receives a intergalactic distress call from space that leads her on a journey to Spacerock, the land where Area 51 once was. She is exposed to severe levels of radiation and within days all of her organs start to fail. Knowing that medical treatment won't help her mother Wendy brings her back to Spacerock to give her to the aliens in hopes that they may be able to save her.

Title: Knightriders
Description: A medieval reenactment troupe struggles to maintain its family-like dynamic amid pressure from local authorities, interest from talent agents, and their "King's" delusions of grandeur.

Title: Keep the Lights On
Description: In Manhattan, film-maker Erik bonds with closeted lawyer Paul after a fling. As their relationship becomes one fueled by highs, lows, and dysfunctional patterns, Erik struggles to negotiate his own boundaries while being true to himself.

Title: Dad
Description: While his mom recovers in hospital from a heart attack, John puts his busy life on hold to fly home and help his elderly dad around the house. John's son later joins them and they all truly bond for the first and, tragically, final time.

Title: Human Experiments
Description: A demented prison doctor performs gruesome shock therapy experiments on inmates.

Title: The Tower
Description: A Christmas Eve party at a luxury residential building takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

Title: Celebrity Sex Tape
Description: When a group of nerds leaks a washed-up celebrity's sex tape, the publicity revives the actress' career and other Hollywood rejects want to star in the guys' next "production."

Title: Missing You
Description: A little girl who lost her father to a serial killer 15 years ago awaits for his release, while a suspecting detective follows the killer upon release.

Title: Snapshots
Description: When a grandmother's secret past collides with her granddaughter's secret future and her daughter's angry present, can the love of three generations be enough to accept decades of deceit. With a simple roll of film it begins.

Title: The United States of Leland
Description: A young man's experience in a juvenile detention center that touches on the tumultuous changes that befall his family and the community in which he lives.

Title: Go West
Description: A crazy group of pioneers brave the harsh elements and numerous mishaps to travel thousands of miles out west to find a place to call home.

Title: Shin Jigen! Crayon Shin-chan the Movie
Description: Kindergartener Shinnosuke gaining telekinetic superpowers after a white light from space passes through Earth. A counterpart black light gives a man named Mitsuru Hiriya psychic powers of his own, which he uses to try and destroy the Earth. While Japan is gripped by fear, Shinnosuke stands up as its new hero.

Title: Fast and Loose
Description: After the leader of a criminal organization suffers memory loss from an attack, he reunites with his crew, only to find that things aren't what he thinks they are.

Title: A Journey of a Thousand Miles: Peacekeepers
Description: A JOURNEY OF A THOUSAND MILES: PEACEKEEPERS follows three women in an all female, predominantly Muslim unit of police officers sent to post-earthquake Haiti as UN Peacekeepers for one year. The mission challenges these women while shattering commonly held stereotypes

Title: The Prince of Pennsylvania
Description: A teenager in love, who needs money to arrange his future life with his mistress, kidnaps his own father for ransom, but nobody cares.

Title: Harvest Lake
Description: Five friends fall under the seductive influence of a libidinous, otherworldly presence that threatens to change their lives forever.

Title: She Will
Description: An aging film star retreats to the Scottish countryside with her nurse to recover from surgery. While there, mysterious forces of revenge emerge from the land where witches were burned.

Title: The Boy
Description: An intimate portrait of a 9-year-old sociopath's growing fascination with death.

Title: Perfect Sisters
Description: Tired of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, two sisters plot to kill her.

Title: Ferrari: Race to Immortality
Description: The story of the Scuderia Ferrari motor team, which was formed by race car driver Enzo Ferrari.

Title: Soldat Bom
Description: The station-master Fabian Bom is a very meticulous person, and he makes sure that the train leaves exactly - on the second. To him, nothing could be more important than duty, efficiency and punctuality, in fact, his sense of duty is clearly perverted. His beloved Plum-Plum, the major's daughter, is infatuated with army officers. To regain her attention, he joins the army. Bom becomes a soldier who loves the military training, long marches as well as hard labour as punishment. He meets Agnes, who falls madly in love with him.

Title: A Dog's Life
Description: A "shockumentary" consisting of a collection of mostly real archive footage displaying mankind at its most depraved and perverse, displaying bizarre rites, cruel behavior and bestial violence.

Title: Far from Men
Description: Algeria, 1954. Two very different men thrown together by a world in turmoil are forced to flee across the Atlas mountains. Daru, the reclusive teacher, has to escort Mohamed, a villager accused of murder.

Title: Carny
Description: Tired of her dull job as a waitress, Donna decides to join two carnival hustlers and see what life in their field is like.

Title: Starship Troopers: Invasion
Description: A black op has gone terribly wrong. Now, Captain Carmen Ibanez and a hardcore trooper famed as Major Henry "Hero" Varro must lead a team of battle-weary troopers to find the missing ship and discover what went wrong.

Title: Dhoom
Description: Dhoom reinvents the classic cops and robbers tale for the 21st century. Fast bikes, big action, and non-stop fun make for a thrilling story.

Title: The Brothers Karamazov
Description: Drama based on Russian writer Fyodor Dostoevsky's homonymous novel about the proud Karamazov family in 1870s Russia.

Title: Taffin
Description: An Irish tough-guy debt collector is asked by his local community to help rid the town of developers bent on building a chemical plant on the outskirts of town. The developers are ruthless and have sent their heavies into town to keep the locals quiet.

Title: Kaabil
Description: A blind man seeks revenge against a corrupt politician and his brother after his wife is raped and killed.

Title: Maleficarum
Description: Maria Francisca, a wealthy young heiress and her friend Mariana De Castro, a young protestant widow, are accused of witchcraft and taken before the Spanish Inquisition of Lima, Peru.

Title: Le Comte de Monte-Cristo
Description: A new adaptation of the famous novel by Alexandre Dumas.

Title: Drop Zone
Description: A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.

Title: My Life
Description: A terminally ill man prepares for his death.

Title: Haunting of the Innocent
Description: Tom and Brenda have the perfect life but when Brenda is violently attacked in the comfort of their home, their perfect lives are thrown into chaos and fear.

Title: Sweet Sweetback's Baadasssss Song
Description: After saving a Black Panther from some racist cops, a black male prostitute goes on the run from "the man" with the help of the ghetto community and some disillusioned Hells Angels.

Title: Tumse Na Ho Payega
Description: In a hilarious turn of events, Gaurav and his friends rediscover themselves when they decide to follow their hearts and defy the expectations of society.

Title: The Last Laugh
Description: When retired talent manager Al Hart is reunited with his first client, Buddy Green, a comic who quit show business 50 years ago, he convinces Buddy to escape their retirement community and hit the road for a cross-country comedy tour.

Title: Fast Color
Description: After years in hiding, a woman is forced to go on the run when her superhuman abilities are discovered. Years after having abandoned her family, the only place she has left to hide is home.

Title: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
Description: The girls of St. Trinians are on the hunt for buried treasure after discovering headmistress Miss Fritton is related to a famous pirate.

Title: Class Action Park
Description: A documentary that focuses on a dangerously legendary water park and its slew of injuries and crimes along with child safety concerns.

Title: The Story of Ruth
Description: Inspired by the scriptural tale. Moabitess priestess Ruth is drawn both to a Judean man and to his talk of a forgiving God. After tragedy strikes, she begins a new life in Bethlehem.

Title: Enigma
Description: A C.I.A. Agent tries to infiltrate Soviet intelligence to stop a murderous diabolical plot.

Title: The Express
Description: A drama based on the life of college football hero Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy.

Title: Thank God It's Friday
Description: A Friday in the life of the disco club The Zoo, where the staff and clients meet and dance their lives away.

Title: Khartoum
Description: In the Sudan, in 1884 to 1885, Egyptian forces led by British General Charles "Chinese" Gordon (Charlton Heston) defend Khartoum against an invading Muslim Army led by a religious fanatic, Mohammed Ahmed el Mahdi (Sir Laurence Olivier).

Title: All About Eve
Description: Eve shows up in the dressing room of Broadway mega-star Margo Channing and tells Margo and her friends a melancholy life story. Margo takes Eve under her wing, only to have Eve use her and connive against her.

Title: Desierto
Description: A group of people trying to cross the border from Mexico into the United States encounter a racist man who has taken border patrol duties into his own hands.

Title: Fort Bliss
Description: After returning home from an extended tour in Afghanistan, a decorated U.S. Army medic and single mother struggles to rebuild her relationship with her young son.

Title: The Match
Description: Inspired by true events from the spring of 1944 when the Nazis organized a soccer match between a team of camp inmates and an elite Nazi team on Adolf Hitler's birthday. A match the prisoners are determined to win, no matter what happens

Title: The Gendarme and the Gendarmettes
Description: Cruchot and his gendarmes from Saint-Tropez receive a highly responsible government mission - to ensure the safety of four young beautiful female gendarmes officers. In a few days they begin to be abducted by mysterious villains.

Title: Cannibal! The Musical
Description: The sole survivor of an ill-fated mining expedition tells how his taste for gold was replaced by that of human flesh.

Title: The Men's Club
Description: A group of men get together to form a "discussion group". They share their feelings about women, life, love, and work. The party gets rowdier and rowdier, and then the wife returns home. Thrown out, the men are not yet willing to call it a night.

Title: Sodom and Gomorrah
Description: Sex, torture, and betrayal in Biblical Sodom and Gomorrah. Lot, leader of the Hebrews, believes that his people can co-exist with the Sodomites--a disastrous decision.

Title: The Innocent
Description: Tullio Hermil is a chauvinist aristocrat who flaunts his mistress to his wife, but when he believes she has been unfaithful, he becomes enamored of her again.

Title: Frozen Land
Description: One bad event begins a chain reaction of misery as problems transfer from one person to another. It starts when a schoolteacher is fired and projects his issues onto his teenage son.

Title: The Legend of Conan
Description: The plot is unknown at this time.

Title: They Found Us
Description: During a camping trip in the Utah wilderness to heal their broken relationship, a father and daughter must fight against a hostile extraterrestrial lifeform to prevent their abduction to an unknown and terrifying alien world.

Title: Major
Description: Based on the life of Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan, who was martyred in action during the November 2008 Mumbai attacks.

Title: Before the Dawn
Description: After an encounter with a troubled student crosses the line, a young high school teacher struggles between giving into her desires and doing the right thing.

Title: Leprechaun 2
Description: On his one thousandth birthday, an evil leprechaun selects the descendant of one of his slaves to have as his bride, leaving it up to the girl's boyfriend to save her.

Title: The Spine of Night
Description: Ultra-violent, epic fantasy set in a land of magic follows heroes from different eras and cultures battling against a malevolent force.

Title: The Last Metro
Description: In occupied Paris, an actress married to a Jewish theater owner must keep him hidden from the Nazis while doing both of their jobs.

Title: Sahara
Description: After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, during the Allied retreat in the Libyan desert, an American tank picks-up a motley group of survivors but they face advancing Germans and a lack of water.

Title: Love at Stake
Description: In this spoof inspired by the Salem witch trials the town's mayor and the judge agree to sentence several innocent townspeople to death for witchcraft in order to confiscate their land for themselves. However, sexy real witches show up.

Title: Jakob's Wife
Description: Anne, married to a small-town Minister, feels her life has been shrinking over the past 30 years. Encountering "The Master" brings her a new sense of power and an appetite to live bolder. However, the change comes with a heavy body count.

Title: Dominick and Eugene
Description: Dominick and Eugene are twins, but Dominick is a little bit slow due to an accident in his youth. They live together, with Dominick working as garbage man to put Eugene through medical school. Their relationship becomes strained when Eugene must decide between his devotion to his brother, or his need to go away to complete his training. Things are also not helped by Dominick's co-worker, or Eugene's budding romance.

Title: Good Neighbours
Description: Victor is new to Montreal and attempts to make friends with the wheelchair-bound Spencer and the cat-loving Louise, but everybody is on edge with a serial killer terrorizing the neighborhood.

Title: Salvation Boulevard
Description: Set in the world of mega-churches in which a former Deadhead-turned-born again-Christian finds himself on the run from fundamentalist members of his mega-church who will do anything to protect their larger-than-life pastor.

Title: Six Triple Eight
Description: 855 women joined the war to fix the three-year backlog of undelivered mail. Faced with discrimination and a country devastated by war, they managed to sort more than 17 million pieces of mail ahead of time.

Title: Godzilla and Mothra: The Battle for Earth
Description: Japan is caught in the middle of a three way battle between Godzilla, the divine Mothra, and her dark counterpart Battra.

Title: Death Line
Description: When a government official disappears in the London tunnels, after several reports of missing people in the same location, Scotland Yard start to take the matter seriously, along with a couple who stumble into a victim by accident.

Title: Lovers of the Arctic Circle
Description: In Lapland's cold Arctic Circle, under the eternal midnight sun, unfavourable circumstances reunite two kindred spirits. And governed by circular motifs woven by faith and love, they must answer a pivotal question. Can they deny destiny?

Title: Marfa Girl 2
Description: A young mother living in Marfa, Texas struggles to raise her child after suffering from a brutal sexual assault.

Title: Catfight
Description: The rivalry between two former college friends comes to a head when they both attend the same glamorous event.

Title: Miracle in Cell No. 7
Description: Joselito (Aga Muhlach), an intellectually-disabled man, is wrongfully charged with sexual assault, kidnapping, and murder of a little girl. In prison he becomes friends with his fellow inmates and together they form a plan to smuggle his young daughter (Xia Vigor) inside the cell. Years after, his daughter (Bella Padilla) becomes a lawyer and is determined to prove her father's innocence.

Title: Swan Song
Description: A formerly flamboyant hairdresser takes a long walk across a small town to style a dead woman's hair.

Title: Corky Romano
Description: The loser son of a Mafia honcho must go undercover for the FBI.

Title: Pokémon Detective Pikachu Sequel
Description: Plot kept under wraps.

Title: Encounter
Description: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.

Title: Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama 2
Description: The babes are back. And so is everyone's favorite wish-grantin', murder-lovin' mischievous gremlin, the Imp. The Pi-Ep sorority house has seen better days, but the girls are intent on gaining some new recruits. With housemother Auntie Snake as their guide, the naughty hi-jinks and hilarity begin. Meanwhile, though, the Bowl-O-Rama bowling alley has had a break-in, and a breakout. With the escape of the magical and murderous Imp, it's a fight for survival, with only one mysterious girl holding the answers to the riddle of the Imp's wish.

Title: Erotic Ghost Story
Description: Three women who are Taoist devotees are tricked by the Wu-Tung demon god into following their sexual desires.

Title: Good Night Oppy
Description: The film follows Opportunity, the Mars Exploration Rover affectionately dubbed Oppy by her creators and scientists at NASA. Oppy was originally expected to live for only 90 days but she ultimately explored Mars for nearly 15 years.

Title: The Talk of the Town
Description: An escaped prisoner has to prove his innocence to a stuffy law professor with the help of a spirited school teacher.

Title: An Autumn Afternoon
Description: An aging widower arranges a marriage for his only daughter.

Title: The Wild Bunch
Description: A gang of American bandits try to elude bounty hunters during the waning days of the wild West. A remake of the 1969 film directed by Sam Peckinpah.

Title: Little Men
Description: Based on the classic novel by Louisa May Alcott. When two homeless boys from Boston find themselves at Plumfield, a rural boarding school run by Jo and her husband, the boys learn both academic and life lessons they won't ever forget.

Title: Big Boys Don't Cry
Description: Connolly recalls childhood in children's home after police probe friend's suicide. He struggles to connect with Anthea while confronting those behind his troubled past and friend's death. Inspired by real events.

Title: Hunk
Description: A computer nerd makes a deal with the Devil and gets a new beefcake body.

Title: The Bed Sitting Room
Description: In post-nuclear-holocaust England, a handful of bizarre characters struggles on with their lives in the ruins, among endless heaps of ash, piles of broken crockery and brick, muddy plains, and heaps of dentures and old boots. Patriotically singing "God Save Mrs. Ethel Shroake, Long Live Mrs. Ethel Shroake", they wander through this surrealistic landscape, forever being warned by the police to "keep moving", and prone to the occasional mutation into a parrot, cupboard, or even--yes, a bed-sitting room with "No Wogs" scrawled in the grime on its windows. In particular, this story revolves around the odd "love story" of a girl who lives with her parents in one compartment of a London Underground train, the commuter in the next compartment, and the doctor they meet after returning above ground in search of a nurse for the heavily-pregnant girl.

Title: Death Kiss
Description: A vigilante with a mysterious past moves into a city that has been infested with crime and terror. He then takes the law into his own hands so that he can save and protect a young mother and her child.

Title: Heaven's Prisoners
Description: A hardened New Orleans cop, Dave Robicheaux, finally tosses in the badge and settles into life on the bayou with his wife. But a bizarre plane crash draws him back into the fray when his family is viciously threatened.

Title: Blood Rage
Description: A boy kills a man and accuses his twin brother of the murder, and the innocent brother ends up institutionalized, while his psychotic twin goes free. 10 years later, the innocent twin escapes, which triggers his brother into killing again.

Title: Impostor
Description: In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.

Title: Frances
Description: The story of Frances Farmer's meteoric rise to fame in Hollywood and the tragic turn her life took when she was blacklisted.

Title: Miss Julie
Description: Over the course of a midsummer night in Fermanagh in 1890, an unsettled daughter of the Anglo-Irish aristocracy encourages her father's valet to seduce her.

Title: The Paradise Motel
Description: A battered wife on the run searching for paradise finds that paradise isn't always. Nothing is as it seems.

Title: Most Wanted
Description: In 1989, a Canadian journalist investigates the circumstances surrounding the suspicious arrest of a heroin addict imprisoned in a Thai jail.

Title: Paradise, Hawaiian Style
Description: Rick Richards is a helicopter pilot who wants to set up a charter flying service in Hawaii -- along the way he makes some friends, including a young Hawaiian girl and her father, romances Judy Hudson, and sings a few songs.

Title: Black Mountain Side
Description: At a cold, desolate, northmost outpost in Canada, an archaeological discovery is made. A specialist arrives Nov. 1. Strange things happen. All contact with the outside world is down.

Title: Rolling Thunder Revue
Description: In an alchemic mix of fact and fantasy, Martin Scorsese looks back at Bob Dylan's 1975 Rolling Thunder Revue tour and a country ripe for reinvention.

Title: Ordet
Description: Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.

Title: Kopps
Description: When a small-town police station is threatened with shutting down because of too little crime, the police realize that something must be done.

Title: Pokémon the Movie: I Choose You!
Description: Ash Ketchum from Pallet Town is 10 years old today. This means he is now old enough to become a Pokémon Trainer. Ash dreams big about the adventures he will experience after receiving his first Pokémon from Professor Oak.

Title: The Coca-Cola Kid
Description: Ex-marine turned Coca-Cola marketing guru Becker is on a mission to boost sales in Australia when he discovers a dry spot in the Outback, where everyone is guzzling homegrown brew - and not a drop of his company's cola.

Title: Down to Earth
Description: After dying before his time, an aspiring black comic gets a second shot at life - by being placed in the body of a wealthy white businessman.

Title: Gentleman's Agreement
Description: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

Title: Diary of a Country Priest
Description: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

Title: Fabian: Going to the Dogs
Description: 1930s Berlin. Dr. Jakob Fabian, who works by day in advertising for a cigarette company and by night wanders the streets of the city, falls in love with an actress. As her career begins to blossom, prospects for his future begin to wane.

Title: The Trace of Your Lips
Description: Román is an actor who works in B-movies and who's isolated in his apartment as a pandemic keeps the world on edge. Aldo, an indigenous young man, is an essential worker who's allowed by the authorities to come and go. They live across from each other in an apartment complex. They meet online, and they can talk and even see each other in videocalls, but they can't meet in person. Eventually, the temptation to break out of their lockdown comes up.

Title: Hacker
Description: With the help of his new friends Alex Danyliuk turns to a life of crime and identity theft.

Title: Abigail
Description: Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed because of an epidemic and Abby's father was one of the sick. Going against the authorities to find her father, Abby learns that her city is actually full of magic.

Title: The Cure for Insomnia
Description: Not really following any standard plot structure, the film mostly consists of poet L.D. Groban reciting his own poem of 4,080 pages, inter-spliced with X-rated film footage and rock music videos.

Title: Deck the Heart
Description: When an EVP inherits a manor, he's expected to host his family for Christmas. Since he doesn't have time or Christmas spirit, he hires an event planner. As Merry decorates and plans, she wins him over and helps him love Christmas again.

Title: The Island
Description: A journalist takes his son with him to investigate pirate activity off the coast of Florida. But he gets stranded on a mysterious island--where he might not be alone.

Title: That Darn Cat
Description: A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.

Title: Carne
Description: A worker in a meat-packing factory becomes the girl of strangers. After she makes love to her boyfriend, she is raped by a fellow worker.

Title: Everybody's Fine
Description: Matteo decides to take a trip across Italy to go visiting his five children.

Title: What Have I Done to Deserve This?
Description: The vicissitudes of Gloria, a neurotic housewife, and her family's peculiar characters.

Title: Saint Nick of Bethlehem
Description: Original story about a man who lost his son, became Santa to many, reunites with his love, and brings hope to all. Distraught over losing his son, Nick, finds closure and discovers a new purpose when he takes on the role of Santa Claus.

Title: She's Gotta Have It
Description: Story of a woman and her three lovers.

Title: Baba Yaga
Description: A photographer finds herself falling under the spell of a witch.

Title: Backtrace
Description: The lone surviving thief of a violent bank robbery is sprung from a high security facility and administered an experimental drug.

Title: Jersey
Description: A cricketer who quits cricket decides to revive his career at the age of 36 for his sons dream and prove his ability.

Title: A Trip to Infinity
Description: Can we experience the infinite? The world''s most modern scientists and mathematicians embark on a search for the infinite and its amazing effects on the universe.

Title: A Tale of Love and Darkness
Description: The story of Amos Oz's youth, set against the backdrop of the end of the British Mandate for Palestine and the early years of the State of Israel. The film details the young man's relationship with his mother and his beginnings as a writer, while looking at what happens when the stories we tell become the stories we live.

Title: The Silent Hour
Description: Follows a hearing impaired police detective who works as an interpreter for the department and must confront a team of corrupt cops trying to eliminate a deaf murder witness in an apartment building.

Title: Under the Sand
Description: When her husband goes missing at the beach, a female professor begins to mentally disintegrate as her denial of his disappearance becomes delusional.

Title: There Are No Saints
Description: A man nicknamed "the Jesuit," is imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit. When his wife is murdered and his son kidnapped and taken to Mexico, he devises an elaborate and dangerous plan to rescue his son and avenge the murder.

Title: Chile '76
Description: Chile, 1976. Carmen heads off to her beach house. When the family priest asks her to take care of a young man he is sheltering in secret, Carmen steps onto unexplored territories, away from the quiet life she is used to.

Title: The Incident
Description: Two parallel stories about characters trapped in illogical endless spaces: two brothers and a detective locked on an infinite staircase, and a family locked on an infinite road - for a very long time.

Title: Don't Go in the House
Description: A disturbed young man who was burned as a child by his sadistic mother stalks women with a flamethrower.

Title: Welcome to the Punch
Description: When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.

Title: The Sign of the Cross
Description: A Roman soldier becomes torn between his love for a Christian woman and his loyalty to Emperor Nero.

Title: Mad to Be Normal
Description: During the 1960s, a renegade Scottish psychiatrist courts controversy within his profession for his approach to the field, and for the unique community he creates for his patients to inhabit.

Title: The Perfect Game
Description: Based on a true story, a group of boys from Monterrey, Mexico who became the first non-U.S. team to win the Little League World Series.

Title: The Public
Description: An act of civil disobedience turns into a standoff with police when homeless people in Cincinnati take over the public library to seek shelter from the bitter cold.

Title: Balloon
Description: East Germany, 1979. After initially failing to flee from the East to the West in a self-built hot-air balloon, two families struggle to make a second attempt, while the East German State Police are chasing them.

Title: The Cleansing Hour
Description: Another successful "exorcism" streamed online - or so it seems. Can the "exorcist", producer and their team bring the ratings up? Ratings skyrocket, when a real demon gets involved.

Title: In This Corner (and Other Corners) of the World
Description: A spirited 18-year-old woman is married off to a man she barely knows as she combats the daily struggles of living in Hiroshima during World War II.

Title: The Born Losers
Description: Billy Jack battles a motorcycle gang in a small California beach town.

Title: Won't You Be My Neighbor?
Description: An exploration of the life, lessons, and legacy of iconic children's television host Fred Rogers.

Title: Simon
Description: Simón, a Venezuelan freedom fighter exiled in Miami, copes not only with trauma, but also deep guilt over a choice he must make: stay in Miami and start a new life, or return home to the losing fight against a tyrannical regime.

Title: Classmates
Description: A computer mix-up gives two college freshmen the chance to swap places but things take a turn when the switch puts them both in danger

Title: Castle Falls
Description: Rival gangs seek out millions of dollars hidden inside a hospital that's scheduled to be demolished, but first they have to deal with the construction worker who found the loot first.

Title: Psycho Raman
Description: Ramanna, a maniac murderer, finds a soulmate in Raghavan, a policeman, who inspects his murder cases. He tries to make Raghavan realize how they both are similar.

Title: At the End of the Tunnel
Description: A paraplegic computer engineer in a wheelchair starts hearing noises and voices of bank robbers in his basement.

Title: Cleaner
Description: A group of activists ambush an energy company's annual meeting and take 300 people hostage.

Title: Spaghetti Junction
Description: An atmospheric tale blurring fantasy and reality to tell the story of August, a recently disabled teenager in America's deep south. One night August sees a flash in the sky and begins having strange dreams that beckon her to a cave in the woods. Here she encounters a mysterious injured boy called "The Traveler", who needs her help.

Title: Henry Danger: The Movie
Description: A theatrical film based on the Nickelodeon Show 'Henry Danger.'

Title: Coppelia
Description: When everyone in town falls under the spell of charismatic cosmetic surgeon Doctor Coppelius, feisty Swan must save her sweetheart Franz before his heart is used to spark life into Coppelia, the robot-woman the Doctor has created.

Title: Breakout
Description: Having taken control of a maximum security prison, a criminal mastermind faces off against a retired Black Ops agent who had been visiting his incarcerated son.

Title: Spencer's Mountain
Description: Grand Teton quarryman and family patriarch carefully navigates issues of religion and education in order to eke out a brighter future for his family.

Title: Hai mai avuto paura?
Description: Inspired by the work of an award-winning Italian novelist, this post-modern noir fantasy is centered on the image of a young poet and his aristocratic family. Set in the 1800s the plot develops around an ancient curse and a series of mysterious and terrifying events occurring on the family country estate. Featuring authentic period sets and costumes, the film is a metaphor of maturing and becoming, where death and rebirth intertwine and perpetuate each other in a continuous flux of life.

Title: Sandwich
Description: A newly wed couple invites a woman for threesome. Unknown to them someone is watching their sexcapade. When the threesome becomes foursome, that's when chaos begins.

Title: The Breaking Ice
Description: The blossoming relationship between three young adults in their twenties.

Title: Reefer Madness
Description: Cautionary tale that features a fictionalized take on marijuana use. A trio of drug dealers lead innocent teenagers to become addicted to "reefer" cigarettes by holding wild parties with jazz music.

Title: 'Round Midnight
Description: A troubled, but talented musician flees the US to escape his problems, finding refuge and support in Paris.

Title: El mestre que va prometre el mar
Description: Based on Antoni Benaiges story.

Title: Time Now
Description: A young mother returns to her estranged hometown of Detroit after the sudden death of her twin brother and immerses herself in his friend group, soon discovering that his death is not what it seems.

Title: The Terror
Description: A French Army officer, Lieutenant Duvalier, has been separated from his unit and receives help from a mysterious woman. He follows her to the castle of Baron Von Lepp only to find that she is the Baron's wife who died 20 years ago.

Title: American Skin
Description: A Marine veteran working as a school janitor tries to mend his relationship with his son after a divorce. When his son is killed by a police officer found innocent without standing trial, he takes matters into his own hands.

Title: Air Strike
Description: During World War II, five different Chinese people fight their way through Japanese Air Force attacks to protect an important military machine in Chongqing, 1940.

Title: Sgt. Bilko
Description: Sgt. Bilko is a well-liked conman in charge of the army base's motor pool, developing a hover tank and unofficially of gambling etc. One man hates Bilko and he's coming to inspect the base for possible closure.

Title: The Summer House
Description: A haunting portrait of a well-established German family living on the outskirts of Berlin in their ideal world, but are slowly shaken by external influences.

Title: Juliet
Description: A romantic drama in which a young woman learns she may be related to the people who inspired one of the most tragic love stories of all time.

Title: Gasoline Alley
Description: A man implicated in the triple homicide of three Hollywood starlets begins his own investigation. Needing assistance, he enlists the two detectives on his tail in order to expose a conspiracy more explosive than any of them imagined.

Title: Whistle
Description: At Whistle High School, misfit students stumble upon a cursed object, an ancient Aztec death whistle. They find that when they blow the whistle, the terrifying sound it emits will invoke their future deaths to hunt them down.

Title: Stroszek
Description: In Berlin, an alcoholic man, recently released from prison, joins his elderly friend and a prostitute in a determined dream to leave Germany and seek a better life in Wisconsin.

Title: Killers Anonymous
Description: A support group of killers is held regularly. The participants sit in a circle of trust and share their transgressions.

Title: Captive
Description: A single mother struggling with drug addiction is taken hostage in her own apartment by a man on the run who has broken out of jail and murdered the judge assigned to his case.

Title: Payback
Description: Oscar Bonsetter tells a dying prisoner that he will take revenge on the sadistic guard who killed him. In exchange, Oscar is told of a stash of money. Oscar is eventually released from prison but when he goes to get revenge, he gets sidetracked by the now-handicapped guard and his alluring wife, Rose. The tension builds as Oscar becomes more and more attracted to Rose.

Title: A Troll in Central Park
Description: An evil Queen banishes a flower loving troll named Stanley (Dom DeLuise) to New York City, where he befriends two young children.

Title: Ex-Husbands
Description: When Peter Pearce flies to Tulum, crashing his son Nick's bachelor party, Peter realizes he's not the only Pearce man in crisis.

Title: Deerskin
Description: A man's obsession with his designer deerskin jacket causes him to blow his life savings and turn to crime.

Title: Roxanne Roxanne
Description: In the late 80s/ early 1990s, the most feared battle MC in Queens, New York, was a fierce teenage girl with the weight of the world on her shoulders. At the age of 14, Lolita "Roxanne Shanté" Gooden was well on her way to becoming a hip-hop legend as she hustled to provide for her family while defending herself from the dangers of the streets of the Queensbridge Projects in NYC.

Title: Good Bad Things
Description: Follows Danny as he sets out to win over a dating app as a potential client for his business. An encounter with a photographer sparks a transformation, leading him on a journey of self-acceptance.

Title: Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie
Description: The AVGN must overcome his phobia of the worst video game in the world to save his fans.

Title: Dragon Fury
Description: A team of experts travels deep into the mountains to find a dangerous creature.

Title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
Description: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

Title: Someone, Somewhere
Description: Rémy is a young Parisian with an unskilled job. Mélanie is a young Parisienne who works in scientific research. Two depressive moods living in close proximity, but being unaware of each other. Will they ever meet?

Title: Guns 3: Alias Billy the Kid
Description: Plot kept under wraps. Third installment of the 'Young Guns' film franchise.

Title: Mukundan Unni Associates
Description: Advocate Mukundan Unni, played by Vineeth Sreenivasan wants to be successful and leaves no stone unturned to achieve growth, prosperity, and respect. But this steadfast nature aided with an ample dose of greed comes with a cost.

Title: Fantasm Comes Again
Description: An intern and a professional writer at a newspaper agency read ten letters sent to their sexual advice column detailing the erotic escapades of various women.
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

Title: Twist
Description: A Modern take on the classic tale of Oliver Twist.

Title: The Rascals
Description: France, 1942. Even during the war, when the country was occupied by German troops, the life of students of the Catholic college went on as usual. Didier, who secretly knits blankets for French soldiers, having received a letter from two girls from a nearby college, decides to go on a date with his friend Bernard, a rather frivolous teenager. It turns out that the girl is only one and her name is Marie-Helen, an older and more mature girl. Didier is not thrilled with her. But Bernard kindled with love. But to approach her is not so easy.

Title: Flossie
Description: A young embassy officer in Stockholm has an unexpected and mysterious encounter with a strange woman who introduces the fascinating, yet inexperienced teenager Flossie to him with the intention to gently and softly seduce her.

Title: Mr. Jones
Description: After being arrested during a manic episode, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder is treated by a psychiatrist who begins to develop romantic feelings towards him.

Title: The Pass
Description: A married couple gives each other one night off from fidelity - a "hall pass" and their lives are quickly turned upside down as the one night of pleasure becomes a tool of deception.

Title: Classified
Description: A career CIA hitman who's been solely using the classified section of various newspapers to receive his orders suddenly learns from his estranged daughter that his division's actually been shut down for years.

Title: Eye of the Storm
Description: Right after thoracic surgeon Dr. Xia is called back to treat an emergency patient, an unknown virus outbreak forces the hospital to go into lockdown, trapping Xia, along with hundreds of healthcare providers, patients, and their families.

Title: Riphagen
Description: The story about Riphagen, a cunning Dutch traitor during WW2 who helped Nazi round up Jews, stealing their treasures for himself. He destroyed Resistance groups, making many who pursued justice after the war look like fools.

Title: Ice Cold: Murder, Coffee and Jessica Wongso
Description: This documentary delves into the unanswered questions surrounding the trial of Jessica Wongso years after the death of her best friend, Mirna Salihin.

Title: The Girl in the Park
Description: Still traumatized by the disappearance of her three-year-old daughter 15 years ago, Julia Sandburg's old psychic wounds painfully resurface when she meets Louise; a troubled young woman with a checkered past.

Title: Berlin Alexanderplatz
Description: A man from Guinea-Bissau moves to Germany, where he is befriended by a drug dealer and two women.

Title: Sex & Fury
Description: During the Meiji era, a gambler called Ocho takes revenge on three gangsters who killed her father, shelters a wanted anarchist and confronts a British spy.

Title: The Thin Man Goes Home
Description: Nick and Nora head to Nick's hometown of Sycamore Springs to spend some time with his parents. His father, a prominent local physician, was always a bit disappointed with Nick's choice of profession in particular and his lifestyle in general. With Nick's arrival however the towns folk, including several of the local criminal element, are convinced that he must be there on a case despite his protestations that he's just there for rest and relaxation. When someone is shot dead on his doorstep however, Nick finds himself working on a case whether he wants to or not.

Title: Casa Grande
Description: Exploring issues of class privilege among Rio's decadent elite, Casa Grande depicts a teenage boy's struggle to escape his overprotective parents as they covertly spiral into bankruptcy.

Title: One True Thing
Description: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.

Title: Louder Than Bombs
Description: The fractious family of a father and his two sons confront their different feelings and memories of their deceased wife and mother, a famed war photographer.

Title: God's Country Song
Description: Noah Bryan wants nothing more than to be the next big country music star, until his past catches up with him.

Title: Tickle Me
Description: A singing rodeo rider hires on at an expensive all-women dude ranch and beauty spa. He falls for a pretty fitness trainer who is constantly threatened by a gang who wants her late grandfather's cache of gold hidden in a ghost town.

Title: Family
Description: An emotionally-stunted aunt tries to bond with her 13-year-old niece, who wants nothing more than to run away and become a Juggalo.

Title: Young Lucrezia
Description: In the early-16th century, the mighty Borgia family, Cesare Borgia and his pitiless sister Lucrezia rule all Italy. Cesare, incestuously in love with his sister, commits a crime and starts a war campaign in Romagna. Lucrezia, meanwhile, gets pregnant. Cesare returns victorious from the war, and the Pope is then forced to separate his two children.

Title: The Collected
Description: This is the third film in The Collector film series. Follow up to The Collection (2012) by Marcus Dunstan and Patrick Melton.

Title: One Day All This Will Be Yours
Description: Successful cartoonist Lisa and her siblings gather at their parents' farm for the first time in over ten years. The parents want only one of them to inherit the forest, which has been in the family's possessions for generations.

Title: Der kleine Dicke mit dem großen Langen
Description: Two crooks on the run wind up in a small village full of sexually unsatisfied women.

Title: Julien Donkey-Boy
Description: A portrait of the effects of schizophrenia on family life is the central focus.

Title: The House in Marsh Road
Description: A novelist and his sexy lover plot to kill the novelist's wife so he can inherit her fortune including her house that happens to be haunted.

Title: The Children Act
Description: As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle.

Title: Time to Leave
Description: A fashion photographer with terminal cancer elects to die alone, preparing others to live past him rather than prolong the inevitable with chemotherapy or be smothered in sympathy by those who know him.

Title: Justice Society: World War II
Description: The Justice Society of America, a group of heroes aiding the allies in World War 2, acquire an ally from the future who sends them on an adventure that changes history.

Title: Southern Gospel
Description: When a rock n roll star's life comes crashing down, he must fight his past demons to realize his childhood ambition of becoming a preacher.

Title: Red Dust
Description: The owner of a rubber plantation becomes involved with the new wife of one of his employees.

Title: Boy A
Description: The story of a young Jack, newly released from serving a prison sentence for a violent crime he committed as a child.

Title: Helen's Dead
Description: A young woman discovers that her boyfriend is sleeping with her cousin Helen and goes to confront them at a dinner party, only to find out that Helen is dead and everybody is a suspect.

Title: Exhibit A
Description: The timely story of a normal family disintegrating under financial pressure, eventually driven to the unimaginable. We witness the terrifying events unfold through daughter Judith's video camera, which subsequently becomes Exhibit A.

Title: The Mambo Kings
Description: Two Cuban brothers bring a new music to the 1950s USA. They are as different as the problems that await them.

Title: Savage Beach
Description: DEA agents flying cargo as part of their cover make an emergency landing on a remote island in the pacific, where several unscrupulous parties are looking for a WWII gold treasure.

Title: Olappeeppi
Description: Malayali family's ordinary life in Kerala from 1970s-2000s told through young Unni and grandmother's perspectives, recalling past eras.

Title: Bushwick
Description: When a U.S. based military force invades their Brooklyn neighborhood, 20-year-old Lucy and war veteran Stupe must depend on each other to survive.

Title: Dementia 13
Description: A scheming widow hatches a bold plan to acquire her late husband's inheritance, unaware that she is being targeted by an ax murderer who lurks in the family's estate.

Title: Little Joe
Description: Alice, a single mother, is a dedicated senior plant breeder at a corporation engaged in developing new species. Against company policy, she takes one home as a gift for her teenage son and names it after him but soon starts fearing it.

Title: For Richer or Poorer
Description: An unhappily married Manhattan socialite couple flee from the I.R.S. and end up in Amish country where they pretend to be visiting relatives.

Title: All the Queen's Horses
Description: How could one woman steal $53 million without anyone noticing? All the Queen's Horses tells the story of Rita Crundwell as self, the perpetrator of the largest case of municipal fraud in American history.

Title: Godzilla vs. Megaguirus
Description: Japan creates an artificial black hole device to trap Godzilla forever, but a test of the device creates new foes for Godzilla, car-sized dragonflies called meganula and their queen, Megaguirus.

Title: The Banishing
Description: The Banishing tells the story of the most haunted house in England. In the 1930s, a young reverend, his wife and daughter move into a manor with a horrifying secret.

Title: Jungle Run
Description: Sibling adventurers come under attack from jungle animals while searching for their missing father. As they fight back against the relentless onslaught, they soon start to realize something much more sinister is happening.

Title: Madman
Description: A legendary psychopathic murderer stalks a summer camp.

Title: Puppet Master: The Littlest Reich
Description: All hell breaks loose when a strange force animates the puppets up for auction at a convention, setting them on a bloody killing spree that's motivated by an evil as old as time.

Title: Sink the Bismarck!
Description: The World War II story of the Royal Navy's effort to defeat Nazi Germany's most powerful warship.

Title: I'll Be Right There
Description: Wanda wants to take care of everyone in her life. She barely has time for herself, not that she would know what to do with it anyway.

Title: Explanation for Everything
Description: Abel is a high school student struggling to focus on his final exams, while being hopelessly in love with his best friend Janka.

Title: Another Dirty Movie
Description: Two college film students set out to make an homage to Charlie LaRue. Not for art or money; they're doing it to get a hot chick.

Title: Speedway
Description: Poor bookkeeping saddles stock car driver Steve Grayson with a huge bill for back taxes which hampers his ability to continue racing competitively.

Title: Wasteland
Description: A young man recently released from prison recruits his three best friends to rob the local drug kingpin who is responsible for his incarceration. Can he get revenge and win back his fed-up girlfriend?

Title: The Bygone
Description: When a young rancher crosses paths with a Lakota girl from a nearby reservation, her mysterious disappearance sparks a search that uncovers a harrowing past and hints at a dire future.

Title: Portal
Description: When an ambitious ghost hunter performs a risky ritual, opening a portal to "the other side," he and his team quickly find themselves way in over their heads in a fight for survival against an ancient demonic force.

Title: Little Fauss and Big Halsy
Description: The friendship between two Arizona dirt bike racers is tested when they both lust for an attractive runaway young woman who joins them on the racing circuit.

Title: Violet & Daisy
Description: Two teenage assassins accept what they think will be a quick-and-easy job, until an unexpected target throws them off their plan.

Title: The Rachel Papers
Description: Charles Highway (Dexter Fletcher) is in control of his life; he is about to finish sixth form college and start at Oxford. He is nineteen and wants an older woman before he turns twenty. Enter the beautiful Rachel Noyce (Ione Skye), and Charles puts his 'master-of-seduction' routines into top gear. Things however get complicated, Charles has a string of exes and a weird brother-in-law. Rachel has a boyfriend named Deforest (James Spader), and Charles' father has a mistress.

Title: Famous Five
Description: The Famous Five Julian, Dick, Anne, George and Timmy (the dog) spend their vacation together, while George's dad (Professor Quentin ) is staying on a nearby island where he works on a project which might bring forward new methods of using alternative energies. But one day, he disappears and the five friends are soon convinced that he was kidnapped. Determined to rescue Professor Quentin, they not only have to deal with thugs and gangsters, but also uncover a huge conspiracy.

Title: Cat Run
Description: When a sexy, high-end escort holds the key evidence to a scandalous government cover-up, two bumbling young detectives become her unlikely protectors from a ruthless assassin hired to silence her.

Title: Our Body
Description: Follows doctors and patients at a gynecology ward in France.

Title: The Desperate Hours
Description: Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.

Title: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
Description: The Z-Fighters must contend with Lord Beerus, the God of Destruction, but only a God can fight a God, and none of them are Gods. However with the creation of the Super Saiyan God, will the Z-Fighters be able to defeat Lord Beerus?

Title: A Woman Is a Woman
Description: A French striptease artist is desperate to become a mother. When her reluctant boyfriend suggests that his best friend impregnate her, feelings become complicated when she accepts.

Title: Corsicana
Description: Deputy Sheriff Bass Reeves is reunited with his former partner and fugitive Sam Tanner. Together with a former Union sharpshooter, they face a race against time to track Jack Donner and his ruthless gang of killers.

Title: Extremities
Description: A woman takes revenge on the man who invades her home and tries to rape her.

Title: Great White
Description: A fun filled flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed in a freak accident and they are trapped on a raft, 100 miles from shore with man-eating sharks lurking beneath the surface.

Title: The Beast Within
Description: A young woman gets raped by a mysterious man-creature, and years later her son begins a horrific transformation into a similar beast.

Title: Bite the Bullet
Description: A pair of ex-Rough Riders, a former prostitute, a gunfighter, an aging cowboy and an English gentleman enter a 700-mile horse race through the Southwest desert in 1908.

Title: The Sound
Description: A supernatural skeptic sets off to debunk paranormal sightings using low frequency sound waves in an abandoned subway station and is met with unforeseen evil and eerie memories.

Title: The Shaggy Dog
Description: A teenage boy is cursed with periodically turning into a sheepdog.

Title: Amelia's Children
Description: When Edward's search for his biological family leads him and his girlfriend Ryley to a magnificent villa high in the mountains of Northern Portugal, he is full of excitement at meeting his long-lost mother and twin brother. Finally, he will discover who he is and where he comes from. But nothing is as it seems, and Edward will soon learn that he is linked to them by a monstrous secret.

Title: Girl in the Shed: The Kidnapping of Abby Hernandez
Description: The search for Abby, who was kidnapped and psychologically and sexually abused, and her fight to stay alive in hopes of seeing her family again.

Title: The Swarm
Description: A single mother's business of a locust farm isn't doing so well. She discovers by accident that blood makes them thrive, and does her best to hide her secrets.

Title: Stars Fell on Alabama
Description: A Hollywood agent returns to his Alabama hometown for 15 year high school reunion. His old schoolmates think, he's dating and bringing a famous movie star with him. He asks a cute client for a favor.

Title: I Want You
Description: A young boy and his sister are drawn into one man's obsessive pursuit of his former lover.

Title: Palindromes
Description: Aviva is thirteen, awkward and sensitive. Her mother Joyce is warm and loving, as is her father, Steve, a regular guy who does have a fierce temper from time to time. The film revolves around her family, friends and neighbors.

Title: Restless
Description: After going to extremes to cover up an accident, a corrupt cop's life spirals out of control when he starts receiving threats from a mysterious witness.

Title: Thappad
Description: Thappad is a story of Amrita whose seemingly perfect life is shattered when her husband slaps her once in a party. But is one slap enough to question what a relationship stands for?

Title: High Road to China
Description: During WW1, an alcoholic American biplane pilot is hired by the spoiled daughter of an industrialist to find her father who disappeared in Asia.

Title: Unknown
Description: Five men wake up in a locked-down warehouse with no memory of who they are. They are forced to figure out who is good and who is bad to stay alive.

Title: Porno
Description: When five teen employees at the local movie theater in a small Christian town discover a mysterious old film hidden in its basement, they unleash an alluring succubus who gives them a sex education...written in blood.

Title: Twisted Nerve
Description: Martin Durnley (Hywel Bennett) is a troubled young man. With a mother who insists on treating him like a child, a stepfather who can't wait to see the back of him, and a brother with Down's Syndrome shut away in an institution, is it any wonder he retreats into an alternate personality - that of six-year-old Georgie? It is Georgie who befriends Susan Harper (Hayley Mills), but friendship soon turns into obsession. When Susan begins to distance herself, something inside Georgie snaps and he embarks on a killing spree, with Susan as the next target.

Title: MVP
Description: On the streets of Hollywood, a recently retired NFL player is saved from scandal by a homeless veteran. With their "glory days" behind them, the two men bond in search of purpose and identity.

Title: Wander Darkly
Description: New parents Adrienne and Matteo are forced to reckon with trauma amidst their troubled relationship. They must revisit the memories of their past and unravel haunting truths in order to face their uncertain future.

Title: Sword Art Online the Movie: Progressive - Scherzo of Deep Night
Description: Two months have passed since the deadly game began, and Kirito and Asuna continue to make progress. They stop for treasure, but then they must face Asuna's least favorite monster.

Title: The Incredible Journey
Description: Two dogs and a cat set off on a treacherous 200-mile journey towards home.

Title: Gossip
Description: Three college students base their class project around gossip and how fast it spreads, which soon spirals out of control.

Title: American Virgins
Description: A trio of clueless minors embark on a quest to get into the local bar, in the hopes of scoring with the opposite sex.

Title: The Wedding Banquet
Description: To satisfy his nagging parents, a gay landlord and a female tenant agree to a marriage of convenience, but his parents arrive to visit and things get out of hand.

Title: The Four Seasons
Description: Three couples vacation together every season. After one divorces, feelings of betrayal and more spawn criticisms of one another, but the things that keep them together are stronger than those which might pull them apart.

Title: Pieta
Description: A loan shark is forced to reconsider his violent lifestyle after the arrival of a mysterious woman claiming to be his long-lost mother.

Title: The Shaft
Description: When the elevators in New York's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, mechanic Mark Newman is sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly "accidents" occur, Mark joins forces with spunky reporter Jennifer.

Title: One of Us
Description: Members of a family begin dying one by one at a funeral, while Youngest searches for the stranger in their midst.

Title: Hour of the Wolf
Description: While vacationing on a remote German island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

Title: Mayerling
Description: Based on real life events that led to tragic deaths of Crown Prince Rudolf of Austria and his lover Baroness Mary Vetsera.

Title: Cirkus
Description: Two sets of identical twins are accidentally separated at birth. Several years later, when they are coincidentally in the same town, there is a lot of confusion and misunderstanding when people mistake them for each other.

Title: Light of Day
Description: A pair of siblings must choose whether to pursue their dream of touring with their rock band or support their family and stay in Cleveland, Ohio.

Title: The Pickup
Description: Plot under wraps.

Title: All I Wish
Description: An aspiring fashion designer struggles to find success and love. The story cuts into her life once a year, always on the same date: her birthday.

Title: Scarlet
Description: The emancipation of a woman over twenty years, between 1919 and 1939, a time of great inventions and great dreams.

Title: I.Q.
Description: A mechanic romances the mathematician niece of physicist Albert Einstein, with help from him and his friends.

Title: Born in Gaza
Description: Filmed shortly after the 2014 Gaza war, this documentary examines how violence has transformed the lives of 10 Palestinian children.

Title: Girl on the Third Floor
Description: Don Koch tries to renovate a rundown mansion with a sordid history for his growing family, only to learn that the house has other plans.

Title: American Factory
Description: In post-industrial Ohio, a Chinese billionaire opens a factory in an abandoned General Motors plant, hiring two thousand Americans. Early days of hope and optimism give way to setbacks as high-tech China clashes with working-class America.

Title: Into the Ashes
Description: Nick escapes his criminal past and 2 partners, gets a steady job, a friend at work and marries the sheriff's daughter. But his past catches up with him, when his ex partners track him down and want their share of the loot.

Title: Mrs Caldicot's Cabbage War
Description: After her husband's death and being forced into a nursing home, a woman starts looking for independence.

Title: Evil Dead Trap
Description: A late night TV presenter receives a snuff tape, in which a woman is brutally killed. She decides to take a crew out to a location indicated in the tape, but only death and despair await them.

Title: Dumplings
Description: Aunt Mei's famous homemade dumplings provide amazing age-defying qualities popular with middle-aged women. But her latest customer - a fading actress - is determined to find out what the secret ingredient is.

Title: Man of the West
Description: A reformed outlaw becomes stranded after an aborted train robbery with two other passengers and is forced to rejoin his old outlaw band.

Title: Public Sex, Private Lives
Description: Public Sex, Private Lives is an intimate look at the professional and private lives of porn performers Lorelei Lee, Princess Donna, and Isis Love. Capturing moments of joy and struggle, this film follows the characters as they navigate their lives as artists, daughters, mothers, writers, and women who have made careers in the adult industry. Asked to defend their choices to their families, communities, and even the United States Government, these women share their unique motivations and shifting visions for the future.

Title: Hoodies vs. Hooligans
Description: The Guvnors is a violent thriller set amongst the clans and firms of South East London, bringing two generations together in brutal conflict.

Title: Heroes of the Golden Masks
Description: Charlie, a wise-cracking, homeless, American orphan is magically transported to the ancient Chinese kingdom of Sanxingdui, where a colorful team of superheroes need his help to defend the city from a brutal conqueror.

Title: Mister Lonely
Description: In Paris, a young American who works as a Michael Jackson look-alike meets Marilyn Monroe, who invites him to her commune in Scotland, where she lives with Charlie Chaplin and her daughter, Shirley Temple.

Title: Dudley Do-Right
Description: The inept Canadian Mountie Dudley Do-Right chases after villain Snidely Whiplash and woos girlfriend Nell Fenwick.

Title: Sweet Sixteen
Description: Teenager Melissa moves into a small town filled with racial prejudice and bullying, and each time she meets up with one of the boys in town, they end up murdered - but who is the killer?

Title: Kid Nightingale
Description: A singing waiter gets into an argument with some obnoxious customers and winds up knocking them out. The incident is witnessed by a shady boxing promoter who sees an opportunity to cash in and pretty soon the waiter is being promoted as "Kid Nightingale, The Singing Boxer".

Title: Life of a King
Description: Ex-felon, Eugene Brown, establishes a Chess Club for inner city teenagers in Washington, D.C.

Title: Shadows in the Sun
Description: An aspiring young writer (Jackson) tracks a literary titan (Keitel) suffering from writers block to his refuge in rural Italy and learns about life and love from the irascible genius and his daughters.

Title: Khumba
Description: Rejected by his superstitious herd, a half-striped zebra embarks on a daring quest to earn his stripes but finds the courage and self-acceptance to save all the animals of the Great Karoo.

Title: Obvious Child
Description: A twenty-something comedienne's unplanned pregnancy forces her to confront the realities of independent womanhood for the first time.

Title: Empire of Passion
Description: A married woman and her lover murder her husband and dump his body into a well. After a while, his ghost comes to haunt them while the local gossip grows stronger.

Title: Stealing Home
Description: Ex-baseball player Billy comes home to receive his childhood darling's ashes.

Title: The Tortured
Description: An upper-middle-class couple's life is destroyed when their only child is kidnapped and killed. Obsessed with revenge, the couple seizes an opportunity to kidnap the killer.

Title: Killer Under the Bed
Description: Starring Kristy Swanson. After her dad dies, Kilee feels the world is against her, until she finds a doll, riddled with pins, in her backyard. Believed to hold supernatural powers, Kilee is concerned when the doll starts acting on its own.

Title: Le Doulos
Description: A burglar betraying other criminals prepares for a big heist with a trusted friend who might be as untrustworthy as he.

Title: Trump vs the Illuminati
Description: A clone of Donald Trump survives the Earth's destruction by stowing-away aboard the last space-bound shuttle. At the same time, across space, the human race continues to fight a costly battle against Illuminati forces.

Title: Dhokha
Description: When a housewife with a personality disorder is taken hostage by a terrorist on the loose and a husband accused of cheating on his wife, have their own versions of reality, how do we know what the truth is?

Title: In a Relationship
Description: A funny chronicle of a summer in the lives of two couples.

Title: Nappily Ever After
Description: Violet Jones tired of waiting for her longtime boyfriend to propose, breaks up with him. But old feelings, and heaps of jealousy, no doubt, arise when he promptly begins dating another woman.

Title: The Featherweight
Description: Set in 1964, a camera crew follows Willie Pep, retired featherweight boxing champion. Down and out in Hartford CT, married to a woman half his age and with a drug-addled son and mounting debts, Pep decides to make a return to the ring.

Title: Chocolate
Description: An autistic girl with powerful martial art skills looks to settle her ailing mother's debts by seeking out the ruthless gangs that owe her family money.

Title: How to Be a Good Wife
Description: Paulette and her husband have been running a housekeeping school. After the sudden death of her husband, Paulette discovers that the school is on the verge of bankruptcy and has to take her responsibilities.

Title: Wild Men
Description: In a desperate attempt to cure his midlife crisis, Martin has fled his family to live high up in the Norwegian mountains. Hunting and gathering like his ancestors did thousands of years ago.

Title: Wendigo
Description: The legend of the Wendigo, a beast from Indian folklore who is half-man, half-deer, and can change itself at will.

Title: Vikram Vedha
Description: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

Title: Sex Weather
Description: The two main characters work through their relationship in a moderately sexy time in bed. They had met again after two years when they worked together in Reality TV.

Title: The Last Resort
Description: A couple teetering on the edge of separation. Determined to rekindle their fading romance, they heed the counsel of their marriage therapist, embarking on a weekend getaway to a secluded, private resort.

Title: Maqbool
Description: The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.

Title: The Possessed
Description: Exorcist Jacob Chandler is summoned to uncover the layers of demonic deception at play by his nephew's new girlfriend, Atalie Carlisle.

Title: The Crow: Salvation
Description: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

Title: German Angst
Description: Three German tales of love, sex and death in Berlin from Germany's most shocking directors.

Title: Birthday Girl
Description: A thirtysomething bank clerk from St Albans has his small-town life exploded by the arrival of his Russian mail-order bride.

Title: Electra Glide in Blue
Description: Ambitious but diminutive motorcycle cop John Wintergreen patrols the Arizona highways, yearning for promotion to Homicide Detective, while investigating a murder tied to hippies.

Title: No
Description: An advertising executive comes up with a campaign to defeat Augusto Pinochet in Chile's 1988 referendum.

Title: Lore
Description: As the Allies sweep across Germany, Lore leads her siblings on a journey that exposes them to the truth of their parents' beliefs. An encounter with a mysterious refugee forces Lore to rely on a person she has always been taught to hate.

Title: Monsieur Verdoux
Description: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

Title: Warsaw '44
Description: A story of love, friendship and the pursuit of adventure during the bloody and brutal reality of the 1944 Warsaw Uprising.

Title: Cul-de-sac
Description: In search of help, two wounded gangsters on the run find refuge in the secluded castle of a feeble man and his wife; however, under the point of a gun, nothing is what it seems.

Title: The French Sex Murders
Description: A man is accused of killing his favorite prostitute in a French brothel. He's tried and sentenced to death. He tries to escape but dies during pursuit. Soon, people connected to the case are killed one by one.

Title: Blind Beast
Description: A blind sculpter and his mother kidnap a young model.

Title: Alone in the Dark
Description: A few dangerous and delusional mental patients break out of a mental asylum during a power blackout, and lay siege to their new doctor's house, who, they believe, killed their previous doctor.

Title: The Old Man and the Sea
Description: An old Cuban fisherman's dry spell is broken when he hooks a gigantic fish that drags him out to sea.

Title: Chinese Kamasutra
Description: A sexy librarian named Joan is interning at a library in China. She keeps rejecting her co-worker's advances. There she finds a volume of the Kamasutra and everything will change for the beautiful Joan.

Title: A Touch of Class
Description: Romantic comedy about a pair of clandestine lovers in a London-Spain tryst.

Title: Red Surf
Description: A surfer enjoys life with drug money together with his gang in 1980s California. His girlfriend is pregnant and will not be in a house with drugs and guns and is going to Portland OR. Can he quit the drugs, the gang and that last big deal?

Title: Beyond the Sea
Description: A swooning study of "Mack the Knife" singer Bobby Darin and specifically his relationship with wife Sandra Dee.

Title: Time to Love
Description: A poor painter falls in love with a photograph of a woman while at work in one of the massive villas on Istanbul's Princes' Islands.

Title: Red Cliff II
Description: Second and final part of epic tale about a legendary battle that changed the course of China history.

Title: Another Version of You
Description: Diggsy meets a stranger who gives him a key to parallel universes where another version of the girl of his dreams may not only exist, but where one of them could possibly love him back.

Title: Saint Laurent
Description: Yves Saint Laurent's life from 1967 to 1976, during which time the famed fashion designer was at the peak of his career.

Title: Plump Fiction
Description: Follows the plot of Pulp Fiction (1994). Scenes from other movies are also parodied.

Title: Butterflies Are Free
Description: A blind man moves into his own apartment against the wishes of his overprotective mother and befriends the freethinking young woman next door.

Title: Bermuda Island
Description: A flight to a tropical paradise crashes at sea, leaving the surviving passengers stranded on a deserted island at the mercy of bloodthirsty creatures.

Title: The Devil Comes at Night
Description: A washed up boxer searching for his inheritance must fight for his life when he is trapped in his deceased father's farmhouse by a local cannibal cult.

Title: Lost Transmissions
Description: When an acclaimed music producer goes off his medication for schizophrenia, his friends chase him though the LA music scene to help commit him to a psychiatric hospital, revealing the troubling inadequacies of our mental health care system.

Title: 13 Minutes
Description: In November 1939, Georg Elser's attempt to assassinate Adolf Hitler fails, and he is arrested. During his confinement, he recalls the events leading up to his plot and his reasons for deciding to take such drastic action.

Title: The Legacy
Description: An American couple in England stumble upon a rambling mansion where a number of powerful individuals have been summoned by its patriarch regarding the home's legacy.

Title: Support Your Local Gunfighter
Description: A con artist arrives in a mining town controlled by two competing companies. Both companies think he's a famous gunfighter and try to hire him to drive the other out of town.

Title: The Sixth Man
Description: A college athlete returns from the dead to help his brother's basketball team win the NCAA title.

Title: Taxi 4
Description: Daniel, the driver of a very special taxi in Marseille, gets a famous soccer player to the stadium in time and later helps his clumsy police friend Émilien catch the dangerous Belgian after he escaped on Émilien's guard.

Title: Breaking Point
Description: Two teenage brothers with an exceptional gift for breakdancing, but at enmity towards one another since the accidental death of their mother, try-out together for the British breakdancing team set to compete in the World Championships.

Title: Odd Man Out
Description: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

Title: A Good Woman Is Hard to Find
Description: A recently widowed young mother will go to any lengths to protect her children as she seeks the truth behind her husband's murder.

Title: Strength of a Woman
Description: It follows Kendra who finds herself in a failing marriage and must deal with her life decisions. When Ben comes back into her life, she is backed into a crisis point and must dig deep to find the strength to take control of her life.

Title: Heaven
Description: A woman takes the law into her own hands after police ignore her pleas to arrest the man responsible for her husband's death, and finds herself not only under arrest for murder but falling in love with an officer.

Title: Tales of Erotica
Description: A series of erotic short films, all with similar unexpected endings.

Title: Nightalk
