Description: A police officer goes undercover on a phone sex app to solve a murder.

Title: Apartment 7A
Description: Plot kept under wraps.

Title: Godzilla vs. Gigan
Description: A manga artist becomes suspicious of his employers when a garbled message is discovered on tape. As he forms a team to investigate, Godzilla and Anguirus set out to help defeat the invaders.

Title: Voyage to the Planet of Prehistoric Women
Description: Astronauts landing on Venus encounter dangerous creatures and almost meet some sexy Venusian women who like to sun-bathe in hip-hugging skin-tight pants and seashell brassieres.

Title: Bones of Crows
Description: Cree code talker Aline Spears survives her traumatic past in Canada's residential school system to continue her family's generational fight against systemic starvation, racism and sexual abuse.

Title: A Fantastic Woman
Description: Marina, a transgender woman who works as a waitress and moonlights as a nightclub singer, is bowled over by the death of her older boyfriend.

Title: Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace
Description: They thought they had destroyed him, but the simple gardener-turned-superkiller has found a way to reboot himself in Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace.

Title: Float
Description: After she nearly drowns, a young woman unexpectedly falls for the small-town lifeguard who rescued her. Based on the novel by Kate Marchant.

Title: The Gingerbread Man
Description: A lawyer uses his power to help his lover put her father behind bars, but when he escapes, they are all in danger.

Title: What Maisie Knew
Description: In New York City, a young girl is caught in the middle of her parents' bitter custody battle.

Title: The Boondock Saints III
Description: Plot under wraps.

Title: Mac & Devin Go to High School
Description: A comedy that follows two high school students -- one overachiever struggling to write his valedictorian speech, the other a senior now going on his 15th year of school.

Title: Hellraiser: Revelations
Description: Two college friends unwittingly release Pinhead and his minions.

Title: Avenging Force
Description: A senator is targeted by the Pentangle, a right wing paramilitary group. His pal, a former CIA agent and martial artist, tries to help him. The group kidnaps the agent's sister and tries to hunt him down, "The Most Dangerous Game" style.

Title: Dona Flor and Her Two Husbands
Description: In a small city of Brazil, a woman named Flor marries a man named Vadinho, but once married she finds that he is a good-for-nothing. She works teaching cooking and he takes all of her money to gamble. After Vadinho dies, Flor marries Tedoror, the owner of a drugstore. Flor is happy with her new husband but misses the love life with her previous husband. When one day the ghost of Vadhino comes back to pursue her.

Title: Lights in the Dusk
Description: In Helsinki, a lonely night watchman is caught up in a series of misadventures with a femme fatale and a crooked businessman.

Title: Happythankyoumoreplease
Description: Captures a generational moment - young people on the cusp of truly growing up, tiring of their reflexive cynicism, each in their own ways struggling to connect and define what it means to love and be loved.

Title: Thunderstruck
Description: When Brian, a hopelessly uncoordinated young fan magically switches talents with his hero, basketball star Kevin Durant, he becomes the star of his high school team, while Kevin Durant suddenly can't make a shot to save his life.

Title: Butterfly Kisses
Description: A filmmaker discovers a box of video tapes depicting two students' disturbing film project featuring a local horror legend, The Peeping Tom. As he sets out to prove this story is real and release it as a work of his own, he loses himself and the film crew following him into his project.

Title: OSS 117: From Africa with Love
Description: The third entry in secret agent OSS 117's parodic spy adventures.

Title: Damascus Cover
Description: A spy navigates the precarious terrain of love and survival during an undercover mission in Syria.

Title: The Gateway
Description: A social worker assigned to the care of the daughter of a single mother intervenes when the dad returns from prison and lures them into a life of crime.

Title: Queen Elizabeth
Description: The evil flourish in the deepest recess. They gain energy from other people's agony and pain. However, in life, our capacity for overcoming obstacles is an indicator of our moral fortitude.

Title: Twin Dragons
Description: Identical twins are separated at birth, one becoming a streetwise mechanic, and the other an acclaimed classical concert conductor. Finally meeting in adulthood, they each become mistaken for the other and entangled in each other's world.

Title: Heal
Description: A documentary film that takes us on a scientific and spiritual journey where we discover that by changing one's perceptions, the human body can heal itself from any dis-ease.

Title: The United States of Insanity
Description: The story of controversial rap duo Insane Clown Posse (ICP), their fans, and their ongoing struggle with the FBI in a landmark case that may be a bellwether of change for First Amendment rights in America.

Title: Zero Contact
Description: Produced in 17 different countries entirely virtually during the 2020 global pandemic.

Title: Lanier
Description: A detective is forced to come to a realization of the dark truths hidden at the bottom of Lake Lanier.

Title: The Coed and the Zombie Stoner
Description: When a nerdy sorority girl falls in love with a zombie, it's only a matter of time before a zombie apocalypse is unleashed on campus. The sorority girl discovers that weed is the cure--now she must smoke out the entire school before it's too late.

Title: HIT
Description: An officer of the 'Homicide Intervention Team' who frequently suffers from having his panic attacks does everything in his power to rescue a woman who went missing.

Title: It Takes Two
Description: Mady and Cody are about to get divorced when their minds are transported to two dolls that their daughter, Rose, made to represent them. Now they must embark on a journey to find a way to return to their bodies.

Title: Office Romance
Description: The life of entire statistical bureau becomes crazy when an ordinary worker, a shy man, falls in love with a boss, a strict woman.

Title: Dasara
Description: Set in the backdrop of Singareni coal mines near Godavarikhani of Telangana.

Title: Warlock
Description: A famous gunman becomes the marshal of Warlock to end a gang's rampages, but is met with some opposition by a former gang member turned deputy sheriff who wants to follow only legal methods.

Title: The Block Island Sound
Description: Something lurks off the coast of Block Island, silently influencing the behavior of fisherman, Tom Lynch. After suffering a series of violent outbursts, he unknowingly puts his family in grave danger.

Title: Between the Canals
Description: Follows three small time criminals from Dublin's North Inner City as they each aspire to be somebody in a fast changing society.

Title: Forever Hold Your Peace
Description: Dragana gives up marrying Momo two days before the date. His dangerously stubborn father forces the disastrous wedding into happening.

Title: Silent Madness
Description: A criminally insane man is accidentally released from a mental hospital. The staff tries to cover it up, but a young psychiatrist travels to the college town where he committed several murders to warn the locals and anticipate his arrival.

Title: The Soul
Description: The founder of a corporation developing a futuristic cancer treatment is brutally murdered, and a prosecutor sidelined by the illness asks to lead the case, assisted by his newly pregnant detective wife.

Title: Catfish
Description: Young filmmakers document their colleague's budding online friendship with a young woman and her family which leads to an unexpected series of discoveries.

Title: Liberty Heights
Description: Baltimore, Fall 1954: Schools implement the new integration law. Ben finds the "colored" girl in his class cute - upsetting his Jewish mom and granny. Ben talks to her while his brother looks for his WASP dream girl.

Title: C'est la vie!
Description: A hectic wedding party held in an 17th century French palace comes together with the help of the behind-the-scenes staff.

Title: The Pebble and the Penguin
Description: He must present his special pebble to her before the pebble festival is over, or lose his chance forever. He just manages to pluck up the nerve, when the evil Drake (Tim Curry) knocks him off the ice, and Hubie (Martin Short) is swept away. Picked up and caged by a ship, he meets the streetwise Rocko (Jim Belushi), whose only wishes are to live in sunny climates and learn to fly. Together they escape, and Hubie convinces Rocko to help him find Antarctica. When they reach the home ice, Hubie must defeat his worst enemy, and Rocko must face up to the reality of his dream of flying.

Title: Soul Survivors
Description: A college student is caught between the world of the living and the dead.

Title: Frontier Uprising
Description: A trail guide leading a wagon train to the West in the 1840s discovers that the U.S. and Mexico are at war.

Title: The Other End
Description: After a 43-year-old divorcee begins a relationship with a 17-year-old boy, they must face his parents' disagreement and fight for their relationship.

Title: Little Birds
Description: Lily and Alison face a life-changing event after they leave their Salton Sea home and follow the boys they meet back to Los Angeles.

Title: Katie's Mom
Description: A recent divorcee's holiday celebration with her adult children derails when she falls for her daughter's charming new boyfriend. A comedy influenced by "The Graduate," told from the perspective of a protagonist inspired by Mrs. Robinson.

Title: Come As You Are
Description: Three young men with disabilities hit the road with a jaded nurse driver to a brothel in Montreal catering to people with special needs. Remake of the acclaimed Belgian film 'Hasta La Vista'.

Title: Getaway
Description: To save his kidnapped wife, Brent Magna must drive at the orders of a mysterious man.

Title: Apache Junction
Description: Apache Junction is an Old West outpost of lawlessness, a haven for thieves and cold-blooded killers. When big-city reporter Annabelle Angel arrives in town and becomes a target, notorious gunslinger Jericho Ford comes to her aid.

Title: Fled
Description: Two prisoners chained together flee during an escape attempt gone bad.

Title: Vagabond
Description: A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.

Title: Taking Off
Description: While searching for their runaway teenage daughter, the parents rediscover the pleasures of life as they get acquainted with a self-help group for parents of vanished children.

Title: Raintree County
Description: A student falls in love with a Southern belle, but their relationship is complicated by her troubled past and the onset of the Civil War.

Title: Thug
Description: An aging gangster attempts to reconnect with his children and rectify the mistakes in his past, but the criminal underworld won't loosen their grip willingly.

Title: Life and a Day
Description: Somaieh, the youngest daughter of an indigent family, is getting married and fear is overwhelming each and every member of the family regarding how to overcome their difficulties after she's gone.

Title: See Spot Run
Description: A mailman takes care of a dog that, unbeknownst to him, is an FBI drug-sniffing superdog that has escaped from the witness protection program after becoming the target of an assassination.

Title: Heart of Midnight
Description: Carol inherits a night club from her weird uncle. She moves into the place, only to find out just how weird her uncle really was. She begins to remember more about her very special relationship with her uncle as she battles her memories and her surroundings in her new home.

Title: Night Games
Description: The story about a man who's trying to get rid of his memories from his past. He grew up in an upper-class family in a castle and now revisits the castle with his fiancee.

Title: The Sword of Doom
Description: Through his unconscionable actions against others, a sociopath samurai builds a trail of vendettas that follow him closely.

Title: Everything Went Fine
Description: When André, 85, has a stroke, Emmanuelle hurries to her father's bedside. Sick and half-paralyzed in his hospital bed, he asks Emmanuelle to help him end his life. But how can you honor such a request when it's your own father?

Title: Junkyard Dog
Description: In a small village in the south of France, Dog and Mirales live a conflicting friendship. The duo is upeneded when Elsa arrives in their village, a young woman with whom Dog will fall in love.

Title: Raven's Touch
Description: A lesbian love story about loss, nature, and healing.

Title: Band of Outsiders
Description: Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.

Title: The Great American Girl Robbery
Description: Cheerleading squads traveling on a bus to a state competition are kidnapped for ransom by former football players.

Title: Far from Home
Description: A teenage girl and her father driving cross-country become stranded when their car runs out of gas in a remote Nevada desert town and they're forced to stay in a dilapidated trailer park where a serial killer lurks.

Title: Till the Clouds Roll By
Description: Biography of songwriter and Broadway pioneer, Jerome Kern (Robert Walker). Unable to find immediate success in the U.S., Kern sought recognition abroad. He journeyed to England where his dreams of success became real and where he met his future wife Eva Leale (Dorothy Patrick).

Title: Lunastajat
Description: Two cult missionaries go door to door, and in one house accidentally kill a person. They hide the body and end up in the middle of a night of live role-playing gamers. They try to survive the night by blending in and trying not to get caught.

Title: Decoys
Description: Luke and Roger are just another couple of college guys trying to lose their virginity. But when Luke sees something unusual, he begins to suspect that the girls on campus aren't exactly human.

Title: Black Belly of the Tarantula
Description: A series of victims are paralyzed while having their bellies ripped open, much in the same way tarantulas are killed by the black wasp. The victims all seem to have a connection with a spa.

Title: That Night
Description: Long Island, NY, summer 1961: Preteen Alice follows, from across the street, the glamorous love life of Sheryl, 17, with bowling alley Rick. A friendship develops as Alice helps Sheryl see Rick.

Title: Katie Says Goodbye
Description: A kindhearted 17-year-old in the American Southwest turns to prostitution to fulfill her dream of a new life in San Francisco.

Title: Born in Heinola
Description: The story of Finnish punk rock band Apulanta.

Title: Chained Heat 2
Description: An innocent woman is sent to a Czech prison, where the sadistic warden and guards rape and perform bizarre sex acts on the prisoners.

Title: Ziegfeld Follies
Description: The late, great impresario Florenz Ziegfeld Jr. looks down from Heaven and ordains a new revue in his grand old style.

Title: The Letter
Description: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

Title: A Muse
Description: In this film, Lee Jeok-yo is a respected poet who cares fondly for his 30ish year old disciple Seo Ji-woo. The world of these two men is shaken when 17-year-old Han Eun-gyo comes into the picture.

Title: Poor Boy
Description: Poor Boy centers on two families whose lives become mysteriously linked by events that occurred seven years earlier. "As they experience loss, longing, belief, love, and hope, their emotional journey forces them to face many truths, as secrets emerge, and lies are uncovered. By the time the story reaches its redemptive finale, the characters have a deeper understanding of who they are, and of the strengths and weaknesses of their relationships, as they, and the audience, are left to question their own sense of self."

Title: High Ground
Description: In a bid to save the last of his family, Gutjuk, a young Aboriginal man, teams up with ex-soldier Travis to track down Baywara, the most dangerous warrior in the Territory, his uncle.

Title: Devil in the Flesh 2
Description: After escaping a mental institution, Debbie Strong steals the car, money and identity of a college co-ed and heads off to college where she becomes obsessed with Sam, a handsome writing teacher.

Title: Marked Men
Description: Shaw has love Rule since she saw him, but Rule doesn't see her as a suitable match, but a night of drinking and secrets leads them to question if they can be together without ruining their relationship...or each other.

Title: Tales of Halloween
Description: Ten stories are woven together by their shared theme of Halloween night in an American suburb, where ghouls, imps, aliens and axe murderers appear for one night only to terrorize unsuspecting residents.

Title: Ice Cold in Alex
Description: During World War II in North Africa, a medical field unit must cross the desert in their ambulance in order to reach the British lines in Alexandria.

Title: Luther
Description: During the early sixteenth century, idealistic German monk Martin Luther, disgusted by the materialism in the Catholic Church, begins the dialogue that will lead to the Protestant Reformation.

Title: Athena Saves Christmas
Description: Samuel and his friends along with his trusted dog Athena have to go for the adventure of a lifetime, matching wits with a mob boss to solve Oscar's riddles in order to help Athena save Christmas for the whole town.

Title: BioShock
Description: Based on the popular Video Game "Bioshock".

Title: Animal
Description: A group of performers spend an increasingly wild summer working at the Hotel Mirage.

Title: Hollywood Shuffle
Description: An actor limited to stereotypical roles because of his ethnicity, dreams of making it big as a highly respected performer. As he makes his rounds, the film takes a satiric look at African American actors in Hollywood.

Title: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
Description: Two best friends being convinced that they are not in love search for each other's love.

Title: Spermula
Description: A notorious secret society known as Spermula plans to return from the future and conquer Earth by neutering the male population.

Title: Devils
Description: A determined homicide detective assigned to take down a ring of serial killers, has a personal motivation as one of the victims is his own brother-in-law.

Title: Schulmädchen-Report 8. Teil - Was Eltern nie erfahren dürfen
Description: A group of young co-eds who are away from home at boarding school share intimate stories about their "first-time" in a revealing session of show and tell. This 1970s late-night classic has been remastered from the original film elements and has never looked better! Three classic "nudie cutie" short films from the 1960s and 70s are included for a perfect night of retro erotic fun!

Title: Trigger Point
Description: Follows Nicolas Shaw, a retired U.S. special operative who becomes part of an elite "invisible" team that quietly takes out the worst villains around the world.

Title: The Good Neighbor
Description: A pair of mischievous high school kids create the illusion of a haunting on an unsuspecting elderly neighbor while keeping his every reaction under surveillance. A series of coincidences leads to tragedy.

Title: Robert
Description: In this chilling story based on real life events a family experience terrifying supernatural occurrences when their son acquires a vintage doll called Robert.

Title: Carry on England
Description: Captain S Melly has been sent to a mixed anti-aircraft battery. His mission? To instil a sense of order in the troops, who are more concerned with capturing the opposite sex than the enemy.

Title: Escape from Fort Bravo
Description: During the Civil War, a group of Confederates escapes from the Union POW camp at Fort Bravo but has to contend with the desert, the Mescalero Apaches and the pursuing Union troops.

Title: The Wolf House
Description: Tells the story of Maria, a young woman who takes refuge in a house in southern Chile after escaping from a German colony.

Title: White Dog
Description: A trainer attempts to retrain a vicious dog that's been raised to attack black people.

Title: OtherLife
Description: After inventing a drug that induces time-compressed virtual realities, young Ren grapples with partner Sam over how to use their powerful creation.

Title: Heretic
Description: Plot under wraps. Rumored to follow two young women of religion who are drawn into a game of cat and mouse in the house of a strange man.

Title: Antigang: La Relève
Description: To avenge the death of his wife, a former cop teams up with his fourteen-year-old daughter.

Title: Superwho?
Description: A struggling actor who seems doomed to lead the life of a loser. When finally gets a lead role as a superhero named "Badman," he feels like everything is possible but fate strikes again.

Title: Oblivion
Description: On another planet which resembles the Old West, a die-hard pacifist is forced to re-examine his ways after an evil alien bandit and his gang murder his estranged sheriff father, take over his home town, and threaten his friends.

Title: Walk All Over Me
Description: A small town girl runs into big time trouble as she takes on her roommates identity as a dominatrix to pay the bills.

Title: Snow Falling on Cedars
Description: A Japanese-American fisherman is accused of killing his neighbor at sea. In the 1950s, race figures into the trial. So does reporter Ishmael.

Title: Bloodline
Description: When her father is murdered, a pharmaceutical heiress becomes the next target of an unknown killer amid the international jet set.

Title: Gardens of the Night
Description: After being abducted as children, and suffering years of abuse, a teenage boy and girl find themselves living on the street.

Title: Destricted
Description: A compilation of erotic films intended to illuminate the points where art meets sexuality.

Title: There Is a Japanese Woman in My Room
Description: A Japanese woman gets a job, but soon she becomes homeless. She is found by a webtoon designer, who uses her as inspiration for his work. Will she become more than his inspiration, or will she defer to the men who take advantage of her?

Title: Theodore Rex
Description: In an alternate futuristic society, a tough female police detective is paired with a talking dinosaur to find the killer of dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals leading them to a mad scientist bent on creating a new Armageddon.

Title: Dance of the 41
Description: At the end of the 19th century, Ignacio de la Torre married the daughter of the president of Mexico, Porfirio Díaz. Ignacio leads a double life: he rises in the traditional world of politics while being a member of a clandestine society.

Title: Seal of Desire
Description: A handsome psychologist who specializes in couples therapy uses his intuitive skills to expose cheating spouses and seduce their heartbroken wives. However, the player soon becomes the pawn when he meets a woman who can beat him.

Title: The Nightcomers
Description: Prequel to Henry James' "The Turn of the Screw", focusing on groundskeeper Peter Quint's slow corruption of the virtuous governess Miss Jessel and the children she looks after.

Title: Cade: The Tortured Crossing
Description: Neil Breen stars as an identical twin brother who restores an old mysterious mental asylum. He takes it upon himself to mystically train the patients as warriors for humanity and justice.

Title: Dread
Description: Three college students set out to document what other people dread the most. However, one of the three turns out to secretly be a sadistic psychopath who uses this knowledge to gruesomely torture the subjects.

Title: The Pool
Description: In an abandoned 6-meter deep pool, a couple is stranded there with a deadly predator.
Five people find themselves trapped in an elevator during the September 11 attacks. They soon work together, never giving up hope, to try to escape before the unthinkable happens.

Title: Side Out
Description: A law student comes to California for the summer and ends up playing professional volleyball.

Title: Krrish 3
Description: Krrish and his scientist father must save the world and their own family from an evil man named Kaal and his gang of mutants, led by the ruthless Kaya.

Title: An Innocent Man
Description: A man is framed by two corrupt cops for drugs. After he gets out of prison, he comes after them.

Title: Buckley's Chance
Description: A year after the loss of his father, Ridley and his mother, Gloria, move to Western Australian to live with Ridley's estranged grandfather Spencer. Once there Spencer tries to connect with Ridley but all efforts usually lead to conflict. Ridley ends up lost deep in the outback on a quest to try to get home. Meanwhile, Spencer and Gloria search the outback for Ridley. Spencer tries to reassure Gloria that her son will be OK, all the while trying to come to terms with the loss of his only child. While suffering the elements of the Australian outback (especially for a kid from New York), Ridley manages to save a dingo, Buckley, from a leg trap. The two develop a bond and both boy and dog try to survive the elements to get Ridley back home.

Title: Dark Tower
Description: A partially under construction office tower is being haunted by a deadly presence which seems to target the building's architect.

Title: The Nightmare
Description: A look at a frightening condition that plagues thousands; sleep paralysis.

Title: Perfect
Description: American gymnast Kerri Strug tries to overcome a terrible injury in order to compete for a gold medal in the 1996 Olympics.

Title: Wish Man
Description: One boy's wish changed a man. One man's wish changed the world.

Title: Unknown: Cave of Bones
Description: Follows Paleo anthropologist Lee Berger in South Africa, as he and his team try to prove that the world's oldest graveyard they found, is not human. A small brained, ape-like creature could have practiced complex burial rituals.

Title: A Thousand & One Nights
Description: Aldin, a vagabond water vendor, embarks of a series of fantastical and tragic misadventures through the Middle East in search of love, fortune, and power.

Title: Girl Next
Description: A young woman is abducted by a strange group of human traffickers who use drug and trauma based mind control to turn women into "Sofia" dolls. Trapped in a waking nightmare she fights for a way to escape, to avoid becoming Girl Next

Title: The Shout
Description: A traveller by the name of Crossley forces himself upon a musician and his wife in a lonely part of Devon, and uses the aboriginal magic he has learned to displace his host.

Title: House of Hummingbird
Description: Seoul 1994, in the year the Seongsu Bridge collapsed, 14-year-old Eunhee wanders the city searching for love.

Title: Inspector Sun
Description: Inspector Sun boards a seemingly normal plane for a much-needed vacation, but when an enigmatic millionaire receives a threat on his life, Sun is back on the case. Trapped in a web of lies, Sun must find the culprit before it's too late.

Title: A Kind of Murder
Description: In 1960s New York, Walter Stackhouse is a successful architect married to the beautiful Clara who leads a seemingly perfect life. But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play cat-and-mouse with a clever killer and an overambitious detective, while at the same time lusting after another woman.

Title: Chilly Scenes of Winter
Description: Charles is a bored civil servant struggling through a harsh Utah winter. He spends most of his time reflecting on his romance with Laura, a coworker who left him to return to her husband, an A-Frame salesman.

Title: Empire
Description: A successful South Bronx drug dealer turns his back on his roots and gives money to a Wall Street broker to invest for him.

Title: Faults
Description: A cult deprogrammer is hired to help a couple whose daughter is under the influence of a mysterious cult.

Title: Seaspiracy
Description: Passionate about ocean life, a filmmaker sets out to document the harm that humans do to marine species - and uncovers alarming global corruption.

Title: South of Heaven
Description: Convicted felon Jimmy gets early parole after serving twelve years for armed robbery. Upon his release, he vows to give Annie, his childhood love, now dying from cancer, the best last year of her life - unfortunately it's not that simple.

Title: Maborosi
Description: A young woman's husband apparently commits suicide without warning or reason, leaving behind his wife and infant.

Title: As You Are
Description: Set in the early 1990s, the telling and retelling of a friendship between three teenagers, as a police investigation prompts disparate memories.

Title: Johnny Suede
Description: A struggling young musician and devoted fan of Ricky Nelson wants to be just like his idol and become a rock star.

Title: Dumbbells
Description: A former basketball star suffering from a knee injury looks to rehab himself at a rundown Los Angeles gym.

Title: They Look Like People
Description: Suspecting that people around him are turning into evil creatures, a troubled man questions whether to protect his only friend from an impending war, or from himself.

Title: Jubilee
Description: Queen Elizabeth I travels 400 years into the future to witness the appalling revelation of a dystopian London overrun by corruption and a vicious gang of punk guerrilla girls led by the new Monarch of Punk.

Title: Who You Think I Am
Description: Claire, a 50-year-old divorced teacher, creates a fake Facebook profile of a 24-year-old woman to catfish Alex, the roommate of her former lover, Ludo.

Title: 2 Minutes of Fame
Description: An up-and-coming stand-up comic moves to L.A. to pursue a film career after video clips of his act make him an online sensation.

Title: I Start Counting
Description: A 15 year-old girl coming to terms with her sexuality suspects her foster brother may be guilty of a murder.

Title: The Great Indian Kitchen
Description: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

Title: The Taste of Christmas
Description: Three separate groups navigate Christmas, the most emotionally fraught season of the year.

Title: The Hallelujah Trail
Description: On its way to Denver, a cargo of whiskey destined for the miners, is sought after by the Temperance League, the U.S. Cavalry, the local Indians and the miners themselves.

Title: Junk Head
Description: In a distant future, humanity has lost its ability to reproduce. An expedition is sent to an underground city where artificial humanoids are still fertile.

Title: Zombie Plane
Description: When passengers on a jet flying from Sydney to Los Angeles become infected with new strains of zombie viruses, Vanilla Ice and Sophie Monk are forced to team up to contain the contagion before the US Air Force shoots it out of the sky.

Title: Reign of Chaos
Description: When the world is gripped by a plague unleashed by the evil lord Chaos, and humans are turned into rabid creatures, mankind can only be saved by three young women, descendants of a Goddess, with the power to stop Chaos' evil.

Title: Viridiana
Description: Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.

Title: On the Edge
Description: On the Edge is about suicidal patients discovering their true selves while going through therapy in a treatment center.

Title: Crimewave
Description: A pair of whacked-out cartoon-like exterminator/hitmen kill the owner of a burglar-alarm company, and stalk the partner who hired them, his wife, and a nerd framed for the murder, who tells the story in flashback from the electric chair.

Title: Christina
Description: A young German woman prepares to leave her war-ravaged city to begin a new life in America with her G.I. fiance. Before she can leave for her new life, she will be forced to confront the past she has been trying to leave behind.

Title: 10 Days of a Good Man
Description: A lawyer turned private investigator takes on a missing person case, propelling him on an unexpected and life-altering quest.

Title: Wide Sargasso Sea
Description: A young female landowner in 1840s Jamaica marries a just-arrived Englishman to avoid losing her property. All seems to be perfect, love arises, and happiness is on the way, but she is hiding an old secret regarding her childhood and her mother. Slowly, this secret begins to erode this perfect relationship and, perhaps, her mother's story will begin again...with her.

Title: DarkGame
Description: A determined detective is in a race against time to stop a twisted game show on the dark web, where captives are forced to compete for their lives.

Title: The Tiger Rising
Description: A young boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home.

Title: Act of Vengeance
Description: A woman is sexually assaulted by a serial rapist wearing a hockey mask. She and other victims form a squad that targets would-be rapists, all the while searching for the mask wearing maniac that raped them all.

Title: The Chosen
Description: In 1944, in Brooklyn, two Jewish kids become friends. One is from a very conservative family, and the other is more liberal. The issues of importance of tradition, parental expectations and the formation of Israel cause constant friction.

Title: Honey
Description: A writer with a gun forces a publisher to read her story about a woman in a hotel of desire.

Title: An Egypt Affair
Description: A husband rejected. A beautiful stranger. A dangerous liaison. For two couples enjoying a spectacular Egyptian adventure, treachery and deception cruise the Nile along with them.

Title: Scorpio Nights 3
Description: A young couple's sex acts are witnessed by a young man through a hole in the wall. When the wife seduces him, they engage in an illicit affair. Chaos ensues when the husband learns about them.

Title: Laxmii
Description: Aasif visits his wife's parents' house and happens to go to a ground that is supposedly haunted. However, he is soon possessed by the spirit of a transgender who is out for revenge.

Title: Snipers
Description: The story of sharpshooter Zhang Taofang, a young army recruit who at age 22 sets a record during the Korean War by reportedly killing or wounding 214 American soldiers with 435 shots in just 32 days.

Title: The Halfway House
Description: Young girls are disappearing in and around the Mary Magdalen Halfway House for Troubled Girls. Desperate to find out what became of her sister, Larissa Morgan goes undercover to infiltrate the Catholic-run institution.

Title: Keeper of the Lost Cities
Description: A telepathic girl must figure out why she is the key to her brand-new world before the wrong person finds the answer first.

Title: Castle Freak
Description: An Albanian castle with bloodthirsty creatures is inherited by a young woman.

Title: Now Is Good
Description: A teenage girl dying of leukemia compiles a list of things she would like to do before passing away. Topping the list is her desire to lose her virginity.

Title: O Lucky Man!
Description: An ambitious coffee salesman has a series of improbable and ironic adventures that seem designed to challenge his naive idealism.

Title: Bliss
Description: A brilliant painter facing the worst creative block of her life turns to anything she can to complete her masterpiece, spiraling into a hallucinatory hellscape of drugs, sex and murder in the sleazy underbelly of Los Angeles.

Title: Raw Force
Description: A group of martial-arts students is heading to an island that supposedly is home to the ghosts of martial artists who have lost their honor. A Hitler lookalike and his gang are running a female-slavery operation on the island as well. When the two groups meet, all sorts of crazy things happen, involving cannibal monks, piranhas, zombies, and more.

Title: Peter von Kant
Description: Peter Von Kant, a successful, famous director, lives with his assistant Karl, whom he likes to mistreat and humiliate. Through the great actress Sidonie, he meets and falls in love with Amir, a handsome young man of modest means.

Title: Diggstown
Description: Gabriel's released from prison. His con man friend makes a foolish bet with Diggstown's owner on who'd win the boxing matches - their man against ten Diggstown men.

Title: Recalled
Description: Disturbing visions about chilling accidents, post-traumatic memory loss and a woman's desperate fight to uncover the truth about her past.

Title: Don't Tell a Soul
Description: Two thieving teenage brothers, stealing money to help their sick mom, match wits with a troubled security guard stuck at the bottom of a forgotten well.

Title: My Old School
Description: In 1993, 16-year-old Brandon Lee enrolled at Bearsden Academy, a secondary school in a well-to-do suburb of Glasgow, Scotland. What followed over the next two years became the stuff of legend.

Title: Down a Dark Hall
Description: A troubled teen named Kit Gordy is forced to join the exclusive Blackwood Boarding School, just to find herself trapped by dark forces around its mysterious headmistress, Madame Duret.

Title: Diamonds of Kilimandjaro
Description: A group of adventurers head to a primitive tribe in Africa to find a treasure of diamonds and a beautiful white girl who was lost years ago and was made the tribe's goddess.

Title: New Year's Day
Description: A man returns to his sublet apartment to find the previous tenants, three offbeat young women, still in residence, under the mistaken belief that they have the apartment until the end of New Year's Day.

Title: Unexpected
Description: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

Title: Hollywood Boulevard
Description: A young woman arrives in Hollywood to try her luck as an actress. An incompetent agent hooks her up with a production company which specializes in low budget B-movie fair, plagued by strange deadly accidents.

Title: Being 17
Description: Damien lives with his mother Marianne, a doctor, while his father is on a tour of duty abroad. He is bullied by Thomas, whose mother is ill. The boys find themselves living together when Marianne invites Thomas to come and stay with them.

Title: Decibel
Description: The story unfolds when a bomb that responds to sound is discovered at the center of the city.

Title: Mythica: A Quest for Heroes
Description: The young magician Marek dreams of exciting adventures. When she meets the help-seeking priestess Teela she offers her assistance and provides a motley troupe. Together they go in search of Teela's sister, who was kidnapped by a wild ogre.

Title: Mr. Roosevelt
Description: After a loved one falls ill, 25 year old struggling comedian Emily Martin returns to her college town of Austin, Texas and must come to terms with her past while staying with her ex-boyfriend and his new girlfriend.

Title: Alpha and Omega
Description: Two young wolves at opposite ends of their pack's social order are thrown together into a foreign land and need each other to return home, but love complicates everything.

Title: Captain Alatriste: The Spanish Musketeer
Description: Viggo Mortensen plays the Spanish soldier-turned-mercenary Captain Alatriste, a heroic figure from the country's 17th century imperial wars.

Title: 8 Million Ways to Die
Description: A former police detective, still recovering from his alcohol addiction, is seemingly drawn into L.A's criminal underworld after stumbling upon a local drug ring.

Title: Cleopatra
Description: The man-hungry Queen of Egypt leads Julius Caesar and Marc Antony astray, amid scenes of DeMillean splendor.

Title: Kill the Czar
Description: A mysterious outsider's life turns upside down when she's blackmailed by an evil filmmaker to carry out an extraordinary act of violence. She winds up in a brutal fight to save the woman she loves.

Title: I Love You More
Description: The much needed desire to be loved, forces Ben to put his family and his dreams on the line for a boy he never met.

Title: All Together Now
Description: An optimistic high schooler with musical aspirations must learn to accept help from her friends to overcome her personal hardships and fulfill her dreams.

Title: The Treatment
Description: A police inspector haunted by the childhood abduction of his brother becomes obsessed with the disturbing case of a dangerous serial kidnapper

Title: Kuffs
Description: George Kuffs, 21, leaves a pregnant girlfriend. He visits his brother Brad to bum money off him. Brad's shot and George IDs the killer at SFPD but to no avail. He inherits Brad's patrol district. He keeps it to get the killer.

Title: Pushover
Description: An undercover police officer falls for the beautiful moll of a bank robber on the run, and together they plan to double-cross the hood and the cops.

Title: I Am Cuba
Description: Four vignettes about the lives of the Cuban people set during the pre-revolutionary era.

Title: Massacre at Central High
Description: A high-school transfer student pushed to the edge by a trio of brutal bullies resorts to murder to reclaim the school from oppression, and later turns against the students wanting to fill the vacuum of their oppressors.

Title: Tony Rome
Description: Tough Miami P.I., Tony Rome's hired by a millionaire to find jewelry stolen from his daughter. In the search, he has several encounters with local hoods as well as the Miami's police.

Title: Kissing Jessica Stein
Description: A woman searching for the perfect man instead discovers the perfect woman.

Title: The Sex Adventures of the Three Musketeers
Description: An "adults only" retelling of the legend of the Three Musketeers.

Title: Lifemark
Description: David's comfortable world is turned upside down when his birthmother unexpectedly reaches out to him, longing to meet the 18-year-old son she's only held once.

Title: Outrage
Description: The boss of a major crime syndicate orders his lieutenant to bring a rogue gang of drug traffickers in line, a job that gets passed on to his long-suffering subordinate.

Title: Knight Moves
Description: During a chess tournament, grand master Peter is suspected of murdering Debi after sex. He helps the police as the murders continue.

Title: Winter Break
Description: Four post-college men living in Aspen try to figure out what to do with their lives.

Title: Berberian Sound Studio
Description: A sound engineer's work for an Italian horror studio becomes a terrifying case of life imitating art.

Title: Son
Description: When a young boy contracts a mysterious illness, his mother must decide how far she will go to protect him from terrifying forces in her past.

Title: Maude v Maude
Description: Plot under wraps.

Title: The Fighter Pilot
Description: A young woman and her brother explore the history of their grandfather, who died in WW2. They start contacting the men who flew with him, asking them about who he was.

Title: All Cheerleaders Die
Description: A rebel girl signs up a group of cheerleaders to help her take down the captain of their high school football team, but a supernatural turn of events thrusts the girls into a different battle.

Title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
Description: A space alien is threatening to bring destruction on Earth, and the Power Rangers are enhanced with turbo powers in order to prevent her plan.

Title: Stream
Description: Roy and Elaine Keenan find themselves separated from their family and decide that something must be done. Roy puts his work on the back burner and the two seize the opportunity to relive past vacations.

Title: Prince Avalanche
Description: Two highway road workers spend the summer of 1988 away from their city lives. The isolated landscape becomes a place of misadventure as the men find themselves at odds with each other and the women they left behind.

Title: Don't Think Twice
Description: When a member of a popular New York City improv troupe gets a huge break, the rest of the group - all best friends - start to realize that not everyone is going to make it after all.

Title: Eternal Beauty
Description: After Jane falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results.

Title: The Killer Elite
Description: Mike Locken, who works for a private security firm affiliated with the C.I.A., is betrayed by his partner and left apparently crippled for life.

Title: I Smile Back
Description: Addicted to drugs and alcohol, a housewife's self-destructive behavior starts to take its toll on her husband and two young children.

Title: A Virgin Among the Living Dead
Description: Following the death of her father, a young girl visits her estranged family at their sinister castle in the countryside, and comes to realize her eccentric and morbid relatives are not quite alive.

Title: Rise of the Footsoldier 3
Description: Notorious gangster, Pat Tate, rises through the ranks of Essex's criminal underworld. A prequel to the 'Rise of the Footsoldier' franchise.

Title: Zombie Ass: Toilet of the Dead
Description: A group of teenagers go camping in the woods where they find themselves in deep trouble, when poop covered zombies that are controlled by parasites come out to attack them.

Title: Buck Rogers in the 25th Century
Description: A 20th century astronaut emerges out of 500 years of suspended animation into a future time where Earth is threatened by alien invaders.

Title: Starting Over
Description: A divorced man falls in love, but somehow he can't get over his ex-wife. This affects his love life in comic ways. Based on Dan Wakefield's novel.

Title: 36 fillette
Description: A night in the life of a young woman who wishes to learn and experience more of life. The men she meets have as much to learn from her as they can offer her, or more.

Title: Ong Bak 2
Description: A young Thai boxer learns the skills and inner meaning of martial arts.

Title: She Hate Me
Description: Fired from his job for exposing corrupt business practices, a former biotech executive turns to impregnating wealthy lesbians for profit.

Title: Man in the Saddle
Description: A private deadly feud ensues when ruthless wealthy rancher Will Isham attempts a takeover of small rancher Owen Merritt's land and marries Owen's old flame, Laurie Bidwell.

Title: Survival of the Dead
Description: On an island off the coast of North America, local residents simultaneously fight a zombie epidemic while hoping for a cure to return their un-dead relatives back to their human state.

Title: We Die Young
Description: Lucas, a 14-year-old boy inducted into the gang life in Washington, D.C., is determined that his 10-year-old brother won't follow the same path. When an Afghanistan war veteran comes into the neighborhood, an opportunity arises.

Title: Main Atal Hoon
Description: Follows the extraordinary life and political journey of Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee, an iconic figure in Indian politics and delves into the multifaceted persona of Vajpayee Ji, capturing his essence as a poet, a gentleman, and a statesman.

Title: Upon the Magic Roads
Description: Foal and his friend John go on an unforgettable journey as they outsmart the tyrant King, catch the fire-bird and find John's true love upon the magic roads.

Title: Man in the Long Black Coat
Description: When a troubled, neo-Nazi teen is accused of a shocking murder, a young rabbi risks everything to investigate and uncover a more sinister truth.

Title: Multiple Maniacs
Description: The travelling sideshow 'Lady Divine's Cavalcade of Perversions' is actually a front for a group of psychotic kidnappers, with Lady Divine herself the most vicious and depraved of all, but her life changes after she gets raped by a 15-foot lobster.

Title: Love Is Strange
Description: After Ben and George get married, George is fired from his teaching post, forcing them to stay with friends separately while they sell their place and look for cheaper housing -- a situation that weighs heavily on all involved.

Title: Head in the Clouds
Description: From the roaring 1920s to the ruinous Spanish Civil War and Adolf Hitler's rise into power, the lives of an Irish schoolteacher, a provocative heiress and her Spanish muse are intricately interlaced, sharing the same destiny and passion.

Title: Cold Copy
Description: An ambitious journalism student falls under the thrall of an esteemed yet cutthroat news reporter whom she's desperate to impress, even if it means manipulating her latest story - and the very idea of truth itself.

Title: The Last Champion
Description: When his mother dies, scandal-ridden ex-Olympian John Wright returns to a hometown that has not forgiven him.

Title: Mesrine: Public Enemy No. 1
Description: The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life and death as France's Public Enemy No. 1 in the 1970s.

Title: My Nights Are More Beautiful Than Your Days
Description: A story of doomed passion by two mortally ill people: he is physically, she is mentally.

Title: Remember Me
Description: Rose awakes in an unknown house following a serious car accident with memory loss and no ability to walk. Her Mother and boyfriend are there to help her. Rose wants to piece together her life before the accident. All is not what it seems.

Title: Fate
Description: Musa, who works as a bookkeeper in the customs office, believes in the emptiness and absurdity of life. He doesn't struggle to change his life; he lets himself flow along with events because he thinks that it all leads to the same end. The death of his mother doesn't affect him. Although he loves her, her death makes him joyful.

Title: Trust
Description: After being thrown out of her house, Maria encounters a married woman who complains of not having children. Maria ends up in an abandoned house, where she meets Matthew. When a baby is kidnapped Maria sets out to find the woman.

Title: Hot Pursuit
Description: Dan arrives too late for his girlfriend's family's plane to the Caribbean. He gets the next. Once there, Dan's hot pursuit of his girlfriend includes 3 friendly locals, a dubious yacht skipper, corrupt police, hijacker, pirates etc.

Title: Labyrinth of Lies
Description: A story that exposes the conspiracy of prominent German institutions and government branches to cover up the crimes of Nazis during World War II.

Title: Violent City
Description: After being double-crossed by his mistress and barely escaping a murder attempt, a hit-man sets out to take his revenge on the woman and the mob boss who put her up to it.

Title: Urge
Description: A weekend getaway takes a dangerous turn when a mysterious nightclub owner introduces a group of friends to a dangerous new designer drug.

Title: The Broken Hearts Club: A Romantic Comedy
Description: An insight into the turbulent lives and loves of a gay clique based in Los Angeles.

Title: Rapid Fire
Description: When student Jake Lo witnesses a killing, he finds himself caught between two feuding drug lords. Betrayed and set up by the federal agents, the only person he can trust is Ryan, a Chicago cop who reminds Jake of his deceased father.

Title: Fire with Fire
Description: A young woman from a Catholic school and a young man from a nearby prison camp fall in love and must run away together to escape the law, the church and their parents.

Title: Unplugging
Description: To revive their marriage and reconnect, a couple takes a self-prescribed digital detox weekend to a remote mountain town. What starts as a perfect weekend getaway without technology quickly spirals out of control.

Title: Restrepo
Description: A year with one platoon in the deadliest valley in Afghanistan.

Title: Sorority Party Massacre
Description: A detective from a big city and a small town sheriff close in on a serial killer. They have to solve the case before a sorority is wiped out and they become victims themselves.

Title: Madame Claude
Description: Based on a true story. Madame Claude, a well connected Parisienne with dark past, runs a network of high-class call girls. She sends her girls to any place in the world to satisfy sexual desires of wealthy and powerful men. Claude's manipulations also involve big business and politics. Meanwhile, photographer David Evans is trying to clear his own criminal record by providing the authorities with pictures of Claude's girls with important clients in compromising positions. But powerful men can do anything to keep their secrets...

Title: The Bell Keeper
Description: Follows a group of friends who travel to a secluded campsite to film a documentary. What they find is something much more sinister than they could have ever imagined.

Title: Room for Rent
Description: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with one of her guests.

Title: Agnes
Description: Rumors of demonic possession at a religious convent prompts a church investigation into the strange goings-on among its nuns. A disaffected priest and his neophyte are confronted with temptation, bloodshed and a crisis of faith.

Title: Company
Description: A small-time gangster named Chandu teams up with Malik, a low-level enforcer for a criminal syndicate. Together they eliminate all their enemies, becoming the most feared gangsters in Mumbai.

Title: The Wildest Dream
Description: Uses astonishing visuals to tell the intersecting stories of George Mallory, the first man to attempt a summit of Mount Everest, and Conrad Anker, the mountaineer who finds Mallory's frozen remains 75 years later.

Title: The Little Mermaid
Description: A mermaid falls in love with a human prince, which leads to tragedy.

Title: Mind Game
Description: After a deadly encounter with two yakuza, a loser with a crush on his childhood girlfriend goes to heaven and back, embarking on a psychedelic self-discovery experience with her and his friends.

Title: Barking Dogs Never Bite
Description: An idle part-time college lecturer is annoyed by the yapping sound of a nearby dog. He decides to take drastic action.

Title: Hounded
Description: A stately home robbery takes an evil turn one night when a gang of young thieves are caught by the owners of the house and then hunted across the estate for the proprietor's entertainment.

Title: Chatterbox!
Description: A young woman who works in a beauty parlor discovers that her vagina can talk, which causes her no end of trouble.

Title: Gun Crazy
Description: Two disturbed young people release their fascination with guns through a crime spree.

Title: Buried Alive
Description: A new teacher at a facility for juvenile delinquent girls starts to suspect foul play when girls begin to inexplicably disappear one by one.

Title: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion
Description: A chief of detectives, homicide section, kills his mistress and deliberately leaves clues to prove his own responsibility for the crime.

Title: It's Pat: The Movie
Description: The comedic misadventures of a person of indeterminate gender.

Title: Naples in Veils
Description: In a Naples suspended between magic and superstition, madness and rationality, a mystery envelops the existence of Adriana, overwhelmed by a sudden love and a violent crime.

Title: Kika
Description: Kika, a cute cosmetologist, prepares Ramon for funeral when he revives. He proposes to the much older Kika who has his dad as lover. Did Ramon's dad murder his mom? What about the escaped rapist and the PSYCHOlogist video reporter?

Title: April and the Extraordinary World
Description: It's 1941 but France is trapped in the nineteenth century, governed by steam and Napoleon V, where scientists vanish mysteriously. Avril, a teenage girl, goes in search of her missing scientist parents.

Title: Premature
Description: A high school senior has to re-live losing his virginity over and over again until he gets it right, with the right girl.

Title: Sun Choke
Description: Janie's just trying to get well.

Title: The Deep Dark
Description: Miners are forced to take a professor underground with them, to take samples for his measurements. After a landslide prevents them from going back up, they discover a crypt from another time, unknowingly waking up a bloodthirsty creature.

Title: Murder at the Murder Mystery Party
Description: An aspiring actress thinks a murder mystery party will be the perfect way to break into the LA scene - until she realizes that the murder is real, and she's being framed for it.

Title: Trick
Description: The misadventures of two young gay men, trying to find a place to be alone, one night in Manhattan.

Title: I Love Lizzy
Description: A seminarian who meets and falls in love with Lizzy.

Title: Viena and the Fantomes
Description: A roadie travels across North America with a punk band during the 1980s.

Title: High Heels
Description: A singer returns after 15 years abroad to perform in Madrid and finds her 27 y.o. daughter married to one of her mom's ex-lovers.

Title: Marketa Lazarová
Description: A grim portrayal of the shift from Paganism to Christianity in medieval central Europe - as a young virgin promised to God is kidnapped and raped by a marauder who her religious father seeks to kill in return.

Title: The Song
Description: An aspiring singer-songwriter's life and marriage suffer when the song he writes for his wife propels him to stardom.

Title: Metronom
Description: Romania, the autumn of the year 1972. Ana, a 17 year-old teenager, finds out that her boyfriend will flee the country for good in a few days. The two lovers decide to spend their last days together.

Title: Radioflash
Description: When a nuclear device causes an electromagnetic pulse that kills power to more than 200 million people, a teenage girl must help lead her family to survival in a dark new world.

Title: Davy Crockett: King of the Wild Frontier
Description: American frontiersman Davy Crockett fights in the Creek Indian War, is elected to the U.S. Congress and fights for Texas at the Alamo.

Title: Blue Collar
Description: When three workers try to steal from the local union, they instead discover corruption and decide to use this information for blackmail.

Title: Teenage Kicks
Description: The scars of our youth shape the adults we become.

Title: The Black Room
Description: A young couple moves into their dream house, which quickly becomes a living nightmare upon discovering a demonic secret awaiting them perennially in the cellar - with unholy pleasures, fear feasting and a brute for all who cross its' path.

Title: Bernadette
Description: Bernadette expected to finally get the position she deserved when she arrived to the Elysée Palace because she had always worked behind her husband's back to elect him president. She took revenge by becoming a major media figure.

Title: The Finale
Description: Theatre camp is all fun and games until the creepy acting teacher shows up and the killing begins. The Finale is a horror movie that takes on current social issues in the performing arts, while drawing inspiration from classic slasher films, old ghost stories, and even some Broadway musicals.

Title: How to Get Ahead in Advertising
Description: A cynical advertising exec has a block at work leading to a meltdown. He's hilariously out of control. Getting a big, talking boil on his shoulder doesn't help.

Title: Dating Amber
Description: Two school friends decide to start a pretend straight relationship in an effort to fit in.

Title: Surveillance
Description: Two FBI agents attempt to clarify the murders occurring in a desolate region. They approach the witnesses of the latest incident with the help of the local police. All of them hide something and all have wildly different stories to tell.

Title: Avengers of Justice: Farce Wars
Description: While trying to remain a good husband and father, Superbat and the Avengers of Justice come out of retirement to stop Dark Jokester and Lisp Luthor from freezing the planet.

Title: The Lost Leonardo
Description: The mystery surrounding the Salvator Mundi, the first painting by Leonardo da Vinci to be discovered for more than a century, which has now seemingly gone missing.

Title: In Her Skin
Description: This is what every parent fears: their child not coming home when they're meant to. When the fifteen-year-old student, Rachel Barber, doesn't climb off the tram to meet her dad, Elizabeth, her mother, and Mike, her dad, bolt into action.

Title: The Curse of the Werewolf
Description: In eighteenth-century Spain, an adopted boy becomes a werewolf and terrorizes the inhabitants of his town.

Title: Night of the Demons
Description: A group of kids go to a Halloween party, only to have to face down a group of demons.

Title: Something New
Description: Kenya McQueen, an accountant finds love in the most unexpected place when she agrees to go on a blind date with Brian Kelly, a sexy and free-spirited landscaper.

Title: Impromptu
Description: In 1830s France, pianist/composer Frédéric Chopin is pursued romantically by the determined, individualistic woman who uses the name George Sand.

Title: The Goat
Description: With the help of her goat, a young girl forced into an abusive marriage must escape and travel through the desert in order to save her village's water spring from a greedy Western corporation.

Title: Coup de Torchon
Description: A pathetic police chief, humiliated by everyone around him, suddenly wants a clean slate in life - and resorts to drastic means to do so.

Title: Emelie
Description: A couple's replacement babysitter turns out to be more than they bargained for when she subjects their kids to a series of twisted activities.

Title: The Giant Mechanical Man
Description: An offbeat romantic comedy about a silver-painted street performer and the soft spoken zoo worker who falls for him.

Title: The Pajama Game
Description: An Iowa pajama factory worker falls in love with an affable superintendent who had been hired by the factory's boss to help oppose the workers' demand for a pay raise.

Title: Chang Can Dunk
Description: A young Asian-American teen and basketball fanatic who just wants to dunk and get the girl ends up learning much more about himself, his best friends, and his mother.

Title: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
Description: A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his gang's latest hit, has been switched.

Title: The Private Eyes
Description: Scotland Yard sends a goofy pair to check on foul play at a mansion outside 1920s London.

Title: Rob Peace
Description: The story of an inner-city Newark kid who attends Yale yet ultimately succumbs to harsh economic realities and the demons of his past.

Title: The Lift
Description: A lift technician finds himself drawn into a web of mystery and peril as he investigates the perplexing deadly accidents occurring in the elevators of a new office building.

Title: The Villain
Description: When his wife becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, Guru blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.

Title: Is Paris Burning?
Description: August 1944. The Allies are approaching Paris and resistance groups within the city start to plan an uprising against the Germans. However, Hitler wants the city destroyed if it looks like the Allies will take it.

Title: Lost & Found
Description: In order to impress his beautiful French neighbor, Dylan Ramsey dognaps her pet pooch so he can return him and become a hero. Unfortunately, things do not work out as planned.

Title: Red Scorpion
Description: A Spetsnaz commando is sent on a covert mission by his Soviet superiors to infiltrate a rebel army and assassinate its leader.

Title: Room at the Top
Description: An ambitious young accountant plots to wed a wealthy factory owner's daughter despite falling in love with a married older woman.

Title: The Only Way
Description: A Jewish family try to escape from Denmark in October 1943 during the German occupation.

Title: Stripped to Kill
Description: When Detective Cody Sheehan discovers the body of a stripper from the Rock Bottom dance club, she wants the case. But the only way Cody can get the assignment is to go undercover - uncovered - at the club.

Title: One Piece Film Z
Description: A former Marine stands in the way of the Straw Hat Pirates.

Title: Cadence
Description: Charlie Sheen plays a rebellious inmate in an Army stockade.

Title: iBoy
Description: After being shot, Tom awakens from a coma to discover that fragments of his smartphone have been embedded in his head--and worse, that returning to normal teenage life is impossible because he has developed a strange set of superpowers.

Title: F*&% the Prom
Description: On the first day of high school, two friends split before reconnecting three years later to sabotage prom.

Title: Vigilante Force
Description: After oil is found in a small town and local factory shut down, violent crime skyrockets. A young man has had enough and calls in his older brother, a cynical Vietnam vet, who cleans the streets but then tries to take over the town.

Title: Mumbaikar
Description: The story is based on the life of people at Mumbai which includes their happiness, drama, fun, and romance which interlink their lives.

Title: Dear White People
Description: The lives of four black students at an Ivy League college.

Title: Stripper Party
Description: Mia,Mason, and Liz are 3 months behind on the rent and decide to throw a wild stripper party to come up with the money.

Title: Jeffrey
Description: A poignant romantic comedy about the quest for love and intimacy in the age of AIDS. A story of a thirtyish gay actor/waiter who decides to become celibate...the risk of AIDS has taken all the joy from sex.

Title: Tracers
Description: Wanted by the Chinese mafia, a New York City bike messenger escapes into the world of parkour after meeting a beautiful stranger.

Title: Larry Mahoney
Description: A student angst story.

Title: The Long Walk Home
Description: Two women, black and white, in 1955 Montgomery Alabama, must decide what they are going to do in response to the famous bus boycott led by Martin Luther King.

Title: Neon Bull
Description: Iremar works at the rodeo in North East of Brazil. From his home, the truck used to transport the animals, he dreams of a future in the region's booming clothing industry.

Title: The Courier
Description: A specialist carrier is hired to deliver a mysterious case to the underworld's most dangerous hitman.

Title: Not Another Happy Ending
Description: When a troubled editor discovers that his only successful author is blocked, he knows that he needs to do something about it.

Title: Hearts of Darkness: A Filmmaker's Apocalypse
Description: Documentary that chronicles how Francis Ford Coppola's Apocalypse Now (1979) was plagued by extraordinary script, shooting, budget, and casting problems--nearly destroying the life and career of the celebrated director.

Title: More Beautiful for Having Been Broken
Description: A female FBI agent befriends a woman and her adorable, young, special needs son who live in the countryside. The women's friendship soon turns into romance but family secrets complicate things.

Title: The Satanic Rites of Dracula
Description: In 1974, Professor Lorrimer Van Helsing investigates a satanic cult on behalf of Scotland Yard, only to discover a plot by Count Dracula to wipe out humanity with a bubonic plague.

Title: Winter Passing
Description: An editor offers actress/bartender Reese $100,000 for her late mom's letters from her novelist dad. She heads home from NYC to get them and finds her dad living in the garage while two strangers live in the house.

Title: Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions
Description: In "Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions," Taylor Swift performs each song in order of her album, "folklore," and reveals the stories and secrets behind all 17 songs.

Title: Little Woods
Description: In Little Woods North Dakota, two estranged sisters are driven to extremes when their mother dies, leaving them with one week to pay back her mortgage.

Title: Sex, Love, Misery: New New York
Description: Swiping. Dating. Ghosting. Have you wondered what was really going on in your date's head? SEX, LOVE, MISERY reveals candid thoughts and encounters between diverse singles looking to mingle or marry, from texts to hook ups and beyond.

Title: Prick Up Your Ears
Description: Biographer John Lahr is writing a book about playwright Joe Orton. Joe and Kenneth meet at drama school and live together for ten years as lovers and collaborators. Both want to be writers, but only one of them is successful.

Title: Dostana
Description: Two straight guys pretend to be gay in order to secure a Miami apartment. When both of them fall for their roommate Neha, hilarity ensues as they strive to convince one and all that they're gay whilst secretly trying to win her heart.

Title: Roustabout
Description: After a singer loses his job at a coffee shop, he finds employment at a struggling carnival, but his attempted romance with a teenager leads to friction with her father.

Title: Hail Satan?
Description: A look at the quick rise and influence of the controversial religious group known as The Satanic Temple.

Title: Beaten to Death
Description: A desperate choice leads Jack down a path that leaves him beaten and bruised as he struggles against man, nature, and his own insanity.

Title: The Evil Eye
Description: A mystery novel-loving American tourist witnesses a murder in Rome, and soon finds herself and her suitor caught up in a series of killings.

Title: Blue Monkey
Description: Detective Jim Bishop and Dr. Rachel Carson must find a way to stop a giant monstrous insect that's eating people in her quarantined hospital before it procreates and spreads a deadly infection it's carrying.

Title: Alone at Night
Description: Quarantine leads to a night of terror.

Title: 6 Years
Description: A young couple, bound by a seemingly ideal love, begin to unravel as unexpected opportunities spin them down a volatile and violent path and threaten the future they had always imagined.

Title: Ill Manors
Description: The lives of four drug dealers, one user, and two prostitutes are explored.

Title: Ted Bundy: American Boogeyman
Description: The intrepid FBI agents Kathleen McChesney and Robert Ressler, organize one of the largest manhunt in history to apprehend America's most infamous serial killer, Ted Bundy.

Title: White Punjab
Description: Story is Inspired by untold and unrevealed anecdotes of Punjab's Criminals which revolves around two rivalry Gangsters Durlabh and Kesar engaged in bitter revenge leading to death of famous personalities in India. Film highlights deep nexus of students Politics and suffering families of the gangsters.

Title: Ilsa, Harem Keeper of the Oil Sheiks
Description: In the vast deserts of the Middle East, lascivious harem keeper Ilsa joins the sex-trafficking ring of a maniacal sheikh who imports helpless female slaves for his perverse amusement.

Title: Beloved
Description: A young couple's romance is cut short when the man learns that his woman is married. Meanwhile, an unhappily married husband meets a lonely teacher and they share an illicit affair.

Title: A Fish Tale
Description: Three children accidentally get turned into fish after drinking a potion made by an eccentric scientist. When the kids end up in the sea, they must find the antidote within 48 hours or remain as fish forever.

Title: The Cat's Meow
Description: Semi-true story of the Hollywood murder that occurred at a star-studded gathering aboard William Randolph Hearst's yacht in 1924.

Title: Witness for the Prosecution
Description: A veteran lawyer must defend a man in what promises to be the most dramatic trial of his career.

Title: Henry's Crime
Description: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing.

Title: Iron Monkey
Description: A martial artist/doctor steals from the corrupt authorities as a masked thief to give to the poor while another martial artist/doctor is forced to hunt him down. But a major threat unites them as a powerful and traitorous shaolin monk takes over the authorities.

Title: Journey to the Far Side of the Sun
Description: The European Space Exploration Council sends two astronauts to explore a planet similar to the Earth but located on the opposite side of the sun.

Title: Emperor
Description: As the Japanese surrender at the end of World War II, General Fellers is tasked with deciding if Emperor Hirohito will be hanged as a war criminal. Influencing his ruling is his quest to find Aya, an exchange student he met years earlier in the U.S.

Title: Evie
Description: As a child, young Evie lost herself in the myths and legends of the sea. As she plays and explores the headland, she finds a cursed necklace washed up at the seaside. She doesn't realize the evil presence connected to it. As its power takes hold of her, she unleashes a deadly water demon that wants to claim her and those she loves.

Title: Where the Sidewalk Ends
Description: Det. Sgt. Mark Dixon wants to be something his old man wasn't: a guy on the right side of the law. Will Dixon's vicious nature get the better of him?

Title: The Mark of Zorro
Description: A young Spanish aristocrat must masquerade as a fop in order to maintain his secret identity of Zorro as he restores justice to early California.

Title: Adventures of a Private Eye
Description: While a private detective is away on vacation, his not particularly bright assistant takes it upon himself to "solve" a case that comes in. Complications ensue.

Title: Ator, the Fighting Eagle
Description: The son of Torren learns of his heritage, goes to avenge the deaths of his fellow villagers, and rescue his sister from the evil Dakkar and his spider cult.

Title: KKN di Desa Penari
Description: Six students who had to carry out KKN in a remote village are warned not to cross the boundary of the forbidden gate that leading to the mysterious place that may related to the figure of a beautiful dancer who began to disturb them.

Title: Vicious Affair
Description: And indeed is not a friend in need when they're trying to get your husband after their failing marriage and your life you got to be careful who you help cuz some people just need to be left alone

Title: The Look of Silence
Description: A family that survived the genocide in Indonesia confronts the men who killed one of their brothers.

Title: Thunder Road
Description: A veteran comes home from the Korean War to the mountains and takes over the family moonshining business. He has to battle big-city gangsters who are trying to take over the business and the police who are trying to put him in prison.

Title: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
Description: Scrooge McDuck takes Huey, Dewey, and Louie to Egypt to find a pyramid and magic lamp.

Title: Ocean Deep
Description: Three months after the disappearance of Rory, her marine scientist husband, artist Mara discovers to her dismay that the search for his body has been called off.

Title: Enemy Gold
Description: While on a mission to stop a drug operation, three Federal agents accidentally discover gold from the Civil War. With the aid of a corrupt agent, a ruthless criminal kingpin will hunt them down, one by one.

Title: Red Road
Description: Jackie works as a CCTV operator. Each day she watches over a small part of the world, protecting the people living their lives under her gaze. One day a man appears on her monitor, a man she thought she would never see again, a man she never wanted to see again. Now she has no choice, she is compelled to confront him.

Title: Razorback
Description: As a vicious wild boar terrorizes the Australian outback, the husband of one of the victims is joined by a hunter and a farmer in a search for the beast.

Title: Dead Space
Description: A deadly virus attacks the crew of a Saturn space station.

Title: The Comedian
Description: A look at the life of an aging insult comic named Jack Burke.

Title: Sun Valley Serenade
Description: After Phil Corey's band arrives at the Idaho ski resort, its pianist Ted Scott is smitten with a Norwegian refugee he has sponsored, Karen Benson. Later, soloist Vivian Dawn quits and Karen stages an ice show as a substitute.

Title: Dragon Rider
Description: A young silver dragon teams up with a mountain spirit and an orphaned boy on a journey through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

Title: The Real Blonde
Description: Joe and Mary live in Manhattan. She's the breadwinner, working as makeup artist. He's a wannabe actor working as waiter. When a friend gets a soap part ($3600/wk), Joe lowers his standard.

Title: Krisha
Description: Krisha returns for Thanksgiving dinner after ten years away from her family, but past demons threaten to ruin the festivities.

Title: Lover Come Back
Description: A series of misunderstandings leaves an advertising executive with a campaign for a product which has not yet been invented, while he romances his rival in the guise of its inventor.

Title: Hey Good Lookin'
Description: An outrageous, affectionate look at coming of age in Eisenhower-era Brooklyn.

Title: Licence
Description: A middle class House wife Asking A fir arms License to safety Precautions.

Title: Serial (Bad) Weddings 3
Description: After convincing their sons-in-law to settle with them in Chinon, Claude and Marie encounter all their co-parents-in-law, while the entire family is about to celebrate Claude and Marie's 40-year wedding anniversary.

Title: The Terrorists
Description: "The Terrorists". A black cloak of forgetting, suppressing and covering has descended on the events that took place in Bangkok in spring 2010.

Title: My Struggle
Description: Boosie's My Struggle (known as Boosie's Mein Kampf over seas) is the story of a failed rapper continuing to trip over his own laces.

Title: Lynch/Oz
Description: Victor Fleming's film The Wizard of Oz (1939) is one of David Lynch's most enduring obsessions. This documentary goes over the rainbow to explore this Technicolor through-line in Lynch's work.

Title: Prehistoric Women
Description: Jungle guide David is kidnapped by a tribe of natives who want to sacrifice him to their white rhino god. Just as he is about to be killed, however, he is thrown backwards in time to a kingdom of brunette women and their blonde slaves.

Title: Boy Meets Girl
Description: Boy Meets Girl is a funny, tender, sex positive romantic comedy that explores what it means to be a real man or woman, and how important it is to live a courageous life not letting fear stand in the way of going after your dreams.

Title: La Cérémonie
Description: A newly hired maid for a rich countryside family befriends a post-office clerk who encourages her to rebel against her employers.
