Description: A museum curator falls in love with a crazy parking attendant.

Title: Bus Stop
Description: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away against her will to get married and live on his ranch in Montana.

Title: Don't Look in the Basement
Description: A young psychiatric nurse goes to work at a remote asylum following a murder. There, she experiences varying degrees of torment from the patients.

Title: Remember the Daze
Description: A glimpse into the teenage wasteland of suburbia 1999 that takes place over 24 hours, and the teenagers who make their way through the last day of high school.

Title: Ain't Them Bodies Saints
Description: The tale of an outlaw who escapes from prison and sets out across the Texas hills to reunite with his wife and the daughter he has never met.

Title: Babes with Blades
Description: Set on the planet Draiga, this steampunk action film features world-class female martial artists and follows Azura as she tries save her dying race.

Title: Boot Camp
Description: A group of at-risk teens are sent to a what they think is a rehabilitation program on Fiji, but it's really a prison-like camp where kids are abused and brainwashed.

Title: Rurouni Kenshin: The Legend Ends
Description: Shishio has set sail in his ironclad ship to bring down the Meiji government and return Japan to chaos, carrying Kaoru with him. In order to stop him in time, Kenshin trains with his old master to learn his final technique.

Title: Descent Into Darkness
Description: Terrifying French horror movie about a journalist who arrives in Paris to film a documentary about the "European dream". A series of poor decisions and bad luck derail his project and drive him to a devastating state of madness...

Title: Five Corners
Description: A psychotic young man returns to his old neighborhood after release from prison. He seeks out the woman he previously tried to rape and the man who protected her, with twisted ideas of love for her and hate for him.

Title: The Underground Comedy Movie
Description: A series of comedic short films guaranteed to offend.

Title: Untitled Hulk Hogan Biopic
Description: The story of wrestling legend Hulk Hogan.

Title: The Roaring Twenties
Description: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

Title: American Siege
Description: An ex-NYPD officer-turned-sheriff of a small rural Georgia town has to contend with a gang of thieves who have taken a wealthy doctor hostage.

Title: Unknown: Cosmic Time Machine
Description: Follows a team of engineers and scientists in an ambitious mission to launch the James Webb Space Telescope and take the next giant leap in the understanding of the universe.

Title: Sansho the Bailiff
Description: In medieval Japan, a compassionate governor is sent into exile. His wife and children try to join him, but are separated, and the children grow up amid suffering and oppression.

Title: The Group
Description: After graduating from a prestigious Eastern university, 8 devoted female friends go their separate ways: one leaves for Europe, while the others experience troubled relationships. Decades later they get to meet one last time.

Title: 55 Steps
Description: When patients' rights lawyer Colette Hughes goes to meet her new client, Eleanor Riese, a patient in the psychiatric unit of a San Francisco hospital, she has no idea that besides taking on an uphill legal battle to improve treatment for mental patients in hospitals, she is meeting a woman who will make it her mission to transform Colette's workaholic life.

Title: The Beatles: Get Back - The Rooftop Concert
Description: For the first time in its entirety - The Beatles' last live performance as a group, the unforgettable rooftop concert on London's Savile Row.

Title: Island Escape
Description: After a mysterious accident at a research camp on the Isle of Gran Manan, a CEO hires a team of blue-collar mercenaries to extract his daughter, a scientist working at the camp. Upon arrival, the team soon learns that not only is the island surrounded by a wormhole that causes time to reset every three days, but it's also crawling with hideous monsters. As they learn more about the nature of time, space, and the creatures on the island, they quickly realize that death may be the easiest way to escape the island.

Title: Furioza
Description: An event from the past separates the fate of three friends. Unexpectedly, in the life of David (Mateusz Banasiuk) she appears again. Dzika (Weronika Ksiazkiewicz) - once the love of his life, now an experienced policewoman, makes him an offer that cannot be rejected. Either he becomes a police informant, or his brother (Wojciech Zielinski) will go to prison with a long-term sentence. Pressed against the wall, David finally succumbs, and his main goal becomes to infiltrate in an organized criminal group. Hitting the middle of a war for influence and money, he will have to face constant suspicion from Golden's old friend (Mateusz Damiecki). He will soon discover that the world from which he tried to free himself draws him in with redoubled strength.

Title: Triple Dog
Description: On the night of a sleepover, a group of teenage girls venture out in a competitive game of challenging dares. As the antics escalate, and the dares become more extreme, the girls unravel the truth behind a former student's rumored suicide.

Title: 2047: Virtual Revolution
Description: In a future mega city, where most people spend most time hooked up to a virtual world, an agent, employed by a corporation supplying virtual reality, is busy tracking down killers/terrorists, both in the virtual and real world.

Title: Master Z: The Ip Man Legacy
Description: While keeping a low profile after his defeat by Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi gets into trouble after getting in a fight with a powerful foreigner.

Title: Fort Apache the Bronx
Description: In New York City, South Bronx's main police precinct is nicknamed Fort Apache by its employees who feel like troopers surrounded by hostiles in a wild west isolated outpost.

Title: Pina
Description: A tribute to the late German choreographer Pina Bausch, as her dancers perform her most famous creations.

Title: True Things
Description: It follows a young woman living on the fringes of society who becomes intoxicated by a stranger who overwhelms her quiet life.

Title: The Indian Tomb
Description: A German architect runs away with the maharajah of Eschnapur's fiancee but is caught and thrown in the dungeon, while his relatives arrive from Europe looking for him and the maharajah's brother is scheming to usurp the throne.

Title: Warriors of Virtue
Description: A young boy is whisked away to the mythical land of Tao where he becomes the center of a conflict between an evil lord and a group of animal warriors.

Title: The Forbidden Play
Description: After beloved wife and mother Miyuki tragically dies, her little son chants a resurrection spell in the hope of reviving her. But something evil is pulsing underground, and a child's pure wish awakens a vengeful monster.

Title: 964 Pinocchio
Description: Pinocchio 964, lobotomised cyborg sex slave, is thrown out onto the street by his owners because of his inability to maintain an erection. He is befriended by a criminally insane, memory-wiped, homeless girl. Meanwhile, the corporate entity who manufactured and sold him plots to kill him because of his malfunction.

Title: Sing Sing
Description: A theater group escapes the reality of incarceration through the creativity of staging a play, with a cast that includes actors who have been incarcerated.

Title: Do You Believe?
Description: When a pastor is shaken by the visible faith of a street corner preacher, he is reminded that true belief always requires action. His response ignites a journey that impacts everyone it touches in ways that only God could orchestrate.

Title: Zero Hour!
Description: In 1950s Canada, during a commercial flight, the pilots and some passengers suffer food poisoning, thus forcing an ex-WWII fighter pilot (Dana Andrews) to try to land the airliner in heavy fog.

Title: The Whistle Blower
Description: A war veteran tries to investigate the murder of his son who was working as a Russian translator for the British intelligence service during the Cold War. He meets a web of deception and paranoia that seems to be impenetrable.

Title: Swimming with Men
Description: A man who is suffering a mid-life crisis finds new meaning in his life as part of an all-male, middle-aged, amateur synchronised swimming team.

Title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
Description: Story of a golden retriever who can play football.

Title: She Dies Tomorrow
Description: A woman becomes strangely convinced she will die the next day. Her friend initially disbelieves her before becoming paranoid herself that she too will die the next day.

Title: Just Before I Go
Description: On the verge of giving up on life, a guy travels to his hometown to make amends.

Title: Dracula 3D
Description: Asia Argento stars in horror legend Dario Argento's sexy spin on the classic tale about the sharp-toothed count who craves human blood.

Title: Bob the Butler
Description: Tom Green stars as a bumbling buffoon who lands at Butlering after working his way through all other 'A' and 'B' jobs.

Title: Death Defying Acts
Description: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini (Guy Pearce) enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con him.

Title: Fallen Angel
Description: A slick con man arrives in a small town looking to make some money, but soon gets more than he bargained for.

Title: Clownhouse
Description: Just before Halloween, three young brothers alone in a big house are menaced by three escaped mental patients who have murdered some traveling circus clowns and taken their identities.

Title: Another You
Description: A mental out-patient is mistaken for a missing wealthy man and a con man takes advantage of the situation.

Title: Donkey Punch
Description: Things go drastically wrong for a group of British holidaymakers in Spain.

Title: Double Blind
Description: When an experimental drug trial goes horribly wrong, the surviving test subjects must fight off sleep, and each other, to stay alive.

Title: L.A. Without a Map
Description: A British writer pursues a young actress to Hollywood and needs all the help he can get to win her love.

Title: Jasper Jones
Description: Coming of age story about Charlie Bucktin, a bookish boy of 14. On the night that Jasper Jones, the town's mixed race outcast shows him the dead body of young Laura Wishart, Charlie's life is changed forever. Entrusted with this secret and believing Jasper to be innocent, Charlie embarks on a dangerous journey to find the true killer. Set over the scorching summer holidays of 1969, Charlie defeats the local racists, faces the breakup of his parents and falls head over heels in love as he discovers what it means to be truly courageous.

Title: Terminal Island
Description: After the abolishment of the death penalty, California murderers are dumped on an island to spend the rest of their lives unsupervised. There, two groups are formed, one lead by a psychopath, and another group determined to bring him down.

Title: Dedication
Description: The romantic comedy follows a misogynistic children's book author who is forced to work closely with a female illustrator instead of his long-time collaborator and only friend.

Title: The Seven Faces of Jane
Description: Jane experiences romance, comedy, tragedy, and crises as imagined by eight different filmmakers.

Title: Where Angels Go Trouble Follows!
Description: An old-line Mother Superior is challenged by a modern young nun when they take the girls of St. Francis Academy on a bus trip across the United States.

Title: Here Are the Young Men
Description: Dublin teenagers Matthew, nihilistic Rez, and the deranged Kearney, leave school to a social vacuum of drinking and drugs, falling into shocking acts of transgression.

Title: This Film Is Not Yet Rated
Description: Kirby Dick's exposé about the American movie ratings board.

Title: A Little Romance
Description: An American teenager living in Paris meets and falls in love with a local.

Title: Dangerous Liaisons
Description: Book smart Célène falls for bad boy Tristan at her new Biarritz high school, unaware she's part of a cruel bet he's made with social media queen Vanessa.

Title: Gabriel's Inferno: Part Three
Description: Someone dark returns from Julia's past with bad intentions. Gabriel has secrets he needs to share, but worries that he'll lose everything if he does. Will their relationship weather the test of secrets revealed?

Title: Private Lessons: Another Story
Description: Professional photographer Lauren travels to Miami to find the next hottest model for her shoot. She hooks up with her emotional Cuban limo driver Raul, but then her cheating sleazy husband Stephen shows up as well as hot Marissa.

Title: Bad Blood
Description: As a deadly virus which infects people who have loveless sex sweeps Paris, a lonely pariah attempts to steal a potent antidote, only to fall for the mistress of his partner-in-crime. Is the infectious young love the cure to the bad blood?

Title: Emilia Perez
Description: Mexico, today. Lawyer Rita receives an unexpected offer. She has to help a feared cartel boss retire from his business and disappear forever by becoming the woman he's always dreamed of being.

Title: Prey
Description: A zoo veterinarian gets caught up in a grisly adventure as she finds herself leading the city-wide hunt for a monstrous lion terrorizing the Dutch capital of Amsterdam.

Title: The Endurance
Description: A retelling of Sir Ernest Shackleton 's ill-fated expedition to Antarctica in 1914-1916, featuring new footage of the actual locations and interviews with surviving relatives of key expedition members, plus archived audio interviews with expedition members, and a generous helping of the footage and still photos shot on the expedition.

Title: Thunderbolt
Description: In order to release his kidnapped sister, sports car mechanic Chan Foh To (Jackie Chan) has to beat a supercriminal street racer.

Title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
Description: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

Title: Night and the City
Description: A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.

Title: Nightmare Weekend
Description: A female scientist performs experiments on three college girls that turn them into drooling, murderous mutants.

Title: Willie Dynamite
Description: A social worker tries to get a pimp to change his ways.

Title: Voyage of the Damned
Description: The tragic 1939 voyage of SS St. Louis carrying hundreds of German Jewish refugees from Nazi Germany that seemingly no nation is willing to save from certain doom.

Title: Arthur 3: The War of the Two Worlds
Description: With Maltazard now seven feet tall and Arthur still two inches small, our hero must find a way to grow back to his normal size and stop the Evil M once and for all, with the help of Selenia and Betameche.

Title: Road to Bali
Description: Two unemployed show-biz pals accept treasure-diving work in Bali for a local princess and they find treasure, love and trouble.

Title: Jericho Ridge
Description: Trapped and without backup, a small town cop fights for her life when her remote Sheriff's Office is targeted by murderous attackers.

Title: Silk Stockings
Description: A Russian government official is sent to Paris to bring back her comrades; she soon gets a taste of Paris life and falls in love with an American movie producer.

Title: The Bohemian Life
Description: Three struggling artists try to make passable livings in Paris despite setbacks and tragedies.

Title: The Recall
Description: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

Title: The Silent Forest
Description: Anja Grimm returns to the remote forest area where her father disappeared without a trace when she was eight years old. Her sudden appearance triggers a brutal murder. Disturbances in the forest floor and pointer plants force her on the trail of deeper layers of guilt and crime and trigger a catastrophe.

Title: The Lady Bird Diaries
Description: A groundbreaking documentary film that uses Lady Bird's audio diaries to tell the story of one of the most influential and least understood First Ladies in history.

Title: Quicksilver
Description: Jack was doing great trading shares until he wasn't. He gets a job on a bike at Quicksilver speed delivery. There he befriends Hector and the cute Terri. Jack gets an enemy in the criminal Gypsy.

Title: Offering to the Storm
Description: Inspector Amaia Salazar confronts the origins of her nightmares as she unfolds the darkest secrets of the Baztan valley.

Title: Long Day's Journey Into Night
Description: At the end of a long and hot summer day, members of one family gather in a large house. Everyone has something painful and offensive to say, and their silence is even worse.

Title: The Bride of Badrinath
Description: Badrinath is looking for a typical bride; Vaidehi is looking for an independent life. Together they must break with tradition and redefine their role.

Title: Cut and Run
Description: A reporter and her cameraman connect a surviving Jonestown leader and a TV exec's missing son to a drug war where jungle installations are being massacred by an army of natives and a skilled white assassin.

Title: Sonchiriya
Description: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands.

Title: David and Bathsheba
Description: After King David sees the beautiful Bathsheba bathing from the palace roof, he enters into an adulterous affair which has tragic consequences for his family and Israel.

Title: The Road Dog
Description: The film is a Drama/Comedy starring DOUG STANHOPE as an alcoholic standup comedian, who gets a second chance in life when he reconnects with the son he's never known.

Title: Miss Shetty Mr Polishetty
Description: Miss Shetty is a feminist living in London and wants to be single forever. Mr. Polishetty from Hyderabad in Telangana, India, wants to be in a committed relationship. The two appear to be in different stages of life but somehow connect.

Title: Close Encounters of the Fifth Kind
Description: Dr. Steven Greer examines details surrounding his alien-visitation "disclosure" movement.

Title: Conquest 1453
Description: After the death of his father Murat II, Mehmet II ascends to the Ottoman throne. After braving internal and external enemies, he decides to complete what he was destined to do - conquer Constantinople.

Title: The Wait
Description: Portrays the macabre descent into hell of a man who suffered the tragic loss of his family.

Title: Island of Lost Souls
Description: A mad doctor conducts ghastly genetic experiments on a remote island in the South Seas, much to the fear and disgust of the shipwrecked sailor who finds himself trapped there.

Title: Inbred
Description: Four young offenders and their care workers visit the remote Yorkshire village of Mortlake, which prides on keeping itself to itself. A minor incident with locals rapidly escalates into a blood-soaked, deliriously warped nightmare.

Title: Cop
Description: An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.

Title: Kiki, Love to Love
Description: Under Madrid's scorching summer sun, ordinary couples with real passion and the unquenchable desire to love and be loved, share the same irrepressible urge to investigate their own sexuality through five intertwined stories.

Title: It's All Gone Pete Tong
Description: A famous DJ in the Ibiza club scene finds the alcohol and drug-fueled party that is his life threatened by the progressive loss of his hearing.

Title: Blancanieves
Description: A twist on the Snow White fairy tale that is set in 1920s Seville and centered on a female bullfighter.

Title: Operation Dumbo Drop
Description: To keep the loyalty of a village during the Vietnam war, a U.S. Army officer and his unit struggle to deliver it a live elephant.

Title: Sour Grapes
Description: Documentary about the fine and rare wine auction market centering around a counterfeiter who befriended the rich and powerful and sold millions of dollars of fraudulent wine through the top auction houses.

Title: Dragon Wars: D-War
Description: Once in 500 years, ancient mythical creatures come to Earth, wreaking havoc and destruction. This time they must be stopped.

Title: Love Stinks
Description: Seth Winnick has it all: a successful career in television, good friends, and a passionate relationship with beautiful Chelsea. However, when he fails to make a timely marriage proposal, Chelsea tries to make his life hell.

Title: Hells Angels on Wheels
Description: At first, gas station attendant Poet is happy when the Hell's Angels gang finally accepts him. But he's shocked when he learns just how brutal they are.

Title: Kid 90
Description: An intimate look at young Hollywood starlets growing up in the 1990s, using hundreds of hours of footage captured by Soleil Moon Frye.

Title: El Muerto
Description: A wrestler gains super power through a mystical mask who originally fought Spider-Man in a charity wrestling match in which he nearly unmasked the webslinger before being stung by Spider-Man with a paralyzing poison.

Title: The Pirates of Somalia
Description: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself with the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

Title: Unbroken: Path to Redemption
Description: The next amazing chapter of Olympian and World War II hero Louis Zamperini's powerful true story of forgiveness, redemption, and amazing grace.

Title: George Harrison: Living in the Material World
Description: Filmmaker Martin Scorsese examines the life of musician George Harrison, weaving together interviews, concert footage, home movies and photographs.

Title: Man's Favorite Sport?
Description: The author of a best-selling fishing guide is actually extremely inexperienced in the sport, which causes mayhem when he is entered into a competition.

Title: Aashiqui 2
Description: Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.

Title: To the Forest of Firefly Lights
Description: Hotaru is rescued by a spirit when she gets lost in a forest as a child. The two become friends, despite the spirit revealing that he will disappear if he is ever touched by a human.

Title: The Loved One
Description: Satire on the funeral business, in which a young British poet goes to work at a Hollywood cemetery.

Title: Folk og røvere i Kardemomme by
Description: The three thieves Kasper, Jesper and Jonathan lives together with their always hungry lion in the little town of Kardemomme town, the home to a fair but kind police officer, and the strict Aunt Sofie.

Title: Tarzoon: Shame of the Jungle
Description: Shame, the ape man of the jungle, sets off to rescue his woman, June, when a gang of giant penises kidnaps her.

Title: Daddy Day Camp
Description: Seeking to offer his son the satisfying summer camp experience that eluded him as a child, the operator of a neighborhood day care center opens his own camp, only to face financial hardship and stiff competition from a rival camp.

Title: Charlie's Farm
Description: 4 friends go camping at a haunted farm with an evil, violent history in the Australian outback - ignoring warnings.

Title: Grand Central
Description: Gary, an unskilled young man, lands a job as a decontamination sub-contractor at a nuclear power plant in the lower valley of the Rhone. Inducted into the workforce by supervisor Gilles and veteran Toni, Gary discovers that radiation contamination is not just a risk factor but an everyday hazard. At the same time, he begins an illicit affair with Karole, the fiancée of Toni.

Title: We Don't Live Here Anymore
Description: An indiscretion between two close friends tears down their respective marriages.

Title: Comes a Horseman
Description: A brave and proud woman struggles for her land, finding help and something more in unexpected way.

Title: Antisocial
Description: Five university friends gather at a house party to ring in the New Year. Unbeknownst to them, an epidemic has erupted outside, causing outbreaks around the world.

Title: An American Carol
Description: An anti-American filmmaker who's out to abolish the July Fourth holiday is visited by three ghosts who try to change his perception of the country.

Title: Room 237
Description: An exploration of various interpretations of Stanley Kubrick's horror film, The Shining (1980).

Title: Pasolini
Description: A kaleidoscopic look at the last day of Italian filmmaker Pier Paolo Pasolini in 1975.

Title: Ghost Stories
Description: The winning team of "Lust Stories" reunites to tell some spine-chilling tales. "Ghost Stories" is a 2020 Indian anthology horror film consisting of four short film segments.

Title: The Council
Description: The never-before told story of a crime syndicate consisting of seven African-American men who ruled Harlem in the 1970s and early 80s focusing on Nicky Barnes, dubbed "Mr. Untouchable" by the New York Times.

Title: Sky Sharks
Description: Deep in the ice of the antarctic, a team of geologists uncover an old Nazi laboratory still intact where dark experiments had occurred. In order to conquer the world, the Nazis created modified sharks who were able to fly.

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
Description: A couple who have been married for three years are shocked to learn that their marriage is not legally valid.

Title: Juggernaut
Description: A blackmailer demands a huge ransom in exchange for information on how to disarm the seven bombs he placed aboard the transatlantic liner Britannic.

Title: Catching Dust
Description: Geena finally decides to leave her criminal husband Clyde and their isolated Texas hideout, but a couple from NY suddenly arrives. Ignoring the risks, she convinces Clyde to let them stay, a decision with dangerous consequences.

Title: The Simp
Description: Monty, an educated and nerdy young man passionate about intellectual pursuits, establishes an online connection with Amber, a self-centered and devious woman. Amber manipulates and exploits Monty for personal gain..

Title: Midas Man
Description: On Thursday 9th November 1961 a man named Brian descended the stairs to a cellar in Liverpool and changed the world forever.

Title: Highway
Description: After Jack gets caught with a Vegas mobster's wife in bed, he's gotta hit the road. Jack's best friend Pilot accompanies him, and the pair sets out on an adventure akin to Kerouac's "On the Road".

Title: Birds of America
Description: A regular guy struggles with a repressive home and professional life, as well as making amends for the trouble his free-spirited brother and sister cause around town.

Title: Reflections in a Golden Eye
Description: Bizarre tale of sex, betrayal, and perversion at a military post.

Title: How I Learned to Fly
Description: After their parents suddenly left them, 2 teenage brothers found themselves all alone. Daniel, the older brother, is deeply troubled by the violence they endured at the hands of their father and is committed to keeping their family safe.

Title: Princess Cyd
Description: A 16-year-old girl visits her aunt in Chicago for the summer. While there, she falls for another girl, and she and her aunt challenge each other's sex and spirit.

Title: Let Sleeping Corpses Lie
Description: A cop chases two hippies suspected of a series of Manson family-like murders; unbeknownst to him, the real culprits are the living dead, brought to life with a hunger for human flesh by ultrasonic radiation being used for pest control.

Title: Gun City
Description: In 1921 a tough cop is sent from Madrid to Barcelona to locate stolen military weaponry.

Title: Fatal Affair
Description: Ellie tries to mend her marriage with her husband Marcus after a brief encounter with an old friend, David, only to find that David is more dangerous and unstable than she'd realized.

Title: And the King Said, What a Fantastic Machine
Description: From the first camera to 45 billion cameras worldwide today, the visual sociologist filmmakers widen their lens to expose both humanity's unique obsession with the camera's image and the social consequences that lay ahead.

Title: West of Memphis
Description: An examination of a failure of justice in the case against the West Memphis Three.

Title: All Day and a Night
Description: A young man who committed a homicide deals with the repercussions of his action.

Title: The Mule
Description: After a trip to Thailand, a first-time drug mule finds himself in police custody, with his stomach crammed with narcotics. Now, he has to endure seven sphincter-clenching days to convince them of his innocence. Will nature take its course?

Title: Rise of the Footsoldier: The Heist
Description: Fresh out of prison, Pat Tate steps right back into his Essex nightclub business. Since he can't stop brooding about the man who had him put away, it's not long before he's off to Marbella to find Frank Harris and seek his revenge.

Title: The Protector
Description: Two New York City cops, Billy Wong and Danny Garoni, head to Hong Kong after the daughter of a rich businessman is kidnapped by the drug lord, Mr. Ko.

Title: 5 Card Stud
Description: The players in an ongoing poker game are being mysteriously killed off, one by one.

Title: City on Fire
Description: Danny Ryan is compelled to transform from a street soldier into a merciless commander in order to save his loved ones. Danny plans to create a dynasty or perish trying while battling the Mafia, the police, and the government.

Title: While the City Sleeps
Description: A serial killer has been killing beautiful women in New York and the new owner of a media company offers a high ranking job to the first of his senior executives who can get the earliest scoops on the case.

Title: Taipei Story
Description: Lung is a former member of the national Little League team who lives with his old childhood sweetheart Ah-chin, a traditional family woman. Although they live together, Ah-chin is weary of Lung's past liaison with another girl.

Title: 4x4
Description: A thug breaks into a specialized car with a special security system that keeps him trapped inside with no one being able to hear him crying for help.

Title: The Chaperone
Description: An ex-con on the run from his criminal past hides out from those he ratted on by chaperoning a field trip to New Orleans.

Title: Bombshell: The Hedy Lamarr Story
Description: The life and career of the hailed Hollywood movie star and underappreciated genius inventor, Hedy Lamarr.

Title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia
Description: A young family moves into a historic house in Georgia and learns that they're not the house's only inhabitants. They find themselves in the presence of a secret rising from underground that threatens to bring down anyone in its path.

Title: Happy Accidents
Description: New Yorker Ruby Weaver believes she has found the man of her dreams in Sam Deed, who is her best catch in some time--except that he assures her that he came from the future.

Title: Deadlock
Description: An ex-military man working at a Georgia power plant has to spring into action to prevent disaster when a group of rogue soldiers gain control of the plant and take the employees hostage.

Title: Junior Bonner
Description: Ace Bonner returns to Arizona several years after he abandoned his family, Junior Bonner is a wild young man. Against the typical rodeo championship, family drama erupts.

Title: When the Lights Went Out
Description: Poltergeists attack a family in Yorkshire during the 1974 nationwide blackouts.

Title: Clara
Description: An obsessive astronomer and a curious artist form an unlikely bond which leads them to a profound, scientific discovery.

Title: Jungle Beat: The Movie
Description: A homesick alien crash-lands his spaceship near the colorful African Jungle. His new animal friends need to get him back to his ship and teach him about friendship and fun before his Space-Conqueror father can take over the planet.

Title: Space Battleship Yamato
Description: In 2199, the crew of the space battleship Yamato embark on a dangerous journey to the planet Iskandar to acquire a device that will rejuvenate the war-ravaged Earth.

Title: It Had to Be You
Description: Two strangers meet and sparks fly during the weekend that they are planning their respective weddings.

Title: Butt Boy
Description: Detective Fox loves work and alcohol. After going to AA, his sponsor, Chip, becomes the main suspect in his investigation of a missing kid. Fox also starts to believe that people are disappearing up Chip's butt.

Title: A.I. Rising
Description: An intimate relationship between a human and an android tests the boundaries of human nature.

Title: The Body
Description: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.

Title: Kumiko, The Treasure Hunter
Description: A jaded Japanese woman discovers a hidden copy of Fargo (1996) on VHS, believing it to be a treasure map indicating the location of a large case of money.

Title: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Them
Description: One couple's story as they try to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.

Title: The Dungeonmaster
Description: A demonic wizard challenges a modern-day computer programmer to a battle of technology vs. sorcery, with the programmer's girlfriend as the prize.

Title: Common Ground
Description: The solution of Regenerative farmers to bring soil health across the continent and beyond.

Title: Haunted Honeymoon
Description: Two radio voice actors are getting married. Larry has fits of fear. A shrink needs 36 hours to scare him to death and cure him - during a family reunion at a scary family castle.

Title: That Was Then... This Is Now
Description: Two juvenile delinquents find themselves growing apart, for one is growing up, and the other is staying young and reckless.

Title: Father & Soldier
Description: During World War I, a father enlists himself in the French Army in order to be with his 17-year-old son who was recruited against his will. Sent to the front, they find themselves facing the war together in the French colony of Senegal.

Title: Paris Blues
Description: During the 1960s, two American expatriate jazz musicians living in Paris meet and fall in love with two American tourist girls.

Title: Barney's Great Adventure
Description: A talking purple dinosaur leads a group of children on a hunt for a large missing egg.

Title: Piercing
Description: A man kisses his wife and baby goodbye and seemingly heads away on business, with a plan to check into a hotel, call an escort service, and kill an unsuspecting prostitute.

Title: Beyond the Edge
Description: A scientist and a pilot volunteer for a high profile mission to reach the end of the universe. After 13 years, the ship crashes through the end of the universe and into the unknown.

Title: Bikini Swamp Girl Massacre
Description: A group of beautiful bikini-clad girls go on a vacation in the swamp of the Florida Everglades, never to return.

Title: Compulsion
Description: Two wealthy law-school students go on trial for murder in this version of the Leopold-Loeb case.

Title: Class Action
Description: An attorney representing a traumatized accident victim finds that his opponent is a very familiar defense attorney - his own daughter.

Title: Marquis de Sade's Justine
Description: Justine is a nubile young virgin cast out of a French orphanage and thrust into a depraved world of prostitution, predatory lesbians, a fugitive murderess, bondage, branding, and one supremely sadistic monk. It's a twisted tale of strange desires, perverse pleasures and the ultimate corruption of innocence as told by the Marquis de Sade.

Title: Black Cat
Description: Two women are raped and killed by samurai soldiers. Soon they reappear as vengeful ghosts who seduce and brutally murder the passing samurai.

Title: Bullet in the Head
Description: When three close friends escape from Hong Kong to war-time Saigon to start a criminal's life, they all go through a harrowing experience which totally shatters their lives and their friendship forever.

Title: Novocaine
Description: A dentist finds himself a murder suspect after a sexy patient seduces him and steals all of the drugs from his practice.

Title: Mrs Dalloway
Description: In 1923 London, socialite Clarissa Dalloway's (Vanessa Redgrave's) well-planned party is overshadowed by the return of an old suitor she had known thirty-three years earlier.

Title: Twin Murders: The Silence of the White City
Description: A cop returns to the job. A serial killer too returns to the job.

Title: Not Fade Away
Description: Set in suburban New Jersey in the 1960s, a group of friends form a rock band and try to make it big.

Title: Bogus
Description: Recently orphaned, a young boy is taken in by his godmother who is shocked to realize that she can see the boy's imaginary friend: a flamboyant, French magician named Bogus.

Title: Firelight
Description: A governess agrees to bear a child to help her father.

Title: The Unthinkable
Description: Sweden faces a mysterious attack while Alex tries to reunite with his youth love, Anna.

Title: Polisse
Description: A journalist covering police assigned to a juvenile division enters into an affair with one of her subjects.

Title: A Tale of Two Cities
Description: A pair of lookalikes, one a former French aristocrat and the other an alcoholic English lawyer, fall in love with the same woman amidst the turmoil of the French Revolution.

Title: The Humanity Bureau
Description: A dystopian thriller set in the year 2030 that sees the world in a permanent state of economic recession and facing serious environmental problems as a result of global warming.

Title: Alice's Restaurant
Description: A cinematic adaption of Arlo Guthrie's classic song story.

Title: Sudden Fear
Description: After an ambitious actor insinuates himself into the life of a wealthy middle-aged playwright and marries her, he plots with his mistress to murder her.

Title: Star Kid
Description: Spencer Griffith's life changes when a meteor falls into a local junkyard, and he finds a Cybersuit, an exoskeleton with AI from another galaxy. When Spencer puts on the Cybersuit he becomes a different kind of person.

Title: Adam Chaplin
Description: His life was torn apart when his wife was murdered by Mafia boss Denny. Filled with vengeance, Adam summoned a demon that endowed him with god-like strength so that he might survive his journey through Heaven's Valley.

Title: The Tomorrow Job
Description: A team of thieves use a drug that allows them to trade consciousnesses with their future-selves in order to steal tomorrow's secrets.

Title: Mark Antony
Description: Two gangsters, Mark and Antony acquire a mobile phone that has the ability to time travel.

Title: Son of a Rich
Description: An ill-behaved, greedy man wakes up in a 19th century village and finds he is a peasant.

Title: The Necro Files
Description: A cannibal rapist rises from the grave as a flesh-eating zombie sex maniac! Two Seattle cops, a satanic cult and a flying demon fetus try to stop the lust-crazed ghoul before he can kill again.

Title: Shipwrecked
Description: A young Norwegian boy in 1850s England goes to work as a cabin boy and discovers some of his shipmates are actually pirates.

Title: Goodbye World
Description: When a mysterious terrorist attack causes chaos in the cities, a group of friends take refuge in their countryside cabin. But the challenges of living in a post-apocalyptic world soon take their toll on relationships within the group.

Title: Survive the Night
Description: A disgraced doctor and his family are held hostage at their home by criminals on the run, when a robbery-gone-awry requires them to seek immediate medical attention.

Title: The Marrying Man
Description: A millionaire playboy goes to Las Vegas and comes out married to a woman he barely knows.

Title: The Glorias
Description: The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide.

Title: I Have Electric Dreams
Description: Eva a 16-year-old girl lives with her mother, her younger sister and their cat, but wants to move in with her estranged father. Clinging onto him, she tries to balance between the tenderness and sensitivity of teenage life.

Title: Devil's Due
Description: After a mysterious, lost night on their honeymoon, a newlywed couple finds themselves dealing with an earlier-than-planned pregnancy.

Title: Danton
Description: In 1793, as the Terror begins in France, Georges Danton, a champion-of-the-people, returns to clash against Maximilien Robespierre and his extremist party.

Title: Princess Caraboo
Description: A mysterious young woman speaking a strange language shows up in an English village, where she is taken in by aristocrats who assume she is a foreign princess

Title: God Help the Girl
Description: As Eve begins writing songs as a way to sort through some emotional problems, she meets James and Cassie, two musicians each at crossroads of their own.

Title: Love Ranch
Description: A drama revolving around a married couple who opened the first legal brothel in Nevada.

Title: Primal Rage
Description: A scientist at a Florida University accidentally creates a "rage virus" while conducting experiments to restore dead brain tissue in baboons. The virus soon spreads.

Title: In the White City
Description: A Swiss sailor abandons his post during a stopover in Lisbon and takes up residence in a small hotel in the city.

Title: The Drawn Together Movie!
Description: Eight housemates on a fake animated reality TV show realize they've been canceled and set off on a journey to get back on the air.

Title: Dr. Phibes Rises Again
Description: The vengeful doctor rises again, seeking the Scrolls of Life in an attempt to resurrect his deceased wife.

Title: Cougars Inc.
Description: Sam has been expelled from every school and is now looking for a creative way to pay for school. He finds it in escort business called Cougars, Inc., which gives him lessons he never expected.

Title: Noah's Ark
Description: A pair of mice attempt to board Noah's Ark.

Title: The Abigail Mysteries
Description: It follows Abby Broukes, who is struggling to come to terms with the loss of her baby and divorce. She moves back to her hometown and gets wrapped up in a mystery surrounding the death of her eccentric neighbor.

Title: Thumbsucker
Description: Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.

Title: Eddie Murphy: Raw
Description: Eddie Murphy in a stand-up performance recorded live. For an hour and a half he talks about his favourite subjects: sex and women.

Title: Sharks of the Corn
Description: Strange things are happening in Druid Hills, Kentucky, known mainly for its voluminous corn output. Victims of monsters in cornfields begin cropping up, and witnesses are saying there are large Great White sharks swimming in the corn stalks.

Title: Deadly Crush
Description: When a painter rents a secluded cabin to jump start her creativity, she has sex with a ghost and finds herself part of his plan to bring itself back to life.

Title: Fantomas vs. Scotland Yard
Description: Famous but unlucky pursuers of Fantomas from France go to weird Scotland for a final attempt to bring the impudent criminal to justice.

Title: The Claim
Description: A prospector who sold his wife and infant daughter in exchange for a mining claim, tries desperately to win them back as he helps to build the Pacific Railroad with a group of pioneer friends.

Title: Fantasm
Description: Professor Jungenot A. Freud explores ten common female sexual fantasies as described by some of his patients.

Title: Get the Girl
Description: Sebastain "Bash" Danye, a legendary gun for hire hangs up his weapon to retire peacefully with his 'it's complicated' partner Renee. Their quiet lives are soon interrupted when they find an unconscious woman on their property, Maddie. While nursing her back to health, some bad men attack the house. Bash and Renee end up killing the men in self-defense to find out that Maddie escaped a sophisticated trafficking ring, and those guys came to recapture their top earner. We find out Maddie's sister was killed in front of her, so she sought out the one person capable of wiping out an entire criminal syndicate. Knowing retaliation is imminent, the motley crew holster up for one last round.

Title: Mermaid Down
Description: A mermaid is ripped from the Pacific, her tail is chopped off and she's thrown into a mental home where no one believes she is a mermaid.

Title: Just Before Dawn
Description: Five young people venture into the backwoods of Oregon to claim a property, and find themselves being stalked by a hulking, machete-wielding psychopath.

Title: Avenged
Description: A deaf girl is brutalized by a murderous gang who are then hunted by her when the bloodthirsty spirit of an Apache warrior inhabits her lifeless body.

Title: Prison Heat
Description: Four American babes on vacation in the Middle East run into trouble when they are imprisoned by corrupt army officials.

Title: The Spy Gone North
Description: In the mid-1990s, a loyal South Korean secret agent is caught in a political vortex plotted by the ruling classes of North and South Korea.

Title: Modern Persuasion
Description: A single woman focused on her career in New York is forced to deal with the aftermath of a failed relationship when an ex-boyfriend hires her company.

Title: Scavenger Hunt
Description: To inherit a fortune, various addressees of a will must compete in a wild scavenger hunt to collect selected items, but cannot be simply bought.

Title: Ghost Book
Description: The forbidden book "The Haunted Book" can make any wish come true, but in order to make your wish come true, you have to go through a life-threatening ordeal. What is the ordeal...!?

Title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
Description: It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect.

Title: Assimilate
Description: Three friends making a web series about their town discover that their neighbors are being killed and replaced by creatures who are perfect copies of their victims.

Title: Surprise
Description: Convinced his wife is cheating on him with his best friend, a husband goes off the deep end into a conspiracy, only to find himself unprepared for what comes next.

Title: Bergen
Description: Bergen, a valuable Turkish Arabesque singer, fights to stay afloat despite all the difficulties in her life.

Title: God's Not Dead 2
Description: When a high school teacher is asked a question in class about Jesus, her response lands her in deep trouble.

Title: The Gateway Meat
Description: The Gateway Meat is a disturbing and sadistic film, that strays far from the normal conventions of the horror genre. It is about a group of Satanists, living in a quaint, coastal fishing town. As the film progresses we get to know the character played by DeCaro himself, Markus. The film is mainly about how Markus struggles as he tries to deal with the great expectations that are placed on him after his fathers death. Markus' father, who was a Satanist, was trying to open up a portal into hell. Now that he is gone, Markus must take the reigns, and gain the power that his father wanted. With the help of his family and a couple of friends, Markus murders his way to power, as his young, preschool aged daughter watches."

Title: Two Can Play That Game
Description: An arrogant career woman plays a series of heartless mind-games with her boyfriend to "put him in line," only to discover that he has a few tricks up his own sleeve.

Title: Fermat's Room
Description: 4 mathematicians are invited to solve an enigma. Once there, they're locked in a mechanically shrinking room and given 1 minute to solve each puzzle via cellphone while also figuring out why they're there.

Title: Samurai Rebellion
Description: The mother of a feudal lord's only heir is kidnapped away from her husband by the lord. The husband and his samurai father must decide whether to accept the unjust decision, or risk death to get her back.

Title: There Is No Evil
Description: The four stories that are variations on the crucial themes of moral strength and the death penalty that ask to what extent individual freedom can be expressed under a despotic regime and its seemingly inescapable threats.

Title: Jumping the Broom
Description: Two very different families converge on Martha's Vineyard one weekend for a wedding.

Title: A Low Down Dirty Shame
Description: An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.

Title: Beginner's Guide to Sex
Description: After experiencing a series of sexually related mishaps, a high school adds sexual education to its curriculum to rehabilitate the student body, and hires Laci Cox to teach it - the only catch is Laci is a virgin.

Title: Bye Bye Love
Description: A story about the family breakup of three divorced men. The film presented their perspective and it reveals their relationship with their children, ex-wives, girl friends, male friendships, and their identities as divorced men.

Title: Habit
Description: A street-smart party girl gets mixed up in a violent drug deal and finds a possible way out by masquerading as a nun.

Title: Art School Confidential
Description: Starting from childhood attempts at illustration, the protagonist pursues his true obsession to art school. But as he learns how the art world really works, he finds that he must adapt his vision to the reality that confronts him.

Title: Sacramento
Description: Rickey, an energetic and free-spirited young man who convinces Glenn, his long-time friend who's settled into domestic life, to go on an impromptu road trip from Los Angeles to Sacramento.

Title: The Well
Description: A budding art restorer travels to a small Italian village to bring a medieval painting back to its former glory. Little does she know she is placing her life in danger from an evil curse and a monster born of myth and brutal pain.

Title: Sentinelle
Description: Transferred home after a traumatizing combat mission, a trained French soldier uses her lethal skills to hunt down the man who hurt her sister.

Title: In Your Absence
Description: A fatherless boy whose fixation on a mysterious stranger leads him blindly into a tragedy that is to mark him for life.

Title: The Pom Pom Girls
Description: A group of carefree high school seniors are having the time of their lives, filled with sex, romance, and teen high jinks.

Title: Casa de mi Padre
Description: Scheming to save their father's ranch, the Alvarez brothers find themselves in a war with Mexico's most feared drug lord.

Title: Bordertown: The Mural Murders
Description: When the imprisoned serial killer Lasse Maasalo's face and a text "Let's make the world a better place" are painted to an underpass with blood, Kari Sorjonen is forced to confront the most difficult case of his career.

Title: Three Christs
Description: Three Christs follows Dr. Alan Stone who is treating three paranoid schizophrenic patients at the Ypsilanti State Hospital in Michigan, each of whom believed they were Jesus Christ. What transpires is both comic and deeply moving.

Title: My Best Fiend
Description: The love-hate relationship between Werner Herzog and Klaus Kinski, the deep trust between the director and the actor, and their independently and simultaneously hatched plans to murder one another.

Title: Mami Wata
Description: When the harmony in a village is threatened by outside elements, two sisters must fight to save their people and restore the glory of a mermaid goddess to the land.

Title: Sword of the Valiant
Description: The Green Knight challenges King Arthur's knights. But only young Gawain accepts and decapitates him. The knight takes his head and now gives Gawain one year to learn about virtues, knighthood and then face the challenge himself.

Title: That Malicious Age
Description: Gardener Napoleone takes a job in a southern-Italian villa and quickly finds himself embroiled in a menage-a-trois with Paola and her mother, which soon leads to sex, death and mayhem.

Title: Edward II
Description: In this Derek Jarman version of Christopher Marlowe's Elizabethan drama, in modern costumes and settings, Plantagenet king Edward II hands the power-craving nobility the perfect excuse by taking as lover besides his diplomatic wife, the French princess Isabel, not an acceptable lady at court but the ambitious Piers Gaveston, who uses his favor in bed even to wield political influence - the stage is set for a palace revolt which sends the gay pair from the throne to a terminal torture dungeon.

Title: The Killer Nun
Description: Legendary Swedish sex bomb Anita Ekberg stars as Sister Gertrude, a cruel nun who discovers depraved pleasure in a frenzy of drug addiction, sexual degradation and sadistic murder.

Title: Craving
Description: A group of drug addicts are besieged by a group of mysterious figures inside a rural bar. As withdrawal starts to set in, a secret one of them is carrying threatens to destroy them all.

Title: Ninja Cheerleaders
Description: Three college cheerleaders (and after-school go-go dancers) use their martial arts skills to save their Sensei from mafia kidnappers, but must keep their extracurricular activities a secret to realize their Ivy League dreams at Brown.

Title: November
Description: In a poor Estonian village, a group of peasants use magic and folk remedies to survive the winter, and a young woman tries to get a young man to love her.

Title: La civil
Description: Story of Cielo, a mother whose teenage daughter is kidnapped in Northern Mexico. When the authorities offer no support in the search, Cielo takes matters into her own hands and transforms from housewife into a vengeful militant.

Title: Leaves of Grass
Description: An Ivy League professor is lured back to his Oklahoma hometown, where his twin brother, a small-time pot grower, has concocted a scheme to take down a local drug lord.

Title: Revenge of the Cheerleaders
Description: Aloha High cheerleaders, who wield considerable power in their ineptly run school, struggle against real estate developers aiming to merge their school with a rival one in order to turn the location into a shopping mall.

Title: Crush Kong Curly
Description: When a curly camgirl Elle meets an architect, Peter, she believes she's ready to love again. How long can she keep her secret job to him?

Title: Faces of Death
Description: A woman, employed as a website content moderator, comes across a series of violent videos reproducing death scenes from a film.

Title: The Dance of Reality
Description: In a little Chilean town, the son of an uprooted couple formed by a rigorous communist father and a loving but weak mother tries to pave his own path in a society that does not understand their Jewish-Ukrainian origins.

Title: Out of the Blue
Description: A young girl whose father is an ex-convict and whose mother is a junkie finds it difficult to conform and tries to find comfort in a quirky combination of Elvis and the punk scene.

Title: The Photograph
Description: A series of intertwining love stories set in the past and in the present.

Title: Sex Doll
Description: Set in London's world of high class call girls, Amoureux Solitaires tells the story of London based French escort Virgiinie, and Rupert, a man who rescues trafficked girls - A tale of modern love.

Title: Deep Water
Description: A group of international passengers en route from Los Angeles to Shanghai are forced to make an emergency landing in shark-infested waters. Now they must work together in hopes to overcome the frenzy of sharks drawn to the wreckage.

Title: Aimee & Jaguar
Description: In 1943 Berlin, a Nazi officer's wife meets and starts a passionate affair with a Jewish woman.

Title: Airlift
Description: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

Title: Body Melt
Description: Residents of peaceful Pebbles Court, Homesville, are being used unknowingly as test experiments for a new 'Body Drug' that causes rapid body decomposition (melting skin etc.) and painful death.

Title: The Happy Hooker Goes to Washington
Description: The world's most famous madame Xaviera Hollander, now a magazine magnate, is called to Washington to testify before Congress in an indecency trial because she's being held up as a prime example of American moral decay.

Title: Walt Before Mickey
Description: Based on the book "Walt Before Mickey" covers the early years of Walt Disney's career.

Title: King David
Description: The Biblical story of Israel's greatest King.

Title: Ernest Goes to Jail
Description: Ernest P. Worrell is a bank janitor sent to jail when people mistake his identity for a look-alike.

Title: Spring Breakdown
Description: Three women vacation together at a popular travel destination for college co-eds on spring break.

Title: Purge
Description: A tormented young woman is given a hiding place by an elderly lady and soon they are reminded of their mutual horrendous past.

Title: A Mighty Heart
Description: Mariane Pearl embarks on a frantic search to locate her journalist husband Daniel when he goes missing in Pakistan.

Title: Invasion Planet Earth
Description: After the death of his young daughter, Thomas Dunn is a man who has lost his faith. On the day he finds out his wife is pregnant again, aliens invade the Earth.

Title: Link
Description: When a female zoology student is invited to a remote seaside mansion to assist a primatology professor with his experiments involving chimpanzees, dangerous events start to occur, all involving the intelligent 45-year-old chimp, Link.

Title: The Man with the Golden Arm
Description: A junkie must face his true self to kick his drug addiction.

Title: Salute
Description: S.I Aravind Karunakaran, a police officer on voluntary leave, is haunted by an old case he investigated. How far will he go to unravel the mystery and bring the truth to light?

Title: Ana
Description: Ana meets Rafa in a chance encounter and they embark on a road trip to try and save him from bankruptcy, or worse.

Title: Benny Loves You
Description: Jack, a man desperate to improve his life throws away his beloved childhood plush, Benny. It's a move that has disastrous consequences when Benny springs to life with deadly intentions.

Title: See You Yesterday
Description: Two Brooklyn teenage prodigies, C.J. Walker and Sebastian Thomas, build makeshift time machines to save C.J.'s brother, Calvin, from being wrongfully killed by a police officer.

Title: Among the Shadows
Description: A private investigator must unravel the murder of her uncle while keeping the secret that she is a descendant from a line of werewolves.

Title: Black Water
Description: A deep-cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

Title: Devil Fish
Description: A marine biologist, a dolphin trainer, a research scientist, and a local sheriff try to hunt down a large sea monster, a shark/octopus hybrid, that is devouring swimmers and fishermen off a south Florida coast.

Title: Tentacles
Description: A mutated giant octopus wreaks havoc on a California seaside community.

Title: This Is the Night
Description: A teenager living in Staten Island during the summer of 1982 embarks on a quest that draws in his family members.

Title: Wine Club
Description: A couple elopes to wine country and stumble upon a vineyard where they hope to get some nice wedding photos. But they quickly realize that there's something very different about the vineyard's wine club.

Title: Violence in a Women's Prison
Description: Photojournalist Emanuelle goes undercover into a woman's prison, where she discovers and experiences the abuse, torture and humiliation the inmates are subjected to.

Title: Monstrous Beauty
Description: Barbara is Born with a rare condition she is entirely covered in hair. She is offered a place in the luxurious court of King Charles II. Barbara aspires to become a playwright under the famous actress Nell powerful mistress to the King.

Title: Totally F***ed Up
Description: Six queer teenagers struggle to get along with each other and with life in the face of varying obstacles.

Title: To the Stars
Description: Under small town scrutiny, a withdrawn farmer's daughter forges an intimate friendship with a worldly but reckless new girl in 1960s Oklahoma.

Title: Better Man
Description: The life and experiences of singer Robbie Williams.

Title: Those People
Description: On Manhattan's gilded Upper East Side, a young gay painter is torn between an obsession with his infamous socialite best friend and a promising new romance with an older foreign concert pianist.

Title: Manifesto
Description: Cate Blanchett performs manifestos as a series of striking monologues.

Title: Boss Nigger
Description: Two black bounty hunters, pursuing an outlaw, take over a small Western town without a sheriff.

Title: Terminator II
Description: In a polluted future Venice researchers work to improve the situation. One day, unknown forces start killing them. A team of soldiers and a couple of civilians is sent to investigate. Soon, they encounter strange murderous creatures.

Title: The Man Who Saved Paris
Description: The most successful brothel owner in Paris during the 1940s is asked by the government to restore the city's image (City of Love, Romance, Light) after the Nazi Occupation and falls in love when he least expects it.

Title: David Byrne's American Utopia
Description: Spike Lee documents the former Talking Heads frontman's brilliant, timely 2019 Broadway show, based on his recent album and tour of the same name.

Title: Do or Die
Description: Hunted down by six teams of assassins hired by a Japanese crime lord, Federal agents Donna and Nicole struggle to survive, with help from their agency friends.

Title: Arthur, malédiction
Description: Alex has been a fan of the Arthur and the Minimoys saga for years. When his friends offer him to go to the abandoned house where the film was shot, he accepts, unaware that they are about to fall into a plot.

Title: Boom
Description: Three female models are unwittingly thrown into the Bombay underworld when they accidentally stop a diamond delivery to the Middle East.

Title: Cromwell
Description: Puritan statesman Oliver Cromwell leads England in a civil war against the absolutist and Catholic-sympathetic King Charles I.

Title: The Girl from Rio
Description: Having established Femina, a secret city populated entirely by beautiful women, Sumuru plots to wage a war against all men.

Title: Saints and Soldiers
Description: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.

Title: Blood Feast
Description: An Egyptian caterer kills various women in suburban Miami to use their body parts to revive a dormant Egyptian goddess while an inept police detective tries to track him down.

Title: The Making Of
Description: Long-married filmmakers have cast overemotional actors to portray their younger selves in the story of their great love. Unfortunately, by the time shooting begins, their fabled marriage is unraveling.

Title: Pudhu Pettai
Description: After running away from his home, Kumar falls in with a gang and slowly rises through the ranks of the criminal underworld.

Title: Breathe
Description: Charlie is an average French suburban teenager, but when she becomes fast friends with Sarah, the rebellious new girl at school, she discovers there's nothing average about how she feels.

Title: The Yearling
Description: A boy persuades his parents to allow him to adopt a young deer, but what will happen if the deer misbehaves?

Title: F for Fake
Description: A documentary about fraud and fakery.

Title: Quarantine 2: Terminal
Description: A plane is taken over by a mysterious virus. When the plane lands it is placed under quarantine. Now a group of survivors must band together to survive the quarantine.

Title: The Bikini Carwash Company
Description: Women go topless at a carwash company in order to increase business.

Title: Adolf Hitler: The Greatest Story Never Told
Description: Adolf Hitler, born in Braunau, a man who will forever change the history of the world.

Title: The Wild Thornberrys
Description: After losing a cheetah cub to ruthless poachers, Eliza must redeem her folly and go on a quest to save him.

Title: Buffalo Bill and the Indians, or Sitting Bull's History Lesson
Description: A cynical Buffalo Bill hires Sitting Bull to exploit him and add his credibility to the distorted view of history presented in his Wild West Show.

Title: Kill Zone 2
Description: While undercover officer Kit is taken prisoner by the syndicate, he befriends his keeper and discovers an organ trafficking ring.

Title: Slipstream
Description: In the near future, where Earth has been devastated by man's pollution and giant winds rule the planet, bounty hunter Matt kidnaps a murderer out of the hands of two police officers, planning to get the bounty himself.

Title: G.B.F.
Description: What happens after Tanner is outed by his classmates and becomes the title "gay best friend" for three high school queen bees?

Title: Lock Up Your Daughters!
Description: A trio of randy sailors go looking for girl-friends in 18th-century London.

Title: Right at Your Door
Description: A dirty bomb goes off in Los Angeles, jamming freeways and spreading a toxic cloud.

Title: Alley Cat
Description: A martial artist stops a street gang from stealing her car, but her grandmother ends up being killed by the same gang. She witnesses firsthand how corrupt and inept law enforcement is, and decides to take matters into her own hands.

Title: Madras Cafe
Description: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.

Title: Death of Me
Description: A vacationing couple must discover the mystery behind a strange video that shows one of them killing the other.

Title: Elvira Madigan
Description: The Danish tightrope dancer Elvira Madigan meets Lieutenant Sixten Sparre, a Swedish officer who is married and has two children. They both decide to run away.

Title: Purple Violets
Description: Patti Petalson (Blair) struggles with the pressure of becoming the next important American writer.

Title: Uncorked
Description: Elijah must balance his dream of becoming a master sommelier with his father's expectations that he carry on the family's Memphis BBQ joint.

Title: Borrego
Description: Borrego follows a young botanist who relocates to a small desert town to study an invasive plant species. She must fight for her survival when she's kidnapped by an inexperienced drug mule after his ultralight plane crashes in the desert.

Title: Bare
Description: A young girl in Nevada becomes romantically involved with a female drifter who introduces her to a life of stripping, drugs, and metaphysical experiences that teach her what happens when real life catches up with dark fantasy.

Title: The Brother from Another Planet
Description: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

Title: Anne+
Description: A twenty-something lesbian university graduate in Amsterdam prepares to leave for Montreal, meanwhile navigating her social life and writing carreer.

Title: The Deer King
Description: The last survivor of a band of warriors is enslaved in a salt mine. One night, savage dogs attack and a mysterious disease wipes out everyone at the mine. The warrior escapes with a little girl, while a gifted physician looks for a cure.

Title: The Alien Factor
Description: A science ship with three dangerous specimens collected from around the universe crash lands on Earth. A mysterious stranger named "Ben Zachary" shows up claiming to be able to save the day. Can he do what he claims?

Title: Gassed Up
Description: Ash, who is trying to earn money to raise his 14-year-old sister and send his mother to rehab, gets caught up with an organized crime ring led by a young and charismatic Albanian immigrant.

Title: Raid
Description: A fearless income tax officer raids the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow after someone mysteriously draws his attention towards the evidence.

Title: Female Agents
Description: London, 1944: SOE's section for French ops parachute 4 women into France, plus a woman there, to free an English geologist and kill SS colonel Heindrich.

Title: The Blade Master
Description: Muscle-bound Ator and his mute East Asian sidekick travel from the ends of the earth to save his aged mentor from the evil, mustachioed Zor.

Title: Little Ashes
Description: About the young life and loves of artist Salvador Dalí, filmmaker Luis Buñuel and writer Federico García Lorca.

Title: The Star Chamber
Description: Frustrated with a legal system gone haywire, a secret society of judges hires hitmen to snuff out criminals who escape courtroom justice - but one young judge questions the ethics of their vigilante system.

Title: Dracula's Daughter
Description: When Countess Marya Zaleska appears in London, mysterious events occur that lead Dr. Von Helsing to believe that the Countess must be a vampire.

Title: Prom
Description: A group of teenagers get ready for their high school prom.

Title: My Best Friend Is a Vampire
Description: After a sexual encounter with a beautiful client, a teenage delivery boy finds himself being turned into a vampire.

Title: Without a Clue
Description: A drunken Sherlock Holmes is really just a cover for the real detective, Dr. Watson.

Title: Uncle Vanya
Description: The Professor retires and moves back into his estate with his young wife, turning the lives of those who have been maintaining it in his absence upside down.

Title: Marui Video
Description: The video evidence of the murder, which is especially brutal and graphic that shouldn't release to the public. A reporter who has access to the prosecutor's office hears about a cursed tape in the video archive and begins reporting on it.

Title: Black & White
Description: A group of white high school teens become involved with Harlem's black hip-hop crowd.

Title: Spanish Fly
Description: On the island of Minorca, Sir Percy de Courcy finds himself once again penniless. Since the disreputable Sir Percy isn't exactly willing to work for a living, this means he must concoct some sort of scam to maintain his lifestyle.

Title: Avenging Angelo
Description: A woman who has just discovered she is the daughter of a murdered Mafia chieftain seeks revenge, with the aide of her father's faithful bodyguard.

Title: The Housemaid
Description: A composer and his wife are thrown into turmoil when a housemaid becomes more than they bargained for.

Title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
Description: A psychologist who begins working with a young boy who has suffered a near-fatal fall finds himself drawn into a mystery that tests the boundaries of fantasy and reality.

Title: Smile
Description: A social comedy about a beauty pageant for young Californian women, held annually in Santa Rosa, and how it affects the locals and participants.

Title: Udaan
Description: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

Title: Two Brothers
Description: Two tigers are separated as cubs and taken into captivity, only to be reunited years later as enemies by an explorer who inadvertently forces them to fight each other.

Title: Born
Description: A 21 year old virgin wakes up pregnant with a demonic fetus that possesses her and commands her to go on a murderous rampage.

Title: Cyrus
Description: John and Molly, a divorced middle aged man and a single mother meet at a friends party and start up a small relationship, all John has to do now is meet Molly's son... Cyrus

Title: A Change of Seasons
Description: Marriage takes a sour turn when a middle-aged husband falls for a young and sexy woman. Things get even more complicated when his wife starts a hot affair with a young lover of her own.

Title: Beyond the Trek
Description: A deep space mining vessel has been adrift for two years. It is suspected the crew brutally killed each other, but the reason for the bloodbath is unknown. A rescue crew is sent to find if there are any survivors, what happened and why.

Title: Twisters
Description: Twenty years ago, scientists achieved the impossible. They collected a full data set from the inside of a monster F5 tornado. Through the application of this data, they were able to create Antheia, an advanced early warning system.

Title: The Queen of Spain
Description: Nearly twenty years after the events of "The Girl of Your Dreams", in the 1950s, Macarena Granada, who has become a Hollywood star, returns to Spain to film a blockbuster about Queen Isabella I of Castile.

Title: Snow White
Description: The ageless tale of a beautiful young princess whose jealous stepmother orders her killed so that she will be 'the fairest in the land.' When the huntsman takes pity on her, he takes her to the house of the seven dwarfs.

Title: The Unbelievable Truth
Description: A man returns to his home town after serving a prison sentence for homicide, and finds that the details of the crime have been forgotten and replaced with local legends and rumors.

Title: The Masters of Time
Description: Piel, a 7 or 8 year old boy, is alone on the desert planet Perdide, only survivor of an attack by giant hornets. Calling for help, Piel's father's friend Jaffar keeps contact with the kid and hurries across space toward Perdide.

Title: Blue Jeans
Description: A young free-spirited drifter falls in love for an older man, who might be her long-lost father.

Title: Private Valentine: Blonde & Dangerous
Description: When fluffy, bubble gum movie star Megan Valentine suddenly finds herself broke and humiliated in the public eye, she wanders from the wreckage of a car accident and witlessly enlists in the U.S. Army hoping in vain that it will change her life.

Title: Triage
Description: The wife of a photojournalist sets out to discover why he came home from a recent assignment without his colleague.

Title: Coffee & Kareem
Description: Twelve-year-old Kareem Manning hires a criminal to scare his mom's new boyfriend -police officer James Coffee - but it backfires, forcing Coffee and Kareem to team up in order to save themselves from Detroit's most ruthless drug kingpin.

Title: Paris When It Sizzles
Description: The sprightly young assistant of a Hollywood screenwriter helps him over his writer's block by acting out his fantasies of possible plots.

Title: Snake Hotel
Description: A group of inmates make a gamble to shorten their prison sentences by taking part in a game of cat and mouse with a giant mutated snake.

Title: Bless Me Father
Description: A man confesses his sins and unveils the ugly truth of his life; he is a hit-man for the New York Italian Mob. Will Vinny follow in his father's footsteps in the organized crime family or sacrifice his life to save his soul?

Title: Immortal
Description: In the distant future, Earth is occupied by ancient gods and genetically altered humans. When a god is sentenced to death he seeks a new human host and a woman to bear his child.

Title: Malicious
Description: After a brief encounter with a beautiful stranger, a college athlete gets more than he bargained for when she becomes obsessed, stopping at nothing to destroy his life.

Title: The Audition
Description: Anna Bronsky is a violin teacher at the Conservatoire. Against the advice of her colleagues, she imposes the admission of a pupil, in whom she sees a great talent. With a lot of involvement, she prepares Alexander for the end-of-year exam and neglects her young son Jonas, who is also a violinist and ice hockey fan. She moves away more and more from her husband, so fond of him, the French "luthier" Philippe Bronsky. At the approach of audition, Anna pushes Alexander towards performances more and more exceptional. The decisive day, an accident occurs, heavy consequence.

Title: Strangler vs. Strangler
Description: A mentally-disturbed flower seller starts killing young girls on the streets of Belgrade. While the frustrated police inspector is trying to stop him, an aspiring musician finds his life and work deeply intertwined with that of a killer.

Title: Medicine for Melancholy
Description: Twenty-four hours in the tentative relationship of two young San Franciscans also dealing with the conundrum of being a minority in a rapidly gentrifying city.

Title: Legal Action
Description: A woman asks her big shot lawyer ex-husband to defend her career criminal brother, accused of killing a DA. He'll need more than his legal skills to stay alive and win the case.

Title: Ferpect Crime
Description: An ambitious salesman will do anything for that big promotion he's been chasing, but inevitably, he will learn that there is no such thing as the perfect crime.

Title: Vera
Description: A young lawyer arrives on a island in Spain with a weight on his conscience that is about to drive him to suicide. The encounter with a young teenager discovering sexuality will first reveal her vulnerabilities and finally her cynicism.

Title: Enthusiastic Sinners
Description: "Enthusiastic Sinners" is the saga of a married cop, a small town widow and their 24 hour lust story that turns into a love story.

Title: Tunes of Glory
Description: After World War II, a Highland Regiment's acting Commanding Officer, who rose from the ranks, is replaced by a peace-time Oxford-educated Commanding Officer, leading to a dramatic conflict between the two.

Title: The Fortune
Description: Two bumbling hustlers in the 1920s attempt to gain the fortune of an heiress. Nothing will stop them, not even murder.

Title: Let the Sunshine In
Description: Isabelle, Parisian artist, divorced mother, is looking for love, true love at last.

Title: All Summers End
Description: After a summer prank goes awry, a teenage boy falls in love while grappling with his guilty conscience.

Title: Locked In
Description: A single mother must protect her daughter and herself during a heist gone wrong at a high-tech storage facility.

Title: My Uncle
