Description: Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.

Title: Leningrad Cowboys Go America
Description: Siberian rock band Leningrad Cowboys go to the USA in pursuit of fame.

Title: Sugar Daddy
Description: Darren, a young talented musician, dreams of making music like nobody has before. But she's broke. Desperate for cash, she signs up to a paid-dating website, throwing herself down a dark path that shapes her music with it.

Title: Dickshark
Description: A romantic couple get more than they expected after the husband's experiments with penis-enlargement cream go awry.

Title: Hero at Large
Description: A struggling actor buying milk stops a robbery while wearing a superhero uniform, promoting a movie. The unknown hero decides to try again. Can he impress his cute neighbor?

Title: The Atticus Institute
Description: When the US government attempts to weaponize the power of a possessed woman, they soon discover that there are forces that exist in this world that simply cannot be controlled.

Title: The Farm
Description: America's most prolific female serial killer's calculated lifestyle derails, resulting in a series of horrific discoveries that remain a mystery to this day. Based on a true story.

Title: Mandibles
Description: When simple-minded friends Jean-Gab and Manu find a giant fly trapped in the boot of a car, they decide to train it in the hope of making a ton of cash.

Title: In a Glass Cage
Description: A former Nazi child-killer is confined in an iron lung inside an old mansion after a suicide attempt. His wife hires him a full-time carer, a mysterious young man who is driven slowly mad by the old man's disturbing past.

Title: City Limits
Description: A pair of teenage motorcycle gangs maintain an uneasy truce between each other in the not-too-distant future. When an evil corporation tries to take over their ruined city, the gangs must decide whether to fight their common enemy.

Title: I, Object
Description: Grieving the loss of his father and unable to relate to the people in his life, 10-year-old Tom takes refuge in the everyday objects around him; they reveal their true identities and speak to Tom, helping him in his healing process.

Title: Centurion: The Dancing Stallion
Description: Ellissia, a college student takes part in a Mexican horse riding competition to temporarily escape her problems. Soon she discovered that her health conditions are to hinder her from pursuing her passion.

Title: Moonlight Mile
Description: As he copes with the death of his fiancée, a young man befriends her parents and must figure out what he wants out of life.

Title: Head Count
Description: A group of college students on a weekend getaway accidentally summon a supernatural entity intent on using them for its deadly ritual.

Title: Sunburn
Description: A group of Irish college students land summer jobs on Long Island, New York. Working hard in the day and playing even harder at night, they relish the opportunity to enjoy adult life far from the eyes of their families.

Title: Sur les chemins noirs
Description: Pierre is a famous writer and explorer. But one drunken night, a terrible fall leaves him in a coma. When he wakes up, barely standing up and against everyone's advice, he decides to explore France on foot, along the smallest paths.

Title: Ryuichi Sakamoto | Opus
Description: Ryuichi Sakamoto's last performance, a concert film featuring just him and his piano playing for the last time before passing away.

Title: Wild Horses
Description: A detective opens up a fifteen-year-old missing persons case, and begins to suspect that the missing boy was murdered, and that a local rancher was involved.

Title: Deal of the Century
Description: A small-time arms dealer in South America to sell weapons to the revolutionaries winds up negotiating the sale of an experimental plane to the nation's dictator.

Title: Theresa & Allison
Description: After a one night stand turns disastrous, Theresa finds herself drawn into a world of inhuman savagery, all the while tempted by the beautiful and immortal Allison.

Title: Save the Tiger
Description: A disillusioned war veteran has two days to let go of his shaken morals if he wants his small fashion company to survive.

Title: Loose Cannons
Description: An unconventional cop who doesn't take any bull, is paired up with an amazing detective to capture some powerful criminals but the cop soon realizes that his by the book partner has split personality disorder.

Title: Collective
Description: Director Alexander Nanau follows a crack team of investigators at the Romanian newspaper Gazeta Sporturilor as they try to uncover a vast health-care fraud that enriched moguls and politicians and led to the deaths of innocent citizens.

Title: Le rempart des Béguines
Description: The young Helene searching for love because of missing her dead mother is falling in love with her fathers bisexual girlfriend Tamara who has a strong personality and knows exactly how to manipulate the people under her influence. Tamara involves Helene in a lesbian relationship but still follows her aim to marry Helene's father, a rich citizen in a little French town.

Title: Dillinger
Description: John Dillinger and his gang go on a bank robbing spree across the midwest, but one G-Man is determined to bring him down.

Title: Billu
Description: In an Indian village, a struggling barber sees his luck begin to turn when residents learn that a famous actor he once knew is coming to town.

Title: Restoration
Description: The exiled royal doctor to King Charles II devotes himself to helping Londoners suffering from the plague, and in the process falls in love with an equally poor woman.

Title: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
Description: In 1964, six teenagers from New Jersey run off to see The Beatles perform on The Ed Sullivan Show (1948) in the hope of meeting their idols. However, they don't have tickets. Along the way, they learn new things about friendship and growing up.

Title: The Uninvited
Description: A stranger crashes a party, sparking a comedy of errors, and a reordering of life.

Title: Sam
Description: An alpha New York City male is magically transformed into a beautiful girl, falls in love, and learns what it means to be a woman.

Title: Blankman
Description: A simpleton inventor becomes a superhero with a bulletproof costume and a low budget.

Title: 4 for Texas
Description: Zack Thomas is a tough guy who hooks up with Joe Jarrett to open a casino.

Title: Two Girls and a Guy
Description: Two girls wait outside a young actor's door and find out he's had them both as "only" girlfriend the last ten months. They wait inside after breaking in. When Blake comes home he just can't stop lying but they stay.

Title: Zappa
Description: In the early '60s, 3 Danish classmates join a "den"/tree house. Steen likes his pet fish Zappa because it eats the weaker fish. Bjørn attracts girls and Mulle is a talkative, strong boy. Steen gets them into burglary and later escalates.

Title: 2025 Armageddon
Description: A militant alien race launches an attack on Earth using gigantic creatures and geological disasters all based on those found on The Asylum's Movie Channel signal which reached their planet.

Title: Benjamin
Description: In Simon Amstell's affecting, bittersweet comedy, a rising young filmmaker is thrown into emotional turmoil by a burgeoning romance and the upcoming premiere of his second feature.

Title: The Prince and the Showgirl
Description: An American showgirl becomes entangled in political intrigue when the Prince Regent of a foreign country attempts to seduce her.

Title: James White
Description: James, a twenty-something New Yorker, struggles to take control of his self-destructive behavior in the face of momentous family challenges.

Title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
Description: A fast paced, womanizing nightclub promoter gets paid back in full when he scorns a beautiful woman with psychotic tendencies who will punish him for breaking her heart.

Title: Tailor
Description: The bank threatens Nikos to repossess his tailor shop and his father fall ill. Nikos with a tailor shop on wheels, reinvents himself while bringing style and confidence to the women of Athens.

Title: Love Today
Description: Two young lovers, who are made to exchange their phones for a day and what happens due to that.

Title: The Last Witness
Description: An ambitious young journalist uncovers the horrific slaughter of twenty-two thousand Polish officers during World War II. A secret that has been kept hidden for far too many years.

Title: Bad Haircut
Description: When a college kid goes to a new place to get a haircut, he discovers that his barber is a psychopath.

Title: The King Tide
Description: After the mayor of an idyllic island village discovers a child with mysterious powers awash on their shores, the once peaceful community devolves into civil war, torn over the belief that the child is the next saviour.

Title: Palma
Description: The film is inspired by an incredible story of a shepherd dog named Palm who was inadvertently left in the airport by her owner. She befriends nine-year old Nicholas whose mother dies leaving him with a father he barely knows - a pilot who finds the dog at the airport. It's a story of amazing adventures, true friendship and unconditional love.

Title: Asterix and the Vikings
Description: While tutoring Vitalstatistix's rebellious nephew Justforkix, Asterix and Obelix must rescue him from Vikings who wish to learn the meaning of fear to become invincible.

Title: The Sunchaser
Description: Michael Reynolds is a rich oncologist who has a $175,000 sports car, a multi-million-dollar house, and a new boost in his career. Brandon "Blue" Monroe" is a dying patient who kidnaps Reynolds and takes him to a legendary Navajo healing place while a manhunt closes in. As the men get closer to the place that might save them both, they come closer to understanding each other.

Title: Young Einstein
Description: Albert Einstein turns the science community upside down with his discoveries including a formula to put bubbles back in beer and rock n' roll.

Title: 20 Feet from Stardom
Description: Backup singers live in a world that lies just beyond the spotlight. Their voices bring harmony to the biggest bands in popular music, but we've had no idea who these singers are or what lives they lead, until now.

Title: Dancing at Lughnasa
Description: Five unmarried sisters make the most of their simple existence in rural Ireland in the 1930s.

Title: The Princess and the Goblin
Description: A naive princess, her beloved cat and a poor mining boy team up to save their kingdom from a nasty underground realm of bad-mannered goblins.

Title: Winter Light
Description: A small-town priest struggles with his faith.

Title: Sorceress
Description: Jealous witch Erica uses her powers to influence her unwitting husband Larry and his colleagues, who all work for a big law firm.

Title: Kikujiro
Description: A young, naive boy sets out alone on the road to find his wayward mother. Soon he finds an unlikely protector in a crotchety man and the two have a series of unexpected adventures along the way.

Title: Tangled
Description: Katherine refuses to fall for playboy Drew Evan's tactical skills to seduce her, making him desire her more.

Title: The Fog of War
Description: The story of America as seen through the eyes of the former Secretary of Defense under President John F. Kennedy and President Lyndon B. Johnson, Robert McNamara.

Title: Typist Artist Pirate King
Description: The growing friendship between two women as they hit the road in an electric car looking for endings and reconciliation.

Title: I'll Do Anything
Description: An aspiring actor's life gets upended when his ex-wife dumps their bossy, wild little daughter into his custody.

Title: Avenue of the Giants
Description: A 74-year-old man carrying a traumatic secret befriends an isolated teenager in an emotional story of multigenerational healing.

Title: College Road Trip
Description: When an overachieving high school student decides to travel around the country to choose the perfect college, her overprotective cop father decides to accompany her to keep her on the straight and narrow.

Title: Muscle Shoals
Description: A documentary that celebrates Rick Hall, the founder of FAME Studios in Muscle Shoals, Alabama, and the signature sound he developed in songs such as "I'll Take You There", "Brown Sugar", and "When a Man Loves a Woman".

Title: De Dana Dan
Description: Two down on their luck men tries to kidnap a wealthy businesswoman's dog to demand a hefty ransom from her. Things goes haywire when the dog goes missing.

Title: The Brides of Dracula
Description: Vampire hunter Dr. Van Helsing returns to Transylvania to destroy handsome bloodsucker Baron Meinster, who has designs on a beautiful young schoolteacher.

Title: Free LSD
Description: Sometimes putting the band together is a matter of life and death.

Title: Band Baaja Baaraat
Description: Shruti and Bittoo become partners in their very own "Wedding planning ka bijness" in Delhi and in the process discover friendship, love and one another.

Title: Bright Night
Description: Two couples visit a home from their past, and sexual tension brings out the worst in each other. Long-buried grudges resurface.

Title: American Nightmare: Becoming Cody Rhodes
Description: Documentary following the career of professional wrestler Cody Rhodes, from leaving the WWE to his eventual return to WrestleMania and his journey chasing the WWE championship - a feat his father, Dusty, never accomplished.

Title: Killer Rack
Description: Comedy about a woman suffering from low self esteem who gets breast enhancement surgery, unaware that her surgeon worships H.P. Lovecraft's elder gods, and the surgery is part of a diabolical plot to rule the world.

Title: Mary Reilly
Description: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.

Title: Hamlet
Description: Modern-day New York City adaptation of Shakespeare's immortal story about Hamlet's plight to avenge his father's murder.

Title: Extra Terrestrial Visitors
Description: A young boy in the woods discovers a lovable alien...or is it?

Title: Mad About Men
Description: Flirtatious mermaid Miranda (Glynis Johns) swaps places with a schoolteacher who has gone on vacation. All is well until she falls in love with a human.

Title: Love Tactics
Description: An ad executive and a fashion designer-blogger don't believe in love, so they place a bet to make the other fall head over heels - with unusual tactics.

Title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
Description: One of puppet-maker Geppetto's creations comes magically to life. This puppet named Pinocchio has one major desire, to become a real boy someday, but he has to learn to act responsibly.

Title: Naked Souls
Description: An artist tries to rescue her scientist boyfriend, who has switched bodies with an evil, elderly genius.

Title: The Goat and Her Three Kids
Description: Secluded from the world, a single mother of three must defend what's left of her family from a cold-blooded killer, at all costs.

Title: Three Blind Mice
Description: Abi is going cold turkey, her family have taken her to a cabin in the woods so she is away from the city. However, little do they know, The Three Blind Mice is more than just a fairy tale.. And they may be next up on the menu.

Title: The Survivalist
Description: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

Title: Food, Inc.
Description: An unflattering look inside America's corporate controlled food industry.

Title: Semper Fi
Description: A police officer who serves in the Marine Corps Reserves is faced with an ethical dilemma when it comes to helping his brother in prison.

Title: Lisa
Description: A flirtatious teenager with an eye for older men gets more than she bargained for when the handsome stranger she's pursuing turns out to be a serial killer.

Title: Together 99
Description: A group of very different individuals who in 1975 lived in a commune called "Together". Now it is 1999, and the collective has turned into the world's smallest. The commune consists of only two people - Göran and Klasse. Feeling a bit lonely, the idea occurs of a reunion with their old friends.

Title: The Burglar
Description: Dan Duryea and his cronies rob a fake spiritualist and then take it on the lam to Atlantic City.

Title: Elvis and Anabelle
Description: Dying after being crowned Miss Texas Rose, Anabelle comes alive just before Elvis embalms her. He does his ailing dad's work. Anabelle later returns to the embalmer's farm to get away from her mom and be happy.

Title: Trial of Midnight Rider: Railroaded in the Deep South
Description: A freight train runs through a film set. A camera assistant is killed and the director held responsible and jailed. But that's far from the whole story which focuses on a corrupt little town in south Georgia, United States.

Title: Lust Life Love
Description: A star-crossed love story set in the world of polyamory and sex parties in New York City.

Title: The Comedian's Guide to Survival
Description: One man's journey around the world to discover the secret of comedy.

Title: Let It Ride
Description: A nosy cab driver gets a hot tip on a race horse and wins big, but he can't seem to stop gambling. Will he go broke or walk home with a pretty penny?

Title: The Fan
Description: The hero-worship that Simone has for a pop singer is built to a crescendo until she passes out when she finally sees him up-close in a crowd of fans. She is later shocked when he lets her know that he does not love her.

Title: Death Carries a Cane
Description: A photographer named Kitty (Susan Scott) accidentally catches a glimpse through a tourist telescope of a woman's savage homicide through the window of a nearby house. She is unable to get a clear view of the killer's face, but she still reports the incident to the police. However, other witnesses who saw the killer flee are soon found brutally murdered. Will Kitty be the next victim?

Title: Born a Champion
Description: Mickey Kelley, one of the first American black belts in Brazilian jiu-jitsu, gets pulled away from everything he loves and into an unsanctioned MMA tournament.

Title: Date with an Angel
Description: An aspiring composer discovers a broken-winged, beautiful angel in his swimming pool. When everyone finds out, he must deal with his jealous fiancé, his future father-in-law, and his friends who have a business plan.

Title: Roma
Description: A fluid, unconnected and sometimes chaotic procession of scenes detailing the various people and events of life in Italy's capital, most of it based on director Federico Fellini's life.

Title: General Commander
Description: GRS operative Jake Alexander and his team of young recruits go after the most dangerous and notorious criminals with the help of a Hong Kong billionaire.

Title: Shell
Description: The story of Shell, a girl who lives with her father Pete in a remote gas station in the Scottish Highlands, in their struggle against the elements and the impossible love they feel during the last winter that she will be in that place.

Title: Use Me
Description: An ambitious documentary filmmaker discovers the darkest parts of himself when he turns his camera on a beautiful woman who humiliates men for money.

Title: Jackpot
Description: Four guys win a jackpot over a million dollars, but when it comes to dividing it up, things get bloody. Based on the 2011 Norwegian film, "Jackpot".

Title: Quo vado?
Description: Checco was born into privilege in a small Italian town with a guaranteed job as a public servant. When a new reformist government vows to cut down on bureaucracy, Checco is forced to accept worsening conditions.

Title: The Lodgers
Description: A family curse confines orphaned twins Rachel and Edwards to their home, in punishment for their ancestors' sins. Bound to the rules of a haunting childhood lullaby, the twins must never let any outsiders inside the house.

Title: Baghead
Description: Four "actors" go to a cabin in the woods for the weekend to write a movie script. They talk about a relationship movie or a paper bag over the head movie. It starts with an anonymous baghead and slowly escalates.

Title: Blood Suckers
Description: A group of friends search for a young English Oxford student who has disappeared whilst researching in Greece. They are shocked to find that, wherever he has been, certain unsolved murders have taken place. Not believing that their friend could be the perpetrator of such acts, they press on with their search, finding him under the spell of a beautiful Vampire, whose blood-sucking methods include the use of sado-masochism. Believing they have killed her, the group return home, unaware that their friend is now a Vampire.

Title: Wild in the Streets
Description: A young man gains significant political influence as the leader of a counterculture rock band with his rallying cry of voting rights for teenagers.

Title: The Hummingbird
Description: The life of male protagonist from the 1970s to the near future and the myriad relationships that have criss-crossed its path along the way.

Title: Dabangg 3
Description: Chulbul Pandey encounters an enemy from his past, and his origin story as the fearless cop unfolds.

Title: I Was a Male War Bride
Description: After marrying an American lieutenant with whom he was assigned to work in post-war Germany, a French captain attempts to find a way to accompany her back to the States under the terms of the War Bride Act.

Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Description: The timeless tale of the seductive gypsy Esmeralda and the tortured hunchback Quasimodo.

Title: Real Love
Description: It follows Kendra as she goes to an HBCU in North Carolina. Kendra is determined to focus on school while balancing work study and keeping things professional with her photo class partner.

Title: Replace
Description: Kira's skin starts to age rapidly, dry out and crumble away. But then she discovers that she can replace her own skin with somebody else's.

Title: Me and Orson Welles
Description: In 1937, a teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar", directed by a young Orson Welles.

Title: Fist of Legend
Description: In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.

Title: Wrong Move
Description: A writer goes on a road trip across West Germany with a group of eclectic people he meets along the way.

Title: Prince Valiant
Description: A young Viking prince strives to become a knight in King Arthur's Court and restore his exiled father to his rightful throne.

Title: The Initiated
Description: Inspired by acclaimed Colombian author Mario Mendoza's literary universe comes this edge-of-your-seat suspense thriller. In a near future plagued by water shortages Frank Molina a gruff journalist must face his demons to get to the murder.

Title: Book of Fire
Description: A 19-year-old girl discovers she is the descendant of the Byzantine Emperor Justinian, and she learns that the emperor might have unleashed the plague on mankind and cursed his bloodline.

Title: Nine Lives
Description: Captives of the very relationships that define and sustain them, nine women resiliently meet the travails and disappointments of life.

Title: InAPPropriate Comedy
Description: In this comedy film, a computer tablet full of the world's most hilariously offensive apps breaks through the borders of political correctness, stirring up cultural anarchy.

Title: Times Square
Description: Two ill-matched teenage girls form a punk band and soon have New York City by its ears.

Title: The Bouncer
Description: A nightclub bouncer in his fifties who's taken punches, literally and figuratively, struggles to raise his 8-year-old daughter.

Title: It's What's Inside
Description: Cyrus convinces Shelby to attend old friend Reuben's pre-wedding party and reunites with college pals. Tension arise when estranged classmate Forbes arrives. Rivalries and old romance flare up as the game goes off rails causing hysteria.

Title: Arctic Dogs
Description: An Arctic fox works in the mailroom of a package delivery service, but wants to be doing the deliveries.

Title: The Wonderful Country
Description: A honorable drifter constantly on the run finds his enemies closing in around him.

Title: Pusher III
Description: Milo tries to be a family man and run his criminal organization, but a wrong drug shipment endangers everything.

Title: A Guilty Conscience
Description: After his negligence causes an innocent woman to go to jail, a lawyer and his colleagues work to clear her name.

Title: For a Good Time, Call...
Description: Former college frenemies Lauren and Katie move into a fabulous Gramercy Park apartment, and in order to make ends meet, the unlikely pair start a phone sex line together.

Title: The Further Adventures of Tennessee Buck
Description: A drunken, down-on-his-luck adventurer is hired by a wealthy man and his beautiful wife to take them on a hunting expedition in the jungle. After a while, though, the guide begins to suspect that there's more to the expedition than just hunting.

Title: My Old Lady
Description: An American inherits an apartment in Paris that comes with an unexpected resident.

Title: Don't Make Waves
Description: Carlo goes on a vacation to Southern California, where he quickly becomes immersed in the easygoing local culture and becomes entangled in two beach-side romances.

Title: Death Note: The Last Name
Description: Picking up where the first one leaves off, Light joins the task force searching for Kira in an effort to avert suspicion from himself---and get rid of L.

Title: The River Murders
Description: While investigating a series of murders, a homicide detective becomes the prime suspect when the FBI uncovers his close personal ties to all the victims.

Title: Dr. Crippen
Description: The real-life story of Dr. Hawley Harvey Crippen, who was hanged in London in 1910 for poisoning his wife so he could be with his young lover. But was he truly guilty of murder?

Title: Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
Description: Madea, Bam, and Hattie venture to a haunted campground and the group must run for their lives when monsters, goblins, and the boogeyman are unleashed.

Title: Wisdom
Description: Unable to find work after a past felony, graduate John Wisdom and his girlfriend embark on a cross-country bank-robbing spree in order to aid American farmers.

Title: My Hero Academia: Two Heroes
Description: All Might and Deku accept an invitation to visit I Island where they battle against a villain who takes the island hostage.

Title: Loft
Description: Five best friends, all married, decide to share a loft apartment to carry on affairs.

Title: Dinner Rush
Description: At a popular NYC Italian restaurant on a dramatic, busy evening, there are 2 gangsters, cop detective, food-critic, ex bookmaker owner, his chef son, indebted gambler sous-chef etc.

Title: A Coffee in Berlin
Description: An aimless university dropout attempts to make sense of life as he spends one fateful day wandering the streets of Berlin.

Title: Door in the Woods
Description: Things take a turn for the worst when a small town family finds an abandoned door in the woods. Is this just an abandoned door, or a gateway to something so dark no one sees coming?

Title: Havana
Description: In 1950s Cuba, a professional gambler falls for a woman heavily involved in the revolution movement.

Title: Portraits of Andrea Palmer
Description: Andrea Palmer spends her days working as a cam girl. After having an online breakdown, she receives an unexpected offer to come to Los Angeles and work full time as an erotic model. A decision that can only end in tragedy and violence.

Title: Chess Story
Description: To withstand the psychological torture of the Gestapo, a lawyer imprisoned by the Nazis finds refuge in the world of chess.

Title: Deported Women of the SS Special Section
Description: Young women in Nazi-occupied countries are packed onto a train and shipped off to a prison camp, where the sadistic commandant uses them as rewards for his lesbian guards and perverted and deviant troops.

Title: Our Man Flint
Description: When scientists use eco-terrorism to impose their will on the world by affecting extremes in the weather, Intelligence Chief Cramden calls in top agent Derek Flint.

Title: White God
Description: Thirteen-year-old Lili fights to protect her dog Hagen. She is devastated when her father eventually sets Hagen free on the streets. Still innocently believing love can conquer any difficulty, Lili sets out to find her dog and save him.

Title: The Nude Vampire
Description: A young man falls in love with a beautiful woman being chased by sinister masked figures at night. He tries to track her down, and learns she's being held captive by his father and colleagues who believe she's a vampire.

Title: Oasis
Description: An irresponsible and childish ex-con befriends a girl with cerebral palsy and develops a progressively stronger bond with her.

Title: Unconquered
Description: Intrepid frontiersman Chris Holden foils the political and personal ambitions of renegade Martin Garth in the Ohio Valley following the French and Indian War.

Title: Death House
Description: Two guards fighting through a power breakdown inside the secret 'Death House' prison must fight to survive ruthless inmates and even supernatural horrors.

Title: Lemon Popsicle
Description: Three friends live their lives in 1950s Israel, each looking for someone to love.

Title: Te estoy amando locamente
Description: It follows a mother who is involved in the homosexual movement of the seventies.

Title: The Awakening
Description: An archeologist discovers his daughter is possessed by the spirit of an Egyptian queen. To save mankind he must destroy her.

Title: Wheelman
Description: A getaway driver for a bank robbery realizes he has been double crossed and races to find out who betrayed him.

Title: Maximum Ride
Description: A flock of winged children mount a rescue plan when wolf-boys abduct their youngest member and return her to the militarized institution that created them all.

Title: Benji
Description: A stray dog saves two kidnapped children.

Title: Shark: The Beginning
Description: Cha Woo Sol, a victim of school violence who was imprisoned in a boys' prison due to an unexpected incident, meets mixed martial arts champion Jeong Do Hyeon and breaks his limit one by one in order to seek for revenge and make his bully pay.

Title: The Love Factor
Description: A race of sexy women from Angvia, a planet in another dimension, comes to Earth to kidnap women to repopulate their planet.

Title: The Aristocrats
Description: One hundred superstar comedians tell the same very, VERY dirty, filthy joke--one shared privately by comics since Vaudeville.

Title: They
Description: A psychology student finds all her childhood fears and phobias becoming real after a traumatic event.

Title: Reign of Assassins
Description: Drizzle/Zeng Jing tries to start a new life after she had betrayed her gang and hid the remains of monk.

Title: The Ploughmen
Description: The Ploughmen is a story of the strange friendship between a haunted young deputy sheriff and a notorious old murderer that turns both their worlds upside down.

Title: Krystal
Description: A young man living a sheltered life develops a crush on an ex-stripper and joins her Alcoholics Anonymous group just so he can be in the same room with her.

Title: Peppermint Candy
Description: Following a man's suicide, time traverses back to reveal six chapters of his life on why he committed suicide.

Title: Onoda: 10,000 Nights in the Jungle
Description: When Japan surrenders at the end of World War II, soldier Hiroo Onoda retreats into the jungles of the Philippines to continue the war himself for another 10,000 days.

Title: Outlaws
Description: 1% is set within the primal underworld of outlaw motorcycle club gangs. It follows the heir to the throne of a motorcycle club who has to betray his president to save his brother's life.

Title: Herbie Rides Again
Description: The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.

Title: Zoo
Description: A look at the life of an Enumclaw, Washington man who died as a result of an unusual encounter with a horse.

Title: Nandhi Varman
Description: A thousand years ago, Gora and his cohorts arrived at the Anumanthapuram village, a part of Gingee ruled by the Pallava king Nandivarman, to loot the gold treasure in the temple of Aanumantheeshwarar.

Title: Boar
Description: In the harsh, yet beautiful Australian outback lives a beast, an animal of staggering size, with a ruthless, driving need for blood and destruction. It cares for none, defends its territory with brutal force, and kills with a raw, animalistic savagery unlike any have seen before. Now coming face to face with the giant bloodthirsty killing machine, teens on a hiking trip will have the beast in order to en its reign of terror.

Title: 32 Sounds
Description: Explores the elemental phenomenon of sound and its power to bend time, cross borders, and profoundly shape our perception of the world around us.

Title: Distorted
Description: A couple moves to an isolated, modern, safe apartment building with CCTV after the wife has problems with nightmares. However, something's not quite right with the building.

Title: War, Inc.
Description: A corporation hires a professional assassin to pose as its trade show representative who must organize the wedding of a Middle Eastern pop star, which will allow him the opportunity to kill a Middle Eastern politician.

Title: House Party 2
Description: When Kid's college money is stolen by a crooked music promoter, Play's solution is to stage the 'mutha' of all pajama parties. Starring Kid 'n Play and Martin Lawrence.

Title: Ashkal: The Tunisian Investigation
Description: Follows an investigation when the body of a caretaker is found calcined in the middle of a construction site in the gardens of Carthage, a new district where modern buildings are juxtaposed with abandoned sites and wastelands.

Title: Stolen from Suburbia
Description: A single mother from the suburbs searches for her kidnapped daughter before human traffickers sell her on the international market.

Title: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw
Description: After inadvertently stopping an Indian attack on his stagecoach while traveling in the American West, an English gentleman finds himself appointed sheriff of a nearby town.

Title: Indian Horse
Description: Follows the life of Native Canadian Saul Indian Horse as he survives residential school and life amongst the racism of the 1970s. A talented hockey player, Saul must find his own path as he battles stereotypes and alcoholism.

Title: Sole Survivor
Description: A lone survivor of a plane crash is haunted by a feeling unworthy of survival. Dead people start coming after her to collect her.

Title: Strangers with Candy
Description: A prequel to the critically-acclaimed series featuring Jerri Blank, a 46-year-old ex-junkie ex-con who returns to high school in a bid to restart her life.

Title: The Charge of the Light Brigade
Description: In 1854, during the Crimean War, poor planning leads to the British Light Brigade openly charging a Russian artillery position with tragic consequences.

Title: Sex of the Witch
Description: In a secluded mansion, the Hilton patriarch dies, leaving several nieces and nephews. Soon, one of the heirs is murdered by a strange killer, under the instructions of a mysterious woman who seeks the demise of the Hilton family line.

Title: Digimon Adventure 02: The Beginning
Description: Daisuke, Miyako, Iori, Takeru Takashi, Hikari, and Ken must reconcile new responsibilities with their Digimon partners. But Rui Owada, a mysterious young man, appears claiming to be the first human to partner with a Digimon.

Title: Impractical Jokers: The Movie
Description: The story of a humiliating high school mishap from 1992 that sends the Impractical Jokers on the road competing in hidden-camera challenges for the chance to turn back the clock and redeem three of the four Jokers.

Title: National Theatre Live: Vanya
Description: Andrew Scott brings multiple characters to life in Chekhov's Uncle Vanya, filmed live in West End, London. Hopes, dreams, and regrets are thrust into sharp focus in this one-man adaptation which explores the complexities of human emotions.

Title: 2036 Origin Unknown
Description: After the first manned mission to Mars ends in a deadly crash, mission controller Mackenzie 'Mack' Wilson (Sackhoff) assists an artificial intelligence system, A.R.T.I. Their investigation uncovers a mysterious object under the surface of Mars that could change the future of our planet as we know it.

Title: Stander
Description: The life and career of Andre Stander, a South African police officer turned bank robber.

Title: Hammer of the Gods
Description: A young man transforms into a brutal warrior as he travels the unforgiving landscape in search of his long lost brother, Hakan the Ferocious, whose people are relying on him to restore order to their kingdom.

Title: Hampstead
Description: An American widow finds unexpected love with a man living wild on Hampstead Heath when they take on the developers who want to destroy his home.

Title: The Onion Movie
Description: Satirical interpretations of world events and curious human behavior.

Title: The Domestics
Description: In the weeks following an apocalyptic event, a husband and wife venture across the countryside inhabited by deadly factions in search of safety, and must work together as they are pushed to the breaking point in order to survive.

Title: Body Shots
Description: A tale of the mysterious, but necessary, mating ritual between men and women of today and everything they think about sex but are afraid to say.

Title: Island Zero
Description: A fishing community on a remote Maine island finds itself suddenly cut off from the rest of the world after the ferry stops coming. When people start to vanish, the terrified survivors realize that someone - or something - is hunting them.

Title: The Resurrection of Gavin Stone
Description: A washed-up former child star, forced to do community service at a local megachurch, pretends to be a Christian to land the part of Jesus in their annual Passion Play, only to discover that the most important role of his life is far from Hollywood.

Title: Blame!
Description: In the distant future, humans are declared "illegal residents" and hunted to near extinction by murderous robots. One day, a group of human scavengers come across a strange man named Killy, who may be the key to humanity's survival.

Title: Break Every Chain
Description: A true account of how God forever changed the life of a police officer who was battling alcoholism, depression, and devastating loss.

Title: OSS 117: Lost in Rio
Description: Another mission of world-known French secret agent leads him to exotic Brazil.

Title: Waiting for Bojangles
Description: In front of their little boy, Camille and Georges dance to their favorite song "Mr Bojangles". With them, there is only place for fun and fantasy.

Title: Crash Pad
Description: A hopeless romantic who thinks he's found true love with an older woman learns that she's married and that the fling is merely an instrument of revenge against her neglectful husband.

Title: The Young Lions
Description: The lives of three young men, a German and two Americans, during WWII.

Title: See You Up There
Description: In November 1919, two soldiers--a disfigured but brilliant artist and an ex-accountant--start a memorial con. But in Roaring Twenties France, their adventures soon turn dangerous.

Title: Straight to Hell
Description: A gang of bank robbers with a suitcase full of money go to the desert to hide out. After burying the loot, they find their way to a surreal town full of cowboys who drink an awful lot of coffee. The townspeople are hostile to the outsiders at first, but seem to accept them once they've killed a couple of people. After a while, a mysterious man named Dade arrives, who seems to have unpleasant business to settle with the robbers. A free-for-all shoot-em-up ensues.

Title: City of Life and Death
Description: In 1937, Japan occupied Nanjing, the Chinese capital. There was a battle and subsequent atrocities against the inhabitants, especially those who took refuge in the International Security Zone.

Title: Flesh
Description: A man desperate for money and no income, turns prostitute and interplays with a variety of clients and hustlers.

Title: Constantine: City of Demons - The Movie
Description: A decade after a tragic mistake, Chas Chandler and occult investigator John Constantine set out to cure Chas's daughter, Trish, from a demonically induced coma.

Title: The Illusionist
Description: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

Title: Train
Description: In Europe, a group of American college athletes unknowingly boards a train that will become one deadly ride.

Title: Body Brokers
Description: Brought to Los Angeles for treatment, a recovering junkie soon learns that the rehab center is not about helping people, but a cover for a multi-billion-dollar fraud operation that enlists addicts to recruit other addicts.

Title: Scarlett
Description: A college student must draw upon all the skills her spy-father taught her to protect herself and save her father from weapons dealers.

Title: Hideout
Description: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

Title: The Lady Vanishes
Description: While travelling by rail in interwar Nazi Germany, a young socialite finds that a fellow female passenger has disappeared from the train, but nobody else remembers her having been on board.

Title: Kahaani
Description: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

Title: Offspring
Description: Against the backdrop of grisly murders and child abductions, a clan of cannibalistic savages which plague the North-east Coast since 1858, is after an unsuspecting family and their innocent baby girl. Do they have what it takes to survive?

Title: Fairy Tales
Description: On his twenty-first birthday, the Prince goes on a quest that takes him across the land searching for the one woman that gets him sexually excited, Princess Sleeping Beauty.

Title: The Curse
Description: When a meteorite lands near his family farm during a storm in Tennessee, the son of a struggling farmer believes it's connected to strange plague-like events afflicting the crops, the farm animals and even the family themselves.

Title: Desperate Living
Description: A neurotic society woman murders her husband with her maid's help; on the lam, they escape to Mortville, a homeless community ruled by a fascist queen.

Title: The Seagull
Description: In the early twentieth century, an aging actress and her lover visit the estate of her elderly brother.

Title: Love Streams
Description: Two closely bound, emotionally wounded souls reunite after years apart.

Title: Mister Mayfair
Description: Max Mayfair is living the 'good life'. Having left his past as a gangster in NY, he now runs the most glamorous club in London: Rat pack style. London though is just as dangerous as Manhattan, only this time he has everything to lose.

Title: Battle Royale II
Description: Three years after the failure of the last BR program, a second act is forged and a class of students is sent to an island with one objective: kill international terrorist Shuya Nanahara.

Title: That Sugar Film
Description: Damon Gameau embarks on an experiment to document the effects of a high sugar diet on a healthy body.

Title: Water and Fire
Description: A young girl falls for an enigmatic, shy man, but is forbidden to tell him she is pregnant. His advisers set up a wedding with the daughter of an antagonistic family to end a feud.

Title: Nähtamatu võitlus
Description: A guard on the Soviet-Chinese border who, after surviving a deadly attack, decides to become a monk but must continually prove along the way that he's capable of becoming the enlightened man he set out to be.

Title: Swimming with Sharks
Description: A young, naive Hollywood studio assistant finally turns the tables on his incredibly abusive producer boss.

Title: The Legend of Boggy Creek
Description: A documentary-style drama about the "Fouke Monster", a Bigfoot-type creature that has been sighted in and around Fouke, Arkansas since the 1950s.

Title: Falcon Rising
Description: Chapman is an ex-marine in Brazil's slums, battling the yakuza outfit who attacked his sister and left her for dead.

Title: Hungry Hearts
Description: The relationship of a couple who meet by chance in New York City is put to the test when they encounter a life-or-death circumstance.

Title: Darling Nikki
Description: Nikki is a carefree, fun-loving girl juggling the men in her life in her quest for the ultimate love. She soon falls into a fantasy world where she is no longer able to distinguish her real life with her "secret" one.

Title: Evening
Description: A drama exploring the romantic past and emotional present of Ann Lord (Vanessa Redgrave) and her daughters, Constance Haverford (Natasha Richardson) and Nina Mars (Toni Collette). As Ann lays dying, she remembers, and is moved to convey to her daughters, the defining moments in her life fifty years ago, when she was a young woman. Harris Arden (Patrick Wilson) is the man Ann loves in the 1950s and never forgets.

Title: Metroland
Description: The sudden reappearance of his best friend Toni, after a ten year absence, causes Chris to remember his past, to question some of his lifestyle decisions and to re-evaluate his life and marriage to Marion.

Title: Between Family
Description: Life of a singer, her daughter and her friends change when they meet with a divorced man.

Title: Resident Evil: Damnation
Description: Special Agent Leon S.Kennedy goes against his superior's orders and works to destroy a series of biological weapons being used in a war zone in Europe.

Title: Eroddity(s)
Description: This four story anthology offers a voyeuristic window into the lives of ten gay youths. Follow as they enter a world of the odd, the erotic and the supernatural.

Title: The Accidental Spy
Description: At a Hong Kong shopping center, Buck Yuen's (Jackie Chan's) intuition warns him. He saves a robbery's loot and gets on television, ends up in Istanbul via South Korea, and accidentally becomes a spy. Fortunately, he knows Kung Fu.

Title: Scorched Earth
Description: A bounty hunter named Attica Gage tracks down criminals in a post-apocalyptic Earth.

Title: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
Description: A compilation of found footage featuring music, interviews, and stories of The Beatles' 250 concerts from 1963 to 1966.

Title: Last Film Show
Description: Samay fights heaven and earth to find light. He wants to catch, control, cut and project that light to tell stories. Now to pursue that dream he must leave everything he loves and take a flight to find the light.

Title: Toto the Hero
Description: Thomas believed he was switched at birth with Alfred. Feeling cheated, Thomas spent his life plotting revenge against Alfred, his perceived lifelong adversary who he felt stole the privileged life that should have been his.

Title: No Future
Description: After the tragic overdose of his estranged friend, Will, a recovering addict, returns home, where he is reunited with Claire, his friend's grieving mother, with whom he begins a secret but volatile affair.

Title: Veteran
Description: A honest cop seeks justice for a common man against all odds. A rich boy seeks revenge on the cop.

Title: The Playbirds
Description: Two detectives are drawn into the world of porn, while investigating murders of centrefolds...

Title: Stella. A Life.
Description: Stella, grows up in Berlin during the rule of the Nazi regime. She dreams of a career as a jazz singer, despite all the repressive measures she is forced to go into hiding with her parents in 1944, her life turns into a culpable tragedy.

Title: Far More
Description: Adrian Grenier stars as Sean McAllister, a successful fashion designer who hasn't seen his family in years. He returns to his hometown for a painstaking family reunion that will take him back to his past only to rebuild his future.

Title: Handsome: A Netflix Mystery Movie
Description: Gene Handsome is an LA homicide detective who tries to make sense of his life as he solves crime. Handsome's knack for solving mysteries is matched only by his inability to make sense of his own problems.

Title: Perfume
Description: A week in the lives of a group of models, photographers, agents, reporters, publicists and other characters during a wild modeling show in New York City.

Title: Tekkonkinkreet
Description: Two boys defend Treasure Town and Yakuza try to take over and clear it for new development.

Title: Resort to Love
Description: Erica, who ends up as the entertainment at her ex-fiancé's wedding after reluctantly taking a gig at a luxurious island resort while in the wake of a music career meltdown.

Title: The Glass Bottom Boat
Description: After a series of misunderstandings, the head of an aerospace research laboratory begins to suspect that his new girlfriend is a Russian spy.

Title: Kiss the Ground
Description: A revolutionary group of activists, scientists, farmers, and politicians band together in a global movement of "Regenerative Agriculture" that could balance our climate, replenish our vast water supplies, and feed the world.

Title: The Third Murder
Description: A courtroom drama centered around the murder of a factory president.

Title: The Terrorizers
Description: A metaphysical mystery about the lives of three couples in Taipei that continually intersect over a span of several weeks.

Title: The Windermere Children
Description: This is the stark, moving, and ultimately redemptive story of the bonds these children make with one another, and of how the friendships forged at Windermere become a lifeline to a fruitful future.

Title: The Road Within
Description: A young man with Tourette's Syndrome embarks on a road trip with his recently-deceased mother's ashes.

Title: Hum Tum
Description: A novel look at the eternal battle of the sexes and the trials and tribulations of Karan and Rhea and their attempts to understand each other.

Title: Carry on Sergeant
Description: Sergeant Grimshawe wants to retire in the flush of success by winning the Star Squad prize with his very last platoon of newly called-up National Servicemen. But what a motley bunch they turn out to be.

Title: Pendekar Awang: Darah Indera Gajah
Description: Awang, one of the great disciples of the legendary warrior Mat Kilau.

Title: DC Down
Description: After an earthquake rocks Washington, D.C., the Army Corps races against the clock to rescue the president, who is trapped under the rubble, while a sinister plot aims to capitalize on the disaster.

Title: The Blood of Heroes
Description: In a future where most of mankind and technology is wiped out, six people travel from place to place playing a brutal form of football with a dog skull. They hope one day to play in the league in a city.

Title: The Efficiency Expert
Description: An expert on productivity shows wacky workers in 1966 Australia how to run their moccasin factory like clockwork, despite laying off more than half the workforce.

Title: Blackboard Jungle
Description: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

Title: China Rich Girlfriend
Description: While in Hong Kong on the eve of their wedding, Rachel and Nick face complications when Rachel finally meets her biological father, who happens to be a rich politician and pharmaceutical company owner.

Title: Boulevard
Description: A devoted husband in a marriage of convenience is forced to confront his secret life.

Title: The Visitors II: The Corridors of Time
Description: Knight Godefroy has to return to our time from 1023 to get back the sacred jewels that Jacquouille has taken to the 20th century.

Title: The Taste of Money
Description: The assistant of a wealthy socialite reveals her husband's salacious affair. The fallout entangles him in a web of sex, love and deceit that could threaten his life and career.

Title: The Mousetrap
Description: Takes place in a newly established bed and breakfast, Monkswell Manor, outside London during a blizzard. There has been a murder nearby and the murderer is still free to carry out their further plans. As the guests arrive, everyone fits the murderer's description and has a secret.

Title: Flint Strong
Description: The story of Claressa 'T-Rex' Shields, a boxer from Flint, Michigan who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

Title: Nightmare
Description: Not all nightmares are over when you wake up.

Title: The Substance
Description: Plot under wraps

Title: Guest House Paradiso
Description: Richie and Eddie, a perverted loser and his alcoholic partner-in-crime, run the worst hotel in Britain: the Guest House Paradiso.

Title: The Villagers
Description: Gi Cheol and Yoo Jin work together to find the missing girl, but traces of her are disappearing.

Title: Amusement
Description: Three women are stalked by a killer with a grudge that extends back to the girls' childhoods.

Title: Motorama
Description: A ten year-old boy runs away from his abusive parents, steals a Mustang, and a pursues a promotional card game sold at gas stations.

Title: The Sect
Description: A lonely kindergarten teacher discovers a secret well in the basement of her house, and soon finds herself being followed by a murderous Satanic cult.

Title: Pure Luck
Description: An accountant with super bad luck is sent in search of a missing boss's daughter, also an incredibly unlucky person.

Title: Hadik
Description: Follows the life of Hungarian nobleman András Hadik.

Title: The Chaos Class
Description: Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

Title: Asylum
Description: In order to secure a job at a mental institution, a young psychiatrist must interview four patients inside the asylum.

Title: Rob-B-Hood
Description: Thongs and Octopus accept a job from their landlord: kidnap a baby. Soon, the baby awakens strong paternal feelings in the two crooks, leading to complications when it comes to handing him over to his possibly crazy gang boss grandfather.

Title: Standoff
Description: A young girl photographs an assassin killing 4 at a cemetery. He wants no witnesses. Carter, a veteran in a farmhouse, is all standing between him and the girl.

Title: Home
Description: The struggle between two generations and its thin line between trust, friendship and betrayal.

Title: Fathers' Day
Description: A woman cons two old boyfriends into searching for her runaway son by convincing both that they are the boy's father.

Title: Traders
Description: What if it made perfect sense for ordinary people to kill each other for money? Better than slow grinding financial ruin and misery, and all done according to a strict code by consenting adults. This is Trading.

Title: King Knight
Description: Thorn and Willow appear to have it all as the revered high priest and priestess of a coven of new age witches. But a secret from Thorn's past throws their lives into turmoil and sends them on a trippy, hilarious journey.

Title: Montevideo: Taste of a Dream
Description: A story about Serbian football team that decides to follow a dream that takes them on a journey to the First World Football Championship in Montevideo, Uruguay in 1930. A dream that allows them to become true stars and living legends.

Title: Phone Bhoot
Description: A ghost reaches out to two bumbling ghostbusters for a business idea. However, their plans go downhill as the eerie ghost reveals her plan.

Title: The Guest House
Description: Before leaving for college, a recently dumped goth girl's life changes forever when she falls in love with a smart and professional college grad who is staying in the family's guest house.

Title: The Diamond Arm
Description: An ordinary Soviet citizen accidentally intervenes into a huge operation of international criminal group that trades illegally obtained jewelry.

Title: Fall Guy
Description: A sexy political drama about a man who's blamed for a crime he didn't do. Will justice be ever served to small people like him?

Title: Not Without Hope
Description: A group of friends' fishing boat capsizes off the coast of Mexico and they're left alone stranded at sea and struggling for survival.

Title: Bro Daddy
Description: The plot revolves around the life of a family man. Unexpected events happen in their house. The brother and father decide to take on the challenges.

Title: The Day After Halloween
Description: A naive hairdresser is spurred by her vivacious friend into becoming a nude model, but soon discovers that everyone she knows wants a piece of her.

Title: 711 Ocean Drive
Description: An electronics expert creates a huge bookie broadcast system for his crime boss, and takes over operations when his boss is murdered. His greed leads him on a deadly destructive path.

Title: The Childhood of a Leader
Description: A chronicle of the childhood of a post-World War I leader.

Title: The Man Who Sold His Skin
Description: His own body turned into a living work of art and promptly exhibited in a museum, Sam, a Syrian refugee, will soon realize to have sold away more than just his skin.

Title: Passchendaele
Description: The lives of a troubled veteran, his nurse girlfriend and a naive boy intersect first in Alberta and then in Belgium during the bloody World War I battle of Passchendaele.

Title: A Return to Salem's Lot
Description: A man and his son vacation to the quiet vampire populated town of Salem's Lot.

Title: Fresh Horses
Description: A college student from Cincinnati breaks off his engagement to his wealthy fiancée after falling in love with a girl from Kentucky. She claims to be 20, but he learns she is actually only 16 and already married.

Title: The Smell of Money
Description: What is the price some pay for the world's pork? North Carolina residents take on one of the world's most powerful companies in a fight for their rights to clean air, pure water, and a life free from the stench of pig feces.

Title: My Big Night
Description: During the never-ending TV taping for a New Year's Eve program, peoples personal lives clash and eventually explode out into the open.

Title: Cheap Thrills
Description: A scheming couple put a struggling family man and his old friend through a series of increasingly twisted dares over the course of an evening at a local bar.

Title: The Girl on the Train
Description: The story follows a recent divorcee who spends her daily commute fantasizing about a seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes daily, but something shocking happens there one day.

Title: In Your Name
Description: Problems arise when Radhey Mohan, a delinquent falls in love with a girl named Nirjara.

Title: A Piece of My Heart
Description: 30-something Isabella visits her hometown to celebrate her dad's 60th birthday. There she reunites with her old friend Molly, who has now taken over the old gang--and even worse, is engaged to marry Isabella's ex, Simon.

Title: SS Experiment Love Camp
Description: Near the end of WW2, prisoners of war are used in experiments to perfect the "Aryan" race.

Title: Like Father Like Son
Description: A mysterious potion switches the personalities of a buttoned-up doctor and his laid-back son.

Title: The Seven-Per-Cent Solution
Description: To treat his friend's cocaine induced delusions, Watson lures Sherlock Holmes to Sigmund Freud.

Title: Anatomy of a Love Seen
Description: Two young actresses fall in love with each other while filming a lesbian love scene, then break up months later, and then are forced to reunite in order to re-shoot the love scene for the movie's distribution.

Title: Good Morning
Description: Two boys begin a silence strike to press their parents into buying them a television set.

Title: Voodoo Passion
Description: Susan comes to Haiti to be with her husband. His naked sister asks her, if she's ever made love to a woman. Susan dreams vividly of nudity, Voodoo rituals and killing.

Title: The Wicker Tree
Description: Charmed by the residents of Tressock, Scotland, two young missionaries accept the invitation to participate in a local festival, fully unaware of the consequences of their decision.

Title: What If...
Description: Ben Walker is allowed to see how different his life would be if he had followed his heart.

Title: Main Street
Description: Durham is slowly dying like the tobacco business it once depended on. Leroy comes to Durham with a business plan. He rents an old warehouse from a cash-strapped old tobacco heiress.

Title: The Swamp
Description: The life of two women and their families in a small provincial town of Salta, Argentina.

Title: Catwoman: Hunted
Description: Follows Catwoman in an attempt to steal a priceless jewel. This puts her squarely in the crosshairs of both a powerful consortium of villains, Interpol and Batwoman.

Title: Two Days in Paris
Description: Marion and Jack try to rekindle their relationship with a visit to Paris, home of Marion's parents -- and several of her ex-boyfriends.

Title: The Deliverance
Description: A family living in a home in Indiana discover strange, demonic occurrences that convince them and the community that the house is a portal to hell.

Title: Dracula Has Risen from the Grave
Description: After a Monsignor accidentally brings Count Dracula back from the dead while exorcising his castle, the vampire preys on the holy man's beautiful niece and her friends.

Title: Be My Cat: A Film for Anne
Description: An aspiring filmmaker goes to shocking extremes to convince Hollywood actress Anne Hathaway to star in his film. First entry in Adrian Tofei's trilogy which includes We Put the World to Sleep and Pure.

Title: Virgin Forest
Description: A photographer, tasked to take photos of a rare flower in the mountain, discovers women trapped in a hidden brothel for illegal loggers. Now, he must do everything to save them.

Title: Forensic
Description: A female police officer in the small hill town of Mussorie and a forensic expert are together on the trail of a serial killer.

Title: Infinitely Polar Bear
Description: A father struggling with bipolar disorder tries to win back his wife by attempting to take full responsibility of their two young, spirited daughters, who don't make the overwhelming task any easier.

Title: Night Train to Terror
Description: God and Satan are on a train discussing the fate of three individuals. The stories of the people in question are told in a trio of very strange vignettes. One involves an insane asylums with some very interesting treatment plans. Another involves a 'death club'. The final story shows us the adventures of a server of Satan.

Title: The Big Hit
Description: An actor past his prime gives drama lessons to prisoners in an attempt to stage "Waiting for Godot."

Title: Ghajini
Description: Sanjay Ramaswamy, who is suffering from short-term memory loss, sets out on a quest to find and eliminate the people responsible for his ladylove Kalpana's murder.

Title: We'll Never Have Paris
Description: A man screws up on a transcontinental level in a noble effort to win back "the one."

Title: 30 Girls 30 Days
Description: A virgin named Fred must win a bet by sleeping with 30 Girls in 30 Days for one million dollars to save his parents business.

Title: The Naked Ape
Description: In a series of live action and animated vignettes, the evolution of humanity is depicted and explored, primarily through the experiences of Cathy, a tour guide in a natural history museum, and Lee, a college student infatuated with her.

Title: Scent of a Woman
Description: A young private is assigned to accompany a blind captain. It soon becomes clear that they are both complex personalities.

Title: Girl at the Window
Description: A teenage girl in the suburbs becomes convinced that her mom's new boyfriend is the serial killer terrorizing the town, and will stop at nothing to prove it.

Title: Thar
Description: A mysterious stranger arrives in a village situated in the Thar desert and crosses paths with a veteran cop investigating a case of brutal killings.

Title: Qarib Qarib Single
Description: Yogi and Jaya, who have polar opposite personalities and sensibilities, meet via a online dating app. This encounter turns into so much more when the two travel to Rishikesh.

Title: Aladin
Description: Since he was a child, Aladin Chatterjee has been teased for his fairytale name. As a college student he follows his namesake's footsteps; unleashing genie Genius and wooing exchange student Jasmine. But the evil Ringmaster approaches.

Title: Ghost in the Machine
Description: An electric surge causes a serial killer's soul to end up in a computer system.

Title: The Donner Party
Description: After becoming snowbound in the Sierra Nevada during the winter of 1846-1847, a number of trapped settlers join together in a final effort to reach California and organize a rescue party.

Title: Mixtape
Description: When a young girl accidentally destroys the mixtape that belonged to her mother, she sets out to track down each of the obscure songs on the cassette.

Title: The Incredible Shrinking Woman
Description: A housewife grows smaller and smaller in reaction to chemicals found in cosmetics and household products.

Title: I Used to Be Funny
Description: Sam, a stand-up comedian struggling with PTSD, weighs whether or not to join the search for a missing teenage girl she used to nanny.

Title: The Other Man
Description: The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life.

Title: Design for Living
Description: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, and the trio agree to try living together in a platonic friendly relationship.

Title: Submission
Description: In wartime France, pharmacist Eliane begins an affair with her shop assistant Armand, but she soon becomes dominated by him. He demands more and more from her, humiliating her and putting her family at risk.

Title: Steel
Description: Strong emotions - fear and panic, self-search and isolation, love and sex, self-denial and self-discovery - a ride on an emotional roller coaster while trying to find one's way into life.

Title: The Billionaire's Accidental Bride
Description: Eric needs to get married in 20 minutes, but his bride is no where seen. Emma is stood up at the alter. When these two cross paths, desperation will kick in.

Title: The War of the Gargantuas
Description: An experimental lab animal called a gargantua escapes from his captors and is suspected to be the creature that is killing people all over the countryside. But when the gargantua from the lab appears at the same time as the evil gargantua, the two begin to battle across Japan.

Title: Defiance
Description: An out-of work merchant seaman single-handedly tames a powerful street gang "The Souls" that has been terrorizing his neighborhood on New York City's Lower East Side.

Title: Hatchet III
Description: A search and recovery team heads into the haunted swamp to pick up the pieces, and Marybeth learns the secret to ending the voodoo curse that has left Victor Crowley haunting and terrorizing Honey Island Swamp for decades.

Title: The Paradine Case
Description: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

Title: Verona
Description: Based on the real story that inspired Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet, follows the greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical.

Title: As You Like It
Description: A daughter of the powerful Duke must show her courage and inventiveness to be with the man she loves.

Title: The St. Valentine's Day Massacre
Description: Al Capone's Valentine's Day surprise for the rival Bugs Moran gang in 1929 Chicago.

Title: Spell
Description: A man crash lands in rural Appalachia and awakens in the attic of a traditional Hoodoo practitioner. He desperately tries to break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual before the rise of the blood moon.

Title: Snow Ponies
Description: A tough group of men ward off ruthless bandits and brutal obstacles as they travel across a treacherous landscape to deliver a mysterious package.

Title: Suki
Description: A lady stripper and a gigolo promised each other that their work can't break them apart. But when lust and temptation come into the picture, they begin to question their vow.

Title: Inga
Description: Inga, a 17 year-old, is sent to live with a scheming aunt who wants her to become mistress of her rich neighbour. She falls for a common young man instead.

Title: Genghis Khan
Description: During the thirteenth century, the shy Mongol boy Temujin (Carlo Cura) becomes the fearless leader Genghis Khan (Omar Sharif), who unites all Mongol tribes and conquers most of Asia, Europe, and the Middle East.

Title: The Landlord
Description: Hal Ashby makes his directing debut with this acclaimed social satire starring Beau Bridges as a wealthy young man Elgar who leaves his family's estate in Long Island to pursue love in a Brooklyn ghetto.

Title: Wish You
Description: Shy keyboardist working for S. Korean music label discovers beautiful male street singer, is transfixed, falling in love at first sight. He shows the video to his boss, giving the singer a chance in the industry and a place in his heart.

Title: The Deep Web: Murdershow
Description: A podcaster's search for clues into his sisters death lands him on the deep web where uncovers THE MURDERSHOW, a site where the highest crypto bidder selects how the victim will be killed. If you are watching them, they are watching you.

Title: Pretty Red Dress
Description: Follows a South London family and how one red dress is the center of their lives.

Title: Grand Theft Auto
Description: A rich girl steals her dad's Rolls Royce and heads off to Las Vegas to get married. However, her angry parents, a jealous suitor, and a bunch of reward seekers are determined to stop her.

Title: Rising High
Description: Charting the rise and fall of three corrupt real estate agents who accumulate absurd wealth in no time but fall into a vortex of fraud, greed and drugs.

Title: Jurassic Park: Island Survival
Description: A science team goes missing on Isla Nublar. Masrani Corp sends a security team to find them and retrieve embryos from an abandoned research lab, now overgrown. An escaped dinosaur complicates the mission.

Title: The Amaranth
Description: Lily and Richard move to a luxurious and cult-like community, where Lily becomes unsettled by the transformation she observes in her older husband and in her own physiology, leading her to wonder if there's something more sinister at play.

Title: Talk to Me
Description: The story of Washington D.C. radio personality Ralph "Petey" Greene, an ex-con who became a popular talk show host and community activist in the 1960s.

Title: American Gothic
Description: A group of travellers make emergency landing on an island in the Pacific Northwest after their seaplane malfunctioned, and stumble across an isolated and psychopathic family.

Title: Smashed
Description: A married couple whose bond is built on a mutual love of alcohol gets their relationship put to the test when the wife decides to get sober.

Title: Bonjour Tristesse
Description: Spoiled Cecile, 17, spends her summer at the French Riviera with her rich, widower, playboy dad and Elsa. Anne, her late mom's friend, visits and brings changes to all.

Title: Beautiful Boy
Description: A married couple on the verge of separation are leveled by the news their 18-year-old son committed a mass shooting at his college, then took his own life.

Title: Pimpin' Pee Wee
Description: Three college buddies search for sex in the summer holidays and end up starting a successful whorehouse.

Title: Ginger & Rosa
Description: A look at the lives of two teenage girls - inseparable friends Ginger and Rosa -- growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms, and the pivotal event that comes to redefine their relationship.

Title: Along Came the Devil
Description: After a troubled childhood, Ashley searches for a connection, and unknowingly invites in a demonic force, which leaves her loved ones fighting for her soul.

Title: The Glass Key
Description: A crooked politician finds himself being accused of murder by a gangster from whom he refused help during a re-election campaign.

Title: The Quiet Ones
Description: A university professor and a team of students conduct an experiment on a young woman, uncovering terrifyingly dark, unexpected forces in the process.

Title: London After Midnight
Description: The abandoned home of a wealthy man who supposedly committed suicide five years earlier is taken over by ghoulish figures - could they be vampires?

Title: The Boyfriend School
Description: Cartoonist Gus has survived cancer treatment and now his romance novelist sister tries to find him a woman and guide him. Will they succeed?

Title: Under the Same Moon
Description: After his grandmother passes away, a young Mexican boy illegally travels across the border to search for his undocumented mother living and working in the U.S.

Title: Small Town Wisconsin
Description: A father tries hard to be a good dad but alcoholism is the huge deterrant.

Title: The Lighthouse
Description: Based on real events which saw two lighthouse keepers stranded for months at sea in a freak storm, the film tells a tale of death, madness and isolation; a desolate trip into the heart of human darkness.

Title: Barcelona
Description: An American working in Barcelona, having sworn off beautiful women, is forced to be host to his playboy cousin in this witty comedy of good intentions and mixed signals.

Title: Cheerleaders Beach Party
Description: Four amorous cheerleaders set out to save their ailing college football team by huddling up on the beach with the rival team...and scoring.

Title: Youtopia
Description: Youtopia is the story of a young woman who decides to sell her virginity to pay debts of her mother and of the man who decides to buy it . It's a Bildungsroman in which the protagonist discovers new worlds and new feelings.

Title: I Love My Dad
Description: A hopelessly estranged father catfishes his son in an attempt to reconnect.

Title: Shinjuku Incident
Description: A simple Chinese immigrant wages a perilous war against one of the most powerful criminal organizations on the planet.

Title: Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo
Description: Fourteen years have passed since the near Third Impact. Most of the world has changed, except for Shinji Ikari, who awakens in a strange new environment without having aged.

Title: Collide
Description: Follows a group of characters as their paths intersect over the course of an evening at an L.A. restaurant.

Title: Welcome Home, Roxy Carmichael
Description: A small town prepares for the homecoming of superstar Roxy Carmichael, as does a young outsider, who believes Roxy is her mother.

Title: Waist Deep
Description: An ex-convict (Tyrese) gets tangled up with a gang after his car is hijacked with his son inside.

Title: The Phantom of Liberty
Description: A series of surreal sequences that critique morality and society in a stream of consciousness style.

Title: Happy New Year
Description: Nick and Charlie (Peter Falk and Charles Durning) are two crooks that rob Harry Winston's jewelry store. Nick portrays a rich elderly brother and sister by using prosthetics and make-up to con the manager.

Title: The Middle Man
Description: Frank Farrelli takes on the job as a middle man in the God-forsaken town of Karmack, USA, a community in a depression so deep that they need a middle man to professionally communicate more of the bad news.

Title: Villain
Description: In 1970s London, Scotland Yard orchestrates the downfall of mob boss Vic Dakin after he crosses the line by blackmailing Members of Parliament.

Title: Daniel the Wizard
Description: Evil assassins want to kill Daniel Kublbock, the third runner up for the German Idols.

Title: Forever Young
Description: Follows a troupe of young students at one of France's most prestigious performing arts academies as they navigate the ups and downs of art and love.

Title: The Big Bet
Description: A 17-year-old high school student who's obsessed with sex tries to seduce both his beautiful older neighbor and the shy new girl in school over a bet, only to end up falling in love.

Title: Saint-Narcisse
Description: When a young man who thought his mother was dead discovers that she may still be alive, he goes on a quest to find her. His journey takes him to a remote cabin in the woods where his mother lives in exile with a mysterious young woman.

Title: Beneath Us
Description: The American Dream becomes a nightmare for a group of undocumented day laborers hired by a wealthy couple. What they expect to be their biggest payday turns into a terrifying fight for survival.

Title: Above the Below
Description: A trio of astronauts survive a destructive re-entry to Earth and find that they are cut off from the world.

Title: Evil Eye
Description: Nala, a 13-year-old girl from the city, travels with her family to her grandmother's home in the countryside, to try to find a cure for her little sister's mysterious illness - But she'll soon find her granny is not exactly what she seems.

Title: A.R.O.G
Description: Commander Logar fools Arif and sends him 1.000.000 years back in the time. He must civilize people from past to reach today.

Title: Hollywood Chainsaw Hookers
Description: A detective embarks on a mission to track down a woman in L.A.'s seedy nightclubs, only to come face-to-face with a blood-thirsty cult of lethally beautiful prostitutes. Is he the next victim of Hollywood's demented Chainsaw Hookers?

Title: Viva Zapata!
Description: The story of Mexican revolutionary Emiliano Zapata, who led a rebellion against the corrupt, oppressive dictatorship of President Porfirio Díaz in the early 20th century.

Title: Poetry
Description: A sixty-something woman, faced with the discovery of a heinous family crime and in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease, finds strength and purpose when she enrolls in a poetry class.

Title: There Is No I in Threesome
Description: Before tying the knot, Ollie and Zoe want to try something new.

Title: Peter Pan
