Description: Peter Pan enters the nursery of the Darling children and, with the help of fairy dust, leads them off to Never Never Land, where they meet the nefarious Captain Hook.

Title: Witchery
Description: A photographer and others are stranded at a Massachusetts island hotel haunted by a woman in black.

Title: Chantilly Bridge
Description: Twenty-five years later, the same brilliant actresses from "Chantilly Lace", Linda Yellen's groundbreaking Sundance hit, return to bring their characters to life in "Chantilly Bridge." In a rare cinematic experience that travels back and forth between films, the characters' memories implode on the present. With unpredictable humor and searing honesty they confront old resentments, celebrate new milestones, and rediscover the unbreakable bond among friends who knew one another when and are there for one another now.

Title: How to Beat the High Cost of Living
Description: A caper comedy about three suburban housewives who, in order to beat inflation and subsidize their alimony checks, plot to steal $1 million from a large plastic ball which is displayed in a local shopping center.

Title: Open Season 3
Description: Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.

Title: Brothers by Blood
Description: A tale of family, friendships and betrayal in the violent world of the Philadelphia mob.

Title: Les 1001 nuits
Description: Zany subversion of the 1001 Nights myth that skips all of the stories and simply focuses on the lovely Scheherazade's escape from the lustful king with the help of a magic lamp and a time traveling astrologist.

Title: Dangerous Game
Description: A New York City film director working on his latest movie in Los Angeles begins to reflect the actions in his movie and real life, especially when he begins an affair with the lead actress.

Title: Scarygirl
Description: As her world is shrouded in darkness, a young girl must overcome her fears and travel to a mysterious city of light, save her father from a dangerous scientist and prevent the destruction of her planet.

Title: Go for It
Description: Two men meet in a strange situation and end up being mistaken first for robbers, then for Secret Service agents.

Title: The Awakening of Gabriella
Description: After leaving her small-town lover, an innocent beauty named Gabriella hits Hollywood with plans to enter a daring and exciting new chapter in her life.

Title: Gunfight in Abilene
Description: A sheriff, haunted by the accidental killing of his best friend, refuses to wear a gun. But when the brother of his best friend is murdered, the lawman must make a choice.

Title: The Sea Wolves
Description: During World War II, British Intelligence brings a crew of ex-soldiers out of retirement, using their age as cover, to take to the seas and pull off an unlikely undercover mission in neutral Goa.

Title: Break In
Description: A woman recently separated from her wealthy husband is terrorized during one harrowing night when a masked intruder breaks into her home. Is it a random home invasion or is something more malicious and personal going on?

Title: The Rooster
Description: When the body of his oldest friend is found buried in a shallow grave, Dan, a small-town cop, seeks answers from a volatile Hermit who may have been the last person to see his friend alive.

Title: I, You, He, She
Description: 'Je' is a girl voluntarily lock up in a room. 'Tu' is the script. 'Il' is a lorry driver. 'Elle' is the girlfriend.

Title: Magellan
Description: After NASA picks up a trio of mysterious signals from within our own solar system, astronaut Roger Nelson is dispatched on a multi-year solo mission aboard the Magellan spacecraft to investigate the sources.

Title: Little Girl Blue
Description: Docudrama about French writer and photographer Carole Achache. Through the power of filmmaking and the help of Marion Cotillard, director Mona Achache brings her mother back to life to retrace her journey and find out who she really was.

Title: Ink
Description: A mysterious creature, known as Ink, steals a child's soul in hopes of using it as a bargaining chip to join the Incubi - the group of supernatural beings responsible for creating nightmares.

Title: The Young and the Damned
Description: A group of juvenile delinquents live a violent and crime-filled life in the festering slums of Mexico City, as the morals of young Pedro are gradually corrupted and destroyed by the others.

Title: Bye Bye Tiberias
Description: Years after leaving her Palestinian village to pursue an acting career in France, Hiam Abbass returns home with her daughter, in this intimate documentary about four generations of women and their shared legacy of separation.

Title: The Teacher
Description: A Palestinian schoolteacher struggles to reconcile his risky commitment to political resistance with the chance of a new relationship with volunteer-worker Lisa and his emotional support for one of his students Adam.

Title: MVP: Most Valuable Primate
Description: When Jack, a sign-language-speaking chimp, makes a break for freedom, his talent for ice skating soon turns him into the local hockey team's secret weapon. But the lab officials are closing in.

Title: We Still Steal the Old Way
Description: The Archer Gang are back and doing a daring heist in London. Remanded in prison, they will try to break out their old friend Briggs.

Title: Faces
Description: A middle-aged man leaves his wife for another woman. Shortly after, his ex-wife also begins a relationship with a younger partner. The film follows their struggles to find love amongst each other.

Title: The Manitou
Description: A psychic's girlfriend finds out that a lump on her back is a growing reincarnation of a 400-year-old demonic Native American spirit.

Title: Alina of Cuba: La Hija Rebelde
Description: A biopic about Alina Fernandez, Fidel Castro's exiled daughter.

Title: Leto
Description: A love triangle emerges around a rock and roll musician, his protege and his wife in 1980s Russia.

Title: Murder, My Sweet
Description: After being hired to find an ex-con's former girlfriend, Philip Marlowe is drawn into a deeply complex web of mystery and deceit.

Title: Chillerama
Description: It's the closing night at the last drive-in theatre in America, and manager, Cecil Kaufman's planned to show 4 movies; films so rare, they've never been exhibited publicly on American soil, until tonight.

Title: Super Fuzz
Description: Red powder from a nuclear explosion gives a police officer super powers as long as he doesn't see anything red. He is eventually framed for murder and is unsuccessfully executed by many different methods.

Title: In the Land of Blood and Honey
Description: During the Bosnian War, Danijel, a soldier fighting for the Serbs, re-encounters Ajla, a Bosnian who's now a captive in his camp he oversees. Their once promising connection has become ambiguous as their motives have changed.

Title: The River
Description: A farming family battles severe storms, a bank is threatening to repossess their farm, and there are other hard times in a battle to save and hold on to their farm.

Title: Bend of the River
Description: When a town boss confiscates homesteaders' supplies after gold is discovered nearby, a tough cowboy risks his life to try and get it to them.

Title: The Blue Elephant
Description: While trying to help an inmate at the mental hospital, a psychotherapist unravels mysteries he never thought existed.

Title: The Ascent
Description: Two Soviet partisans on a mission to gather food contend with the winter cold, the occupying Germans, and their own psyches.

Title: Between the Temples
Description: A cantor in a crisis of faith finds his world turned upside down when his grade school music teacher re-enters his life as his new adult Bat Mitzvah student.

Title: Scars of Dracula
Description: A young man is murdered while spending the night at Count Dracula's castle, prompting his brother to come to the small town where all the traces end to look for him.

Title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
Description: An American journalist returns to Paris - a city that gave him true love and deep grief.

Title: Kin-dza-dza!
Description: Two Russians push the wrong button on a strange device and end up on the telepathic planet Pluke with its strange societal norms.

Title: Sylvia
Description: Story of the relationship between poets Edward James "Ted" Hughes and Sylvia Plath.

Title: Go Goa Gone
Description: A group of friends, just looking to have a good time in a rave party on a remote island in Goa, find out that the island is infested with Zombies.

Title: Creator
Description: An eccentric scientist teaches a student in his own manner while he looks for a way to clone his deceased wife.

Title: It Only Takes a Night
Description: Four best friends on a girl's night out end up on a path none of them expected and find out it really does only take one night to change your life.

Title: This Special Friendship
Description: A tale of the tender relationship between a twelve-year-old boy and the upperclassman who is the object of his desire. All set in the rigid atmosphere of a Jesuit-run school.

Title: My Husband's Secret Wife
Description: A married woman's life turns upside down when she learns her husband is married to another woman.

Title: Kage & Celeste
Description: In a kingdom, far, far away from Earth; humans inhabit another planet. Celeste is a twelve-year-old orphan girl, Kage is the son of an old Hag, and Narcissa and Waylon are two childless adults (or so they think). What will happen when Celeste and Kage escape their hiding spots on the same night? What will the Hag do when she finds out that Narcissa and Waylon disregarded her advice?

Title: Lesson Plan
Description: After a teacher tragically dies, his friend, who happens to be a former cop, takes over his old job in hopes of catching the people responsible for his murder.

Title: Five Children and It
Description: Five children staying in their eccentric uncle's labyrinthine mansion for protection during World War I befriend a sand fairy who has the power to grant wishes.

Title: Rowdy Rathore
Description: A con man uncovers a deadly secret and must save his lady love, the small-town locals and the little girl who insists she's his daughter, from the mob.

Title: Young. Wild. Free.
Description: A teenager struggling to provide for his younger siblings in Compton finds his life turned upside down when he's held at gunpoint by the girl of his dreams.

Title: The Sicilian
Description: Egocentric bandit Salvatore Giuliano fights the Church, the Mafia, and the landed gentry while leading a populist movement for Sicilian independence.

Title: Hatred
Description: Despite being in love with a Ukrainian boy from the same village, Polish girl named Zosia is forced into marrying a wealthy widower. Soon World War II begins and ethnic tensions arise. Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive.

Title: Bloody Mama
Description: A psychologically disturbed matriarch presides over her damaged family of bank-robbing misfits.

Title: Horsemen
Description: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between a serial killing spree and the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

Title: The General
Description: The real-life story of Dublin folk hero and criminal Martin Cahill, who pulled off two daring robberies in Ireland with his team, but attracted unwanted attention from the police, the I.R.A., the U.V.F., and members of his own team.

Title: Surf Nazis Must Die
Description: When the son of a gun-wielding woman is murdered by neo-Nazi surf punks in the post-apocalyptic future, his Mama hunts them down for some bloodthirsty revenge.

Title: Klokkenluider
Description: A darkly comic, character-driven thriller following a government whistleblower and his forthright wife as they are sent to a remote house in Belgium. Joined by two close protection officers, they await the arrival of a British journalist.

Title: Good Deeds
Description: Businessman Wesley Deeds is jolted out of his scripted life when he meets Lindsey, a single mother who works on the cleaning crew in his office building.

Title: King's Ransom
Description: Hoping to foil his own gold-digging wife's plan, a loathsome businessman arranges his own kidnapping, only to realize that there are plenty of other people interested in his wealth as well.

Title: Lady Frankenstein
Description: Baron Frankenstein's daughter and his assistant/her lover continue his experiments in an attempt to rebuild his legacy after he is killed by his psychotic, murderous first monster.

Title: Drugstore June
Description: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

Title: Paparazzi
Description: A rising Hollywood actor decides to take personal revenge against a group of four persistent photographers to make them pay for almost causing a personal tragedy involving his wife and son.

Title: Sunny Side
Description: In this movie adaptation of the TV-Show by the same name, we join the three couples in a comedy about divorces, love, child longing, weird parents and unwritten bathing rules in Torekov.

Title: Another Woman
Description: Facing a mid-life crisis, a woman rents an apartment next to a psychiatrist's office to write a new book, only to become drawn to the plight of a pregnant woman seeking that doctor's help.

Title: Slam Dance
Description: An artist, framed for the murder of a woman, is drawn into a web of corruption, blackmail and deceit.

Title: Mr. Putifar's Wacky Plan
Description: A Revenge on the kids who made his life hell twenty years ago and destroyed his one chance at love.

Title: Jhimma 2
Description: Follows a group of women that comes from different age and sociocultural backgrounds who celebrate life together.

Title: Mako
Description: Eight businessmen decide to go to the location where the Elsalam ship was sunk years ago to make a documentary. There, they face a lot of dangers.

Title: Intimate Affairs
Description: A group of men and two female stenographers scientifically study sex.

Title: Purple Sea
Description: Nothing - not her father, not the church - can stop unruly Angela from being with her childhood best friend and great love, Sara in a 19th century Italian village.

Title: A White, White Day
Description: An off duty police begins to suspect a local man for having had an affair with his recently dead wife. Gradually his obsession for finding out the truth accumulates and inevitably begins to endanger himself and his loved ones.

Title: Debt Collectors
Description: A pair of debt collectors are thrust into an explosively dangerous situation, chasing down various lowlifes while also evading a vengeful kingpin. -Samuel Goldwyn Films-

Title: Turkey Shoot
Description: In a dystopian future where deviants are held in "re-education" camps, a freedom fighter and an innocent prisoner try to survive their decadent oppressors' game of kill-or-be-killed.

Title: The Illustrated Man
Description: In 1930s, a psychotic drifter who's after the mystery woman who covered his whole body in illustrations that foresee distant future shows three of them (The Veldt, The Long Rain and The Last Night of the World) to a mesmerized traveler.

Title: Bunny Lake Is Missing
Description: A woman reports that her young daughter is missing, but there seems to be no evidence that she ever existed.

Title: Day Zero
Description: When society breaks down due to a violent outbreak that turns victims into undead monsters, a former elite soldier breaks out of jail to find his family.

Title: National Theatre Live: Fleabag
Description: A rip-roaring look at some sort of woman living her sort of life. With family and friendships under strain and a guinea pig cafe struggling to keep afloat, Fleabag suddenly finds herself with nothing to lose.

Title: The Whales of August
Description: Two aged sisters reflect on life and the past during a late summer day in Maine.

Title: Defenseless
Description: A lawyer is hired to defend an old college friend accused of murdering her husband.

Title: The Life and Death of Peter Sellers
Description: The feature adaptation of Roger Lewis' book about the actor best remembered as Inspector Clouseau in the Pink Panther movies.

Title: Survive the Game
Description: A man's life on his farm is interrupted when a cop and a pair of dangerous criminals show up.

Title: Girl from the North Country
Description: Nick Laine's wife is suffering from dementia. Their daughter Marianne has a guarded secret that no one can explain, she will start a relationship with a convict that will change everything for everyone forever in a timeless love story.

Title: The Extortion
Description: A commercial airplane pilot is blackmailed by his country's intelligence services to carry mysterious suitcases on his trips to Spain.

Title: Silver Haze
Description: Fifteen years after she got burnt when the pub where she slept as a child caught fire, Franky (23) seeks revenge because she still hasn't found any answers.

Title: Masseuse
Description: Jack is a real scumbag who is going to marry Kristy. He has a bad habit of sleeping with other women and stealing all of their money. Two weeks before their marriage, Kristy sees Jack having sex with their maid, Rosa. It turns out that he was threatening Rosa into having sex as well as his secretary Diane. When he goes away on business, Kristy, Rosa, and Diane devise a way to get him back for all of the things he has put them through. They also decide to turn his house into a special massage parlor for a few nights so Kristy can try to make some of the money back that Jack stole from her.

Title: Ong Bak 3
Description: Continuing from Ong Bak 2's 1440s, Prince Tien fails to revenge his parents' murder by the evil new ruler. The beaten Tien is rescued. Can he bring peace to the kingdom?

Title: The in Crowd
Description: A mentally disturbed young woman takes a job at a posh country club and falls in with a clique of wealthy college kids where she's taken under the wing of the clique's twisted leader, who harbors some dark secrets too terrifying to tell.

Title: The Last Deal
Description: A black market marijuana dealer tries to make one final score before getting squeezed out of the business when cannabis becomes legal.

Title: Eleven Days, Eleven Nights
Description: A female journalist writing a book about sexual adventures lures a man, who's about to get married, for a sexual fling that will last for eleven days.

Title: Mister Organ
Description: Journalist David Farrier (Tickled) is drawn into a game of cat and mouse with a mysterious individual. Delving deeper he unearths a trail of court cases, royal bloodlines and ruined lives, in this true story of psychological warfare.

Title: Angela
Description: Rebecca Miller's riveting drama examines how two sisters cope with their mother's mental illness.

Title: Vehicle 19
Description: In Johannesburg, an American parole breaker unknowingly picks up a rental car that will tie him to a web of corrupt local police.

Title: Your Fat Friend
Description: The rise of Aubrey Gordon, from anonymous blogger to best selling author. Her aim? A paradigm shift in the way that we view fatness. A film about fat, family, the complexities of change and the deep, messy feelings we hold about our bodies

Title: Dear Jassi
Description: Follows the story of a young couple who desperately want to be together but are separated due to time, distance, and societal expectations.

Title: Smiley
Description: After discovering an urban legend of a demented serial killer, who has nothing but a carved "smiley" on his face, a mentally fragile teenager must figure out if she is going insane - or if she could be the next victim.

Title: Plan A
Description: In 1945, a group of Jewish holocaust survivors planned to poison the water system in Germany. The film tells the dangerous and bold secret-operation which was called - Plan A.

Title: Escape from the Bronx
Description: A rag-tag group of people must fight extermination squads amid their ruined city.

Title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Death & Rebirth
Description: A recap of the first 24 episodes of Neon Genesis Evangelion, followed by a 30-minute continuation of the plot that would later form the first third of The End of Evangelion.

Title: We Still Die the Old Way
Description: In the face of their biggest threat yet, the Archers take one last stand.

Title: Fragmentada
Description: A policewoman returns with her young daughter to her hometown to care for her dying mother. The murder of a young girl will keep her there longer than expected. Thus, she will try to solve a case that no one seems to care about.

Title: The Iceman Cometh
Description: A salesman with a sudden passion for reform has an idea to sell to his barfly buddies: throw away your pipe dreams. The drunkards, living in a flophouse above a saloon, resent the idea.

Title: They Call Me Mister Tibbs!
Description: In San Francisco, a high-priced call girl is murdered and the case is assigned to Police Lieutenant Virgil Tibbs.

Title: Two Sinners and a Mule
Description: Two ladies of pleasure, kicked out of town, run across a Bounty Hunter shot to hell. After nursed back to health, the ladies decide he needs their help to track down, Gila Grimes, a ruthless, murdering bandit, for half of the bounty.

Title: Out Stealing Horses
Description: A grieving widower moves to the country where a chance encounter rekindles memories from his past.

Title: Come and Find Me
Description: When his girlfriend goes missing, David must track down her whereabouts after he realizes she's not who she was pretending to be.

Title: Corazón
Description: Elena Ramirez (Ana De Armas) is a disadvantaged prostitute who learns that she has a life threatening medical condition, and must make attempts to earn a visa in order to gain access to the necessary treatment.

Title: Beauty and the Billionaire
Description: Addison travels with a picky billionaire as an assistant in her brother's place so he doesn't lose his job. She clashes with the billionaire until both start to see more in each other than they thought.

Title: A New Breed of Criminal
Description: Inspired by Stephen Sayers' rise from the backstreets of Newcastle's West End to the top of the criminal ladder and the authorities subsequent attempt to bring him crashing back down again.

Title: Security
Description: A winter's tale in which an incident disrupts the lives of its characters and changes them forever. When the fear lives inside homes and people, what is the price of security?

Title: Love at First Bite
Description: After being evicted from his castle in Transylvania, Count Dracula and his assistant Renfield travel to New York to find a woman who the Count believes is the reincarnation of the woman he has loved for all eternity.

Title: Malibu High
Description: After being dumped by her boyfriend and about to flunk high school, Kim decides on major changes by using her body.

Title: Lohusa
Description: Lohusa tells the funny story of a mother and father trying to keep up with life during the first 40 days after birth.

Title: CM101MMXI Fundamentals
Description: The funny little details of everyday life; the simple things that makes us laugh. An unforgettable performance from Cem Yilmaz. Yilmaz captures the audience with his hilarious stories about relationships, humankind's struggle with the technology and professional life. Yilmaz proves us that a food delivery or even a funeral might be amusing when considered correctly.

Title: Paramporul
Description: Revolves around the smuggling mafia of sacred temple idols and a cop who involves with a smuggler to make money out of a sacred idol, possessed by a murder victim.

Title: The Quatermass Xperiment
Description: Professor Bernard Quatermass' manned rocket ship returns to Earth, but two of the astronauts are missing and the survivor seems ill and unable to communicate.

Title: Year 2
Description: Two scientists try to stop a mutation that turns people into werewolves after being touched by a super-moon the year before.

Title: Streetwise
Description: Gritty documentary that looks at the lives of teenagers living on the streets of Seattle.

Title: The Out-of-Towners
Description: The remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy follows the adventures of married couple Henry and Nancy Clark as they are vexed by misfortune while in New York City for a job interview.

Title: Rhubarb
Description: Rich, eccentric T.J. Banner adopts a feral cat who becomes an affectionate pet. Then T.J. dies, leaving to Rhubarb most of his money and a pro baseball team, the Brooklyn Loons. When the team protests, publicist Eric Yeager convinces them that Rhubarb is good luck. But Eric's fiancée Polly seems to be allergic to cats, and the team's success may mean new hazards for Rhubarb.

Title: To Hell and Back
Description: The true WWII story of Audie Murphy, the most decorated soldier in U.S. history. Based on the autobiography of Audie Murphy who stars as himself in the film.

Title: Heroes
Description: A Vietnam veteran suffering from post traumatic stress disorder breaks out of a VA hospital and goes on a road trip with a sympathetic traveler to start a worm farm in California with his fellow veterans.

Title: Batman: Soul of the Dragon
Description: In the 1970s, a missing teacher of martial arts is the subject of a quest by his devoted and brilliant but distant students, who include Batman.

Title: Miami Blues
Description: An ex-con's first act of freedom is moving to Miami where he restarts his old criminal ways with even more potency.

Title: Pride
Description: The determined Jim Ellis starts a swim team for troubled teens at the Philadelphia Department of Recreation.

Title: 6 Bullets
Description: An ex-mercenary known for finding missing children is hired by a mixed martial arts fighter whose daughter has been kidnapped.

Title: The Seduction
Description: A popular anchorwoman, Jaime Douglas, is stalked by a photographer who's obsessed with her and wants to win her affections at any cost.

Title: CC2C
Description: A cook from Chandni Chowk gets mistaken for the reincarnation of an ancient peasant warrior by the residents of an oppressed Chinese village.

Title: Maharshi
Description: A story about Rishi and his quest for success in different stages of life from being a US-based businessman to being a champion for the poor downtrodden farmers.

Title: Grabbers
Description: When an island off the coast of Ireland is invaded by bloodsucking aliens, the heroes discover that getting drunk is the only way to survive.

Title: The Crossing Guard
Description: Freddy Gale is a seedy jeweller who has sworn to kill the drunk driver who killed his little girl.

Title: Juliet of the Spirits
Description: Visions, memories, and mysticism all help a 40-something woman to find the strength to leave her cheating husband.

Title: JJ+E
Description: Two youngsters are raised in the same city, yet they live light years apart, separated economically, socially and culturally. That is until the day they start in the same high school class.

Title: 2001: A Space Travesty
Description: Marshal Dix is to free US president from aliens on the int'l lunar base. A clone has replaced him in The White House. Can Dix prevent an alien invasion?

Title: Doom Asylum
Description: A horribly disfigured lawyer, wrongfully pronounced dead after a terrible car accident, is taken to an asylum for dissection, only to come back alive, kill everyone, and make the asylum his killing grounds.

Title: Everything's Going to Be Great
Description: The Smart family has to move from one state to another, performing in regional theater, where all their dreams will not necessarily come true.

Title: Invisible Life
Description: Kept apart by a terrible lie and a conservative society, two sisters born in Rio de Janeiro make their way through life each believing the other is living out her dreams half a world away.

Title: Befikre
Description: It is a carefree love story of Dharam and Shyra, who find love in an engaging series of experiences. Doused in the spirit of Paris, it celebrates a sensual and free-spirited love.

Title: Cold Souls
Description: Paul is an actor who feels bogged down by his participation in a production of Chekov's play, Vanya.

Title: Twister
Description: Delusional and spoiled Maureen and her eccentric brother Howdy decide to track down and meet their estranged mother, all while the drama of dysfunctional relationships, disastrous weather conditions and a dark family secret ensue.
Two university students, Jule and Jan, leave Berlin together in an old camper on a road trip south, but for different reasons.

Title: Hoax
Description: An investigative team travels deep into the remote Colorado wilderness after a group of young campers are viciously murdered by what may be Bigfoot.

Title: Herbie Goes Bananas
Description: The adorable little VW helps its owners break up a counterfeiting ring in Mexico.

Title: Birder
Description: A birdwatcher, Kristian Brooks, invades a nude queer campground on a remote lake in the New Hampshire wilds. He wears whatever he needs to ensnare the locals in his dark fetish in this nightmarish erotic thriller. Consent has never been more deadly.

Title: Cast a Dark Shadow
Description: Edward "Teddy" Bare is a delusional psychotic with a lust for wealth, older women and murder. Having committed what he thinks is the perfect murder of his elderly wife; Teddy sets his sights on new targets when her fortune goes elsewhere.

Title: Lonesome Soldier
Description: Based on a True American Story, Lonesome Soldier follows the life of Jackson Harlow, from young dreamer to haunted war veteran in this harrowing portrayal of PTS(D) and the effects it has, not only on Soldiers, but also their loved ones.

Title: Movie Madness
Description: A parody of film genres composed of three shorts, spoofing personal growth films, glossy soap operas, and police stories.

Title: Son of Frankenstein
Description: Returning to the ancestral castle long after the death of the monster, the son of Dr. Frankenstein meets a mad shepherd who is hiding the comatose creature. To clear the family name, he revives the creature and tries to rehabilitate him.

Title: Bomb City
Description: Bomb City is a crime-thriller, about the cultural aversion of a group of punk rockers in a conservative Texas town. Their ongoing battle with a rival, more-affluent clique leads to a controversial hate crime that questions the morality of American justice. Based on the true-life story of Brian Deneke.

Title: The Hand
Description: A comic book artist loses his hand, which in turn takes on a murderous life of its own.

Title: The Pride of the Yankees
Description: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

Title: Robot Overlords
Description: Earth has been conquered by robots from a distant galaxy. Survivors are confined to their houses and must wear electronic implants, risking incineration by robot sentries if they venture outside.

Title: 3391 Kilometre
Description: A lonely Turkish girl meets a boy who lives in a small town of France. Despite living far apart, they bond over shared quirks. Through late night chats they become close, overcoming physical distance to find friendship.

Title: Dev.D
Description: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

Title: Bleeder
Description: Two stories for the price of one: Lenny works in a video shop and tries to get aquainted with the waitress Lea. Leo beats his pregnant wife, Louise, which is a VERY bad idea, as her brother, Louis, is a violent racist.

Title: Being Julia
Description: Set in 1930s London, this movie involves stage actors and actresses and their experiences with love and revenge.

Title: Alone in Berlin
Description: After a Nazi German working class couple loses their son in World War II, they decide to retaliate by secretly leafletting handwritten cards in Berlin denouncing their government.

Title: Charlotte Gray
Description: A young Scottish woman joins the French Resistance during World War II to rescue her Royal Air Force boyfriend who is lost in France.

Title: Crimes of the Future
Description: In a dystopic world where a plague is killing off pubescent human females, an esoteric researcher seeks his missing mentor while trying to retain morality in the sex-obsessed society he lives in.

Title: Killbird
Description: When a young woman's car breaks down in back country Oregon, she finds herself at the mercy of a paranoid conspiracy theorist, who assumes she's a government agent.

Title: Pets
Description: Naive, but brash and sultry teenage runaway Bonnie finds herself lost and adrift in America. The lovely young lass runs afoul of a colorful array of evil oddballs who all treat her like an object: violent criminal Pat makes Bonnie help her kidnap the middle-aged Dan Daubrey; domineering lesbian painter Geraldine Mills wants Bonnie to be her kept girl and uses her as a model; and wicked misogynistic rich sicko Vincent Stackman desires poor Bonnie as the ultimate prized possession in his menagerie of caged female animals he keeps locked up in the basement of his swanky remote mansion.

Title: Morocco
Description: A cabaret singer and a Legionnaire fall in love, but their relationship is complicated by the results of his womanizing and the appearance of a rich man who wants her for himself.

Title: Killer Mermaid
Description: Two young American women go on a Mediterranean vacation and uncover the watery lair of a killer mermaid hidden beneath an abandoned military fortress. What was once a carefree adventure becomes a deadly fight for survival.

Title: Secret Sunshine
Description: A woman moves to the town where her dead husband was born. As she tries to fit in, another tragic event overturns her life.

Title: Teenagers from Outer Space
Description: A young alien and a teenage earthling fall in love, and plot to stop the alien's race from using Earth as a food-breeding ground for giant lobsters from their planet.

Title: To Olivia
Description: The story of the tumultuous marriage between actress Patricia Neal and renowned writer Roald Dahl.

Title: Last Breath
Description: Based on the documentary, Last Breath (2019).

Title: Masquerade
Description: A young girl struggles to survive after a group of home invaders break into her house to steal her family's priceless artwork.

Title: The Hunters
Description: A Stockholm cop moves back home to his brother near Norway and Finland. He investigates out of control reindeer poaching. He confiscates rifles with no permits. Everybody, even his brother and local cops, are against him. Things escalate.

Title: Beyond the Darkness
Description: A disturbed young taxidermist exhumes his recently deceased girlfriend, brings her body to his family villa and proceeds to embalm her corpse, with help from his strange housekeeper. But his bouts of insanity are just beginning.

Title: Behind the Curtain of Night
Description: After being declared dead for a second time, a man comes back to life with the ability to see his past lives.

Title: The Puppet Masters
Description: The Earth is invaded by stingray-shaped alien "slugs" that ride on people's backs and control their minds.

Title: The Dark
Description: In mourning over the tragic drowning of their daughter Sarah, James and Adèle are visited by Ebrill, a young girl who claims she died 60 years ago - and bears a startling resemblance to Sarah.

Title: Rachel, Rachel
Description: Rachel is a lonely school teacher who lives with her mother. When a man from the big city asks her out, she starts thinking about where she wants her life to go.

Title: A Prayer for the Dying
Description: Martin, an I.R.A. hitman, is seen by a Catholic priest while carrying out a hit. He grows a bond with the priest and his niece. But his past and his former employers put all their lives in danger.

Title: Donkey Skin
Description: A fairy godmother helps a princess disguise and flee the kingdom so she won't have to marry the king who happens to be her father.

Title: Lady Sings the Blues
Description: The story of the troubled life and career of the legendary Jazz singer, Billie Holiday.

Title: Mrs. Winterbourne
Description: Connie, unwed and pregnant, is heading to Boston by train when she meets wealthy newlyweds Hugh and Patricia. The train crashes, and when Connie comes to in the hospital, she is mistaken for Patricia, who died in the crash with Hugh.

Title: End of Sentence
Description: After being widowed, Frank Fogle reluctantly embarks on a journey to honor his wife's last wish of spreading her ashes in a remote lake in her native Ireland and a promise of taking his estranged son, Sean, along for the trip. As Sean steps out of prison the last thing on his mind is a foreign road trip with his alienated father. What he needs is a fresh start in California. But when his travel plans collapse he reluctantly accepts his father's proposal in return for a ticket to the West Coast and a promise that they never have to see each other again. Between a disconcerting Irish wake, the surfacing of an old flame, the pick up of a pretty hitchhiker and plenty of unresolved issues, the journey becomes a little more than father and son had bargained for.

Title: Bye Bye Morons
Description: A seriously-ill woman tries to find her long-lost child with the help of a man in the middle of a burnout and a blind archivist.

Title: Abraham Ozler
Description: Revolves around the personal and professional lives of veteran cop Abraham Ozler, ACP Trichur, who at one time has to take up a serial killing case and the mysterious hunt begins.

Title: Creation Stories
Description: Creation Stories tells the unforgettable tale of infamous Creation Records label head Alan McGee; and of how one written-off young Glaswegian upstart rose to irrevocably change the face of British culture.

Title: Pretty Young Sister
Description: Will Min-soo and Ji-yeong get together after many twists and turns, or will Ji-yeong return to Woo-hyeon's arms? The story of two men vying for Ji-yeong's heart begins.

Title: My Little Princess
Description: When Hanah re-emerges in the life of her pre-pubescent daughter, she comes with a strange, yet attractive proposition: she needs her own girl to pose for her in ways that would later take by surprise the Parisian art world of the 1970s.

Title: Aatmapamphlet
Description: A young boy growing up amidst massive social and economic changes in 1990s India.

Title: Zyzzyx Rd
Description: Staid accountant Grant finds himself questioning his sanity after he begins a passionate affair with the enigmatic Marissa in Las Vegas and winds up killing her jealous boyfriend, Joey, when he attacks them. But is Joey really dead?

Title: Tramps
Description: A young man and woman find love in an unlikely place while carrying out a shady deal.

Title: Maniac Cop
Description: Is there a monster on the loose on the streets of Los Angeles, or is it just a killer cop out to punish the city that destroyed him?

Title: Shell
Description: Set in the near future, when society has reached unprecedented heights in its cultural fixation with youth and beauty.

Title: Needle Boy
Description: Life has become unbearable for 23 year old Nick who is convinced that he's an evil person. Consequently, he shows up at Aarhus University with a gun in his pocket wanting to shoot his fellow students.

Title: Coming Soon
Description: The trials and tribulations of wealthy young Manhattanites and their sexual coming of age, a romantic comedy set at an Upper East Side preparatory school.

Title: Night School
Description: Who's been decapitating the innocent girls at a local night school? The police are baffled.

Title: CQ
Description: A young filmmaker in 1960s Paris juggles directing a cheesy sci-fi debacle, directing his own personal art film, coping with his crumbling relationship with his girlfriend, and realizing that he's infatuated with the sci-fi film's starlet.

Title: Smithereens
Description: A talent-challenged girl tries to promote herself to stardom in New York's waning punk music world.

Title: Campfire Tales
Description: Teens entertain one another by telling an anthology of famous urban legends with a modern twist; including makeout-point, monsters, psychopaths, and ghosts.

Title: Puffin Rock and the New Friends
Description: Follow the disappearance of the final Little Egg of the season in strange circumstances, leading Oona and her friends to embark on a race against time to try to save it before a big storm hits Puffin Rock and puts the island in danger.

Title: The Beast
Description: When a militia of unidentified hostiles coordinates a coup against the U.S., the president uncovers the extent of The Beast's highly classified offensive capabilities in order to save his life and America.

Title: The King of Marvin Gardens
Description: A daydreamer convinces his radio personality brother to help fund one of his get-rich-quick schemes.

Title: Rejected
Description: Children. Banished. Now witches.

Title: Flypaper
Description: A man caught in the middle of two simultaneous robberies at the same bank desperately tries to protect the teller with whom he's secretly in love.

Title: Mr. Woodcock
Description: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made middle school hell for generations of students.

Title: Things to Come
Description: A philosophy teacher soldiers through the death of her mother, losing her book deal, and dealing with a husband who is cheating on her.

Title: L'Argent
Description: A counterfeit bill that starts off as a schoolboy prank leads to incarceration and violence.

Title: Consent
Description: A wealthy Manhattan family's inability to cope with the suicide of their eldest daughter sends them into a downward spiral of drugs, alcohol and sexual taboos that threatens to destroy them.

Title: The Crucible
Description: Lust and betrayal against the backdrop of the Salem witch trials.

Title: Fear the Invisible Man
Description: A young British widow shelters an old medical school colleague, a man who has somehow turned himself invisible. As his isolation grows and his sanity frays, he schemes to create a reign of wanton murder and terror across the city - and she's the only one who knows that he even exists.

Title: An Angel at My Table
Description: Janet Frame was a brilliant child who, as a teen, was misdiagnosed with schizophrenia. Explore Janet's discovery of the world and her life in Europe as her books are published to acclaim.

Title: Soul to Keep
Description: Beelzebub, a powerful demon hellbent to possess and consume souls, goes after siblings and their lifelong friends at a rundown country house.

Title: The Concert
Description: Thirty years ago Bolshoi Orchestra conductor Andreï Filipov was fired for hiring Jewish musicians. Now a lowly janitor, an opportunity arises to gather his old musicians to go and pose as the official Buolshoi orchestra in Paris.

Title: Bheed
Description: The toughest times people had to face just to reach their homes.

Title: A Cowgirl's Song
Description: An aspiring teen singer goes to live with her grandmother, once a country music legend, but has fallen on hard times after the death of her husband five years earlier.

Title: The Majorettes
Description: A high school majorettes are being methodically killed by a mysterious masked figure. Meanwhile, a local gang are involved in suspicious activities around the school.

Title: Texas Rangers
Description: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the dangerous, ruthless duty of cleaning up the West.

Title: Antony and Cleopatra
Description: After the murder of her lover Caesar, Egypt's queen Cleopatra needs a new ally. She seduces his probable successor Mark Antony. This develops into real love and slowly leads to a war with the other possible successor: Octavius.

Title: White Hunter Black Heart
Description: A thinly fictionalized account of a legendary movie director, whose desire to hunt down an animal turns into a grim situation with his movie crew in Africa.

Title: Bachchhan Paandey
Description: When a struggling filmmaker and actor set out to make a biography on one of the most dreaded gangsters, they have little idea about just how crazy and dangerous it's going to be.

Title: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
Description: In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.

Title: Blood Hook
Description: During a local fishing contest, people are being violently dragged into the lake and killed by a giant fish hook.

Title: The Fantasist
Description: A psychopathic killer in pursuit of his next victim crosses paths with Patricia Teeling (Moira Harris), full of enthusiasm for her new life in Dublin.

Title: Track 29
Description: Linda is still tormented by giving up a baby for adoption at 15. She wants a baby, but her husband has enough in his model trains, mistress and being a doctor.

Title: Four Flies on Grey Velvet
Description: A musician is stalked by an unknown homicidal maniac, who blackmails him for the accidental killing of another stalker.

Title: Wise Guys
Description: Harry Valentini and Moe Dickstein are both errand boys for the Mob. When they lose two hundred fifty thousand dollars, they are set up to kill each other. But they run off to Atlantic City, and comedy follows.

Title: Fourth of July
Description: A recovering alcoholic and jazz pianist in NYC confronts his acerbic family during their annual Fourth of July vacation.

Title: Trauma
Description: A young man tries to help a teenage girl find the serial killer who murdered her parents before the killer comes after them.

Title: Pandemic
Description: A New York doctor travels with her team to Los Angeles to find survivors of a worldwide pandemic.

Title: Orozco the Embalmer
Description: A Documentary about the grim work of an embalmer in one of the poorest and most dangerous parts in Colombia.

Title: Beyond the Reach
Description: In the Mojave Desert, a naked and unarmed hunting guide runs from a wealthy hunter who wants to ensure his silence in the death of an old man.

Title: Welcome 2 Karachi
Description: Two men from India land in Karachi, Pakistan, without their passports. They get trapped by the Taliban and desperately try to find a way to get back to India.

Title: Guns
Description: After a failed assassination attempt on her partner, DEA agent Donna Hamilton discovers that the crime lord responsible for her father's death is coming after her and her associates.

Title: Shackleton: The Greatest Story of Survival
Description: 28 lost adventurers must fight for their lives after their only lifeline is destroyed in the most uninhabitable place on Earth - Antarctica.

Title: Schumacher
Description: Through exclusive interviews and archival footage, this documentary traces an intimate portrait of seven-time Formula 1 champion Michael Schumacher.

Title: Limbo
Description: Omar is a promising young musician. Separated from his Syrian family, he is stuck on a remote Scottish island awaiting the fate of his asylum request.

Title: The Head Hunter
Description: A medieval warrior's gruesome collection of heads is missing only one - the monster that killed his daughter years ago.

Title: Branded to Kill
Description: After a botched assignment, a rice-fetishizing hitman finds himself in conflict with his organization, and one mysterious, dangerous fellow-hitman in particular.

Title: Road to Ninja - Naruto the Movie
Description: Naruto and Sakura are captured in a parallel world by Madara, who's intentions are to steal the Nine Tails from Naruto.

Title: Many Wars Ago
Description: On the Italian/Austrian front during World War I, a disastrous Italian attack upon the Austrian positions leads to a mutiny among the Italian troops.

Title: My Little Eye
Description: Five people are offered one million dollars to spend six months together in an isolated mansion, with cameras watching their every move.

Title: Police Story 2
Description: The Hong Kong supercop must stop a group of blackmailing bombers, while the villains of Police Story (1985) are out for revenge.

Title: Battle on Buka Street
Description: After a lifetime of rivalry, two half-sisters find themselves at loggerheads once again when they set up food businesses on the same street.

Title: Stories We Tell
Description: A film that excavates layers of myth and memory to find the elusive truth at the core of a family of storytellers.

Title: Small Crimes
Description: A disgraced former cop, fresh off a six-year prison sentence for attempted murder - returns home looking for redemption but winds up trapped in the mess he left behind.

Title: Kill Switch
Description: A pilot battles to save his family and the planet after an experiment for unlimited energy goes wrong.

Title: The Field Guide to Evil
Description: A feature-length anthology film. They are known as myths, lore, and folktales. Created to give logic to mankind's darkest fears, these stories laid the foundation for what we now know as the horror genre.

Title: Billy Bathgate
Description: In the year 1935, a teen named Billy Bathgate finds first love while becoming the protégé of fledgling gangster Dutch Schultz.

Title: Strange Circus
Description: The erotic novelist Taeko is writing a morbid story of a family destroyed by incest, murder and abuse. Her assistant, Yuji, sets on a mission to uncover the reality of this story, but the reality might be too much to bear.

Title: Cut Throat City
Description: Set after Hurricane Katrina, four boyhood friends out of options reluctantly accept an offer to pull off a dangerous heist in the heart of New Orleans.

Title: Reap the Wild Wind
Description: Florida ship salvager Loxi falls for Jack, captain of a ship wrecked on the Key West shore. However, their romance is complicated by the arrival of another suitor.

Title: The Wisdom of Trauma
Description: 1 in 5 Americans are diagnosed with mental illness every year. Suicide is the second most common cause of death in the US for youth aged 15-24, and kills over 48,300 in the US and 800,000 people globally per year. Drug overdose kills 81,000 in the US annually. The autoimmune disorder epidemic affects 24 million people in the US alone. What is going on? The interconnected epidemics of anxiety, chronic illness and substance abuse are, according to Dr Gabor Maté, normal - but not in the way you might think.

Title: Are You Being Served?
Description: The staff of Grace Bros. take a trip to Costa Plonka while the department is being remodeled.

Title: Trapped
Description: A man struggles to survive after he unintentionally locks himself up in a high rise devoid of food, water and electricity.

Title: Attack of the Flies
Description: A narrative sci-fi thriller set during the 1920's Prohibition in the farthest north regions of Michigan. The isolation naturally breeds despair, but the arrival of an irregular infestation of insects, turns the isolation into madness.

Title: Hollywood Ending
Description: A director is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film. But the night before the first day of shooting, he develops a case of psychosomatic blindness.

Title: The Favorite
Description: The true story of Aimee Dubuca De Rivery, a French girl sold into slavery to the Sultan of the Ottoman Empire.

Title: Beyond the Mask
Description: A British East India Trading Company assassin seeks to redeem his past by thwarting a plot against a young nation's hope for freedom.

Title: Love Is Not Perfect
Description: Elena is a beautiful, 35-year-old accomplished woman who has an unhealthy obsession with perfection. Elena's well-ordered life is thrown into chaos, however, when she meets Adriana, an 18-year-old seductive young woman who offers passion and excitement, and Hector, an older man who offers Elena stability and security. Elena quickly realizes though that Adriana is too immature and too young for her, so she tries to end their romance, but for Adriana the rejection is just another game to play.

Title: Q&A
Description: Dirty cop, Mike Brennan thinks he got away with murder. But during a routine Q&A, the righteous assistant DA finds a clue that sets them both on a collision course.

Title: Harmony
Description: Born with an energetic power to absorb fear from others, a young woman must find love to balance the fears of her own and fight an ever growing storm of negative energy.

Title: Zombie Tidal Wave
Description: A fisherman contends with an ocean-borne outbreak that threatens his seaside island community.

Title: Kutsal Damacana 4
Description: It tells the story of Fikret, who accidentally becomes a priest. Fikret finds himself in an unpredictable position on the priesthood path he accidentally entered. Unexpectedly rising to the Vatican, Fikret now decides to return to his homeland.

Title: The Chambermaid Lynn
Description: In this coming out story with a difference, Lynn - a painfully shy hotel maid with OCD - voyeuristically watches a guest's encounter with a dominatrix. She then decides to hire the call girl to help her shed her own inhibitions.

Title: The One
Description: On August 24, 1981, the newlyweds Larisa and Vladimir Savitsky stepped on board the plane, following the flight Komsomolsk-on-Amur - Blagoveshchensk.

Title: Sweet Bean
Description: Burdened with a heavy and ever-increasing debt, a dorayaki baker hires a kind ageing woman, after tasting her delicious surprise. Little by little, she unravels her beautiful inner world. Could she be holding the secret to his success?

Title: Where Has Poor Mickey Gone?
Description: Things go terribly wrong for four youths, ejected from a London nightclub for rowdiness, after they decide to break into a Magic shop, where they tie up and terrorize the owner. They find to their cost that he deals in more than illusions...

Title: Cocaine Cowboys
Description: The story of how Miami became the cocaine capital of the United States in the early 1980's and the police officers who turned the tide on crime.

Title: The Wishing Forest
Description: A beautiful desperate widow goes on a dangerous quest to meet a mythical wish-granting unicorn who lies deep in the cannibal-infested "Wishing Forest." Along the way, she encounters a mighty warrior and a deceptive thief, who may or may not be trustworthy. But danger lurks everywhere and they are being tracked by the deadliest cannibal of all, a bloodthirsty savage who worships a magical feral Goddess who feasts on the hearts of his victims.

Title: High Strung Free Dance
Description: A young choreographer casts a contemporary dancer and an innovative pianist in New York's most anticipated new Broadway show.

Title: The Second Mother
Description: When the estranged daughter of a hard-working live-in housekeeper suddenly appears, the unspoken class barriers that exist within the home are thrown into disarray.

Title: That Day, on the Beach
Description: Two friends who haven't seen each other for thirteen years reunite. One is a successful concert pianist just back from a European tour and the other has just started a new business.

Title: Tom at the Farm
Description: A grieving man meets his lover's family, who were not aware of their son's sexual orientation.

Title: Autumn and the Black Jaguar
Description: The heart of the Amazon about incredible friendship and the protection and wonder of nature.

Title: Time of the Wolf
Description: When Anna and her family arrive at their holiday home, they find it occupied by strangers. This confrontation is just the beginning of a painful learning process.

Title: Snow Cake
Description: A drama focused on the friendship between a high-functioning autistic woman and a man who is traumatized after a fatal car accident.

Title: A Brother's Love
Description: Sophia, an unemployed academic, is forced to change the way she thinks and lives her life when Karim, her beloved brother, falls in love.

Title: Where Are You
Description: A grieving fashion photographer searches for his missing girlfriend.

Title: Jack and the Beanstalk
Description: Jack goes up the beanstalk to rescue a little girl who has been transformed into a harp.

Title: Mili
Description: Janhvi Kapoor as a woman stuck in a freezer fighting to stay alive. 'Mili' is the official Hindi remake of the Malayalam thriller 'Helen'.

Title: Robin and the Hood
Description: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends 'The Hoods', the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom.

Title: Chariot
Description: A story about a corporation and a doctor (John Malkovich) that oversees the process of reincarnation, and a young man (Thomas Mann) who becomes a glitch in the system when he encounters a woman (Rosa Salazar) he loved in a previous life.

Title: Ted - Show Me Love
Description: The life of Swedish pop star Ted Gärdestad.

Title: Five Deadly Venoms
Description: The sixth and final pupil of a dying martial arts teacher is instructed to find the teacher's five former pupils and defeat any evil ones that are among them.

Title: Undefeatable
Description: Kristi Jones (Cynthia Rothrock) avenges her sister's death at the hands of a crazed martial arts rapist.

Title: Return from the Ashes
Description: In Paris, a Polish gigolo marries a rich Jewish doctor and stands to inherit her estate when she is deported to Dachau by the Nazis.

Title: Kumbalangi Nights
Description: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.

Title: Bats
Description: Genetically mutated bats escape and it's up to a bat expert and the local sheriff to stop them.

Title: Fade to Black
Description: A shy, lonely film buff embarks on a killing spree against those who browbeat and betray him, all the while stalking his idol, a Marilyn Monroe lookalike.

Title: Butterfly Tale
Description: A pair of rival butterflies form an unlikely friendship.

Title: Young Ones
Description: Set in the future when water is hard to find, a teenage boy sets out to protect his family and survive.

Title: Gangster No. 1
Description: Chronicles the rise and fall of a prominent, and particularly ruthless English gangster.

Title: Pardes
Description: Kishorilal wants an Indian bride for his westernised son. He gets him engaged to Ganga, his friend's daughter, and brings her to USA. But she shares a deeper bond with Arjun, Kishorilal's foster son.

Title: The Workshop
Description: A spiritual search for answers leads the documentary filmmaker to a California workshop run by a guru who promotes sexual adventure -- and the exploration of the human condition.

Title: Downrange
Description: Stranded at the side of the road after a tire blowout, a group of friends become targets for an enigmatic sniper.

Title: The Keeper
Description: The love story of a young English woman and a German PoW, who together overcome prejudice, public hostility and personal tragedy.

Title: Starfish
Description: A unique, intimate portrayal of a girl grieving for the loss of her best friend, which just so happens to take place on the day the world ends.

Title: Chato's Land
Description: In 1870s New Mexico, a half-breed kills a bigoted sheriff in self-defense but the posse that eventually hunts him finds itself in dangerous territory.

Title: American Anthem
Description: Steve has given up on football and gymnastics after breaking an arm. Julie comes to town to train for the U.S. gymnastics championship, the first step to the Olympics. They meet and she motivates him to return to the gym.

Title: All Inclusive
Description: Jacco and Sylvie's shaky marriage is put to the test during their stay at an All-Inclusive resort. Jacco finds it difficult to embrace the All-Inclusive culture and at the same time has to repair his marriage and his band with the kids.

Title: Keyholes Are for Peeping
Description: Funny parody of adult films starring Sammy Petrillo.

Title: Day of the Falcon
Description: Set in the 1930s Arab states at the dawn of the oil boom, the story centers on a young Arab prince torn between allegiance to his conservative father and his modern, liberal father-in-law.

Title: The Pirate
Description: A girl is engaged to the local rich man, but meanwhile she has dreams about the legendary pirate Macoco. A traveling singer falls in love with her and to impress her he poses as the pirate.

Title: Richard III
Description: Shakespeare's powerful tale of the wicked deformed King and his conquests, both on the battlefield and in the boudoir.

Title: Public Sex
Description: An aspiring journalist drops his inhibitions to research the UK's outdoor sex scene. He meets a certain girl in a car park, and the totally unexpected happens.

Title: Jackson County Jail
Description: A wrongfully imprisoned young woman accused of murdering the guard who assaulted her escapes from jail and becomes a fugitive.

Title: Maniac
Description: A former vaudevillian gifted at impersonation assists a mad scientist in reanimating corpses and soon goes mad himself.

Title: The Invisible Woman
Description: An attractive model with an ulterior motive volunteers as guinea pig for an invisibility machine.

Title: The Long Swift Sword of Siegfried
Description: An "adults only" retelling of the legend of Siegfried.

Title: Man-Thing
Description: Agents of an oil tycoon vanish while exploring a swamp marked for drilling. The local sheriff investigates and faces a Seminole legend come to life: Man-Thing, a shambling swamp-monster whose touch burns those who feel fear.

Title: Human Animals
Description: After several nuclear explosions, two men and one woman wake up in the middle of a desert and begin a journey of survival and self discovery.

Title: Fluke
Description: After a man dies in a car crash, he is reincarnated as a dog and attempts to reconnect with his family.

Title: Tropico
Description: Raymond is hired to spy on Mark, an American businessman, in a steamy coastal town in Northern Brazil. However, things get complicated when he falls simultaneously for Mark's wife, Lucia (Baccarin), and her identical twin sister, Lea.

Title: Ground Control
Description: A disgraced former air traffic controller is called back into service when the airport's traffic control system malfunctions.

Title: Spiral
Description: The inhabitants of a small Japanese town become increasingly obsessed with and tormented by spirals.

Title: Summer Camp
Description: Follows Nora, Ginny, and Mary, three childhood best friends who used to spend every summer at a sleep away camp together. After years, when the opportunity to get back together for a summer camp reunion presents itself, they all seize it.

Title: Chasing the Dragon
Description: An illegal immigrant from Mainland China sneaks into corrupt British-colonized Hong Kong in 1963, transforming himself into a ruthless and emerging drug lord.

Title: Heat
Description: Las Vegas is the backdrop for all the torrid action of heat, as Burt Reynolds plays the soft-hearted bodyguard who's out to protect his friends.

Title: Adam
Description: Abla runs a modest local bakery from her home in Casablanca where she lives alone with her 8-year-old daughter, Warda. When Samia, a young pregnant woman, knocks on their door, Abla is far from imagining that her life will change forever.

Title: Emanuelle and Francoise
Description: A woman plots to take revenge on the man that abused her sister.

Title: Sleight
Description: A young street magician is left to care for his little sister after their parents' death, and turns to illegal activities to keep a roof over their heads. When he gets in too deep, his sister is kidnapped and he is forced to use his magic and brilliant mind to save her.

Title: Vaathi
Description: The life of a young man and his struggles against the privatization of education.

Title: Suzzanna: Kliwon Friday Night
Description: After a shaman casts a curse on her, a woman is killed by dark sorcery and resurrected as a wrathful spirit who seeks to reunite with her newborn baby.

Title: Omen
Description: After spending years in Belgium, a young Congolese man returns to his birthplace of Kinshasa to confront the intricacies of his family and culture.

Title: The Proposition
Description: Longing to have a baby, a sterile 1930s Bostonian hires a man to impregnate his wife.

Title: Hello, My Name Is Doris
Description: A self-help seminar inspires a sixty-something woman to romantically pursue her younger co-worker.

Title: Kings
Description: The life of a foster family in South Central Los Angeles, a few weeks before the city erupts in violence following the verdict of the Rodney King trial.

Title: Legacy of Blood
Description: Horror movie about three wicked sisters and their equally unsavory husbands who all arrive at a remote inn where they mean to attend the reading of their uncle's will. One by one, the heirs are dispatched by an unknown killer.

Title: Honkytonk Man
Description: A boy with a music talent goes on a journey with his uncle for a stage concert.

Title: The Area 51 Incident
Description: An outbreak occurs in the infamous Area 51 leading a group of survivors to an underground bunker.. only to learn.. they are not alone.

Title: Management
Description: A traveling art saleswoman tries to shake off a flaky motel manager who falls for her and won't leave her alone.

Title: Rob the Mob
Description: A Queens couple who specialize in robbing mafia social clubs stumble upon a score bigger than they could ever imagine, becoming targets of both the mob and the FBI in the process.

Title: Watchers
Description: A boy takes in a stray dog, later discovering that it is an ultra-intelligent runaway being stalked by a dangerous creature from the same genetic research lab.

Title: Heartbreaker
Description: Alex and his sister run a business designed to break up relationships. They are hired by a rich man to break up the wedding of his daughter. The only problem is that they only have one week to do so.

Title: The Immortal
Description: Ciro's body is slowly sinking in the Gulf of Naples. As he plunges into darkness, memories emerge.

Title: Trailer Park Boys: The Movie
Description: Ricky, Julian, and Bubbles come up with a scheme to steal large amounts of untraceable coins.

Title: Love & Sex
Description: Kate's fired from a women's magazine for writing about blow jobs, based on own experience as requested. She gets a last chance - 2500 happy, perky words on finding/keeping that perfect man. She tells about her relationships.

Title: Cargo
Description: Dr. Laura P. takes a job on a cargo spaceship for 4 years plus 4 years back. She'll join her sister on Rhea. 44 months later, in Laura's shift, strange things happen in cargo. The crew is reanimated and the captain dies mysteriously.

Title: The Limits of Control
Description: The story of a mysterious loner, a stranger in the process of completing a criminal job.

Title: Pokémon 3 the Movie: Spell of the Unown
Description: In the town of Greenfield, a young, lonely girl's dreams and wishes are brought into reality by a collective of reality-warping Pokémon.

Title: Wildcat
Description: Back from war in Afghanistan, a young British soldier struggling with depression and PTSD finds a second chance in the Amazon rainforest when he meets an American scientist, and together they foster an orphaned baby ocelot.

Title: Silver Dollar Road
Description: A Black family in North Carolina has been harassed for decades by land developers attempting to take their waterfront property.

Title: Shock Waves
Description: Visitors to a remote island discover that a reclusive Nazi commandant has been breeding a group of Zombie soldiers.

Title: Franklyn
Description: A portrait of the broken lives of four people (a vigilante detective, a worried parent, an awkward man looking for love and a suicidal artist) as they all struggle to cope in their religiously-dystopian city.

Title: Photo de famille
Description: Three estranged siblings who loathe each other reunite with their distant parents at their grandmother's funeral in this French ensemble comedy.

Title: Dobermann
Description: Dobermann is the world's most ruthless bank robber and with his gang rob bank after bank, now in Paris. What can the police do but to let the mad, morally bankrupt police commissioner loose on him?

Title: Mission Kashmir
Description: A police officer adopts the son and sole survivor of a family he has massacred while pursuing a terrorist. After some time the foster son finds out what the stepfather did.

Title: 1942: A Love Story
Description: A young Indian couple, both from wealthy backgrounds, find themselves caught up in the 1940's Indian revolutionary movement against their families whom are under the thumb a sadistic British general.

Title: Last Orders
Description: A group of old friends reminisce about their lives over the years after the death of one of their crew.

Title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc II - The Battle for Doldrey
Description: For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in order to become Griffith's equal and truly be called his friend, Guts realizes he will have to leave the Band of the Hawk.

Title: The Woman in the Window
Description: When a conservative middle aged professor engages in a relationship with a femme fatale, he's plunged into a nightmarish world of blackmail and murder.

Title: In Search of a Midnight Kiss
Description: Broke and alone on New Year's Eve, Wilson just wants to spend the rest of a very bad year in bed. But, when his best friend convinces him to post a personal ad, he meets a woman bent on finding the right guy to be with at midnight.

Title: Salt on the Skin
Description: After a computer operator has been through a painful relationship, he is determined to look the other way every time any interesting woman enters his life.

Title: The Master and Margarita
Description: Based on Mikhail Bulgakov's novel "Master and Margarita". 1930's, Moscow. A famous writer is censored by the Soviet state: his novel is banned, and the theatrical premier of his new play about Pontius Pilate - canceled. In just a few days he becomes an outcast. Inspired by these misfortunes the writer conceives a new novel in which the devil, named Woland, satirically revenges all those responsible for the writer's downfall. He knows this novel can never be published in the USSR, but Margarita - his muse pushes him to write it no matter what.

Title: The Witches
Description: Five short stories loosely dealing with the roles of women in society.

Title: Freedomland
Description: A black police detective must solve a strange case of a kidnapped boy and deal with a big racial protest.

Title: Señora Influencer
Description: Fatima becomes one of the most famous influencers of the moment. Cami and Sofi, young influencers, try to take advantage of Fatima's sudden popularity by pretending to be her friends.

Title: Love and Bullets
Description: Arizona cop is sent to Switzerland to bring in the girlfriend of a dangerous mobster so she can testify against him. The mobster sends someone too - assassins.

Title: Hell and Back
Description: Two best friends set out to rescue their pal after he's accidentally dragged to hell.

Title: Promises
Description: Plot unknown.

Title: Bad Hombres
Description: Two undocumented immigrants take the simple job of digging a hole in the desert, but when their employers turn out to be psychopaths, staying alive will become the most complex job of their lives.

Title: Daddy and Them
Description: Dark comedy where a married couple comes to the aid of a jailed uncle.

Title: Riptide
Description: When a biker gang's drug operation is raided by the ATF the gang leader's two sons develop differing views about the gang's future.

Title: Outpost
Description: In war-torn Eastern Europe, a mysterious businessman hires a group of mercenaries on a routine mission to protect him not knowing of the long-hidden secret that lies there.

Title: In China They Eat Dogs
Description: Two brothers, one cold and ruthless, the other sensitive and reluctant, and their brutal misadventures.

Title: The Forbidden Photos of a Lady Above Suspicion
Description: The wife of a struggling businessman is blackmailed by a mysterious man into having a sadistic affair with him, or he will leak evidence implicating her husband of murder.

Title: Wild Orchid II: Two Shades of Blue
Description: In 1958 California, a teenage girl goes to work as a prostitute in a high-class brothel after the death of her father.

Title: The Agony and the Ecstasy
Description: The biographical story of Michelangelo's troubles while painting the Sistine Chapel at the urging of Pope Julius II.

Title: A Love Story from the Streets
Description: To make ends meet with her drug-addicted mother, Kenya immerses herself in the world of underground strip parties.

Title: A Tale of Winter
Description: Five years after losing touch with a summer fling, a woman has difficulty choosing between her two suitors.

Title: Shoot the Piano Player
Description: A pianist helps his brother escape from two gangsters, who retaliate by abducting their kid brother.

Title: All to Play For
Description: Barmaid Sylvie is a single mom living with her two sons, Sofiane and Jean-Jacques. One night, Sofiane is injured while being alone in the flat which results in placing him in a foster home. Sylvie is determined to bring her son back home.

Title: Spiral
Description: A same-sex couple move to a small town to enjoy a better quality of life and raise their daughter with strong social values. But when neighbors throw a very strange party, nothing is as it seems in their picturesque neighborhood.

Title: Bonamy
Description: Bonamy is the journey of a stray puppy through 2 children's life. The 8-year-old girl's love and affection for the dog and her helplessness where she has to leave it alone at some point in her life, and the 10-year-old boy's struggle to find a shelter for the puppy and how he manages to achieve it. The film also conveys how true love and compassion can bring happiness to one's life.

Title: Bottom
Description: A cinema verite documentary about a man living in New York City determined to have raw sex with as many men as possible in a year and meticulously keeping count of the number of 'loads' he takes.

Title: Haute couture
Description: Esther is at the end of her career as Head Seamstress at Dior Avenue Montaigne workshop. One day, she gets her handbag stolen in the metro by a 20 year old woman, Jade. Instead of calling the police she decides to take care of Jade. She sees in her the opportunity to pass on her skills, the craft of dressmaking, her only wealth. In the frenetic world of Haute Couture, Esther will give Jade la beauté du geste, a way to reach beyond herself.

Title: No Way Out
Description: Two hoodlum brothers are shot and wounded during an attempted robbery. They're taken to a nearby hospital where one brother dies. The surviving brother, a rabid racist, blames the Black doctor for his brother's death.

Title: Vice Squad
Description: A single mother prostitute, who goes by the name Princess, finds herself forced to work undercover for the police in order to apprehend a homicidal, misogynistic pimp named Ramrod, who will do anything not to get arrested.

Title: Swept Away
Description: A trip into the Mediterranean sea becomes a trip into the discovery of how society's frameworks of the rich and poor are delicate and temporary.

Title: I Am Zlatan
Description: Son of Balkan immigrants Zlatan Ibrahimovic, born in Sweden, becomes, after a rough childhood, a Swedish football champion of several decades.

Title: Ghoster
Description: An inquisitive girl and her father must unravel the secrets of Echoville Manor which has held the world's cutest spirit Ghoster captive for 50 years, before Yuto the ghost dragon wipes them all out in his quest for immortality.

Title: Forget Me Not
Description: "Do you remember me?" A childhood game turns terrifyingly real for a group of high schoolers celebrating graduation. After a hide and seek like game in a cemetery, the players begin to disappear one by one.

Title: The Facts of Life
Description: Sophisticated comedy with Larry and Kitty leaving their spouses for an interlude together.

Title: Shame
Description: In the midst of a civil war, former violinists Jan and Eva Rosenberg, who have a tempestuous marriage, run a farm on a rural island. In spite of their best efforts to escape their homeland, the war impinges on every aspect of their lives.

Title: Alienoid: The Return to the Future
Description: The second part to Alienoid, which will center on ancient Taoists traveling through time and space in an effort to obtain the Divine Sword.

Title: Where the Day Takes You
Description: King is a young man, but he's already a veteran of life on the streets of Los Angeles. The leader of a group of runaways, King acts as a mentor to troubled kids such as gay hustler Little J and junkie Greg.

Title: The Man Who Loved Women
Description: A womanizing sculptor named David goes to seek help from a psychiatrist, Marianna, to cure him of his obsession with women.

Title: House of 9
Description: Nine strangers, with no apparent connection between them are abducted: drugged, kidnapped and sealed in a house together.

Title: I Won't Love You
Description: In an idyllic working class community, 13 year old Anka grows up, going through stages of adolescence, dreaming, first love and gossiping with girlfriends. Roughly disturbed by the shame and disgrace of alcoholism - leaves unwashable stains upon the community, that tries to cope with abuse and depression, and the system (including school teachers) who try to avoid the subject. This story was aimed at parents, to give them morally an insight into what happens when a young girl has to deal with the disgrace of an alcoholic father and a mentally instable mother. Very well acted by Grazyna Michalska as Anka. [translated from Polish by ALIPTES]

Title: Tasleem Ahaly
Description: The story follows a married couple, as the husband works as a doctor who dreams of immigrating to Canada, a woman soon appears in their lives and starts following them everywhere.

Title: A Cop
Description: After a shaky first heist, a group of thieves plan an even more elaborate and risky second heist.

Title: Blood Diner
Description: Two brothers are entrusted by their uncle to uphold the ritualistic cannibalism of the ancient cult of Sheetar. In order to do so, they have to prepare a feast of sacrifice for the resurrection of their goddess.

Title: Friday Foster
Description: At Los Angeles airport, magazine photographer Friday Foster witnesses an assassination attempt against billionaire Blake Tarr and is drawn into a murky political conspiracy.

Title: The Last Movie
Description: After a film production wraps in Peru, an American wrangler decides to stay behind to witness the ways that filmmaking affects the locals.
