Description: In 19th century England, young Mary Grant and her brother, Robert, embark on a dangerous quest to find their missing father, a sea captain who vanished somewhere along the Chilean coast.

Title: Gangster Land
Description: A very high level and brief history of how "Machine Gun Jack McGurn" rose from amateur boxer to second in command of Al Capone's criminal empire.

Title: Alabama Moon
Description: After the unexpected death of his survivalist father, an eleven-year-old boy raised in the Alabama wilderness must learn how to make a home in the modern world.

Title: Lady in Cement
Description: During an ocean dive, Miami gumshoe Tony Rome (Frank Sinatra) finds a woman's body with her feet encased in a concrete block and sets out to solve the murder case.

Title: Post Impact
Description: After a meteor strike starts a new ice age, a group of survivors tries to find a device that could give mankind new hope

Title: The Lost Continent
Description: The captain, crew, and passengers of an old freighter-all of them with dark secrets to keep-find themselves adrift in a mysterious land full of monsters, conquistadors, and killer seaweed.

Title: Born to be Great
Description: "Alexander The Great's early life while still at school under the tutelage of the great philosopher Aristotle but old enough to engage in battle demonstrating leadership standing out above the rest".

Title: Danika
Description: Danika's fears for her children are manifested in premonitions of death and disaster.

Title: Mindhorn
Description: A has-been actor best known for playing the title character in the 1980s detective series "Mindhorn" must work with the police when a serial killer says that he will only speak with Detective Mindhorn, whom he believes to be a real person.

Title: Love Is All You Need
Description: A hairdresser who has lost her hair to cancer, finds out her husband is having an affair, travels to Italy for her daughter's wedding, and meets a widower who still blames the world for the loss of his wife.

Title: Modigliani
Description: The story of Amedeo Modigliani's bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

Title: Confessions from a Holiday Camp
Description: Timothy Lea finds work in a holiday camp, and is soon up to his usual sexy shenanigans when he organizes a beauty pageant.

Title: Dark Victory
Description: A young socialite is diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor, and must decide whether or not she'll meet her final days with dignity.

Title: Hard Rock Zombies
Description: A freshly-out-of-the-grave band of Hard Rock Zombies is thirsting to take their sweet revenge, as they give the performance of a lifetime.

Title: A Far Off Place
Description: When a gang of African poachers raid her family's farm, young Nonni, visiting American teenager Harry Winslow and a local bushman guide must escape into the Kalahari desert and reach the nearest town.

Title: Chuck
Description: A drama inspired by the life of heavyweight boxer Chuck Wepner, who had a once-in-a-lifetime bout with Muhammad Ali that would inspire the film Rocky (1976).

Title: Assassination
Description: A presidential bodyguard is assigned to protect an objecting first lady, as repeated attempts are made on her life.

Title: Inu-oh
Description: A cursed dancer and a musician stun society with electrifying concerts in this animated rock opera.

Title: Two Lovers and a Bear
Description: Set in a small town near the North Pole where roads lead to nowhere, the story follows Roman and Lucy, two burning souls who come together to make a leap for life and inner peace.

Title: Stealing Candy
Description: Three ex-cons kidnap a famous movie star and force her to shoot a live sex tape to be aired over the internet for a paying audience.

Title: Other People
Description: A struggling comedy writer, fresh off a breakup and in the midst of the worst year of his life, returns to Sacramento to care for his dying mother.

Title: Rangoli
Description: A school boy frequently overcomes uncertain issues. Later realize his family struggles because of him.

Title: Waktu Maghrib
Description: In a village there is a girl who says goodbye to the mosque to pray maghrib to her father.

Title: Distant Vision
Description: A coming-of-age story about a teenage Italian-American boy and girl.

Title: Brother
Description: A Japanese gangster is exiled to Los Angeles where his brother lives with a small but respectable multi-racial gang, who he inspires to expand their influence.

Title: Hell's Crossroads
Description: An imprisoned gunfighter is offered parole on one condition--that he track down and bring in Jesse James.

Title: Batman
Description: Japanese spymaster Prince Daka operates a covert espionage organization located in Gotham City's now-deserted Little Tokyo which turns American scientists into pliable zombies.

Title: Banshee Chapter
Description: Journalist Anne Roland explores the disturbing links behind her friend's sudden disappearance, an ominous government research chemical, and a disturbing radio broadcast of unknown origin.

Title: The Last Front
Description: Amidst World War I's chaos, a grieving father turns hero, leading villagers to safety while evading a relentless enemy driven by vengeance.

Title: Love & Gelato
Description: Lina makes a promise to her sick mother that she'll spend the summer before college in Rome, where she falls for the city, the people - and the "gelato".

Title: Here Alone
Description: A young woman struggles to survive on her own in the wake of a mysterious epidemic that has killed much of society, and forced her deep into the unforgiving wilderness.

Title: The Adventure of Sherlock Holmes' Smarter Brother
Description: The younger brother of the consulting detective tries to steal Sherlock's glory by solving an important case assisted by an eccentric Scotland Yard detective and a lovely but suspicious actress.

Title: Midnight
Description: The foreman of a jury asks questions that send a woman to the electric chair for a murder committed in the heat of passion. On the night of the execution, his actions come back to haunt him.

Title: The Child Remains
Description: An expectant couple's intimate weekend turns to terror as they discover their secluded country inn is a haunted maternity home where infants and mothers were murdered.

Title: Drift
Description: In the 70s two brothers battle killer waves, conservative society and ruthless bikers to kick-start the modern surf industry.

Title: Gimme Shelter
Description: When three hundred thousand members of the Love Generation collided with a few dozen Hells Angels at San Francisco's Altamont Speedway, the bloody slash that transformed a decade's dreams into disillusionment was immortalized on this film.

Title: Angel Eyes
Description: A troubled teenager wants no one coming between her and her stepfather--which, unknown to him, is why she murdered her mother. Now "dad" has a new girlfriend, who has no idea how much trouble she will soon be in.

Title: Ashes of Time
Description: A broken-hearted hit man moves to the desert where he finds skilled swordsmen to carry out his contract killings.

Title: Jane
Description: Olivia is a young woman who gets deferred from her dream college and experiences frightening panic attacks. In an attempt to regain some sense of control, she embarks on a social media-fueled rampage against those that stand in her way.

Title: First Name: Carmen
Description: A woman involved with a terrorist group becomes dangerously close to the police officer guarding the bank they plan to rob.

Title: The Place
Description: The fates of an apparently random group of strangers who each come into contact with a mysterious figure who they believe possesses the power to grant any wish, in return for which they must carry out a task he assigns them.

Title: Safe Place
Description: Follows Damir, who's trying to take his own life while his family wants to save him. Everything happens over a period of just 24 hours.

Title: Angrezi Medium
Description: When his daughter decides to further her studies in London, a hardworking Rajasthani businessman does everything in power to make her dreams come true.

Title: Peace by Chocolate
Description: After the bombing of his father's chocolate factory, a charming young Syrian refugee struggles to settle into his new small-town life, caught between following his dream and preserving his family's legacy.

Title: Titina
Description: Embark on the extraordinary polar adventure.

Title: Twin Sitters
Description: A business executive is releasing dangerous toxins and the Barbarian Brothers set out to stop his evil work.

Title: More
Description: Stefan, a recent college graduate, hitchhikes from Germany to Paris where he meets American expatriate, Estelle. They chase the sun to Ibiza. An idyllic island life degenerates when she introduces him to heroin and they get addicted.

Title: Romina, VTM
Description: Romina begins to fall in love with Valentin, a tourist on holiday in Costinesti with plans to become a musician. She helps Valentin to become an artist and, without realizing, he is starting to look a lot like someone from Romina's past.

Title: The Connection
Description: A French police magistrate spends years trying to take down one of the country's most powerful drug rings.

Title: An Evening with Beverly Luff Linn
Description: Lulu Danger's unsatisfying marriage takes a turn for the worst when a mysterious man from her past comes to town to perform an event called "An Evening With Beverly Luff Linn; For One Magical Night Only."

Title: I Love Trouble
Description: Peter Brackett and Sabrina Peterson are two competing Chicago newspaper reporters who join forces to unravel the mystery behind a train derailment.

Title: Mini's First Time
Description: A rebellious girl hooks up with an escort agency, where her stepfather is a client.

Title: A Tale of Two Guns
Description: In the lawless West, The Cowboys a notorious brotherhood of killers and thieves reigned over the land with brutal fists and fast guns. Fate had finally caught up with them - and now the merciless gang has but a single surviving member. When a deputized gunslinger takes up the call to hunt down the last Cowboy, the chase is on and the bullets fly and only one of these hardened men can survive.

Title: The Visitor from the Future
Description: Alice, a young girl, protest against the construction of a nuclear plant created by her father, a deputy. It is then that a strange visitor take them in 2555, a future devastated by the explosion of the central.

Title: South Riding
Description: Winifred Holtby realised that local government is not a dry affair of meetings and memoranda, but the front-line defence thrown up by humanity against its common enemies of sickness, poverty and ignorance. She built her story around six people working for a typical county council. Beneath the lives of the public servants runs the thread of their personal drama. The story tells how a public life affects the private life; and how a man's personal sufferings make him what he is in public. Corruption, intrigue and romance in a Yorkshire setting where country squire whose wife is in a mental hospital becomes attracted to a crusading local schoolmistress.

Title: Eric Larue
Description: It tells the story of Janice, the mother of a teenager who shot and killed three of his classmates.

Title: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
Description: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

Title: Conclave
Description: It follows Cardinal Lomeli as he oversees the group of Cardinals responsible for selecting a new Church leader while trying to uncover a secret from the late Pontiff.

Title: STZ
Description: When three scientist launch a bio attack on a bus full of hot girls they create sex crazed zombies wreaking havoc on a small town.

Title: Russian Dolls
Description: Five years after their summer together in Barcelona, Xavier, William, Wendy, Martine and Isabelle reunite.

Title: Long Weekend
Description: When a suburban couple go camping for the weekend at a remote beach, they discover that nature isn't in an accommodating mood.

Title: Tagaru Palya
Description: Revolve around the essence of rural life and how the villagers cook food on the temple premises and serve it to the devotees.

Title: Satan's Little Helper
Description: A naive young boy unknowingly becomes the pawn of a serial killer.

Title: Lassie
Description: A family in financial crisis is forced to sell Lassie, their beloved dog. Hundreds of miles away from her true family, Lassie escapes and sets out on a journey home.

Title: Family Business
Description: An ex professor offers Adam $1,000,000 to "get" some plasma from a high tech company's lab. Adam asks his criminal grandpa for help. Can they convince Adam's now honest dad to join?

Title: The Trouble with Terkel
Description: Terkel is an average teenager whose life takes a turn for the worse when a girl who had a crush on him kills herself and an unknown maniac starts stalking him.

Title: Grizzly
Description: An eighteen-foot-tall grizzly bear terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a Park Ranger to save the day.

Title: Infernal Affairs II
Description: In this prequel to Mou gaan dou (2002), Chan Wing Yan has just become an undercover cop in the triads while Lau Kin Ming joins the police force. Both the triads and the police find an enemy in a rival crime boss.

Title: My Heart Can't Beat Unless You Tell It To
Description: Two mysterious siblings find themselves at odds over care for their frail and sickly younger brother.

Title: Call Me
Description: A journalist agrees to meet an obscene caller at a bar, and ends up witnessing a murder.

Title: Rocket Science
Description: Looking for answers to life's big questions, a stuttering boy joins his high school debate team.

Title: Éducation anglaise
Description: After losing both her parents, young Sylvie is enrolled in a strict and sadistic boarding school by her uncaring ward.

Title: The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia
Description: A small-town stud wants to go to Nashville to be a big country star. His ambitious kid sister works as his manager. Their dream hits jeopardy when they cross paths with a small-town sheriff.

Title: Love's Labour's Lost
Description: An update of the classic Shakespeare story, director Kenneth Branagh shot the film like a classic 1930s musical. It tells the story of four best friends who swear off love.

Title: Kindergarten
Description: The movie focuses on the marriage of Graciela and Arturo, who operate a kindergarten in their mansion.

Title: Good
Description: John Halder, a German literature professor in the 1930s, is initially reluctant to accept the ideas of the Nazi Party. He is pulled in different emotional directions by his wife, his mother, his mistress, and a Jewish friend.

Title: Satan's Slave
Description: A woman traveling with her parents to her uncle's house crash near his house. Her parents die but she survives. She stays with her uncle, but it becomes clear that he and his son are planning something sinister for her.

Title: The Cabbage Soup
Description: 2 buddy farmers are visited by aliens who like their domestic cabbage soup.

Title: The Drowning Pool
Description: Harper's a big-city PI, who travels to Louisiana to help an old girlfriend who's worried her husband will find out she's been cheating on him.

Title: Born Yesterday
Description: A tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette, with unexpected results.

Title: Retribution
Description: A banker and his kids are held hostage in their own speeding car by a bomb-making extortionist.

Title: Saranjana: Kota Ghaib
Description: When Sitha, the lead singer of a famous band goes missing, the band goes on a search, finding out that Sitha is in Saranjana, a supernatural city, and to bring her back they must find a portal through an adventure of mystical events.

Title: Jalla! Jalla!
Description: Roro, a foreign worker in Swedish parks, loves his girlfriend and wants to marry her, but he is about to marry another girl to prevent her from being sent back to her homeland, Lebanon. Meanwhile, Roro's best friend Måns has serious problems getting an erection.

Title: The Brothers McMullen
Description: Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.

Title: Alice
Description: Alice, a happy and perfect wife and mother, has her life turned upside down when she discovers her husband is living a secret life.

Title: Six Years Gone
Description: Six years ago, single mother Carrie Dawson suffered every parent's worst nightmare. Now she seeks redemption.

Title: The Nowhere Inn
Description: St. Vincent sets out to make a documentary about her music, but when she hires a close friend to direct, notions of reality, identity, and authenticity grow increasingly distorted and bizarre.

Title: Attack on Titan
Description: Titan rebels attack Earthlings, preventing them from obtaining sustainable H2O reserves from its inhabitants.

Title: White Nights
Description: A humble clerk courts a woman who awaits her lover's return night after night.

Title: 200 Pounds Beauty
Description: A talented but obese girl, who ghost-sings for a not-so-talented pop star, undergoes extensive plastic surgery to become a slender beauty with a new identity.

Title: Drunk Parents
Description: Two drunk parents attempt to hide their ever increasing financial difficulties from their daughter and social circle through elaborate neighborhood schemes.

Title: Ilsa the Tigress of Siberia
Description: In 1953, nestled deep in the unforgiving Siberian tundra, the Stalinist Gulag 14 is a purgatory under the command of the brutally seductive tormentor, Ilsa. More than two decades later, the camp's sole survivor still thirsts for revenge.

Title: Fanfic
Description: Two high school students form an intense connection as they navigate the challenges of discovering and expressing their truest selves.

Title: Swinging Wives
Description: An obsessed reporter interviews several Average-Joes who have encountered strange situations when meeting seductive married women. House calls will never be the same again when sexually repressed wives get turned on.

Title: How to Be a Player
Description: A playboy gets the tables turned on him when a party is arranged with all of the women he has been two-timing are in attendance.

Title: The Other Me
Description: A professor of criminology tries to solve five completely unrelated murders whose only link is quotes from Pythagoras.

Title: The Truth About Charlie
Description: A woman returns from holiday to find her husband has been murdered, and several groups of people are pressuring her to unravel the mystery of his true identity and activities during his final days.

Title: Desert Flower
Description: Waris Dirie, born 1965 in Somalia, flees at thirteen when sold to be a mans fourth wife. She works as a maid at the Somalian embassy in London, then in a McDonald's where she's discovered and becomes an international top model. Then, in 1997 she speaks up against female genital mutilation.

Title: Happy Endings
Description: Happy Endings weaves multiple stories to create a witty look at love, family and the sheer unpredictability of life itself.

Title: Ma ma
Description: In the aftermath of a tragedy a woman, Magda, reacts with a surge of newfound life that engulfs her circle of family and friends.

Title: The Big Trail
Description: Breck Coleman leads hundreds of settlers in covered wagons from the Mississippi River to their destiny out West.

Title: The Stone Angel
Description: A 90-year-old woman, rapidly losing her memory and knowing that sooner or later her life will be over, returns to the Manitoba farmhouse she grew up in to try and make peace with her dysfunctional family.

Title: Martin
Description: A journey of a man discovering himself, finding love and fighting for his motherland. Can he hold the fort on all three gates?

Title: Shottas
Description: Wayne and Biggs grow up together on the tough and dangerous streets of Kingston, Jamaica. Eventually moving to Miami, they begin a ruthless climb to the top of a criminal enterprise as they aggressively take control of the Jamaican mob.

Title: Kira & El Gin
Description: Two men team up to fight against British occupation in Egypt during the 1919 revolution.

Title: Space Station 76
Description: A 1970s version of the future, where personalities and asteroids collide.

Title: Ashes and Diamonds
Description: As WWII and the German occupation ends, the Polish resistance and the Russian forces turn on each other in an attempt to take over leadership in Communist Poland.

Title: Monsieur Lazhar
Description: At a Montréal public grade school, an Algerian immigrant is hired to replace a popular teacher who committed suicide in her classroom. While helping his students deal with their grief, his own recent loss is revealed.

Title: Padre Pio
Description: An investigative journey into the life of Padre Pio, an Italian mystic who defied explanation, blending sainthood's devotion with modern celebrity's allure.

Title: One More Chance
Description: A pathological gambler who finds a way to connect with his autistic son.

Title: Stranger Things
Description: An unusual and touching bond develops when grieving Oona reaches out to a mysterious homeless man, offering him a place to stay in her garden shed.

Title: Def by Temptation
Description: An evil succubus is preying on libidinous black men in New York City, and all that stands in her way is a minister-in-training, an aspiring actor, and a cop who specializes in cases involving the supernatural.

Title: National Theatre Live: The Seagull
Description: The Seagull is a filmed performance of the play by Anton Chekhov, in a new version by Anya Reiss, in which a woman leaves Moscow to visit her terminally ill brother.

Title: Vampires of the Velvet Lounge
Description: As they are locked in a battle with a deadly foe in this twisted fairy tale, a coven of vampires struggles to come to terms with the modern world and their own mortality.

Title: S.F.W.
Description: An alienated and misanthropic teenager gains sudden and unwanted celebrity status after he's taken hostage by terrorists where his indifference to their threats to kill him makes news headlines.

Title: The Hills Have Eyes Part II
Description: A group of bikers, heading to a race, become stranded in the desert and find themselves fighting off a family of inbred cannibals who live off the land.

Title: Woo
Description: Gorgeous and extravert Woo meets insecure and straight-laced law clerk Tim at a blind date.

Title: Paganini
Description: A biography of Italian violinist Niccolò Paganini.

Title: The Three Lives of Thomasina
Description: Thomasina the cat brings a family together, through her mysterious death and reappearance.

Title: Murder Syndicate
Description: When the matriarch of a family of assassins falls ill, her three children and younger boyfriend fight among themselves to take over her empire.

Title: Drop Dead Sexy
Description: When their money scam runs aground, a group of would-be thieves turn to kidnapping in an attempt to blackmail their target.

Title: Operation Mad Ball
Description: In post-WWII France, U.S. Army hospital Private Hogan and Captain Lock try to outwit each other on issues such as wooing pretty nurses, accounting for missing medical supplies, organizing unauthorized dances, and influencing their C.O.

Title: Sunod
Description: A woman who is desperate to find the cure for her daughter's illness takes a job at a call center, only to be haunted by the ghost in it.

Title: Terror Train 2
Description: The remaining survivors are coerced to take a New Year's Eve redemption ride on the very same train, where a new evil awaits and the terrified passengers must once again fight to survive the ride.

Title: Bellbottom
Description: When an Indian commercial airliner is hijacked by terrorists in the mid 1980s, a government agent is tasked with rescuing the 210 hostages.

Title: Week-End in Havana
Description: Nan Spencer is on a boat bound for Havana which runs aground. The man sent to rescue her is engaged and she doesn't understand his disinterest. Monte Blanca is interested, to the annoyance of his girlfriend.

Title: The Mimic
Description: The Jangsan Tiger, who mimics human voices to lure them close, encounters a family affected by the creature.

Title: Prevenge
Description: Widow Ruth is seven months pregnant when, believing herself to be guided by her unborn baby, she embarks on a homicidal rampage, dispatching anyone who stands in her way.

Title: Jolly LLB
Description: Wanting to earn fame and fortune, a small time lawyer files a PIL for an infamous hit-and-run, and thus learns what it really is like to be a lawyer.

Title: Longest Third Date
Description: When Matt and Khani match on Hinge, sparks fly. They spontaneously fly to Costa Rica for their third date - and get stuck as the world shuts down in March 2020. An extended stay in paradise becomes the ultimate test of compatibility.

Title: Rustom
Description: A naval officer returns home to find out about his wife's affair. Soon, he surrenders after murdering the lover but as the case unfolds, it starts to reveal his hidden intention.

Title: Slashlorette Party
Description: A bride-to-be is taken to a woodland cabin for a bachelorette party, but the fun stops when an uninvited party starts cutting down the guest list.

Title: The Accursed
Description: Elly is asked by a family friend (Mena Suvari) to look after an elderly woman (Meg Foster) living in a remote cabin for a few days. She agrees, but soon discovers there is a demon hiding in the woman just waiting to break free.

Title: The Forest of Love
Description: A small group of student filmmakers and a shy young girl with strict parents are simultaneously manipulated, seduced and abused by an older man. They follow his bidding, even when murder is involved.

Title: Fukrey Returns
Description: Just out of jail, a don is ready to get back at the four friends who conned her.

Title: The Testament of Dr. Mabuse
Description: A criminal mastermind uses hypnosis to rule the rackets after death.

Title: The Devil's Violinist
Description: 19th Century violinist and composer Niccolò Paganini incurs the wrath of his diabolical manager while preparing for his debut performance in London, and falling for the daughter of an English impresario.

Title: Bad Class
Description: Ji-woon has a bad impression of men because of her father, but her mother convinces her to pay tuition to an art student, Jung-woo. He is surprised by her coolness, but at the same time there are tensions between them.

Title: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Knapsack Kid
Description: It's March, and there's only one month left in the third semester. Sakuta Azusagawa attended the graduation ceremony of his girlfriend Mai Sakurajima. As he waits for Mai on the shore of Shichirigahama, an elementary school student who looks just like Mai from her childhood days appears in front of him. "Uncle, who is it?" Is this a dream or a vision?Sakuta is reminiscing about his mysterious experience when he receives a phone call from his father. "It's about my mother. She said she wanted to meet Kaede". It was a wish to "see her" from Kaede's mother, who had been hospitalized for a long time because she could not fully accept what had happened to her. In response to his mother's wishes, he decides to meet her mother with Kaede, but he cannot hide his nervousness at the opportunity to meet her for the first time in a while. An unfamiliar scar appears on Sakuta's body. Is this a harbinger of a new adolescent syndrome?

Title: The Land
Description: Jeremy and Neets have a happy marriage and successful careers, but their lives are turned upside down when Simon returns and wants to confess to a rape they committed at university 20 years prior.

Title: Get Duked!
Description: An anarchic, hip-hop inspired comedy that follows four city boys on a wilderness trek as they try to escape a mysterious huntsman.

Title: Cleanskin
Description: A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

Title: The Moth Diaries
Description: Rebecca is suspicious of Ernessa, the new arrival at her boarding school. But is Rebecca just jealous of Ernessa's bond with Lucie, or does the new girl truly possess a dark secret?

Title: Lonelyhearts
Description: Eager for a job, journalist Adam White accepts the lowly position of columnist for the advice-giving section of the Chronicle but he often clashes with his cynical editor, Shrike.

Title: Resident Evil: Degeneration
Description: Leon S. Kennedy and Claire Redfield must battle a rogue warrior seeking revenge after unleashing the deadly G-Virus, whilst a mutated monster goes on a rampage.

Title: Every Note Played
Description: When a piano virtuoso is diagnosed with ALS, his estranged ex-wife takes up the cross of caring for him, and he is forced to balance reconciling his failed relationships with redefining his pursuit of greatness.

Title: There's No Business Like Show Business
Description: Molly and Terry Donahue, plus their three children, are The Five Donahues. Son Tim meets hat-check girl Vicky and the family act begins to fall apart.

Title: Carmen
Description: A group of flamenco dancers are rehearsing a very Spanish version of Bizet's dramatization of Prosper Merimee's novella Carmen. The choreographer Antonio falls in love with Carmen, the main dancer. Their story then turns similar to the play.

Title: Lady Bloodfight
Description: Upon arriving in Hong Kong, an American woman is beaten up and mugged by thugs. She's taken in by a martial arts master who trains her for a formidable fight competition known as the Kumite.

Title: The Body
Description: When the body of a powerful businesswoman disappears from the morgue, the inspector in charge hunts for the truth. But when he questions her husband he realizes that there is much more to the case than meets the eye.

Title: The World Unseen
Description: A drama centered on two women who engage in a dangerous relationship during South Africa's apartheid era.

Title: The Passionate Friends
Description: A woman meets a man whose love she rejected years ago.

Title: A Soldier's Revenge
Description: Haunted by wartime horrors, Civil War soldier-turned-bounty-hunter Frank Connor spends his time post-war polishing off two things: whiskey and fugitives.

Title: Edge of Winter
Description: When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat.

Title: The Assassination of Richard Nixon
Description: Based on real life events, Assassination is set in 1974 and centers on a businessman who decides to take extreme measures to achieve his American dream.

Title: Septembers of Shiraz
Description: Prior to the Iranian revolution it was a place where people of all religions were allowed to flourish. This is the story of a prosperous Jewish family who abandon everything before they are consumed by the passions of revolutionaries.

Title: Ziegfeld Girl
Description: In the 1920s, three women become performers in the renowned Broadway show the Ziegfeld Follies, where they find fame, love, and tragedy.

Title: The Belles of St. Trinian's
Description: The schoolgirls of St. Trinian's are more interested in racing forms than books; as they try to get rich quick, they are abetted by the headmistress' brother.

Title: The Phenom
Description: A rookie pitcher undergoes psychotherapy to overcome the yips.

Title: The Horror of Party Beach
Description: Sea creatures created from radioactive sludge terrorize a beach community.

Title: Samba
Description: Senegalese Samba has worked 10 years in France. He's arrested and befriends the woman helping him with legal matters as volunteer after a burnout at work. He's released after being told to leave France. Chemistry?

Title: The Haunting of Julia
Description: After her daughter's death, wealthy American homemaker Julia Lofting moves to London to restart her life. All seems well until she is haunted by the ghosts of other children while mourning for her own.

Title: Among the Beasts
Description: When a gangster's daughter reluctantly teams with a former Marine to find her kidnapped cousin, the combat veteran must overcome his own demons in order to rescue the child.

Title: Asher
Description: An aging hitman's last job goes sideways, forcing him to redeem himself.

Title: The Canyon
Description: A survival story about a honeymooning couple who get lost in the wide expanse of the Grand Canyon.

Title: God's Little Acre
Description: In the 1950s, a poor Georgia cotton farmer and his sons search for the gold presumably buried on the farm by their great-grandfather, but problems related to poverty, infidelity, unemployment, and booze threaten to destroy their family.

Title: I Love America
Description: A single woman who decides to take a chance on love again by catapulting her life from Paris to Los Angeles. From awkward dates to touching surprise encounters, she understands the journey to love is a journey towards herself.

Title: Leprechaun Returns
Description: The Leprechaun returns once again, when a group of girls unwillingly awaken him after they tear down a cabin so that they can build a new sorority house.

Title: Brotherhood
Description: Sam is facing up to the new world. He realizes it also comes with new problems and new challenges and which will require old friends to help him survive new dangers.

Title: Suburban Secrets
Description: Laura, a famous nude model, returns to her small-town home when she learns that her old boyfriend is having a relationship with her aunt.

Title: Darby and the Dead
Description: Darby Harper was granted the ability to see ghosts after suffering a near death experience in her childhood. She runs a side business counseling local spirits in her spare time.

Title: Babysitter
Description: After a sexist joke goes viral, Cédric loses his job and embarks on a therapeutic journey to free himself from sexism and misogyny. He and his girlfriend hire a mysterious and liberated babysitter to help shake things up.

Title: The Thrill of It All
Description: A homemaker's sudden rise to fame as a soap spokesperson leads to chaos in her home life.

Title: Sex Cowboys
Description: Marla and Simone are madly in love and have a very passionate relationship. They are also struggling to get by and are unable to pay the rent. In desperation they decide to make porn videos.

Title: Our Season
Description: A fantasy drama about the miraculous moment of a mother coming down from the Heavens on a 3-day vacation and staying beside her daughter.

Title: Muhammad: The Messenger of God
Description: The events, trials and tribulations of the city of Makkah in 7th century AD.

Title: Empire of Lust
Description: The love and betrayal, loyalty and revenge, amongst the first prince's hardships during the confusion of the establishment of the Joseon, after the fall of Koryeo.

Title: Mad
Description: Set in an engineering college and revolves around the antics of the students there, primarily the boys, who get a kick out of torturing the hostel warden.

Title: Truth
Description: A suspenseful, psychological thriller, "Truth" exposes the hidden demons buried deep inside each and every one of us. After a chance encounter over the Internet, Caleb, who suffers from borderline personality disorder, meets and falls head over heels for Jeremy, and soon the line between love and lies blur. Struggling to keep his past a secret, including his mentally ill mother, Caleb slowly succumbs to his darker side. A sudden turn of events finds Jeremy held captive, until Caleb's quest for the truth be revealed.

Title: Scorpio
Description: During the Cold War, the CIA orders free-lance operative Scorpio to assassinate his former CIA mentor Cross and a deadly cat-and-mouse game ensues.

Title: Submarino
Description: Two brothers meet at their mother's funeral, each in his way on a path of self-destruction, both haunted by a tragedy in their youth.

Title: The More the Merrier
Description: During the World War II housing shortage in Washington, two men and a woman share a single apartment and the older man plays Cupid to the other two.

Title: March or Die
Description: During the 1920s, French Foreign Legion Major William Foster's (Gene Hackman's) unit is protecting an archaeological dig, but the discovery of an Arab sacred burial site prompts the angry Arab tribes to attack Foster's small garrison.

Title: Something for the Boys
Description: The oddly-assorted Hart cousins--revue singer Blossom, con man Harry and machinist Chiquita (who gets radio through her teeth!)--inherit Southern plantation Magnolia Manor, which alas proves to be a "termite trap" and tax liability. Fortunately, Sgt. Rocky Fulton from a nearby army camp appears with a plan to convert the place into a hotel for Army wives but to pay bills until then, they decide to put on a show. Of course, romantic and military complications intervene.

Title: Music Box
Description: A lawyer defends her father accused of war crimes, but there is more to the case than she suspects.

Title: Capturing the Killer Nurse
Description: This documentary reveals how investigators proved ICU nurse Charles Cullen was killing patients — and how close he came to getting away with murder.

Title: Results
Description: Two mismatched personal trainers' lives are upended by the actions of a new, wealthy client.

Title: Bulletproof 2
Description: Set 25 years after, Jack is now working as a Special Agent with a mission to take down a powerful South African crime family. The officer begrudgingly goes undercover once again, this time taking the identity of Moses.

Title: Posse
Description: In 1898 Cuba, five Buffalo Soldiers find a gold cache, desert and return to America where they help defend a black town from the KKK, all the while trying to avoid capture by lawmen and military authorities alike.

Title: Summer Night
Description: A coming-of-age story about the complexities of young romantic relationships.

Title: Música
Description: Follows a young man, plagued by the music in his head, who has to come to terms with an uncertain future while balancing love, family and Brazilian culture in Newark, New Jersey.

Title: April 9th
Description: On April 9, 1940 Germany invaded Denmark. Based on real events - in Southern Jutland a military unit on bicycles was sent south to help hold back the Germans until reinforcement.

Title: The Sasquatch Gang
Description: Young fantasy and science fiction aficionado Gavin Gore and his friends stumble onto some huge footprints in the woods. A local cop, reporter, and a renowned Sasquatch authority investigate, while two of Gavin's dim-witted neighbors hatch a scheme to profit from the situation.

Title: Double Trouble
Description: Muscle-bound twins try to smash a jewel smuggling ring.

Title: WarHunt
Description: A US Army plane flies over Germany's Black Forest in 1945. It's suddenly enveloped by a swarm of crow feathers. As the aircraft plummets toward the ground, the AIRMEN glimpse the feathers converging to form a MYSTERIOUS WOMAN IN BLACK.

Title: The Party 2
Description: Vulnerable and impressionable teenage girl continues to experience sorrows and joys of adult life.

Title: The Girl King
Description: THE GIRL KING paints a portrait of the brilliant, extravagant Kristina of Sweden, queen from age six, who fights the conservative forces that are against her ideas to modernize Sweden and who have no tolerance for her awakening sexuality.

Title: Virgin Mountain
Description: Fusi, a 43 year old man, still lives with his mother. His daily life is characterized by monotonous routine. The appearance of vibrant Sjöfn and young neighbour Hera will upset his old bachelor habits.

Title: The Billion Dollar Spy
Description: The true story of a man who became the Pentagon's most valuable spy during the last years of the Cold War.

Title: O'Dessa
Description: A farm girl in search to recover a cherished family heirloom. She travels to a strange and dangerous city where she meets her one true love. To save his soul, she must put the power of destiny to the ultimate test.

Title: Thread: An Insidious Tale
Description: Plot under wraps.

Title: Mad City
Description: A distraught man inadvertently takes a group of children hostage in a museum while a hungry, seasoned reporter tries to resurrect his career covering the story.

Title: Glen or Glenda
Description: A psychiatrist tells the stories of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda) and a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).

Title: Kappa Kappa Die
Description: After Shauna's older sister dies rushing Kappa Kappa Phi, she joins the same sorority to find out what really happened. What she discovers are sinister secrets and an evil spirit out for gallons and gallons of blood. Can Shauna and her new sisters make it out of their haunted sorority house alive?

Title: Pure Grit
Description: Growing up queer on Wyoming's Wind River reservation, Sharmaine Weed has faced more than her share of troubles-but her love of extreme bareback horse racing has sustained her throughout. A ten-time undefeated champion until she's forced to give up racing to care for her sister after a horse racing accident, Sharmaine finds solace and support in her burgeoning relationship with Savannah, a sparkling city girl who moves to the rez to help her care for her family. When the two young women decide relocate to the city to escape the increasingly toxic atmosphere at home, Sharmaine finally earns enough cash to realize her dream of buying a horse of her own and begins plotting her racing comeback. But the path we choose doesn't always take us where we want to go... as Sharmaine and Savannah soon discover. Filmed over the course of three years in the breathtaking Wyoming landscape, this affecting documentary from Kim Bartley (The Revolution Will Not Be Televised) is an exuberant tale of love, loss, and resilience among the Native American community.

Title: Women's Prison Massacre
Description: Four escaped male convicts seize control of a women's prison and proceed to terrorize the inmates, one of whom is reporter Emanuelle, incarcerated on trumped-up charges.

Title: Felidae
Description: A cat must investigate brutal murders of other cats in a neighborhood he has moved into with his owner.

Title: Scout's Honor: The Secret Files of the Boy Scouts of America
Description: Survivors, whistle-blowers and experts recount the Boy Scouts of America's decades long cover-up of sexual abuse cases and its heartbreaking impact.

Title: Kafka
Description: Kafka works during the day at an insurance company, where events lead him to discover a mysterious underground society with strange suppressive goals.

Title: The Rebellious
Description: Félix is the manager of a luxurious Parisian hotel and during the first lockdown in March 2020, decides to start a clandestine business. He employs young escorts to cater to a handful of privileged clients who seek refuge in his palace of lust, on a mission to forget the deadly pandemic that is taking hold of the outside world. In a twisted story of complicity, a community of rebels is formed.

Title: Rock Around the Clock
Description: A frustrated big-band promoter bumps into rock-and-rollers Bill Haley and the Comets.

Title: Clown Motel
Description: When Alma returns home to help her family get their Native American heritage recognized, all she finds is the World-Famous Clown Motel that has been erected on their land.

Title: Shall We Dance?
Description: A successful but unhappy Japanese accountant finds the missing passion in his life when he begins to secretly take ballroom dance lessons.

Title: Villain
Description: Eddie Franks is a former criminal who attempts to help his family by reconnecting with his daughter and clearing his brother's debt. Despite his efforts, he is drawn back into a criminal way of life, with devastating consequences.

Title: The Sun Also Rises
Description: A group of disillusioned American expatriate writers live a dissolute, hedonistic lifestyle in 1920s France and Spain.

Title: The Aviary
Description: Two women flee into the New Mexican desert to escape the clutches of an insidious cult. Consumed by fear and paranoia, they can't shake the feeling that they are being followed by its leader, a man as seductive as he is controlling. With their supplies dwindling and their senses starting to fail them, they are faced with a horrifying question: how do you run from an enemy who lives inside your head?

Title: End of the Spear
Description: Two people come to the end of a spear in order to realize that the divisions between them are not real.

Title: Honeydew
Description: Strange cravings and hallucinations befall a young couple after seeking shelter in the home of an aging farmer and her peculiar son.

Title: Medea
Description: After his quest to retrieve the fabled Golden Fleece, Jason returns to Greece with powerful sorceress Medea. However, when the king banishes her, it's only human that Medea plots her furious revenge. Can they escape her wrath?

Title: Tom Thumb
Description: A boy (Russ Tamblyn), no bigger than a thumb, manages to outwit two thieves (Terry-Thomas and Peter Sellers) determined to make a fortune from him.

Title: That Most Important Thing: Love
Description: Servais Mont, a photographer, meets Nadine Chevalier who earns her money starring in cheap soft-core movies. Trying to help her, he borrows the money from the loan sharks to finance the theatrical production of 'Richard III' and gives Nadine a part. Nadine is torn apart between Servais, for whom she is falling in love, and her husband Jacques, to whom she has moral obligations.

Title: Fat Slags
Description: The Fat Slags from Viz hit the big time and become celebrities.

Title: Kabuliwala
Description: Set in the bustling city of Kolkata in 1965, the film revolves around the heartwarming connection between Rahmat, a middle-aged Afghan man and Mini, a little girl.

Title: White Snake
Description: A love story between a snake spirit and a snake hunter.

Title: The Wish of the Fairy Fish
Description: If you go fishing, be prepared to draw the fish of your dreams, the magical Pike, which can grant any three wishes. Only Emelya let two wishes down the drain, and decided to save the third. Therefore, in order to achieve the hand of the royal daughter Anfisa, he will have to act without magical power, on his own. And Pike will help him, who without her skin will appear as an ordinary girl Vasilisa.

Title: Please Don't Eat the Daisies
Description: Drama professor turned theater critic balances his home life and career when he moves to the country with his wife and their four sons.

Title: Guns, Girls and Gambling
Description: 5 Elvis impersonators stay long after the contest playing poker, when a valuable mask is stolen from the Indian casino. Killers, incl. a sexy, blonde assassin, hunt down the Elvises to get the mask.

Title: The 27th Day
Description: Aliens take five people, give them small capsules which can kill mankind without additional damage, with the understanding they will colonize Earth only if they use the weapons.

Title: Fatal Instinct
Description: A cop who moonlights as a lawyer cheats on his wife, not knowing that she's cheating on him and plans to kill him for the insurance.

Title: Crazy Beautiful You
Description: A spoiled young girl is forced to tag along with her mom on a medical mission in Tarlac. There she meets a young man from a different world who shows her another side of life.

Title: Thabo and the Rhino Case
Description: Thabo (11) wants to become a private detective. If only his home, the small African village, was not the most peaceful Savannah paradise. But things take a sudden turn when a rhino is murdered in the safari park because of its horn.

Title: 13 Fanboy
Description: An obsessed fan stalks his favorite actors from the Friday the 13th films and beyond, mirroring his idol Jason Voorhees.

Title: 14 Phere
Description: Sanjay, a Rajput from Jahanabad, is in love with Aditi, a Jat from Jaipur. They want to get married, but don't want to hurt their families. So they plan to get married by arranging a fake set of parents. Will they succeed?

Title: Dragon
Description: A papermaker gets involved with a murder case concerning two criminals leading to a determined detective suspecting him and the former's vicious father searching for him.

Title: Calm Like a Bomb
Description: Determined to take revenge for the murder of his girlfriend, a man targets the three men responsible over the course of a single night.

Title: Sand Sharks
Description: The residents of a small town team up to kill a group of evolved sharks that can swim in sand, and are terrorizing local beaches.

Title: Five Minutes of Heaven
Description: The story of former UVF member Alistair Little. Twenty-five years after Little killed Joe Griffen's brother, the media arrange an auspicious meeting between the two.

Title: Harem Suare
Description: In Constantinople in the early 1900's, a young woman is brought into the sultan's harem and she manages to become his favorite. But the love she begins to feel for a eunuch ventures the outcome of her plan.

Title: The Intruders
Description: After the traumatic loss of her mother, a teenaged girl tries to uncover the dark secrets behind her new home, in spite of her father's disbelief.

Title: The Bridge
Description: In 1945, Germany is being overrun, and nobody is left to fight but teenagers.

Title: A Kiss Before Dying
Description: A determined student murders his pregnant secret girlfriend and moves onto her twin sister who gradually becomes suspicious of her new lover.

Title: Ode to My Father
Description: Amid the time of Korean War, a young boy's vow to take care of his family marked the beginning of a lifelong promise spanning 60 years.

Title: It Feels So Good
Description: Kenji returns to Akita to attend his old squeeze's wedding and Naoko proposes they have sex again, marking a new beginning.

Title: Carmen
Description: In a small Mediterranean village, Carmen has looked after her brother, the local priest, for her entire life. When the Church abandons Carmen, she is mistaken for the new priest. Carmen begins to see the world, and herself, in a new light.

Title: The Cardinal
Description: A young Catholic priest from Boston confronts bigotry, Nazism, and his own personal conflicts as he rises to the office of cardinal.

Title: The Killing Gene
Description: A calculating killer coerces a detective to pay for his previous mistakes.

Title: Artie Shaw: Time Is All You've Got
Description: Documentary cataloging the life and music of the band leader and clarinetist, Artie Shaw.

Title: Confidential Report
Description: An elusive billionaire hires an American smuggler to investigate his past, leading to a dizzying descent into a cold-war European landscape.

Title: The Breaks
Description: Adopted by a black family in L.A., Derrick grows up an Irish white boy who thinks he's black! When his mother catches him romantically entangled with a woman on her couch, he's thrown out with an ultimatum. In HD.

Title: The Three Faces of Eve
Description: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.

Title: Ambrosia
Description: A beautiful and talented fashion designer's excitement in landing a dream job is complicated when her new boss takes more than a professional interest in her, which makes her question her own values, threatens her marriage, and forces her to make a life-changing decision.

Title: Critical Zone
Description: A man driving through Tehran's underworld with his dog, dealing drugs and healing troubled souls.

Title: Baby Cat
Description: When Dana moves into her new apartment she falls in love with the building's cat but the cat is actually an adult woman in a costume.

Title: Salyut-7
Description: USSR, June 1985. Based on actual events. After contact with the Salyut 7 space station is lost, cosmonauts Vladimir Dzhanibekov and Viktor Savinykh dock with the empty, frozen craft, and bring her back to life.

Title: Orpheus
Description: A poet in love with Death follows his unhappy wife into the underworld.

Title: Better Living Through Chemistry
Description: Douglas leads a simple and uneventful existence as a pharmacist in a small town.

Title: Belzebuth
Description: After a personal tragedy, a police detective investigates a school massacre committed by a student - and another massacre. Are the 3 tragedies linked to demon possession?

Title: The Mountain
Description: The heroic story of two soldiers trapped in an ambush, fighting for their lives.

Title: Let's Do It Again
Description: Two Atlanta men raise funds for their charity by rigging boxing matches in New Orleans, but their tricks attract the mob's attention.

Title: Rabid Dogs
Description: Following a bungled robbery, three violent criminals take a young woman, a middle-aged man, and a child hostage and force them to drive them outside Rome to help them make a clean escape.

Title: Holly Slept Over
Description: This unconventional comedy follows the relationship struggles of a married couple trying to conceive, their friends who have lost their spark, and the tension that ensues when an old college roommate stays over for the weekend.

Title: The Undertaker
Description: An undertaker makes the wrong choice at a moral crossroads as he is made to dispose of the victims of a gangster's power grab.

Title: Executive Action
Description: Rogue intelligence agents, right-wing politicians, greedy capitalists, and free-lance assassins plot and carry out the JFK assassination.

Title: Queen Christina
Description: Queen Christina of Sweden is a popular monarch who is loyal to her country. However, when she falls in love with a Spanish envoy, she must choose between the throne and the man she loves.

Title: Expensive Candy
Description: Candy is a sex worker. A poor teacher, Toto (Carlo Aquino), falls in love with her and she becomes his motivation to work hard.

Title: Evil Laugh
Description: A group of Med students fix up an old house over a weekend. Where a mass murder occurred 10 years earlier. Mayhem ensues.

Title: The MacKintosh Man
Description: A member of British Intelligence assumes a fictitious criminal identity and allows himself to be caught, imprisoned, and freed in order to infiltrate a spy organization and expose a traitor.

Title: The Fire That Took Her
Description: The case of Judy Malinowski, a young mother who suffered debilitating burns after being set on fire by a man she had dated.

Title: No Smoking
Description: A heavily addicted smoker is unprepared for the true price he must pay when he asks a guru's help to kick the habit.

Title: No Hard Feelings
Description: Second-generation Irani-German Parvis works at a refugee shelter where he meets brother and sister Irani refugees and develops a tenuous romance with Amon as his friends attempt refugee status.

Title: The Taste of Tea
Description: A spell of time of a rural family's slightly surreal life.

Title: Life Stinks
Description: A filthy rich businessman bets a corporate rival that he can live on the streets of L.A. without the comforts of home or money, which proves to be tougher than he thought.

Title: Oedipus orca
Description: After her harrowing kidnap ordeal in Snatch (1976), Alice tries to return to her normal life, but her memories still haunt her twisting her psyche even further as no one realizes that she's in need of some serious help.

Title: Bikini Hackers
Description: A group of women hatch a plan to take down the top global financial systems.

Title: Field of Lost Shoes
Description: A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley.

Title: I Melt with You
Description: When four 40-something college friends meet up for their annual reunion, things start to spiral out of control, and a pact they made as young men is revisited.

Title: Django, Prepare a Coffin
Description: A gunfighter forms a gang of "deceased" execution victims to get revenge on the politician and outlaw who killed his wife.

Title: The Enormity of Life
Description: After a failed suicide attempt, a man receives a substantial inheritance from a long lost relative and meets a struggling single mom with an eccentric young daughter. Together they embark on a journey of self discovery and healing.

Title: Roe v. Wade
Description: Dr. Bernard Nathanson and Dr. Mildred Jefferson square off in a national battle in this untold conspiracy that led to the most famous and controversial court case in history.

Title: It
Description: A salesgirl pursues a handsome playboy.

Title: Walking My Baby Back Home
Description: World War II veteran Clarence "Jigger" Millard forms a band with several other former GIs. The band fails to take off and he is forced to join a minstrel show headed by Colonel Wallace. He soon falls for Wallace's niece Chris Hall.

Title: The Old Gun
Description: During World War II, a peaceful French surgeon decides to ruthlessly exterminate an SS squad because of the atrocities they'd just committed in his countryside home and childhood village.

Title: Collection
Description: A grieving father grapples with the seedy, manipulative world of high stakes debt collection while struggling to shed the tragedies of his past. He'll find himself pitted against his best friend, his prodigy and his love.

Title: Sarkaru Vaari Paata
Description: After being conned by the woman he loves, a finance agent arrives in India from USA to retrieve his money from the woman's father who is a powerful MP and industrialist.

Title: The Mole Agent
Description: A private investigator in Chile hires someone to work as a mole at a retirement home where a client of his suspects the caretakers of elder abuse.

Title: American Tragedy
Description: Sue Klebold attempts to reconcile how the son she affectionately referred to as "Sunshine Boy" became a school shooter. "If love could have stopped Columbine," she says, "Columbine would never have happened.

Title: She's Lost Control
Description: The professional and personal life of a sexual surrogate begins to unravel when she starts working with a new client.

Title: The Skin of the Wolf
Description: A highlander that lives alone in the mountains buys a wife to relieve his loneliness.

Title: What Have You Done to Solange?
Description: A teacher who is having an affair with one of his students is reluctant to present an alibi when his lover witnesses the first in a series of murders connected to their school.

Title: The Objective
Description: A military special operations team, led by a CIA case officer, are on a mission in the harsh and hostile terrain of Afghanistan where they find themselves in a Middle Eastern "Bermuda Triangle" of ancient evil.
Twelve jurors must decide the fate of a Chechen adolescent charged with murdering his stepfather.

Title: Jesus' Son
Description: Based on the critically acclaimed book by Denis Johnson, a young man (Billy Crudup), often high on drugs and alcohol, careens through life and makes his way toward recovery and redemption.

Title: Kiss Me, Stupid
Description: Jealous piano teacher Orville Spooner sends his beautiful wife, Zelda, away for the night while he tries to sell a song to famous nightclub singer Dino, who is stranded in town.

Title: Judy Moody and the Not Bummer Summer
Description: Third grader Judy Moody sets out to have the most thrilling summer of her life.

Title: Cinderella's Hot Night
Description: A beautiful woman falls prey to her cruel, sex-crazed benefactor but receives help from a fairy.

Title: The Cake Eaters
Description: Two families are brought together by the return of one family's son -- a reunion that conjures up old ghosts and issues that must be addressed.

Title: Ladki: Enter the Girl Dragon
Description: The love triangle between the female, her boyfriend and her inspiration towards martial arts.

Title: Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai
Description: A young girl meets the doppelganger of her deceased boyfriend and now has a chance to find the people who have murdered him.

Title: Savior
Description: A hardened mercenary in the Foreign Legion begins to find his own humanity when confronted with atrocities during the fighting in Bosnia.

Title: Slaxx
Description: When a possessed pair of jeans begins to kill the staff of a trendy clothing store, it is up to Libby, an idealistic young salesclerk, to stop its bloody rampage.

Title: Shadows
Description: Cassavetes' jazz-scored improvisational film explores interracial friendships and relationships in Beat-Era (1950s) New York City.

Title: The Shrine
Description: Two female journalists and a photographer travel to Europe to investigate a series of mysterious disappearances, only to find themselves embroiled in a struggle against a kind of evil they never expected.

Title: Love, Kennedy
Description: A teenage girl copes with her diagnosis of terminal juvenile Batten Disease.

Title: T11 Incomplete
Description: A visiting home health aide and recovering alcoholic strives to rebuild her broken life, only to have it fall apart once again when she falls in love with her young, paraplegic patient, and betrays her trust.

Title: Streetwalkin'
Description: A high school dropout working as a street prostitute spends one night turning tricks and avoiding her emotionally unstable pimp who's starting to turn very violent.

Title: New Jersey Drive
Description: Jason and Midget are two young, black teenagers living in Newark,New Jersey, the unofficial car theft capital of the world. Their favourite pastime is that of everybody in their neighbourhood: stealing cars and joyriding. The trouble starts when they steal a police car and the cops launch a violent offensive that involves beating and even shooting suspects.

Title: The Broken Land
Description: A cowboy rides into a small town that is ruled with an iron fist by a corrupt Sheriff. He becomes involved with a pretty young town girl and some residents who are trying to oust the Sheriff, resulting in a robbery, a murder, and his being pursued by a vengeful posse.

Title: I Wish
Description: Twelve-year-old Koichi, who has been separated from his brother Ryunosuke due to his parents' divorce, hears a rumor that the new bullet trains will precipitate a wish-granting miracle when they pass each other at top speed.

Title: Amateur
Description: An amnesiac wakes up on an NYC alley. He meets Isabelle, an ex nun now erotic writer, at a diner and follows her home. She helps him find his identity. Then there's Sofia, the porn star.

Title: My Best Friend the Baby Snatcher
Description: Best friends become pregnant at the same time. However, when one of them suffers a miscarriage, jealousy turns her into a murderous baby snatcher.

Title: Phels High
Description: Loyalty amongst friends isn't always the case, when your life is on the line.

Title: Deathstalker IV: Match of Titans
Description: Deathstalker must defend his remaining comrades, his life, and his newfound love in the battle against an evil army of stone warriors and the wicked queen who created them.

Title: I Dream in Another Language
Description: When a language dies, a unique vision of the world is lost forever.

Title: The Nana Project
Description: Follows Helen "Nana" Lewis, a feisty chess master, and her grandsons, as they embark on a road trip to support her rise to state championships.

Title: Gold
Description: In the summer of 1898, a small group of German compatriots head into the hostile northern interior of British Columbia in search for gold at the height of the Klondike Gold Rush.

Title: Magic Camp
Description: At the urging of his former mentor and Magic Camp owner Roy Preston, Andy returns as a counselor to the camp of his youth hoping to reignite his career.

Title: I Run to You
Description: The life of serial seducer Gianni is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is a paraplegic.

Title: The Lost City
Description: A wealthy Havana club owner and his family are torn apart by the violent sociopolitical upheaval brought about by the transition from the dictatorial regime of Batista to the Marxist revolution led by Fidel Castro in 1950s Cuba.

Title: Emu Runner
Description: A spirited 8-year-old girl deals with the grief of her mother's death by forging a bond with a wild emu. This spiritual dreaming is a bond she will do anything to keep, but one that puts her at odds with the new social worker.

Title: The Magician
Description: A traveling magician and his assistants are persecuted by authorities in Sweden of the 19th century. Their capture, however, didn't bring victory to those in power.

Title: Carry on at Your Convenience
Description: This is the tale of industrial strife at WC Boggs' Lavatory factory. Vic Spanner is the union representative who calls a strike at the drop of a hat; eventually everyone has to get fed up with him. This is also the ideal opportunity for lots of lavatorial jokes...

Title: Irena's Vow
Description: Follows the life of a Polish nurse Irene Gut Opdyke who was awarded the Righteous Among the Nations medal for showing remarkable courage in her attempt to save Polish Jews during World War II.

Title: Calamity Hustle
Description: Tells the story of a former Los Angeles detective turned undercover detective who, after being shaken down by a vicious crime lord, must track down his brother who is responsible for disrupting a diamond heist.

Title: The Shiralee
Description: After Jim Macauley finds his wife with another man, he takes their young daughter and they hit the road. With a young child as his responsibility, he finds he can't be quite the fancy-free wanderer that he had been.

Title: Nothing Lasts Forever
Description: Illusions and reality merge, where authenticity and imagination overlap, and questions arise about the value we place on the goods around us.

Title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Freedom
Description: Movie sequel to Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny (2004).

Title: Visions
Description: After moving to a vineyard to start a new life with her husband, a pregnant woman begins to experience terrifying visions.

Title: Balls Out
Description: With marriage, graduation, and the real world looming on the horizon, fifth year senior Caleb Fuller reassembles the ol' team of misfits for one last epic run in Intramural football.

Title: Baby It's You
Description: In a 1966 New Jersey high school, Jill and new student Sheik from the other side of the tracks make their way in a first love romance.

Title: Che: Part Two
Description: In 1967, Ernesto 'Che' Guevara leads a small partisan army to fight an ill-fated revolutionary guerrilla war in Bolivia, South America.

Title: Mad Love
Description: The wild and sexy story of two passionate young people who take to the road for the incredible adventure of their lives.

Title: Triumph of the Spirit
Description: In Greece during World War II, a young Jewish boxer, meets regularly with girlfriend Allegra until they and their families are sent to Auschwitz. When the Nazis learn of his boxing, they force him to participate in weekly boxing matches.

Title: Attack
Description: Witness the rise of an army soldier as he realizes his destiny and comes to terms to becoming India's first super soldier created to combat terrorists as he fights his inner demons and outer enemies.With lots of action

Title: Hera Pheri
Description: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

Title: Housefull
Description: Believing himself to be jinxed, a man attempts to find true love, but instead gets caught in a web of lies.

Title: The Calling
Description: Detective Hazel Micallef hasn't had much to worry about in the sleepy town of Fort Dundas until a string of gruesome murders in the surrounding countryside brings her face to face with a serial killer driven by a higher calling.

Title: Mercenaries
Description: The President's daughter is captured and imprisoned while touring a war zone, so a team of elite female commandos is assembled to infiltrate a women's prison for a daring rescue.

Title: White Zombie
Description: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

Title: The Unknown Woman
Description: Haunted by a horrible past, a young Ukrainian woman calculatedly insinuates herself into the life of a rich Italian family.

Title: Encounters at the End of the World
Description: Film-maker Werner Herzog travels to the McMurdo Station in Antarctica, looking to capture the continent's beauty and investigate the characters living there.

Title: Son of the White Mare
Description: In this dreamlike Hungarian folk myth, a horse goddess gives birth to three powerful brothers who set out into the Underworld to save three princesses from three evil dragons and reclaim their ancestors' lost kingdom.

Title: The Baby
Description: When his son and son's partner are killed in a car accident, Joseph must try to decide how to be a grandfather to the baby they were expecting via a fierce, young Flemish surrogate.

Title: Barry
Description: A look into the early life of U.S. President Barack Obama.

Title: Berlin Calling
Description: A man tours clubs around the globe with his manager and girlfriend. On the eve of their largest album release he is admitted to a psychiatric clinic after overdosing at a gig.

Title: Caramel
Description: A romantic comedy centered on the daily lives of five Lebanese women living in Beirut.

Title: Devil's Gate
Description: Seeking a missing woman in North Dakota, an FBI agent and a sheriff focus on her religious zealot husband but discover something far more sinister.

Title: Hara-Kiri: Death of a Samurai
Description: A tale of revenge, honor and disgrace, centering on a poverty-stricken samurai who discovers the fate of his ronin son-in-law, setting in motion a tense showdown of vengeance against the house of a feudal lord.

Title: The Divorce
Description: French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her sister and French brother-in-law and niece in Paris.

Title: Roger Dodger
Description: After breaking up with his lover and boss, a smooth-talking man takes his teenaged nephew out on the town in search of sex.

Title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
Description: Tanhaji Malusare, a military chieftain in the army of the Maratha king Shivaji, leads the charge to capture the strategically important Kondhana fort guarded by the army of the fierce Rajput chieftain Udaybhan Rathod.

Title: Ana's Desire
Description: After years of absence Juan returns to Ana, his older sister. Both have changed, but none of them has been able to overcome the love affair they lived in their youth that marked them forever.

Title: Dr. Bird's Advice for Sad Poets
Description: In the emotionally charged, wild and humorous world of sixteen year old James Whitman, we see his struggle to overcome anxiety and depression by seeking advice from Dr. Bird - an imaginary pigeon therapist - in the wake of his sister's disappearance.

Title: The Dresser
Description: Personal assistant Norman struggles to get deteriorating veteran actor Sir through a difficult performance of King Lear.

Title: Love's Kitchen
Description: Rob Haley (Dougray Scott), an up-and-coming chef and restaurateur in London, is grief-stricken when he loses his wife. With encouragement from his infamous friend and real life TV Chef Gordon Ramsay, Rob decides to spice up his life by turning a run-down country pub into a gourmet restaurant. His food catches the eye - and taste buds - of beautiful American food critic Kate Templeton (Claire Forlani) and they soon both write a recipe for love that leaves both their hearts - and their stomachs - full.

Title: Serial (Bad) Weddings 2
Description: Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere.

Title: Vengeance Is Mine
Description: Chronological exploits of Iwao Enokizu, a murderous thief on the run.

Title: The Amazing Panda Adventure
Description: A young American boy visiting China helps his zoologist father rescue a panda cub from unscrupulous poachers while its reserve is threatened with closure from officious bureaucrats.

Title: I'm Totally Fine
Description: Vanessa, a woman in mourning, takes a solo trip to clear her head after the death of her friend, but her self-care vacation plans change when she's met with an out-of-this-world situation.

Title: The Adventures of Hercules
Description: Hercules searches for the Seven Thunderbolts of Zeus, which have been stolen by renegade gods.

Title: The Timekeepers of Eternity
Description: Mr Toomey obsessively tears paper to control his childhood monsters, but when he wakes mid-flight to Boston to find most of the other passengers disappeared, he must confront the paper nightmare which threaten to rip everything apart.

Title: Mortuary
Description: Convinced that her father's death was not accidental, a beautiful girl decides to investigate to find out the truth, aided by her boyfriend. Her sleuthing draws her to a local mortuary, where many secrets will be revealed.

Title: Government Cheese
Description: Hampton Chambers a newly released ex-convict striving to leave his criminal history behind and reunite with his family. Amidst this struggle, he grapples with frequent inexplicable moments of divine intervention.

Title: What We Found
Description: A trio of friends are starting high school when their friend vanishes. With the police unable--or unwilling?--to find her, they take it upon themselves to find out what happened, undertaking a harrowing journey that will change them all.

Title: The Color of Paradise
Description: The story of Mohammed, a blind Iranian boy and his father, Hashem, who is always oscillating between accepting his son as he is and abandoning him, as he represents a burden for him, after the loss of his wife.

Title: The Gunfighter
Description: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.

Title: Deborah
Description: A group of old friends discovers a seemingly harmless device that allows them to rewind time, but not without consequences.

Title: Last Three Days
Description: After getting mixed up with a dangerous crime syndicate, an undercover cop wakes up to discover he is missing his partner, his wife, and three days of his life.

Title: Anjaam Pathiraa
Description: The police are on the trail of a serial killer, but with the victims being fellow officers, will they be able to catch the killer and solve the case in time?

Title: Guide
Description: When mistaken to be a sage by some villagers, an ex-tour guide reflects on his past and lost love to search for spiritual wisdom to guide the villagers.

Title: Utama
Description: In the Bolivian highlands, an elderly Quechua couple has been living the same daily life for years. During an uncommonly long drought, Virginio and Sisa face a dilemma: resist or be defeated by the environment and time itself.

Title: Private Peaceful
Description: Set in the fields of Devon and the WW1 battlefields of Flanders, two brothers fall for the same girl while contending with the pressures of their feudal family life, the war, and the price of courage and cowardice.

Title: Blue Juice
Description: JC thinks surfing is everything. His girlfriend Chloe wants him to settle down. When he decides to go surfing one night with friends from London, she throws JC out. Surfing or Chloe?

Title: Don't Come Knocking
Description: An aging cowboy movie star deserts a film set and tries to reconnect with his mother, whom he hasn't seen in thirty years, only to learn that he has a child he never knew about.

Title: Woyzeck
Description: Franz Woyzeck is a hapless, hopeless soldier, alone and powerless in society, assaulted from all sides by forces he can not control.

Title: Sehidup Semati
Description: A woman named Renata who is the wife of a man named Edwin. But unfortunately, their marriage did not run healthily, it was really toxic.

Title: May God Save Us
Description: Inspectors Velarde and Alfaro must find what appears to be a serial killer. This hunt against the clock will make them realize something they'd never thought about: neither one of them is that different from the killer.

Title: In the Rearview
Description: A small van traverses war-torn roads, picking up Ukrainians as they abandon their homes at the front. Shuttling them across the battered landscape into exile, the van becomes a fragile refuge, a zone for its passengers' confidences.

Title: Scream of the Wolf
Description: Shooting a vampire movie in an old abandoned house should have worked like a dream. However, with the full moon, the nightmare begins. The body count rises as the cast and crew encounter the mansion's resident werewolf.

Title: Band of Robbers
Description: Tom Sawyer and Huck Finn are grown men, still searching for the hidden treasure that has eluded them since childhood.

Title: Crossfire
Description: A syndicate murders an FBI agent's wife, targeting his daughter. They pursue the girl as the agent scrambles to protect her. Their game of cat-and-mouse ends in a final showdown between the syndicate and the father defending his daughter.

Title: Snapdragon
Description: Two men have already been killed during intercourse by a prostitute. The young Sergeant Peckham is transferred from vice to homicide squad for the investigation.

Title: House of Good and Evil
Description: After a family tragedy in the chaotic city, Chris and Maggie Conley, in a last-ditch effort to save their dying marriage, purchase an isolated home in the deepest woods, to which they quickly discover evil has a key.

Title: Westward the Women
Description: A trail guide escorts a group of women from Chicago to California to marry men that have recently begun settling there.

Title: The Man from Hong Kong
Description: While on dispatch in Australia to extradite a drug courier, a tough Hong Kong cop wages a one-man war against Sydney's most powerful kingpin.

Title: Mr. Baseball
Description: Jack Elliot, once a great baseball player, is forced to play in Japan where his brash, egotistical ways cause friction with his new teammates and friends.

Title: Native Son
Description: A young African-American living in Chicago enters into a seductive new world of money and power after he is hired as a chauffeur for an affluent businessman.

Title: Underdogs
Description: Set in rural Ohio, the birthplace of football, a small-town high school football team rises to play their cross-town rival, a perennial powerhouse, while standing up for an entire community.

Title: Free Willy 3: The Rescue
Description: 16-year-old Jesse and old friend Randolph try to foil an illegal whaler threatening Willy and his pregnant mate.

Title: Bitch Ass
