Description: A gang initiation goes wrong when a group of four recruits break into a house of horror, as they're all forced to play deadly games for their lives. Win and you live - lose and you die.

Title: The True Story of the Nun of Monza
Description: Sister Virginia becomes the new Mother Superior at the convent of Monza. Debauched priest Don Arrigone and lecherous womanizer Giampaolo Osio plot to seduce sister Virginia by any means necessary.

Title: Permanent Vacation
Description: A young man wanders New York City searching for some meaning in life and encounters many idiosyncratic characters.

Title: The Alphabet Killer
Description: Based on the true story of the double initial killings in Rochester, NY.

Title: Murder 3
Description: A hot-shot fashion and wildlife photographer Vikram gets into a relationship with Nisha. She moves in with him in his palatial house outside of the city. The old world house, made decades ago is as beautiful as it is scary. It holds many secrets which Nisha is soon to unearth; of the life of the man who made it and of Vikram, who is dealing with the mysterious disappearance of his former girlfriend Roshni.

Title: The Isle
Description: Working at a fishing resort in an idyllic location, but surrounded by various facets of human unpleasantness, a young mute woman falls in love with a man on the run from the law for committing murder.

Title: Tokyo Revengers 2: Bloody Halloween - Decisive Battle
Description: The long-awaited sequel to "Tokyo Revengers" will be released in two parts, before and after the film. Once again, Hinata is killed in front of Takemichi's very eyes by the now-militarized Tokyo Manjikai.

Title: The Girl on the Mountain
Description: When a reclusive backwoodsman finds a mute little girl wandering alone in the forest, he must protect her from the evil forces determined to end her life.

Title: Trailer Park Boys
Description: Two petty felons have a documentary made about their life in a trailer park.

Title: The Harder They Come
Description: Wishing to become a successful reggae singer, a young Jamaican man finds himself tied to corrupt record producers and drug pushers.

Title: Sexo, pudor y lágrimas
Description: Six friends... two couples... from the mexican middle well-off class, dealing with issues about sex, relationships, infidelity and many others.

Title: End of the Century
Description: Two men meet in Barcelona and after spending a day together they realize that they have already met twenty years ago.

Title: Between Two Worlds
Description: It is based on French journalist Florence Aubenas's bestselling non-fiction work Le Quai de Ouistreham, investigating rising precarity in French society through her experiences in the northern port city of Caen.

Title: Women in the Dark
Description: These women are beguiling mysteries to one another, but not for much longer - A compilation of shorts based around lesbian and female sexuality.

Title: All Nighter
Description: A workaholic father who attempts to visit his daughter during a layover in LA, only to discover that she's disappeared, is forced to team up with her awkward ex-boyfriend to find her over the course of one transformative night.

Title: The Man in the White Van
Description: In a quaint, family town in Florida, 1974, an ominous white van stalks a young girl, and her parents' disbelief leads to a terrifying Halloween nightmare.

Title: The Yellow Balloon
Description: In post-war London, a small boy who blames himself for the accidental death of a friend, falls under the bad influence of a street criminal.

Title: The Bay of Silence
Description: Will believes his wife Rosalind is innocent of their son's suspected murder, only to discover the devastating truth behind her past links her to another unsolved crime.

Title: Minding the Gap
Description: Filmmaker Bing Liu searches for correlations between his skateboarder friends' turbulent upbringings and the complexities of modern masculinity.

Title: Hold That Ghost
Description: After inheriting a fortune from a gangster, two dim-witted service station attendants find themselves stranded in a haunted house.

Title: Sidonie au Japon
Description: While on a book tour in Japan, Sidonie Perceval, still haunted by the ghost of her late husband, begins an affair with her mysterious Japanese publisher.

Title: The Leather Boys
Description: An immature teenager marries a young biker but becomes disenchanted with the realities of working class marriage and her husband's relationship with his best friend.

Title: Blue Iguana
Description: Ex-jailbirds Eddie and Paul are on parole and working in a New York diner. Their lives are a dead end. That is, until English lawyer Katherine Rookwood walks into the diner with an offer they can't refuse.

Title: Tiger Stripes
Description: An 11-year-old girl who is carefree until she starts to experience horrifying physical changes to her body.

Title: Innocent Crush
Description: A high school student develops a crush on her gym teacher.

Title: The Blade
Description: A swordsmith trains his friend's orphaned son. The boy seeks revenge for his father's murder but loses an arm rescuing the swordsmith's daughter. A hermit girl nurses him, and he learns swordsmanship with his father's broken sword.

Title: Family Vanished
Description: A happy family returns from a vacation to find their home invaded by a criminal family and must fight for survival.

Title: Kysset
Description: The story follows Anton whose top priority is to complete his training as a cavalry officer. During training he orders his platoon to help Baron and he meets the Baron's daughter Edith who has been in an accident.

Title: The Battle of Jangsari
Description: A unit of student soldiers on a diversionary mission for the Battle of Incheon during the Korean War in 1950.

Title: Sabata
Description: A master gunfighter sides with a banjo-playing drifter and a Mexican tramp to foil the dignitaries of Daugherty, who want to use stolen army money to buy land that the railroad will cross.

Title: The Precocious and Brief Life of Sabina Rivas
Description: At the Mexican-Guatemalan border, young teenage lovers Sabina and Jovany, both Hondurans, accidentally meet again after some years apart. She plans to get to the United States and dreams about being a great singer; he commits all the required atrocities to be accepted by the gang La Mara Salvatrucha. Sabina and Jovany clash with the most adverse conditions at the border, including white slavery, Mexican and American migratory agents Burrona and Patrick, brothel matron Doña Lita, Don Nico the Mexican Consul in Tecún Umán, the drug-trafficking networks, the army, and La Mara Salvatrucha.

Title: Miss Willoughby
Description: Orphaned at an early age, when she grows up, receives a call from some old family friends, who have experienced a series of apparitions in her old bookstore, asking Elizabeth to get to the bottom of the paranormal mystery.

Title: Safe Men
Description: 2 bad singers are mistaken for top safe-crackers at a bar. A gangster boss orders them to break into 3 safes or else..

Title: A Wolf at the Door
Description: A journey to the dark cutting edge of desires, lies and wickedness of a love triangle, from the moment a child is mysteriously kidnapped.

Title: The Trial
Description: After the horrific death of his wife and two sons, suicide seems to be the only escape for a small town attorney, until he's assigned a capital punishment case that begins to transform his life.

Title: Oink
Description: A nine-year-old girl gets a pig named Oink as a gift from her grandfather.

Title: Hangar 18
Description: After a UFO crashes in Arizona, due to a space collision with a NASA satellite launch, the U.S. government tries to cover-up the incident for political reasons.

Title: Monster
Description: When a serial killer murders her sister, rage consumes her completely as she seeks for revenge.

Title: Gozu
Description: A yakuza enforcer is ordered to secretly drive his beloved colleague to be assassinated. But when the colleague unceremoniously disappears en route, the trip that follows is a twisted, surreal and horrifying experience.

Title: Blood Alley
Description: His ship seized by the Chinese Communists, American Merchant Captain Tom Wilder languishes in prison but Chinese villagers help him escape to sail them to Hong-Kong.

Title: North of Normal
Description: After being raised in the wilderness, a teenage girl moves to the city hoping for a normal life with her anything but normal mother.

Title: Patterns
Description: When Fred Staples is recruited onto the board of a high-powered New York corporation, he finds his ethics and ambition at odds.

Title: White Plastic Sky
Description: A young couple living in a barren, post-apocalyptic Budapest in the year 2123, struggle for food and life.

Title: Azumi
Description: Raised to deal in cold blooded death, the teenage assassin girl Azumi must defeat three evil warlords while also battling her own heart.

Title: A Force of One
Description: When the detectives of an undercover police unit are being mysteriously killed by a martial artist, a professional kickboxer is hired to assist them.

Title: Adults in the Room
Description: Greece in 2015: the economy is in tatters and the country is on the verge of bankruptcy. A new government rebels against the EU's iron-fisted rule and inspires millions of Europeans. Based on the political memoirs of Yanis Varoufakis.

Title: Afterglow
Description: A handyman with marital problems meets a housewife with the same.

Title: E.M.P. 333 Days
Description: After an E.M.P. (Electro Magnetic Pulse) weapon is deployed, North America is forced to live in pre-industrial conditions. Anything electrical is useless, sending North American nations into anarchy. An introverted 11 year old girl must fend and fight for herself while trying to find her father.

Title: The Maltese Falcon
Description: A lovely dame with dangerous lies employs the services of a private detective, who is quickly caught up in the mystery and intrigue of a statuette known as the Maltese Falcon.

Title: Dare
Description: A drama centered around three high school seniors - an aspiring actress, her misfit best friend, and a loner - who become engaged in an intimate and complicated relationship.

Title: Last Days in the Desert
Description: An imagined chapter from Jesus' forty days of fasting and praying in the desert. On his way out of the wilderness, Jesus struggles with the Devil over the fate of a family in crisis.

Title: Footlight Parade
Description: Chester Kent struggles against time, romance, and a rival's spy to produce spectacular live "prologues" for movie houses.

Title: Mad Love
Description: In Paris, a demented surgeon's obsession with a British actress leads him to secretly replace her concert-pianist husband's mangled hands with those of a guillotined murderer with a gift for knife-throwing.

Title: Greed
Description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

Title: The Swinger
Description: An authoress writes a steaming sex-novel and proceeds to live out her heroine's adventures.

Title: Seven Beauties
Description: The defense of honor, a strong value in Neapolitan society, and its effects on the life of everyman Pasquale Frafuso.

Title: Scavenger Hunt
Description: A group of high school seniors decide to revive the ancient, strictly verboten ritual of the scavenger hunt -- and another Night Of Bad Things begins as the sun sets on a happy pack of foolhardy teens.

Title: Come Back, Little Sheba
Description: An emotionally remote recovering alcoholic and his dowdy, unambitious wife face a personal crisis when they take in an attractive lodger.

Title: A Wedding
Description: The daughter of a Louisville truck driver marries the scion of a very wealthy family, but the reception at the family estate is boycotted by the invited guests.

Title: Autopsy
Description: A young woman tries to find her injured boyfriend in a bizarre and dangerous hospital.

Title: Dr. Gift
Description: In the haunted corridors of the Lockhouse asylum, a psychotic doctor conducts gruesome experiments on his patients. 70 years later the asylum opens as a bed and breakfast, and the door to hell is opened along with it.

Title: Peripheral
Description: A young writer battles the intelligent software designed to help her write her new book and stumbles upon a conspiracy of social control.

Title: Miss Bala
Description: After entering a beauty contest in Tijuana, a young woman witnesses drug-related murders and is forced to do the gang's bidding.

Title: The Podcast Murders
Description: A true crime podcast host tries to keep a low profile despite achieving massive success for her investigation of a serial killer. However, it soon becomes clear that her anonymity isn't the only thing being threatened.

Title: Suddenly
Description: In the city of Suddenly, three gangsters trap the Benson family in their own house, on the top of a hill nearby the railroad station, with the intention of killing the president of the USA.

Title: Out on a Limb
Description: A financial whiz takes a wild detour to come to the aid of his kid sister in the small logging town of 'Buzzsaw'.

Title: Sounds Like Love
Description: Fashion assistant Maca has just about got her life together after a devastating breakup, when Leo, the man who broke her heart returns. Seeking support from best friends, Adriana and Jime, all three will learn love can be complicated.

Title: Ghoulies II
Description: The Ghoulies wreak havoc at an amusement park, disposing of those who mistake them for mere fairground attractions.

Title: Palm Springs Weekend
Description: Several Los Angeles college students flock to Palm Springs, California for a long, fun-filled spring-break weekend. Jim finds romance with Bunny, the daughter of a harried, stressed-out Palm Springs Police Chief. Jim's bumbling roommate Biff tries to get tomboyish Amanda's attention with a so-called love gadget. Gayle Lewis, a high-school senior posing as a wealthy college girl, is pursued by wealthy, spoiled college preppie Eric Dean but has eyes for a Texas cowboy called Stretch. Jim and Biff's basketball coach, Campbell, tries to romance Naomi, the owner of the motel where they're all staying, but faces interference from Naomi's troublemaking brat son "Boom-Boom."

Title: Schoolgirl Report Vol. 13: Don't Forget Love During Sex
Description: During rehearsals for a school performance, a group of students discusses whether sex and love belong together, and whether both together in a relationship is possible.

Title: Dismissed
Description: A straight-edged teacher finds trouble when an honors student is willing to do anything to get an A.

Title: Rosebud
Description: Renowned producer-director Otto Preminger captures international terrorism in this film about five teenage girls who are kidnapped from a yacht by the P.L.O. Stars Peter O'Toole and Richard Attenborough.

Title: Amar Akbar Anthony
Description: Three brothers are separated and united after many years - one is brought up a Hindu, another a Muslim and the last (and most memorable) a Christian. Hilarity and adventure ensues.

Title: He Was a Quiet Man
Description: An unhinged office worker who planned to go on a shooting spree at his workplace struggles with his newfound status as a hero after he ends up stopping a shooting spree instead.

Title: Tornado
Description: A young Japanese girl finds herself in a dangerous situation when she and her father's puppet show cross paths with a gang of criminals led by Sugarman and his ambitious son Little Sugar.

Title: Diary of a Fleeting Affair
Description: A single mother and a married man enter into an affair with the understanding that their relationship is purely sexual. Though they agree the relationship has no future, they find themselves increasingly drawn into each other's company.

Title: Angélique
Description: In France, prior to Louis XIV ascending the throne, a young baroness is forced to marry against her will and is caught up in a web of treachery and murder, threatening her and her husband, whom she has come to love deeply.

Title: The Legend & Butterfly
Description: The story of a man and a woman that extends over 30 years in the Warring State period.

Title: Sink or Swim
Description: A depressed man joins a synchronized swimming team made up of middle aged men.

Title: Summer School Teachers
Description: A trio of naive, but eager young Midwestern women go to California to teach summer school classes at Regency High School.

Title: The Other Side of Heaven
Description: John Groberg, a farm kid from Idaho Falls, crosses an ocean to become a missionary in the remote and exotic Tongan islands during the 1950s.

Title: Vikingdom
Description: A forgotten king, Eirick, is tasked with the impossible odds to defeat Thor, the God of Thunder.

Title: Tokyo Pop
Description: Aspiring singer Wendy hops on a plane to Tokyo with dreams of making it big in the music business. She soon finds romance with Hiro, a rock 'n' roll musician who convinces her to become the lead singer in his band.

Title: Monsieur Ibrahim
Description: In Paris, a Turkish shop owner befriends a Jewish boy in his mid-teens.

Title: Ice Castles
Description: Alexis is a young girl who dreams of becoming a champion figure skater. One day, while practicing, Alexis suffers a terrible accident that takes her sight and threatens to destroy her dreams.

Title: Kade Dade Diyan Kade Pote Diyan
Description: Goga and Kamal are in love and want to get married, but Kamal's grandmother is standing in their way. In a moment of despair, Goga prays for Kamal's grandmother's death, and when it occurs a few days later, Goga is left fearful and confused. The couple's wedding plans seem to be back on track until Goga spots the ghostly figure of Kamal's grandmother wandering around. Despite Goga's attempt to prove the sighting, nobody else can see the apparition but him. In desperation, Goga seeks guidance from Notorious Baba who advises him to summon the ghost of his own grandfather to help. Unfortunately, the only person who can see Goma's grandfather's ghost is Kamal. What follows is a side-splitting tale of confusion and errors, but is ultimately a poignant tribute to the enduring power of love.

Title: Eugenie de Sade
Description: Eugenie, a beautiful but shy young girl, has been living with her stepfather, Albert since her mother died when she was a baby. He is a famous writer specializing in stories of erotica. One day she happens to read one of his "erotic" books and its power so affects her that begins to find herself sexually attracted to him. He notices this, and eventually brings her into his dark world of sexual perversion and murder.

Title: Death in Love
Description: The devastating legacy of a liaison between a concentration camp inmate and a Nazi doctor reflects on the lives of her sons.

Title: Prospero's Books
Description: The magician Prospero attempts to stop his daughter's affair with an enemy.

Title: The Hypnotist
Description: A detective pairs himself with a famous psychologist on a case involving a traumatized young witness to a crime.

Title: Stay Away, Joe
Description: A mixed-race American Indian rodeo champ returns to the reservation to help his people out.

Title: Shotgun Stories
Description: Set in Arkansas, this poetic and powerful film directed by Jeff Nichols (Mud, Take Shelter) tracks a blood feud that erupts when two sets of half-brothers come to blows at their father's funeral.

Title: Conquest
Description: A young man, armed with a magical bow and arrows, embarks on a mystical journey through a mystical land to rid it of all evil and joins forces with an outlaw to take down an evil witch bent on claiming the magic bow for evil.

Title: Operation Rogue
Description: Deep in the jungles of Southeast Asia, a terrorist organization has stolen materials to create a dangerous chemical bomb.

Title: The Unborn
Description: A couple struggling to conceive visit a miracle doctor as a last hope for having a child. The wife gets pregnant, but after the initial joy comes horror, as she slowly discovers the nightmarish truth behind the doctor's success.

Title: The Universal Theory
Description: The year of 1962. A physics congress in the Alps. An Iranian guest. A mysterious pianist. A bizarre cloud formation in the sky and a booming mystery under the mountain. THE THEORY OF EVERYTHING. A quantum mechanical thriller in black and white.

Title: Oddity
Description: Uncovering the truth behind sister's death with the help of wooden mannequin.

Title: Good Guys Wear Black
Description: An ex-US Army commando must find the reason why his comrades from his unit are being systematically murdered before he is next.

Title: Secret Pleasures
Description: An attractive woman detective, expert in cases of conjugal infidelity is hired by a mysterious millionaire, unaware that she will get involved in a feverish love triangle to gather all the evidence she needs to finish the case.

Title: Return to Two Moon Junction
Description: A New York fashion model returns to her hometown in Georgia where she strikes up a lustful tryst with a handsome sculptor.

Title: The Moogai
Description: A young Aboriginal couple brings home their second baby. What should be a joyous time takes a sinister turn, as the baby's mother starts seeing a malevolent spirit she is convinced is trying to take her baby.

Title: The Disappointments Room
Description: A mother and her young son release unimaginable horrors from the attic of their rural dream home.

Title: Promised Land
Description: "Promised Land" tells the story of a group of young unwitting Estonian girls smuggled through Egypt to be auctioned off as prostitutes in Israel, and of their initiation into this trade of flesh, and finally of the accidental freeing of one girl who most fight for her freedom.

Title: The Color of Milk
Description: Selma's mother died giving birth to her, and Selma's step-aunt is living proof that men only cause trouble. So the 11-year-old girl makes a deal with her best friends that they will stay away from boys and dedicate their lives to science. By the way, Selma was probably born on another planet and not meant to fall in love with anyone. But what happens when her friends break the pact, and she actually meets a boy who's not like the rest? A beautiful story about exploring and finding out about life and what you want, and how difficult this can be. Especially when "nature" works against your principles and beliefs.

Title: The Petrified Forest
Description: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

Title: Greven från gränden
Description: The poor photographer Tibbe is the heir of the recently deceased count Silfverbaage. But there is a condition to get the money: he must stop seeing his old friends, including his fiancée Maja.

Title: Tooken
Description: Tooken - The spoof on the popular Taken franchise.

Title: Holy Man
Description: Eddie Murphy stars as an over-the-top television evangelist who finds a way to turn television home shopping into a religious experience, and takes America by storm.

Title: White Man's Burden
Description: In an alternative America where African-Americans and White Americans have reversed cultural roles, a white factory worker kidnaps a black factory owner for dismissing him over perceived disdain.

Title: The Murder Mansion
Description: A couple lost in thick fog, take refuge in an old mansion next to a cemetery, and strange things start to happen.

Title: Us or Them
Description: Two childhood friends get more than they bargained for when they unwittingly agree to play each other in a deadly game of life and death called "Us or Them."

Title: Balkan Spy
Description: Convinced that his subtenant is a spy and an enemy of the state, a man falls into deep paranoia which leads to absurd and destructive chain of events.

Title: Yor: The Hunter from the Future
Description: A warrior seeks his true origins in a seemingly prehistoric wasteland.

Title: Dante's Inferno
Description: Loosely adapted from Dante's Divine Comedy and inspired by the illustrations of Gustav Doré the original silent film has been restored and has a new score by Tangerine Dream.

Title: Essential Killing
Description: An Afghan POW attempts his escape.

Title: Shepherd
Description: A young Scottish shepherd, following the death of his unfaithful wife, fights to maintain his own sanity when the past catches up to him.

Title: Hatchet for the Honeymoon
Description: A cleaver-wielding bridal designer murders various young brides-to-be in an attempt to unlock a repressed childhood trauma.

Title: Sarah Millican: Bobby Dazzler
Description: The live recorded stand-up special of Sarah Millican's Bobby Dazzler tour.

Title: Donnybrook
Description: Two men prepare to compete in a legendary bare-knuckle fight where the winner gets a $100,000 prize.

Title: Vuk samotnjak
Description: A boy finds a large wolf-like dog in the mountain and they befriend. The local peasants think that it may be a real wolf responsible for the sheep pestilence. They decide to kill the animal, but the boy is worried about it and he secretly provides the dog with the food.

Title: The Silver Brumby
Description: A mother tells her daughter a fable about the prince of the brumbies, brumby being a term for the feral horses of Australia, who must find its place among its kind, while one man makes it his mission to capture it and tame it.

Title: The Malibu Bikini Shop
Description: Two brothers who have just graduated from college inherit a bikini store from their aunt.

Title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
Description: In the wake of Pearl Harbor, a young lieutenant leaves his expectant wife to volunteer for a secret bombing mission which will take the war to the Japanese homeland.

Title: The Passion of Darkly Noon
Description: A young man who has spent his life as a member of an ultraconservative Christian cult loses his parents and becomes disoriented, wandering into a forest and meeting a coffin transporter, a caring woman, her mute boyfriend, and his mother.

Title: Outlaw
Description: A group of people who feel betrayed by their government and let down by their Police force form a modern-day outlaw posse in order to right what they see as the wrongs of society.

Title: Shopping
Description: You've run out of options, no school, no job. Steal a car, smash a shop with a heavy car and reap the proceeds! This movie is about underground England. The causes, the benefits, and the result of a life of 'crash and carry.'

Title: Blood and Sand
Description: Juan is a young Spanish man whose dream is to become one of the famous toreros. When he was caught making an illegal (and in fact for the real torero life endangering) night bullfight with one of the destinated bulls for the corridas on the property of the Sols he meets the daughter of the American landowner Dona Sol, half Spanish, half American, and falls desperately in love with her. She brings him in contact with a famous torero and thus converts Juan into one of the famous, too. Still in love with Dona Sol, although married to the beautiful Carmen, Juan celebrates triumphes until Dona Sol lets him down. Drinking and being desperate only Carmen would stand by his side when he tries to come back in the corrida buisiness...

Title: Alien Invasion
Description: Inspired by the myths of Cthulhu, the film tells a story of horror and adventure started by a mysterious experiment in quantum mechanics.

Title: Agneepath
Description: A young boy's quest for revenge leads him to become a gangster as an adult, and with each day he becomes more and more like his enemies. Can he find vengeance and redemption?

Title: The Meddler
Description: An aging widow from New York City follows her daughter to Los Angeles in hopes of starting a new life after her husband passes away.

Title: The Nature of the Beast
Description: Two men, both hiding a deadly secret, are on a murderous rampage through the desert.

Title: Kooman
Description: The story is about a strict police officer who relocates to a hilly village on the Kerala-Tamil Nadu border. Few normal incidents that take place suddenly appear to be abnormal.

Title: Utopians
Description: A young student who finds himself attracted to his handsome male professor, is intent on getting close enough to him. It's an experience that transforms his life and comes to define his adult identity.

Title: Screwdriver
Description: Taken in by a wealthy couple after her sudden divorce, an isolated woman spirals into a surreal nightmare of manipulation, paranoia, and betrayal.

Title: Demoted
Description: What goes around comes around for a pair of prank-playing tire salesmen (Astin and Vartan) who find themselves placed in secretarial jobs by their put-upon boss (Cross).

Title: Rorschach
Description: The Movie is about Luke Anthony who has a mysterious past and is out on a mission to seek revenge from someone who has destroyed him deeply

Title: The Sword and the Rose
Description: During the reign of Henry VIII, Mary Tudor seeks to flee a forced marriage with the French king by escaping to America with her true love, but her plans are not so easily executed.

Title: Spasms
Description: A gigantic serpent is captured on a remote island and shipped to an American college for experimentation. A British millionaire and an American scientist must pursue the beast when it escapes and starts to kill innocent people.

Title: Stolen
Description: A detective deals with the loss of his own son while trying to uncover the identity of a boy whose mummified remains are found in a box buried for fifty years.

Title: Euphoryaa
Description: A courageous, contemporary story about love, relationships and vaccines.

Title: The Square
Description: A man's life begins to unravel when his mistress brings him a bag of cash.

Title: Beautiful Minds
Description: Two men, with vastly different life stories and personalities, embark on a hearse heading to the south of France. During their journey they realize that, however unlikely, they're not so different after all.

Title: Desperate Souls, Dark City and the Legend of Midnight Cowboy
Description: Follows the behind-the-scenes odyssey to get Midnight Cowboy (1969) produced, as well as the tumultuous era in which the movie was released and embraced.

Title: The Domino Principle
Description: A Vietnam War veteran, imprisoned for murder, is offered his freedom if he accepts to undertake a contract killing for a shady organization.

Title: Fair Game
Description: A young woman running an animal sanctuary in the outback takes her revenge on a trio of kangaroo hunters who terrorized her.

Title: The Chef
Description: A veteran chef faces off against his restaurant group's new CEO, who wants to the establishment to lose a star from its rating in order to bring in a younger chef who specializes in molecular gastronomy.

Title: O.G.
Description: Louis awaits release from prison after nearly 24 years in, when young Beech is incarcerated.

Title: Eliminators
Description: A former pilot rebels against his creator, teaming up with the scientist responsible for android technology, her pet robot Spot, a rough-and-tumble riverboat guide, and a martial arts warrior.

Title: I Shot Andy Warhol
Description: The story of Valerie Solanas, a '60s radical who preached misandry in her "Scum" manifesto. She wrote a screenplay for a film that she wanted Andy Warhol to produce, but after he repeatedly ignored her, she shot him.

Title: Unruly
Description: The year is 1933, and society has very specific expectations of how young women should behave. Seventeen-year-old Maren is wild and unruly, so she is sent to the women's institution on Sprogø to adapt. The stay has the opposite effect.

Title: Undead
Description: A quaint Australian fishing village is overcome by meteorites that turn its residents into the ravenous undead, leaving a small group of those unharmed to find a way out.

Title: Redirected
Description: Three friends try to make money and invite another friend in on a plot.

Title: Arctic Hollow
Description: An Alaskan bush pilot attempts a daring rescue of a stranded researcher deep inside an arctic cave system thought to be an entrance to the inner earth, only to find himself battling creatures not of this world.

Title: Girls Trip 2
Description: Plot unknown.

Title: The Insult
Description: After an emotional exchange between a Lebanese Christian and a Palestinian refugee escalates, the men end up in a court case that gets national attention.

Title: Panther
Description: A dramatized account of the story of The Black Panther Party of Self-Defense.

Title: Early Summer
Description: A family chooses a match for their daughter Noriko, but she, surprisingly, has her own plans.

Title: Goblin Slayer: Goblin's Crown
Description: In a world dominated by monsters, a young priestess decides to train as an adventurer to deal with the threat. She joins a group of inexperienced fighters who have set out to drive the goblins away.

Title: Songs of Earth
Description: Being connected to nature, what does it mean? Father knows and father shows. The director's father is 84. We follow in his footsteps into the mountain home. Into nature's smallest life and out to grand panoramas, where he grew up.

Title: The Thief Lord
Description: After their mother dies, two boys flee their mean aunt and head for Venice, Italy, where they meet Scipio, the mysterious "Thief Lord." Along with a small gang of abandoned kids, the boys start robbing the rich to support themselves.

Title: The MatchMaker
Description: Marcy is an assistant to Senator John McGlory, who is having problems with a re-election campaign. Desperate for Irish votes, McGlory's chief of staff Nick sends Marcy to Ireland to trace McGlory's relatives or ancestors. Marcy arrives at the village of Ballinagra when it is preparing for an annual Matchmaking Festival. A well-dressed, handsome, single young lady, she becomes the center of attention for two professional matchmakers, Dermot and Millie, as well as for bartender Sean.

Title: Sugar Hill
Description: A drug dealer tries to get out of the life and start anew with his girlfriend, but the transition is tragically difficult.

Title: Mobile Homes
Description: A young mother drifts from one motel to the next with her dangerously intoxicating boyfriend and her 8-year-old son. When a crisis tears them apart, the mother finds a mobile home community that provides the possibility of a better life.

Title: Setup
Description: A group of friends become involved in a potentially deadly diamond heist.

Title: Hanuman
Description: This animated movie depicts Hanuman's life from birth. The narrator is actor Mukesh Khanna. The movie relays how Hanuman was born to Anjani a female Apsara and Kesari, by the blessings of Vayu-Dev, the Wind God.

Title: Testament
Description: A retired archivist is annoyed and confused by a group of protestors who are angered by a mural inside the retirement home where he resides that glorifies colonialism.

Title: Point Blank
Description: Convicted corporate criminal Howard engineers a prison break as he and a number of fellow inmates are being transferred to a new facility. The escapees storm a shopping mall and take a group of shoppers hostage (after killing many more of them) before making their demands. Only Rudy, a former mercenary and brother of one of the fugitives, can take out the criminals before more of the hostages die.

Title: House III: The Horror Show
Description: Detective McCarthy finally catches "Meat Cleaver Max", a serial killer, who promises revenge during his execution. Nonetheless, a parapsychologist tells the detective that the only hope of stopping Max for good is to destroy his spirit.

Title: Pimp
Description: An urban love story set on the hard streets of the Bronx. A struggling female Pimp, named Wednesday, grows up learning the game from her dad. Once he's gone she's left to look out for her prostitute mother and girlfriend Nikki.

Title: Always Watching: A Marble Hornets Story
Description: A small town news team discovers a box of video tapes where a faceless figure dressed in a dark suit, haunts and torments a family... slowly driving them insane. Soon after, they realize that the "Operator" has begun to stalk them as well.

Title: Attack on Titan: Chronicle
Description: A recap of the popular anime series Shingeki no Kyojin from seasons 1-3.

Title: Jinn
Description: A man turns to a mysterious pair and a shackled mental patient for help in combating an ancient family curse.

Title: Don't Feed the Children
Description: A gang of orphans travels to the south in quest of a new life after a viral outbreak decimates the adult population of the nation, only to find themselves at the mercy of a psychotic woman who is hiding a perilous secret.

Title: Here and Now
Description: A singer (Sarah Jessica Parker) in New York City gets a grim diagnosis that puts her life and dreams into perspective.

Title: Zanox
Description: As a result of a drug experiment, Misi will be able to travel through time, but only if he drinks from a special homemade spirit.

Title: Bob Trevino Likes It
Description: After searching for her estranged father online, a people-pleasing young woman unexpectedly forms a close bond with a grieving, childless man with the same name as her father on Facebook. Inspired by a true story.

Title: Mediterraneo
Description: In WW2, an Italian Army unit of misfits occupies an isolated non-strategic Greek island for the duration of the war.

Title: The Last Keepers
Description: When the teenage daughter of a reclusive family of artists falls in love with an unusual boy at school, she awakens mysterious powers and discovers ancient family secrets that will change her life forever.

Title: I'm So Excited!
Description: When it appears as though the end is in sight, the pilots, flight crew, and passengers of a plane heading to Mexico City look to forget the anguish of the moment and face the greatest danger, which we carry within ourselves.

Title: Most vagy soha!
Description: On March 15, 1848, a young firebrand poet, Sándor Petöfi ignites the Hungarian Revolution with his passionate 'National Song', prompting the Austrians to dispatch a ruthless secret agent to assassinate him and suppress the uprising.

Title: The Doughgirls
Description: While sharing a hotel suite during the World War II housing shortage in Washington, D.C., three friends discover that their respective marriages are not legally valid.

Title: Black Butterflies
Description: In Apartheid-torn South Africa, poet Ingrid Jonker (Carice van Houten) struggles tragically in search of love and a sense of home.

Title: World's Best
Description: Follows Prem Patel, who is an expert at math but is also secretly obsessed with his late father's dream of becoming a rap musician, and he almost loses everything in his attempt to achieve multiple goals in life.

Title: Buried Truths
Description: A traumatized painter and her husband move to a secluded 100 year old abandoned house, but as her new painting unfolds with help from a supernatural presence, a mystery from thirty years ago is unearthed, leading to a dangerous truth.

Title: Wide Awake
Description: A 10-year-old boy goes on a search for God after his grandfather dies.

Title: Sophia, Death and Me
Description: A pale man knocks at Reiners door and calls himself the death. After realizing its not a joke, he travels with his ex-girlfriend to see his mother for a last time. On the road he has time to think about his life and the upcoming end.

Title: Young Mother 3
Description: Twenty year-old Ki-Chan lives alone with his father. One day his stepmother comes to live with them. She tries to be friendly with Ki-Chan but he approaches her as a woman and after that Their relationship turns into something dangerous.

Title: Premam
Description: A young man has three opportunities to find love. Will the third time be the charm?

Title: Blue Summer
Description: Teenagers pack a van full of beer and go on the road in search of sexual adventures.

Title: The Flip Side
Description: Australian madness via the visitors-from-hell mixed with love, lust and a bloody good shiraz.

Title: Amar te duele
Description: Renata is a young high-class girl and Ulises is a poor guy. They both fall in love, but they must fight against everyone, specially Renata's rich parents, who want to stop their love by sending her to Canada. The story remarks the difference between social classes in Mexico City, and their characters risk everything just to save their love.

Title: Whisper If I Forget
Description: An old pop singer who has Alzheimer's returns to her old house where she remembers her old days of climbing the stairs of fame and fortune while trying to deal with her older sister who holds her responsible for her ruined life.

Title: Evil Bong 420
Description: When Rabbit escapes Evil Bong's evil world, he opens a bowling alley, and decides to have a celebration with friends. Little does Rabbit know that not only is Evil Bong on his trail, he's joined by Gingerdead Man, and they're showing up invite or not!

Title: Easy Come, Easy Go
Description: Navy frogman, Ted Jackson (Elvis Presley), balances his time between twin careers as a deep sea diver and nightclub singer. During a dive, Ted spots sunken treasure and returns with hope to retrieve it.

Title: Snow White Dies at the End
Description: The lives of a hikikomori, an Asperger's, an ad man, a video store clerk, a corner shop philosopher, and a gynecologist intertwine in three quirky tales of love, friendship, and commitment.

Title: Alien Siege
Description: After an alien spacecraft destroys Washington, D.C., the residents of a small town must fight off a unit of alien soldiers on the hunt for the President of the United States and the mysterious device he's carrying after his escape chopper crash lands nearby.

Title: Neo Tokyo
Description: A trilogy of separate stories. In "Labyrinth labyrinthos", a girl and her cat enter a strange world. In "Running Man", a racer takes on the ultimate opponent. In "Construction Cancellation Order", a man must shut down worker robots.

Title: Exit
Description: A rock climber tries to save the day when a mysterious white gas envelops an entire district in Seoul, South Korea.

Title: Phenomena
Description: Three middle-aged women who investigate paranormal events are put to the test when their leader Father Pilón disappears. Inspired by the real Hepta Group.

Title: We Are Not Alone
Description: SF comedy set after Earth has been invaded by a race of aliens, the Gu'un. A hapless human called Stewart is appointed the Gu'un's official liaison, is saddled with an alien housemate and must deliver their message to the masses.

Title: Doin' It
Description: A Indian American virgin who gets a job teaching high school sex ed.

Title: White Line Fever
Description: In 1970s Arizona, a young married man becomes an independent long-haul driver and he risks his life fighting the corruption in the local long-haul trucking industry.

Title: 7 Deadly Sins
Description: Before heading off to college, a group of high school seniors throw themselves the best Spring Break party ever. But when party goers begin to die, the teenagers must figure out how to survive the evil demon they summoned.

Title: Doubting Thomas
Description: When a black baby is born to white parents, a family's life is torn apart as secrets are revealed, their love is tested and the legacy of racism in America hits home.

Title: Fort Yuma
Description: A disgruntled settler kills an Apache chief at Fort Yuma, and the fort's commander knows that the chief's son, Manga Colorado, will seek revenge and go on the warpath.

Title: The Time Capsule
Description: In the near future, a politician fresh off an electoral loss escapes to his family's summer lake house. His vacation is disrupted by the appearance of his first love, who has just returned from a 20-year space voyage and hasn't aged a day.

Title: Mindwarp
Description: In post-apocalyptic 2037, Judy rebels against the AI-ruled utopia where people live in a happy VR simulation. She's exiled to a post-nuclear wasteland where she meets drifter Stover. Mutated cannibals capture them for their leader Seer.

Title: Ballerina Overdrive
Description: It follows a group of ballerinas as they try to escape from a remote inn after their bus breaks down on the way to a dance competition.

Title: Chapter Two
Description: George Schneider is an author whose wife had just died. His brother Leo gives him the number of Jennie Malone, and somehow they hit it off, and just when things are moving along, the memory of his first wife comes between them.

Title: Captain Kronos: Vampire Hunter
Description: A master swordsman and former soldier and his hunchbacked assistant hunt vampires.

Title: Going Berserk
Description: A clumsy chauffeur is hypnotized by a cult to kill the father of his fiancée, a congressman who's suing the cult for fraud, and encounters several weird characters during the days leading up to his wedding.

Title: Private School Girls
Description: The caretaker of a girls' school is charged with lewd behavior, and a number of students testify at the trial.

Title: Hyde Park on Hudson
Description: The story of the love affair between FDR and his distant cousin Margaret "Daisy" Suckley, centered around the weekend in 1939 when the King and Queen of the United Kingdom visited upstate New York.

Title: Cold Meat
Description: David Petersen is passing through the Colorado Rockies. After saving a young diner waitress from her violent ex-husband during a break from driving, he hits the road again alone through a dangerous snow blizzard. One false move behind the wheel has him waking up inside a ravine, in the eye of the storm. But the cold is the least of his worries when a beast starts prowling outside. How will he survive?

Title: The Bride Wore Black
Description: Julie Kohler is prevented from suicide by her mother. She leaves the town. She will track down, charm and kill five men who do not know her. What is her goal? What is her purpose?

Title: Please Murder Me!
Description: A lawyer suffers a guilt complex after getting a murder acquittal for his client, and then finding out she did commit the crime.

Title: Blood Fest
Description: Fans flock to a festival celebrating the most iconic horror movies, only to discover that the charismatic showman behind the event has a diabolical agenda.

Title: Tomorrow Is Forever
Description: An American World War I soldier whose disfigured face is reconstructed by Austrian plastic surgeons returns home after 20 years, but no one recognizes him, his widow is married to another man, and his son is a grown young man.

Title: Kath & Kimderella
Description: Fountain Lakes' foxy ladies who turn more than just heads when they go on an overseas trip and end up being the centre of their very own fairytale.

Title: Beyond the Hills
Description: The friendship between two young women who grew up in the same orphanage; one has found refuge at a convent in Romania and refuses to leave with her friend, who now lives in Germany.

Title: Stay the Night
Description: A failed work opportunity prompts chronically single Grace to pursue a one night stand with a stranger. Turns out he's an on-the-outs professional athlete in town with a problem of his own. Maybe they can help each other.

Title: The Yellow Tie
Description: Sergiu Celibidache's fairy tale journey: from Moldavia to the Berlin Philharmonic. Despite World War II and countless challenges, he pursued his musical dreams with relentless dedication and refusal to compromise, inspiring many.

Title: Barbara
Description: A teenage girl spends the summer on the notorious Fire Island off of New York. She has sex with a variety of people, while the others in her group engage in both straight and gay sex with each other. She succeeds in seducing her brother, then both hatch a plot to try to convert their parents to their newfound "lifestyle".

Title: Forbidden Games
Description: A young French girl orphaned in a German air attack is befriended by the son of a poor farmer, and together they try to come to terms with the realities of death.

Title: Asking for It
Description: After a small town waitress is sexually assaulted after a date with her old friend, she befriends a mysterious stranger who introducers her to an all femme gang.

Title: Death Rider in the House of Vampires
Description: In the Wild West, the mysterious Death Rider enters a dangerous Vampire Sanctuary where the price of admission is one female virgin.

Title: The Magnificent Meyersons
Description: A complicated New York City family discovers on one extraordinary day that although life-and family-can sometimes shock you - they can also lead to miraculous new places.

Title: Colao
Description: A coffee grower, single at almost 40, goes to the city in search of the only thing lacking in his life: love.

Title: It Happened to Jane
Description: Jane Osgood runs a lobster business, which supports her two young children. Railroad staff inattention ruins her shipment, so with her lawyer George, Jane sues Harry Foster Malone, director of the line and the "meanest man in the world".

Title: Unfit: The Psychology of Donald Trump
Description: An eye-opening and shattering analysis of the behavior, psyche, condition, and stability of Donald Trump.

Title: Phantom of the Opera
Description: An acid-scarred composer rises from the Paris sewers to boost his favorite opera understudy's career.

Title: Krippendorf's Tribe
Description: An anthropologist creates a fictitious lost New Guinea tribe using his family members to cover-up for his misuse of grant monies.

Title: Homunculus
Description: Truth and illusion blurs when a homeless amnesiac awakens from an experimental medical procedure with the ability to see people's innermost traumas.

Title: Miss Saigon: 25th Anniversary
Description: A filmed production of the musical 'Miss Saigon' for its 25th anniversary, performed live at London's Prince Edward Theatre, in London's West End. Including the 2hr 20minute production and a bonus 35-minute "25th Anniversary Gala" which included stars of the original cast, Jonathan Pryce, Lea Salonga and Simon Bowman.

Title: Eye of the Tiger
Description: Returning home from prison, a Vietnam War veteran sets out to clean up his hometown which has come under the control of a violent motorcycle gang.

Title: Dudes
Description: Three punk-loving New York City dudes need a change and drive a VW Beetle to California. After rednecks kill one of them in Arizona, they want justice. A cute girl helps them.

Title: Stella Dallas
Description: A working-class woman is willing to do whatever it takes to give her daughter a socially promising future.

Title: The Shape of Things
Description: A quiet, unassuming man begins to change in a major way as a result of meeting a new, art-student girlfriend, and his friends are unsettled by the transformation.

Title: Julia X
Description: Meeting a man on the Internet, Julia decides to see him in person, only to get abducted and branded with the letter "x" by that guy. A game of cat and mouse follows, but the story has an unexpected twist.

Title: Emmanuelle 5
Description: Emmanuelle has a streak of bad luck that starts when she is stripped by a mob of adoring fans at the Cannes Film Festival. Her rotten luck continues when the dictator of a banana republic uses the screening of one of her films as a pretext to get her into his country. Our heroine finds herself admitted into his harem as a slave.

Title: Everything Will Change
Description: In a dystopian 2054, three friends go on a road trip into the past. On their journey, they rediscover lost biodiversity. How could it all disappear? When the friends find the key to a decisive moment in time everything will change.

Title: On Your Wedding Day
Description: The story of the man who receives a wedding invitation from his first love that he met in high school.

Title: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time
Description: On the verge of being fired, a corrupt customs official finds a haul of drugs and teams up with a vicious gangster to become the most powerful crime partnership in Busan.

Title: A Moment of Romance
Description: During a bank heist, the getaway driver Wah took a young woman Jo Jo hostage. After preventing her from getting killed by his accomplices, they began a forbidden relationship causing mayhem and chaos for their friends and family.

Title: HoneyBee
Description: A quiet town is jump-started by the arrival of an enigmatic family. With the arrival of the mysterious family just weeks before school is to let out, life suddenly becomes appealing.

Title: Double Dutchess: Seeing Double
Description: All of the high-wire action, tearful drama, sexy romance, and dark humor that defines the Double Dutchess.

Title: Songs My Brothers Taught Me
Description: With an older brother in jail and living with their single mother on Pine Ridge Reservation, Johnny and his sister Jashuan's lives develop new challenges when their absentee cowboy father suddenly dies. The loss prompts Johnny to strike out for Los Angeles, but would mean leaving behind his beloved sister.

Title: The Crossing
Description: In the midst of the Chinese Revolution during the late 1940s, couples flee to the island of Taiwan.

Title: Les hommes de ma mère
Description: Young Elsie is shocked to learn that her eccentric mother wanted her ashes to be scattered among her five ex-husbands. Elsie is adamant about carrying out her mother's wishes, but the trip fundamentally alters her course.

Title: Howling Village
Description: After her brother goes missing, a young psychologist visits an infamous haunted and cursed location known as 'Howling Village' to investigate his disappearance and uncover her family's dark history.

Title: Aferim!
Description: Set in early 19th century Romania, a policeman, Costandin, is hired by a nobleman to find a Gypsy slave who has run away from his estate after having an affair with his wife.

Title: Decision at Sundown
Description: Bart Allison and sidekick Sam arrive in the town of Sundown on the wedding day of town boss Tate Kimbrough, whom Allison blames for his wife's death years earlier.

Title: The Humbling
Description: A stage actor who is slowly losing his mind engages in a relationship with a sexually confused younger woman.

Title: Take the Money and Run
Description: The life and times of Virgil Starkwell, inept bank robber.

Title: Standing Up
Description: Two kids befriend each other after being left stripped nude in a lake as the victims of an immature summer camp prank. They run away from camp and for three days learn more about each other than they've ever known before.

Title: My Donkey, My Lover & I
Description: A schoolteacher crashes her married lover's family vacation and befriends a donkey named Patrick.

Title: Religulous
Description: Bill Maher's take on the current state of world religion.

Title: Funeral Parade of Roses
Description: The trials and tribulations of Eddie and other transvestites in Japan.

Title: Virginia
Description: A sheriff sees his state senate bid slide out onto the ice when his daughter begins to date the son of a charming but psychologically disturbed woman with whom the sheriff has engaged in a two-decade-long affair.

Title: Pierrepoint: The Last Hangman
Description: The life and times of Albert Pierrepoint - Britain's most prolific hangman.

Title: Children of the Damned
Description: Six impossibly intelligent children from all over the world with dangerous psychic powers hide in a church in England after the military tries to experiment on them. Besieged, they warn the military to back off before carnage ensues.

Title: The Distinguished Citizen
Description: A winner of the Nobel Prize for Literature, who has been living in Europe for decades, accepts an invitation to receive another award. In Argentina he finds both similarities and irreconcilable differences with the people of his hometown.

Title: A Zed & Two Noughts
Description: Twin zoologists lose their wives in a car accident and become obsessed with decomposing animals.

Title: Sextette
Description: On the day of her wedding to her sixth husband, a glamorous silver screen sex symbol is asked to intervene in a political dispute between nations, which leads to chaos.

Title: Another Thin Man
Description: An explosives manufacturer suspects a young man is out to kill him. He calls in new parents Nick and Nora to sort things out.

Title: Rattlesnake
Description: When a single mother accepts the help of a mysterious woman after her daughter is bitten by a rattlesnake, she finds herself making an unthinkable deal with the devil to repay the stranger.

Title: The White Countess
Description: In 1930s Shanghai, a blind American diplomat develops a curious relationship with a young Russian refugee who works odd--and sometimes illicit--jobs to support members of her dead husband's aristocratic family.

Title: Trail of the Screaming Forehead
Description: A small town infestation of crawling alien foreheads that begin attaching to people and taking them over collides with a scientist's experiments to extract foreheadazine and things go horribly horribly wrong.

Title: The Mysteries of Pittsburgh
Description: A college graduate's defining summer crossing his gangster dad and exploring love, sexuality, and the enigmas surrounding his life and his city.

Title: Hustle
Description: At the instigation of a grieving father, a Los Angeles cop investigates the suspicious circumstances of a girl's apparent suicide.
After mobiles start mysteriously flying out of the hands of people in Chennai, Dr Vaseegaran summons his trusted robot Chitti to ward off the bird-shaped supernatural powers of Pakshirajan.

Title: The Kennel Murder Case
Description: Philo Vance, accompanied by his prize-losing Scottish terrier, investigates the locked-room murder of a prominent and much-hated collector whose broken Chinese vase provides an important clue.

Title: Tum Bin...: Love Will Find a Way
Description: Shekhar accidentally kills his associate Amar, and decides to watch over Amar's company and take care of his family and friends. However, he falls in love with Amar's fiancé Piya.

Title: Jocks
Description: The coach of a college tennis team is given an ultimatum: put together a winning team, or else.

Title: Caught
Description: A desperate housewife discovers her husband is having an affair and kidnaps his unsuspecting mistress, but what starts as a prank quickly spirals out of control.

Title: The Lay of LaLa Land
Description: Follows Lenny, an obsessive compulsive psych major, who meets a beautiful, but emotionally unstable girl named Jane, who has plans to enter into a troubling venture.

Title: Bloodsucking Bastards
Description: A down on his luck cubicle worker and his slacker best friend discover their new boss is a vampire who is turning their coworkers into the un-dead.

Title: Hope
Description: The relationship between artist-partners Tomas and Anja is put to the test after Anja gets a life-threatening diagnosis.

Title: Saul: The Journey to Damascus
Description: Known as Saul the Butcher, the stoning of Stephen was said to have shattered Saul's faith in the Temple and its denial of Christ as the Messiah. His conversion to Christianity and baptism as Paul changed the history of the world.

Title: All Hallows' Eve 2
Description: A woman finds a VHS tape on her doorstep that shows a series of gruesome tales that could be real. But the true danger is the pumpkin-faced killer that's using the tape to find his next victim.

Title: The Brothers Karamazov
Description: Three brothers, one spiritual and living at a monastery, the other - a gambler, and the third - an intellectual, work out their problems in 19th century Russia.

Title: Savage Dog
Description: A story set in Indochina in 1959, a land beyond rule and a time without mercy and the birth of a legend.

Title: The Marine 6: Close Quarters
Description: Jake Carter and another former Marine, Luke Trapper, join forces to rescue a kidnapped girl from a gang of international criminals.

Title: Criss Cross
Description: An armored truck driver and his ex-wife conspire with a gang to have his own truck robbed on the route.

Title: Rodan
Description: A mining engineer investigates the death of his fellow coworkers and discovers prehistoric nymphs emerging from the mines. As he heads deeper into the mines, he makes a more horrifying discovery in the form a prehistoric flying creature.

Title: One Love
Description: A rasta musician meets a gospel singer when they both enter a music contest in Kingston Jamaic. They fall for each other but are kept apart by the Girl's father the Pastor, who wants her to marry into the church.

Title: The Empty Hours
Description: On the desolated coast of Veracruz, Mexico, 17-year-old Sebastián takes over running his uncle's small & cozy rent-by-the-hour motel. There all by himself much of the time, he meets Miranda, a regular customer who comes to the motel to meet a lover who always keeps her waiting. There together with time to kill, Sebastián and Miranda begin to get to know each other, and an ambiguous game of seduction begins between them.

Title: The Great Indian Road Movie
Description: On regaining his vision after a cornea transplant, a nine-year-old boy embarks on a journey to explore India along with his father.

Title: I Am the Abyss
Description: A serial killer set in an atmospheric lakeside setting.

Title: The Naked Prey
Description: During the 1800s, a safari guide, two elephant hunters and their crew run into trouble with the natives in the South African veld when they refuse to offer gifts to the tribesmen.

Title: Blue in the Face
Description: Brooklyn Cigar Store is a neighborhood hangout in Brooklyn with Auggie Wren/H.Keitel as center. Some people are interviewed about Brooklyn, spiced up with statistics on Brooklyn.

Title: Power
Description: After a close friend drops out of politics, a political consultant helping to find a replacement finds a web of corruption and deceit as well.

Title: 7 Guardians of the Tomb
Description: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Chinese Emperor from 200 B.C. unearths a two-thousand-year-old nightmare, a secret that should have remained buried.

Title: Christmas Party
Description: Dumped by her boyfriend just before Christmas for being too boring, Ruth faces spending the holidays alone. A friend introduces her to a secret sexy club where Ruth falls for the charismatic club owner who shows her new ways to jingle.

Title: Stormy Weather
Description: The relationship between an aspiring dancer and a popular songstress provides a retrospective of the great African-American entertainers of the early 1900s.

Title: Hell
Description: In the not too distant future, people struggle to survive their greatest enemy, the sun.

Title: H.P. Lovecraft's Monster Portal
Description: A cult is about to waken H.P. Lovecraft's most feared creature.

Title: The D Train
Description: The head of a high school reunion committee tries to get the most popular guy in school to attend their class' upcoming 20-year reunion.

Title: Himizu
Description: After two teenagers from abusive households befriend each other, their lives take a dark adventure into existentialism, despair, and human frailty.

Title: The Gang That Couldn't Shoot Straight
Description: This is the funny story about two warring Mafia gangs in New York City. The weaker gang uses a lion to blackmail the opposite gang's "clients." The police succeed in stopping one of the gangs, while the other remains without the boss.

Title: Other People's Children
Description: A filmmaker, reeling from the death of her famous father, falls down the rabbit hole of a charismatic homeless man who becomes the subject of her latest documentary and her new love interest.

Title: One-Sided Passion
Description: A partially paralyzed teenager is failing to have sex for the first time. He's eager but clumsy and sickly, so the local country girls reject him. He starts to realize that the only affectionate person in his life is his beautiful mother.

Title: Ju Dou
Description: In rural China, the young bride of a tyrannical owner of a silk-dyeing business finds temporary solace in the arms of her husband's nephew, but problems arise when she becomes pregnant.

Title: Line of Duty
Description: Four friends from the rough side of town grow apart when two are consumed by a life of crime, and the other two become FBI agents sent deep undercover - to bring down those childhood friends.

Title: The War Lord
Description: In 11th century Normandy, a Norman duke sends one of his knights to build a defensive fortress in order to guard the borders against Frisian raiders.

Title: Libeled Lady
Description: When a socialite sues a big paper for libel, the editor responsible calls in the help of his ignored fiancée and a former employee to frame her and make the false story seem true.

Title: Mea Culpa
Description: Follows an ambitious criminal defense attorney that, in his aspiration to be named partner, takes on a murder case of an artist.

Title: Back Fork
Description: When the strain of tragedy was too much for a young couple in Appalachia, prescription pills became the medicine to ease the pain.

Title: Happy Life
Description: A woman embarks on a mission of self-discovery after she suspects her workaholic husband of having an affair.

Title: Lovesong
Description: The relationship between two friends deepens during an impromptu road trip.

Title: The Lost Door
Description: Obsession, sex, and illusion are depicted in a series of parallel stories. Alex, a museum guard is love-struck with Nicole with whom he lives. She meets a naive Amazon, Kristina, who likewise falls desperately in love with the young woman. Kristina enlists the help of an intellectual playboy to break up the couple who by theorizing on the "love-virus and the futility of romance manages to manipulate Nicole before being mysteriously murdered. Kristina is arrested as a suspect. The Lost Door opens while Kristina is being interrogated in a psychiatric hospital where she has been committed. Catherine, a young and beautiful psychiatrist has been assigned by the court to discover what goes on in the deranged yet intriguing mind of this suspected murderer, haunted by ghosts and strange sexual situations. After a long confrontation, it's the mysterious Kristina who opens up the young psychiatrists mind to her own repressed desires.

Title: Containment
Description: What happens when an epidemic breaks out, but you're kept in the dark? Anything can happen. Slowly the residents realize that they will all die unless they come together.

Title: Naughty
Description: Follows Mallory, whose only chance to get custody of her son back from her trash-bag of a former boyfriend is to track down Santa Claus and persuade him to appear in court.

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Mahi
Description: Life story of cricketer and former team India captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni.

Title: Caged Women
Description: Delinquent women are shipped to an island prison run by the sadistic warden Carla. Forced into situations of sexual perversion and violence and torture, the prisoners band together to try to overthrow Carla and escape the island.

Title: Frida
Description: Frida is an artist, but experiences difficulties selling her paintings. A lesbian herself, she is forced to earn a living in dubious ways, satisfying sexual fantasies of VIP clients.

Title: Conversation Piece
Description: A reclusive retired professor is faced with confronting modernity when a group of vulgar youths led by an obnoxious marchesa take up residence in his unused upper residence.

Title: School for Sex
Description: Lord Wingate, aquitted after appearing in court for fraud, starts up a 'finishing school' for girls. He enlists the help of the Duchess of Burwood and Hector. The first batch of pupils come from Holloway prison.

Title: Slapface
Description: A boy deals with the loss of his mother by creating a dangerous relationship with a monster rumored to live in the woods.

Title: Rich Flu
Description: Explores how far people would go to save themselves when the wealth that made the world go round then becomes its most dangerous commodity after a strange disease threatens to kill anyone with any sort of fortune.

Title: Penelope
Description: Comedy about a flighty, bored, kleptomaniac wife of a banker who robs her husband's bank of $60,000.

Title: Who Killed Teddy Bear
Description: In New York, a disco hostess is stalked by a sexual predator and she requests help from a vice squad detective who takes a personal interest in the case.

Title: Greek Pete
Description: A year in the life of a London rent-boy.

Title: The 10 Year Plan
Description: Best friends make a pact to be together in a decade if neither finds love. With two months left until their deadline, they both scramble to find someone to avoid being each other's last resort.

Title: Toilet: A Love Story
Description: A woman threatens to leave her husband unless he installs a toilet in their home. To win back her love and respect, he heads out on a journey to fight against the backward society.

Title: A Single Girl
Description: One morning Valerie has to tell her unemployed boyfriend Remi that she is pregnant. She has decided to keep the child, but they argue whether they should break up or not. That same day she starts working in room service at a smart hotel.

Title: The Big Sky
Description: The success of the journey focuses on keeping the Indian girl alive as well as themselves to complete trade with the Blackfeet.

Title: Mourning Wife
Description: Director Daisuke Goto, the master of the cinematic Pink Eiga, is back with this retelling of the classic film noir, The Postman Always Rings Twice. A married woman, tasked with running her handicapped husband's failing printing business, meets a drifter and they fall in love. Soon a plan to murder the husband is put into motion and the forces of fate begin to show their hand. Featuring bravura filmmaking, fantastic performances and steamy sex, the Mourning Wife is a worthy follow up for any fan of Daisuke Goto's masterpiece A Lonely Cow Weeps at Dawn. Directed by Daisuke Goto

Title: Into the Inferno
Description: An exploration of active volcanoes around the world.

Title: Illicit Dreams
Description: A man and a woman sharing a psychic link meet and fall in love, but the woman's influential and powerful husband stands in their way.

Title: This Sporting Life
Description: Despite success on the field, a rising rugby star senses the emerging emptiness of his life as his inner angst begins to materialize through aggression and brutality, so he attempts to woo his landlady in hopes of finding reason to live.

Title: Johnny Keep Walking!
Description: Fitter Hu Jianlin gets promoted during layoffs, but his rural roots clash with corporate culture. Can he survive office politics and uncover the truth?

Title: The Red Queen Kills Seven Times
Description: Two sisters inherit their family castle, which is said to be haunted by their ancestor, a dark-haired, red-robed woman who is said to take seven lives every hundred years.

Title: Impact
Description: A unfaithful wife plots with her lover to kill her husband, but the lover is accidentally killed instead. The husband stays in hiding and lets his wife be charged with conspiracy.

Title: Trading Paint
Description: Veteran race car driver Sam Munroe and his son, a fellow driver from a small town overcome family and professional conflicts, balancing competition, ego, resentment and a racing nemesis to come out stronger on the other side.

Title: The Couch Trip
Description: A burnt-out shrink needs a temp. A charming escaped convict takes over his practice and radio show.

Title: Omar and Cedric: If This Ever Gets Weird
Description: Having worked with the likes of Coldplay, PJ Harvey and Mumford and Sons, this director charts the intimate, artistic and personal relationship between Omar Rodriguez-López and Cedric Bixler-Zavala from progressive band The Mars Volta.

Title: Yaariyan
Description: A college student must win an inter college competition to save his college from being demolished by property builders.

Title: Slammed!
Description: Some rise by sin, some by virtue fall.

Title: Life During Wartime
Description: Friends, family, and lovers struggle to find love, forgiveness, and meaning in an almost war-torn world riddled with comedy and pathos.

Title: Girl from Nowhere
Description: A Cape Town couple, Katherine and Hugh, are headed to their mountain getaway, when they pick up a young woman hitchhiker, Liza, who carries a gun and may or may not be the devil herself.

Title: Hell Drivers
Description: A rookie trucker tries to expose his boss' rackets.

Title: Rumspringa
Description: A young Amish man travels to Berlin on a rite of passage to connect with his roots, explore other ways of life, fall in love — and face a big decision.

Title: Sweetness in the Belly
Description: Based on the novel by Camilla Gibb, Lilly is an English child abandoned in Africa, forced to flee Ethiopia for England amid civil war. There she befriends Amina, an Ethiopian refugee, and they begin a mission to reunite scattered families.

Title: Wolf Warrior
Description: A Chinese special force soldier with extraordinary marksmanship is confronted by a group of deadly foreign mercenaries who are hired to assassinate him by a vicious drug lord.

Title: Claudine
Description: In the 1970s Harlem, garbage collector Roop feels intimidated by the idea of dating Claudine who is a single mother of six on welfare.

Title: What the #$*! Do We (K)now!?
Description: A fictional photographer's quest to spiritually rediscover herself is interspersed with documentary footage of scientists and theologians discussing the philosophical aspects of quantum physics.

Title: Loose Cannons
Description: Tommaso is the youngest son of the Cantones, a large, traditional southern Italian family operating a pasta-making business since the 1960s. On a trip home from Rome, where he studies literature and lives with his boyfriend, Tommaso decides to tell his parents the truth about himself. But when he is finally ready to come out in front of the entire family, his older brother Antonio ruins his plans.

Title: Twin Sisters
Description: Twin sisters Lotte and Anne grow up very differently after their parents death. Now adults, they want to reunite but World War II and their growing socioeconomic differences complicate things.

Title: The Purge: Survival
Description: Blake Simmons and her fiancé, Colin Ford, are invited to the home of Blake's mother, Laurel, to wait out the night of the purge, however, it is a trap that was constructed to kill Blake and collect her life insurance the next day.

Title: Run with the Hunted
Description: Oscar, a young boy, defends his best friend, Loux, and kills her abusive father in the process, forcing him to run away from his rural hometown. His innocence slips away as he is introduced to love, crime and corruption.

Title: Terra Willy
Description: Upon the destruction of their ship, Willy is separated from his parents. He lands on a wild and unexplored planet and with the help of Buck, a survival robot, he will have to hold until the arrival of a rescue mission.

Title: Miracle: Letters to the President
Description: Dreaming of making a train station for his sister and the villagers, Joon-kyung sends many letters to the president, but with no reply. Ra-hee, who has a crush on Joon-kyung, does everything she can to help him meet the president.

Title: Frøken Nitouche
Description: A convent girl school's music teacher has composed an operetta. He has to escort his best student to an arranged marriage, but they head for his theater premiere instead.

Title: The Good Earth
Description: Although married Chinese farmers Wang and O-Lan initially experience success, their lives are complicated by declining fortunes and lean times, as well as the arrival of the beautiful young Lotus.

Title: Bunny and the Bull
Description: A young shut-in takes an imaginary road trip inside his apartment, based on mementos and memories of a European trek from years before.

Title: Hussy
Description: Beaty (Dame Helen Mirren) is a prostitute working out of a high-class London cabaret where Emory (John Shea) is a technician. They begin an affair encumbered by her job, his lack of money, and their pasts: She has an abusive former lover, the father of her ten-year-old son and possibly her pimp, Alex (Paul Angelis), a strong-arm gorilla type fresh out of prison also arrives, needing a place to stay. Alex is clearly a brutish psychopath who threatens Beaty and Emory's future. Emory's wife died in questionable circumstances and he has a shady friend, Max (Murray Salem), who shows up with a scheme for making lots of money. Beaty and Emory want to sort things out, but the odds are against them. Life is no cabaret.

Title: The Crimson Pirate
Description: During the 1700s, pirate Captain Vallo seizes a British warship and gets involved in various money-making schemes involving Caribbean rebels led by El Libre, British envoy Baron Jose Gruda, and a beautiful courtesan named Consuelo.

Title: Five Dolls for an August Moon
Description: An industrialist invites his colleagues to his private island so they can exploit a resin formula invented by one of the guests, but a killer within the group disrupts the proceedings.

Title: The Student Nurses
Description: Sexy young nurses apply special therapy in their daily rounds.

Title: Above Suspicion
Description: A paralyzed cop struggles with his life following a failed special operation and gets depressed. His wife and brother try to get him out of that state which causes a series of unpredictable events.

Title: Tin Men
Description: A minor car accident drives two rival aluminum-siding salesmen to the ridiculous extremes of man versus man in 1963 Baltimore.

Title: We're Not Married!
Description: In separate stories, five couples learn that they are not legally married.

Title: Snow Angels
Description: A drama that interweaves the life of a teenager, with his old baby sitter, her estranged husband, and their daughter.

Title: Who Can Kill a Child?
Description: A couple of English tourists arrive on an island where all the children have gone crazy and are murdering the adults.

Title: Fackham Hall
Description: A new porter forms an odd bond with the youngest daughter of a well-known UK family. As the Davenport family, headed by Lord and Lady Davenport, deals with the epic disaster of the wedding of their eldest daughter to her caddish cousin.

Title: Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing
Description: A widowed Chinese-English doctor falls in love with a married American correspondent in Hong Kong during China's Communist Revolution.

Title: Sweet Country
Description: Western set on the Northern Territory frontier in the 1920s, where justice itself is put on trial when an aged Aboriginal farmhand shoots a white man in self-defense and goes on the run as a posse gathers to hunt him down.

Title: Sweet Sixteen
Description: Determined to have a normal family life once his mother gets out of prison, a Scottish teenager from a tough background sets out to raise the money for a home.

Title: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
